div.seg: A ten-an izuṛan n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yellan si dderya n Sidna Dawed akk-d Sidna Ibṛahim :
Sidna Ibṛahim yeǧǧa-d Isḥaq, Isḥaq yeǧǧa-d Yeɛqub, Yeɛqub yeǧǧa-d Yahuda d watmaten-is.
Yahuda akk-d Tamaṛ ǧǧan-d Fares, akk-d Ziraḥ ; Fares yeǧǧa-d Ḥesrun, Ḥesrun yeǧǧa-d Aram.
Aram yeǧǧa-d Ɛaminadab, Ɛaminadab yeǧǧa-d Naḥsun, Naḥsun yeǧǧa-d Salmun.
Salmun d Raḥab ǧǧan-d Buɛaz, Buɛaz akk-d Rut sɛan-d Ɛubed, Ɛubed yeǧǧa-d Yassa.
Yassa yeǧǧa-d Sidna Dawed, Sidna Dawed yuɣal d agellid, yeǧǧa-d ɣer tmeṭṭut n Uryaḥ Sidna Sliman.
Sidna Sliman yeǧǧa-d Raḥabɛam, Raḥabɛam yeǧǧa-d Abiya, Abiya yeǧǧa-d Asaf,
Asaf yeǧǧa-d Yehucafat ; Yehucafat yeǧǧa-d Yihuram ; Yihuram yeǧǧa-d Ɛuzya ;
Ɛuzya yeǧǧa-d Yuṭam ; Yuṭam yeǧǧa-d Aḥaz ; Aḥaz yeǧǧa-d Ḥizeqya ;
Ḥizeqya yeǧǧa-d Mennac ; Mennac yeǧǧa-d Ɛamun ; Ɛamun yeǧǧa-d Yuciya ;
Yuciya yeǧǧa-d Yixunya akk-d watmaten-is, di lweqt i deg iqaldiyen wwin at Isṛail d imeḥbas ɣer tmurt n Babilun.
Mbeɛd lweqt n usgiǧǧi ɣer tmurtn Babilun, Yixunya yeǧǧa-d Calatyel ; Calatyel yeǧǧa-d Zurubabil .
Zurubabil yeǧǧa-d Abihud. Abihud yeǧǧa-d Ilyaqim ; Ilyaqim yeǧǧa-d Ɛazuṛ ;
Ɛazuṛ yeǧǧa-d Saduq ; Saduq yeǧǧa-d Yaxin ; Yaxin yeǧǧa-d Ilihud.
Ilhud yeǧǧa-d Ilɛazaṛ ; Ilɛazaṛ yeǧǧa-d Mattan ; Mattan yeǧǧa-d Yeɛqub.
Yeɛqub yeǧǧa-d Yusef, d Yusef agi i d argaz n Meryem i d-yeǧǧan Sidna Ɛisa i gețțusemman Lmasiḥ.

Si lweqt n Sidna Ibṛahim armi d lweqt n Sidna Dawed, ɛeddan ṛbeɛṭac n leǧyal. Ɛeddan daɣen ṛbeɛṭac n leǧyal si lweqt n Sidna Dawed armi d lweqt n usgiǧǧi ɣer tmurt n Babilun. Si lweqt-agi n usgiǧǧi armi d lweqt n Lmasiḥ ɛeddan daɣen ṛbeɛṭac n leǧyal.
Atan wamek i d-ilul Sidna Ɛisa : yemma-s Meryem tella tețwaxḍeb i yiwen wergaz ițțusemman Yusef. S tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, terfed s tadist uqbel aț-țeddu ț-țislit.
Yusef axḍib-is, yellan d argaz n ṣṣwab, ur yebɣi ara a ț-țicemmet, dɣa yeqsed ad imsefṛaq yid-es s tuffra.

Akken yețxemmim i waya, yers-ed ɣuṛ-es lmelk n Ṛebbi di targit yenna-yas : A Yusef ! A mmi-s n Dawed ! Ur țțaggad ara aț-țesɛuḍ Meryem ț-țameṭṭut-ik, axaṭer llufan yellan di tɛebbuṭ-is, yusa-yas-d s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.
A d-tesɛu aqcic, a s-tsemmiḍ Ɛisa, axaṭer d nețța ara iselken lumma-s si ddnubat-nsen.
Ayagi akk yedṛa iwakken ad ițwakemmel wayen i d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi seg imi n nnbi Iceɛya :
Ațan tɛezrit aț-țerfed tadist, a d-tesɛu aqcic ad ițțusemmi Imanuwil yeɛni :« Ṛebbi yid-nneɣ.»
Mi i d-yuki Yusef, ixdem ayen i s-d-yenna lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi, yeqbel Meryem aț-țili ț-țameṭṭut-is ; yewwi-ț-id ɣer wexxam-is.
Meɛna ur ț-innul ara armi i d-tesɛa mmi-s iwumi isemma Ɛisa.
Sidna Ɛisa ilul di taddart n Bitelḥem, di tmurt n Yahuda di lweqt n ugellid Hiṛudus ameqqran, kra n imusnawen usan-d si cceṛq ɣer temdint n Lquds, iwakken ad steqsin :
anda ilul llufan-nni ara yilin d agellid n wat Isṛail ? Axaṭer nwala-d itri-ines si cceṛq, nusa-d a t-neɛbed.
Agellid Hiṛudus akk-d imezdaɣ n temdint n Lquds meṛṛa dehcen, yerwi lxaṭer-nsen mi slan s lexbaṛ-agi.
Hiṛudus yesnejmaɛ-ed akk lmuqedmin d lɛulama n wegdud, isteqsa-ten ɣef wemkan anda ara d-ilal Lmasiḥ ara d-yasen.
Nnan-as : Ahat di tmurt n Yahuda di taddart n Bitelḥem ! Axaṭer atan wayen i gura nnbi Mixa :
I kemm a taddart n Bitelḥem, ur telliḍ ara ț-țaneggarut ger temdinin n Yahuda, axaṭer seg-em ara d-iffeɣ ugellid ara yeksen at Isṛail agdud-iw.
Hiṛudus yessawel i imusnawen nni s tuffra, isteqsa-ten si melmi i walan itri-nni.
Dɣa iceggeɛ-iten ɣer Bitelḥem, yenna-yasen : Nadit lexbaṛ n ṣṣeḥ ɣef weqcic-agi, m'ara t-tafem, init-iyi-d iwakken ad ṛuḥeɣ ula d nekk a t-ɛabdeɣ.
Mi slan i ugellid, ṛuḥen. AAkken kan i ffɣen, walan itri-nni i ẓran di cceṛq yezwar, iteddu zdat-sen. MMi gewweḍ sennig wemkan anda yella weqcic-nni, yeḥbes.
Feṛḥen aṭas mi walan itri-nni.
Kecmen ɣer wexxam-nni, walan llufan akk-d yemma-s Meryem ; tɛeǧben s weqcic-nni dɣa seǧǧden zdat-es. FFsin tiyemmusin-nsen, fkan-as tirezfin : ddheb, lebxuṛ akk-d leɛṭeṛ ɣlayen.
Sidi Ṛebbi ixebbeṛ-iten-id di targit ur țțuɣalen ara ɣer Hiṛudus, dɣa uɣalen ɣer tmurt-nsen seg ubrid nniḍen.

Mi ṛuḥen, lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi idheṛ-as-ed i Yusef di targit, yenna-yas-ed :-- Kker, ddem aqcic akk-d yemma-s, rewlet ɣer tmurt n Maṣeṛ, qqimet dinna alamma nniɣ-ak-ed a d-tuɣaleḍ, axaṭer Hiṛudus ad iqelleb ɣef weqcic-agi iwakken a t-ineɣ.
Yusef ikker yewwi aqcic-nni akk-d yemma-s deg iḍ, yerwel ɣer tmurt n Maṣeṛ.
Yeqqim dinna armi yemmut Hiṛudus, iwakken ad idṛu wayen i d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi seg imi n nnbi Huceɛ : Ssawleɣ-as i Mmi a d-iffeɣ si tmurt n Maṣer.

Mi gwala Hiṛudus belli kelxen-t imusnawen-nni, ikcem-it zzɛaf d ameqqran, iceggeɛ ɣer taddart n Bitelḥem akk-d ț-țmura i s-d-izzin, ad nɣen arrac meṛṛa yesɛan si sin iseggasen d akessar, s wakken yella leḥsab i s-d-fkan imusnawen-nni.
Dɣa yețwakemmel wayen i d yenna nnbi Irmiya :
Yekker leɛyaḍ di taddart n Rama, nesla i imeṭṭawen d umeǧǧed, d Ṛaḥil i gețrun ɣef warraw-is, tegguma aț-țesbeṛ fell-asen, axaṭer mmuten.
Mi gemmut Hiṛudus ameqqran, lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi iweḥḥa-d i Yusef di targit mi gella di tmurt n Maṣer,
yenna-yas : Kker, ddem aqcic d yemma-s tuɣaleḍ ɣer tmurt n wat Isṛail, axaṭer wid yebɣan ad nɣen aqcic-nni, mmuten.
Yusef iddem aqcic-nni d yemma-s, yuɣal ɣer tmurt n wat Isṛail
Meɛna mi gesla belli d Aṛxilyus mmi-s n Hiṛudus, i gellan d agellid ɣef tmurt n Yahuda, yuggad. SSidi Ṛebbi iɛeggen-as-ed di targit, iṛuḥ ɣer tmurt n Jlili,
izdeɣ deg yiwet n taddart ițțusemman Naṣaret, iwakken ad yedṛu wayen i d-nnan lenbiya : Ad ițțusemmi Anaṣari.
Deg wussan-nni, iban-ed Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas, yețbecciṛ deg unezṛuf n tmurt n Yahuda,
iqqaṛ-ed : Tubet, beddlet tikli, axaṭer tagelda n igenwan tqeṛṛeb-ed.
Fell-as i d-immeslay nnbi Iceɛya mi d-yenna : Ț-țaɣect n win ițɛeggiḍen di lxali : Heggit abrid n Sidi Ṛebbi, ssemsawit iberdan-is.
Yeḥya yelsa llebsa yețwaxedmen s ccɛeṛ n welɣem, tabagust n weglim ɣef wammas-is, tamɛict-is d ibẓaẓ akk-d tament n lexla.
Imezdaɣ meṛṛa n temdint n Lquds, tamurt n Yahuda akk-d tmura i d-yezzin i wasif n Urdun, țțasen-d ɣuṛ-es
iwakken a d-qiṛṛen s ddnubat nsen, nețța yesseɣḍas-iten deg wasif nni n Urdun.
Mi gwala aṭas n at ifariziyen d isaduqiyen i d-ițasen ad țwaɣeḍsen, yenna-yasen : A ccetla n izerman, anwa i kkun isfaqen belli tzemrem aț-țrewlem i lḥisab i d-iteddun ?
Sbeggnet-ed s lecɣal-nwen belli tettubem, tbeddlem tikli.
Ur qqaṛet ara i yiman-nwen : « Sidna Ibṛahim d jeddi-tneɣ » ! Axaṭer, a wen-iniɣ : SSidi Ṛebbi yezmer a d-yefk dderya i Ibṛahim seg idɣaɣen-agi.
Ațan ihi tcaquṛt thegga ɣer izuṛan n ttjuṛ, yal ttejṛa ur d-nețțak ara lfakya lɛali, aț-țețwagzem, aț-țețwaḍeggeṛ ɣer tmes.
Nekk sseɣḍaseɣ-kkun deg waman iwakken aț-țetubem, lameɛna a d-yas yiwen yesɛan tazmert akteṛ-iw, ur uklaleɣ ara a s-fsiɣ ula d arkasen is. Nețța a kkun-yesseɣḍes s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ț-țmes.
Tazzert deg ufus-is, ad yebrez annar-is, ad ijmeɛ irden-is ɣer ikuffan, ma d alim a t-yesseṛɣ di tmes ur nxețți.
Sidna Ɛisa yusa-d si tmurt n Jlili ɣer wasif n Urdun iwakken a t- yesseɣḍes Yeḥya.
Yeḥya yugi, yenna-yas : D nekk i geḥwaǧen ad iyi- tesɣeḍseḍ, kečč tusiḍ-ed ɣuṛ-i iwakken a k-sɣeḍseɣ !
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Anef tura ! Akkagi i glaq a nexdem lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi ! DDɣa Yeḥya yunef-as.
Mi gețwaɣḍes Sidna Ɛisa, yeffeɣ-ed seg waman ; imiren kan ldin igenwan, yers-ed fell-as Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi s ṣṣifa n tetbirt.
Tekka-d yiwet n taɣect seg igenwan, tenna-d : «` Wagi d Mmi ameɛzuz, deg-s i gella lfeṛḥ-iw ! »
Imiren Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yewwi Sidna Ɛisa ɣer unezṛuf iwakken a t-ijeṛṛeb Cciṭan.
Mi guẓam ṛebɛin wussan d ṛebɛin wuḍan, yuɣal yelluẓ.
Iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-es Yeblis yenna-yas : Ma d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi i telliḍ, ini-yasen i yedɣaɣen-agi ad uɣalen d aɣṛum.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yura di tira iqedsen : Mačči s weɣṛum kan ara iɛic wemdan, lameɛna s mkul awal i d-ițasen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi.
Cciṭan yewwi-t ɣer temdint n Lquds issers-it ɣef yixef n lǧameɛ iqedsen,

yenna-yas : Ma d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi i telliḍ, ḍeggeṛ iman-ik d akessar, anaɣ yura : Sidi Ṛebbi ad yefk lameṛ i lmalayekkat-is fell-ak, aa k-awint ger ifassen-nsent iwakken ad ḥadrent aḍar-ik ɣef yedɣaɣe n .
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yura daɣen : Ur tețjeṛṛibeḍ ara Sidi Ṛebbi IIllu-inek .
Cciṭan yewwi-t daɣen ɣef wedrar ɛlayen, isken-as-ed tigeldiwin meṛṛa n ddunit d lɛaḍima-nsent, yenna-yas :
A k-tent-fkeɣ meṛṛa ma yella tseǧǧdeḍ zdat-i a yi-tɛebdeḍ.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Beɛɛed akkin fell-i a Cciṭan, axaṭer yura : Anagar Sidi Ṛebbi-inek ara tɛebdeḍ , i nețța kan iwumi ara tseǧdeḍ .
Dɣa Cciṭan iṭṭaxeṛ fell-as. Imiren usant-ed lmalayekkat ɣuṛ-es, iwakken a s-qedcent.
Mi gesla s Yeḥya yețwaḥbes, Sidna Ɛisa yuɣal ɣer tmurt n Jlili.
Iffeɣ si taddart n Naṣaret, iṛuḥ ad izdeɣ di Kafernaḥum ; ț-țamdint yyellan rrif n lebḥeṛ di leǧwahi n tmura n Zabulun d Nefṭali,
iwakken ad yedṛu wayen yenna nnbi Iceɛya :
A tamurt n Zabulun akk-d Nefṭali, a timura iqeṛben lebḥeṛ akkin i wasif n Urdun , a tamurt n Jlili i deg zedɣen leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail,
agdud-nni yezgan di ṭṭlam, iwala tafat tameqqrant, wid izedɣen di ṭṭlam n lmut, tceṛq-ed fell-asen tafat !
Seg imiren, Sidna Ɛisa yebda yețbecciṛ yeqqaṛ : Tubet, uɣalet-ed ɣer webrid, axaṭer tagelda n igenwan tqeṛṛeb-ed.
Mi gțeddu Sidna Ɛisa ɣef rrif n lebḥeṛ n Jlili, iwala sin iḥewwaten : SSemɛun ițțusemman Buṭrus akk-d gma-s Andriyus. Llan ṭeggiṛen icebbaken-nsen ɣer lebḥeṛ, țṣeggiḍen.
Yenna-yasen : Ddut-ed yid-i, a kkun-rreɣ d iṣeggaḍen n yemdanen.
Dɣa imiren kan, ǧǧan icebbaken nsen, ddan yid-es.
Mi gerna yelḥa kra, iwala sin watmaten nniḍen : Yeɛqub d Yuḥenna yellan d arraw n Zabadi. LLlan akk-d baba-tsen di teflukt, țxiḍin icebbaken-nsen.
Yessawel-asen, imiren kan ǧǧan dinna baba-tsen, taflukt-nni, ṛuḥen ddan yid-es.
Syenna, Sidna Ɛisa yekka-d tamurt n Jlili meṛṛa, yesselmad di leǧwameɛ n wat Isṛail, yețbecciṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n tgeldit n Ṛebbi, isseḥlay yal aṭan d yal leɛyubat n lɣaci.
Slan yis ula di tmurt n Surya meṛṛa ; țțawin-as-ed imuḍan i ghelken si mkul aṭan : wid ițwamelken, wid iwumi yețṛuḥu leɛqel akk-d wukrifen. Sidna Ɛisa isseḥla-ten akk.
D izumal n lɣaci i t-id-itebɛen si tmurt n Jlili, si ɛecṛa n temdinin-nni, si temdint n Lquds, si tmurt n Yahuda akk-d leǧwahi yellan agemmaḍ i wasif n Urdun.
Mi gwala annect-nni n lɣaci, Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer wedrar iqqim. Inelmaden-is qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es,
dɣa ibda isselmad-iten :
D iseɛdiyen wid ițeddun s neyya, aaxaṭer tagelda n igenwan d ayla-nsen !
D iseɛdiyen wid ițrun, axaṭer ad țwaṣebbṛen !
D iseɛdiyen wid ḥninen, aaxaṭer ad weṛten tamurt i sen-iwɛed Sidi Ṛebbi !
D iseɛdiyen wid illuẓen, iffuden lḥeqq, axaṭer ad ṛwun !
D iseɛdiyen wid yesɛan ṛṛeḥma deg wulawen-nsen, aaxaṭer ad iḥunn fell-asen Sidi Ṛebbi !
D iseɛdiyen wid iwumi yeṣfa wul, axaṭer ad walin Sidi Ṛebbi !
D iseɛdiyen wid i d-isrusun talwit, aad țțusemmin d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi !
D iseɛdiyen wid ițțuqehṛen ɣef lḥeqq, aaxaṭer ddewla igenwan d ayla-nsen !
D iseɛdiyen ara tilim, m'ara kkun-regmen, mm'ara tețwaqehṛem, m'ara xedmen deg-wen lbaṭel ɣef ddemma-w.
Feṛḥet, ilit di lfeṛḥ, axaṭer ṛṛezq-nwen d ameqqran deg igenwan, aakka i țwaqehṛen lenbiya i kkun-id izwaren.
D kunwi i d lmelḥ n ddunit, lameɛna ma tṛuḥ-as lbenna i lmelḥ, s wacu ara s-ț-id-nerr ? Yelha kan ma nḍeggeṛ-it ɣer beṛṛa a t-rekkḍen yemdanen.
D kunwi i ț-țafat n ddunit ; taddart yellan ɣef wudrar ulamek ara teffer !
Akken daɣen, ur nceɛɛel ara taftilt iwakken a ț-nɣumm s kra, meɛna a ț-nessers ɣef lmeṣbeḥ, iwakken aț-țfeǧǧeǧ i wid akk yellan deg wexxam.
Akka i glaq aț-țecceɛceɛ tafat-nwen zdat yemdanen, iwakken ad walin lecɣal-nwen ilhan, yerna ad ḥemden Baba-twen yellan deg igenwan.
Ɣuṛ-wat aț-țɣilem usiɣ-ed ad sseɣliɣ ayen i d-tenna ccariɛa d wayen i d-nnan lenbiya ! Ur d-usiɣ ara ad sseɣliɣ, lameɛna usiɣ-ed ad snekmaleɣ.
A wen-iniɣ tideț : skud mazal igenwan d lqaɛa, ula d yiwen wawal neɣ usekkil n ccariɛa ur imeḥḥu, alamma yedṛa wayen akk yuran deg-s.

Win ur nqudeṛ ara ula d yiwen n lameṛ amecṭuḥ n ccariɛa, yerna isselmad i wiyaḍ ad xedmen am nețța, ad ițwaḥseb d amecṭuḥ akk di tgelda n igenwan. MMa d win ixeddmen ayen i d-tenna ccariɛa, yerna isselmad i wiyaḍ ad xedmen akken, ad yili d ameqqran di tgelda n igenwan.
Axaṭer a wen-iniɣ, ma yella ur tuɣem ara awal i Sidi Ṛebbi akteṛ n wakken tețțaɣem awal i yimusnawen n ccariɛa d ifariziyen, ur tkeččmem ara tagelda n igenwan.
Teslam daɣen s leqwanen i d- ițțunefken i lejdud-nneɣ : Ur tneqqeḍ ara tamgeṛt, WWin ara yenɣen tamgeṛṭ, ad iɛeddi di ccṛeɛ, ad ițwaḥkem fell-as.

Ma d nekk a wen-iniɣ : kra n win ara izeɛfen ɣef gma-s, ad iɛeddi di ccṛeɛ. Win ara yinin i gma-s : « ay abuhal, » ad ibedd zdat wesqamu n ccraɛ. Win ara yinin i gma-s : « ay amehbul, » yuklal ad ikcem ɣer ǧahennama.
M'ara tțedduḍ aț-țefkeḍ lweɛda i Sidi Ṛebbi, temmektaḍ-ed zdat n wemkan n iseflawen belli gma-k iṭṭef-ak cceḥna,
eǧǧ dinna lweɛda-nni, tṛuḥeḍ uqbel aț-ḍelbeḍ ssmaḥ i gma-k, d wamek ara tefkeḍ lweɛda-k i Sidi Ṛebbi.

Ma yella iḍlem-ik yiwen, tedduklem di sin ɣer wexxam n ccṛeɛ, ɣiwel msefham kečč yid-es deg ubrid, m'ulac axṣim-ik a k-yawi ɣer lḥakem, lḥakem a k-yefk i wɛessas, aɛessas-nni, a k-yerr ɣer lḥebs.
A k-iniɣ tideț : ur d-țeffɣeḍ ara syenna alamma txellṣeḍ aṣurdi aneggaru n ṭṭlaba-inek.
Teslam belli qqaṛen-d : ur xeddem ara asekkak yeɛni zzna.
Lameɛna, nekkini a wen-d-iniɣ : win ara imuqlen tameṭṭut, imenna deg ul-is ad iznu yid-es, atan am akken izna yid-es.
Daymi ma yella ț-țiṭ-ik tayeffust i k-ițawin ɣer leḥṛam, qleɛ-iț, ḍeggeṛ-iț akkin fell-ak. Axaṭer axiṛ-ak a k-iṛuḥ yiwen si lemfaṣel-ik wala aț-țkecmeḍ s lekmal-ik ɣer ǧahennama.
Ma yella s ufus-ik ayeffus i txeddmeḍ leḥṛam, gzem-it, tḍegṛeḍ-t akkin fell-ak, axiṛ-ak a k-ixaṣ ufus wala ma tkecmeḍ s lekmal-ik ɣer ǧahennama.
Qqaṛen-d daɣen : Win ara yebrun i tmeṭṭut-is, a s-yefk lkaɣeḍ n berru .
Lameɛna nekkini a wen-iniɣ : win ara yebrun i tmeṭṭut-is, yili ur tezni ara, d nețța i ț-iwelhen ɣer zzna ma tezweǧ d wayeḍ. Daɣen win yuɣen tameṭṭut innebran, ula d nețța yezna.
Teslam daɣen s wayen i d-nnan i lejdud-nneɣ : Ur ḥennet ara, lameɛna ayen i tɛuhdeḍ s limin zdat Sidi Ṛebbi, ilaq a t-txedmeḍ.
Meɛna nekk a wen-iniɣ : ur țgallat ara maḍi ! Ur țgallat s igenni, axaṭer d amkan n lḥekma n Sidi Ṛebbi,
ur țgallat s lqaɛa axaṭer fell-as i gesrusu iḍaṛṛen-is, neɣ s Lquds imi ț-țamdint n ugellid ameqqran.
Ur țgallat ara daɣen : « s yixef n uqeṛṛuy-nwen » axaṭer ur tezmirem ara aț-țerrem ula d yiwen wenẓad d aberkan neɣ d amellal.
Init « ih » ma ilaq aț-ținim ih, neɣ « xaṭi » ma ilaq aț-ținim xaṭi ; ayen akk ara ternum d zzyada, s ɣuṛ Cciṭan i d-ițas.
Teslam s wayen i d-qqaṛen : Tiṭ s tiṭ, tuɣmest s tuɣmest.
Meɛna nekk a wen-iniɣ : ma yella win i wen-ixedmen cceṛ ur țțarat ara țțaṛ. Ma iwwet-ik yiwen ɣer lḥenk ayeffus, sken-as lḥenk nniḍen.
Ma yebɣa yiwen a k-isiweḍ ɣer ccṛeɛ iwakken a k-ikkes aqenduṛ-ik, rnu-yas ula d abeṛnus-ik.
Ma yella iḥṛes-ik walebɛaḍ a s-tbibbeḍ taɛkumt azgen webrid-is, kečč awi-yas-ț armi d axxam.
Efk-as ayen yeḥwaǧ i win i k-d-issutren, ur reggel ara ɣef win ibɣan ad yerḍel s ɣuṛ-ek.
Teslam i wayen i d-qqaṛen : Ḥemmel amdakkel-ik, tkeṛheḍ aɛdaw ik.
Nekk a wen-iniɣ : ḥemmlet iɛdawen-nwen i kkun ițqehhiṛen. BBarket wid i kkun-ineɛlen, xedmet lxiṛ i wid i kkun-ikeṛhen, dɛut s lxiṛ i wid i kkun-iḍelmen, akk-d wid i kkun-ițqehhiṛen.

S wakka ara d-tbanem d arraw n Baba-twen yellan deg igenwan, axaṭer nețța icṛeq-ed iṭij-is ama ɣef wid yelhan ama ɣef yemcumen, yețțak-ed ageffur ( lehwa ) ama i wid ixeddmen lxiṛ, ama i wid ixeddmen cceṛ.
Ma yella tḥemmlem kan wid i kkun-iḥemmlen, d acu n lfayda ara tesɛum ? Ula d imekkasen n tebzert ( leɣṛama ) xeddmen akenni.
Ma yella tețțemsalamem d watmaten-nwen kan, d acu n lxiṛ i txedmem ? Ula d imednuben xeddmen akken.
Sfut ihi akken yeṣfa Baba-twen n igenwan.
Ayen txeddmem i Sidi Ṛebbi, ur t-id-sbegginet ara iwakken a kkun-walin medden, m'ulac ur tseɛɛum ara lfayda ɣer Baba-twen yellan deg igenwan.
M'ara tseddqeḍ, ur țberriḥ ara am akken xeddmen at sin wudmawen di leǧwameɛ neɣ deg iberdan, iwakken ad sɛun ccan ɣer yemdanen. A wen iniɣ tideț : d ayagi kan i d lfayda-nsen.
Ma d kečč m'ara tseddqeḍ, ilaq afus-ik ayeffus ur ițwali ara wayen ixeddem ufus-ik azelmaḍ ;
iwakken ssadaqa-inek aț-țeqqim di sser, akka ara tețwaqebleḍ ɣer Baba Ṛebbi yețwalin ayen txeddmeḍ di sser.
M'ara tețẓallam, ur xeddmet ara am at sin wudmawen iḥemmlen ad ẓallen s ibeddi di leǧwameɛ neɣ deg iberdan iwakken a ten-walin medden. AA wen-iniɣ tideț : d ayagi kan i d lfayda-nsen.
Ma d kečč m'ara tebɣuḍ aț-țẓalleḍ, ṛuḥ ekcem ɣer texxamt-ik, sekkeṛ tawwurt, tedɛuḍ di sser ɣer Baba Ṛebbi, nețța yețwalin ayen yellan di sser, a k-id-iqbel.
M'ara tețẓallam, ur sṭuqqutet ara lehduṛ am akken xeddmen at ddunit, ɣilen s lketṛa n imeslayen ara d țwaqeblen.
Ur ten-țɛanadet ara, axaṭer Baba Ṛebbi yeẓra d acu teḥwaǧem uqbel a s-t-tessutrem.
Atah wamek ilaq aț-țețẓallam : AA Baba-tneɣ yellan deg igenwan, iisem-ik ad ițwaqeddes,
lḥekma n tgeldit-ik a d-tass, llebɣi-k ad idṛu di lqaɛa aakken yedṛa deg igenwan.
Efk-aɣ-d mkul ass tamɛict-nneɣ.
Semmeḥ-aɣ ddnubat-nneɣ aakken i nețsamaḥ i wid i ɣ-iḍelmen.
Ssebɛed fell-aɣ ajeṛṛeb, ssellek-aɣ si tḥila n Cciṭan. AAxaṭer ɣuṛ-ek i tella tgeldit, ttazmert d lɛaḍima i dayem. Amin !
Ma yella tețsamaḥem i yemdanen ii wen-ixeddmen cceṛ, Baba Ṛebbi yyellan deg igenwan a wen-isameḥ uula i kunwi.
Lameɛna ma yella kkunwi ur tețsamaḥem ara i wiyaḍ, aatan Baba Ṛebbi ur a wen-ițsamaḥ aara ula i kunwi ddnubat-nwen.
Asmi ara tuẓummem, ur d tesbegginet ara iman-nwen tḥeznem am at sin wudmawen issexsaṛen udmawen-nsen iwakken a ten-țwalin yemdanen belli uẓamen. A wen-iniɣ tideț : d ayagi kan i d lfayda-nsen.
Ma d kečč, m'ara tuẓumeḍ, ssired udem-ik, tdehneḍ aqeṛṛuy-ik s rriḥa,
iwakken yiwen ur k-iɛeqqel belli tuẓameḍ. Ilaq ayagi ad iqqim gar-ak d Baba Ṛebbi ițwalin ayen yellan di sser, nețța a k-id-iqbel.
Ur ssexzanet ara igerrujen di ddunit anda ara ten-yečč ubeɛɛuc d ṣṣdiḍ, anda ara ten-akren wid ifettken leḥyuḍ.
Meɛna sxeznet axiṛ igerrujen deg igenwan anda ur llin ibeɛɛac d ṣṣdiḍ isserkuyen, anda ur zmiren ara imakaren ad fetken neɣ ad akren.
Axaṭer anda yella ugerruj-ik, dinna ara yili wul-ik.
Allen, ț-țiftilin n lǧețța, ma yella seḥḥant wallen-ik, aț-țilliḍ s lekmal-ik di tafat.
Lameɛna, ma yella allen-ik ur seḥḥant ara, aț-țiliḍ di ṭṭlam. Ma yella dɣa allen-ik ur seḥḥant ara, tafat yellan deg-k d ṭṭlam, acḥal ihi berrik ṭṭlam i deg telliḍ.
Ur izmir yiwen ad iqdec ɣef sin imɛellmen deg yiwet n tikkelt. Ma iḥemmel yiwen, ad ikṛeh wayeḍ ; ma yeṭṭef deg yiwen, ad iḥqeṛ wayeḍ. Ur tezmirem ara ihi aț-țɛebdem Ṛebbi akk-d idrimen !

Daymi i wen-d-qqaṛeɣ : ur țḥebbiṛet ara i tudert-nwen, ɣef wayen ara teččem d wayen ara teswem akk-d wayen ara telsem. Acu i gesɛan azal, ț-țudert neɣ d lqut ? D lǧețța neɣ d llebsa ? Tudert tugar lqut, lǧețța tugar llebsa !

Walit igṭaṭ ( ifṛax ) deg igenwan : ur zerrɛen, ur meggren, ur jemmɛen ula d acemma ɣer ikuffan, meɛna Baba-twen yellan deg igenwan, yețțak-asen-d tamɛict-nsen. Eɛni ur teswim ara akteṛ n yefṛax ?
Anwa i gzemren s uḥebbeṛ, ad yernu kra n wussan i leɛmeṛ-is ?
Iwacu ara tḥebbṛem ɣef llebsa ? Walit amek i gemmun ijeǧǧigen n lexla : ur zeṭṭen, ur țellmen,
lameɛna a wen-iniɣ : ula d agellid Sliman s yiman-is di ccan-is ameqqran, ur yelsi am yiwen seg-sen.
Ma yella Ṛebbi islusuy akka leḥcic yellan di lexla ass-agi, azekka ad ițwadeggeṛ ɣer tmes, amek ur kkun-islusu ara ula d kunwi ay imdanen ixuṣṣen di liman ?
Kkset anezgum i yiman-nwen, ur qqaṛet ara : d acu ara nečč, d acu ara nsew neɣ d acu ara nels ?
Axaṭer ayagi d imejhal i gețḥebbiṛen fell-as. Ma d Baba-twen yellan deg igenwan, yeẓra ayen akk teḥwaǧem !
Nadit uqbel ɣef tgeldit n Sidi Ṛebbi d wayen yellan d lḥeqq, ayen nniḍen meṛṛa d nețța ara wen-t-id yefken.
Ur țḥebbiṛet ara ihi i uzekka, axaṭer azekka s unezgum-is weḥd-es. Yal ass s leɛtab-ines !
Ur țḥasabet ara wiyaḍ iwakken ur kkun-ițḥasab ula d yiwen.
Akken tețḥasabem wiyaḍ ara kkun-iḥaseb Sidi Ṛebbi. A wen-d-iktil s lkil s wayes tețțektilim i wiyaḍ.
Acuɣeṛ tețmuqquleḍ axeclaw yellan di tiṭ n gma-k, kečč ur nețwali ara tigejdit yellan di tiṭ-ik ?
Amek ara tiniḍ i gma-k : « Eǧǧ-iyi ad kkseɣ axeclaw-nni yellan di tiṭ-ik, » kečč yesɛan tigejdit di tiṭ-ik ?
A bu sin wudmawen ! Ekkes uqbel tigejdit yellan di tiṭ-ik, imiren aț-țwaliḍ amek ara d-tekkseḍ axeclaw yellan di tiṭ n gma-k.
Ur țțaket ara ayen yeṣfan i yeqjan, ur ṭeggiṛet ara tiɛeqcin ɣlayen zdat yilfan, m'ulac a ten ṛekḍen yerna a d-zzin fell-awen a kkun-gezren.
Ssutret, a wen-d-ițunefk ! Nadit, aț-țafem ! Sqerbebbet, a wen-d-ldin !
Axaṭer kra n win ara issutren, a s-d-ițțunefk ! Win ițnadin, ad yaf ! A s-d-teldi tewwurt i win ara isṭebṭben.
Anwa deg-wen ara yefken ablaḍ i mmi-s ma yessuter-as-d aɣṛum ?
Neɣ, anwa deg-wen ara yefken azrem i mmi-s ma yella yessuter-as-d aslem ?
Ma yella kunwi yellan d imcumen tessnem aț-țefkem ayen yelhan i warraw-nwen, amek Baba twen yellan deg igenwan ur d-ițțak ara ayen yelhan i wid ara s-t-issutren ?
Ihi, xedmet i wiyaḍ ayen i tebɣam a wen-t-xedmen i kunwi, axaṭer akka i ɣ-d-tweṣṣa ccariɛa n Musa akk-d lenbiya.
Kecmet si tewwurt iḍeyqen ! Axaṭer acḥal tewseɛ tewwurt, acḥal yeshel webrid yețțawin ɣer nnger, yerna aṭas i gețɛeddayen syenna.
Meɛna acḥal teḍyeq tewwurt, acḥal yewɛeṛ webrid yețțawin ɣer tudert yerna drus i gețɛeddayen syenna.
Ḥadret iman-nwen si lenbiya n lekdeb ! Țțasen-d ɣuṛ-wen am izamaren, nutni ɣer daxel d uccanen.
A ten-tɛeqlem s lecɣal-nsen. UUr d-nțekkes ara tiẓurin seg inijel, neɣ lexṛif seg isennanen.
Ttejṛa yelhan, tețțak-ed lfakya yelhan, yir ttejṛa tețțak-ed lfakya n diri.
Ttejṛa yelhan ur tezmir ara a d-tefk yir lfakya, akken daɣen yir ttejṛa ur tezmir ara a d-tefk lfakya yelhan.
Yal ttejṛa ur d-nețțak ara lfakya lɛali aț-țețwagzem, aț-țețwaḍeggeṛ ɣer tmes.
S wakka, s lecɣal-nsen ara tɛeqlem lenbiya n lekdeb.
Mačči d wid kan i yi-d-iqqaṛen : « A Sidi, a Sidi » ara ikecmen ɣer tgelda n igenwan, meɛna d wid ixeddmen lebɣi n Baba yellan deg igenwan.
Aṭas ara yi-d-yinin ass n lḥisab : « a Sidi a Sidi, s yisem-ik i nbecceṛ imeslayen s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi, s yisem-ik i nessufeɣ leǧnun, s yisem-ik i nexdem aṭas n lbeṛhanat ! »
Dɣa a sen-d-rreɣ : beɛdet akkin fell-i a wid ixeddmen cceṛ, ur kkun ssineɣ ara !
Akka, s kra n win yesmeḥsisen i wawal-iw yerna ixeddem-it, ițemcabi ɣer wemdan aɛeqli yebnan lsas n wexxam-is ɣef wezṛu.
Ageffur ( lehwa ) yeɣli-d, isaffen ḥemlen-d, aḍu ihubb-ed ɣef wexxam-nni, meɛna ur yeɣli ara, axaṭer lsas-is yers ɣef wezṛu.
Ma d win ismeḥsisen i wawal iw, ur nxeddem ara wayen i d-qqaṛeɣ, icuba ɣer wemdan ur nețxemmim ara, i gebnan axxam-is ɣef ṛṛmel ;
yeɣli-d ugeffur, ḥemlen-d isaffen, ihubb-ed waḍu ɣef wexxam-nni, imiren yeɣli. Lexsaṛa-s ț-țameqqrant !
Mi gfukk Sidna Ɛisa aselmed, lɣaci akk wehmen deg imeslayen-ines,
axaṭer isselmad-iten s tissas, mačči am lecyux-nsen.
Mi d-yuder Sidna Ɛisa seg udrar, aṭas n lɣaci i t-id-itebɛen.
Ataya yiwen wemdan ihelken lbeṛs yusa-d ɣuṛ-es, iseǧǧed zdat-es, yenna-yas : A Sidi, ma yella tebɣiḍ, tzemreḍ a yi-tseḥluḍ.
Sidna Ɛisa yessers afus-is fell-as, yenna-yas : Bɣiɣ ! Ili-k teḥliḍ ! IImiren kan iḥla wergaz-nni si lbeṛs-ines, yeṣfa weglim-is.

Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ḥader aț-țeḥkuḍ ula i yiwen ɣef wayagi, meɛna ṛuḥ ɣer yiwen si lmuqedmin a k-iẓer, ad iwali belli teṣfiḍ, tefkeḍ lweɛda-nni n tezdeg s wayes i wen-d-yumeṛ nnbi Musa, iwakken ayagi a sen-yili d țbut.
Akken i gekcem Sidna Ɛisa ɣer temdint n Kafernaḥum, ataya yiwen umeqqran n lɛeskeṛ n Ṛuman iqeṛṛeb ed ɣuṛ-es, iḥellel-it, yenna yas :
A Sidi, aqeddac-iw yenṭer, atan iḍleq deg wexxam, yekref !
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ad ṛuḥeɣ a t-sseḥluɣ.
Ameqqran n lɛeskeṛ yerra-yas : A Sidi, ur uklaleɣ ara aț-țkecmeḍ ɣer wexxam-iw, meɛna ini-d kan yiwen n wawal, aqeddac-iw ad iḥlu.

Axaṭer nekk s yiman-iw akken sɛiɣ wid iḥekmen fell-i, i sɛiɣ wid yellan seddaw n lḥekma-w. Ad iniɣ i yiwen ṛuḥ ad iṛuḥ, ad iniɣ i wayeḍ aṛwaḥ a d-yas, ad iniɣ daɣen i uqeddac-iw : xdem aya, a t-ixdem.
Mi gesla Sidna Ɛisa imeslayen-agi itɛeǧǧeb, yenna i wid yellan dinna : A wen-iniɣ tideț, ger wat Isṛail meṛṛa ur ufiɣ ara liman am wagi.
A wen-iniɣ daɣen : aṭas ara d-yasen si cceṛq d lɣeṛb, ad ṭṭfen imukan ɣer tama n Ibṛahim, n Isḥaq akk-d Yeɛqub di tgelda n igenwan.
Meɛna aṭas seg wid i gɣilen ad weṛten tagelda ara yețwaḍeggṛen ɣer beṛṛa, ɣer ṭṭlam anda ara ilin imeṭṭawen, nndama tameqqrant akk-d weqṛac n tuɣmas.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna i umeqqran-nni n lɛeskeṛ : Ṛuḥ, imi tumneḍ atan wayen i tḍelbeḍ a k-id-yaweḍ ! DDi teswiɛt-nni, yeḥla uqeddac-is.
Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ ɣer wexxam n Buṭrus, yufa taḍeggalt n Buṭrus deg usu tuɣ-iț tawla.
Innul afus-is, dɣa teffeɣ-iț tawla-nni. Imiren kan tekker-ed, tebda tqeddec-asen.
Mi geɣli yiṭij, wwin-d i Sidna Ɛisa aṭas n yemdanen ițwamelken. S wawal-is, issufeɣ seg-sen leǧnun yerna yesseḥla imuḍan meṛṛa.
Ixdem ayagi iwakken ad ițwakemmel wawal i d-yenna nnbi Iceɛya : Yewwi leɛyub-nneɣ , iɛebba lehlakat-nneɣ .
Sidna Ɛisa mi gwala annect-nni n lɣaci yezzi-yas-d, yumeṛ i inelmaden-is ad zegren ɣer ugemmaḍ n lebḥeṛ.
Yiwen lɛalem n ccariɛa iqeṛṛeb ɣer Sidna Ɛisa, yenna-yas : A Sidi, anda teddiḍ ad dduɣ.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Uccanen sɛan lɣiṛan, ifṛax n igenni sɛan leɛcuc, ma d Mmi-s n bunadem ur yesɛi ara anda ara yessers aqeṛṛuy-is.
Yiwen seg inelmaden-is, yenna-yas : A Sidi, semmeḥ-iyi ad ṛuḥeɣ ad meḍleɣ baba.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Ddu yid-i eǧǧ wid yemmuten ad meḍlen lmegtin-nsen.
Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer teflukt, ddan yid-es inelmaden-is.
Deg yiwet n teswiɛt, tekker-ed tbuciḍant di lebḥeṛ armi tɣumm teflukt-nni s lemwaji. Sidna Ɛisa yella iṭṭes.
Qeṛṛben-d ɣuṛ-es inelmaden-is, ssakin-t-id, nnan-as : A Sidi, sellek-aɣ m'ulac a nemmet !
Yenna-yasen : Acimi tuggadem, a wid iwumi ixuṣṣ liman ! IImiren ikker, yumeṛ i waḍu d lebḥeṛ ad rsen dɣa ters-ed talwit ț-țameqqrant.
Wid iḥedṛen, tɛeǧǧben qqaṛen : Anwa-t wagi ? Ula d aḍu d lebḥeṛ țțaɣen-as awal !

Mi gewweḍ Sidna Ɛisa agemmaḍ i lebḥeṛ, ɣer tmurt n at Gadaṛa, a ten-aya sin yergazen yețwazedɣen, ffɣen-d si tmeqbeṛt, mmugren-t-id. Yiwen ur izmir ad iɛeddi seg webrid-nni axaṭer weɛṛen aṭas.
Bdan țɛeggiḍen : D acu i tebɣiḍ ɣuṛ-nneɣ a Mmi-s n Ṛebbi ? Tusiḍ-ed iwakken a ɣ-tɛețbeḍ uqbel lweqt ?
Di leǧwahi-nni, tella yiwet n tqeḍɛit tameqqrant n yilfan i gkessen dinna.
Leǧnun-nni țḥellilen Sidna Ɛisa, qqaṛen-as : Ma tessufɣeḍ-aɣ, ceggeɛ-aɣ ɣer tqeḍɛit-ihina n yilfan.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Ṛuḥet ! FFfɣen-d si sin-nni n yemdanen, kecmen deg yilfan-nni. IImiren kan, grarben ɣer daxel n lebḥeṛ, ɣeṛqen, mmuten akk.
Imeksawen-nni rewlen, ṛuḥen ɣer temdint ad ḥkun ayen akk yedṛan d yergazen-nni yețwamelken.
Imezdaɣ akk n temdint ffɣen-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa ; mi d-wwḍen ɣuṛ-es, ḥellelen-t ad iffeɣ si tmurt-nsen.
Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer teflukt, yezger lebḥeṛ yuɣal ɣer temdint n Kafernaḥum.
Wwin-as-d yiwen wukrif iḍleq ɣef wusu. MMi gwala liman n yemdanen-agi, yenna i wukrif-nni : Ur țțaggad ara a mmi, țwaɛeffan ak ddnubat-ik.
Llan dinna kra si lɛulama țxemmimen deg wulawen-nsen qqaṛen : Argaz-agi yekfeṛ !
Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yeẓran ayen țxemmimen, yenna-yasen : Acuɣeṛ yir axemmem-agi deg ulawen-nwen ?
D acu i gsehlen a t-id-iniɣ : « Țwaɛfan-ak ddnubat-ik neɣ kker telḥuḍ » ?
Meɛna iwakken aț-țeẓrem belli Mmi-s n bunadem yesɛa tazmert di ddunit-agi ad yeɛfu ddnubat... YYenna i wukrif-nni : Ekker, ddem usu-inek tṛuḥeḍ ɣer wexxam-ik !
Imiren, argaz-nni yekker, iṛuḥ ɣer wexxam-is.
Mi walan ayagi, lɣaci akk ikcem-iten lxuf, țḥemmiden Sidi Ṛebbi, imi i d-ifka tazmert am tagi i yemdanen.
Mi gɛedda zdat wexxam anda țxelliṣen tabzert, ( leɣṛama ) Sidna Ɛisa iwala yiwen umekkas isem-is Matta, yenna-yas : Ddu-d yid-i ! IImiren kan ikker Matta, yedda yid-es.
Mi llan tețțen deg wexxam n Matta, aṭas n imekkasen akk-d yir imdanen i d-yusan, qqimen akk-d Sidna Ɛisa d inelmaden-is, tețțen yid-sen.
Ifariziyen mi walan ayagi nnan i inelmaden-is : Acuɣeṛ Ssid-nwen iteț akk-d imekkasen d yir imdanen ?
Sidna Ɛisa yesla i wayen i d nnan, yerra-yasen : Mačči d wid iseḥḥan i geḥwaǧen ṭṭbib, meɛna d wid ihelken.

Meyzet ɣef lmeɛna n wawal-agi yellan di tira iqedsen : D ulawen yeṣfan i bɣiɣ mačči d iseflawen n lmal. AAxaṭer ur d-usiɣ ara ad ssiwleɣ i iḥeqqiyen iwakken a d uɣalen ɣer webrid, meɛna i imednuben.
Inelmaden n Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas usan-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : Acuɣeṛ nukkni akk-d ifariziyen nețțuẓum ma d inelmaden-ik ur țțuẓumen ara ?
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Eɛni inebgawen n tmeɣṛa zemren ad ilin di leḥzen skud yella yesli yid-sen ? A d-yas wass i deg ara sen-ițwakkes yesli, imiren ad uẓummen.
Ur nezmir ara a nxiḍ tafaweț tajḍiṭ i uceṭṭiḍ aqdim, axaṭer tafaweț-nni tajḍiṭ aț-țejbed aceṭṭiḍ-nni aqdim, acerrig-nni ad innerni.

Ur nețɛemmiṛ ara daɣen iyeddiden iqdimen s ccṛab ajdid, neɣ m'ulac ad fellqen, ccṛab ad inɣel, iyeddiden ad xesṛen ; meɛna a nerr ccṛab ajdid deg yeddiden ijdiden, s wakkenni ccṛab d uyeddid ad țwaḥerzen.
Mazal Sidna Ɛisa ițmeslay, yusa-d yiwen n ccix n lǧameɛ iseǧǧed zdat-es, yenna-yas : Tura kan i temmut yelli, di leɛnaya-k as-ed aț-țserseḍ afus-ik fell-as, a d-teḥyu !
Sidna Ɛisa ikker yedda yid-es nețța d inelmaden-is.
Ațaya yiwet n tmeṭṭut yuḍnen ssiq tnac iseggasen aya, tekka-yas-d si deffir, tennul tacḍaṭ n ubeṛnus-is,
axaṭer teqqaṛ deg ul-is : « lemmer zemreɣ ad nnaleɣ ɣas ula ț-țacḍaṭ n ubeṛnus-is, ad ḥluɣ. »
Sidna Ɛisa yezzi ɣer deffir, mi ț-iwala yenna-yas : Ur țțaggad a yell-i, liman-im isseḥla-kkem. SSeg imiren tameṭṭut-nni teḥla.
Mi gewweḍ Sidna Ɛisa ɣer wexxam n ccix-nni, yufa lɣaci țmeǧǧiden, yerna nhewwalen meṛṛa. Yenna-yasen :
Ffɣet syagi, taqcict ur temmut ara, d iḍes kan i teṭṭes. DDɣa țmesxiṛen fell-as.
Mi ssufɣen lɣaci, ikcem, yeṭṭef-ed taqcict-nni seg ufus, dɣa tekker-ed.
Yeffeɣ lexbaṛ-agi di tmurt meṛṛa.
Mi gṛuḥ Sidna Ɛisa syenna, tebɛen-t sin iderɣalen, țɛeggiḍen : A mmi-s n Sidna Dawed, ḥunn fell-aɣ !
Mi gewweḍ ɣer wexxam, iderɣalen-nni kecmen ɣuṛ-es, dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Tumnem belli zemreɣ a wen xedmeɣ ayen i yi-d-tessutrem ? RRran-as : Ih a Sidi numen !
Innul allen-nsen, yenna : A wen-ițwaxdem s wakken yella liman-nwen !
Dɣa yuɣal-asen-d yeẓri. Sidna Ɛisa yeggul deg-sen : Ɣuṛ-wat ad iffeɣ lexbaṛ ɣef wayagi !
Meɛna akken kan ffɣen, bdan aberreḥ, lexbaṛ-nni yekka-d meṛṛa tamurt.
Mi ṛuḥen sin-nni, a ten-aya wiyaḍ wwin-as-d yiwen wergaz i gesgugem uṛuḥani.
Akken issufeɣ Sidna Ɛisa aṛuḥani-nni, agugam-nni yebda ițmeslay. Lɣaci akk tɛeǧben, qqaṛen : Leɛmeṛ neẓri ayagi di tmurt n wat Isṛail !
Lameɛna ifariziyen qqaṛen : S tezmert n ugellid n leǧnun i ten-issufuɣ.
Sidna Ɛisa yekka-d ɣef temdinin ț-țudrin meṛṛa, yesselmad di leǧwameɛ nsen, yețbecciṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n tgeldit n Sidi Ṛebbi, isseḥlay mkul aṭan d mkul lɛib.
Sidna Ɛisa tegzem tasa-s mi gwala annect-nni n lɣaci ɛyan, feclen, ḥeznen am ulli ur nesɛi ameksa .
Dɣa yenna i inelmaden-is : Tamegra meqqṛet, meɛna drus ifellaḥen i gellan.
Ḥellelet ihi bab n tmegra a d iceggeɛ ixeddamen ɣer tmegra-s.
Sidna Ɛisa yessawel i tnac inelmaden-is, yefka-yasen tazmert s wayes ara ssufuɣen leǧnun, ara seḥluyen mkul aṭan d mkul lɛib.
Atnan yismawen n tnac-nni inelmaden n Sidna Ɛisa :Amezwaru d Semɛun ițțusemman Buṭrus akk-d gma-s Andriyus, Yeɛqub mmi-s n Zabadi akk-d gma-s Yuḥenna,
Filibus d Bartelmay, Suma akk-d Matta amekkas n tebzert, Yeɛqub mmi-s n Ḥalfi akk-d Taddi ;
Semɛun awaṭani, Yudas n Qeṛyut, win akken ixedɛen Sidna Ɛisa.
Sidna Ɛisa iceggeɛ tnac inelmaden-is, iweṣṣa-ten : Ur țṛuḥut ara ɣer tmura tibeṛṛaniyin, ur keččmet ara ɣer temdinin n at Samarya ;
ṛuḥet axiṛ ɣer wat Isṛail yellan am ulli iḍaɛen.
M'ara tețțeddum, țbecciṛet qqaṛet : « Ațaya tgeldit n igenwan tqeṛṛeb-ed » !
Sseḥlut imuḍan, sseḥyut-ed lmegtin, ssizdeget wid ihelken lbeṛs, ssufɣet leǧnun. Akken i wen-d-ițțunefk mbla idrimen, fket ula d kunwi mbla idrimen.
Ur țțawit yid-wen ama d ddheb, ama d lfeṭṭa, ama d idrimen ;
ur țțawit yid-wen agrab neɣ sin iqendyaṛ, ur țțawit irkasen neɣ aɛekkaz, axaṭer axeddam yuklal lqut-is.
Di yal tamdint neɣ taddart anda ara tkecmem, steqsit ma yella win ara yesṭerḥben yis-wen, qqimet ɣuṛ-es alamma tekkrem aț-țṛuḥem.
M'ara tkecmem ɣer yiwen wexxam, sellmet fell-asen,
ma sṭerḥben yis-wen, lehna-nwen aț-țers fell-asen ; ma yella ur sṭerḥben ara yis-wen, lehna-nwen aț-țeqqim ɣuṛ-wen.
M'ur qbilen ara ad sṭreḥben yis-wen neɣ ad semḥessen i wawal, ffɣet seg wexxam-nni neɣ si temdint nni, zwit ula d aɣebbaṛ seg iḍaṛṛen nwen.
A wen-iniɣ tideț : ass n lḥisab, imezdaɣ n temdint-agi ad țțuɛaqben akteṛ n temdinin n Sudum akk-d Gumuṛ.
Atan, a kkun-ceggɛeɣ am ulli ger wuccanen, ḥeṛcet ihi am izerman, sɛut neyya am yetbiren.
Ḥadret ɣef yiman-nwen, axaṭer kra n yemdanen a kkun-sbedden ɣer ccṛeɛ; yerna a kkun-wten s ujelkaḍ di leǧwameɛ-nsen.
Ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw, a kkun-sbedden zdat lḥekkam akk-d igelliden, iwakken am nutni am at leǧnas nniḍen, ad slen s yisem-iw.
M'ara kkun-ṭṭfen, ur țḥebbiṛet ara ɣef wamek ara temmeslayem, neɣ ɣef wayen ara d-tinim, imeslayen ara d-tinim, a wen-d-țțunefken di teswiɛt nni kan.
Axaṭer mačči d kunwi ara imeslayen, meɛna d Ṛṛuḥ n Baba Ṛebbi ara d-imeslayen seg-wen.
Amdan ad yefk gma-s ɣer lmut, ababat ad yefk mmi-s, dderya a d kkren ɣer imawlan-nsen, a ten ssiwḍen ɣer lmut.
A kkun-keṛhen irkul ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw, meɛna win ara yeṭṭfen alamma ț-țaggara, ad ițțusellek.
M'ara tețwaqehṛem deg yiwet n temdint, rewlet ɣer tayeḍ. A wen-iniɣ tideț : Mmi-s n bunadem a d-yuɣal uqbel a d-tekkem tudrin meṛṛa n tmurt n wat Isṛail.
Ulac anelmad yugaren ccix-is neɣ aqeddac yellan sennig umɛellem is.

Akken ițwaḥseb ccix ara yețwaḥseb unelmad-is. Daɣen akken yella wemɛellem ara yili uqeddac-is. MMa semman i bab n wexxam Balzabul iḥekkmen ɣef leǧnun, amek ur țsemmin ara akkenni i wat wexxam-is !
Ur ten-țaggadet ara ihi ! Axaṭer kra n wayen yeffren a d-iḍheṛ, kra n lbaḍna yellan a d-tban.
Ayen i wen-qqaṛeɣ deg iḍ, init-eț ɛinani deg wass, ayen slan imeẓẓuɣen-nwen di sser, berrḥet-eț deg iberdan.
Ur țțaggadet ara wid ineqqen lǧețța lameɛna ur zmiren ara ad nnɣen ṛṛuḥ, aggadet win izemren ad iḍeggeṛ ṛṛuḥ akk-d lǧețța ɣer ǧahennama.
Eɛni ur znuzun ara sin iẓiwcen s uṣuṛdi ? Meɛna ula d yiwen deg-sen ur d-iɣelli ɣer lqaɛa mbla lebɣi n Baba Ṛebbi.
Ula d anẓaden uqeṛṛuy-nwen țwaḥesben irkulli.
Ihi ur țțaggadet ara : tesɛam azal akteṛ n waṭas n iẓiwcen !
Kra win ara yessetḥin s yisem-iw zdat yemdanen, ula d nekk, ad ssetḥiɣ yis zdat Baba yellan deg igenwan.
Kra win ara yi-nekṛen zdat yemdanen, a t-nekkṛeɣ ula d nekk zdat Baba yellan deg igenwan.
Ɣuṛ-wat aț-țɣilem d lehna i d wwiɣ ɣer ddunit ; mačči d lehna i d-wwiɣ, meɛna d ccwal i d-wwiɣ.
Axaṭer wwiɣ-d lfiṛaq ger weqcic d baba-s, ger teqcict d yemma-s, ger teslit ț-țemɣaṛt-is,
a d-kkren yeɛdawen seg at wexxam.
Win iḥemmlen baba-s d yemma-s neɣ mmi-s d yelli-s akteṛ iw ur yuklal ara ad yili d anelmad-iw.
Kra win ur neqbil ara ad inɛețțab ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw iwakken ad iyi-itbeɛ, ur yuklal ara ad yili d anelmad-iw.
Win iḥerzen taṛwiḥt-is, a s-tṛuḥ, ma d win ara isebblen taṛwiḥt-is ɣef ddemma-w ad yuɣal a ț-yaf.
Win isṭerḥben yis-wen, yis-i i gesṭerḥeb, win isṭerḥben yis-i, isṭerḥeb s win i yi-d-iceggɛen.
Win isṭerḥben s nnbi imi s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi i d-yusa a s-d-ițțunefk wayen yuklal nnbi, win isṭerḥben s uḥeqqi imi d aḥeqqi i gella, a s-d-ițunefk wayen yuklal uḥeqqi.
Kra win ara yefken lkas n waman isemmaḍen i yiwen seg imecṭuḥen-agi imi d anelmad-iw i gella, a wen-iniɣ tideț : ur a s-ițṛuḥ ara lḥeqq yuklal.
Mi gweṣṣa tnac-nni inelmaden is, Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ syenna ad ibecceṛ di tudrin n leǧwahi-nni.
Yeḥya yellan di lḥebs, yesla s lecɣal n Lmasiḥ, iceggeɛ ɣuṛ-es inelmaden is iwakken a s-inin :
D kečč i d win akken ara d yasen neɣ ilaq-aɣ a nerǧu wayeḍ ?
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen-d : Ṛuḥet ssiwḍet-as lexbaṛ i Yeḥya ɣef wayen twalam d wayen teslam :
Iderɣalen țwalin, iquḍaren leḥḥun, ibeṛsiyen ṣeffun, iɛeẓẓugen sellen, lmegtin ḥeggun-d, lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ițțubecceṛ i yimeɣban.
D aseɛdi win iwumi ur țțiliɣ ara d sebba n tuccḍa ( ugur ) !
Mi ṛuḥen inelmaden-is, Sidna Ɛisa yebda iheddeṛ i lɣaci ɣef Yeḥya : D acu i tṛuḥem a t-id-teẓrem deg unezṛuf ? D aɣanim yețhuzzu waḍu ?
Ɣer wacu i tṛuḥem aț-țfeṛǧem ? ƔƔer yiwen wergaz yelsan llebsa ifazen ? Wid yețlusun llebsa ifazen, deg ixxamen n igelliden i țțilin.
Anwa i ɣer tṛuḥem a t-id-teẓrem ihi ? D yiwen n nnbi ? Țideț ih, d nnbi ! A wen-iniɣ : yugar nnbi.
Axaṭer d nețța i ɣef yura : Atan zewwreɣ zdat-ek amceggeɛ-inu, iwakken ad iheggi abrid zdat-ek.
A wen-iniɣ tideț : ulac mmi-s n tmeṭṭut yugaren Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas. Lameɛna, amecṭuḥ maḍi di tgelda n igenwan, meqqeṛ akteṛ-is.
Seg wussan-nni i deg ițbecciṛ Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas armi ț-țura, imdanen țnaɣen ɣef tgelda n igenwan, bɣan a ț-țkecmen s ddreɛ.
Axaṭer ccariɛa n Musa d lenbiya hedṛen-d ɣef tgelda n igenwan armi d lweqt n Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas.
Ma tebɣam aț-țfehmem, d nețța i d Ilyas-nni ilaqen a d-yas.
Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen, isel-ed !
Ɣer wuɣuṛ ara metleɣ lǧil-agi ? Icuba ɣer warrac yeqqimen deg uzniq, ssawalen i warrac nniḍen, qqaṛen asen :
Newwet ajewwaq uur tecḍiḥem ara, nnecna cnawi n leḥzen uur tmeǧdem ara.
Axaṭer Yeḥya yusa-d, ur iteț ur itess, tennam : « izdeɣ-it uṛuḥani. »
Mmi-s n bunadem yusa-d, iteț, itess am wiyaḍ, teqqaṛem : «` Ițxemmim kan ɣef wučči ț-țissit, d amdakkul n imekkasen ixeddaɛen akk-d yir imdanen » lameɛna tideț tban-ed s lecɣal-is.
Sidna Ɛisa ibda ițlumu timdinin nni i deg ixdem aṭas n lbeṛhanat, axaṭer imezdaɣ-is ur d-uɣalen ara ɣer webrid n Ṛebbi.

A nnger-im a tamdint n Kurazim ! A nnger-im a tamdint n Bitsayda ! Axaṭer lemmer lbeṛhanat yedṛan deg-kkunt dṛan di temdinin n Sur akk-d Sidun, tili imezdaɣ-nsent aṭas aya i sburren tacekkaṛt n leḥzen, qqimen ɣef yiɣiɣden iwakken a d sbegnen belli ndemmen uɣalen-d ɣer ubrid n Ṛebbi.
Daymi, imezdaɣ n temdinin-agi ad țuɛaqben akteṛ n wid n temdinin n Sur akk-d Sidun.

Ula d kemm a tamdint n Kafernaḥum, tɣileḍ aț-țaliḍ ɣer igenni ? Xaṭi ! Aț-țețwaḍeggreḍ ɣer laxeṛt ; axaṭer lemmer di temdint n Sudum i dṛan lbeṛhanat i gedṛan ɣuṛ-em, tili mazal-iț ar ass-a !
Daymi, ass n lḥisab anegaru aț-țețțuɛaqbeḍ akteṛ n tmurt n Sudum.
Di lweqt-nni, Sidna Ɛisa inṭeq yenna : Ḥemmdeɣ-k a Baba Ṛebbi, a Bab igenwan d lqaɛa, imi i d tessekneḍ i imecṭaḥ ayen i teffreḍ i imusnawen d lɛuqal.
Ih a Baba Ṛebbi ! Ḥemmdeɣ-k imi d wagi i d lebɣi-k.
Baba Ṛebbi yerra-d kullec ger ifassen-iw. YYiwen ur yessin Mmi-s n Ṛebbi anagar Baba Ṛebbi ! Yiwen ur issin daɣen Baba Ṛebbi anagar Mmi-s akk-d win iwumi yebɣa Mmi-s a s-t-id-isken.
Aset-ed ɣuṛ-i a wid akk yeɛyan, iɛebban taɛekkumt ẓẓayen, a wen-fkeɣ talwit d westeɛfu.
Refdet ɣef tuyat-nwen azaglu inu tlemdem s ɣuṛ-i, axaṭer ul-iw yeččuṛ d ṛṛeḥma yerna d aḥnin, aț-țafem talwit i teṛwiḥin-nwen.
Azaglu-inu yeshel, taɛekkumt-iw fsuset.
Yiwet n tikkelt, deg wass n ssebt yellan d ass n westeɛfu, Sidna Ɛisa izger igran n yirden. Inelmaden-is lluẓen, bdan țekksen-d tigedrin, tețțen-tent.
Ifariziyen mi ten-walan, nnan i Sidna Ɛisa : Acuɣeṛ inelmaden-ik xeddmen ayen iḥeṛmen deg wass n westeɛfu ?
Meɛna Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Eɛni ur teɣṛim ara wayen yexdem ugellid Dawed, mi gelluẓ nețța d wid yellan yid-es ?
Mi gekcem ɣer wexxam iqedsen, yečča seg weɣṛum-nni yețțunefken d lweɛda i lmuqedmin yerna yefka seg-s i imdukkal-is !
Eɛni ur teɣṛim ara di tektabt n ccariɛa n Musa belli lmuqedmin xeddmen ɣas akken d ass n westeɛfu yerna mačči d leḥṛam fell-asen ?
Ihi a wen-d-iniɣ : yella dagi win yugaren axxam iqedsen.
Lemmer tfehmem d acu i d lmeɛna n wawal-agi : D ulawen yesɛan ṛṛeḥma i bɣiɣ mačči d isflawen n lmal ttili ur tḥekkmem ara s lmut ɣef wid ur neḍlim ara !
Axaṭer Mmi-s n bunadem, d nețța i gḥekmen ɣef wass n westeɛfu.
Syenna, yerra ɣer yiwen n lǧameɛ,
yella dinna yiwen wergaz iwumi yekref ufus. Ifariziyen steqsan-t nnan-as : Eɛni iḥlel useḥlu deg wass n westeɛfu ? SSteqsan-t akka, iwakken a s-d-afen sebba s wayes ara t-sḍelmen.
Yerra-yasen : Anwa deg-wen yesɛan yiwet n tixsi kan, ma yella teɣli ɣer tesraft deg wass n westeɛfu ur ț-id-issalay ara ?
Eɛni tixsi teswa akteṛ n wemdan ? Ihi, yeḥlel a nexdem lxiṛ deg wass n westeɛfu !
Imiren Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas i wergaz-nni : Sleq-ed afus-ik ! YYeḍleq afus-is, dɣa yuɣal iṣeḥḥa am ufus nniḍen.
Ifariziyen ffɣen, ṛuḥen mcawaṛen wway gar-asen amek ara a s-d-afen sebba s wayes ara t-nɣen.
Mi gesla bɣan a t-nɣen, Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ syenna. Aṭas i geddan yid-es, yesseḥlay imuḍan meṛṛa,
iqqaṛ-asen : Ɣuṛ-wat aț-țessufɣem lexbaṛ !
Iwakken ad idṛu wayen yenna nnbi Iceɛya :
Ataya uqeddac-iw i xtaṛeɣ, win eɛzizen fell-i, deg-s i gella lfeṛḥ-iw. A d-yers Ṛṛuḥ-iw fell-as, ad ibecceṛ lḥeqq i leǧnas.
Ur iskkaray ara ccwal, ur ițɛeggiḍ ara, ur ițḥettim ara iman-is ɣef wiyaḍ.
Ur ițkemmil ara i uɣanim iceqqeqen, ur isnusuy ara taftilt yețmețțaten, alamma yesbedd lḥeqq.
Imiren leǧnas meṛṛa ad ssirmen ɣuṛ-es, fell-as ara țeklen.
Wwin-d i Sidna Ɛisa yiwen wergaz i gesgugem, i gesderɣel uṛuḥani. Yesseḥla-t, yuɣal wergaz-nni iheddeṛ, yețwali.
Lɣaci meṛṛa wehmen di Sidna Ɛisa qqaṛen : Mačči d wagi i d mmi-s n Sidna Dawed, win akken ara d-yasen ?
Mi sen-slan ifariziyen nnan : Argaz-agi yessufuɣ leǧnun s tezmert n Balzabul iḥekkmen ɣef leǧnun.

Sidna Ɛisa yeẓran ayen i țxemmimen, yenna-yasen : Yal tagelda anda țnaɣen lɣaci wway gar-asen, aț-țuɣal aț-țenger. YYal taddart neɣ yal axxam i deg țnaɣen imezdaɣ wway gar-asen, ur d-yețɣimi ara.
Ma yella Cciṭan issufuɣ Cciṭan, atan yebḍa d yiman-is ! Amek ihi ara d-tdum ddewla-s ?
Ma yella nekkini ssufuɣeɣ leǧnun s tezmert n Balzabul, i warraw nwen s wacu i ten ssufuɣen ? Daymi, d arraw-nwen ara kkun-iḥasben !
Meɛna ma yella nekkini s Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi i ssufuɣeɣ leǧnun, ihi tagelda n Ṛebbi ațan tewweḍ-ed armi d ɣuṛ-wen.
Yiwen ur yezmir ad ikcem ɣer wexxam n wergaz iǧehden iwakken a s-iddem ayla-as ma yella ur t-yuriz ara uqbel, meɛna m'ara t-yarez, imiren ad yizmir ad iddem ayen akk yellan deg wexxam-is.
Win ur nelli ara yid-i, ixulef-iyi ; win ur d-njemmeɛ ara yid-i ițḍeggiɛ !
Daymi i wen-qqaṛeɣ : Mkul ddnub d mkul rregmat zemren ad țwasemmḥen i yemdanen, ma d rregmat ɣef Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ur țwasemmaḥent ara !
Yal win ara iregmen di Mmi-s n bunadem, a s-ițwasameḥ, ma d win ara iregmen Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, ur s-ițwasamaḥ ara ama di lweqt-agi, ama di lweqt i d-iteddun.
Ɛeqlet ttejṛa ɣer lfakya-s : ma telha ttejṛa, a d-tefk lfakya yelhan, ma yella diri-ț, a d-tefk lfakya n diri !
A ccetla n izerman, amek ara d-tinim ayen yelhan ma yella kunwi diri-kkun ? Axaṭer d ayen yellan deg ul i d-ițeffɣen seg imi !
Argaz lɛali yessufuɣ-ed ayen yelhan seg ugerruj yellan deg ul-is ma d amcum yessufuɣ-ed ayen n diri si lexzin n diri yellan deg ul-is !
Aql-i nniɣ-awen-t : ass n lḥisab, ad țțuḥasben yemdanen ɣef yal awal ur nesɛi lmeɛna i d-iffɣen seg yimi-nsen ;
axaṭer ɣef leḥsab n imeslayen-ik ara tețțuḥasbeḍ, d imeslayen-ik ara d-isbeggnen ma d aḥeqqi i telliḍ neɣ d amcum.
Dɣa kra n lɛulama n ccariɛa akk-d ifariziyen nnan i Sidna Ɛisa : A Sidi, nebɣa a k-nwali txedmeḍ yiwen n lbeṛhan.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra yasen : Lǧil am-agi ijehlen ixedɛen Ṛebbi, yessutur lbeṛhan, ur a sen d-yețțunefkay ara lbeṛhan nniḍen anagar win n nnbi Yunes.
Axaṭer akken yesɛedda nnbi Yunes tlata wussan d tlata wuḍan deg uɛebbuḍ n uḥewtiw ameqqran di lebḥeṛ, akken daɣen ara yesɛeddi Mmi-s n bunadem tlata wussan d tlata wuḍan zdaxel n wakal.

Ass n lḥisab, imezdaɣ n temdint n Ninebi a d-kkren ɣer yemdanen n lǧil-agi ad ccetkin fell-asen iwakken ad țțuḥasben, axaṭer nutni uɣalen-d ɣer webrid mi slan i ubecceṛ n nnbi Yunes. AA wen-d-iniɣ : atan yella dagi win yugaren nnbi Yunes !

Ass n lḥisab, tagellit n tmurt n Ḥabac a d-tekker ɣer yemdanen n lǧil-agi aț-țeccetki fell-asen iwakken ad țțuḥasben, axaṭer tusa-d seg yixef n ddunit iwakken aț-țsel i tmusni n ugellid Sliman. AAtan nniɣ-awen yella dagi win yugaren agellid Sliman !
M'ara yețwaqecceɛ uṛuḥani seg yiwen wemdan, ad ițezzi deg imukan yexlan, ad ițqellib anda ara yaf ṛṛaḥa ur yețțaf ara.
Dɣa ad yini : Ad uɣaleɣ ɣer umkan ansi i d-ffɣeɣ ! MMi guɣal ɣer wemdan-nni, ad yaf amkan d ilem, zeddig yerna iseggem.

Imiren ad iṛuḥ a d-yawi sebɛa iṛuḥaniyen nniḍen i gweɛṛen akteṛ-is, ad kecmen ɣer dinna, ad zedɣen. Lḥala n wergaz-nni aț-țenṭaṛ akteṛ n tikkelt tamezwarut. Akka ara tedṛu d lǧil-agi ijehlen.
Mazal Sidna Ɛisa yețmeslay i lɣaci, mi d-yusa yiwen wergaz yenna-yas : Yemma-k d watmaten-ik atnan di beṛṛa, bɣan a k-ẓren.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Anta i d yemma, anwi i d atmaten-iw ?
Iwehha s ufus-is ɣer inelmaden is yenna : D wigi i d yemma d watmaten-iw !
Axaṭer win ixeddmen lebɣi n Baba yellan deg igenwan, d winna i d gma, i d weltma, i d yemma.
Ass-nni kan, Sidna Ɛisa yeffeɣ-ed seg wexxam, iṛuḥ ad iqqim rrif n lebḥeṛ,
d izumal n lɣaci i s-d-izzin, dɣa yuli ɣer teflukt, yeqqim. LLɣaci ibedd ɣef rrif n lebḥeṛ,
nețța yebda isselmad-iten s lemtul iqqaṛ-asen : Yiwen ufellaḥ yeffeɣ ad izreɛ.
Mi gzerreɛ, ɣlin-as kra n iɛeqqayen rrif n webrid, usan-d igṭaṭ ( ifṛax igenni ) ččan-ten.
Kra iɛeqqayen nniḍen ɣlin deg wakal yeččuṛen d izṛa, mɣin-d s lemɣawla axaṭer ulac aṭas n wakal.
Mi gebda wezɣal, yezlef imɣan nni dɣa qquṛen, axaṭer ur sɛin ara izuṛan lqayen.
Kra iɛeqqayen nniḍen ɣlin ger isennanen. Isennanen-nni gman dɣa ɣummen-ten.
Meɛna kra iɛeqqayen ɣlin deg wakal yelhan : fkan-d tigedrin, ta tefka-d meyya iɛeqqayen, ta sețțin, tayeḍ tlatin.
Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen isel-ed !
Inelmaden-is qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es, nnan-as : Acimi i sen-theddṛeḍ s lemtul ?
Yerra-yasen : Kunwi yețțunefk-awen-d aț țissinem lbaḍna n tgelda igenwan, ma d wiyaḍ, ur sen-d-ițțunefk ara.
Axaṭer win yesɛan a s-d-nernu alamma yella di tawant, ma d win ur nesɛi ara, a s-nekkes ula d ayen yesɛa.
Daymi i sen-țmeslayeɣ s lemtul, axaṭer țmuqulen ur țwalin, țḥessisen ur sellen, ur fehhmen.
S wakka, yedṛa-d yid-sen wayen i d-ixebbeṛ fell-asen nnbi Iceɛya : Aț-țsellem s imeẓẓuɣen-nwen, ur tfehhmem ara, aț-țmuqulem s wallen-nwen, ur tețwalim ara,

Imi agdud-agi qquṛen wulawen-nsen, qeflen imeẓẓuɣen- sen, qqnen allen-nsen, iwakken ur țwalin, ur sellen ; sseɣṛen ulawen nsen, ugin ad fehmen, axaṭer lemmer tuben, uɣalen-d ɣer webrid, tili sseḥlaɣ ten.
Ma d kunwi amarezg-nwen ! Axaṭer allen-nwen țwalint, imeẓẓuɣen nwen sellen.
Aql-i nniɣ-awen tideț, aṭas si lenbiya akk-d imdanen iḥeqqiyen i gebɣan ad walin ayen tețwalim, ur t-walan, ad slen ayen tsellem, ur t-slin.
A wen-d-iniɣ lmeɛna n lemtel n win izerrɛen :
m'ara isel wemdan i wawal yeɛnan tageldit n igenwan, ur t-yefhim ara, ițemcabi ɣer yiri n webrid i ɣer tɣelli zzerriɛa ; d Cciṭan i d-ițasen ad iqleɛ ayen izerɛen deg ul-is.
Wayeḍ ițemcabi ɣer wakal-nni yeččuṛen d izṛa anda teɣli zzerriɛa. M'ara isel i wawal n Ṛebbi, iqebbel-it s lfeṛḥ,
meɛna ur t-yețțaǧǧa ara ad iger izuṛan deg-s, ur yețțaṭṭaf ara. MM'ara d-tass lmeḥna neɣ aqehheṛ ɣef ddemma n wawal n Ṛebbi, ad yeǧǧ imiren kan liman-is.
Wayeḍ daɣen ițemcabi ɣer zzerriɛa yeɣlin ger isennanen. M'ara isel i wawal n Ṛebbi, iɣeblan n ddunit d ṭṭmeɛ n rrbeḥ țɣummun awal-nni, dɣa ur d-ițțak ara lfakya.
Wayeḍ icuba daɣen ɣer zzerriɛa yeɣlin deg wakal yelhan, m'ara isel i wawal n Ṛebbi, ifehhem-it, daymi i d-ițțak lfakya ! YYal aɛeqqa ițțak-ed : wa tlatin, wa sețțin, wa meyya n tɛeqqayin.
Sidna Ɛisa yefka-yasen-d lemtel nniḍen : Tagelda n igenwan tcuba ɣer yiwen wergaz i gzerɛen irden deg iger-is.
Yiwen yiḍ mi ṭṭsen akk medden, yusa-d weɛdaw-is izreɛ aẓekkun ger yirden, imiren iṛuḥ.
Mi d-gman yirden-nni fkan-d tigedrin, aẓekkun-nni ula d nețța igma-d.
Iqeddacen n bab n iger-nni, usan-d ɣuṛ-es nnan-as : A Sidi, eɛni mačči d irden i tzerɛeḍ deg iger-ik ? Ansi i d-ikka ihi uẓekkun-agi ?
Yerra-yasen : D yiwen weɛdaw i gxedmen akka ! IIqeddacen-nni nnan-as : Ihi tebɣiḍ a nṛuḥ a neqleɛ aẓekkun-agi ?
Yerra-yasen : Xaṭi ! Axaṭer m'ara tekksem aẓekkun, tzemrem a d-teglum s yirden.
Anfet-asen ad gmun di sin alamma ț-țamegra. Ass-nni, a sen iniɣ i wid imeggren : qelɛet-ed uqbel aẓekkun, cuddet-eț ț-țadliwin iwakken a tent-nesseṛɣ ma d irden jemɛet țen-id ɣer ikuffan-iw.
Sidna Ɛisa yefka-yasen-d lemtel nniḍen : Tagelda n igenwan tcuba ɣer yiwen uɛeqqa n uxerḍel i d-iddem yiwen wergaz iwakken a t-izreɛ deg iger-is.

Aɛeqqa-yagi d nețța i d amecṭuḥ meṛṛa ger zzerriɛat yellan, lameɛna mi gețwazreɛ, igemmu yețțali alamma yekka-d sennig akk yemɣan n tebḥirt, yeggar-ed ifurkawen d imeqqranen, ula d ifṛax n igenni , bennun leɛcuc-nsen s ufella-s.

Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen-d lemtel nniḍen : Tagelda n igenwan tețțemcabi ɣer temtunt ( yiɣes n temtunt ) ara d-teddem tmeṭṭut a t-tsexleḍ i tlata lkilat n uwren, s wakka arukti-nni meṛṛa ad yali.
Sidna Ɛisa ițmeslay-ed i lɣaci anagar s lemtul.
Ițmeslay-asen-d akka iwakken ad yedṛu wayen i d-nnan lenbiya : A sen-mmeslayeɣ s lemtul, a sen-beccṛeɣ tiɣawsiwin yeffren seg wasmi i d-texleq ddunit. cc
Mi gekfa Sidna Ɛisa ameslay, lɣaci ṛuḥen, nețța ikcem ɣer wexxam. Inelmaden-is qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es nnan-as : Ssefru-yaɣ-d lemtel n uẓekkun deg iger.
Yerra-yasen-d : Win izerrɛen irden d Mmi-s n bunadem ;
iger, d ddunit ; irden, d wid ițekkan di tgelda n igenwan ; ma d aẓekkun, d widak ițekkan d Cciṭan ;
aɛdaw i gzerrɛen aẓekkun, d Cciṭan ; tamegra , ț-țaggara nddunit ; ma d wid imeggren, d lmalayekkat.
Akken ara qellɛen aẓekkun ṭeggiṛen-t ɣer tmes, ara tedṛu di taggara n ddunit.
Mmi-s n bunadem a d-iceggeɛ lmalayekkat-is, ad ssufɣen si tgelda-s wid akk yesseɣlayen wiyaḍ di ddnub akk-d wid ixeddmen cceṛ,
dɣa a ten-ḍeggṛen ɣer tmes anda ara yilin imeṭṭawen d nndama tameqqrant ;
ma d wid iḍuɛen Ṛebbi ad feǧǧeǧen am yiṭij di tgelda n Baba Ṛebbi. Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen isel-ed !
Tagelda n igenwan tețțemcabi ɣer ugerruj yeffren deg yiwen n yiger. Yiwen wergaz yufa-t, yuɣal iffer-it. Si lfeṛḥ-nni i gefṛeḥ, iṛuḥ izzenz ayen akk yesɛa iwakken ad yaɣ iger-nni.
Tagelda n igenwan tețțemcabi daɣen ɣer yiwen umetjaṛ ițqelliben tiɛeqcin ifazen.
Mi gufa yiwet ifazen ɣef tiyaḍ, iṛuḥ izzenz ayen akk yesɛa, yuɣal-ed yuɣ-iț.
Tagelda n igenwan tețțemcabi daɣen ɣer ucebbak ițwadeggṛen ɣer lebḥeṛ, iwakken a d-iṭṭef iselman ( lḥut ) n mkul ṣṣenf.
M'ara yeččaṛ, iḥewwaten a t-id-jebden ɣer rrif n lebḥeṛ, dɣa ad qqimen iwakken ad fernen iselman, ad jemɛen wid yelhan, ad ḍeggṛen wid n diri.
Akka ara tedṛu di taggara n ddunit : lmalayekkat a d-asent a d ddment imcumen si ger iḥeqqiyen,
iwakken a ten-ḍeggṛent ɣer tmes anda llan imeṭṭawen d nndama tameqqrant.
Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Tfehmem ayagi meṛṛa ? RRran-as : Anɛam a Sidi, nefhem !
Yerna-yasen : Ihi, yal amusnaw n ccariɛa ara ifehmen tagelda n igenwan, icuba ɣer bab n wexxam i d-ițekksen seg ugerruj-is tiɣawsiwin tijdidin, akk-d ț-țɣawsiwin tiqdimin.
Mi d-yenna lemtul-agi, Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ syenna.
Yerra ɣer taddart i deg ițțuṛebba. Isselmad di lǧameɛ nsen, lɣaci akk iḥedṛen wehmen, qqaṛen : Ansi i s-d-tekka tmusni-yagi akk d tezmert s wayes ixeddem lbeṛhanat agi ?
Mačči d nețța i d mmi-s n win ineǧṛen ijegwa ? Eɛni yemma-s mačči ț-țin iwumi qqaṛen Meryem ? AAtmaten-is mačči d Yeɛqub, Yusef, Semɛun akk-d Yuda ?
Yessetma-s daɣen, mačči gar aneɣ i llant ? Ansi i s-d-ikka ihi wannect-agi ?
Ɣef wayagi akk i sen-yella d sebba n tuccḍa, ugin ad amnen yis. DDɣa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Nnbi yețwaḥqeṛ anagar di tmurt-is akk-d wexxam-is.
Sidna Ɛisa ur yexdim ara aṭas n lbeṛhanat dinna, axaṭer ugin ad amnen.
yenna i iqeddacen-is : D Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas ! D nețța i-d iḥyan si ger lmegtin, daymi i gesɛa tazmert s wayes ixeddem lbeṛhanat.
D agellid Hiṛudus i gefkan yakan lameṛ ad qnen Yeḥya s ssnasel, a t-rren ɣer lḥebs. Ayagi ɣef sebba n Hiṛudyad, tameṭṭut n Filibus yellan d gma-s n Hiṛudus.
Axaṭer Yeḥya yella yeqqaṛ i Hiṛudus : D leḥṛam fell-ak aț-țesɛuḍ Hiṛudyad ț-țameṭṭut-ik !
Seg imiren, Hiṛudus ițqellib ad ineɣ Yeḥya, meɛna ikukra agdud n wat Isṛail axaṭer ḥesben-t akk d nnbi.
Ass n lɛid n umulli n Hiṛudus, yelli-s n Hiṛudyad tecḍeḥ zdat inebgawen, teɛǧeb-as aṭas i Hiṛudus,
armi i s-iɛuhed, a s-yefk ayen ara s-d tessuter.
Tweṣṣa-ț yemma-s a s-tini : Awi-yi-d ɣer dagi aqeṛṛuy n Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas deg uḍebsi.
Agellid Hiṛudus iḥzen aṭas, yemmuɣben, lameɛna ɣef ddemma n limin i geggul zdat inebgawen-is, issendeh a s-t-id-awin.
Iceggeɛ a s-d-gezmen aqeṛṛuy i Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas di lḥebs ;
wwin-as-t-id i teqcict-nni deg uḍebsi, nețțat tefka-t i yemma-s.
Inelmaden n Yeḥya usan-d ad awin lǧețța-s iwakken a ț-meḍlen ; imiren ṛuḥen ssawḍen-as lexbaṛ i Sidna Ɛisa.
Mi gesla s lexbaṛ n lmut n Yeḥya, Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer teflukt, iṛuḥ iwakken ad iḍeṛṛef iman-is. Akken slan lɣaci s wemkan i ɣer iteddu, ffɣen-d si tudrin, tebɛen-t ɣef wuḍar.
Sidna Ɛisa yers-ed si teflukt, iwala annect-nni n lɣaci, dɣa gezmen tasa-s ; ibda yesseḥlay imuḍan-nsen.
Mi geɣli yiṭij, inelmaden n Sidna Ɛisa qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es, nnan-as : Amkan-agi yexla yerna iṛuḥ lḥal ; ini-yasen i lɣaci-yagi ad ṛuḥen ɣer tudrin iwakken a d-aɣen ayen ara ččen.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Acuɣeṛ ara ṛuḥen, fket-asen kunwi ad ččen !
Nnan-as : Ɣuṛ-nneɣ anagar xemsa teḥbulin n weɣṛum, d sin iselman ( iḥutiwen ).
Yerra-yasen : Awit-țen-id ɣer dagi !

Yenna i lɣaci ad qqimen ɣef leḥcic, iddem-ed xemsa teḥbulin-nni n weɣṛum d sin iselman-nni, yerfed allen-is ɣer igenni, iḥmed Ṛebbi. YYebḍa aɣṛum-nni, yefka-t i inelmaden-is, feṛqen-t i lɣaci.
Sčan akk armi ṛwan, yerna inelmaden-is ččuṛen-d tnac iqecwalen n wayen i d-yegran.
Ad ilin azal n xemsa alaf n yergazen i geččan, mbla tilawin d warrac.
Imiren kan, Sidna Ɛisa iḥṛes inelmaden-is ad alin ɣer teflukt iwakken ad zwiren ɣer rrif nniḍen n lebḥeṛ, ma d nețța ad yerr lɣaci-nni.
Mi ṛuḥen akk lɣaci-nni, yuli weḥd-es ɣer wedrar iwakken ad iẓẓall, dɣa yeɣli-d yiḍ.
Taflukt-nni tella di tlemmast n lebḥeṛ, lemwaji kkatent-eț axaṭer aḍu iqubel-iten-id.
Mi qṛib ad yali wass, ataya Sidna Ɛisa iteddu-d ɣef wuḍar s ufella n waman.
Akken i t-walan ileḥḥu ɣef waman, inelmaden-is xelɛen qqaṛen : D lexyal ! BBdan țɛeggiḍen s lxuf.
Meɛna imiren kan Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen-d : Ur xellɛet ara, d nekk ! Ur țțaggadet ara !
Dɣa Buṭrus yenna-yas : A Sidi, ma yella d keččini, efk-ed lameṛ a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-ek ɣef wuḍar s ufella n waman.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : As-ed ! BBuṭrus yers-ed si teflukt, ileḥḥu ɣef waman, iteddu ɣer Sidna Ɛisa.
Meɛna mi gwala yekker-ed waḍu, ikcem-it lxuf, yebda izedder, dɣa iɛeggeḍ : A Sidi, sellek-iyi !
Imiren kan, Sidna Ɛisa yeḍleq afus-is, ijbed-it-id yenna-yas : A win iwumi ixuṣṣ liman ! Acuɣeṛ i k-ikcem ccekk ?
Ulin ɣer teflukt di sin, dɣa yers waḍu-nni.
Inelmaden-nni yellan di teflukt seǧǧden zdat Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : Ț-țideț, d kečč i d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi !
Zegren lebḥeṛ-nni, armi wwḍen ɣer tmurt n Jiniṣaret.
Imezdaɣ n lǧiha nni ɛeqlen Sidna Ɛisa, dɣa ceggɛen ɣer yal lǧiha n tmurt, wwin-as-d imuḍan nsen meṛṛa.
Ḥellelen-t iwakken a ten-yeǧǧ ad nalen ɣas ula ț-țacḍaṭ uqenduṛ-is. Wid akk i t-innulen, ḥlan.
Acuɣeṛ inelmaden-ik țṛuẓun lɛadda i d-ǧǧan lejdud-nneɣ ? M'ara qeṛṛben ɣer lqut, ur ssiriden ara ifassen-nsen.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : I kunwi, acimi tețṛuẓum lumuṛat n Ṛebbi iwakken aț-țxedmem ṛṛay nwen ?
Yak d ṣṣeḥ, Ṛebbi yenna-d : Qadeṛ baba-k d yemma-k, yyenna daɣen : Kra win ara ineɛlen baba-s d yemma-s, ad yețwaḥkem fell-as s lmut.
Meɛna kunwi teqqaṛem : win yefkan d lweɛda i Ṛebbi ayen s wacu i glaq ad iɛiwen imawlan-is,
am akken d imawlan-is i gɛawen. SS wakka, tbeddlem awal n Ṛebbi, iwakken aț-țesɛeddim lɛaddat-nwen.
Ay at sin wudmawen ! Ț-țideț i d-yenna nnbi Iceɛya mi d-icar fell awen :
Y enna-d Ṛebbi : agdud-agi, ițɛuzzu-yi s wawal kan, ma d ul-is yebɛed fell-i.
L eɛbada-nsen ur tesɛi ara azal axaṭer sselmaden ayen i d-yekkan seg imdanen.
Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yessawel i lɣaci yenna-yasen : Semḥesset-d tfehmem ayagi :
mačči d ayen i gkeččmen seg imi n wemdan i t-yessamasen, meɛna d ayen i d-ițeffɣen seg-s.
Inelmaden qeṛṛben-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : Ifariziyen iɣaḍ-iten lḥal ɣef yimeslayen-nni i d-tenniḍ !
Yerra-yasen : Yal imɣi ur yeẓẓi ara Baba yellan deg igenwan, ad yețwaqleɛ.
Anfet-asen, d iderɣalen iteṭṭfen afus i iderɣalen nniḍen ; ma yella aderɣal yeṭṭef afus i wayeḍ, ad ɣlin i sin ɣer tesraft.
Buṭrus yenṭeq-ed yenna-yas : Ssefhem-aɣ-d lemtel-agi.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna i inelmaden-is : Eɛni ula d kunwi txuṣṣ-ikkun lefhama ?
Ur tefhimem ara belli ayen ikeččmen seg imi n wemdan yețțara ɣer uɛebbuḍ-is, mbeɛd ad ițwadeggeṛ ɣer beṛṛa.
Lameɛna ayen i d-iteffɣen seg imi itekk-ed seg wul, d annect-agi i gessenǧasen amdan.
Axaṭer seg wul i d-tekken : yir ixemmimen, timegṛaḍ, zzna ( lɛaṛ ), yir tikli, tukerḍa, cchada n ẓẓuṛ akk-d rregmat.
Atan wayen yessenǧasen amdan, mačči d učči mbla tarda n ifassen i t-yessenǧasen.
Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ syenna, iteddu ɣer tmura n Sur akk-d Sidun.
Yiwet n tmeṭṭut n at Kenɛan i gzedɣen dinna tusa-d ɣuṛ-es tețɛeggiḍ : A Sidi, a mmi-s n Sidna Dawed, ḥunn fell-i ! Ațan yelli izdeɣ-iț uṛuḥani, iɛețțeb-iț aṭas.
Sidna Ɛisa ur as-d-yerri ula d yiwen wawal. Inelmaden-is qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es nnan-as : Err-as awal, axaṭer tugi aț-țeḥbes leɛyaḍ deffir-nneɣ.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Țțuceggɛeɣ-ed anagar ɣer wulli iḍaɛen n wat Isṛail !
Lameɛna tameṭṭut-nni teɣli ɣer iḍaṛṛen n Sidna Ɛisa tenna-yas : A Sidi ɛiwen-iyi di leɛnaya-k !
Yenna-yas : Ur ilaq ara ad ițwakkes weɣṛum i warrac, ad ițwadeggeṛ i yeqjan.
Tenna-yas : Ț-țideț a Sidi, lameɛna ula d iqjan tețțen tifețțitin i d-iɣellin si ṭṭabla n imawlan-nsen.
Imiren Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Liman-inem d ameqqran a tameṭṭut ! A m-yețwaxdem wayen tebɣiḍ ! IImiren kan yelli-s teḥla.
Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ syenna, yerra ɣer leǧwahi n lebḥeṛ n Jlili, yuli ɣer wedrar yeqqim.
Usan-d ɣuṛ-es lɣaci d izumal, wwin-as-d iquḍaren, iderɣalen, ineɛyuba, igugamen d waṭas imuḍan nniḍen. Ssersen-ten ɣer zdat iḍaṛṛen-is dɣa isseḥla-ten.
Imdanen meṛṛa tɛeǧben mi walan igugamen heddṛen, ineɛyuba ḥlan, iquḍaren leḥḥun, iderɣalen țwalin, dɣa bdan țḥemmiden Sidi Ṛebbi Illu n wat Isṛail.

Sidna Ɛisa yessawel-asen i inelmaden-is yenna-yasen : Ɣaḍen-iyi lɣaci-agi axaṭer tlata wussan aya segmi llan yid-i, yerna ur sɛin d acu ara ččen. Ur bɣiɣ ara a ten-rreɣ akka lluẓen neɣ m'ulac ad feclen deg webrid.
Inelmaden nnan-as : Ansi ara ɣ-d-yekk deg umkan-agi yexlan, weɣṛum ara isseṛwun annect agi n lɣaci ?
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Acḥal n teḥbulin n weɣṛum i tesɛam ɣuṛ-wen ? RRran-as : Sebɛa n teḥbulin akk-d kra n iselman ( iḥutiwen ).
Imiren yenna i lɣaci ad qqimen ɣer lqaɛa.
Yeddem-ed tiḥbulin-nni n weɣṛum d iselman-nni, iḥmed Ṛebbi, yebḍa-ten, yefka-ten i inelmaden-is iwakken a ten-feṛqen i lɣaci.
Sčan akk armi ṛwan, yerna ččuṛen sebɛa n tqecwalin n wayen i d-yegran.
Ger wid yeččan, llan azal n ṛebɛa alaf n yergazen mbla tilawin d warrac.
Mi gerra lɣaci, Sidna Ɛisa yerkeb di teflukt, iṛuḥ ɣer tmurt n Magadan.
Ifariziyen d isaduqiyen qeṛṛben ɣer Sidna Ɛisa, ssutren-as lbeṛhan iwakken a t-jeṛben.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : M'ara yeɣli yiṭij, twalam igenni d azeggaɣ, teqqaṛem ad yelhu lḥal.
Akken daɣen taṣebḥit, teqqaṛem a d-iwwet ugeffur ( lehwa ) axaṭer yella usigna. AAmek ! Tesnem aț-țfehmem lḥala n igenni, ur tezmirem ara aț-țfehmem licaṛat yeɛnan lweqt-agi !
Lǧil am agi ijehlen ixedɛen Ṛebbi, yessutur lbeṛhan ! Meɛna ur as-d-ițțunefkay ara lbeṛhan nniḍen anagar win n nnbi Yunes ! DDɣa iṛuḥ, yeǧǧa-ten.
Mi zegren agummaḍ i lebḥeṛ, inelmaden-is țțun ur wwin ara yid-sen aɣṛum.
Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Ḥadret iman-nwen seg iɣes n temtunt n ifariziyen d isaduqiyen !
Inelmaden xemmemen deg yiman-nsen, nnan : Ahat imi ur d-newwi ara yid-nneɣ aɣṛum i ɣ-d-yenna akka !
Sidna Ɛisa iẓra ɣef wacu i țxemmimen yenna-yasen : A wid i gxuṣṣen di liman ! Tɣilem imi ur d-tewwim ara aɣṛum i wen-d-nniɣ akka ?
Mazal ur tefhimem ara ? Eɛni tețțum yakan xemsa teḥbulin-nni n weɣṛum i bḍiɣ i xemsa alaf n yergazen ? D wacḥal n tqecwalin i d-yegran ?
Ur tecfim ara daɣen ɣef sebɛa teḥbulin-nni n weɣṛum i bḍiɣ i ṛebɛa alaf n yemdanen, d wacḥal n tqecwalin i d-yegran ?
Amek akka ur tefhimem ara belli mačči ɣef weɣṛum i wen-d-țmeslayeɣ ? ḤḤadret iman-nwen seg iɣes n temtunt n ifariziyen d isaduqiyen !
Imiren inelmaden-is fehmen belli mačči ɣef yiɣes n temtunt i sen-d-immeslay, lameɛna ad ḥadren iman-nsen ɣef wuselmed n ifariziyen d isaduqiyen.
Mi gewweḍ Sidna Ɛisa ɣer tmurt n Qiṣarya n Filibus, isteqsa inelmaden is, yenna-yasen : D acu i-d-qqaṛen medden ɣef Mmi-s n bunadem ?
Rran-as : Kra qqaṛen d Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas, wiyaḍ qqaṛen d nnbi Ilyas, wiyaḍ daɣen d nnbi Irmiya neɣ d yiwen ger lenbiya.
I kunwi, d acu-yi ɣuṛ-wen ?
Buṭrus yerra-yas : Kečč d Lmasiḥ, Mmi-s n Sidi Ṛebbi yeddren !
Yenṭeq ɣuṛ-es yenna-yas : Amarezg-ik, a Buṭrus a mmi-s n Yunes, axaṭer mačči s tmusni-inek i tfehmeḍ ayagi, meɛna d Baba Ṛebbi yellan deg igenwan i k-t-id-isbegnen.
Ihi nekk a k-iniɣ : kečč a Buṭrus d azṛu, yerna ɣef wezṛu-agi ara bnuɣ tajmaɛt-iw, ula ț-ținezmarin n lmut ur țțaṭṭafent ara zdat-es !
Ad a k-fkeɣ tisura n tgelda n igenwan, ayen ara teqneḍ neɣ ayen iwumi ara tserrḥeḍ di ddunit, ad yețwaqbel deg igenwan.
Imiren yumeṛ i yinelmaden-is ur qqaṛen ula i yiwen belli d nețța i d Lmasiḥ.

Seg imiren, Sidna Ɛisa yebda issefham i inelmaden-is belli ilaq ad yali ɣer temdint n Lquds, anda ara yenneɛtab aṭas ger ifassen n lmuqedmin akk-d lɛulama n ccariɛa ad ḥekmen fell-as s lmut, ass wis tlata a d-iḥyu si ger lmegtin.
Buṭrus ijbed-it weḥd-es, yenna yas : A k-imneɛ Ṛebbi a Sidi, a wer d-yedṛu wayagi yid-ek !
Sidna Ɛisa idewweṛ ɣuṛ-es, yenna-yas : Beɛɛed akkin fell-i a Cciṭan ! Tebɣiḍ aț-țiliḍ d ugur deg webrid-iw ! Ixemmimen-ik ur d-kkan ara s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi, lameɛna d ixemmimen n yemdanen.
Imiren Sidna Ɛisa yenna i inelmaden-is : Kra win yebɣan ad iddu yid-i, ilaq-as ur yețḥebbiṛ ara ɣef yiman-is, ad iqbel ad inɛețțab ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw, a yi-d-itbeɛ.
Kra win yebɣan ad isellek taṛwiḥt-is, a s-tṛuḥ ; ma d win iseblen taṛwiḥt-is ɣef ddemma-w ad yuɣal a ț-yaf.
D acu n lfayda ara yesɛu wemdan di rrbeḥ n ddunit meṛṛa, ma yella yesṛuḥ taṛwiḥt-is ? Neɣ d acu i gezmer a t-yefk wemdan iwakken a d-ifdu taṛwiḥt-is ?
Axaṭer Mmi-s n bunadem a d-yas nețța d lmalayekkat-is di lɛaḍima n Baba-s, ad yefk i yal yiwen ayen yuklal, yal yiwen ɣef leḥsab n lefɛayel-is.
A wen-iniɣ tideț : llan kra seg wid yellan dagi, ur țmețțaten ara alamma ẓran Mmi-s n bunadem yusa-d am ugellid.
Mi ɛeddan sețța wussan, Sidna Ɛisa yewwi yid-es Buṭrus, Yeɛqub akk-d gma-s Yuḥenna, ulin ɣer wedrar eɛlayen, anda qqimen ḍeṛfen iman-nsen.
Taswiɛt kan ibeddel ṣṣifa zdat sen, walan udem-is yețfeǧǧiǧ am yiṭij, llebsa-s tuɣal ț-țamellalt, tecceɛceɛ am tafat.
A ten-aya dehṛen-asen-d Sidna Musa akk-d Sidna Ilyas țmeslayen d Sidna Ɛisa.
Buṭrus inṭeq yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : A Sidi, yelha ma neqqim dagi, ma tebɣiḍ ad sbeddeɣ tlata iqiḍunen : yiwen i kečč, yiwen i Sidna Musa, wayeḍ i Sidna Ilyas.
Mazal-it ițmeslay mi d-ters yiwet n tagut ițfeǧǧiǧen tɣumm-iten. Si tagut-nni tenṭeq-ed yiwet n taɣect, tenna-d : Wagi d Mmi eɛzizen deg-s i gella lfeṛḥ-iw, smeḥsiset-as !
Mi slan i taɣect-nni, inelmaden ikcem-iten lxuf, ɣlin ɣef wudem.
Sidna Ɛisa yessers afus-is fell-asen, yenna-yasen : Ur țțaggadet ara, kkret !
Mi refden allen-nsen, ur walan ula d yiwen nniḍen anagar Sidna Ɛisa.
Akken i d-țadren seg wedrar, Sidna Ɛisa yumeṛ-iten yenna-yasen : Ur qqaṛet i yiwen wayen akka twalam alamma yeḥya-d Mmi-s n bunadem si ger lmegtin.
Inelmaden steqsan Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : Iwacu imusnawen n ccariɛa qqaṛen-d : « Ilaq a d-yas nnbi Ilyas d amezwaru ? »
Yerra-yasen : Ț-țideț ilaq a d-yas nnbi Ilyas d amezwaru, iwakken ad iseggem kullec.
Ma d nekk aql-i nniɣ awen-d : nnbi Ilyas yusa-d yakan, lameɛna imdanen ur t-ɛqilen ara yerna xedmen deg-s akken i sen ihwa. Akka daɣen ara inɛețțab Mmi-s n bunadem ger ifassen-nsen !
Inelmaden fehmen imiren belli ițmeslay-asen-d ɣef Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas.
Mi wwḍen ɣer wanda llan lɣaci, yiwen wergaz iqeṛṛeb-ed ɣer Sidna Ɛisa, yeɣli ɣef tgecrar zdat-es yenna yas :
A Sidi, ḥunn ɣef mmi ! Atan kkaten-t imsigman, yenneɛtab aṭas ! Acḥal d abrid i geɣli ɣer tmes neɣ ɣer waman,
wwiɣ-t-id i inelmaden-ik, meɛna ur zmiren ara a t-sseḥlun.
Inṭeq Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : A lǧil ijehlen, iɛewjen ! Ar melmi ara yiliɣ yid-wen ? Ar melmi ara wen-sebṛeɣ ? Awit-iyi-d aqcic-agi ɣer dagi !
Sidna Ɛisa iɛeggeḍ ɣef lǧen-nni, yumeṛ-as ad iffeɣ seg weqcic-nni. Imiren kan, aqcic-nni yeḥla.
Mi llan inelmaden iman-nsen, qeṛṛben ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : Acuɣeṛ nukkni ur nezmir ara a t-nessufeɣ ?

Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Axaṭer txuṣṣem di liman ! Aql-i nniɣ-awen, lemmer tesɛim liman annect n uɛeqqa n uxerḍel, tili a s tinim i wedrar-agi, qleɛ iman-ik sya ɣer dihin ad iqleɛ. Ulac wayen iwumi ur tețțizmirem ara.
Sṣenf-agi n leǧnun țeffɣen anagar s tẓallit d uẓummu.
Mi llan di tmurt n Jlili, Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Mmi-s n bunadem ad ițțusellem ger ifassen n yemdanen ;
a t-nɣen, meɛna ass wis tlata a d-iḥyu si ger lmegtin. DDɣa inelmaden ikcem-iten leḥzen d ameqqran.
Mi gewweḍ Sidna Ɛisa akk-d inelmaden-is ɣer Kafernaḥum, imekkasen n lǧameɛ qeṛṛben-d ɣer Buṭrus nnan-as : Eɛni Ssid-nwen ur ițxelliṣ ara tabzert n lǧameɛ ?

Yerra-yasen Buṭrus : Ih, ad ixelleṣ ! Imiren kan mi gekcem Buṭrus ɣer wexxam, Sidna Ɛisa iluɛa-t, yenna-yas : D acu twalaḍ a Buṭrus ? Anwa i glaqen ad ixelleṣ tabzert i igelliden n ddunit-a , d arraw-nsen neɣ d ibeṛṛaniyen ?
Buṭrus yerra-yas : D ibeṛṛaniyen ! DDɣa Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas-d : Ihi arraw n tmurt ur țxelliṣen ara !

Lameɛna iwakken ur ten-yețɣaḍ ara lḥal, ṛuḥ, ḍeggeṛ tasennaṛt ɣer lebḥeṛ, aslem ( aḥewtiw ) amezwaru ara d-teṭṭfeḍ, ldi-yas imi, aț-țafeḍ deg-s aṣurdi n lfeṭṭa, efk-asen-t d lexlaṣ n tebzert-nneɣ nekk yid-ek.
Di lweqt-nni, inelmaden n Sidna Ɛisa qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es nnan-as : -- Anwa i d ameqqran di tgelda n igenwan ?
Sidna Ɛisa yessawel i yiwen weqcic isbedd-it di tlemmast-nsen, yenna :
A wen-d-iniɣ tideț ; ma yella ur d-tuɣalem ara ɣer webrid, m'ur teqbilem ara aț-țilim .am arrac imecṭuḥen, ur tkeččmem ara ɣer tgelda n igenwan !
Daymi, win ara yeṣṣemẓin iman-is am weqcic-agi amecṭuḥ, d nețța ara yilin d ameqqran di tgelda n igenwan.
Kra win ara yestṛeḥben s weqcic am-agi ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw, yis-i i gesṭerḥeb.
Win ara yesseɣlin di ddnub ula d yiwen seg imecṭuḥen-agi yumnen yis-i, axiṛ-as a s-cudden aɣaṛef n tsirt ɣer temgeṛṭ-is, a t-ḍeggṛen ɣer lebḥeṛ ad iɣṛeq.
A tawaɣit n ddunit-a, imi qwant tsebbiwin n tuccḍa ! Axaṭer tisebbiwin n tuccḍa ulamek ur d-țilint ara. Meɛna a nnger n win ara yilin d sebba-nsent.

Ma yella d afus-ik neɣ d aḍaṛ-ik ara k-yesseɣlin di ddnub, gzem-iten, ḍeggeṛ-iten akkin fell-ak, axiṛ-ak aț-țiliḍ di ddunit d aɛiban wala aț-țesɛuḍ sin iḍaṛṛen neɣ sin ifassen, aț-țwaḍeggṛeḍ ɣer tmes ur nxețți.

Ma yella daɣen ț-țiṭ-ik ara k-yawin ɣer ddnub, qleɛ-iț ḍeggeṛ-iț akkin fell-ak ; axiṛ-ik aț-țiliḍ di ddunit s yiwet n tiṭ wala aț-țesɛuḍ snat wallen, aț- țwaḍeggṛeḍ ɣer tmes n ǧahennama.
Ɣuṛ-wat aț-țḥeqṛem yiwen seg imecṭuḥen-agi axaṭer aql-i nniɣ awen-t : lmalayekkat-nsen deg igenwan, zgant daymen zdat Baba Ṛebbi.
xaṭer Mmi-s n bunadem yusa-d ad isellek wid i gḍaɛen ! ]
D acu twalam ? Ma yella win yesɛan meyya wulli dɣa teɛṛeq-as yiwet deg-sent, ur ițțaǧa ara țesɛa uțesɛin-nni nniḍen di lexla iwakken a d-inadi ɣef tin i s-iɛeṛqen ?
A wen-iniɣ tideț : ma yufa-ț, ad ifṛeḥ yis akteṛ n țesɛa uțesɛin-nni nniḍen ur neɛṛiq ara.
Akken daɣen Baba-twen Ṛebbi yellan deg igenwan, ur yebɣi ara a s-iṛuḥ ula d yiwen seg imecṭuḥen-agi.
Ma yella twalaḍ gma-k idneb, ṛuḥ ṭṭef-it weḥd-es, nhu-t. Ma yuɣ-ak awal, atan trebḥeḍ-ed gma-k !
Meɛna ma igumma a k-d-isel, awi yiwen neɣ sin yemdanen yid-ek, iwakken ad ilin d inigan m'ara tefru temsalt , akken i d-tenna ccariɛa.
Ma yugi a sen-isel, ssiweḍ tamsalt ɣer tejmaɛt n watmaten, m'ur iḥess ara ula i tejmaɛt-nni, ḥseb-it am akken d akafriw neɣ d amekkas axabit !
A wen-iniɣ tideț : ayen akk ara teqnem neɣ iwumi ara tserrḥem di ddunit, ad yețwaqbel deg igenwan.
A wen-iniɣ daɣen s tideț : ma yella sin seg-wen ddukklen iwakken ad ssutren kra di tẓallit, Baba Ṛebbi yellan deg igenwan, a sen-t-id-yefk.
Axaṭer anda ara dduklen sin neɣ tlata s yisem-iw, ad ḥedṛeɣ gar-asen !
Imiren Buṭrus iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-es yenna-yas : A Sidi, acḥal n tikkal ilaq ad semḥeɣ i gma ma yeḍlem-iyi, armi d sebɛa n tikkal ? SSidna Ɛisa yerra yas :
Xaṭi ! Ur k-d-nniɣ ara alamma d sebɛa tikkal, meɛna alamma d sebɛin iberdan sebɛa tikkal !
Daymi, tagelda n igenwan tețțemcabi ɣer yiwen ugellid yebɣan ad imḥasab nețța d iqeddacen-is.
Akken yebda leḥsab, wwin-as-d yiwen uqeddac iwumi yețțalas imelyunen.
Imi ur yesɛi ara s wacu ara ixelleṣ, agellid-nni ifka lameṛ a ten-zzenzen d aklan, s nețța s tmeṭṭut-is, s warraw-is d wayen akk yesɛa, iwakken ad ixelleṣ ṭṭlaba-ines.
Aqeddac-nni yeɣli ɣer iḍaṛṛen n ugellid, iḥellel-it yenna-yas : «` A Sidi, ṣṣbeṛ kra wussan, ad uɣaleɣ a k-xellṣeɣ ayen akk i yi tețțalaseḍ. »
Imi i t-iɣaḍ aṭas, agellid-nni isumeḥ-as ṭṭlaba-ines iserreḥ-as ad iṛuḥ.

Akken kan i d-iffeɣ uqeddac-nni immuger-ed yiwen seg imdukkal-is ixeddmen yid-es, iwumi yețțalas kra n iṣurdiyen. IIkker ɣuṛ-es yeṭṭef-it si temgeṛṭ yeqqaṛ-as : « Err-iyi-d ayen i k țțalaseɣ ! »
Amdakkel-is yeɣli ɣer iḍaṛṛen-is iḥellel-it, yenna-yas : « Sṣbeṛ kra n wussan, ad uɣaleɣ a k-xellṣeɣ ! »
Lameɛna ur yeqbil ara ad isbeṛ, yerra-t ɣer lḥebs, alamma tețwaxelleṣ ṭṭlaba-ines.
Iqeddacen nniḍen mi walan ayen yedṛan, iɣaḍ-iten lḥal, dɣa ṛuḥen ṣṣawḍen lexbaṛ i ugellid.
Agellid iceggeɛ ɣer uqeddac-nni akken a d-yas, dɣa yenna-yas : « A yir amdan ! Mi tețḥellileḍ deg-i, eɛni ur k-sumḥeɣ ara akk ṭṭlaba-inek ?
Acuɣeṛ ihi ur as-tsumḥeḍ ara i wemdakkel-ik akken i k-sumḥeɣ nekkini ? »
Agellid-nni yezɛef aṭas, yerra aqeddac-nni ɣer lḥebs, iwakken ad inɛețțab alamma tețwaxelleṣ ṭṭlaba ines.
Akken daɣen ara wen-yexdem Baba Ṛebbi yellan deg igenwan ma ur tețsamaḥem ara i watmaten-nwen seg ul.
Mi gekfa lewṣayat-agi, Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ si tmurt n Jlili ɣer tmurt n Yahuda ɣer leǧwahi n wasif n Urdun.
Aṭas n lɣaci i t-iḍefṛen ɣer dinna, dɣa yesseḥla wid akk ihelken.
Kra ifariziyen qeṛṛben-d ɣuṛ-es iwakken a t-jeṛben, nnan-as : Eɛni ccariɛa-nneɣ tsumeḥ-as i wergaz ad yebru i tmeṭṭut-is ɣef yal sebba yellan ?
Yerra-yasen : Ur teɣṛim ara ayen i d-teqqaṛ ccariɛa : di tazwara Sidi Ṛebbi ixleq-ed argaz ț-țmeṭṭut,
yenna-d : AArgaz ad yeǧǧ baba-s d yemma-s, iiwakken ad iɛic nețța ț-țmeṭṭut-is, ddɣa di sin yid-sen, ad uɣalen d yiwen.
S wakka ur llin ara d sin, meɛna uɣalen d yiwen. Ur as-ilaq ara ihi i wemdan ad ifṛeq ayen yesdukkel Sidi Ṛebbi !
Nnan-as : Acuɣeṛ ihi Sidna Musa yeǧǧa yaɣ-d lqanun belli m'ara yebru wergaz i tmeṭṭut-is, a s-yefk lkaɣeḍ n berru ?
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Ɣef ddemma n wulawen-nwen yeqquṛen i wen-iserreḥ nnbi Musa aț-țebrum i tilawin-nwen. Meɛna di tazwara mačči akka i gella lḥal.
Ma d nekk a wen-d-iniɣ : kra n win ara yebrun i tmeṭṭut-is yili ur tezni ara, iwakken ad yaɣ tayeḍ, d nețța i geznan !
Inelmaden nnan-as : Ma yella akka i d lḥala n wergaz ɣer tmeṭṭut, ulac lfayda di zzwaǧ !
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Mačči d imdanen meṛṛa i gzemren ad qeblen aselmed agi lameɛna anagar wid iwumi i d-ifka Sidi Ṛebbi lefhama i gzemren ad qeblen annect-agi.

Aṭas n sebbat i gqeḍɛen zzwaǧ i wemdan. Llan wid i d-ilulen si tɛebbuṭ n yemma-tsen ur sɛin ara ddunit, wiyaḍ d imdanen i sen-ț-ikksen. LLlan daɣen wid iḥeṛmen iman-nsen ɣef zwaǧ, ɣef ddemma n tgelda n igenwan. Win i gzemren ad ifhem aselmed agi a t-yefhem !
Kra yemdanen țawin-d i Sidna Ɛisa arrac imecṭuḥen iwakken ad issers afus-is fell-asen a ten-ibarek, meɛna inelmaden-is țțaran-ten.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Anfet-asen i warrac a d-asen ɣuṛ-i, ur sen-qeṭṭɛet ara abrid, axaṭer tagelda n igenwan thegga i nutni akk-d wid yellan am nutni !
Yessers afus-is fell-asen, iburek iten, dɣa iṛuḥ syenna.
Imiren yiwen wergaz iqeṛṛeb-ed ɣer Sidna Ɛisa, yenna-yas : A Sidi, d acu i yi-ilaqen a t xedmeɣ n wayen yelhan iwakken ad sɛuɣ tudert n dayem ?

Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Acuɣeṛ i yi-testeqsayeḍ ɣef wayen yelhan ? AAnagar yiwen i gelhan ! Ma tebɣiḍ aț-țesɛuḍ tudert-agi, xdem lumuṛat yellan di ccariɛa. YYerra-yas-ed weqcic-nni : Anwi i d lumuṛat ara tebɛeɣ ?
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Ur tneqqeḍ ara tamgeṛṭ, ur tzennuḍ ara, ur tețțcehhideḍ ara s ẓẓur, ur tețțakkṛreḍ ara,
qadeṛ baba-k d yemma-k, tḥemmleḍ lɣiṛ-ik am yiman-ik !
Aqcic-nni yerra-yas-ed : Ayagi akk xedmeɣ-t, d acu i yi-ixuṣṣen ?

Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ma tebɣiḍ ihi aț-țkemleḍ deg webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi , ṛuḥ, zzenz akk ayen i tesɛiḍ, tefkeḍ idrimen-nni i yimeɣban, s wakka aț-țesɛuḍ agerruj deg igenwan ! Imiren as-ed, aț-țedduḍ yid-i.
Mi gesla i yimeslayen-agi, ilemẓi-nni yeḥzen aṭas dɣa iṛuḥ, axaṭer d ameṛkanti ameqqran i gella.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna i inelmaden-is : A wen-iniɣ s tideț : iwɛeṛ aṭas i umeṛkanti ad ikcem ɣer tgelda n igenwan !
A wen-iniɣ daɣen : ma yella iwɛeṛ i welɣem ad iɛeddi di tiṭ n tissegnit, iwɛeṛ akteṛ i umeṛkanti ad ikcem ɣer tgelda n igenwan !
Mi slan i imeslayen-agi, inelmaden-is dehcen aṭas, nnan-as : Anwa i gzemren ad ițțusellek ihi ?
Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa imuqel-iten, yenna : Imdanen s yiman-nsen ur zmiren ara, meɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yezmer i kullec.
Buṭrus inṭeq, yenna-yas : Aql-aɣ nukkni neǧǧa kullec iwakken a k-netbeɛ, d acu ara yedṛun yid-nneɣ ?

Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : A wen-iniɣ s tideț, asm'ara d-ḥyun lmegtin ɣer ddunit tajḍiṭ, asm'ara yeqqim Mmi-s n bunadem ɣef wukersi n lḥekma di lɛaḍima-s, ula d kunwi yeddan yid-i, aț-țeqqimem di tnac yid-wen ɣef yikersiyen n lḥekma iwakken aț-țḥasbem tnac n leɛṛac n wat Isṛail.

Yerna, kra win ara yeǧǧen ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw axxam-is neɣ atmaten-is, yessetma-s neɣ baba-s, yemma-s, arraw-is neɣ tiferkiwin-is, ad as-d-yețțunefk akteṛ n wayen yeǧǧa, yerna a t-id-tṣaḥ tudert n dayem.
Aṭas seg wid yellan d imezwura ad uɣalen d ineggura, aṭas daɣen seg wid yellan d ineggura ad uɣalen d imezwura.
Imsefham yid-sen a ten-ixelleṣ s twizeț n lfeṭṭa i wass, dɣa iceggeɛ-iten ɣer tfeṛṛant-is.
Iffeɣ daɣen ɣef țesɛa n ṣṣbeḥ, iwala wiyaḍ qqimen di beṛṛa mbla lxedma.
yenna-yasen : Ṛuḥet ula d kunwi aț-țxedmem di tfeṛṛant-iw, a wen-fkeɣ ayen tuklalem.
Dɣa ṛuḥen. Bab n tfeṛṛant-nni yexdem akken daɣen ɣef tnac n wass akk-d ț-țlata n tmeddit.
Iffeɣ daɣen ɣef lxemsa n tmeddit, yufa wiyaḍ qqimen di beṛṛa yenna-yasen : Acuɣeṛ i tețɣimim ass kamel mbla lxedma ?
Nnan-as-ed : Ulac win i ɣ-d-ifkan lxedma ! YYenna-yasen : Ṛuḥet ula d kunwi aț-țxedmem di tfeṛṛant-iw !
Mi i d-tewweḍ tmeddit, bab n tfeṛṛant yenna i lewkil-is : Ssiwel i ixeddamen txellseḍ-ten yiwen yiwen. Zwir seg ineggura tessegriḍ imezwura.
Usan-d wid yebdan lxedma ɣef lxemsa n tmeddit, ixelleṣ-iten s ssuma n yiwen wass,
mi i d-tewweḍ nnuba n wid ibdan lxedma ɣef țesɛa n ṣṣbeḥ, ɣilen ad țwaxelṣen akteṛ n wiyaḍ, meɛna ula d nutni țwaxellṣen s ssuma n yiwen wass.
Mi ṭṭfen lexlaṣ-nsen, iɣaḍ-iten lḥal, nnan i bab n tfeṛṛant-nni :
Ixeddamen-agi ineggura xedmen yiwet n ssaɛa kan, txellṣeḍ ten am nukkni yenɛețțaben ass kamel i wezɣal ?
Meɛna yerra-yas i yiwen seg sen : Ay amdakkel, acuɣeṛ i k-iɣaḍ lḥal ? Eɛni ur nemsefham ara ɣef lexlaṣ-nwen ad yili tawizeț n lfeṭṭa d ssuma n yiwen wass ?
Awi lḥeqq-ik tṛuḥeḍ. I ma yella bɣiɣ ad fkeɣ i uneggaru annect i k-fkiɣ i kečč ?
Eɛni ur zmireɣ ara ad xedmeɣ akken bɣiɣ s idrimen-iw ? Neɣ iɣaḍ-ik lḥal imi ur lliɣ ara d amecḥaḥ ?
S wakka aṭas ineggura ara yuɣalen d imezwura, aṭas n imezwura ara yuɣalen d ineggura.
Mi țeddun ad alin ɣer temdint n Lquds, Sidna Ɛisa iṭṭef tnac-nni inelmaden-is weḥḥed-sen, yenna yasen :
Ḥesset-ed : atan a nali ɣer temdint n Lquds, anda ara ițțusellem Mmi-s n bunadem ger ifassen n lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d lɛulama n ccariɛa. Ad ḥekmen fell-as s lmut,
yerna a t-sellmen ger ifassen nn ikafriwen iwakken ad stehzin fell-as, a t-jelkḍen ( a t-cellṭen ), a t-semmṛen ɣef wumidag, ass wis tlata a d-iḥyu si ger lmegtin.
Imiren yemma-s n Yeɛqub d Yuḥenna, arraw n Zabadi, tqeṛṛeb-ed ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nețțat d warraw-is, tseǧǧed ɣer iḍaṛṛen-is.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : D acu i tebɣiḍ ? Tenna-yas : Di leɛnaya-k a Sidi, efk-asen imukan i sin-agi n warraw-iw di tgelda-inek, iwakken ad qqimen wa ɣer uyeffus-ik, wa ɣer uzelmaḍ-ik.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Ur teẓrim ara ayen akka i d tessutrem ! Eɛni tzemrem aț-țeswem si tbuqalt-agi n lemṛaṛ ara sweɣ ? NNnan-as : Ih a Sidi, nezmer !

Yerra-yasen : Ț-țideț, aț-țeswem si tbuqalt-agi, meɛna ɣef wayen yeɛnan imukan ɣer tama-w tayeffust neɣ tazelmaṭ, mačči d nekk ara ten-ifken, ad țțunefken i wid iwumi i ten-ihegga Baba Ṛebbi.
Ɛecṛa n inelmaden-nni mi slan ayagi, ikcem-iten zzɛaf ɣef ddemma n sin-nni watmaten.
Sidna Ɛisa yessawel-asen, yenna-yasen : Walit igelliden n yegduden nniḍen akk-d imeqqranen-nsen amek ḥeṛsen yerna ḥeqṛen lɣaci-nsen !
Ur ilaq ara ad yili wannect-agi gar-awen. Ma yella yiwen seg-wen yebɣa ad yuɣal d ameqqran, ilaq ad yili d aqeddac-nwen.
Akken daɣen, win yebɣan ad yili d amezwaru, ilaq ad yuɣal d akli-nwen.
Daymi Mmi-s n bunadem ur d-yusi ara iwakken ad qedcen fell-as, meɛna yusa-d iwakken ad yili d aqeddac, yerna ad isebbel tudert-is iwakken ad isellek aṭas n yemdanen.
Mi d-ffɣen si temdint n Yiriku, aṭas n lɣaci i d-iḍefṛen Sidna Ɛisa.
Llan sin iderɣalen qqimen rrif n webrid, mi slan belli d Sidna Ɛisa i d-iɛeddan bdan țɛeggiḍen : A Sidi ! A mmi-s n Sidna Dawed ! Ḥunn fell-aɣ !
Lɣaci-nni țlumun-ten, qqaṛen asen ad ssusmen, ma d nutni țkemmilen leɛyaḍ : Ḥunn fell-aɣ a Sidi, a mmi-s n Sidna Dawed !
Sidna Ɛisa iḥbes, issawel-asen, yenna-yasen : D acu i tebɣam a wen-t- xedmeɣ ?
Rran-as : Nebɣa a ɣ-d-yuɣal yeẓri a Sidi !
Ɣaḍen aṭas Sidna Ɛisa, yennul allen-nsen, imiren kan yuɣal-iten-id yeẓri, dɣa ddan yid-es.
Mi qṛib ad kecmen ɣer temdint n Lquds, wwḍen ɣer yiɣil n uzemmur yellan tama n taddart n Bitfaji, Sidna Ɛisa iceggeɛ sin inelmaden-is,
