Llan kra n yemdanen țemcabin ɣer webrid-nni anda teɣli zzerriɛa, m'ara slen i wawal, Cciṭan a d-yas a t-iqleɛ seg ulawen-nsen iwakken ur țțamnen ur țwasellaken.

Wiyaḍ țemcabin ɣer wakal yeččuṛen d idɣaɣen. M'ara slen i wawal a t-qeblen s lfeṛḥ lameɛna ur t-țaǧǧan ara ad iger izuṛan ; imiren kan ad amnen, m'ara d-yas lweqt n ujeṛṛeb țțuɣalen ɣer deffir.
Ayen yeɣlin ger isennanen, d wid isellen i wawal meɛna m'ara d-imɣi ur igemmu ara deg-sen axaṭer țțaǧan anezgum d rrbeḥ akk-d zzhu n ddunit ad iɣumm awal-nni.
Ma d ayen yețwazerɛen deg wakal lɛali, d wid isellen i wawal s wul yeṣfan d neyya ḥerzen-t yerna țțaǧan-d lxiṛ s ṣṣbeṛ-nsen.
Yiwen ur iceɛɛel taftilt iwakken a ț-iɣum s lḥila neɣ a ț-issedreg; lameɛna a ț-issers ɣef lmeṣbeḥ iwakken kra n win ara d-ikecmen ad iwali tafat.
Kra n wayen yeffren a d-iban, kra n wayen yellan di ṭṭlam a t-id-tesban tafat.
Ɛasset iman-nwen ihi ɣef wayen i tsellem, axaṭer win i gḥerzen ayen yesɛa a s-nernu, ma d win ur nḥerrez ara a s-ițwakkes ula d ayen i gɣil yesɛa-t.
Yemma-s d watmaten n Sidna Ɛisa usan-d a t-ẓren, meɛna ur zmiren ara ad qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es imi aṭas n lɣaci i gellan dinna.
Ssawḍen-as lexbaṛ nnan-as : A Sidi, yemma-k d watmaten-ik atnan di beṛṛa, bɣan a k-ẓren.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Yemma d watmaten-iw d widak ismeḥsisen i wawal n Ṛebbi yerna ttabaɛen-t.
Yiwen wass, Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer yiwet n teflukt nețța d yinelmaden-is. Yenna-yasen : Eyyaw a nzegret ɣer tama nniḍen n lebḥeṛ n Jlili. Dɣa ṛuḥen.
Mi teddun ɣef waman, Sidna Ɛisa yeṭṭes. Yekker-ed waḍu iǧehden di lebḥeṛ, taflukt tebda tețțačaṛ d aman, ikcem-iten lxuf ameqqran.
Inelmaden qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es, sekkren-t-id nnan-as : A Sidi, a Sidi, atan a neɣṛeq. Yekker-ed, dɣa yumeṛ i waḍu d lemwaji ad ḥebsen, imiren kan ters-ed talwit.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Anida-t liman-nwen ? Tɛeǧǧben, țergigin, qqaṛen wway gar-asen : Anwa-t wagi ? Izmer ad yefk lameṛ i waḍu d lebḥeṛ yerna țțaɣen as awal !
Wwḍen ɣer tama nniḍen n lebḥeṛ, ɣer tmurt n ijiṛaziyen iqublen tamurt n Jlili.
Mi d-yers Sidna Ɛisa, ataya yusa-d ɣuṛ-es yiwen wergaz n taddart nni, melken-t waṭas n leǧnun ; acḥal ur yelsi llebsa, ur yezdiɣ axxam, yețɛici di tmeqbeṛt ger iẓekwan.
Mi gwala Sidna Ɛisa, yeɣli ɣer iḍaṛṛen-is iɛeggeḍ yenna : D acu i tebɣiḍ ɣuṛ-i a Ɛisa Mmi-s n Ṛebbi ɛlayen ? Di leɛnaya-k ur iyi-țɛețțib ara.

Yenna-yas-d akka axaṭer Sidna Ɛisa yefka lameṛ i uṛuḥani i t-izedɣen ad iffeɣ seg-s. Acḥal d abrid i s-cudden ifassen d iḍaṛṛen s ssnasel, nețța isseɣṛas-itent yerna aṛuḥani-nni yezzuɣuṛ-it ɣer yimukan yexlan.
Sidna Ɛisa isteqsa-t yenna-yas : Isem-ik ? yerra-yas : Tarbaɛt. Yenna-yas-d akka axaṭer aṭas n leǧnun i t-izedɣen.
?ḥellilen Sidna Ɛisa ur ten-ițceggiɛ ara ɣer yimukan n ṭṭlam.
Tella dinna yiwet n tqeḍɛit tameqqrant n yilfan kessen deg yiwet n tiɣilt. Leǧnun-nni țḥellilen Sidna Ɛisa a ten-yeǧǧ ad kecmen deg yilfan-nni ; Sidna Ɛisa iserreḥ-asen.
Imiren ffɣen seg wergaz-nni, kecmen deg yilfan, grarben seg ixef n tiɣilt ɣer lebḥeṛ, ɣeṛqen.
Imeksawen-nsen mi walan ayen yedṛan uzzlen ɣer taddart d lexlawi ad ssiwḍen lexbaṛ.
Usan-d lɣaci ɣer Sidna Ɛisa, ufan-d argaz-nni i seg d-ffɣen leǧnun yeqqim ɣer iḍaṛṛen-is, yuɣal-ed ɣer leɛqel-is, yelsa llebsa. Wehmen akk, tekcem-iten tugdi.
Wid iḥedṛen i wayen yedṛan, ḥkan amek yețwasellek umeǧnun-nni.
Imezdaɣ n tmurt uggaden, dɣa ssutren i Sidna Ɛisa ad ibɛed fell-asen. Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer teflukt iwakken ad iṛuḥ.
Argaz-nni i seg d-ffɣen leǧnun, issuter a t-yeǧǧ ad yeddu yid-es, meɛna Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas :
Uɣal ɣer wexxam-ik, teḥkuḍ ayen akk i k-ixdem Ṛebbi. Argaz-nni iṛuḥ, ikcem ɣer taddart, yeḥka meṛṛa wayen i s-ixdem Sidna Ɛisa.
Mi d-yuɣal Sidna Ɛisa, lɣaci meṛṛa i t-ițṛaǧun mmugren-t-id.
Yewweḍ-ed yiwen wergaz isem-is Jayrus, d ameqqran n lǧameɛ, yeɣli ɣer iḍaṛṛen n Sidna Ɛisa, yețḥellil deg-s iwakken ad iddu ɣer wexxam is
axaṭer yesɛa yelli-s tnac yiseggasen di leɛmeṛ-is, tețmețțat yerna anagar nețțat i gesɛa. Akken ițeddu Sidna Ɛisa ɣer dinna, ḥeṛsen-t-id lɣaci si mkul lǧiha.
Tella dinna yiwet n tmeṭṭut ihelken, tnac iseggasen nețțat tessaq d idammen. Texṣeṛ ayen akk i tesɛa ɣer ṭṭebba, yiwen ur ț-isseḥla.
Tekka-d deffir Sidna Ɛisa, teḍleq afus-is, tennul iri n ubeṛnus-is, imiren kan teḥla ḥebsen idammen-nni.
Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq yenna : Anwa akka i yi-d-innulen ? Imi ssusmen meṛṛa, Buṭrus yenna yas : A Sidi, lɣaci yezzi-yak-d yerna iḥṛes-ik-id si mkul tama, kečč teqqaṛeḍ anwa i k-id-innulen !
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yella yiwen i yi-d-innulen axaṭer ḥusseɣ i kra n tezmert teffeɣ seg-i.
Tameṭṭut-nni imi twala ulamek ara teffer, tusa-d tețțergigi teɣli ɣer yiḍaṛṛen n Sidna Ɛisa, teḥka-d zdat lɣaci meṛṛa acuɣeṛ i t-tennul d wamek teḥla imiren kan si lehlak-is.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : A yell-i, imi tumneḍ yis-i teḥliḍ ! Ṛuḥ di talwit.
Mazal-it iheddeṛ, ataya yiwen wergaz yusa-d seg wexxam n Jayṛus, yewwi-yas-d lexbaṛ-agi : Yelli-k temmut ! Ur țɛețțib ara Sidna Ɛisa.
Sidna Ɛisa mi s-yesla i wergaz-nni, yenna i Jayṛus : Ur țțagad ara ! Amen kan, yelli-k aț-țeslek.
Mi gewweḍ ɣer wexxam, ur yeǧǧi yiwen ad ikcem yid-es anagar Buṭrus, Yuḥenna, Yeɛqub akk-d baba-s d yemma-s n teqcict-nni.
Wid yellan dinna țrun akk, țɣerriden ( țmeǧǧiden ) fell-as. Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Beṛka-kkun imeṭṭawen ! taqcict ur temmut ara ! D iḍes i teṭṭes.
Nutni ugin a s-d-ḥessen imi ẓran taqcict temmut.
Sidna Ɛisa yeṭṭef-iț-id seg wufus yenna-yas s taɣect ɛlayen : A taqcict, ekker !
Imiren kan yuɣal-iț-id ṛṛuḥ, tekker-ed. Sidna Ɛisa yumeṛ a s-fken ayen ara tečč.
Imawlan-is wehmen. Sidna Ɛisa iweṣṣa-ten ur țɛawaden i yiwen ayen yedṛan.
Sidna Ɛisa isnejmaɛ-ed tnac yinelmaden-is, yefka-yasen tazmert d lḥekma s wacu ara ssufɣen leǧnun, ara sseḥlun imuḍan.
Iceggeɛ-iten ad beccṛen tageldit n Ṛebbi, yerna ad sseḥlun imuḍan.
Yenna-yasen : Ur țțawit acemma yid-wen d aɛwin, ur țțawit aɛekkaz neɣ agrab (aqwrab), ur țțawit aɣṛum neɣ idrimen, ur țțawit ara daɣen sin yiqendyaṛ.
Kra n win ara yestṛeḥben yis wen, qqimet deg wexxam-is alamma tṛuḥem.
Ma d anda ur stṛeḥben ara yis-wen, m'ara teffɣem si taddart-nni, zwit ula d aɣebbaṛ-is seg yiḍaṛṛen nwen, iwakken aț-țcehdem fell-asen belli d nutni i kkun-yugin.
Ṛuḥen, țeddun si taddart ɣer tayeḍ, țbecciṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ, sseḥlayen imuḍan di mkul amkan.
Hiṛudus lḥakem n tmurt n Jlili, yeɛweq mi gesla s wayen yedṛan meṛṛa, axaṭer kra n yemdanen qqaṛen : « d Yeḥya i d-iḥyan si ger lmegtin ! »
Wiyaḍ qqaṛen : « d Sidna Ilyas i d-yuɣalen ! » Neɣ : « ahat d yiwen si lenbiya n zik i d-iḥyan ! »
Lameɛna Hiṛudus yeqqaṛ : « Yeḥya kkseɣ-as aqeṛṛuy ! Anwa-t ihi wagi i ɣef selleɣ annect-agi ? » Dɣa ițqellib ad iẓer Sidna Ɛisa.
Mi d-uɣalen ṛṛusul n Sidna Ɛisa, bdan ḥekkun-as ayen akk i xedmen. Yewwi-ten yid-es ɣer yiwen wemkan, ɣer tama n taddart n Bitsayda akken ad qqimen weḥḥed-sen.
Mi slan anda yella lɣaci tebɛen-t. Nețța yesteṛḥeb yis-sen, yebda iheddeṛ-asen ɣef tgeldit n Ṛebbi, yesseḥla daɣen wid ihelken.

Akken qṛib ad yeɣli yiṭij, tnac-nni n ṛṛusul usan-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : Serreḥ i lɣaci ad ṛuḥen ɣer temdinin ț-țudrin iqeṛben iwakken ad afen ayen ara ččen d wanda ara ṭsen, axaṭer aql-aɣ deg wemkan yexlan.

Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Fket-asen kunwi s yiman-nwen ayen ara ččen. Erran-as : ?uṛ-nneɣ anagar xemsa teḥbulin n weɣṛum d sin yiselman. Neɣ tebɣiḍ a nṛuḥ nukni a d-naɣ ayen ara ččen lɣaci-agi ?
Llan dinna azal n xemsa alaf n yergazen. Sidna Ɛisa yenna i yinelmaden-is : Feṛqet lɣaci ț-țirebbaɛ n xemsin xemsin, tesɣimem-ten.
Ṛuḥen sɣimen-ten akken i sen-d yenna.
Sidna Ɛisa yerfed allen-is ɣer yigenni, yeḥmed Ṛebbi icekkeṛ-it, yeddem-ed xemsa-nni teḥbulin n weɣṛum d sin-nni iselman yebḍa-ten, yefka-ten i inelmaden-is a ten- feṛqen i lɣaci.
?čan akk armi ṛwan, yerna ččuṛen tnac yiḍellaɛen s wayen i d-yugran.
Yiwen wass Sidna Ɛisa yeqqim weḥd-es yețẓalla. Inelmaden-is qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es dɣa isteqsa-ten yenna-yasen : D acu-yi ɣer lɣaci ?
Rran-as : Kra qqaṛen d Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas ; wiyaḍ d Sidna Ilyas i d-yuɣalen ; ma d kra nniḍen qqaṛen d yiwen si lenbiya n zik i d-iḥyan si ger lmegtin.
Yenna-yasen : I kunwi, d acu-yi ɣuṛ-wen ? Yenṭeq Buṭrus yenna-yas : D kečč i d Lmasiḥ n Ṛebbi.
Sidna Ɛisa iweṣṣa-ten ur qqaṛen i yiwen belli d nețța i d Lmasiḥ.
Yenna-yasen daɣen : Ilaq Mmi-s n bunadem ad yeɛteb aṭas. A t-nekkṛen lecyux d lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d lɛulama n ccariɛa yerna a t-nɣen, lameɛna ass wis tlata a d-iḥyu si ger lmegtin.
Yenna daɣen i lɣaci : Win yebɣan ad iddu yid-i ur ilaq ara ad ixemmem ɣef tudert-is ; ilaq ad iqbel ad yenɛețțab yal ass ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw yerna ad yetbeɛ abrid-iw.
Axaṭer win yebɣan ad isellek tudert-is a s-tṛuḥ. Ma d win iwumi ara tṛuḥ ɣef ddemma-w ad yuɣal a ț-yaf.
D acu i d lfayda n wemdan ara irebḥen ddunit meṛṛa ma yesṛuḥ tudert-is neɣ issenger iman-is ?
Atan win issetḥan yis-i neɣ s yimeslayen iw, ad issetḥi yis Mmi-s n bunadem m'ara d-yas di tmanegt-is ț-țmanegt n Baba Ṛebbi akk-d lmalayekkat iqedsen.
A wen-d-iniɣ tideț, llan gar-awen wid ur nețmețțat ara alamma walan Tageldit n Ṛebbi.
Ɛeddan azal n tmanya wussan segmi i d-yenna imeslayen-agi. Sidna Ɛisa yewwi yid-es Buṭrus, Yuḥenna d Yeɛqub, yuli ɣer wedrar ad iẓẓall.
Mi gella ideɛɛu yenbeddal wudem-is, llebsa-s tuɣal ț-țamellalt tețfeǧǧiǧ am yiṭij.
Taswiɛt kan bedden-d ɣuṛ-es sin yergazen heddṛen yid-es : d Sidna Musa akk-d Sidna Ilyas.
Banen-ed di tafat tameqqrant, țmeslayen yid-es ɣef lmut-is ara yedṛun di temdint n Lquds.
Buṭrus d yimdukkal-is yewwi ten yiḍes. Mi d-endekwalen, walan tamanegt n Sidna Ɛisa akk-d wid yellan yid-es.

Mi kkren ad ṛuḥen sin-nni yergazen, yenṭeq Buṭrus ɣer Sidna Ɛisa yenna : A Sidi, acḥal yelha m'akka nella dagi ! Ma tebɣiḍ a nesbedd tlata yiqiḍunen, yiwen i kečč, yiwen i Sidna Musa wayeḍ i Sidna Ilyas. Yenna-d akka, axaṭer ur yeẓri d acu i d-iqqaṛ !
Mazal-it iheddeṛ mi ten-id-tɣumm yiwet n tagut. Buṭrus d imdukkal-is ikcem-iten lxuf d ameqqran.
Iffeɣ-ed yiwen n ṣṣut si tagut-nni yenna-d : Wagi d Mmi, d nețța i xtaṛeɣ, smeḥsiset-as.
Mi geḥbes ṣṣut-nni, walan anagar Sidna Ɛisa. Deg ussan-nni, inelmaden ur ḥkin i yiwen ayen ẓran.
Azekka-nni mi d-ṣubben seg wedrar, aṭas n lɣaci i d-immugren Sidna Ɛisa.
Atah yiwen wergaz iɛeggeḍ-ed si ger lɣaci yenna : A Sidi, di leɛnaya-k muqel-ed ɣer mmi, ala nețța i sɛiɣ !
Ikcem-it uṛuḥani, tiswiɛin m'ara t-ițhuccu, yețɛeggiḍ alamma ffɣent-ed tkufta seg imi-s, ur as-ițserriḥ ara alamma yerẓa-t akk.
?elleleɣ inelmaden-ik a t-ssufɣen seg-s, lameɛna ur zmiren ara.
Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq yenna : A lǧil ijehlen iɛewjen, ar melmi ara yiliɣ yid-wen, ara wen-sebṛeɣ ? Awi-d mmi-k ɣer dagi !

Akken i d-iqeṛṛeb weqcic-nni, aṛuḥani isseglallez-it di lqaɛa armi i d-țeffɣent tkufta seg yimi-s. Sidna Ɛisa yefka lameṛ i uṛuḥani-nni iwakken a t-iffeɣ. Aqcic-nni yeḥla, Sidna Ɛisa yerra-t i baba-s.
Lɣaci meṛṛa wehmen di tezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi. Imi tɛeǧǧben akk s wayen i gxeddem, Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq ɣer yinelmaden-is yenna :
?esset-ed mliḥ i wayen ara wen-d-iniɣ tura : « Mmi-s n bunadem ad ițțusellem ger ifassen n yemdanen. »
Inelmaden-is ur fhimen ara imeslayen-agi, lmeɛna-ines tețwaffer fell-asen iwakken ur t-fehmen ara yerna kukran a t-steqsin.
Inelmaden țmeslayen wway gar-asen, țmesteqsayen anwa i d ameqqran deg-sen.
Sidna Ɛisa yeẓran ayen țxemmimen deg ulawen-nsen, ikker yeddem-ed yiwen weqcic isbedd-it zdat-es,
yenna-yasen : Win iqeblen aqcic am wagi ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw d nekk i geqbel, win i yi-qeblen, yeqbel win i yi-d iceggɛen. Win yessimẓiyen iman-is gar-awen d nețța i d ameqqran.
Yuḥenna yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : A Sidi, neẓra yiwen wergaz yessuffuɣ leǧnun s yisem-ik, nebɣa a s-neqḍeɛ imi ur k-itbiɛ ara am nukni.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Ur s-țțagit ara ! Win ur wen-d neffiɣ ara d aɛdaw, yid-wen i gella !
Mi qṛib a d-awḍen wussan i deg ara yețwarfed ɣer igenwan, Sidna Ɛisa yeqsed ad iṛuḥ ɣer temdint n Lquds.
Yessezwer imceggɛen zdat-es iwakken a s-heggin ayen ilaqen. Kecmen ɣer yiwet n taddart n yisamariyen,
lameɛna ugin ad stṛeḥben yis imi slan ɣer temdint n Lquds i gteddu.
Yeɛqub d Yuḥenna mi ẓran ayagi, nnan : A Sidi, tebɣiḍ a nefk lameṛ i tmes n yigenni a d-teɣli fell-asen a ten tessenger ?
Sidna Ɛisa yezzi ɣuṛ-sen, iɛeggeḍ fell-asen yenna : Acuɣeṛ i tețxemmimem akka ?
Mmi-s n bunadem ur d-yusi ara ad issenger imdanen lameɛna yusa-d a ten-isellek. Dɣa ṛuḥen ɣer taddart nniḍen.
Mi teddun deg webrid, yiwen wergaz yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : A Sidi, anda teddiḍ ad dduɣ !
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Uccanen ɣuṛ-sen lɣiṛan, ifṛax n yigenni sɛan leɛcuc, ma d Mmi-s n bunadem ur yesɛi ara anda ara yessers aqeṛṛuy-is.
Dɣa yenna i yiwen nniḍen : Eyya-d aț-țedduḍ yid-i. Yerra-yas : A Sidi, serreḥ-iyi uqbel ad ṛuḥeɣ ad meḍleɣ baba.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Eǧǧ wid yemmuten ad meḍlen lmegtin-nsen, ma d kečč eyya-d aț-țbecṛeḍ tageldit n Ṛebbi.
Wayeḍ yenṭeq yenna-yas : Ad dduɣ yid-ek a Sidi, lameɛna eǧǧ-iyi ad ṛuḥeɣ ad sellmeɣ ɣef wat wexxam-iw.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Kra n win yeṭṭfen lmaɛun, yețmuqul ɣer deffir, ur yenfiɛ ara i tgelda n Ṛebbi.
Syenna, Sidna Ɛisa yextaṛ-ed tnin usebɛin yinelmaden nniḍen, iceggeɛ-iten sin sin ad ṛuḥen ɣer mkul taddart d mkul amkan anda ilaq ad iṛuḥ ula d nețța.
Yenna-yasen : Tamegra meqqṛet meɛna drus yixeddamen i gellan. Dɛut ihi ɣer Bab n tmegra iwakken a d-iceggeɛ ixeddamen ɣer yigran-is.
Atan a kkun-ceggɛeɣ am izamaren ger wuccanen.
Ur țțawit yid-wen idrimen, ur țțawit aɛwin neɣ tayuga nniḍen n yerkasen. Deg webrid-nwen ur sṛuḥuyet ara lweqt di sslam.
Kra n wexxam ara tkecmem init : sslam n Ṛebbi fell-awen ay at wexxam !
Ma yella dinna walebɛaḍ d imhenni, sslam-nwen ad yers fell-as, neɣ m'ulac lehna-nwen aț-țeqqim ɣuṛ-wen.
Qqimet deg wexxam-nni, ččet swet ayen ara wen-d-fken, axaṭer axeddam yuklal lexlaṣ-is. Ur țṛuḥut ara seg wexxam ɣer wayeḍ.
Mkul taddart ara tkecmem, ma stṛeḥben yis-wen ččet ayen ara wen-d-ssersen.
Sseḥlut imuḍan-nsen, init-asen : tageldit n Ṛebbi tewweḍ-ed ɣuṛ-wen.
Lameɛna mkul taddart ara tkecmem m'ur stṛeḥben ara yis-wen, effɣet ɣer yizenqan-nsen init :
« a nezwi ula d aɣebbaṛ n taddart-nwen i d-ineṭḍen deg yiḍaṛṛen nneɣ, meɛna ḥṣut belli tageldit n Ṛebbi tewweḍ-ed ɣuṛ-wen.
Aql-i nniɣ-awen, ass n lḥisab taddart-agi aț-țețțuɛaqeb akteṛ n temdint n ?udum.

A nnger-im a tamdint n Kurazim, a nnger-im a Bitsayda ! A lukan lbeṛhanat yețwaxedmen deg kkunt țwaxedmen di temdinin n ?ur akk-d Sidun, tili imezdaɣ-nsent acḥal aya segmi sburren ticekkaṛin n leḥzen, sexnunnsen iman-nsen deg iɣiɣden iwakken a d-beggnen belli ndemmen, uɣalen-d ɣer webrid.
?ef wannect-agi, ass n lḥisab a ț-țețțuɛaqbemt akteṛ n temdinin n ?ur d Sidun.
I kemmini a tamdint n Kafernaḥum, tɣileḍ aț-țaliḍ ɣer yigenni ? Xaṭi ! ?er tesraft lqayen n laxeṛt ara tețwaḍeggṛeḍ.
Win i wen-ismeḥsisen ismeḥsis-iyi-d i nekk. Win ur kkun-neqbil d nekk ur geqbil ara, win ur iyi-neqbil ara, ur iqbil ara Win i yi-d-iceggɛen.
Tnin usebɛin-nni yinelmaden uɣalen-d ččuṛen d lfeṛḥ, nnan-as : A Sidi, ula d leǧnun țțagaden-aɣ s yisem-ik.
Yenna-yasen : Walaɣ Cciṭan yeɣli-d am lebṛaq seg yigenni.
Slet-ed i wayen ara wen-iniɣ : ț-țideț fkiɣ-awen tazmert s wayes ara tṛekḍem izerman ț-țɣerdmiwin, aț-țmeḥqem lǧehd n weɛdaw yerna ulac ayen ara wen-izemren ;
lameɛna ur feṛṛḥet ara imi i tḥekkmem ɣef leǧnun, feṛḥet imi ismawen-nwen țwajerden deg igenwan.

Imiren kan, Sidna Ɛisa yeččuṛ-it Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen s lfeṛḥ, yenṭeq yenna : Tanemmirt a Baba, kečč yellan d Bab n yigenwan d lqaɛa, imi ayen akk i teffreḍ ɣef lɛuqal d yimusnawen tbeggneḍ-t-id i yimecṭuḥen. Tanemmirt a Baba Ṛebbi aḥnin axaṭer d wagi i d lebɣi-k.
Baba yerra kullec ger ifassen-iw. Yiwen ur yeẓri d acu-yi anagar Baba Ṛebbi, yiwen ur issin Baba Ṛebbi anagar Mmi-s akk-d win iwumi yebɣa Mmi-s a t-id-isbeggen.
Dɣa yezzi ɣer yinelmaden-is yenna-yasen : Amarezg n wid iwalan ayen tețwalim !
Aql-i nniɣ-awen : aṭas n lenbiya d waṭas n yigelliden i gebɣan ad ẓren ayen i tẓerrem ur t-ẓrin, i gebɣan ad slen ayen i tsellem ur t-slin.
Ikred yiwen umusnaw n ccariɛa yebɣan ad ijeṛṛeb Sidna Ɛisa, yenna yas : A Sidi, d acu ara xedmeɣ iwakken ad sɛuɣ tudert n dayem ?
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : D acu yuran di ccariɛa n Musa ? D acu i tfehmeḍ deg-s mi ț-teɣriḍ ?
Yerra-yas-d : Aț-țḥemmleḍ Sidi Ṛebbi s wul-ik d ṛṛuḥ-ik, s wayen yellan di tezmert-ik akk-d lɛeqliya-k. Aț-țḥemmleḍ daɣen wiyaḍ am yiman-ik .
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ayen akka i d-tenniḍ ț-țideț, exdem akka aț-țesɛuḍ tudert n dayem !
Lɛalem-nni n ccariɛa yebɣan ad yefk lḥeqq i yiman-is, yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : Anwa-ten wiyaḍ-agi ?
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yiwen wergaz iṣubb-ed si temdint n Lquds ɣer temdint n Yiriku ; sqaṭɛen-as yimakaren ɛerran-t rnan wten-t, ṛuḥen ǧǧan-t ur yemmut ur iddir.
Iɛedda-d syenna yiwen lmuqeddem n ccariɛa ; mi t-iwala iwwet iɛedda si tama nniḍen.
Iɛedda-d daɣen seg webrid-nni yiwen wemṛabeḍ n at Lewwi, iwala-t, ikemmel abrid-is iṛuḥ.
Ataya yiwen wubeṛṛani n tmurt n Samarya, iwweḍ-ed ɣuṛ-es, mi t-iwala iɣaḍ-it.
Iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-es, idhen leǧruḥ-is s zzit d ccṛab, icudd iten ; isserkeb-it ɣef zzayla-s, yewwi-t ɣer yiwen wexxam n yemsafren, ilha-d yid-es.
Azekka-nni yefka sin yiṣurdiyen i bab n wexxam-nni, yenna-yas : « Bedd ɣuṛ-es, ayen ara tṣeṛṛfeḍ n zzyada fell-as, a k-t-id-kemmleɣ asm'ara d-uɣaleɣ. »
Di tlata-agi, anwa i gḥemmlen am yiman-is argaz-agi yețțuɛerran ?
Amusnaw n ccariɛa yerra-yas : D win akken iḥunnen fell-as, i s ixedmen lxiṛ. Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ṛuḥ ula d kečč exdem akken.
Deg webrid-nsen ɣer temdint n Lquds, Sidna Ɛisa yekcem ɣer yiwet n taddart. Yiwet n tmeṭṭut isem is Marṭa teɛṛeḍ-it ɣer wexxam-nsen.
Tesɛa weltma-s isem-is Meryem, teqqim-ed ɣer iḍaṛṛen n Sidna Ɛisa, tesmeḥsis i wawal-is.
Marṭa tqeddec yečča-ț ccɣel, tusa-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa tenna-yas : A Sidi, ur ak-tewqiɛ ara lmeɛna imi iyi-teǧǧa weltma ad qedceɣ weḥd-i ? Ini-yas aț-țekker a yi-tɛiwen.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : A Maṛta, tețḥebbiṛeḍ tețqelliqeḍ iman-im ɣef waṭas n tɣawsiwin ;
lameɛna yiwet kan i gṣeḥḥan ! Meryem textaṛ ayen ilaqen yerna yiwen ur as-t-ițekkes.
Yiwen wass, Sidna Ɛisa yețẓalla deg yiwen wemkan. Mi gfukk, yiwen seg yinelmaden-is yenna-yas : A Sidi, selmed-aɣ amek ara neẓẓal akken yesselmed Yeḥya i yinelmaden-is.
Yenna-yasen : M'ara tẓallem, init : A Baba Ṛebbi, isem-ik ad ițwaqeddes, lḥekma n tgeldit-ik a d-tas.
Yal ass efk-aɣ-d aɣṛum-nneɣ.
Semmeḥ-aɣ ddnubat-nneɣ akken i nețsamaḥ ula d nukkni i wid i ɣ-ixedmen cceṛ, ur aɣ-țaǧǧa ara a neɣli deg wujeṛṛeb.
Yenna-yasen daɣen : Ma yella yiwen deg-wen yesɛa aḥbib, iṛuḥ ɣuṛ-es di țnaṣfa n yiḍ a s-yini : « Ay aḥbib ṛḍel-iyi-d tlata teḥbulin n weɣṛum ,
atan yusa-yi-d yiwen weḥbib i geṭṭef webrid, ur sɛiɣ d acu ara s-d-sserseɣ. »
Ma yerra-yas-d si zdaxel n wexxam : « Ur iyi-țɛețțib ara, tawwurt tsekkeṛ, nekk d warraw-iw aql-aɣ neṭṭes, ur zmireɣ ara a d-kkreɣ iwakken a k-d-fkeɣ aɣṛum. »
A wen-d-iniɣ : ma yeɛdez ur yebɣi ara a d-yekker ɣuṛ-es ɣas akken d aḥbib-is, a d-ikker a s-d-yefk ayen akk i s-issuter axaṭer yusa-d ɣuṛ es di țnaṣfa n yiḍ yeṛṛez-as aqeṛṛuy-is.
Ma d nekk nniɣ-awen : ssutret a wen-d-ițunefk, qellbet aț-țafem, sqerbebbet di tewwurt a wen-d-ldin.
Axaṭer kra n win yessuturen a s-d ițunefk, win ițqelliben ad yaf, win yesṭebṭuben a s-d-ldin tawwurt.
Anwa deg-wen ara yefken i mmi-s adɣaɣ ma yessuter-as aɣṛum ? Neɣ a s-yefk azrem ma yessuter-as aslem ?
Neɣ ma yessuter-as tamellalt a s-yefk tiɣirdemt ?
Ma yella kunwi yellan d imcumen tessnem aț-țefkem ayen yelhan i warraw-nwen, amek Baba-twen yellan deg igenni ur d-ițțak ara Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i wid i s-t-issuturen ?
Yiwen wass ikker Sidna Ɛisa yessuffeɣ lǧen yesgugmen yiwen wergaz. Mi t-iffeɣ lǧen, argaz-nni yebda iheddeṛ ; lɣaci meṛṛa wehmen.
Lameɛna kra deg-sen nnan : « D Balzabul iḥekmen ɣef leǧnun i s-yefkan tazmert akken a ten issuffeɣ. »
Kra nniḍen bɣan a t-jeṛṛben, ssutren-as yiwen n lbeṛhan ara d-yasen seg yigenni.
Sidna Ɛisa yessnen ixemmimen-nsen yenna yasen : Yal tagelda i deg ara țnaɣen imezdaɣ-is wway gar-asen tețțeddu ɣer nnger, ixxamen-is ad ɣlin.
Ma yella Cciṭan yețnaɣ d yiman-is amek ara tdum tgelda-s ? Teqqaṛem s Balzabul i ssufuɣeɣ leǧnun !
Ma yella nekk s Balzabul i ten-ssufuɣeɣ, anwa ihi i sen-ițțaken tazmert i yinelmaden-nwen iwakken a ten-ssuffuɣen ? Daymi d nutni ara kkun-iḥasben.
Lameɛna ma yella s ufus n Ṛebbi i ten-ssuffuɣeɣ, ațan ihi tageldit n Ṛebbi tewweḍ-ed ɣuṛ-wen.
Argaz iǧehden yesɛan leslaḥ, ițɛassan ɣef wexxam-is, ṛṛezq-is ad yili di laman.
Ma yusa-d ɣuṛ-es yiwen iǧehden akteṛ-is iɣleb-it, a s-ikkes leslaḥ ɣef wacu yețkel, ad yernu ad ifṛeq i wiyaḍ ayen akk yesɛa.
Win ur nelli ara yid-i, d axṣim-iw ; win ur njemmeɛ ara yid-i, yețḍeggiɛ.
M'ara yeffeɣ uṛuḥani seg yiwen wergaz, ad iṛuḥ ɣer yimukan yexlan akken ad iqelleb ɣef ṛṛaḥa. M'ur yufi ara, ad yini : « ad uɣaleɣ ɣer tnezduɣt-iw ansi i d-ffɣeɣ. »
M'ara yaweḍ ɣer tnezduɣt-nni, a ț-yaf zeddiget, tqeɛɛed ;
imiren ad iṛuḥ a d-yawi sebɛa yiṛuḥaniyen nniḍen iweɛṛen akteṛ-is, ad kecmen ad zedɣen deg-s ; s wakka lḥala n wergaz-nni aț-țenṭeṛ akteṛ n tikkelt tamezwarut.
Mi d-yenna Sidna Ɛisa ayagi, yiwet n tmeṭṭut tenṭeq-ed s ṣṣut ɛlayen si ger n lɣaci tenna-yas : ?-țaseɛdit tmeṭṭut i k-id-yurwen, i k-issuṭṭḍen !
Lameɛna nețța yerra-yas : Iseɛdiyen, d wid ismeḥsisen i wawal n Ṛebbi, yerna ḥerzen-t.
Mi d-innejmaɛ ɣuṛ-es waṭas n lɣaci, Sidna Ɛisa yekker yenna-yasen : Lǧil-agi d lǧil amcum, yessutur lbeṛhan ! Ur as-d-ițunefkay ara lbeṛhan anagar win n nnbi Yunes !
Axaṭer akken yella nnbi Yunes d lbeṛhan i yimezdaɣ n temdint n Ninebi, ara yili Mmi-s n bunadem d lbeṛhan i lǧil-agi.

Ass n lḥisab tagellit n tmurt n usammer a d-tekker ɣer yemdanen n lǧil-agi a ten-tesseḍlem imi nețțat tusa-d seg yixef n ddunit iwakken aț-țsel i tmusni n ugellid Sliman. Atah yella gar-awen win yugaren agellid Sliman !

Ass n lḥisab a d-kkren daɣen imezdaɣ n temdint n Ninebi ɣer lǧil-agi a ten-sḍelmen, axaṭer nutni uɣalen-d ɣer webrid mi sen-ibecceṛ nnbi Yunes. Kunwi tesɛam dagi gar-awen win yugaren nnbi Yunes !
Yiwen ur iceɛɛel taftilt iwakken a ț-iffer neɣ akken a ț-iɣumm s lḥila, lameɛna a ț-issers ɣef lmeṣbeḥ iwakken kra n win ara d-ikecmen ad iwali tafat.
Tiṭ ț-țaftilt n wemdan. Ma yella tiṭ-ik tṣeḥḥa aț-țiliḍ di tafat, meɛna ma tedderɣel aț-țiliḍ di ṭṭlam.
?ader ihi aț-țuɣal tafat yellan deg-k d ṭṭlam.
Ma telliḍ di tafat s lekmal-ik, ur yețțili ara deg-k ṭṭlam, aț-țiliḍ di tafat am teftilt m'ara d-cceɛceɛ fell-ak.
Mi gfukk Sidna Ɛisa ameslay, iɛreḍ-it yiwen wufarizi ɣeṛ imensi.
Afarizi-nni yewhem mi gwala Sidna Ɛisa ur issared ara uqbel ad yečč, akken tella di lɛadda-nsen.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Kunwi s yifariziyen tessiridem taqbuct d uḍebṣi s wufella kan ma zdaxel n wulawen teččuṛem d ṭṭmeɛ akk-d ddɣel.
A wid iɣeflen ! Eɛni win i d ixelqen ayen yellan s wufella, mačči d nețța i d-ixelqen ayen n daxel ?
Fket lweɛda s wulawen-nwen, imiren kullec ad awen-yeṣfu.

A nnger-nwen ay ifariziyen ! Kunwi yețɛecciṛen nneɛneɛ d uwermi d wayen i d-ițemɣayen di tebḥirt, ma d lḥeqq d leḥmala n Sidi Ṛebbi tețțarram-ten ɣer deffir ; d annect-agi i gezwaren mbla ma tețțum ayen nniḍen.
A nnger-nwen ay ifariziyen ! Tḥemmlem imukan imezwura di leǧwameɛ, tḥemmlem ad țsellimen fell-awen yemdanen deg iberdan.
A nnger-nwen, kunwi yecban iẓekwan i gɣumm wakal, ur d-nețban ara, ɛeffsen-ten yemdanen ur d-wwin s lexbaṛ.
Yenṭeq yiwen lɛalem n ccariɛa, yenna-yas : A Sidi, atan tregmeḍ-aɣ ula d nukkni s wayen i d-tenniḍ akka !
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : A nnger-nwen ula d kunwi a lɛulama n ccariɛa ! Tețɛebbim i wiyaḍ tiɛekkmin ẓẓayen, ma d kunwi ur tent-tețnalem ara ula s yiwen uḍaḍ.
A tawaɣit-nwen ! Lejdud-nwen nɣan lenbiya, kunwi tbennum-asen iẓekwan.
S wakka i d-tesbegnem belli tqeblem ayen i xedmen yerna tețkemmilem di tikli-nsen ; axaṭer nutni nɣan-ten, kunwi tbennum-asen iẓekwan.
?ef wayagi Sidi Ṛebbi yeẓran kullec yenna : a sen-ceggɛeɣ lenbiya d ṛṛusul, kra a ten-nɣen kra a ten qehṛen.
Daymi lǧil-agi ad ițțuḥaseb ɣef tazzla n yidammen n lenbiya seg wasmi i d-texleq ddunit ;
seg yidammen n Habil mmi-s n Adem armi d idammen n Zakarya i nɣan ger udekkan n iseflawen d lǧameɛ iqedsen. Lǧil-agi ad ițțuḥaseb ɣef ayagi meṛṛa.
A tawaɣit-nwen a lɛulama n ccariɛa ! Teṭṭfem tasaruț n tmusni, ur tekcimem kunwi, ur teǧǧim ad kecmen wid yebɣan.
Mi geffeɣ Sidna Ɛisa, lɛulama n ccariɛa d ifariziyen ḥeṛsen-t iwakken a d-immeslay ɣef waṭas n tɣawsiwin nniḍen,
țqelliben amek ara t-id-sseɣlin deg wawal.
Di teswiɛt-nni kan, lɣaci yennejmaɛ-ed s luluf armi țemyeɛfasen. Sidna Ɛisa yenna i yinelmaden-is : ?adret iman-nwen ɣef temtunt ( iɣes ) n yifariziyen, axaṭer d at sin wudmawen.
Kra n wayen iɣummen a d-iban, kra n wayen yeffren ad yemẓer.
Ayen i thedṛem di ṭṭlam a t-slen di tafat, ayen i tennam ɣer umeẓẓuɣ di texxamt ad ițțuberreḥ deg yizenqan.
A wen-d-iniɣ i kunwi yellan d iḥbiben-iw : ur țțagadet ara wid ineqqen lǧețța, sennig lmut ur zmiren ad xedmen acemma nniḍen.
A wen-d-iniɣ anwa i glaq aț- țaaggadem : aggadet win izemren a kkun-ikkes si ddunit yerna a kkun-iḍeggeṛ ɣer ǧahennama. Atan nniɣ-awen-t-id, d nețța i glaq aț- țaggadem.
D acu i swan xemsa iẓiwcen ? Anaɣ sin iṣurdiyen kan ! Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi ur itețțu ula d yiwen deg-sen.
Ula d anẓaden n iqeṛṛay-nwen țwaḥesben yiwen yiwen. Ur țțagadet ara ihi, teswam akteṛ n iẓiwcen.
A wen-d-iniɣ : kra n win ara d-icehden zdat yemdanen belli yumen yis-i, Mmi-s n bunadem ur t-inekkeṛ ara zdat lmalayekkat,
ma d win ara yi-nekṛen zdat yemdanen, ula d nekk a t-nekkṛeɣ zdat lmalayekkat n Ṛebbi.
Kra n win ara yewten di Mmi-s n bunadem a s-ițusemmeḥ, ma d win ara iregmen Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ulac fell-as ssmaḥ.
M'ara kkun-awin ad ḥekmen fell-awen di leǧwameɛ zdat lecyux d lḥekkam, ur țxemmimet ara amek ara tsellkem iman-nwen neɣ ɣef wayen ara d-tinim,
axaṭer d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ara wen-d-ifken di teswiɛt-nni ayen ilaqen a t-id-tinim.
Yiwen wergaz inṭeq-ed si ger n lɣaci yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : A Sidi, ini-yas i gma ad ibḍu yid-i lweṛt i d-iǧǧa baba-tneɣ.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Ay argaz, anwa i yi-sbedden iwakken ad bḍuɣ gar-awen ?
Dɣa yenna i lɣaci : ?adret iman-nwen ɣef ṭṭmeɛ imi tudert n wemdan ur d-tekki ara seg wayen yesɛa ɣas akken di rrbeḥ ameqqran i gella.
Imiren yewwi-yasen-d lemtel agi : Yiwen umeṛkanti, yesɛa tamurt tefka-d aṭas n lɣella.
Ixemmem deg iman-is, yenna : « amek ara xedmeɣ imi ur sɛiɣ ara amkan anda ara jemɛeɣ leṛẓaq-iw ?
Ad huddeɣ ikuffan-iw, ad bnuɣ wiyaḍ d imeqqranen iwakken ad jemɛeɣ irden-iw d leṛẓaq-iw meṛṛa.
Imiren ad iniɣ i yiman-iw : « atan tesxezneḍ leṛẓaq i waṭas n iseggasen ; steɛfu tura, ečč, sew tezhuḍ. »
Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yenna yas-d : « a win iɣeflen ! Iḍ-agi ad a k-ddmeɣ ṛṛuḥ-ik ! Ayen meṛṛa i tjemɛeḍ, iwumi ara d-yeqqim ? »
Akka i tdeṛṛu d win ijemɛen leṛẓaq i yiman-is, wala ad ixdem ɣef laxeṛt-is, ad yili d ameṛkanti ɣer Ṛebbi.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna daɣen i yinelmaden-is : ?ef wayagi i wen-d-qqaṛeɣ ur țḥebbiṛet ara ɣef tudert-nwen, ɣef wayen ara teččem d wayen ara telsem.
Axaṭer tudert-nwen tugar lqut, lǧețța-nwen tugar llebsa.
Walit tigerfiwin , ur zerrɛent ur meggrent , ur sɛint akufi ur sɛint acbayli meɛna Sidi Ṛebbi ițɛeyyic itent. Acḥal teswam akteṛ n yefṛax n igenni !
Anwa deg-wen i gzemren s uḥebbeṛ ad yessiɣzef leɛmeṛ-is ula s yiwen n wass ?
Imi ur tezmirem ara i tɣawsiwin timecṭuḥin, acuɣeṛ i tețḥebbiṛem ɣef wayen nniḍen ?
Walit amek gemmun ijeǧǧigen n lexla ! Ur țellmen ur ẓeṭṭen ! Atan qqaṛeɣ-awen : ula d agellid Sliman s yiman-is di ccan-is, ur yelsi am yiwen seg yijeǧǧigen-agi.
Ma yella Sidi Ṛebbi yeslusu akka leḥcic yellan ass-agi di lexla, azekka ad iṛeɣ di tmes, amek ur kkun-islusu ara kunwi, ay imdanen ixuṣṣen di liman !
Ur țḥebbiṛet ara ihi ! Ur țqellibet ara ɣef wayen ara teččem d wayen ara teswem,
axaṭer d imdanen ur nețțamen ara s Ṛebbi i gețqelliben ɣef wayagi meṛṛa. Baba-twen yellan deg yigenwan yeẓra ayen teḥwaǧem.
Qellbet axiṛ ɣef tgeldit n Ṛebbi, ayen nniḍen meṛṛa d nețța ara wen-t-id ifken.
Ur țțagad ara a taqeḍɛit illan tamecṭuḥt, axaṭer iɛǧeb-as i Baba Ṛebbi a wen-d-yefk tageldit-is.
Zzenzet ayen tesɛam, tsedqem-t. Heggit i yiman-nwen deg yigenwan agerruj ur nkeffu, ur nrekku, dinna ulac imakaren ara t-yakren, ulac ibeɛɛac ara t-iččen.
Axaṭer anda yella ugerruj-ik, dinna ara yili wul-ik.
Heggit iman-nwen, ɛiwzet, beggset ɣef yiman-nwen tceɛlem tiftilin-nwen !
Ilit am wid yețṛaǧun amɛellem nsen ara d-yuɣalen si tmeɣṛa ; akken kan ara d-yesqeṛbeb a s-ldin tawwurt.
Amarezg n yiqeddacen-agi ara d-yaf wemɛellem-nsen ɛawzen. A wen-d iniɣ tideț, ad ibeddel llebsa, a ten isɣim ɣer ṭṭabla iwakken a sen-yefk ad ččen.
Ma yewweḍ-ed di țnaṣfa n yiḍ neɣ akteṛ, amarezg-nsen ma yufa-ten-id mazal țṛaǧun-t !
Fehmet ayagi : lemmer yeẓra bab n wexxam lweqt i deg ara d-yas umakar, tili a t-iɛass ur t-ițțaǧa ara ad ikcem axxam-is.
Heggit iman-nwen ula d kunwi imi di lweqt i ɣef ur tebnim (tedmim) ara a d-yas Mmi-s n bunadem.
Buṭrus inṭeq yenna-yas : A Sidi, i nukkni iwumi d-tenniḍ lemtel-agi neɣ i lɣaci meṛṛa ?
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Anwa i d lewkil iḥeṛcen i ɣef yella lețkal, ara iwekkel bab n wexxam ɣef wayla-s, iwakken ad ifṛeq i yiqeddacen amur-nsen n yirden di lweqt ilaqen ?
Amarezg n wuqeddac agi ara d-yaf bab-is ibedd ɣer cceɣl-is !
A wen-d-iniɣ tideț, a t iwekkel ɣef wayen akk yesɛa.
Lameɛna aqeddac-nni ma yeqqaṛ deg wul-is : « amɛellem-iw iɛeṭṭel ur d yuɣal ara» ! Yebda iḥeqqeṛ iqeddacen ț-țqeddacin, yekkat-iten, iteț itess alamma yeskkeṛ.
A d-yas umɛellem-is deg wass i ɣef ur yebni ara, di lweqt ur yessin ara, a t-iɛaqeb s lmut akken țțuɛaqben wid iɛuṣan Ṛebbi.
Aqeddac yessnen lebɣi n bab-is yerna ur t-ixdim ara, ad yečč tiɣṛit tameqqrant,
ma d win ur nessin ara lebɣi n bab-is, ixdem ayen yuklalen tiɣṛit, ad yečč tiɣṛit tamecṭuḥt. Win iwumi nefka aṭas a s-nessuter aṭas, ma d win i ɣef nețkel aṭas a neṛǧu deg-s akteṛ.
Usiɣ-ed a d-awiɣ yiwet n tmes ɣer ddunit ! Acḥal ɣeṣbeɣ melmi ara tecɛel !
Yella yiwen n weɣḍas i yi-țṛaǧun... D leɛtab ameqqran yerna ɣeṣbeɣ melmi ara d-yas wass-nni !
Tɣilem d lehna i d-wwiɣ ɣer ddunit ? Xaṭi, d beṭṭu i d-wwiɣ !
Sya ɣer zdat ma llan xemsa deg yiwen wexxam, ad bḍun ; tlata a d-kkren ɣer sin, sin a d-kkren ɣer tlata.
Ababat a d-innaɣ d mmi-s, mmi-s a d-yekker ɣer baba-s ; tayemmaț aț-țennaɣ d yelli-s, yelli-s akk-d yemma-s ; tamɣaṛt aț-țennaɣ ț-țeslit-is, tislit akk-d temɣaṛt-is.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna daɣen i lɣaci : M'ara twalim asigna yekka-d si lɣeṛb, teqqaṛem atan a d-tewwet lehwa ; d ayen i gdeṛṛun.
M'ara d-iṣuḍ waḍu seg usammer teqqaṛem ad iḥmu lḥal ; d ayen i d-ideṛṛun daɣen.
Ay at sin wudmawen ! Imi tessnem aț-țɛeqlem lḥal n yigenni d lqaɛa, amek ur tezmirem ara aț-țɛeqlem zzman-agi ?
Acuɣeṛ ur tețmeyyizem ara s yiman-nwen ɣef wayen yellan d lḥeqq ?
M'ara k-yessiweḍ wexṣim-ik ɣer ccṛeɛ, eɛṛeḍ a ț-tefruḍ yid-es uqbel aț-țawḍem ɣer dinna, neɣ m'ulac a k-yawi ɣer lḥakem, lḥakem a k-yefk i uɛessas, aɛessas a k-iḍeggeṛ ɣer lḥebs.
A k-d-iniɣ : ur d-tețțeffɣeḍ ara syenna alamma txellṣeḍ aṣurdi aneggaru n ṭlaba-inek.
Di lweqt-nni, kra n yemdanen usan-d a s-ḥkun i Sidna Ɛisa ɣef kra n yergazen n tmurt n Jlili i genɣa Bilaṭus, d wamek issexleḍ dammen-nsen d idammen n iseflawen nsen.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Tɣilem belli imezdaɣ-agi n Jlili ițțuɛetben akka d imednuben akteṛ n wiyaḍ ?
Xaṭi, meɛna a wen-d-iniɣ : m'ur tbeddlem ara tikli aț-țemtem ula d kunwi.
Neɣ am tmenṭac-nni yergazen yemmuten mi d-yeɣli fell-asen ṣṣuṛ n Silwi, tɣilem d imednuben akteṛ n imezdaɣ nniḍen n temdint n Lquds ?
Xaṭi, meɛna nniɣ-awen : m'ur tbeddlem ara tikli aț-țemtem ula d kunwi.
Yewwi-yasen-d lemtel-agi : Yiwen wergaz yesɛa taneqleț teẓẓa deg yiger n tẓurin. Yusa-d iwakken a d-ikkes tibexsisin lameɛna ur yufi ara.
Yenna i uxeddam n yiger-nni : tlata n yiseggasen aya nekk țțaseɣ ed iwakken a d-kkseɣ lexṛif si tneqleț agi meɛna ur d-țțafeɣ ara, gzem-iț ihi ! Acuɣeṛ ara teṭṭef akal mbla nnfeɛ ?
Axeddam-nni yerra-yas : a Sidi, eǧǧ-iț aț-țernu aseggas-a ; aț-țneqceɣ, a s-rreɣ leɣbaṛ,
sya d asawen ma tefka-d lfakya eǧǧ-iț, m'ulac qeleɛ -iț.
Sidna Ɛisa yesselmad deg yiwen n lǧameɛ deg wass n westeɛfu.
Tella dinna yiwet n tmeṭṭut ihelken tmenṭac yiseggasen aya ; d yiwen uṛuḥani i ț-ikerfen ur tezmir ara aț-țesbedd lqedd-is.
Mi ț-iwala Sidna Ɛisa, iluɛa-ț yenna-yas : A tameṭṭut, teḥliḍ seg wekraf-im.
Issers ifassen-is fell-as , imiren kan tesbedd lqedd-is, teḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi.

Ccix-nni n lǧameɛ iɣaḍ-it lḥal imi i ț-isseḥla Sidna Ɛisa deg wass n westeɛfu, yenna i lɣaci : Llan sețța wussan i deg ilaq a nexdem ; aset-ed ihi deg ussan-nni iwakken a kkun-isseḥlu mačči deg wass n westeɛfu !
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Ay at sin wudmawen ! Anwa deg-wen ur d-nețserriḥ i wezger-ines neɣ i weɣyul-is iwakken a t-yawi a d-isew ɣas deg wass n westeɛfu ?
I tmeṭṭut-agi yellan si dderya n Ibṛahim, i gekref Cciṭan tmenṭac n yiseggasen aya, eɛni ur ilaq ara a s-nekkes akraf ɣas akka d ass n westeɛfu ?
Mi d-yenna imeslayen-agi, ixṣimen-is meṛṛa nneḥcamen ma d lɣaci feṛḥen s leɛǧayeb i gxeddem.
Yenna daɣen : ?er wacu i tețțemcabi tgeldit n Ṛebbi ? ?er wacu ara ț-metleɣ ?
Tețțemcabi ɣer uɛeqqa amecṭuḥ n zerriɛa n uxerḍel i geẓẓa yiwen wergaz di tebḥirt-is. Mi d-imɣi yuɣal d ttejṛa, ifṛax n igenni bnan leɛcuc deg ifurkawen-is.
Yenna daɣen : ?er wacu i zemreɣ ad metleɣ tageldit n Ṛebbi ?
Tețțemcabi ɣer ciṭṭuḥ yiɣes n temtunt i d-teddem tmeṭṭut, tger-it di tlata lkilat n uwren dɣa teǧǧa-t armi yuli meṛṛa.
Deg webrid-is ɣer temdint n Lquds, Sidna Ɛisa ițɛedday ɣef temdinin ț-țudrin, isselmad.
Isteqsa-t yiwen yenna-yas : A Sidi, drus n yemdanen ara yețțuselken ?
Yenna-yasen : Qellbet amek ara tkecmem si tewwurt iḍeyqen ; a wen-d-iniɣ : aṭas ara yebɣun ad kecmen lameɛna ur țțizmiren ara.

M'ara d-yekker bab n wexxam ad isekkeṛ tawwurt, wid i d-yufa lḥal di beṛṛa a d-bdun asqeṛbeb ad qqaṛen : « A Sidi ! A Sidi ! Ldi-yaɣ tawwurt» ! Nețța a wen-d-yerr : ur kkun-ssineɣ ur ẓriɣ ansi i d-tekkam !?
Kunwi ad as-tinim : « anaɣ nečča neswa yid-ek, teslemdeḍ deg yizenqan nneɣ ! »
Nețța a wen-d-yerr : Nniɣ-awen ur kkun-ssineɣ ara, beɛdet akkin fell-i a kunwi ixeddmen cceṛ !
Dinna ara yilin yimeṭṭawen d nndama tameqqrant m'ara twalim Ibṛahim, Isḥaq, Yeɛqub akk-d lenbiya di tgelda n yigenwan, ma d kunwi aț-țeqqimem di beṛṛa.
A d-asen si cceṛq d lɣeṛb, seg umalu d usammer, ad ṭṭfen imukan di tmeɣṛa n tgelda n igenwan.
Imiren ad ilin ineggura ara yuɣalen d imezwura, am akken daɣen ara yilin imezwura ara yuɣalen d ineggura.
Di teswiɛt-nni, kra n ifariziyen usan-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : Ṛuḥ tixxeṛ syagi, atan Hiṛudus ițqellib a k-ineɣ.
Yenna-yasen : Ṛuḥet init-as i wuccen-agi : ass-a d uzekka ad ssufɣeɣ leǧnun, ad sseḥluɣ imuḍan , ass wis tlata ad fakeɣ cceɣl-iw.
Lameɛna ilaq ad kemmleɣ tikli-inu ass-a, azekka d sellazekka, axaṭer ur s-ilaq ara i nnbi ad immet beṛṛa n temdint n Lquds.

A tamdint n Lquds ! A tamdint n Lquds ineqqen lenbiya, iṛeǧǧmen wid i m-d-ițwaceggɛen s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi ! Acḥal d abrid i ɛerḍeɣ a d-jemɛeɣ arraw-im am tyaziṭ i d-ijemɛen ifṛax-is seddaw wafriwen-is, lameɛna ur tebɣim ara.
Atan ihi, axxam-nwen ad ixlu yerna nniɣ-awen, ur iyi-tẓerrem ara alamma d asmi ara tinim : Ad ițțubarek win i d-yusan s yisem n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Yiwen wass yellan d ass n westeɛfu, Sidna Ɛisa illa yețwaɛreḍ ɣer wexxam n yiwen seg yimeqqranen n yifariziyen iwakken ad yefteṛ. Wid yellan dinna țɛassan-t d acu ara yexdem.
Yella dinna yiwen wergaz yesɛan lehlak n ubezzug.
Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq ɣer lɛulama n ccariɛa d yifariziyen yenna-yasen : D acu twalam ? D leḥlal win ara isseḥlun deg wass n westeɛfu neɣ ala ?
Imi yiwen deg-sen ur d-yenṭiq, Sidna Ɛisa iqeṛṛeb ɣer umuḍin-nni, yesseḥla-t, iserreḥ-as ad iṛuḥ.
Dɣa yenna i wiyaḍ : Anwa deg-wen ma yeɣli-yas mmi-s neɣ wezger-ines ɣer lbir, ur t-id-ițekkes ara ɣas ma d ass n westeɛfu ?
Yiwen ur izmir a s-d-yerr awal.
Mi gwala wid yețwaɛerḍen bdan țextiṛin imukan imezwura, Sidna Ɛisa yewwi-yasen-d lemtel-agi yenna yasen :
M'ara k-id-yeɛreḍ yiwen ɣer tmeɣṛa, ɣurek ur țțaṭṭaf ara amkan amezwaru ! Axaṭer yezmer ad yili yiwen ger inebgawen yesɛan leqdeṛ akteṛ-ik ,
a d-yas win i kkun-iɛerḍen i sin a k-yini : « eǧǧ-as amkan-nni i wagi ! » Imiren aț-țenneḥcameḍ, aț-țṛuḥeḍ aț-țeṭṭfeḍ amkan aneggaru.
Lameɛna m'ara tețwaɛeṛḍeḍ, ṭṭef amkan aneggaru iwakken m'ara d-yas win i k-id-iɛerḍen, a k-yini : « ay aḥbib ɛeddi-d ɣer zdat ! » Imiren aț-țesɛuḍ leqdeṛ zdat inebgawen meṛṛa.
Axaṭer kra n win yessalayen iman-is a t-id-yessers Ṛebbi , ma d win yesrusuyen iman-is a t-yerfed.

Yenna daɣen i win i t-id iɛeṛḍen : M'ara tebɣuḍ aț-țseččeḍ, ur d-ɛeṛṛeḍ ara imdukkal-ik neɣ atmaten ik, ur d-ɛeṛṛeḍ ara imawlan-ik neɣ lǧiran-ik imeṛkantiyen ; m'ulac a k ɛerḍen ula d nutni iwakken a k-d-rren lxiṛ-ik.
Lameɛna m'ara txedmeḍ tameɣṛa, ɛṛeḍ-ed igellilen, ineɛyuba, iquḍaren d yiderɣalen.
Ili-k di lfeṛḥ imi ur zmiren ara a k-d-rren lxiṛ-ik, axaṭer lxiṛ-ik a k-id-yuɣal asm'ara d-ḥyun wid yellan d iḥeqqiyen ɣer Ṛebbi.
Mi gesla i imeslayen-agi, yiwen seg inebgawen inṭeq-ed yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : Amasseɛd n win ara yeččen tiremt di tgelda n yigenwan!
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yiwen wergaz ixdem imensi, iɛreḍ-ed aṭas lɣaci.
Lweqt n imensi, iceggeɛ aqeddac-is iwakken ad yini i inebgawen : aset-ed ! Kullec iwjed !
Akken ma llan ufan-d sebba. Amezwaru yenna-yas : « aql-i uɣeɣ iger, ilaq ad ṛuḥeɣ a t-id-ẓreɣ , di leɛnaya-k semmeḥ-iyi ».
Wayeḍ yenna-yas : « aql-i uɣeɣ-d xemsa n tyugiwin n yezgaren bɣiɣ ad ṛuḥeɣ a tent-ɛerḍeɣ, di leɛnaya-k semmeḥ iyi ».
Wayeḍ daɣen yenna-yas : « tura kan i zewǧeɣ, ulamek ara d aseɣ ».

Mi d-yuɣal uqeddac ɣer umɛellem-is, yeḥka-yas ayen akk i s-d-nnan. Bab n wexxam yerfa, yenna i uqeddac-is : « azzel, ṛuḥ ɣer yiberdan d yizenqan n temdint, tɛeṛḍeḍ-ed iẓawaliyen, ineɛyuba, iderɣalen d iquḍaren ».
Mi d-yuɣal uqeddac-nni yenna-yas : a Sidi, ayen i yi-d-tenniḍ xedmeɣ-t yerna mazal llan imukan.
Amɛellem yenna i uqeddac is : « effeɣ ɣer iberdan n tudrin d lexlawi ; wid akk ara tafeḍ, ḥṛeṣ-iten a d asen iwakken ad iččaṛ wexxam-iw. »
Atan nniɣ-awen : ula d yiwen seg wid-nni yețwaɛerḍen d imezwura ur iɛerreḍ imensi-inu.
Aṭas n lɣaci i geddan d Sidna Ɛisa. Yezzi ɣuṛ-sen yenna-yasen :
Kra n win ara d-yasen ɣuṛ-i, ma iḥemmel baba-s d yemma-s neɣ tameṭṭut-is d warraw-is neɣ ayetma-s d yessetma-s neɣ iḥemmel iman-is akteṛ-iw, ur izmir ara ad yili d anelmad-iw.
Kra n win ur neqbil ara ad yeɛteb ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw yerna ur iyi-d-itbiɛ ara, ur izmir ara ad yili d anelmad-iw.
Anwa deg-wen ma yebɣa ad ibnu lbeṛǧ, ur yețɣimi ara ad ixdem uqbel leḥsab-is, iwakken ad iẓer ma yezmer a t-ifak ?
Axaṭer ma yebda lsas yeǧǧa-t akken, kra n wid ara t-iẓren ad stehzin fell-as ad inin :
argaz-agi yebda lsas ur izmir ad ikemmel lebni.
Neɣ anwa agellid ara yekkren ad innaɣ d ugellid nniḍen, ur ixeddem ara uqbel leḥsab iwakken ad iẓer ma yezmer ad iqabel s ɛecṛa alaf iɛsekṛiwen win i d-iteddun ɣuṛ-es s ɛecrin alef iɛsekriwen ?
Ma iwala ur s-izmir ara, ad iceggeɛ ɣuṛ-es uqbel a d-yaweḍ, iwakken ad ifru yid-es tamsalt s lehna.
S wakka, yiwen ur yezmir ad yili d anelmad-iw m'ur yeqbil ara ad yeǧǧ ayen akk yesɛa.
Lmelḥ d ayen yelhan, lameɛna ma tṛuḥ-as lbenna-s amek ara s-ț-id-nerr ?
Ur yelhi i wakal, ur yelhi i leɣbaṛ, ilaq kan a t-nḍeggeṛ ɣer beṛṛa. Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen isellen, isel-ed !..
Imekkasen n tebzert akk-d yir imdanen țțasen-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa iwakken a s-slen.
Ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa iɣaḍ-iten lḥal qqaṛen wway garasen : « argaz-agi yesṭerḥib s imednuben yerna yețɣimi yid-sen ɣer lmakla ».
Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yewwi-yasen-d lemtel-agi :
Anwa deg-wen ma yesɛa meyya wulli tṛuḥ-as yiwet deg-sent, ur yețțaǧa ara di lexla țesɛa uțesɛin nniḍen akken ad iṛuḥ a d-inadi ɣef tin i s-iɛeṛqen alamma yufa-ț ?
M'ara ț-yaf, a ț-id-ibibb ɣef tuyat-is s lfeṛḥ.
M'ara d-yaweḍ ɣer wexxam, ad issiwel i imdukkal-is d lǧiran-is, a sen-yini : feṛḥet yid-i, atan ufiɣ tixsi-nni i yi-iɛeṛqen.
S wakka nniɣ-awen : ad yili lfeṛḥ d ameqqran deg igenni ɣef yiwen umednub i d-yuɣalen ɣer webrid wala ɣef țesɛa uțesɛin nniḍen ur neɛṛiq ara.
Neɣ anta tameṭṭut ma tesɛa ɛecṛa n twiztin tṛuḥ-as yiwet, ur tceɛɛel ara taftilt, ur tberrez ara axxam akken aț-țqelleb fell-as alamma tufa-ț ?
Mi ț-tufa aț-țessiwel i tmeddukal-is ț-țǧiratin-is a sent-tini : ufiɣ tawizeț-nni i yi-ṛuḥen ! Feṛḥemt yid-i !
S wakka a wen-d-iniɣ : yețțili lfeṛḥ d ameqqran ɣer lmalayekkat ɣef yiwen umednub i d-yuɣalen ɣer webrid.
Yenna-yasen daɣen : Yiwen wergaz yesɛa sin warrac.
Ameẓyan deg-sen yenna i baba-s : a baba, efk-iyi-d amur i yi-d-iṣaḥen deg wayla-k. Dɣa baba-s yefka-yas amur-is.
Mi Ɛeddan kra n wussan, ikker ameẓyan-nni ijmeɛ-ed akk amur-is, izzenz-it, ibeddel tamurt, iṛuḥ ɣer yiwet n tmurt ibeɛden. Dinna yewwi-t zzhu, yesṛuḥ ayen akk yesɛa.
Mi i gṣeṛṛef akk idrimen is, yeɣli-d laẓ d ameqqran di tmurt nni, ula d nețța yuɣal yelluẓ.
Yufa lxedma ɣer yiwen umezdaɣ n tmurt nni, iceggeɛ-it ad yeks taqeḍɛit n yilfan.
Acḥal imenna ad yečč ulamma d axeṛṛub-nni i tețțen yilfan-nni, meɛna yiwen ur as-d-yefki.
Ihi yebda yețxemmim deg iman-is yenna : « acḥal n ixeddamen yellan ɣer baba ṛwan aɣṛum, nekk yenɣa-yi laẓ dagi.
Ad kkreɣ kan ad uɣaleɣ ɣer baba, a s-iniɣ : a baba ɛuṣaɣ Ṛebbi erniɣ-k keččini ;
ur uklaleɣ ara ad iliɣ d mmi-k, ḥseb-iyi am yiwen seg ixeddamen-ik »
Ikker iṛuḥ ɣer baba-s. Akken qṛib ad yaweḍ ɣer wexxam, baba-s iɛqel-it-id si lebɛid, iɣaḍ-it, yuzzel-ed ɣuṛ-es. Yeṭṭef-it ger iɣallen-is isellem fell-as.
Mmi-s yenna-yas : « a baba, ɛuṣaɣ Ṛebbi rniɣ-k keččini, ur uklaleɣ ara a yi-tḥesbeḍ d mmi-k ».
Lameɛna baba-s ikker yenna i iqeddacen-is : « ɣiwlet awit-ed abeṛnus-nni n leḥrir selset-as-t, qnet-as taxatemt i uḍaḍ-is ternum-as isebbaḍen i iḍaṛṛen-is.
Awit-ed agenduz-nni yeṭṭuqten tezlum-t a t-nečč, a nexdem tameɣṛa ;
axaṭer mmi-nni i ḥesbeɣ yemmut yuɣal-ed idder, yella yeɛṛeq tura iban-ed ». Dɣa bdan tameɣṛa.
Mmi-s amenzu yella di lexla. Mi d-yuɣal, akken qṛib a d-yaweḍ ɣer wexxam, yesla i ccna d ccḍeḥ.
Yessawel i yiwen seg iqeddacen, isteqsa-t ɣef wayen yedṛan.
Aqeddac nni yenna-yas : « d gma-k i d-yuɣalen, baba-k ifṛeḥ aṭas imi i d-yuɣal di lehna, yezla-yas agenduz-nni yeṭṭuqten.
Mi gesla i yimeslayen-nni, yerfa yugi ad ikcem ɣer wexxam. Baba-s yeffeɣ a t-iḥellel iwakken ad ikcem,
lameɛna nețța yenna-yas : « acḥal iseggasen nekk qeddceɣ fell-ak, ula d yiwen webrid ur ɛuṣaɣ awal-ik, leɛmeṛ ur iyi-tefkiḍ ula d yiwen yiɣid a t-zluɣ iwakken ad feṛḥeɣ d imdukkal-iw.
ma d mmi-k-agi i gesṛuḥen ayen akk yesɛa ɣef yir tilawin, i nețța tezliḍ agenduz-nni yeṭṭuqten ! »
Ikker baba-s yenna-yas : A mmi, kečč kull ass tețțiliḍ yid-i, ayen akk sɛiɣ d ayla-k.
Lameɛna ilaq-aɣ a nefṛeḥ axaṭer gma-k i ḥesbeɣ yemmut atan yuɣal-ed idder, yella ijaḥ, tura iban-ed.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna daɣen i inelmaden-is : -- Yiwen wergaz d ameṛkanti yesɛa lewkil ; lewkil-agi ccetkan fell-as ɣer umɛellem-is nnan-as : « lewkil-ik ițḍeggiɛ ayla-k ».

Amɛellem-is issawel-as yenna yas : « d acu-ten imeslayen-agi i sliɣ fell-ak ? Efk-iyi-d leḥsab ɣef wayen akk i d-teskecmeḍ d wayen i tessufɣeḍ, axaṭer sya d asawen ur tețțiliḍ ara d lewkil-iw ».
Lewkil-agi ixemmem deg iman-is yenna : d acu ara xedmeɣ imi amɛellem-iw ad iyi ikkes amkan-iw ? Ad xedmeɣ akal... Ur zmireɣ ara ! Ad țreɣ.... ssetḥaɣ !
?riɣ d acu ara xedmeɣ, iwakken m'ara yi-istixxeṛ umɛellem-iw, ad afeɣ wid ara yi-iɛiwnen !
Yessawel-asen yiwen yiwen i wid akk yesɛan ṭṭlaba ɣer umɛellem-is. Yenna i umezwaru : « Acḥal i k-ițalas umɛellem-iw ? »
Argaz-nni yerra-yas-d : « Meyya yecbuyla n zzit uzemmur. » Yenna-yas : « sellek awi-d leḥsab ik, qqim taruḍ xemsin ».
Yenna daɣen i wayeḍ : « i keččini, acḥal i k-ițalas ? » Yenna-yas-d : « meyya tcekkaṛin n yirden. » Yenna-yas : « awi-d leḥsab-ik, qqim taruḍ tmanyin».
Amɛellem n lewkil-nni axeddaɛ icekkeṛ-it ɣef tiḥeṛci-ines axaṭer arraw n ddunit-agi ḥeṛcen di lecɣal wway gar-asen akteṛ n warraw n tafat.
Ma d nekk atan a wen-d iniɣ: sxedmet adrim n ddunit-agi iwakken aț-țesɛum imdukkal, s wakka asm'ara yefnu cci n ddunit, aț-țețțuqeblem di tmezduɣin n dayem.
Ma nesɛa laman deg yiwen ɣef tɣawsiwin timecṭuḥin, a nețkel fell-as ula ɣef tmeqqranin ; win yellan d axeddaɛ di tɣawsiwin timecṭuḥin, ad yili d axeddaɛ ula di tmeqqranin.
Ma yella tețḍeggiɛem leṛẓaq n ddunit-agi, anwa ara kkun-iwekklen ɣef leṛẓaq n tideț ?
Ma yella ulac daɣen laman deg-wen ɣef wayen i wen-iwekkel walebɛaḍ, amek ara wen-d-yefk Sidi Ṛebbi ayen i wen-ihegga i kunwi ?

Ulac aqeddac ara iqedcen ɣef sin yemɛellmen : ma iḥemmel yiwen ad ikṛeh wayeḍ neɣ ma yeṭṭef deg yiwen ur yețțak ara lqima i wayeḍ. Ur tezmirem ara aț-țqedcem ɣef Ṛebbi ma yella tettabaɛem leṛẓaq n ddunit agi.
Ifariziyen i gesmeḥsisen i wayen i d-iqqaṛ Sidna Ɛisa, stehzayen fell-as axaṭer nutni ḥemmlen idrimen ;
ma d nețța yenna-yasen : Tesbegginem-d iman-nwen d iḥeqqiyen zdat medden, meɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yessen ulawen-nwen ; ayen yesɛan ccan ɣer yemdanen di ddunit-agi, d ayen yețwakeṛhen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.
Uqbel lweqt n Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas, kullec iteddu s ccariɛa n Musa d wayen i d-xebbṛen lenbiya. Tura, lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yeɛnan tgelda n Ṛebbi ițțubecceṛ ; mkul yiwen yekkat amek ara ț-ikcem s ddreɛ.
Yeshel i igenni d lqaɛa ad fnun, ma d ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi ur ițțanqas seg-s ula d yiwen n usekkil.
Kra n win ara yebrun i tmeṭṭut-is iɛawed zzwaǧ, yezna ; kra n win ara yaɣen tameṭṭut yennebran, yezna daɣen.
Yiwen wergaz d ameṛkanti, ițlusu anagar llebsa ifazen n leḥrir aṛqaq ; mkul ass ixeddem tameɣṛa, ițɛici di zzhu d lfeṛḥ.
Yiwen igellil isem-is Laɛẓar, iččuṛ d ideddiyen, ițɣimi ɣer tewwurt n umeṛkanti-nni,
iṭṭamaɛ deg-s ad yečč ɣas d ayen i gɣellin ɣer lqaɛa ; ula d iqjan țțasen-d ad mecḥen ideddiyen-is.
Asmi yemmut uẓawali-nni, ddment-eț lmalayekkat wwint-eț ɣer igenni ɣer wanda yella Ibṛahim. Ameṛkanti-nni yemmut ula d nețța, meḍlen-t.
Di laxeṛt yenɛețțab aṭas, yerfed allen-is, iwala mebɛid Ibṛahim akk-d Laɛẓar ɣer tama-s.
Iɛeggeḍ yenna-yas : « A baba Ibṛahim, ḥunn fell-i ceggeɛ-ed Laɛẓar ad iger ulamma d ixef n uḍad-is deg waman ad issismeḍ iles-iw, aql-i nneɛtabeɣ aṭas deg uḥǧaǧu-yagi n tmes. »
Ibṛahim yerra-yas : A mmi, mmekti-d belli tewwiḍ amur-ik di ddunit ; ma d Laɛẓar yeṛwa lehmum. Tura nețța yețțuṣebbeṛ yufa dagi lfeṛḥ, kečč iṣaḥ-ik-id lqeṛḥ.
Yerna yella gar-aneɣ yiwen yeɣzeṛ annect ila-t, wid yebɣan ad zegren sya ɣuṛ-wen, ur zmiren ara ; kunwi daɣen ur tezmirem ara a d-zegrem ɣuṛ-nneɣ.
Ameṛkanti-nni yenna-yas : Ihi a baba Ibṛahim di leɛnaya-k ceggeɛ Laɛẓar ɣer wexxam n baba ;
ad iɛeggen i xemsa-nni wayetma, iwakken ur d-țțasen ara ula d nutni ɣer wemkan-agi n leɛtab.
Ibṛahim yerra-yas : Atmaten-ik ɣuṛ-sen ccariɛa n Musa d lenbiya, a ten-tebɛen !
Ameṛkanti-nni yenna-yas-d : A baba Ibṛahim, ur țḥessisen ara i ccariɛa d lenbiya lameɛna ma yuɣal ɣuṛ-sen yiwen syagi, ad beddlen tikli.
Ibṛahim yerra-yas : M'ur semḥessen ara i ccariɛa n Musa d lenbiya, atan ɣas ma yuɣal yiwen si lmegtin ur as-smeḥsisen ara.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna i inelmaden is imeslayen-agi : -- D lmuḥal ur d-țilint ara sebbat ara yesseɣlin imdanen di ddnub. A nnger n win ara yilin d sebba n uɣelluy ;
axiṛ a s-ɛelqen aɣaṛef n tsirt ɣer temgeṛṭ-is, a t-ḍeggṛen ɣer lebḥeṛ wala ad yesseɣli di ddnub yiwen seg imecṭuḥen-agi.
?adret ɣef yiman-nwen ! Ma yeḍlem gma-k ssefhem-it, ma yendem deg wayen ixdem semmeḥ as.
?as ma yeḍlem-ik sebɛa iberdan deg wass, ma yusa-d ɣuṛ-ek sebɛa tikkal a k-d-yini : « aql-i ndemmeɣ deg wayen xedmeɣ », ilaq a s tsemmḥeḍ.
Ṛṛusul n Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : A Sidi ssemɣeṛ liman-nneɣ !
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Lemmer tesɛam liman ulamma annect n uɛeqqa n yired, aț-țizmirem aț-ținim i ttejṛa-yagi n țut qleɛ sya tṛuḥeḍ aț-țeẓẓuḍ iman-im di lebḥeṛ, a wen-taɣ awal.
Anwa deg-wen ara yesɛun axeddam ikerrzen neɣ ikessen lmal, ara s-yinin m'ara d-yuɣal si lexla : « lɛeslama-inek, qqim aț-țesteɛfuḍ, tura a k-d-awiɣ aț-țeččeḍ ».
Mačči akka ara s-yini, meɛna a s-yini : « ɣiwel beddel lqecc-ik tawiḍ-iyi-d ad ččeɣ ad sweɣ, mi ččiɣ ṛwiɣ, imiren aț-țeččeḍ aț-țesweḍ ula d keččini. »
Eɛni ad icekkeṛ axeddam-is imi gexdem ayen i s-yumeṛ ?
Kunwi daɣen m'ara txedmem ayen i wen-d yețwamṛen, init : d iqeddacen kan i nella, nexdem ayen ilaqen a t-nexdem.
Deg webrid-is ɣer temdint n Lquds, Sidna Ɛisa iɛedda ger tmurt n Samarya akk ț-țmurt n Jlili.
Mi gekcem ɣer yiwet n taddart, mmugren t-id ɛecṛa imuḍan ihelken lbeṛs, bedden mebɛid
ɛeggḍen nnan-as : A Sidna Ɛisa ! A Sidi ḥunn fell-aɣ !
Mi ten-iwala, Sidna Ɛisa yenna yasen : Ṛuḥet a kkun-walin lmuqedmin, a d-cehden belli teḥlam. Deg webrid-nsen mi ṛuḥen, akken walan iman-nsen ḥlan ṣfan,
yiwen deg-sen yuɣal-ed seg webrid-nni yețḥemmid Ṛebbi s kra yellan di taɣect-is.
Yusa-d yeɣli ɣer iḍaṛṛen n Sidna Ɛisa, iseǧǧed zdat-es, icekkeṛ-it, yerna argaz-agi d aṣamari i gella.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna i lɣaci : Eɛni ur ḥlin ara di ɛecṛa yid-sen ? I țesɛa nniḍen anda llan ?
Anagar abeṛṛani-agi i d-yuɣalen ad yeḥmed Ṛebbi !
Dɣa yenna i usamari-nni : Kker fell-ak uɣal ɣer wexxam ik, imi tumneḍ yis-i, tețțusellkeḍ.
Ifariziyen steqsan Sidna Ɛisa melmi ara d-tas lḥekma n tgeldit n Sidi Ṛebbi. Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Lḥekma n Sidi Ṛebbi mačči d ayen țwalint wallen.
Ur nezmir ara a d-nini : ațan dagi neɣ ațan dihin, axaṭer lḥekma n Sidi Ṛebbi ațan gar-wen.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna i inelmaden-is : A d-yas lweqt i deg ara tmennim aț-țeẓrem Mmi-s n bunadem ulamma d yiwen wass lameɛna ur kkun-id-ițṣaḥ ara.
Imiren ma nnan-awen-d : atah dagi neɣ atan dihin ur țṛuḥut ara, ur țțazzalet ara,
axaṭer am lebṛaq m'ara yewwet seg yixef n igenni ɣer wayeḍ, akken ara yili Mmi-s n bunadem ass n tuɣalin-is.
Tazwara ilaq ad yeɛteb aṭas, yerna lǧil-agi ur t-iqebbel ara.
D ayen yedṛan di zzman n Nuḥ ara yedṛun deg ussan n tuɣalin n Mmi-s n bunadem.
Imdanen llan tețțen, țessen, țemyezwaǧen, zeggjen i dderya-nsen, armi d asmi yekcem Nuḥ ɣer lbabuṛ ; yewwet-ed uḥemmal, neflen-d waman ɣef ddunit, imdanen meṛṛa mmuten.
D ayen yedṛan di zzman n Luṭ ara yedṛun daɣen : imdanen tețțen tessen, țțaɣen znuzun, țeẓẓun, bennun ;
asmi d-yeffeɣ Luṭ si temdint n ?udum, teɣli-d seg igenni tmes d ukebri i ten-isnegren akk.
Akken ara d-tedṛu asm'ara d-iban Mmi-s n bunadem.
Ass-nni win ara yilin sufella n wexxam ur ilaq ara ad yekcem a d-iddem lqecc-is ; win i d-yufa lḥal di lexla ur ilaq ara ad yuɣal ɣer deffir ;
mmektit-ed tameṭṭut n Luṭ.
Win ara yebɣun ad isellek tudert-is ad a s-tṛuḥ, win iwumi ara tṛuḥ ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw a ț-isellek.
Qqaṛeɣ-awen : deg iḍ-nni, ger sin ara yilin deg yiwen wusu, yiwen ad ițwarfed wayeḍ a d-yeqqim.
Ger snat n tilawin yeẓẓaden, yiwet aț-țețwarfed tayeḍ a d-teqqim.
Ger sin yergazen ara yilin di lexla, yiwen ad ițwarfed wayeḍ a d-yeqqim.
Inelmaden-is steqsan-t nnan-as : Anda ara yedṛu wayagi a Sidi ? Yenna-yasen : Anda yella umurḍus, dinna ara a d-nejmaɛen igudar.
Sidna Ɛisa yewwi-yasen-d lemtel-agi iwakken ad deɛɛun daymen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi ur feččlen ara.
Yenna-yasen : Deg yiwet n temdint yella yiwen lqaḍi, ur ițțagad Ṛebbi ur yețqadaṛ imdanen.
Di temdint-nni tella daɣen yiwet n taǧǧalt tețṛuḥu ɣuṛ-es, teqqaṛ-as : « eḥkem s lḥeqq gar-i d wexṣim-iw. »
Aṭas i geqqim yegguma a s-yefk lḥeqq, meɛna ixemmem deg yiman-is yenna : « taǧǧalt-agi eɛyiɣ deg-es ! ?as ur țțaggadeɣ Ṛebbi ur ḥsibeɣ yiwen
a s-fkeɣ lḥeqq akken ur d-tețțuɣal ara a yi-teṛṛeẓ aqeṛṛuy-iw. »
Dɣa Sidna Ɛisa yenna : Twalam ayen i d-yenna lqaḍi agi amesbaṭli !
Amek Sidi Ṛebbi ur d-yețțak ara lḥeqq i wid i gextaṛ, i gețɛeggiḍen ɣuṛ-es am yiḍ am ass ? A wen-d-iniɣ : ur yețɛeṭṭil ara iwakken a ten-iɛiwen, a sen-yefk lḥeqq.
Meɛna Mmi-s n bunadem asm'ara d-yas, wissen ma d-yaf liman di ddunit ?
Yenna-d daɣen lemtel-agi ɣef kra n yemdanen iḥesben iman-nsen d iḥeqqiyen ɣer Ṛebbi, iḥeqqṛen wiyaḍ :
Sin yergazen ulin ɣer lǧameɛ ad ẓallen ; yiwen (d ccix n lǧameɛ) n ukabar n ifariziyen, wayeḍ d amekkas (ixeddmen ɣer iṛumaniyen istɛemṛen tamurt).

Afarizi ibedd yețẓalla yeqqaṛ deg iman-is : a k-ḥemdeɣ a k-cekkṛeɣ a Sidi Ṛebbi imi ur lliɣ ara am wid yellan d imcumen, d ixeddaɛen, yețɛicin di zzna ; a k-cekkṛeɣ daɣen imi ur lliɣ ara am umekkas-agi.
?țuẓumeɣ sin wussan di dduṛt, țțakeɣ leɛcuṛ seg wayen sɛiɣ.
Amekkas-nni ibedd mebɛid, issetḥa ad yerfed ula d allen-is ɣer igenni, yekkat deg idmaren-is yeqqaṛ : « a Sidi Ṛebbi, ḥunn fell-i nekk yellan d amednub ! »

A wen-d-iniɣ : amekkas-nni yuɣal ɣer wexxam-is di lehna, yețwaqbel ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi, ma d afarizi-nni ur yețwaqbel ara. Kra n win yessimɣuṛen iman-is a t-id-isres Sidi Ṛebbi ; ma d win yessimẓiyen iman-is a t-issaɛli.
Lɣaci țțawin-as-ed ula d llufanat iwakken ad issers afus-is fell-asen a ten-ibarek. Inelmaden-is mi walan ayagi, țnaɣen-ten.
Sidna Ɛisa issawel asen-d yenna : Anfet-asen i warrac imeẓyanen a d-asen ɣuṛ-i ur ten-țțarrat ara, axaṭer tagelda n Ṛebbi tețwahegga i wid yellan am nutni.
A wen-iniɣ tideț : kra n win ur neqbil ara tageldit n Sidi Ṛebbi am weqcic ameẓyan, ur ț-ikeččem ara.
Yiwen umeṛkanti isteqsa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ay argaz n lɛali, d acu i yi ilaqen a t-xedmeɣ iwakken ad sɛuɣ tudert n dayem ?
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Acuɣeṛ i yi-d-tenniḍ « ay argaz lɛali » ? Ulac win yellan d lɛali-t anagar Sidi Ṛebbi !
Tessneḍ ayen i d-tenna ccariɛa n Musa : ur xeddem ara zzna, ur neqq ara, ur țțaker ara, ur țcehhid ara s ẓẓur, qadeṛ baba-k d yemma-k.
Argaz-nni yenna-yas : Ayagi akk xeddmeɣ-t seg wasmi lliɣ d ameẓyan.

Mi gesla Sidna Ɛisa i imeslayen agi, yenna-yas : Ihi txuṣṣ-ik yiwet lḥaǧa kan : ṛuḥ zzenz ayen akk tesɛiḍ, seddeq-it i yigellilen iwakken aț-țesɛuḍ agerruj deg igenni, tuɣaleḍ-ed aț-țedduḍ yid-i.
Argaz-nni mi gesla i yimeslayen-agi yeɣli-d fell-as leḥzen imi d ameṛkanti i gella.
Mi t-iwala yeḥzen, Sidna Ɛisa yenna : Acḥal i sen-yewɛeṛ i wid yesɛan cci ad kecmen ɣer tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi !
Ishel i welɣem ad iɛeddi di tiṭ n tissegnit wala i umeṛkanti ad yekcem ɣer tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Wid i s-yeslan, nnan-as : Anwa i gzemren ad ițțusellek ?
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Ayen yellan d lmuḥal i wemdan yeshel ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.
Buṭrus yenna-yas : I nukkni yeǧǧan kullec iwakken a neddu yid-ek ?
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : A wen-iniɣ tideț : kra n win yeǧǧan axxam-is, tameṭṭut-is, ayetma- s, imawlan-is neɣ arraw-is ɣef ddemma n tgeldit n Ṛebbi,
a s-d-ițunefk di ddunit-agi akteṛ n wayen yeǧǧa yerna ɣer zdat, ad yesɛu tudert n dayem.
Sidna Ɛisa ijmeɛ-ed ɣuṛ-es tnac-nni inelmaden-is yenna-yasen : Aql-aɣ a nali ɣer temdint n Lquds, ad idṛu wayen akk i d-uran lenbiya ɣef wayen yeɛnan Mmi-s n bunadem.
Ad ițțusellem ger ifassen n lkeffaṛ, ad ḍsen fell-as, ad kksen fell-as sser, a t-ssusfen.
A t-wwten s ujelkkaḍ ( s ucelliṭ ), a t-enɣen ; ass wis tlata a d-iḥyu si ger lmegtin.
Inelmaden-is ur fhimen acemma deg wayen i sen-d-yenna, lmeɛna n imeslayen-agi tețwaffer fell-asen. Ur ẓrin ara d acu i gebɣa a t-id-yini.
Akken qṛib ad yaweḍ Sidna Ɛisa ɣer temdint n Yiriku, yiwen uderɣal yeqqim rrif n webrid yessutur tin n Ṛebbi.
Mi gesla i lɣaci țɛeddayen, yesteqsa d acu i gedṛan ;
nnan-as belli d Ɛisa Anaṣari i d-iɛeddan.
Dɣa iɛeggeḍ yenna : A Ɛisa, a mmi-s n Sidna Dawed, ḥunn fell-i !
Wid yezwaren țdemmiren-t ɣer deffir qqaṛen-as : Ssusem a k-ihdu Ṛebbi ! Meɛna nețța yețɛeggiḍ akteṛ : A mmi-s n Sidna Dawed, ḥunn fell-i !
Sidna Ɛisa yeḥbes, yefka lameṛ a s-t-id-awin. Mi d-yewweḍ ɣuṛ-es, yenna-yas :
D acu tebɣiḍ a k-t-xedmeɣ ? Yerra-yas-d : A Sidi, bɣiɣ a yi-d-yuɣal yeẓri !
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Wali ! Imi tumneḍ yis-i atan tețțusellkeḍ.
Imiren kan yuɣal-it-id yeẓri yețwali, yedda d Sidna Ɛisa, iḥemmed Ṛebbi. Mi walan ayagi, lɣaci meṛṛa ḥemden Ṛebbi.
Sidna Ɛisa iɛedda si temdint n Yiriku.
Yella dinna yiwen umeṛkanti isem-is Zaci, d ameqqran n imekkasen n ddewla.
Yebɣa ad iẓer anwa i d Sidna Ɛisa lameɛna ur yezmir ara a t-iwali imi aṭas lɣaci i gellan, yerna nețța d awezlan.
Yuzzel ɣer zdat, yuli ɣef ttejṛa iwakken a t-iwali m'ara d-iɛeddi syenna.
Mi gewweḍ Sidna Ɛisa ɣer wemkan-nni, yerfed allen-is yenna i Zaci : A Zaci, ɣiwel ers-ed syenna, ɣuṛ-ek ara nseɣ ass-agi.
Zaci yers-ed s lemɣawla ad yesteṛḥeb s Sidna Ɛisa.
Lɣaci mi walan ayagi smermugen wway gar asen qqaṛen : « ɣer yiwen umekkas (axeddaɛ) am wagi ara yens ! »
Zaci iqeṛṛeb-ed ɣer Sidna Ɛisa, yenna-yas : A Sidi, atan ad fkeɣ i igellilen azgen n wayen sɛiɣ, yerna ma ḍelmeɣ yiwen a s-rreɣ ṛebɛa imuren.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ass-agi leslak ikcem-ed axxam agi, imi argaz-agi ula d nețța d mmi-s n Ibṛahim.
Axaṭer Mmi-s n bunadem yusa-d ad inadi ɣef wid iḍaɛen, a ten-isellek.
Sidna Ɛisa yerna-d yiwen n lemtel i wid i s ismeḥsisen, axaṭer qṛib ad awḍen ɣer temdint n Lquds, lɣaci ɣilen imiren kan ara d-tas tgeldit n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Yenna yasen : Yiwen wergaz imawlan-is muceɛen, ițeddu ad iṛuḥ ɣer yiwet n tmurt ibeɛden iwakken a t-sbedden d agellid ɣef tmurt-is , imiren a d-yuɣal.
Qbel ad iṛuḥ, yessawel i ɛecṛa seg iqeddacen-is ; yefka tawizeț i mkul yiwen deg-sen, yenna-yasen : « xedmet yis-sent tjaṛa alamma uɣaleɣ-ed ».
Arraw n tmurt-is i t-ikeṛhen, ceggɛen deffir-es kra n yemdanen ara yinin : « ur nebɣi ara ad yili wergaz agi d agellid fell-aneɣ. »
Mi t-sbedden d agellid, yuɣal ed ɣer tmurt-is ; yessawel i iqeddacen nni iwumi yefka tiwiztin iwakken ad isteqsi mkul yiwen deg-sen d acu i d-yerbeḥ yis-sent.
Amezwaru yusa-d, yenna : A Sidi, s twizeț-nni i yi-d-tefkiḍ rebḥeɣ-ed ɛecṛa nniḍen.
Agellid yenna-yas : D ayen yelhan ay aqeddac lɛali, imi deg-ek laman ɣef lḥaǧa tamecṭuḥt, a k-fkeɣ aț-țḥekmeḍ ɣef ɛecṛa n tudrin.
Aqeddac wis sin yusa-d yenna : A Sidi, rebḥeɣ-ed xemsa n twiztin s twizeț i yi-d-tefkiḍ.
Agellid yenna-yas : Ula d kečč a k-sbeddeɣ d lḥakem ɣef xemsa tudrin.
Yusa-d uqeddac wis tlata yenna : A Sidi, ațah twizeț-inek ! Freɣ-ț deg yiwen uceṭṭiḍ ;
uggadeɣ-k axaṭer tweɛṛeḍ, tețțeddmeḍ ayen ur tesriseḍ, tmeggreḍ ayen ur tezriɛeḍ.
Agellid yerra-yas : ?ef yimeslayen-ik ara k-ḥasbeɣ ay aqeddac amcum ! Teẓriḍ weɛṛeɣ, țeddmeɣ ayen ur sriseɣ, meggreɣ ayen ur zriɛeɣ ;
acuɣeṛ ihi ur tefkiḍ ara idrimen-iw i wid ara ten-isxedmen, iwakken m'ara d-uɣaleɣ a ten-id jebdeɣ s lfayda ?
Dɣa yenna i widak yellan dinna : Kkset-as tawizeț-nni, rnut-as-ț i win yesɛan ɛecṛa.
Nnan-as : A Sidi, yesɛa yakan ɛecṛa !
Yerra-yasen : Nniɣ-awen : win yesɛan a s nernu, ma d win ur nesɛi ara a s nekkes ula d ayen i gɣil yesɛa-t.
Ma d iɛdawen-nni-inu ur neqbil ara ad iliɣ d agellid fell-asen, awit-țen-id ɣer dagi tezlum-ten zdat-i.
Mi gekfa ameslay, Sidna Ɛisa yezwar ɣer zdat lɣaci iwakken ad yali ɣer temdint n Lquds.
Mi qṛib ad yaweḍ ɣer tuddar n Bitfaji akk-d Bitani, ɣer tama n yiwen yiɣil ițțusemman « Iɣil Uzemmur, » Sidna Ɛisa iceggeɛ sin seg inelmaden-is,
yenna-yasen : Ṛuḥet ɣer taddart ihin i ɣ-d iqublen, aț-țafem ajḥiḥ yeqqen, leɛmeṛ ur yerkib fell-as yiwen ; brut-as-ed, tawim-t-id.
Ma yella win i wen-d yennan : « acuɣeṛ i s-d-tebram ? » Init-as : yeḥwaǧ-it Ssid-nneɣ.
Imceggɛen-nni ṛuḥen, ufan kullec akken i sen-d-yenna Sidna Ɛisa.
Mi s-d-bran i wejḥiḥ-nni, bab-is yenna-yasen : I wacu i s-d-tebram ?
Rran-as : Yeḥwaǧ-it Ssid-nneɣ.
Wwin-d ajḥiḥ-nni, ssersen fell-as ibeṛnyas-nsen, srekben Sidna Ɛisa.
Akken i gteddu, lɣaci tessun-as-d ibeṛnyas-nsen deg webrid.
Mi qṛib ad awḍen ɣer temdint n Lquds, di tkessart-nni n yiɣil n uzemmur, inelmaden-is d lɣaci meṛṛa ččuṛen d lfeṛḥ, țḥemmiden Sidi Ṛebbi s ṣṣut eɛlayen ɣef lbeṛhanat akk i walan.
Qqaṛen : Yețțubarek ugellid i d-yusan s yisem n Sidi Ṛebbi ! Lehna deg igenwan, tamanegt i Sidi Ṛebbi deg imukan ɛlayen.
Kra ifariziyen di tlemmast lɣaci nnan i Sidna Ɛisa : A Sidi, ini-yasen i inelmaden-ik ad ssusmen.
Yenna-yasen : A wen-iniɣ : ma ssusmen nutni, d idɣaɣen ara d-iɛeggḍen.
Mi qṛib ad yaweḍ ɣer temdint n Lquds, akken i ț-iwala, Sidna Ɛisa yețru fell-as,
yenna : A tamdint n Lquds ! Lemmer teẓriḍ ass-agi ayen ara m-d-ifken lehna ! Lameɛna tura ayagi yeffer ɣef wallen-im !
A d-asen wussan anda ara d-zeḍmen fell-am yeɛdawen-im, a d-kecmen a m-d-zzin si mkul tama, a kem-ḥeṛsen ;
a kem-snegren kemm d warraw-im, ur țțaǧan deg-m azṛu ɣef wayeḍ ; axaṭer ur teɛqileḍ ara usan i deg i d-yusa leslak n Sidi Ṛebbi ɣuṛ-em.
Sidna Ɛisa yekcem ɣer wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen, yebda ițqecciɛ wid yeznuzun,
yeqqaṛ-asen : Yura di tira iqedsen : Axxam-iw ad yili d axxam n tẓallit, kunwi terram-t d axxam n imakaren.
Sidna Ɛisa yesselmad mkul ass di lǧameɛ iqedsen. Lmuqedmin imeqqranen, lɛulama d imeqqranen n wegdud țnadin a t-nɣen,
lameɛna ur s-ufin ara abrid axaṭer lɣaci meṛṛa smeḥsisen-as, yerna tɛeǧǧben deg yimeslayen-is.
Yiwen wass deg ussan-nni, Sidna Ɛisa yella yesselmad lɣaci deg wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen yețbecciṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ; leḥqen-d lmuqedmin d lɛulama n ccariɛa akk d imeqqranen n wegdud,
nnan-as : Di leɛnaya-k ! ansi i k-d-tekka lḥekma s wacu i txeddmeḍ annect agi ? Anwa i k-ț-id-yefkan ?
Yerra-yasen : A kkun-steqsiɣ ula d nekkini, init-iyi-d :
anwa i d-icegn, d Ṛebbi neɣ d imdanen ?
Bdan țemcawaṛen wway gar-asen, qqaṛen : Ma nenna-yas d Ṛebbi, a ɣ-d yini iwacu ihi ur tuminem ara yis ?
Ma nenna-yas d imdanen, lɣaci akk a ɣ-ṛejmen axaṭer umnen meṛṛa belli Yeḥya d nnbi.
Dɣa nnan i Sidna Ɛisa : Atan ur neẓri ara anwa i t-id iceggɛen.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Ula d nekk ur awen-d-qqaṛeɣ ara ansi i yi-d-tekka lḥekma s wacu i xeddmeɣ annect-agi.
Dɣa yewwi-d lemtel-agi i lɣaci : Yiwen wergaz yeẓẓa tafeṛṛant ( iger n tẓurin ) issekra-ț i ixemmasen, iṛuḥ ɣer lɣeṛba, iɛeṭṭel dinna.
Mi d-yewweḍ lweqt n tẓurin, iceggeɛ ɣuṛ-sen aqeddac iwakken a s-d-fken amur-is ; lameɛna ixemmasen-nni wwten-t, rrant-id ifassen d ilmawen.
Iceggeɛ daɣen aqeddac nniḍen, lameɛna ula d nețța ewten-t, regmen-t, rrant-id ifassen d ilmawen.
Iceggeɛ-asen daɣen wis tlata, jerḥen-t rnan qecɛen-t-id syenna.
Amɛellem-nni n tfeṛṛant yenna : « d acu ara xedmeɣ tura ? A sen ceggɛeɣ mmi ameɛzuz , ahat nețța a t-qadṛen ! »
Lameɛna ixemmasen nni mi t-walan, mcawaṛen wway gar asen nnan : « ataya win ara iweṛten ! Kkret a t-nenneɣ iwakken aț-țuɣal tfeṛṛant d ayla-nneɣ. »
?eggṛen-t beṛṛa n tfeṛṛant, nɣan-t. D acu ara sen-yexdem tura bab n tfeṛṛant-agi ?
A d-yas ad ineɣ ixemmasen-nni, ad yefk tafeṛṛant i wiyaḍ. Lɣaci mi slan annect-agi, nnan : A ɣ-imneɛ Ṛebbi !
Lameɛna Sidna Ɛisa imuqel-iten yenna : D acu i d lmeɛna n wawal-agi yuran : adɣaɣ i ḍeggṛen wid ibennun, yuɣal d win yeṭṭfen lebni .
Kra n win ara yeɣlin ɣef wedɣaɣ-agi ad yeṛṛez ; ma d win i ɣef ara d-yeɣli, ad ițwanɣed.
Lɛulama n ccariɛa d imeqqranen n lmuqedmin țqelliben a t-ṭṭfen imiren kan, axaṭer fehmen fell-asen i d-yenna lemtel-agi, lameɛna uggaden lɣaci.
Bdan țɛassan Sidna Ɛisa iwakken ma yeɣli-d deg wawal a t-ṭṭfen. Fkan tajɛelt i kra n yemdanen yerran iman-nsen d wid iḍuɛen Ṛebbi iwakken a t-zenzen ɣer lḥakem n tmurt.
Steqsan-t ihi s imeslayen-agi : A Sidi, neẓra ayen i d-teqqaṛeḍ d wayen i tesselmadeḍ d lḥeqq, yerna ur txeddmeḍ ara lxilaf ger yemdanen, tesselmadeḍ abrid n Ṛebbi s tideț.
Ini-yaɣ-d ma d leḥlal a nxelleṣ tabzert i Qayṣer (isteɛmṛen tamurt)?
Sidna Ɛisa ifaqen i tḥila-nsen, yerra-yasen : Seknet-iyi-d aṣurdi.
Udem-agi d wayen yuran ɣef wuṣuṛdi-agi wi ten-ilan ? Rran-as : D udem n Qayṣer!
Dɣa yenna-yasen : Ihi erret i Qayṣer ayen yellan n Qayṣer, terrem i Ṛebbi ayen yellan n Ṛebbi.
Wehmen s wayen i sen-d-yerra dɣa ssusmen irkul, axaṭer ur ufin ara amek ara t-id-sseɣlin deg wawal zdat lɣaci.
Kra n isaduqiyen ur nețțamen ara s ḥeggu n lmegtin, qeṛṛben-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa, steqsan-t nnan-as :

A Sidi, atah wayen i d-teqqaṛ ccariɛa n Musa : Ma yemmut yiwen wergaz yeǧǧa-d tameṭṭut-is mbla dderya, ilaq gma-s ad yaɣ tameṭṭut-nni, ad yesɛu yid-es dderya iwakken a d-ixlef isem n gma-s yemmuten.
Ihi llan sebɛa watmaten : amezwaru yezweǧ, yemmut ur d yeǧǧi dderya.
Wis sin yuɣ taǧǧalt-nni, yemmut ula d nețța.
Yuɣ-iț daɣen wis tlata, akken armi d wis sebɛa ; mmuten meṛṛa, yiwen ur d-yeǧǧi yid-es dderya.
?er taggara temmut tmeṭṭut-nni ula d nețțat.
Ass n ḥeggu n lmegtin, anwa ara ț-yesɛun ț-țameṭṭut-is imi ț-uɣen yiwen yiwen di sebɛa yid-sen ?
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Irgazen akk-d tilawin n ddunit agi țemyezwaǧen wway gar-asen.
Lameɛna wid ara yuklalen a d-ḥyun si lmut ɣer tudert n dayem, ur țemyezwaǧen ara,
axaṭer ur țțuɣalen ara ad mmten, ad ilin am lmalayekkat ; Sidi Ṛebbi a ten-yerr d arraw-is imi i d-ḥyan si ger lmegtin.
?ef wayen yeɛnan ḥeggu n lmegtin ula d nnbi Musa ihḍeṛ-ed fell-as mi gessawel i Sidi Ṛebbi zdat udarnu iṛeqqen : a Ṛebbi, Illu n Ibṛahim, Illu n Isḥaq, Illu n Yeɛqub.
Ṛebbi mačči d Ṛebbi n wid yemmuten meɛna d Ṛebbi n wid yeddren imi ɣuṛ-es ddren irkulli ɣas akken mmuten.
Kra n imusnawen n ccariɛa neṭqen-d nnan-as : A Sidi, d awal n lɛali i d-tenniḍ.
Kukran a s-rnun ula d yiwen usteqsi.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Amek armi qqaṛen Lmasiḥ d mmi-s n Dawed ?
Dawed s yiman-is yenna-d di tektabt n ?abur : Sidi Ṛebbi yenna i Ssid-iw : qqim aț-țḥekmeḍ ɣer tama- w tayeffust
alamma rriɣ iɛdawen-ik seddaw iḍaṛṛen-ik.
Ma yella Dawed isemma i Lmasiḥ « Sidi », amek i gezmer ad yili d mmi-s ?
Lɣaci meṛṛa llan smeḥsisen, Sidna Ɛisa yenna i inelmaden-is :

?adret iman-nwen ɣef lɛulama n ccariɛa i gḥemmlen ad țḥewwisen s ijellaben iɣezfanen, ḥemmlen ad țsellimen fell-asen yemdanen di leswaq, ad ṭṭfen imukan imezwura di leǧwameɛ d imukan lɛali di tmeɣṛa.
Tețțen ayla n tuǧǧal, ssiɣzifen taẓallit iwakken a ten-id-walin wiyaḍ. ?ef wannect-agi, Sidi Ṛebbi ihegga-yasen-d lɛiqab d ameqqran.
Sidna Ɛisa yerfed allen-is, iwala imeṛkantiyen srusun lewɛadi deg usenduq n lǧameɛ.
Ațaya yiwet n taǧǧalt taẓawalit tger sin iṣurdiyen ɣer usenduq-nni,
dɣa yenna : A wen-iniɣ tideț : lweɛda n taǧǧalt-agi taẓawalit tugar akk tiyaḍ ;
axaṭer wiyaḍ fkan seg wayen sɛan d zzyada ma d nețțat tefka ciṭṭuḥ-nni s wacu ara tɛic.
Kra n yemdanen țmeslayen ɣef lǧameɛ iqedsen qqaṛen wway gar-asen : Acḥal yecbeḥ lebni n lǧameɛ-agi akk-d țɣawsiwin i s-d-yețțunefken d lweɛda ! Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen :
Deg wayen akka i tețwalim, a d-awḍen wussan anda kullec ad ihudd, ur d-yețɣimi wedɣaɣ ɣef wayeḍ.
Steqsan-t nnan-as : A Sidi, melmi ara d-yedṛu wannect-a ? Anta licaṛa ara d isbegnen belli qṛib a d-yedṛu waya ?
Yenna-yasen : ?uṛ-wat a kkun-kellxen, axaṭer aṭas ara d-yasen s yisem-iw a d inin : d nekk i d Lmasiḥ ! Neɣ a wen-d-inin : lweqt yewweḍ-ed ! Ur ten-țțamnet ara !
M'ara teslem heddṛen ɣef tegrawliwin d ṭradat ur țțagadet ara, axaṭer ilaq a d-yedṛu uqbel wayagi, lameɛna mačči imiren i ț-țaggara n ddunit.
Yenna-yasen daɣen : A d-yekker wegdud ɣer wayeḍ, a d-tekker tagelda ɣer tayeḍ.
A d-tilint zzelzlat timeqqranin, a d-ɣlin di yal lehlakat i gderrɛen ( i gneṭṭḍen) akk-d laẓ, a d-tilint leɛǧubat yessexlaɛen akk-d licaṛat timeqqranin deg igenni.

Lameɛna uqbel a d-yedṛu wannect-a, kunwi s inelmaden-iw a kkun-ṭṭfen, a kkun qehṛen, ad ḥekmen fell-awen di leǧwameɛ, a kkun-ḍeggṛen ɣer leḥbus, a kkun-sbedden zdat igelliden d lḥekkam ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw.
A d-yedṛu wannect-a yid-wen iwakken aț-țilim d inigan-iw zdat-sen.
Ur țḥebbiṛet ara amek ara tsellkem iman-nwen,
axaṭer a wen-d-fkeɣ imeslayen d leɛqel s wacu ara tqablem iɛdawen nwen, ur țizmiren ara ad bedden zdat-wen neɣ a kkun-xalfen.
Ula d imawlan-nwen akk-d atmaten-nwen d imdukkal-nwen a kkun-zzenzen yerna ad nɣen aṭas seg-wen.
A kkun-keṛhen yemdanen meṛṛa ɣef ddemma-w,
lameɛna yiwen wenẓad n uqeṛṛuy-nwen ur yețṛuḥu.
?ebṛet, axaṭer s ṣṣbeṛ-nwen ara tsellkem tiṛwiḥin-nwen.
M'ara teẓrem tamdint n Lquds zzin-as-d lɛeskeṛ n yeɛdawen-is, ḥṣut belli nnger-is yewweḍ-ed.
Ass-nni ilaq wid ara yilin di temdint n Lquds ad ffɣen, wid ara yilin di lexla ur keččmen ara ɣer temdint, wid ara yilin di tmurt n Yahuda ad rewlen ɣer idurar.
Axaṭer ussan-nni d ussan n twaɣit deg wacu ara yedṛu meṛṛa wayen yuran.
A nnger n tilawin ara yilin s tadist neɣ tid ara yessuṭuḍen deg ussan-nni axaṭer a d-teɣli cedda ț-țameqqrant ɣef tmurt, a d-yeɣli wurrif n Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wegdud,

imezdaɣ-is ad mmten s ujenwi, a ten-awin d imeḥbas ɣer tmura nniḍen. Tamdint n Lquds a ț-ṛekḍen leǧnas ur nețțamen ara s Sidi Ṛebbi, alamma yețwakemmel lweqt i sen-d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi, imiren ad yezzi ɣef leǧnas-nni, a ten-iɛaqeb.
A d-tbanent licaṛat deg iṭij, deg waggur d yitran. Di ddunit, imdanen meṛṛa a ten-iffeɣ leɛqel, ur ẓerren ara d acu ara xedmen m'ara slen i ṣṣut n lemwaji d lebḥuṛ.
Ad ilin wid ara yemten si lxuf m'ara walin lmuṣibat ara d-yeɣlin ɣef ddunit ; igenwan d kra yellan deg-sen ad rgagin.
Imiren imdanen ad walin Mmi-s n bunadem iteddu-d ɣef wusigna s tezmert d lɛaḍima tameqqrant.
M'ara yebdu wannect-agi iḍeṛṛu, sbeddet lqedd-nwen trefdem iqeṛṛay-nwen axaṭer leslak-nwen yewweḍ-ed.
Yewwi-yasen-d lemtel-agi : Walit taneqleț neɣ ttjuṛ nniḍen !
M'ara bdunt fessunt, teẓram qṛib a d-yaweḍ unebdu.
Kunwi daɣen m'ara twalim yewweḍ-ed wannect-agi ḥṣut belli tageldit n Ṛebbi teqṛeb-ed.
A wen-iniɣ tideț: lǧil-agi ur yețmețțat ara alamma yedṛa wannect-agi meṛṛa.
Igenni d lqaɛa ad fnun ma d awal-iw ur ifennu ara.
Ɛasset ɣef yiman-nwen, ḥadret a kkun-iɣuṛṛ zzhu n ddunit ; ɛasset iman-nwen ɣef tissit n ccṛab d iɣeblan, neɣ m'ulac a d-yeɣli fell awen wass-nni ur tebnim fell-as.
Ass-nni a d-yeɣli am ucebbak ɣef yemdanen n ddunit meṛṛa.
Ɛiwzet ihi, deɛɛut dayem ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi a wen-d-yefk tazmert ara kkun-imenɛen seg wayen i d-iteddun, s wayes ara tbeddem zdat Mmi-s n bunadem.
Deg wass, Sidna Ɛisa yesselmad di lǧameɛ iqedsen ma deg iḍ, yețṛuḥu ad yens deg yiwen yiɣil ițțusemman : «Iɣil n uzemmur ».
?ṣbeḥ zik, lɣaci meṛṛa țṛuḥun ɣuṛ-es ɣer lǧameɛ iqedsen iwakken ad slen i wawal-is.
Lɛid i deg xedmen aɣṛum mbla iɣes n temtunt ițțusemman « Tafaska n izimer n leslak » tqeṛb-ed.
Lmuqedmin imeqqranen d lɛulama n ccariɛa țqelliben amek ara nɣen Sidna Ɛisa lameɛna uggaden lɣaci.
Yudas n Qeṛyut yiwen si tnac-nni n inelmadenis, ikcem-it Cciṭan.
Iṛuḥ ad yemcawaṛ d lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d lḥekkam iɛessasen n lǧameɛ iqedsen, iwakken a sen izzenz Sidna Ɛisa.
Nutni feṛḥen yerna ɛuhden-t a s-fken idrimen.
Yudas yefra awal yid-sen syenna yebda yețqellib amek ara sen-t-yezzenz s tuffra ɣef lɣaci.
Yewweḍ-ed wass n Tfaska n weɣṛum mbla iɣes n tamtunt i deg ilaq ad zlun izimer n leslak.
Sidna Ɛisa iceggeɛ Buṭrus d Yuḥenna, yenna-yasen : Ṛuḥet a ɣ-theggim imensi n Tfaska.
Nnan-as : Anda tebɣiḍ a t-nheggi a Sidi ?
Yerra-yasen : M'ara tkecmem ɣer temdint, a d-temmagrem yiwen wergaz yerfed tacmuxt n waman ; tebɛet-eț ɣer wexxam anda ara yekcem.
Init i bab n wexxam-nni : yeqqaṛ-ak-d Ssid nneɣ, anda ara nečč imensi n Tfaska nekk d inelmaden-iw ?
A wen-d-isken yiwet n tɣuṛfeț tameqqrant iwejden, dinna ara theggim imensi n Tfaska.
Mi ṛuḥen, ufan kullec akken i sen-t-id-yenna, dɣa heggan imensi n Tfaska.
Mi d-yewweḍ lweqt n imensi, Sidna Ɛisa yeqqim ad yečč nețța d Ṛṛusul-is,
yenna-yasen : Acḥal i mennaɣ ad ččeɣ imensi n Tfaska-agi yid-wen uqbel ad nneɛtabeɣ !
A wen-d-iniɣ : atan ur țțuɣaleɣ ara maḍi a t-ččeɣ alamma tețwakemmel lmeɛna-ines di tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Yeddem-d tabuqalt n waman n tẓurin, yeḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi yenna : Axet tabuqalt-agi, feṛqet-eț wway gar-awen,
a wen-d-iniɣ : sya d asawen ur țțuɣaleɣ ara ad sweɣ seg waman-agi n tẓurin alamma tewweḍ ed tgeldit n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Yeddem-ed daɣen aɣṛum, iḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi, yebḍa-t yefka-yasen-t, yenna : Aɣṛum-agi d lǧețța-w ara fkeɣ fell-awen, feṛqet-eț gar-awen. Sya d asawen xeddmet akkagi akken ad iyi-d-tețmektayem.
Mi gfukk imensi, yeddem-ed tabuqalt n waman n tẓurin, yefka yasen-ț yenna : Tabuqalt-agi, d leɛqed ajdid s idammen-iw ara yazzlen fell-awen.
Ma d win ara yi-zzenzen atan yeqqim-ed yid-i ɣer lmakla.
Mmi-s n bunadem ad immet akken yura fell-as di tira iqedsen, lameɛna a nnger n wemdan agi ara t-izzenzen !
Ṛṛusul bdan țmesteqsayen wway gar-asen anwa-t wagi ara t-ixedɛen.
Inelmaden bdan țemjadalen wway gar-asen iwakken ad ẓren anwa deg-sen ara ițwaḥesben d ameqqran.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna yasen : Imeqqranen n ddunit ḥekmen s ddreɛ ɣef yigduden-nsen yerna țțusemman d at lxiṛ.
Kunwi xḍut i wannect-agi. Ameqqran deg-wen ad yili am umeẓyan, win iḥekmen ad yili am win iqeddcen.
Anwa i d ameqqran , d amɛelem yeqqimen ad yečč neɣ d win i s iqeddcen ? Yak d win yeqqimen ad yečč ! Ma d nekk, aql-i gar-awen am win iqeddcen.
Kunwi aql-ikkun tṣebṛem yid-i di lmeḥnat-iw.
Akken i yi-d-ihegga Baba tagelda, ula d nekk a wen-ț-id heggiɣ i kunwi
iwakken aț-țeččem aț-țeswem yid-i di tgelda-inu. Aț-țeqqimem ɣef yikursiyen n lḥekma, aț-țḥekmem ɣef tnac leɛṛac n wat Isṛail.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna : A Semɛun sel-iyi-d ! Cciṭan yessuter a kkun-isserwet am yirden,
lameɛna dɛiɣ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi fell-ak akken ur tfeččleḍ ara di liman. Ma d kečč m'ara d-tuɣaleḍ ɣuṛ-i, sseǧhed atmaten-ik.
Buṭrus yenna-yas : Aql-i heggaɣ iman-iw ad kecmeɣ yid-ek ɣer lḥebs, ad dduɣ yid-ek ula ɣer lmut.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : A k-d-iniɣ a Buṭrus , ass-a uqbel ad iskkuɛ uyaziḍ ad iyi-tnekṛeḍ tlata iberdan, aț-ținiḍ ur iyi-tessineḍ ara !
Yenna-yasen daɣen : M'akken i kkun-ceggɛeɣ mbla idrimen, mbla agrab, mbla arkasen, yella kra i kkun-ixuṣṣen ? Rran-as : Ur aɣ-ixuṣṣ wacemma !
Yenna-yasen : Ihi tura win yesɛan idrimen neɣ agrab yawi-ten, win ur nesɛi ara ajenwi ad izzenz abeṛnus-is iwakken a d-yaɣ yiwen.
Axaṭer qqaṛeɣ awen : Ilaq ad yedṛu yid-i wayen yuran. « Ițțuneḥsab seg yembaṣiyen, » yerna ayen yuran fell-i, atan yewweḍ ed.
Inelmaden-is nnan-as : A Sidi , atnan sin ijenwiyen ! Yenna-yasen : D ayen tura, beṛka !
Akken yuɣ tannumi, Sidna Ɛisa yeffeɣ, iṛuḥ ɣer yiɣil n uzemmur ; inelmaden-is tebɛen-t.
Mi gewweḍ ɣer wemkan-nni, yenna-yasen : Dɛut ɣer Ṛebbi akken ur tɣellim ara deg ujeṛṛeb.
Dɣa yessebɛed iman-is fell-asen azal n kra n lmitrat, yeqqim ɣef tgecrar ideɛɛu i Ṛebbi yeqqaṛ :
A Baba, ma tebɣiḍ ssebɛed fell-i leɛtab-agi i yi-țṛaǧun ; lameɛna d lebɣi-k ara yedṛun mačči d lebɣi inu.
Yiwen n lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi iḍheṛ-as-d a t-yesseǧhed.
Iḍaq wul-is, ikețțeṛ di tẓallit armi tuɣal tidi-ines d idammen yețqiṭṭiren ɣer lqaɛa.
Mi gekfa, yuɣal-ed ɣer inelmaden-is, yufa-ten-id yewwi-ten yiḍes axaṭer yeɣli-d fell-asen leḥzen ameqqran ;
dɣa yenna-yasen : Acuɣeṛ i tegnem ? Kkret, dɛut ɣer Ṛebbi akken ur tɣellim ara deg ujeṛṛeb.
Mazal-it iheddeṛ, atnaya wwḍen d lɣaci. Yudas, yiwen si tnac-nni inelmaden-is yezwar-ed zdat-sen, iqeṛṛeb ɣer Sidna Ɛisa ad isellem fell-as.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna yas : A Yudas, s sslam ara txedɛeḍ Mmi-s n bunadem !
Wid yellan d Sidna Ɛisa, mi walan ayen ara yedṛun nnan-as : A Sidi, a newwet s ijenwiyen ?
Yiwen deg-sen yewwet aqeddac n lmuqeddem ameqqran, igzem-as ameẓẓuɣ ayeffus.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna yasen : ?ebset ! Dayen tura ! Yessers afus-is ɣef wemkan n umeẓẓuɣ n uqeddac-nni, yerra-yas-t akken yella.
Dɣa yezzi ɣer wid i d-yusan a t-ḥebsen, ɣer lmuqedmin imeqqranen d lɛuqal akk-d lḥekkam n iɛessasen n lǧameɛ iqedsen yenna yasen : Tusam-d ɣuṛ-i s ijenwiyen d iɛekzan am akken d amakar i lliɣ.
Mkul ass țțiliɣ yid-wen di lǧameɛ iqedsen yiwen ur d-yerfid afus-is ɣuṛ-i. Lameɛna taswiɛt-agi ț-țaswiɛt nwen, ț-țaswiɛt n tezmert n ṭṭlam.
Mi ṭṭfen Sidna Ɛisa, wwin-t ɣer wexxam n lmuqeddem ameqqran. Buṭrus itbeɛ-iten s lebɛid.
Ceɛlen times di tlemmast n wefrag, qqimen. Buṭrus yella yid-sen.
Yiwet n tqeddact twala-t-id yeqqim yeẓẓiẓin, tmuqel-it tenna : Argaz-agi daɣen yella yid-es.
Lameɛna Buṭrus yenkeṛ, yenna : Ur t-ssineɣ ara a tameṭṭut !
Cwiṭ akka, iwala-t-id yiwen nniḍen, yenna : Kečč daɣen d yiwen seg-sen. Buṭrus yerra-yas, yenna : Ur lliɣ ara seg-sen ay argaz !
Iɛedda wazal n ssaɛa, yenṭeq-ed yiwen nniḍen yenna : Mbla ccekk argaz-agi yella yid-es axaṭer d ajlili.
Buṭrus yerra-yas : Ur ẓriɣ ara d acu i d-teqqaṛeḍ ay argaz ! Werɛad yekfi ameslay... yeskkuɛ uyaziḍ.
Sidna Ɛisa yezzi ɣuṛ-es, immuqel-it. Dɣa Buṭrus yemmekta-d wayen i s-d-yenna Sidna Ɛisa : « Ass-agi, uqbel ad iskkuɛ uyaziḍ ad iyi-tnekṛeḍ tlata iberdan.»
Yeffeɣ ɣer beṛṛa iṭṭerḍeq s imeṭṭawen axaṭer yendem.
Irgazen-nni i gɛussen Sidna Ɛisa, stehzayen fell-as kkaten-t.
?ɣummun-as udem-is, rnan qqaṛen-as « eɛqel ihi anwa i k-id yewten ».
Rnan regmen-t s mkul rregmat yellan.
Mi guli wass, tajmaɛt n lɛuqal n wegdud, lmuqedmin imeqqranen d lɛulama n ccariɛa nnejmaɛen. Wwin-d Sidna Ɛisa ɣer usqamu n ccṛeɛ.
Steqsan-t nnan-as : Ma d kečč i d Lmasiḥ, ini yaɣ t-id. Yerra-yasen : Atan ma nniɣ-awen-t-id ur iyi tețțamnem ara,
ma steqsaɣ-kkun-id ur iyi-d-țarram ara.
Lameɛna a wen-d-iniɣ, sya ɣer zdat, Mmi-s n bunadem ad yeḥkem ɣer tama tayeffust n Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n tezmert.
Kkren-d akken ma llan nnan : Ihi kečč d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi ? Nețța yerra-yasen : Tennam-t-id, d nekk !
Imiren ɛeggḍen nnan : Dayen ur neḥwaǧ ara inigan, yenna-t-id s yimi-s, nesla-yas s imeẓẓuɣen-nneɣ.
Tajmaɛt meṛṛa tekker, wwin Sidna Ɛisa ɣer lḥakem Bilaṭus.
Bdan țcetkin fell-as, qqaṛen : -- Nufa argaz-agi yeskker ccwal ger lɣaci-nneɣ, yeqqaṛ-asen : « ur țxelliṣet ara leɣṛama i Qayṣer », yeqqaṛ daɣen : « d nețța i d Lmasiḥ, i d agellid ».
Bilaṭus isteqsa-t s imeslayen-agi : D kečč i d agellid n wat Isṛail ? Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Tenniḍ-t-id.
Bilaṭus yenna i lmuqedmin imeqqranen d lɣaci : Ur s-d-ssukkseɣ acemma i wergaz-agi.
Nutni țkemmilen qqaṛen : Yeskker ccwal ger lɣaci s wayen yesselmad ; yebda-d si tmurt n Jlili, yuɣal ɣer tmurt n Yahuda meṛṛa, tura yewweḍ-ed ɣer dagi.
Bilaṭus, mi gesla bedren-d tamurt n Jlili, yesteqsa ɣef Sidna Ɛisa ma d ajlili i gella.
Mi geẓra belli Sidna Ɛisa ajlili, n tmurt i ɣef yeḥkem Hiṛudus, iceggeɛ-as-t i Hiṛudus yellan ula d nețța di temdint n Lquds ussan-nni.
Hiṛudus ifṛeḥ aṭas mi geẓra Sidna Ɛisa, axaṭer acḥal segmi yebɣa a t-iẓer ɣef ddemma n wayen yesla fell-as. Yețmenni a t-iwali yexdem lbeṛhan,
isteqsa-t aṭas, lameɛna Sidna Ɛisa ur as-d-yerri acemma.
Lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d lɛulama n ccariɛa yellan dinna țcetkayen fell-as s lɣecc.
Hiṛudus d lɛeskeṛ-is ḥeqṛen-t, stehzayen fell as, selsen-as yiwen ubeṛnus ifazen, imiren rran-t i Bilaṭus.
Seg wass-nni, Bilaṭus d Hiṛudus uɣalen d imdukkal nutni yellan zik d iɛdawen.
Imiren Bilaṭus yesnejmaɛ-ed lmuqedmin imeqqranen d lɛulama akk-d lɣaci,
yenna-yasen : Tewwim-iyi-d argaz-agi, tennam d yeskker ccwal ger lɣaci ; atan steqsaɣ-t zdat-wen ur ufiɣ ara deg-s ayen akka s wayes i d-teccetkam fell as.
Ula d Hiṛudus ur s-d yessukkes acemma imi i ɣ-t-id-yerra. Ihi argaz-agi ur yexdim ara ayen yuklalen lmut.
A s-fkeɣ tiɣṛit imiren a s-serrḥeɣ.
