d Ṛṛuḥ n tideț, win akken ur tezmir ddunit a t-teqbel axaṭer ur t-twala ur t-tessin. Kunwi tessnem-t axaṭer yella yid-wen yerna ad yili deg-wen.
Ur kkun-țțaǧǧaɣ ara d igujilen, a d-uɣaleɣ ɣuṛ-wen.
Drus i yi-d iqqimen di ddunit ; ddunit ur tețɛawad ara a yi-tẓer, ma d kunwi a yi-twalim axaṭer ddreɣ yerna ula d kunwi aț-țidirem.
Ass-nni aț-țfehmem belli nekk lliɣ di Baba, aț-țeẓrem daɣen belli kunwi tellam deg-i nekk lliɣ deg-wen.
Win i yi-ḥemmlen s tideț, d win i geṭṭfen lewṣayat-iw yerna iḥrez-itent. Win i yi-ḥemmlen a t-iḥemmel Baba, nekk daɣen a t-ḥemmleɣ yerna a d-sbeggneɣ iman-iw ɣuṛ-es.
Yuda (mačči Yudas n Qeṛyut), yenna-yas : A Sidi, acuɣeṛ i nukkni kan i tebɣiḍ a d-sbeggneḍ iman-ik, mačči i ddunit meṛṛa ?
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Win i yi-ḥemmlen ad ixdem ayen i d-nniɣ, ula d Baba a t iḥemmel ! A d-nas i sin ɣuṛ-es, a nezdeɣ ɣuṛ-es.
Ma d win ur iyi-nḥemmel ara ur ixeddem ara ayen i d-nniɣ. Awal-agi i teslam mačči s ɣuṛ-i i d-yekka meɛna d awal n Baba i yi-d-iceggɛen.
Qqaṛeɣ-awen-d akk annect-agi skud mazal-iyi yid-wen.
Lameɛna Amɛiwen, Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ara d-iceggeɛ Baba s yisem-iw, a wen-isselmed kullec yerna a wen-d-ismekti ayen akk i wen-d-nniɣ.
Ad ṛuḥeɣ meɛna a wen-d ǧǧeɣ lehna, d lehna-w ara wen-d fkeɣ. Lehna ara wen-d-fkeɣ mačči am lehna i d-tețțak ddunit. Daymi i wen-d-qqaṛeɣ ur țțaggadet ara, kkset anezgum seg wulawen-nwen.
Teslam-d mi wen-d-nniɣ ad ṛuḥeɣ meɛna a d-uɣaleɣ ɣuṛ-wen. Lemmer tḥemmlem-iyi, tili tfeṛḥem imi teẓram ɣer Baba ara ṛuḥeɣ, axaṭer Baba yugar-iyi.
Xebbṛeɣ-kkun-id ɣef wannect-agi tura uqbel ad yedṛu iwakken m'ara d-yedṛu aț-țamnem.
Sya d asawen, ur seɛɛuɣ ara lweqt ad meslayeɣ yid-wen imi Amesbaṭli n ddunit-agi atan iteddu-d. Ur yeḥkim ara deg-i,
meɛna ilaq imdanen n ddunit-a ad ɛeqlen belli ḥemmleɣ Baba yerna xeddmeɣ akken i yi-d-yumeṛ. Ayaw kkret a nṛuḥet syagi.
-- D nekk i ț-țara n tideț, yerna d Baba i ț-ixeddmen.
Yal isegmi yeṭṭfen deg-i ur d-nețțak ara lfakya, ige??em-it, ma d isegman i d-ițakken lfakya, iferres iten akken a d-efken lfakya s waṭas.
Akka ula d kunwi i teṣfam s uselmed i wen-d-fkiɣ.
Ilit deg-i, nekk ad iliɣ deg-wen. Isegmi ur yezmir ara a d-yefk lfakya weḥd-es m'ur yeṭṭif ara ɣer tara. Akken daɣen kunwi, m'ur teṭṭifem ara deg-i ur tețțizmirem ara a d-tefkem lfakya.
Nekk ț-țara, kunwi d isegman-is. Win yellan deg-i nekk lliɣ deg-s, a d-yefk lfakya s waṭas, axaṭer mbla nekk ur tețțizmirem aț-țxedmem acemma.
Win ur neṭṭif ara deg-i ad yețwaḍeggeṛ ɣer beṛṛa n tfeṛṛant am isegmi yețwagezmen. M'ara qqaṛen isegman, ad țwajemɛen iwakken a sen-ceɛlen times ad ṛɣen.
Ma teṭṭfem deg-i yerna awal-iw yezdeɣ deg-wen, ssutret ayen i tebɣam a kkun-id-yaweḍ.
Ma tețțakem-d lfakya s tugeț tesbegginem-d belli ț-țideț d inelmaden-iw i tellam ; akka ara d-tban tmanegt n Baba i yemdanen.
Akken i yi-iḥemmel Baba i kkun ḥemmleɣ ula d nekk ; dumet di tayri-inu.
Ma tḥerzem lumuṛat-iw aț țdumem di tayri-w, akken ḥerzeɣ lumuṛ n Baba yerna dumeɣ di tayri-s.
Nniɣ-awen-d akk ayagi iwakken lfeṛḥ-iw a kkun-yeččaṛ ula d kunwi, dɣa lfeṛḥ-nwen ad yennekmal.
Atan ihi lameṛ ara wen-d-fkeɣ : « Myeḥmalet wway gar-awen akken i kkun-ḥemmleɣ nekkini.»
Ulac tayri yugaren tin n win ara isebblen tudert-is ɣef yeḥbiben-is.
Aql-ikkun d iḥbiben-iw ma txeddmem ayen i wen d-umṛeɣ.
Sya ɣer zdat ur kkun-ḥețțbeɣ ara d iqeddacen, axaṭer aqeddac ur yeẓri ara d acu i gxeddem Bab-is. Tura aql-ikkun d iḥbiben-iw axaṭer slemdeɣ-awen ayen akk i d-lemdeɣ ɣer Baba.
Mačči d kunwi i yi-ixtaṛen meɛna d nekk i kkun ixtaṛen ; ceggɛeɣ-kkun iwakken a d-tefkem lfakya, lfakya ara idumen. S wakka, Baba Ṛebbi a wen-yeqbel kra n wayen ara s-tessutrem s yisem-iw.
Atan ihi lameṛ ara wen-d-fkeɣ : « Myeḥmalet wway gar-awen».
Ma yella tekṛeh-ikkun ddunit ilaq aț-țeẓrem belli tekṛeh-iyi uqbel-nwen.
Lemmer n ddunit i tellam tili tḥemmel-ikkun imi d ayla-s. Lameɛna kunwi mačči n ddunit, axaṭer d nekk i kkun-id yextaṛen si tlemmast n ddunit, daymi i kkun-tekṛeh.
Mmektit-ed ayen i wen-d nniɣ : aqeddac werǧin yugar Bab-is. Ma qehṛen-iyi a kkun-qehṛen ula d kunwi ; ma ḥerzen imeslayen-iw ad ḥerzen imeslayen-nwen.
?ef ddemma-w ara xedmen akka, axaṭer ur ssinen ara win i yi-d-iceggɛen.
Lemmer ur d-usiɣ ara, lemmer ur sen-d-mmeslayeɣ ara tili ulac ddnub fell-asen lameɛna tura ddnub i yirawen-nsen.
Win i yi-keṛhen yekṛeh daɣen Baba.
Lemmer ur xdimeɣ ara gar-asen ayen weṛǧin yexdem yiwen, tili ulac ddnub fell-asen. Meɛna tura, ɣas akken ẓran kullec, țkemmilen keṛhen-iyi am nekk am Baba.
Axaṭer ilaq ad yețwakemmel wayen yuran di ccariɛa : Keṛhen-iyi mbla sebba.
M'ara d-yas umɛiwen, win akken ara wen-d-ceggɛeɣ s ɣuṛ Baba Ṛebbi, Ṛṛuḥ n tideț ara d-yasen s ɣuṛ-es, nețța s yiman-is ara d-icehden fell-i.
Kunwi daɣen aț-țuɣalem d inigan-iw imi tellam yid-i si tazwara.
Nniɣ-awen-d akk annect-agi iwakken ur tɣellim ara.
Axaṭer, a kkun-stixṛen si lǧwameɛ, yerna a d-yas lweqt anda wid ara kkun-inɣen ad ɣilen d asfel i fkan i Ṛebbi.
Ad ssiwḍen ɣer wannect-agi imi ur iyi-ssinen nekk, ur ssinen Baba.
Nniɣ-awen-d akk ayagi tura iwakken asm'ara ssiwḍen ɣer wannect-agi, a d-mektim belli nniɣ-awen-t-id uqbel a d-yedṛu. Ur a wen-t-id-nniɣ ara si tazwara axaṭer mazal-iyi lliɣ yid-wen.
Tura ad ṛuḥeɣ ɣer win i yi-d iceggɛen ; atan yiwen deg-wen ur iyi-d-isteqsa ɣer wanda ara ṛuḥeɣ.
Imi i wen-d-nniɣ akka, leḥzen yeččuṛ ulawen-nwen.
A wen-iniɣ tideț, yelha-yawen ma ṛuḥeɣ axaṭer m'ur ṛuḥeɣ ara, amɛiwen ur d-yețțas ara ɣuṛ-wen, meɛna ma ṛuḥeɣ a wen t-id-ceggɛeɣ.
M'ara d-yas, a d-isbeggen i yemdanen belli ɣelṭen ɣef wayen yeɛnan ddnub, lḥeqq, d lḥisab n Ṛebbi.
?elṭen ɣef wayen yeɛnan ddnub, imi ugin ad amnen yis-i ;
ɣef wayen yellan d lḥeqq imi tedduɣ ɣer Baba yerna ur tețțuɣalem ara a yi-twalim ;
ɣelṭen ɣef wayen yeɛnan lḥisab n Ṛebbi, imi amesbaṭli n ddunit-agi yețțuḥaseb yakan.
Aṭas n lewṣayat i mazal a wen tent-id-iniɣ, lameɛna di teswiɛt-agi ur sent-tezmirem ara.

Asm'ara d-yas Ṛṛuḥ n tideț, a kkun-iseddu di tideț akken tella, ayen ara wen-d-yini mačči s ɣuṛ-es i d-yekka meɛna a d-immeslay ɣef wayen akk i gesla yerna a kkun id-ixebbeṛ ɣef wayen akk ara yedṛun ɣer zdat.
A d-isbeggen tamanegt-iw axaṭer s ɣuṛ-i ara d-yawi wayen akk ara wen-d-yini.
Ayla n Baba d ayla-w ula d nekk. Daymi i wen-d-nniɣ s ɣuṛ-i ara d-yawi wayen akk ara wen-d-yini.
Di kra n lweqt ur iyi-tețwalim ara, kra n lweqt daɣen aț-țuɣalem a yi-twalim.

Dɣa kra seg inelmaden-is țmesteqsayen, qqaṛen : D acu i gebɣa a ɣ-d-yini mi i d-yeqqaṛ : « Kra n lweqt ur iyi tețwalim ara, kra n lweqt daɣen aț-țuɣalem a yi-twalim », neɣ mi ɣ-d yenna : «Ad ṛuḥeɣ ɣer Baba»?
Nnan daɣen : D acu i d lmeɛna n «Kra n tallit kan» i ɣef i ɣ-d-yemmeslay ? Ur nefhim ara d acu i gebɣa a d-yini !
Sidna Ɛisa yefhem belli bɣan a t-steqsin, dɣa yenna-yasen : Tețmesteqsayem ɣef wayen i bɣiɣ a d-iniɣ s imeslayen-agi : « Tallit kan i mazal ur yi-tețwalim ara, tallit daɣen a yi-twalim » ;
nniɣ-awen s tideț : kunwi aț-țețrum, aț-țmeǧdem, ma d imdanen n ddunit-a ad feṛḥen aṭas. Kunwi aț-țeṛwum lqeṛḥ meɛna lqeṛḥ-nwen ad yuɣal d lfeṛḥ.
M'ara d-tarew tmeṭṭut tețțenɛețțab aṭas di teswiɛt-nni, lameɛna akken kan ara twali llufan-is ilul-ed tețțu lqeṛḥ-is imi lfeṛḥ-is d ameqqran.
Kunwi daɣen aql-ikkun tețwaqeṛḥem tura meɛna a d-uɣaleɣ a kkun-zṛeɣ, imiren ulawen-nwen ad ččaṛen d lfeṛḥ ; lfeṛḥ-agi yiwen ur izmir a wen t-yekkes.
M'ara d-yas wass-nni ur tețțuɣalem ara a yi-testeqsim. A wen iniɣ s tideț : ayen akk ara tessutrem i Baba s yisem-iw a wen-t-id-yeqbel.
Ar tura ur tessutrem acemma s yisem-iw. Ssutret a wen-d-yețțunefk akken lfeṛḥ-nwen ad yețwakemmel.
Ayen akk i wen-d-nniɣ, nniɣ awen-t-id s lemtul. A d-yas lweqt ur a wen-d-țmeslayeɣ ara akka, a wend hedṛeɣ ɛinani ɣef wayen yeɛnan Baba.
Ass-nni aț-țdeɛɛum ɣer Baba s yisem-iw, yerna ur wen-d-qqaṛeɣ ara belli ad dɛuɣ ɣer Baba fell-awen.
Axaṭer Baba iḥemmel-ikkun imi iyi-tḥemmlem, yerna tumnem belli s ɣuṛ-es i d-kkiɣ.
?-țideț usiɣ-ed s ɣuṛ Baba, usiɣ-ed ɣer ddunit, ma ț-țura ad ǧǧeɣ ddunit ad uɣaleɣ ɣer Baba.
Inelmaden-is nnan-as : Atan tura tețmeslayeḍ-aɣ-d ɛinani mačči s lemtul.
Tura neẓra belli tessneḍ kullec imi uqbel a d-nehdeṛ teẓriḍ ɣef wacu i nebɣa a k-nesteqsi. ?ef wayagi i numen belli s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi i d-tusiḍ.
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Tura tumnem !
Atan iteddu-d lweqt yerna yewweḍ-ed, aț țemfaṛaqem ɣer mkul tama a yi teǧǧem iman-iw. Lameɛna ur lliɣ ara weḥd-i axaṭer Baba yella yid-i.
Ilaq-iyi a wen-d-iniɣ daɣen annect-agi akken aț-țafem deg-i talwit. Aț-țɛeddim si teswiɛin n ddiq di ddunit, aț-țneɛtabem meɛna ṣebṛet ! Nekk ɣelbeɣ ddunit.
Mi d-yenna imeslayen-agi, Sidna Ɛisa yerfed allen-is ɣer igenni, yenna : -- A Baba, yewweḍ-ed lweqt ! Sbeggen-ed tamanegt n Mmi-k iwakken ula d nețța a d-isbeggen tamanegt-ik !
Tefkiḍ-as tazmert ɣef yemdanen n ddunit meṛṛa akken ad yefk tudert n dayem i wid akk i s-d-tefkiḍ.
Tudert n dayem : d asm'ara issinen yemdanen belli d kečč i d Ṛebbi awḥid, Illu n tideț, ad issinen daɣen Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, win akken i d-tceggɛeḍ.
Sbeggneɣ-ed tamanegt-ik di ddunit mi kfiɣ ccɣel-nni i ɣef iyi-twekkleḍ.
Tura a Baba, ɛuzz-iyi s tmanegt-ik, tin akken i sɛiɣ asmi lliɣ ɣuṛ-ek uqbel a d-texleq ddunit !
Sbeggneɣ-d isem-ik i yemdanen akk i yi-d-tefkiḍ si ddunit. Llan d ayla-k, tuɣaleḍ tefkiḍ-iyi-ten-id ; nutni ḥerzen awal-ik.
Tura ẓran belli ayen akk i yi-d-tefkiḍ s ɣuṛ-ek i d-yekka ;
axaṭeṛ ṣṣawḍeɣ-asen-d awal-ik akken yella, yerna qeblen-t. ?ran ț-țideț s ɣuṛ-ek i d-kkiɣ yerna umnen d kečč i yi-d-iceggɛen.
Deɛɛuɣ ɣuṛ-ek fell-asen. Ur deɛɛuɣ ara ɣef yemdanen nniḍen lameɛna ɣef wid i yi-d-tefkiḍ, axaṭer nutni d ayla-k.
Ayen yellan d ayla-w inek, ayen yellan d ayla-k inu. Tamanegt-iw tețfeǧǧiǧ deg-sen.

Qṛib tura ad ffɣeɣ si ddunit, a n-ṛuḥeɣ ɣuṛ-ek meɛna nutni ad qqimen di ddunit. A Baba, ay Imqeddes ! ?erz-iten s tezmert n yisem-ik, isem-nni i yi-d-tefkiḍ iwakken ad uɣalen d yiwen, akken nella nekk yid-ek d yiwen.
Seg wasmi lliɣ gar-asen, ḥerzeɣ-ten s tezmert n yisem-ik, isem-agi i yi-d-tefkiḍ. ?erzeɣ-ten, yiwen deg-sen ur yeɛṛiq anagar win i glaqen ad yeɛṛeq, iwakken tira iqedsen ad nnekmalent.
Tura a n-uɣaleɣ ɣuṛ-ek, qqaṛeɣ-ed akk annect-agi skud mazal-iyi di ddunit, akken ad ččaṛen wulawen-nsen d lfeṛḥ am lfeṛḥ-iw ikemlen.
Fkiɣ-asen awal-ik meɛna at ddunit keṛhen-ten axaṭer am nekk am inelmaden-iw ur nelli ara n at ddunit.
Ur k-d-ssutreɣ ara akken a ten tekkseḍ si ddunit, meɛna a ten tmenɛeḍ si Cciṭan.
Nutni mačči n ddunit, akken ula d nekk ur lliɣ ara n ddunit.
?erz-iten di tideț ; d awal-ik i ț-țideț.
Akken i yi-d-tceggɛeḍ ɣer ddunit, nekk daɣen a ten-ceggɛeɣ.
?ef yisem-ik ad sebbleɣ iman-iw fell-asen, iwakken ula d nutni ad sebblen iman-nsen ɣef tideț.
Mačči fell-asen kan i deɛɛuɣ, deɛɛuɣ daɣen ɣef wid akk ara yamnen yis-i s cchada n inelmaden-iw.
A k-ssutreɣ a Baba ad uɣalen akk d yiwen. Akken telliḍ deg-i a Baba nekk daɣen lliɣ deg-k, ad uɣalen d yiwen iwakken at ddunit ad amnen belli d kečč i yi-d-iceggɛen.
Fkiɣ-asen tamanegt i yi-d-tefkiḍ iwakken ad uɣalen d yiwen, akken nella nekk yid-ek d yiwen :
nekk deg-sen, kečč deg-i. Ad uɣalen akk d yiwen, iwakken at ddunit meṛṛa ad setɛeṛfen belli d kečč i yi-d-iceggɛen, yerna tḥemmleḍ-ten akken i yi tḥemmleḍ !
A Baba bɣiɣ wid meṛṛa i yi-d tefkiḍ ad ilin yid-i anda ara yiliɣ, ad walin tamanegt i yi-d-tefkiḍ axaṭer tḥemmleḍ-iyi uqbel a d-texleq ddunit.
A Baba, Kečč yellan d aḥeqqi at ddunit ur k-ssinen ara ma d nekk ssneɣ-k, wigi ẓran belli d kečč i yi-d-iceggɛen.
Sbeggneɣ-k-id ɣuṛ-sen yerna mazal a k-id-sbeggneɣ, iwakken tayri akk i yi-d-tefkiḍ aț-țili deg-sen, nekk daɣen ad iliɣ deg-sen.
Mi gfukk ta?allit, Sidna Ɛisa yekker iṛuḥ nețța d inelmaden is, zegren iɣzer n Sidṛun. Dinna tella yiwet n tmazirt kecmen ɣuṛ-es.
Yudas ara t-ixedɛen yessen mliḥ amkan-nni, axaṭer Sidna Ɛisa yennum ițṛuḥu ɣer dinna nețța d inelmaden-is.
Yudas yewwi-d yid-es tarbaɛt n lɛeskeṛ akk-d iɛessasen n lǧameɛ ; ceggɛen-ten-id lmuqedmin imeqqranen d ifariziyen, wwḍen-d ɣer tmazirt-nni. Wwin-d yid-sen tiftilin, isufa akk-d leslaḥ.
Sidna Ɛisa yeẓran akk ayen ara yedṛun yid-es, iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-sen yenna yasen : ?ef wanwa i tețnadim ?
Nutni rran-as : Nețnadi ɣef Ɛisa anaṣari ! Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : D nekkini. Yudas, win akken ara t-ixedɛen yuɣ-it lḥal gar-asen.
Imi i sen-yenna Sidna Ɛisa « d nekkini », uɣalen akk ɣer deffir, ɣlin ɣer lqaɛa.
Sidna Ɛisa yesteqsa-ten daɣen yenna : ?ef wanwa i tețnadim ? Nutni rran-as : ?ef Ɛisa anaṣari !
Sidna Ɛisa yerna yenna-yasen : Nniɣ-awen-d d nekk ! Ma d nekk i ɣef tețnadim, ǧǧet widak-agi ad ṛuḥen.
Akka i gedṛa wawal-nni i d yenna yakan : « Ur sruḥeɣ ula d yiwen seg widak i yi-d-tefkiḍ. »
Semɛun Buṭrus yejbed-ed ajenwi, yewwet yis aqeddac n lmuqeddem ameqqran, igzem-as ame??uɣ ayeffus. Aqeddac-agi isem-is Maṛxus.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna i Buṭrus : Err ajenwi-inek ɣer titar-is (teɣlaft-is). Eɛni ur ilaq ara ad sweɣ taqbuct n leɛtab i yi-d-yefka Baba ?
Lɛeskeṛ akk-d iɛessasen n lǧameɛ ṭṭfen Sidna Ɛisa,
wwin-t yețwarez ɣer wexxam n ?anna aḍeggal n Kayef yellan d lmuqeddem ameqqran aseggas-nni.
Kayef d win akken i sen-yennan i wat Isṛail : « Axiṛ ad immet yiwen kan ɣef lumma.»
Semɛun Buṭrus, nețța d yiwen unelmad nniḍen tebɛen Sidna Ɛisa. Anelmad-agi yessen lmuqeddem ameqqran s yiman-is ; itbeɛ Sidna Ɛisa mi t-wwin ɣer wefrag n wexxam n lmuqeddem ameqqran,
ma d Buṭrus yeqqim di beṛṛa ɣer tama n tewwurt. Anelmad-nni yessnen lmuqeddem ameqqran yuɣal yeffeɣ ed, yehdeṛ-as i tɛessast n tewwurt, dɣa tessekcem Buṭrus.
Taqeddact-nni yețɛassan tawwurt, tenna i Buṭrus : Ur telliḍ ara ula d kečč seg inelmaden n wergaz-agi ? Buṭrus yerra-yas : Xaṭi, ur lliɣ ara seg-sen !
Iqeddacen akk-d iɛessasen ceɛlen times di lkanun, zzin-as iwakken ad sseḥmun axaṭer d asemmiḍ. Buṭrus iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-sen ad yeẓẓiẓen ( ad isseḥmu ) ula d nețța.
Lmuqeddem ameqqran yebda yesteqsay Sidna Ɛisa ɣef wayen yeɛnan inelmaden-is d uselmed-ines.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Hedṛeɣ ɛinani zdat lɣaci, slemdeɣ di leǧwameɛ n wat Isṛail, slemdeɣ daɣen deg wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen anda i gețnejmaɛ lɣaci, ur hdiṛeɣ ara s tuffra.
Iwacu i yi testeqsayeḍ ? Steqsi widak i yi-slan amek i sen-hedṛeɣ, nutni ẓran akk ayen i d-nniɣ.
Mi d-yenna ayagi, yiwen uɛessas yellan zdat-es, yewwet it s useṛfiq, yenna-yas : Akka ara d-thedṛeḍ i lmuqeddem ameqqran ?
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ma nniɣ-ed ayen ixesṛen, ini yi-d d acu-t ; ma yella ț-țideț i d nniɣ, acuɣeṛ i yi-tewteḍ ?
Imiren ?anna iceggeɛ Sidna Ɛisa yețwarez ɣer Kayef, lmuqeddem ameqqran.

Semɛun Buṭrus mazal-it yeqqim yeẓẓiẓin deg wemkan-nni, iluɛa-t-id yiwen yenna-yas : I kečč, ur telliḍ ara d yiwen seg inelmaden n wergaz-agi ? Buṭrus inkeṛ yenna-yas : Xaṭi, ur lliɣ ara seg-sen !
Yiwen seg iqeddacen n lmuqeddem ameqqran, yețțilin i win akken iwumi yegzem Semɛun Buṭrus ame??uɣ, iwehha-d ɣuṛ-es yenna-yas : Ur k-ẓriɣ ara yid-es di tmazirt ?
Lameɛna Buṭrus yenkeṛ daɣen. Imiren kan iskkuɛ uyaziḍ.

Mi d-ffɣen s ɣuṛ Kayef, lecyux n wat Isṛail wwin Sidna Ɛisa ɣer lḥakem Bilaṭus ; yuɣ lḥal d lefjer. Wid i t-yewwin ur kcimen ara ɣer daxel n lbeṛj (sṛaya) n Bilaṭus, iwakken ad qqimen d izedganen m'ara ččen imensi n lɛid n Tfaska.
Daymi i d-iffeɣ ɣuṛ-sen Bilaṭus, yesteqsa-ten yenna : D acu i gexdem wergaz-agi ?
Rran-as : Lemmer ur yexdim ara ayen n diri, tili ur k-t-id-nețțawi ara.
Bilaṭus yenna-yasen : Atan ɣuṛ-wen, ḥekmet fell-as s ccariɛa-nwen ! Nutni nnan-as : Nukni ur nezmir ara a neḥkem ɣef yiwen s lmut !
Ayagi, iwakken ad yedṛu wayen i d-yenna Sidna Ɛisa ɣef lmut i t-yețṛaǧun.
Bilaṭus yekcem ɣer wexxam n ccṛeɛ akken ad icaṛeɛ Sidna Ɛisa ; yesteqsa-t, yenna-yas : D kečč i d agellid n wat Isṛail ?
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Yella win i k-t-id-yennan neɣ d kečč i t-id-yennan s yiman-ik ?
Bilaṭus yerra-yas : Tḥesbeḍ-iyi n wat Isṛail nekkini ? D lmuqedmin imeqqranen d wat n tmurt-ik i k-id-yewwin ɣuṛ-i ! D acu i txedmeḍ ?

Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Tagelda-w mačči n ddunit-agi. Lemmer tagelda-w n ddunit-agi tili iqeddacen-iw nnuɣen akken ur d-ɣelliɣ ara ger ifassen n imeqqranen n wat Isṛail. S tideț tagelda-w mačči n dagi.

Bilaṭus yenna-yas : Ihi d agellid i telliḍ ? Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Tenniḍ-t-id s yiman-ik, d agellid i lliɣ ! Luleɣ-d yerna usiɣ-ed ɣer ddunit-agi akken a d-cehdeɣ ɣef tideț. Win iḥemmlen tideț, yesmeḥsis i wayen i d-qqaṛeɣ.
Bilaṭus yenna-yas : D acu i ț-țideț ? Mi s-d-yenna ayagi, Bilaṭus yuɣal ɣer wat Isṛail yenna-yasen : Nekk, ur ufiɣ ara sebba s wayes ara ḥekmeɣ ɣef wergaz-agi.
Meɛna akken i tella lɛadda, di mkul lɛid n Tfaska țserriḥeɣ-awen-d i yiwen umeḥbus ; tebɣam ihi a d-serrḥeɣ i ugellid n wat Isṛail ?
Dɣa nutni bdan țɛeggiḍen, qqaṛen : Ala ! Ur as-d-țserriḥ ara i nețța ! Serreḥ-ed i Baṛabas ! Baṛabas-agi, d argaz bu tmegṛaḍ.
Bilaṭus yefka lameṛ ad awin Sidna Ɛisa a t-wten s ujelkkaḍ.
Lɛeskeṛ zḍan taɛeṣṣabt s isennanen, ssersen-as-ț ɣef wuqeṛṛuy, selsen-as daɣen abeṛnus azeggaɣ,
imiren țqeṛṛiben ɣer zdat-es qqaṛen : Azul fell-ak ay agellid n wat Isṛail ! Rnan kkaten-t s iṣeṛfiqen ( ibeqqayen ).
Bilaṭus yeffeɣ-ed daɣen ɣer imeqqranen n wat Isṛail yenna-yasen : Atan a wen-t-id-awiɣ ɣer dagi akken aț-țeẓrem belli ur ufiɣ ara deg-s sebba s wayes ara ḥekmeɣ fell-as.
Ssufɣen-d Sidna Ɛisa ɣer beṛṛa s tɛeṣṣabt-nni n isennanen akk-d ibidi ( abeṛnus ) azeggaɣ. Bilaṭus yenna-yasen : Atan ɣuṛ-wen !

Mi t-walan imeqqranen n wat Isṛail d iɛessasen, bdan țɛeggiḍen : Semmeṛ-it ɣef wumidag ! Semmeṛ-it ɣef lluḥ ! Bilaṭus yenna yasen : Ma tebɣam a t-tsemmṛem ɣef wumidag, atan ɣuṛ-wen ! Ma d nekk, ur ufiɣ ara sebba s wayes ara ḥekmeɣ fell-as.
Lecyux n wat Isṛail rran-as : Nukni nesɛa ccariɛa ; ccariɛa nneɣ teqqaṛ-ed : Argaz am agi ilaq ad yemmet axaṭer yenna-d : « Nekk d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi.»
Imeslayen-agi sxelɛen Bilaṭus.
Yuɣal yekcem ɣer wexxam n ccṛeɛ yesteqsa daɣen Sidna Ɛisa, yenna-yas : Ansi i d-tekkiḍ ? Sidna Ɛisa ur s-d-yerri ara awal.
Bilaṭus yenna-yas : Amek ! Ur iyi-d-țarraḍ ara awal ? Ur teẓriḍ ara belli zemreɣ a k-serḥeɣ, zemreɣ daɣen ad fkeɣ lameṛ a k-semmṛeɣ ɣef wumidag ?
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ur tezmireḍ i wacemma fell-i anagar ayen i k-d-yețțunefken seg igenni. Daymi win i yi-d-yewwin ger ifassen-ik yewwi ddnub akteṛ-ik.

Seg imiren Bilaṭus yețqellib amek ara d-iserreḥ i Sidna Ɛisa lameɛna lecyux n wat Isṛail sekkren leɛyaḍ, qqaṛen-as : Ma tserrḥeḍ-as i wergaz-agi ur telliḍ ara d aḥbib n Qayṣer, axaṭer win yerran iman-is d agellid, d aɛdaw n Qayṣer.
Mi gesla i imeslayen-agi, Bilaṭus yessufeɣ-ed Sidna Ɛisa ɣer beṛṛa, yeqqim ɣef wukursi n ccṛeɛ deg umkan iwumi qqaṛen s tɛibṛanit «Gabbaṭa» yeɛni «afrag yessan s yeblaḍen».
Ass-nni, d ass uqbel lɛid n Tfaska ; aț-țili d leǧwahi n tnac, Bilaṭus yenna i lecyux n at Isṛail : Atan ugellid-nwen !

Meɛna nutni rnan ɛeggḍen : Enɣ-it ! Enɣ-it ! Semmeṛ-it ɣef wumidag ! Bilaṭus yenna-yasen : Amek ! Ad semmṛeɣ agellid nwen ? Lecyux n wat Isṛail rran-as : D Qayṣer i d agellid-nneɣ, ur nesɛi ara agellid nniḍen.
Dɣa Bilaṭus yefka-yasen-t akken a t-semmṛen ɣef wumidag. ?ṭfen-d Sidna Ɛisa
sbubben-as amidag, ffɣen si temdint, ulin ɣer wemkan yețțusemman « tiɣilt n uqeṛṛuy » ( iwumi qqaṛen s tɛibṛanit « Gulguṭa »).
Dinna i t-semmṛen ɣef lluḥ nețța akk-d sin nniḍen. Sbedden imidagen yiwen sya wayeḍ sya, Sidna Ɛisa di tlemmast.
Bilaṭus yumeṛ ad semmṛen yiwet n telwiḥt sennig uqeṛṛuy n Sidna Ɛisa, yura deg-s : « Ɛisa anaṣari, agellid n wat Isṛail.»
Imi amkan-nni anda i t-semmṛen ur yebɛid ara ɣef temdint, aṭas n wat Isṛail i geɣṛan talwiḥt-nni yuran s tɛibṛanit, s tlatinit ț-țyunanit.
Lecyux n wat Isṛail ccetkan ɣer Bilaṭus, nnan-as : Ur ilaq ara aț-țaruḍ ɣef telwiḥt nni «Agellid n wat Isṛail,» lameɛna ilaq aț-țaruḍ «Argaz-agi yenna d : nekk d agellid n wat Isṛail.»
Bilaṭus yerra-yasen : Ayen uriɣ ad yeqqim akken i t-uriɣ.
Mi semmṛen Sidna Ɛisa ɣef wumidag, lɛeskeṛ ddmen-d lqecc-is bḍan-ten ɣef ṛebɛa, yal yiwen yewwi amur-is ; yeqqim-ed ujellab-is ur nefṣil ur nxaḍ, mazal-it akken yezḍa seg yixef ɣer wayeḍ.

Heddṛen wway gar-asen, nnan : Acuɣeṛ ara t-ncerreg, eyyaw axiṛ a nger tasɣaṛt fell-as a nẓer anwa ara t-yawin. S wakka i gennekmal wayen yuran di tira iqedsen : Feṛqen lqecc-iw, gren tasɣaṛt ɣef wubeṛnus-iw.» Akka i xedmen iɛsekṛiyen-nni.
Zdat umidag, tbedd yemma-s n Sidna Ɛisa, weltma-s n yemma-s, Meryem tameṭṭut n Klufas akk-d Meryem tamagdalit.
Mi gwala Sidna Ɛisa yemma-s tbedd ɣer tama n unelmad-nni i gḥemmel, yenna-yas : A tameṭṭut, atan mmi-m.
Yenna daɣen i unelmad-nni : Ațan yemma-k. Seg imiren anelmad-nni yewwi-ț ɣer wexxam-is.
Mi geẓra Sidna Ɛisa dayen kullec ifuk, yenna iwakken ad nnekmalent tira iqedsen : Ffudeɣ !
Yella dinna ubuqal yeččuṛen d lxell. Dmen-d ameččim n taḍuṭ cudden-t ɣer yixef n uɣanim, sbezgen t-id s lxell-nni, ssawḍen-as-t ɣer yimi-s.
Akken kan i geɛṛeḍ lxell-nni, Sidna Ɛisa yenna : Kullec yețwakemmel ! Yessekna aqeṛṛuy-is, yessufeɣ ṛṛuḥ.

Tafaska n izimer n leslak yeɣli-d deg wass n westeɛfu. Tameddit n wass uqbel ass n westeɛfu, lecyux n wat Isṛail ur bɣin ara ad ǧǧen lǧețțat-nni ɣef yimidagen di leɛwaceṛ. Ṛuḥen ad ssutren i Bilaṭus a sen-ṛẓen iḍaṛṛen i widak-nni yețwasemmṛen ; iwakken ad kksen lǧețțat-nsen.
Lɛeskeṛ ṛuḥen, ṛẓan iḍaṛṛen i yiwen seg widak-nni yețwasemmṛen ț-țama n Sidna Ɛisa, syenna uɣalen ɣer wayeḍ.
Mi wwḍen ɣer Sidna Ɛisa, ufan-t yemmut yakan, daymi ur s-ṛzin ara iḍaṛṛen-is.
Yiwen uɛeskṛi yessenta yas isekkin deg idis, imiren ffɣen-d waman akk-d idammen seg-s.
Win i d-yeḥkan ɣef wannect-agi d inigi n ṣṣeḥ, axaṭer d ayen i geẓra s wallen-is. Yezṛa ț-țideț i d-yenna, yenna-t-id akken aț-țamnem ula d kunwi.
Ayagi meṛṛa yedṛa iwakken ad yețțukemmel wayen yuran di tira iqedsen : Ula d yiwen seg yeɣsan-is ur yețṛuz.
Yura daɣen : Ad ssersen tamuɣli ɣef win i fetken.

Deffir wannect-agi meṛṛa, Yusef n taddart n Arimati iṛuḥ yessuter i Bilaṭus a t-yeǧǧ ad yawi lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa. Nețța daɣen yella d anelmad-is, lameɛna yeffer iman-is axaṭer ițțaggad lecyux n wat Isṛail. Bilaṭus yeqbel wayen i s-d yessuter ; dɣa Yusef iṛuḥ a d-yawi lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa nețța d Nikudem,
win akken i gṛuḥen deg yiḍ ɣer Sidna Ɛisa. Nikudem yewwi-d yid-es azal n tlatin litrat n leɛṭeṛ ixeddmen i lmegtin.
Di sin yid-sen, wwin-d lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa xedmen-as leɛṭeṛ akken i tella lɛadda n wat Isṛail, imiren țțlen-t s lekfen.
Zdat wemkan anda semmṛen Sidna Ɛisa, tella deg yiwet n tmazirt yiwen n yefri yețwaheggan d aẓekka, ulac win i gmeḍlen deg-s.
Imi i geqṛeb yefri-nni, rran lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa ɣer daxel, axaṭer ass i d-iteddun d ass n westeɛfu n wat Isṛail.
Ass n lḥedd, ṣṣbeḥ zik qbel ad yali wass, Meryem tamagdalit tṛuḥ ɣer u?ekka. Twala azṛu-nni iqeflen imi n u?ekka yețwakkes.
Imiren kan tuzzel aț-țessiweḍ lexbaṛ i Semɛun Buṭrus akk-d unelmad-nni i gḥemmel Sidna Ɛisa. Tenna-yasen : Kksen-d Ssid-nneɣ seg u?ekka, ur neẓri ara anda i t-rran.
Buṭrus d unelmad-nni ddukklen, ṛuḥen ɣer u?ekka.
Uzzlen i sin, lameɛna anelmad-nni yeǧǧa Buṭrus ɣer deffir, yewweḍ d amezwaru.
Imuqel ɣer daxel n u?ekka, iwala lekfen di lqaɛa, lameɛna ur yekcim ara.
Semɛun Buṭrus i t-id-itebɛen ilḥeq-ed. Yekcem ɣer daxel u?ekka, iwala lekfen di lqaɛa,
ma d aceṭṭiḍ s wayes yețțel uqeṛṛuy n Sidna Ɛisa ur yelli ara akk-d lekfen-nni, meɛna yers ɣer rrif, mazal-it deg wemkan-is akken yețțel.
Anelmad-nni i gewwḍen d amezwaru, yekcem ula d nețța ɣer uẓekka. Mi gwala, yumen.
Axaṭer armi d imiren, urɛad fhimen belli Sidna Ɛisa ilaq a d yeḥyu si ger lmegtin akken yura di tira iqedsen.
Sin inelmaden-nni uɣalen ɣer yexxamen-nsen.
Yuɣ lḥal Meryem tella di beṛṛa, tețru tama n u?ekka. Mi tella tețru, tmuqel ɣer daxel,
twala snat lmalayekkat s llebsa tamellalt, qqimen deg wemkan-nni anda akken i ssersen lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa, yiwen ɣer uqeṛṛuy wayeḍ ɣer iḍaṛṛen,
nnan-as : Acuɣeṛ i tețruḍ ? Meryem tenna-yasen : Wwin Ssid-iw, yerna ur ẓriɣ ara anda i t-rran !
Urɛad d-tfuk ameslay tmuqel ɣer deffir, twala Sidna Ɛisa ibedd-ed, lameɛna ur teɛqil ara belli d nețța.

Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Acuɣeṛ i tețruḍ ? ?ef wanwa i tețqellibeḍ ? Meryem tɣil d aɛessas n tmazirt, tenna-yas : Ma yella d kečč i t-iddmen, ini-yi-d ɣer wanda i t-tewwiḍ akken ad ṛuḥeɣ a t-id-awiɣ.
Sidna Ɛisa iluɛa-ț-id yenna-yas : Meryem ! Tezzi ɣuṛ-es, dɣa tenna-yas s tɛibṛanit : Rabuni ! ( yeɛni : a Sidi ! )
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ur yi-d-țmassa ara, axaṭer urɛad uliɣ ɣer Baba. Lameɛna ṛuḥ ini-yasen i watmaten-iw : aql-iyi ad aliɣ ɣer Baba yellan d Baba-twen, ɣer Yillu-yiw yellan d Illu-nwen.
Meryem tamagdalit tṛuḥ aț țessiweḍ lexbaṛ i inelmaden. Tenna yasen : ?riɣ Ssid-nneɣ, atah wayen i yi-d-yenna ...
Ass n lḥedd tameddit, inelmaden llan deg yiwen wexxam ɣelqen tiwwura axaṭer uggaden at Isṛail. Ataya Sidna Ɛisa ibedd-ed gar-asen, yenna-yasen : Sslam fell-awen !
Akken i gsellem fell-asen isken asen-d ifassen-is akk-d yidis-is. Inelmaden feṛḥen aṭas imi walan Ssid-nsen.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen daɣen : Sslam fell-awen. Akken i yi-d iceggeɛ Baba, nekk daɣen a kkun ceggɛeɣ.
Mi d-yenna annect-agi, isuḍ ɣef yinelmaden-is, yerna yenna-yasen : Stṛeḥbet s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.
Wid iwumi ara tsemḥem ddnubat a sen țwasemḥen, ma d wid iwumi ur tețsemmiḥem ara ddnubat-nsen ad qqimen i yirawen-nsen.
?uma, iwumi qqaṛen Akniw, yellan d yiwen si tnac-nni, ur yelli ara yid-sen mi d-yusa Sidna Ɛisa.

Inelmaden nniḍen nnan-as : Neẓra Sidna Ɛisa ! Meɛna nețța yerra-yasen : Ma yella ur walaɣ ara ccwami n imesmaṛen deg ifassen-is, ma yella ur sriseɣ ara aḍad-iw anda ntan imesmaṛen, ma yella ur sriseɣ ara afus-iw ɣef yidis-is, ur țamneɣ ara.

Mi ɛeddan tmanya n wussan, inelmaden nnejmaɛen daɣen deg wexxam. Tikkelt-agi ?uma yella yid-sen. Ataya Sidna Ɛisa yekcem-ed ɣuṛ-sen ɣas akken ɣelqent tewwura. Ibedd gar-asen, yenna-yasen : Sslam fell-awen !
Sidna Ɛisa yenna i ?uma : Awi-d aḍad-ik atnan ifassen-iw, qeṛṛeb-ed afus-ik tserseḍ-t ɣef yidis-iw. Ur jehhel ara, amen !
?uma yerra-yas : A Ssid-iw ! Ay Illu-yiw !
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Armi i yi-twalaḍ i tumneḍ ! Amarezg n win ara yamnen mbla ma iwala.
Aṭas n lbeṛhanat i gexdem daɣen Sidna Ɛisa zdat inelmaden-is, ur d-temmeslay ara fell-asen tektabt-agi.
Lameɛna ayen akk i d-yețwajemɛen deg-s yura-d iwakken aț-țamnem belli d Ɛisa i d Lmasiḥ, d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi yerna ma tumnem yis aț-țesɛum tudert s yisem-is.
Syin akkin, Sidna Ɛisa isbeggen-ed iman-is daɣen i inelmaden-is ɣef rrif n lebḥeṛ n Tiberyas. Atah wamek i tedṛa :
Semɛun Buṭrus, ?uma iwumi qqaṛen Akniw, Natanahil n taddart n Kana yellan di tmurt n Jlili, arraw n Zabadi akk-d sin inelmaden nniḍen ddukklen akken.
Semɛun Buṭrus yenna-yasen : Ad ṛuḥeɣ a d-ṣeggḍeɣ iselman. Nutni nnan-as : Ula d nukkni a neddu yid-ek. Dɣa ṛuḥen rekben taflukt, ṣeggden iḍ kamel ur d-ṭṭifen ula d yiwen uḥewtiw.
Akken yebda yețțali wass, ataya Sidna Ɛisa ibedd-ed ɣef rrif n lebḥeṛ ; inelmaden ur t-eɛqilen ara d nețța.
Sidna Ɛisa yessawel-asen : Ay arrac, teṭṭfem-d kra n lḥut neɣ ala ? Nutni rran-as : Ur d-neṭṭif ula d yiwen !
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : ?eggṛet acebbak ɣer tama tayeffust n teflukt a d-teṭṭfem. Deggṛen acebbak ɣer wanda i sen-d-yenna, mi t-id-ssulin yeččuṛ ed d lḥut armi ur zmiren ara a t-id refden.
Anelmad-nni i gḥemmel Sidna Ɛisa, yenna i Buṭrus : D Sidna Ɛisa !ɣ Mi gesla belli d Sidna Ɛisa, Semɛun Buṭrus yekksen aqenduṛ-is mi gella yețṣeggid, yelsa-t, dɣa iḍeggeṛ iman-is ɣer waman.
Inelmaden nniḍen uɣalen-d s teflukt ɣer rrif, zzuɣṛen-d yid-sen acebbak nni yeččuṛen d iselman. Llan beɛden ɣef rrif azal n meyya n lmitrat.
Mi d-rsen ɣer lqaɛa, ufan-d aɣṛum akk-d lḥut s ufella n yirrij n tmes.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Awit-ed kra n iselman seg wid i d-teṭṭfem.
Semɛun Buṭrus yuli ɣer teflukt, ijebd-ed acebbak-nni, yeẓẓuɣer-it-id ɣer lqaɛa. Ufan deg-s meyya utlata uxemsin iselman imeqqranen ; ɣas akken yeččuṛ ucebbak-nni ur iqqeṛs ara.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Qeṛṛbet-ed aț-țeččem. Ula d yiwen seg inelmaden-nni ur yezmir a s-yini « anwa-k ? » ?ran akk belli d Sidna Ɛisa.
Sidna Ɛisa iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-sen, ifṛeq-asen aɣṛum-nni d iselman-nni.
?-țikkelt tis tlata i d-yesken iman-is Sidna Ɛisa i inelmaden-is seg wasmi i d-yeḥya si lmut. Sidna Ɛisa akk-d Buṭrus

Mi kfan učči, Sidna Ɛisa yenna i Semɛun Buṭrus : A Semɛun mmi-s n Yunes, tḥemmleḍ-iyi akteṛ n wigi ? Semɛun Buṭrus yenna-yas : Ih a Sidi, teẓriḍ ḥemmleɣ-k. Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : ?ḥadar izamaren-iw.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas tikkelt tis snat : A Semɛun mmi-s n Yunes, tḥemmleḍ-iyi ? Yerra-yas : Ih teẓriḍ ḥemmleɣ-k a Sidi ! Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Kess ulli-inu.

Sidna Ɛisa yesteqsa-t tikkelt tis tlata, yenna-yas : A Semɛun mmi-s n Yunes, tḥemmleḍ-iyi ? Semɛun Buṭrus iɣaḍ-it lḥal, axaṭer ț-țikkelt tis tlata i t-id-yesteqsa : « Ma tḥemmleḍ-iyi ?». Dɣa yenna-yas : A Sidi, teẓriḍ kullec, teẓriḍ belli ḥemmleɣ-k ! Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : ?ḥadar ulli-inu.

Qqaṛeɣ-ak s tideț : asmi me??iyeḍ, tețbeggiseḍ i yiman-ik weḥd-ek, tețṛuḥuḍ anda tebɣiḍ. Lameɛna asm'ara tuɣaleḍ d amɣaṛ, aț-țḍelqeḍ iɣallen-ik i wayeḍ akken a k-yebges yerna a k yawi ɣer wanda ur tebɣiḍ ara aț-țṛuḥeḍ.
S imeslayen-agi, issemɛen-ed amek ara yemmet Semɛun Buṭrus ɣef ddemma n tmanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi. Mi d-yenna ayagi, yenna-yas daɣen : Ddu-d yid-i !

Buṭrus yezzi ɣer deffir, iwala anelmad-nni i gḥemmel Sidna Ɛisa iteddu-d deffir-nsen. Anelmad-agi d win akken i geknan ɣer Sidna Ɛisa asmi llan tețțen imensi, i s yennan : «A Sidi, anwa ara k ixedɛen ?»
Mi t-iwala, Buṭrus yesteqsa Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : I nețța a Sidi, d acu ara yedṛun yid-es ?
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ma bɣiɣ ad yidir alamma d asm'ara d-uɣaleɣ, d acu i k yecqan ? Kečč tbeɛ-iyi-d !

?ef wannect-agi i geffeɣ lexbaṛ ger watmaten, qqaṛen : « Anelmad-agi ur yețmețțat ara ». S tideț, Sidna Ɛisa ur d-yenni ara belli anelmad-agi ur yețmețțat ara lameɛna yenna-d kan : « Ma bɣiɣ ad yidir alamma asm'ara d uɣaleɣ, d acu i k yecqan ? »
D anelmad-agi i d-ixebbṛen ɣef wannect-agi yerna yura-t-id. Neẓra belli cchada-ines tṣeḥḥa.
Sidna Ɛisa yexdem daɣen aṭas n lecɣal nniḍen. Lemmer a ten-id neḥku yiwen yiwen, ur cukkeɣ ara ddunit meṛṛa aț-țawi tiktabin ara naru.
A Tawfilus, di tektabt-inu tamezwarut, ḥkiɣ-ed ayen ixdem Sidna Ɛisa d wayen yesselmed seg wass amezwaru armi d ass i deg yețwarfed ɣer igenni.
Uqbel ad ițwarfed, yefka lumuṛat-is s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i wid i gextaṛ ad ilin d ṛṛusul.
Mi d-iḥya si ger lmegtin, i nutni daɣen iwumi i d-isban iman-is belli yedder ; ṛebɛin wussan nețța ițban asen-d yerna ițmeslay-asen-d ɣef wayen yeɛnan tagelda n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Yiwen wass, mi gella itețț yid-sen, yefka-yasen lameṛ-agi : Ur țeffɣet ara si temdint n Lquds, lameɛna eṛǧut lemɛahda n Baba Ṛebbi, tin akken i wen-d nniɣ ;
« Yeḥya isseɣḍas imdanen deg aman, ma d kunwi, di kra n wussan aț-țețwaɣeḍsem s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.»
Mi llan ṛṛusul nnejmaɛen yid-es, steqsan-t : A Sidi, deg ussan-agi ara d terreḍ tageldit i wegdud n wat Isṛail ?
Yerra-yasen : Ur țnadit ara aț-țeẓrem ayen yeɛnan lewqat d wussan i ghegga Baba Ṛebbi s lḥekma-ines si zik, ayagi mačči d ccɣel-nwen.

Kunwi a wen-d-tețțunefk tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ara d-yersen fell-awen, imiren aț-țilim d inigan-iw di temdint n Lquds, di tmurt n Yahuda ț-țmurt n Samarya, aț-țawḍem alamma d ixfawen n ddunit.
Akken i d-yenna imeslayen-agi, Sidna Ɛisa yețwarfed ɣer igenni nutni țmuqulen deg-s armi i t-tɣumm tagut.
Mazal ṛeṣṣan allen-nsen deg-s ɣer tegnaw, mi sen-d-dehṛen sin yergazen s llebsa tamellalt, nnan-asen :
Ay imezdaɣ n tmurt n Jlili, acuɣeṛ mazal-ikkun tețmuqqulem ɣer tegnaw ? Akken i twalam Sidna Ɛisa yuli ɣer igenni, akken daɣen ara t-twalim asmi ara d-yuɣal.
Seg iɣil uzemmur, uɣalen ɣer temdint n Lquds ibeɛden azal n tikli n wass n westeɛfu.

Mi wwḍen ɣer temdint n Lquds, ulin ɣer texxamt anda nnumen țnejmaɛen. Yella gar-asen Buṭrus, Yuḥenna, Yeɛqub, Andriyus, Filibas, Suma, Bartelmay, Matta, Yeɛqub mmi-s n Ḥalfi, Semɛun awaṭani akk-d Yahuda mmi-s n Yeɛqub.
Țnejmaɛen s yiwen n ṛṛay iwakken ad deɛɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi nutni d kra n tlawin, llan yid-sen daɣen watmaten n Sidna Ɛisa akk-d yemma-s, Meryem.
Deg ussan-nni, llan nnejmaɛen azal n meyya uɛecrin n wayetmaten, yekker-ed Buṭrus gar-asen, yenna-d :
Ay atmaten, ilaq a d-yedṛu wayen i d-yenna Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen si zik seg yimi n Sidna Dawed, ɣef wayen yeɛnan Yudas i d-yezwaren zdat n wid i geṭṭfen Sidna Ɛisa.
Yudas-agi yella d yiwen seg neɣ, yerna ițekki di leqdic-nneɣ ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi.
Argaz-agi yuɣ akal s yedrimen-nni n lexdeɛ, yuɣal yeɣli ɣef wudem, ifelleq uɛebbuḍ-is, mmaren-d akk ijuɣdan-is.
Imezdaɣ n temdint n Lquds slan akk s wannect-agi, daymi i semman i wemkan-nni s tmeslayt-nsen : Ḥaqel damma , yeɛni iger n idammen.
Am akken yura di tektabt n Sabur : Axxam-is ad yexlu, ur t-izeddeɣ yiwen. Yura daɣen : Wayeḍ ad yeṭṭef amkan-is.
Ilaq-aɣ ihi a d-nextiṛ yiwen seg wid yellan yid-nneɣ mi nțeddu d Sidna Ɛisa di mkul amkan,
seg wasmi i t-isseɣḍes Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas armi d ass i deg yețwarfed ɣer igenni ; iwakken ad yili am nukkni d inigi n ḥeggu-ines.
Sbedden-d sin yergazen : Yusef yețțusemman Barsaba iwumi qqaṛen daɣen « Aḥeqqi » akk-d Matyas.
Dɛan ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi s imeslayen agi : A Sidi Ṛebbi, kečč yesnen ulawen n yemdanen meṛṛa, sbeggen aɣ-ed anwa deg-sen i gwulmen
iwakken ad iṭṭef amkan di lecɣal n ṛṛusul i ɣef yeṭṭaxeṛ Yudas, imi nețța iṛuḥ ɣer wemkan i s-ilaqen.
Gren tasɣaṛt, tṣaḥ-ed i Matyas ; dɣa rnan-t-id ɣer ḥdac-nni n ṛṛusul.
Ass n Lɛid n wass wis xemsin, inelmaden llan nnejmaɛen akk deg yiwen n wemkan.
Taswiɛt kan, yekka-d yiwen n lḥess ameqqran seg igenni am waḍu iǧehden, yeččuṛ akk axxam-nni anda qqimen.
Sehṛen-asen-d am akken d ilsawen n tmes ițemfaṛaqen wway gar-asen, rsen-d ɣef yal yiwen deg sen.
Sčuṛen akk s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, bdan țmeslayen s tutlayin nniḍen, yal yiwen seg-sen iheddeṛ s tutlayt i s-d-yefka Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.
Deg ussan-nni, di temdint n Lquds, llan yemdanen n wat Isṛail yețḍuɛun Sidi Ṛebbi, i d-yusan si mkul tamurt n ddunit.
Mi slan i lḥess-nni, lɣaci uzzlen d meṛṛa ; dehcen, axaṭer sellen-asen țmeslayen-d s tutlayt n tmurt i deg țɛicin.
Wehmen, țɛeǧben, qqaṛen wway gar-asen : Imdanen-agi yețmeslayen mačči n tmurt n Jlili ?
Amek armi yal yiwen deg-nneɣ isell-asen țmeslayen s tmeslayt-is ?

Llan gar-aneɣ yemdanen i d yusan si tmurt n Bartas, si tmurt n Midyas, si tmurt n Ilam, kra nniḍen si tmurt n Mizubuṭamya, si tmurt n Yahuda akk-d tmurt n Kafadusya, wiyaḍ si tmurt n Tqenṭert, si tmurt n Asya,
si tmurt n Frijya akk-d Bamfilya. Usan-d daɣen si tmurt n Maṣer, si leǧwahi n Qiṛwan di tmurt n Libya, widak i d-yusan si temdint n Ṛuma ;
llan daɣen wat Isṛail akk-d wid itabaɛen di ddin nsen, llan wid n tegzirt n Kritus akk-d waɛṛaben. Amek armi i sen-nesla țmeslayen s tutlayin-nneɣ meṛṛa ɣef leɛǧayeb n Sidi Ṛebbi ?
Dehcen akk, ur ẓrin d acu ara xemmemen, qqaṛen wway gar-asen : D acu-t wayagi ?
Ma d wiyaḍ stehzayen fell-asen qqaṛen : D askaṛ i sekkṛen !

Buṭrus yellan akk-d ḥdac n ṛṛusul-nni, issaɛli taɣect-is yenna i lɣaci : Ay imezdaɣ n temdint n Lquds akk-d kunwi meṛṛa isɛeddayen ussan di temdint-agi, slet-ed mliḥ i wayen ara wen-d-iniɣ, ilaq aț-țeẓrem ayagi :
irgazen-agi ur skiṛen ara am akken i ɣilen kra seg-wen, axaṭer ațan d țesɛa n ṣṣbeḥ kan !
Lameɛna ayagi yedṛan d ayen i d-icar nnbi Yuwil :

Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-d : Deg ussan ineggura a d-sserseɣ Ṛṛuḥ-iw ɣef yemdanen meṛṛa ; arrac-nwen d yessi-twen a d-țcirin ayen ara sen-d-țxebbiṛeɣ, ilmeẓyen-nwen a sen-d-țweḥḥiɣ, imɣaṛen-nwen a sen-d-mmeslayeɣ di tirga.
Anɛam, deg ussan-nni a d-smireɣ Ṛṛuḥ-iw ɣef yiqeddacen-iw ț-țqeddacin-iw, a d-ciren s wayen ara sen-d-țxebbiṛeɣ.
Deg igenni ad xedmeɣ leɛǧayeb, di lqaɛa a d-sekneɣ licaṛat yessewhamen : idammen, times d usigna n ddexxan.
Iṭij ad yuɣal d ṭṭlam, aggur ad yuɣal am idammen uqbel a d-yas wass n Sidi Ṛebbi ; ass-nni d ass ameqqran, yeččuṛen d lɛaḍima.
Imiren kra n win ineddhen s yisem n Sidi Ṛebbi ad ițțusellek.

Ay imdanen n wat Isṛail, ḥesset-ed mliḥ i wayen ara wen-d iniɣ : ɣef wayen yeɛnan Ɛisa anaṣari, teẓram akk belli Sidi Ṛebbi isbeggen ed tazmert-is mi gexdem zdat-wen lbeṛhanat, licaṛat d leɛǧubat, am akken i teẓram s yiman-nwen.
Akken yella si zik di leqsed n Sidi Ṛebbi ; argaz-agi tezzenzem-t, d kunwi i t-yenɣan mi t-tsellmem ger ifassen n ikafriwen i t-isemmṛen ɣef lluḥ.
Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yesseḥya t-id, isellek-it-id si tesraft n lmut axaṭer d lmuḥal a t-teṭṭef ɣuṛ-es.
Sidna Dawed yenna-d fell-as : Țwaliɣ kull ass Sidi Ṛebbi zdat-i axaṭer yețțili ɣer uyeffus-iw iwakken ur ɣelliɣ ara ;
daymi i gefṛeḥ wul-iw, i tcennu taɣect-iw ; ula d iɣsan-iw ad ṛtiḥen di laman ;
axaṭer ur iyi-tețțaǧǧaḍ ara di laxeṛt,ur tețțaǧaḍ ara win i k-iḍuɛen ad yerku deg uẓekka.
Teldiḍ-iyi iberdan n tudert ; ul-iw yeččuṛ d lfeṛḥ imi tețțiliḍ yid-i.
Ay atmaten ilaq-iyi a wen d-mmeslayeɣ ɛinani ɣef tideț yeɛnan jeddi-tneɣ Sidna Dawed. Teẓram belli yemmut, yețwamḍel, yerna aẓekka ines mazal-it ar ass-a gar-aneɣ.
Lameɛna imi d nnbi i gella, yeẓra belli Sidi Ṛebbi ad iṭṭef di lemɛahda i s-d-yefka mi s-d-yenna : D yiwen si tarwa-k ara sbeddeɣ d agellid deg wemkan-ik.
Ɣef ḥeggu n Lmasiḥ i d-icar mi d-yenna lehduṛ-agi ; axaṭer ț-țideț, ur t-yeǧǧi di laxeṛt, ur t-yeǧǧi ad yerku.+
Win ɣef i wen-d-țmeslayeɣ, d Ɛisa-agi i d-isseḥya Sidi Ṛebbi si ger lmegtin, aql-aɣ akk d inagan.
Mi gețwarfed ɣer uyeffus n Sidi Ṛebbi, yețțunefk-as Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i s-yewɛed Baba Ṛebbi, nețța ismar-it-id fell-aɣ ; d ayen i teslam, i twalam.
Mačči d Sidna Dawed i gulin ɣer igenni, axaṭer d nețța i d-yennan : Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-d i Ssid-iw :
Sṭef amkan n lḥekma ɣer uyeffus-iw alamma rriɣ iɛdawen-ik seddaw idaṛṛen-ik.+ +
Ilaq ihi at Isṛail meṛṛa ad ẓren s tideț belli Ɛisa-nni i tsemmṛem ɣef lluḥ, d nețța i gerra Sidi Ṛebbi d Agellid ameqqran, d Lmasiḥ.
Mi slan i wayen i d-yenna Buṭrus, lɣaci meṛṛa saxen wulawen-nsen, nnan i Buṭrus d ṛṛusul nniḍen : Ay atmaten, d acu ara nexdem ?
Buṭrus yerra-yasen : Tubet, beddlet tikli ! Mkul yiwen deg-wen ad yețwaɣḍes s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ iwakken a wen-țwasemmḥen ddnubat-nwen, yerna a wen-d yețțunefk Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.
Axaṭer lweɛd-agi n Sidi Ṛebbi, yețțunefk-ed i kunwi d warraw-nwen akk-d wid meṛṛa n leǧnas nniḍen iwumi ara d-issiwel Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ.
Buṭrus inehhu-ten s waṭas n yimeslayen nniḍen, iwakken ad amnen, yeqqaṛ-asen : Xḍut i lǧil-agi iɛewjen iwakken aț-țețțusellkem !
Wid iqeblen ayen i d-yenna Buṭrus, qeblen ad țwaɣedṣen. Ass-nni rnan-d wazal n tlata alaf n yemdanen i gumnen.
Seg imiren, zgan țnejmaɛen am atmaten iwakken ad slen i wselmed n ṛṛusul ; beṭṭun aɣṛum n usmekti n Lmasiḥ, yerna deɛɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi s yiwen n wul.
Tɛeǧǧben, tekcem-iten akk tugdi mi țwalin ṛṛusul xeddmen aṭas n lbeṛhanat d leɛǧayeb.
Wid akk yumnen, țɛicin s tdukli yerna beṭṭun wway gar-asen ayen akk sɛan.
Znuzun ayla-nsen meṛṛa, ayen akken i d-jemɛen, feṛqen-t wway gar-asen mkul yiwen ɣef leḥsab n wakken yeḥwaǧ.
Kull ass, s yiwen ṛṛay, țnejmaɛen di lǧameɛ iqedsen, țnejmaɛen daɣen deg ixxamen-nsen, beṭṭun aɣṛum iwakken ad mektin Lmasiḥ, tețțen lqut-nsen s nneya d lfeṛḥ ;
țḥemmiden Sidi Ṛebbi, imdanen meṛṛa țqadaṛen-ten ; Sidi Ṛebbi irennu-d kull ass ɣer tejmaɛt-nsen wid ițțusellken.
Aț-țili d leǧwahi n tlata n tmeddit, Buṭrus d Yuḥenna ddukklen, ulin ɣer lǧameɛ iqedsen iwakken ad dɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.

Țțawin-d mkul ass yiwen n wergaz i d-ilulen d aquḍar ɣer zdat n tewwurt n lǧameɛ, tin iwumi qqaṛen « tawwurt tucbiḥt »; yețɣimi dinna iwakken ad issuter tin n Ṛebbi i wid i gkeččmen ɣer lǧameɛ-nni.
Mi gwala Buṭrus d Yuḥenna țeddun ad kecmen, issuter-asen tin n Ṛebbi.
Buṭrus d Yuḥenna, ṛeṣṣan allen-nsen fell-as, nnan-as : Muqel-ed ɣuṛ-nneɣ !
Argaz-nni imuqel-iten, iḍmeɛ deg-sen a s-d-fken kra.
Dɣa Buṭrus yenna-yas : Ur sɛiɣ idrimen n lfeṭṭa, ur sɛiɣ wid n ddheb, lameɛna ayen sɛiɣ a k-t-fkeɣ : s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ anaṣari, ekker telḥuḍ !
Iṭṭef-it-id seg ufus ayeffus, issekker-it-id. Imiren kan iḍaṛṛen-is ț-țkeɛburin n idaṛṛen-is ḥlan.
Ibedd ɣef yidaṛṛen-is, ineggez, yebda ileḥḥu. Ikcem yid-sen ɣer lǧameɛ, ileḥḥu ițjellib, ițḥemmid Sidi Ṛebbi.
Lɣaci akk walan-t mi gleḥḥu ițḥemmid Sidi Ṛebbi.
Mi t-ɛeqlen qqaṛen : Mačči d win akken yețɣimin ɣer tewwurt tucbiḥt n lǧameɛ iqedsen win akken issuturen tin n Ṛebbi ? Dehcen meṛṛa, wehmen deg wayen yedṛan yid-es.
Argaz-nni iteddu d Buṭrus akk-d Yuḥenna, ur yeṭṭixiṛ ara fell-asen, lɣaci-nni meṛṛa wehmen, uzzlen-d ɣuṛ-sen ɣer usqif iwumi qqaṛen « Asqif n Sidna Sliman ».

Buṭrus mi gwala ayagi, yenṭeq ɣer lɣaci yenna : Ay at Isṛail, acuɣeṛ akka twehmem deg wayen yedṛan ? Acuɣeṛ i d-țmuqulem ɣuṛ-nneɣ, am akken d nukkni i gesselḥan argaz-agi s tezmert-nneɣ neɣ s ṭṭaɛa-nneɣ ?

D Sidi Ṛebbi Illu n Sidna Ibṛahim, n Isḥaq d Yeɛqub, Ṛebbi n lejdud-nneɣ, d nețța i d-isbeggnen lɛaḍima n Sidna Ɛisa aqeddac-is, win akken i tnekṛem, i tsellmem i lḥakem Bilaṭus i gebɣan a s-d-iserreḥ.
Kunwi tnekṛem win akken yellan d azedgan, d aḥeqqi ; tessutrem a d-serrḥen i bu tmegṛaḍ deg umkan-is.
Tenɣam Mmi-s n ugellid n tudert, meɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yesseḥya-t-id si ger lmegtin , aql-aɣ d inigan.
Ț-țazmert yellan deg isem n Sidna Ɛisa i d-yerran lǧehd i wergaz agi i tețwalim, yerna tessnem-t. D Sidna Ɛisa s wayes numen i t-isseḥlan zdat-wen meṛṛa.
Ay atmaten, ẓriɣ s lqella n lefhama i txedmem annect-nni, am kunwi am imeqranen-nwen.
Meɛna s wakka i gesnekmal Sidi Ṛebbi ayen i d-yenna si zik seg imawen n lenbiya meṛṛa : yenna-d belli Lmasiḥ-ines ad inɛețțab.
Ndemmet ihi, beddlet tikli iwakken ad mḥun ddnubat-nwen,
iwakken a kkun-id-asen wussan n ṛṛaḥa s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi, a wen-d iceggeɛ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, win akken i wen-ihegga.
Tura atan deg igenni alamma yusa-d lweqt i deg ara tuɣal txelqit meṛṛa ț-țajḍiṭ, akken i t-id-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi si zik seg imawen n lenbiya.
Sidna Musa yenna i wat Isṛail : Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nwen a wen-d iceggeɛ si ger watmaten-nwen,+ yiwen n nnbi am nekk, a s-tḥessem deg wayen akk ara wen-d-yini.+
Kra n win ur nețḥessis ara i nnbi-yagi, ad yețwakkes si ddunit ger watmaten-is.
Lenbiya meṛṛa, si zzman n nnbi Samwil d wid meṛṛa i d-yernan deffir-es, caren-d daɣen ɣef wussan agi i deg nețɛici.
D kunwi i d arraw n lenbiya, i d arraw n leɛqed-nni i gexdem Sidi Ṛebbi d lejdud-nneɣ, mi s-yenna i Sidna Ibṛahim : S dderya n dderya-k ara barkeɣ tiwaculin meṛṛa n ddunit+ .
I kunwi d imezwura iwumi i d iceggeɛ Sidi Ṛebbi aqeddac-is, isseḥya t-id iwakken a kkun-ibarek yerna a d-issebɛed mkul yiwen deg-wen seg yir n lecɣal-is.
Buṭrus d Yuḥenna mazal-iten heddṛen i lɣaci mi d-wwḍen kra n lmuqedmin, yedda-d yid-sen umeqqran n iɛessasen n lǧameɛ iqedsen akk-d kra n yergazen si tejmaɛt n isaduqiyen
Zeɛfen mi walan ṛṛusul sselmaden lɣaci yerna ssefhamen-ten ɣef ḥeggu n lmegtin qqaṛen-asen : -- Akken i d-yeḥya Sidna Ɛisa si ger lmegtin, akken daɣen ara d-ḥyun lmegtin.
Sṭfen-ten, rran-ten ɣer lḥebs armi d azekka-nni axaṭer imiren yeɣli-d yiḍ.
Lameɛna aṭas seg wid yeslan i wawal, umnen. Ad ilin azal n xemsa alaf n yemdanen i gumnen.
Azekka-nni, lḥukkam, lecyux akk-d lɛulama n ccariɛa yellan di temdint n Lquds, nnejmaɛen.
Yella lmuqeddem ameqqran ițusemman Hannan akk-d wid i s-yețțilin, ḥedṛen daɣen : Kayef, Yuḥenna d Alixandru.
Wwin-d Buṭrus d Yuḥenna, sbedden-ten di tlemmast-nsen akken a ten-beḥten, qqaṛen-asen : Ansi i wen-d-tekka tezmert-agi, anwa isem s wayes i tneddhem armi txedmem ayagi ?
Dɣa Buṭrus yeččuṛen d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, yenna-yasen :
A lḥukkam d lecyux n wat Isṛail ! Imi ɣef lxiṛ i nexdem i wergaz-agi aɛiban d wamek i geḥla i ɣ-d-testeqsayem ass-agi,

ilaq aț-țeẓrem kunwi d wat Isṛail meṛṛa, belli s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa anaṣari, win akken i tsemmṛem ɣef wumidag, win akken i d-yesseḥya Sidi Ṛebbi si ger lmegtin, s tezmert-is i gbedd wergaz agi tura zdat-wen yeḥla.
D nețța i ɣef d-nnant tira iqedsen : D azṛu-nni i tḍeggṛem kunwi ay ibennayen, i guɣalen d azṛu i geṭṭfen lebni. +
Deg-s i gella leslak ; ulac di ddunit meṛṛa isem nniḍen s wayes i nezmer a nețțusellek.
Mi walan belli Buṭrus d Yuḥenna heddṛen s laman mbla akukru, wehmen axaṭer ẓran d imdanen ur neɣṛi ara ; ɛeqlen-ten seg wid yeddan d Sidna Ɛisa.
Lameɛna imi walan argaz-nni yeḥlan ibedd zdat-sen, ur ufin d acu ara d-inin.
Umṛen-ten ad ffɣen seg unejmaɛ n ccṛeɛ iwakken ad mcawaṛen wway gar-asen,
nnan : D acu ara nexdem s yemdanen agi ? Imezdaɣ n temdint n Lquds akk wwin-d s lexbaṛ belli xedmen lbeṛhan yerna ț-țideț ur nezmir ara a nenkeṛ ayagi.
Lameɛna iwakken lexbaṛ-agi ur iteffeɣ ara ger lɣaci, a neggal deg-sen ur țțuɣalen ara ad mmeslayen ula i yiwen s yisem-agi.
Uɣalen ssawlen-asen, gullen deg-sen iwakken ur țțuɣalen ara ad mmeslayen neɣ ad slemden s yisem-agi n Ɛisa.
Lameɛna Buṭrus d Yuḥenna nnan-asen : D acu i d lḥeqq zdat Ṛebbi, a wen-naɣ awal i kunwi neɣ a naɣ awal i Sidi Ṛebbi ?
Walit s yiman nwen ! Nukni ur nezmir ara a nessusem ɣef wayen neẓra d wayen nesla.
Rnan gullen deg-sen, lameɛna serrḥen-asen imi ur d-ufin ara sebba s wayes ara ten-ɛaqben, yerna lɣaci akk țḥemmiden Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wayen yedṛan,
axaṭer argaz-agi i geḥlan s lbeṛhan di leɛmeṛ-is akteṛ n ṛebɛin iseggasen.
Mi sen-serrḥen, ṛuḥen ɣer watmaten, ḥkan-asen akk ayen i sen-d-nnan lmuqedmin imeqqranen d lecyux.
Mi slan watmaten-nni i wayen i d-yenna Buṭrus, akken ma llan serrḥen i taɣect-nsen, nedhen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi nnan : A Sidi Ṛebbi, kečč i gxelqen igenni, lqaɛa, lebḥeṛ d wayen akk yellan.
D kečč i d-ineṭqen s Ṛṛuḥ-ik iqedsen seg yimi n jeddi-tneɣ Dawed aqeddac-ik, mi d-yenna : Acuɣeṛ ccwal-agi ger leǧnas, acuɣeṛ igduden ggaren-d anagar yir ixemmimen ?
Igelliden n ddunit heggan iman nsen, imeqqranen ddukklen akk, ffɣen-d d iɛdawen n Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d Lmasiḥ-ines.
Axaṭer ț-țideț, di temdint-agi, Hiṛudus d Bilaṭus mcawaṛen, ddukklen nutni d ibeṛṛaniyen akk-d wat Isṛail, uɣalen d iɛdawen n Sidna Ɛisa imqeddes i textaṛeḍ d Lmasiḥ.
Ayen akka xedmen, d ayen akken i tqesdeḍ keččini di lebɣi-inek, s tezmert-ik, si zik.
I tura, a Sidi Ṛebbi, wali-d amek akka i ɣ ssaggaden ; efk-aɣ-d a Sidi Ṛebbi tazmert s wayes ara nbecceṛ awal-ik s ṭṭmana mbla akukru.
Ssers-ed afus-ik iwakken ad ḥlun imuḍan, iwakken a d-ilint licaṛat d lbeṛhanat s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa aqeddac-ik imqeddes.
Mi fukken taẓallit, amkan-nni anda nnejmaɛen yergagi ; ččuṛen akk s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, bdan țbecciṛen awal n Sidi Ṛebbi s ṭṭmana mbla tugdi.
Wid akk yumnen s Lmasiḥ, ddukklen akk s yiwen n wul, s yiwen n ṛṛuḥ, ula d yiwen deg-sen ur yeḥsib ayen yesɛa d ayla-s i yiman-is kan, meɛna cerken kullec wway gar-asen.
Ṛṛusul țcehhiden-d ɣef ḥeggu n Sidna Ɛisa s tezmert tameqqrant yerna ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi txeddem deg-sen s lǧehd.
Ulac gar-asen win ixuṣṣen ; wid akk yesɛan igran neɣ ixxamen zzenzen-ten,
idrimen-nni i d-țțawin deg-sen, țțawin-ten ɣer ifassen n ṛṛusul i ten-ifeṛṛqen i mkul yiwen ɣef leḥsab n wakken yeḥwaǧ.
Yusef illan n at Lewwi iwumi semman ṛṛusul Barnabas, ( yeɛni argaz inehhun ) i glulen di tegzirt n Qubṛus,
yesɛa yiwen n yiger, izzenz-it, yewwi-d idrimen-nni, yefka-ten i ṛṛusul.
Yiwen wergaz isem-is Ananyas, nețța ț-țmeṭṭut-is Safira zzenzen yiwen n weḥric seg wakal-nsen ; msefhamen ad kksen yiwen n umur si ssuma n lbiɛ-nni ;
amur nniḍen yewwi-t-id ɣer ifassen n ṛṛusul.

Buṭrus inṭeq ɣuṛ-es yenna : Ay Ananyas, acuɣeṛ i teǧǧiḍ Cciṭan yeččuṛ ul-ik ? Acuɣeṛ i teskadbeḍ i Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen mi tekkseḍ yiwen umur n yedrimen n wakal i tezzenzeḍ ? Uqbel a t- tezzenzeḍ, akal-nni yella d ayla-k !
Mi t-tezzenzeḍ, idrimen-nni daɣen d ayla-k ! Amek armi i teṣṣawḍed aț-țxeḍmeḍ yiwet lḥaǧa am tagi ? Ihi mačči i yemdanen iwumi teskadbeḍ, lameɛna i Sidi Ṛebbi !
Mi gesla i yimeslayen-nni, Ananyas yeɣli, yeffeɣ-it ṛṛuḥ, yemmut. Wid akk yellan dinna, ikcem-iten akk lxuf, țergigin.
Kkren ilmeẓyen kefnen-t, wwin-t a t-meḍlen.
Ɛeddant wazal n tlata sswayeɛ, mi d-tekcem tmeṭṭut n Ananyas, nețțat ur tesli ara s wayen yedṛan.
Buṭrus yenṭeq ɣuṛ-es yenna-yas : Ini-yi-d, ma s ssuma-yagi i tezzenzem akal-nwen ? Terra-yas-d : Ih, s ssuma-yagi i t-nezzenz.
Dɣa Buṭrus yenna-yas : Amek armi i temsefhamem iwakken aț-țjeṛṛbem Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi ? Wid imeḍlen argaz-im atnan ɣer tewwurt, a kkem-awin ula d kemm !
Imiren kan teɣli ɣer idaṛṛen-is yeffeɣ-iț ṛṛuḥ, temmut. Ilmeẓyen-nni mi d-kecmen ufan-ț-id temmut, wwin-ț meḍlen-ț ɣer tama n wergaz-is.
Yeɣli-d ṛṛɛac ( lxuf ) d ameqqran ɣef tejmaɛt n watmaten d wid akk yeslan s wayen yedṛan.
Aṭas n lbeṛhanat d lmuɛǧizat i xeddmen ṛṛusul ger lɣaci. Wid yumnen țnejmaɛen akk s yiwen ṛṛay deg wesqif n Sidna Sliman.
Lɣaci meṛṛa țcekkiṛen-ten meɛna kukran akk a d-rnun ɣuṛ-sen.
Leḥsab n yergazen ț-țilawin yumnen s Sidna Ɛisa yețzad irennu.
Țțawin-d imuḍan ɣer iberdan, srusun-ten ɣef tgertyal iwakken m'ara d-iɛeddi Buṭrus, ad innal yiwen seg-sen ulamma s tili-ines.
Lɣaci țțazzalen-d daɣen ula si temdinin nniḍen iqeṛben tamdint n Lquds ; țțawin-d imuḍan akk-d wid yețwazedɣen, ḥellun akken ma llan.
Ɣef ddemma n wayen ideṛṛun kkrent-asen-d tismin i lmuqeddem ameqqran akk-d isaduqiyen-nni yellan yid-es,
ṭṭfen ṛṛusul, rran-ten ɣer lḥebs n baylek.
Lameɛna deg yiḍ-nni, yiwen lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi yeldi tiwwura n lḥebs, issufeɣ-iten-id, yenna-yasen :
Ṛuḥet beccṛet di lǧameɛ iqedsen, slemdet i lɣaci awal n tudert.

Mi slan i wayen i sen-d-yenna lmelk-nni, ṛuḥen ṣṣbeḥ zik ɣer lǧameɛ iqedsen, bdan sselmaden. Ma d lmuqeddem ameqqran d wid akk yellan yid-es, snejmaɛen-d lecyux akk-d imeqqranen n wat Isṛail ɣer unejmaɛ n ccṛeɛ ; imiren ceggɛen a d-awin ṛṛusul-nni si lḥebs.
Mi wwḍen iɛessasen ɣer lḥebs, ur ten-ufin ara dinna ; uɣalen-d ɣer unejmaɛ, nnan-asen :
Nufa lḥebs isekkeṛ, iɛessasen bedden zdat n tewwurt, lameɛna mi nekcem, ur nufi ula d yiwen zdaxel.
Mi ten-yewweḍ lexbaṛ-agi, lqebṭan n lǧameɛ akk-d lmuqedmin imeqqranen ɛewqen ! Ur ẓrin ara ɣer wanda ara taweḍ temsalt-agi.
Iṛuḥ-ed ɣuṛ-sen yiwen yenna yasen : Irgazen-nni i terram ɣer lḥebs, atnan deg ufrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen yerna sselmaden lɣaci.
Lqebṭan n lǧameɛ d iɛessasen ṛuḥen wwin-ten-id lameɛna ḥudren ten axaṭer uggaden a ten-ṛejmen lɣaci.
Mi ten-id-wwin ɣer zdat usqamu n ccṛeɛ, lmuqeddem ameqqran isteqsa ten yenna-yasen :
Neggul deg-wen ur tețțuɣalem aț-țeslemdem s yisem-agi ; lameɛna kunwi tessufɣem aselmed nwen di temdint n Lquds meṛṛa ! Tura tebɣam a d-terrem ɣer yirawen nneɣ tamgeṛṭ n wergaz-agi !
Buṭrus d ṛṛusul nniḍen erran asen : Ilaq a naɣ awal i Sidi Ṛebbi, mačči i yemdanen !
Ṛebbi, Illu n lejdud-nneɣ yesseḥya-d Sidna Ɛisa, win akken i tenɣam, i tsemmṛem ɣef lluḥ.
D nețța i gessuli Sidi Ṛebbi ɣer uyeffus-is d Agellid, d Amsellek, iwakken a d-yefk i wat Isṛail leɛfu n ddnubat m'ara beddlen tikli.
Aql-aɣ d inagan ɣef wayagi, nukkni akk-d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi i wid i t-iḍuɛen.
Mi sen-slan, ikcem-iten wurrif d ameqqran armi bɣan a ten-nɣen.
Meɛna Gamalyel, yiwen n lɛalem n ccariɛa yellan d afarizi, ḥemmlen-t akk lɣaci ; ikker-ed deg unejmaɛ-nni, yefka lameṛ ad ssufɣen ṛṛusul-nni kra n lweqt.
Dɣa yenṭeq yenna : Ay at Isṛail, ḥadret iman-nwen ɣef wayen akka tebɣam a t-txedmem i yemdanen-agi !

Mmektit-ed, mačči aṭas aya ikker-ed yiwen yețțuseman Tudas yerran iman-is d ameqqran. Azal n ṛebɛa meyya n yergazen i ddan yid-es; asmi i t-nɣan, wid akk i geddan yid-es mfaṛaqen, ur d-yeqqim lateṛ-nsen.
Deffir Tudas, ikker-ed daɣen Yahuda ajlili di lweqt-nni n ujerred n wegdud ; aṭas daɣen n wid i geddan yid-es, meɛna ula d nețța mi gemmut, wid akk yeddan yid-es mfaṛaqen.
Ihi tura a wen-d-iniɣ : ur ceɣlet ara d yemdanen-agi, anfet-asen ad ṛuḥen. Ma yella aselmed-agi-nsen yekka-d s ɣuṛ-sen, ur yețdumu ara ;
ma yella s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi i d-ikka, ur tețțizmirem ara a t-tekksem ! Ḥadret iman-nwen ihi, neɣ m'ulac aț-țuɣalem d iɛdawen n Sidi Ṛebbi !
Mi mcawaṛen, uɣen ṛṛay-is. Uɣalen skecmen ṛṛusul-nni, fkan lameṛ a ten-wwten s iɛekkzan, rnan gullen deg-sen ur țțuɣalen ara ad mmeslayen s yisem-agi n Ɛisa, dɣa serrḥen-asen.
Mi d-ffɣen ṛṛusul seg unejmaɛ n ccṛeɛ, feṛḥen imi țwaḥesben d wid yuklalen ad țewten, ad țwaregmen ɣef ddemma n yisem n Sidna Ɛisa.
Dɣa kull ass sselmaden țbecciṛen di lǧameɛ iqedsen akk-d ixxamen, lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yeɛnan Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.

Deg ussan-nni, leḥsab n widak yumnen s Sidna Ɛisa yețzid irennu. At Isṛail i d-yusan si tmura nniḍen, yețmeslayen s tyunanit, ccetkan ɣef wat Isṛail yellan di tmurt, axaṭer m'ara feṛqen lmakla, ur d-țelhayen ara ț-țuǧǧal-nsen.
Tnac ṛṛusul-nni snejmaɛen-d inelmaden meṛṛa, nnan-asen : Mačči d lḥeqq a neǧǧ Awal n Sidi Ṛebbi di rrif iwakken a nelhi d wefṛaq n lqut i mkul yiwen.
Ihi ay atmaten, xtiṛet-ed si gar-awen sebɛa yergazen i deg sɛan laman yemdanen n tmurt meṛṛa, yeččuṛen d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen akk-d leɛqel, d nutni ara nwekkel ɣef ccɣel-agi.
Ma d nukkni, lweqt-nneɣ a t-nesɛeddi di tẓallit akk-d uselmed n wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi.

Tajmaɛt akk iɛeǧǧeb-as ṛṛay-agi. Kkren xtaṛen-d Stifan yellan d argaz yeččuṛen d liman akk-d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen. Xtaṛen daɣen Filbas, Brukurus, Nikanur, Timun, Barmenas, akk-d Nikulus n temdint n Antyuc, i gkecmen si zik di ddin n wat Isṛail.
Wwin-ten-id, sbedden-ten zdat n ṛṛusul. Ṛṛusul ssersen ifassen-nsen fell-asen, dɛan-asen s lxiṛ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.
Yuɣal, awal n Sidi Ṛebbi iffeɣ yețwassen, leḥsab n wid yumnen s Lmasiḥ yețzid irennu di temdint n Lquds yerna aṭas n lmuqedmin i gumnen, qeblen abrid n Lmasiḥ.
Stifan yeččuṛen d ṛṛeḥma ț-țezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi, ixeddem lbeṛhanat d leɛǧayeb timeqqranin ger lɣaci.
Kra n yemdanen n tejmaɛt n iḥeṛṛiyen i d-yusan si tmurt n Qiṛwan, si tmurt n Skandriya, si tmurt n Silisya akk-d wid i d-yusan si tmurt n Asya, usan-d ad mjadalen nutni d Stifan ;
lameɛna ur zmiren ara a t-ɣelben deg awal axaṭer ițmeslay s ṣṣwab d leɛqel i s-d-yefka Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.
Imiren fkan tajɛelt i kra n yergazen iwakken a d-inin : « Nesla yas yekfeṛ ɣef Sidna Musa akk-d Sidi Ṛebbi ! »
Sekkren ccwal ger lɣaci d lecyux akk-d lɛulama n ccariɛa , dɣa ṭṭfen Stifan ewwtent, wwin-t ɣer unejmaɛ n usqamu n ccṛeɛ.
Sbedden-d inigan i d-icehden fell-as s ẓẓur, nnan-d : Argaz-agi, yezga yekkat deg wemkan-agi iqedsen akk-d ccariɛa n Sidna Musa !
Nesla-yas mi geqqaṛ : « Ɛisa-nni Anaṣari, ad ihudd amkan agi yerna ad ibeddel lɛaddat i ɣ-d yeǧǧa Sidna Musa. »
Wid akk yellan deg unejmaɛ n ccṛeɛ, ṛeṣṣan allen-nsen ɣef Stifan ; țwalin udem-is am akken d udem n lmalayekkat.
Lmuqeddem ameqqran isteqsa Stifan yenna-yas : Ț-țideț wayen akka i d-nnan ?

Stifan yerra-yas : Ay atmaten, ay imɣaṛen n wat Isṛail, ḥesset-iyi-d ! Sidi Ṛebbi di lɛaḍima-s tameqqrant, yesbeggen-ed iman-is i jeddi-tneɣ Sidna Ibṛahim, mi gella di tmurt n Mizubuṭamya uqbel ad yezdeɣ di temdint n Haran.
Yenna-yas : Ffeɣ si tmurt-ik, si tmurt n imawlan-ik, tṛuḥeḍ ɣer tmurt ara k-d-ssekneɣ.
Iffeɣ ihi si tmurt n iqaldiyen, iṛuḥ ad izdeɣ di temdint n Haran. Mi gemmut baba-s, Sidi Ṛebbi yewwi-t-id ɣer tmurt-agi i deg tzedɣem tura.

Sidi Ṛebbi ur s-yefki ara di tmurt-agi ula d azal n terdast i deg ara yesres aḍar-is ; meɛna iwɛed-as a s-yefk tamurt-agi i nețța d dderya n dderya-s ɣas akken imiren mazal ur yesɛi ara dderya, Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-yas :
Dderya n dderya-k aț-țezdeɣ deg yiwet n tmurt tabeṛṛanit, dinna a ten-erren d aklan, ad sɛeddin fell-asen lḥif azal n ṛebɛa meyya iseggasen.
Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-d : Ad uɣalen a d-ffɣen si tmurt-nni, ad iyi-ɛebden deg wemkan-agi ; ma d lǧens-nni i ten-yerran d aklan, d nekk ara ten-iḥasben.

Dɣa Sidi Ṛebbi yefka-d i Sidna Ibṛahim leɛqed yeɛnan ṭṭhaṛa. S wakka, mi d-yesɛa mmi-s Isḥaq, Sidna Ibṛahim iṭeḥheṛ-as deg wass wis tmanya n tlalit-is. Isḥaq daɣen yexdem akken i mmi-s yeɛqub ; ula d Yeɛqub iṭeḥheṛ i tnac-nni warraw-is yellan d lejdud-nneɣ.
Ihi arraw-agi n yeɛqub usmen ɣef gma-tsen Yusef, kkren zenzen-t ɣer tmurt n Maṣer anda yuɣal d akli.

Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yella yid-es, ițsellik-it si tegnatin n ccedda ; issers-ed fell-as ṛṛeḥma yerna-yas-d leɛqel s wayes ara yeɛziz ɣer Ferɛun agellid n tmurt n Maṣeṛ. Ferɛun isbedd-it d lḥakem ɣef tmurt-is akk-d wexxam-is meṛṛa.
Yeɣli-d laẓ ɣef tmurt n Maṣeṛ akk ț-țmurt n Kenɛan, d lweqt n cedda tameqqrant ; lejdud-nneɣ ur ufin ara ayen ara ččen.
Mi gesla Yeɛqub belli llan yirden di tmurt n Maṣer, iceggeɛ ɣer dinna tikkelt tamezwarut, arraw-is yellan d lejdud-nneɣ.
Mi uɣalen tikkelt tis snat, Yusef isbeggen-ed iman-is ɣer watmaten-is, ɛeqlen-t d nețța. Yuɣal Ferɛun yeẓra laṣel n Yusef ansi-t.
Yusef iceggeɛ a d-awin baba-s Yeɛqub akk-d wat wexxam-is meṛṛa i gellan di xemsa usebɛin yid-sen.
Yeɛqub iṣubb ɣer tmurt n Maṣer ikemmel dinna ussan-is armi yemmut, am nețța am lejdud-nneɣ.
Wwin-d iɣsan-nsen ɣer taddart n Sicem, meḍlen-ten deg uẓekka i guɣ Sidna Ibṛahim s yedrimen ɣef warraw n Hamur n taddart n Sicem.
Mi d-yewweḍ lweqt i deg ara yedṛu wayen i gewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi i Sidna Ibṛahim s limin, agdud-nneɣ yufa-t-id lḥal innerna s waṭas di tmurt n Maṣer ;
imiren ikker-ed ugellid nniḍen ur nessin ara Yusef.
Agellid-nni iḥqeṛ lɣaci-nneɣ, yețqehhiṛ lejdud nneɣ, yeṣṣaweḍ armi i gefka lameṛ ad ǧǧen arraw-nsen i cceṛ akken kan ara d-lalen, iwakken ur țidiren ara.
Di lweqt-nni i d-ilul Sidna Musa ; icbeḥ yerna eɛziz ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi. Yețțuṛebba deg wexxam n imawlan-is tlata wagguren s tuffra ;
uɣalen rran-t zdaxel n tqecwalt, serrḥen-as deg wasif ; d yelli-s n Ferɛun i t-id-ijemɛen, tṛebba-t-id am mmi-s.
Ikker-ed ger imaṣriyen, yelmed akk tamusni-nsen ifazen. Yuɣal d argaz amusnaw, izewṛen ama deg yimeslayen ama di lecɣal.
Mi geṣṣaweḍ ṛebɛin iseggasen di leɛmeṛ-is, yemmekta-d atmaten-is at Isṛail, iṛuḥ ad iẓer acu n lḥala i deg țɛicin.
Yiwen wass iwala s wallen-is yiwen umaṣri ikkat yiwen seg wat Isṛail ; ikker a t-iḥudd, yerra-as-d țțar ; yewwet amaṣri-nni, yenɣa-t.
Yenwa ad fehmen watmaten-is belli s ufus-is ara ten-isellek Sidi Ṛebbi ; lameɛna nutni ur fhimen ara.
Azekka-nni iwala sin yergazen n wat Isṛail țnaɣen wway gar-asen, iger iman-is, yeɛṛed a ten-ifru, yenna-yasen : Eɛni mačči d atmaten i tellam ? Acimi i tețțnaɣem wway gar-awen ?
Lameɛna win akken iḍelmen wayeḍ idemmer Musa yenna-yas : Anwa i k-yerran d aqeṛṛuy neɣ d lḥakem fell-aɣ ?
Eɛni tebɣiḍ a yi-tenɣeḍ akken tenɣiḍ iḍelli amaṣri-nni ?
Ɣef ddemma n yimeslayen-agi Sidna Musa yerwel, iṛuḥ ad izdeɣ di tmurt n Madyan. Dinna i gesɛa sin n warrac.
Mi ɛeddan ṛebɛin n iseggasen, idheṛ-as-ed yiwen n lmelk deg yiwen uḥeǧǧaǧu n tmes iceɛlen deg inijel, mi gella deg unezṛuf n wedrar n Sinay.
Sidna Musa yewhem deg wayen yețwali ; akken kan iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-es, Sidi Ṛebbi yessawel-as-d seg uḥeǧǧaǧu-nni n tmes, yenna-yas-d :
D nekk i d Illu n lejdud-ik, d Illu n Ibṛahim, n Isḥaq akk-d Yeɛqub. Sidna Musa yeqqim ițergigi, yuggad ad yerfed ula d allen-is.
Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-yas : Kkes arkasen seg iḍaṛṛen-ik axaṭer amkan-agi anda tbeddeḍ d amkan iqedsen.
Walaɣ lbaṭel ideṛṛun d wegdud-iw di tmurt n Maṣer ; sliɣ-ed i unazeɛ-nsen ; ṣubbeɣ-d iwakken a ten-sellkeɣ. Ṛuḥ tura a k-ceggɛeɣ ɣer tmurt n Maṣeṛ.

Musa-nni i nekṛen m'akken i s-nnan : Anwa i k-yerran d amdebbar neɣ d lḥakem ? D nețța i d-iceggeɛ Sidi Ṛebbi d aqeṛṛuy, d amcafeɛ n wegdud ; s lemɛawna n lmelk i s-d-idehṛen deg udarnu ireqqen.
D nețța i ten-id-issufɣen si tmurt n Maṣer. Yexdem aṭas n lbeṛhanat d leɛǧayeb di tmurt-nni, di lebḥeṛ azeggaɣ, deg unezṛuf n Sinay, anda akken qqimen ṛebɛin iseggasen.
D nețța daɣen i gennan i wat Isṛail : Sidi Ṛebbi a wen-d-yefk si ger watmaten-nwen yiwen n nnbi am nekk.
Asm'akken i gennejmaɛ wegdud deg unezṛuf, d nețța iwumi d yemmeslay lmelk-nni deg wedrar n Sinay, d nețța iwumi d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi awal n tudert iwakken a ɣ-t-id issiweḍ.
Lameɛna lejdud-nneɣ ugin a s-aɣen awal ; ur t-qbilen ara axaṭer deg ulawen-nsen bɣan ad uɣalen ɣer tmurt n Maṣer.
Nnan i Haṛun gma-s n Sidna Musa : Xdem-aɣ-d iṛebbiten am wid n imaṣriyen, ara nezzwer zdat-nneɣ, axaṭer Musa-agi i ɣ-d-yessufɣen si tmurt n Maṣeṛ, ur neẓri ara d acu i gedṛan yid-es.
Dɣa deg ussan-nni, jemɛen-d ddheb, ssefsin-t xedmen yis yiwen ugenduz. Imiren zlan-as asfel, xedmen-as tameɣṛa, feṛḥen s wayen xedmen yifassen-nsen.

Sidi Ṛebbi yeṭṭaxeṛ fell-asen, yeǧǧa-ten ad ɛebden itran n yigenni , d ayen i guran di tektabt n lenbiya : Ay agdud n wat Isṛail, eɛni i nekk iwumi d-tefkam lewɛadi d iseflawen, di ṛebɛin iseggasen-nni i tesɛeddam deg unezṛuf ?
Xaṭi meɛna tbubbem aqiḍun n Mulux akk-d itri n Rufan i tḥesbem d iṛebbiten-nwen ;+ lmeṣnuɛat nni i txedmem iwakken a ten-tɛebdem ! Daymi ara kkun-nfuɣ ɣer lebɛid, akkin i temdint n Babilun !

Deg unezṛuf, lejdud-nneɣ sɛan aqiḍun i deg yella leɛqed n Sidi Ṛebbi ; aqiḍun-nni ițwaxedmen akken i s-t-id-yemla Sidi Ṛebbi i Sidna Musa mi s-d-yenna : Xdem-it am akken i t-twalaḍ di lemtel i k-d-ssekneɣ.

Mi d-yewweḍ uqiḍun-nni ɣer ifassen n lejdud-nneɣ , wwin-t-id yid-sen mi i ten-issekcem Yacuɛa ɣer tmurt-nni i sen-yewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi , mi ssufɣen imezdaɣ-is s tezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi. Aqiḍun-nni yeqqim dinna armi d zzman n Sidna Dawed.
Sidna Dawed eɛzizen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi, yedɛa ɣuṛ-es yenna : A Sidi Ṛebbi ! A Yillu n jeddi-tneɣ Yeɛqub ! Eǧǧ-iyi ad a k-bnuɣ lǧameɛ iqedsen ara yilin ț-țanezduɣt-ik !
Lameɛna d Sidna Sliman i s yebnan lǧameɛ-nni !
Ɣas akken Sidi Ṛebbi ɛlayen ur izeddeɣ ara deg ixxamen ițwabnan s ufus n wemdan, akken i d-yenna nnbi Iceɛya :
Igenni d amkan n lḥekma-w, ma d lqaɛa ț-țaḥsiṛt i ɣef srusuɣ idaṛṛen-iw. Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-d : Acu n wexxam i tzemrem a yi-tebnum, neɣ anda-t wemkan i deg zemreɣ ad steɛfuɣ ?
Eɛni mačči d afus-iw i d-ixelqen kullec ?
A wid isbeddayen iɛenqiqen nsen ! Tesɣaṛayem ulawen-nwen, tqeflem imeẓẓuɣen-nwen, tețțeddum di nneqma i Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen am kunwi am lejdud-nwen !
Anwa nnbi ur qhiṛen ara lejdud-nwen ? Nɣan wid akk ițbecciṛen si zik ɣef Uḥeqqi ara d-yasen ; tura d kunwi i t-ixedɛen yerna tenɣam-t.
Tewweḍ-ikkun-id ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi s ufus n lmalayekkat, lameɛna kunwi tugim a s-taɣem awal !
Mi slan i yemslayen-agi, lmuqedmin iffeɣ-iten leɛqel, qeṛcen tuɣmas-nsen fell-as.
Lameɛna Stifan yeččuṛen d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, yerfed allen-is ɣer igenni, iwala tamanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d Sidna Ɛisa ibedden ɣer uyeffus-is.
Imiren iɛeggeḍ, yenna : Atan țwaliɣ igenwan ldin, țwaliɣ Mmi-s n bunadem ibedd ɣer tama tayeffust n Ṛebbi !
Qeflen imeẓẓuɣen-nsen, bdan țɛeggiḍen, ẓedmen fell-as akken ma llan.
Zzuɣṛen-t beṛṛa n temdint, ṛejmen-t s iblaḍen iwakken a t-nɣen. Inigan ǧǧan leḥwayeǧ-nsen ɣer yiwen ilemẓi isem-is Caɛul, iwakken a ten-iɛas.
M'akken i t-ṛeǧmen, Stifan ideɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi yeqqaṛ : A Sidna Ɛisa, atan ṛṛuḥ-iw ger ifassen-ik !
Imiren yeɣli ɣef tgecrar, iɛeggeḍ s lǧehd-is : A baba Ṛebbi ur ten-țḥasab ara ɣef ddnub-agi ! Akken kan i d-yenna imeslayen agi, iffeɣ-it ṛṛuḥ.

Caɛul, d yiwen seg wid iqeblen lmut n Stifan. Ass-nni kkren-d wid ibdan țqehhiṛen tajmaɛt n wid yețțamnen s Lmasiḥ yellan di temdint n Lquds. Wid akk yumnen s Lmasiḥ rewlen ɣer tudrin n tmurt n Yahuda armi ț-țamurt n Samarya ; anagar ṛṛusul i d-yeqqimen di temdint n Lquds.
Kra yergazen iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi, wwin-d Stifan meḍlen-t, ḥeznen aṭas, țrun fell-as.
Ma d Caɛul ixeddem akk lmejhud-is iwakken ad ihudd tajmaɛt n wid yumnen s Sidna Ɛisa ; issufuɣ ed seg ixxamen-nsen, irgazen ț-țilawin yumnen s Lmasiḥ, issekcam iten ɣer lḥebs.
Ihi wid akk i grewlen, mfaṛaqen, țṛuḥun seg wemkan ɣer wayeḍ, țbecciṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Filbas iṣubb ɣer temdint n Samarya, ibecceṛ dinna lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yeɛnan Lmasiḥ.
Lɣaci meṛṛa rran ddehn-nsen ɣer Filbas, mi slan i wayen i d-yeqqaṛ yerna walan lbeṛhanat i gxeddem ;
axaṭer leǧnun țeffɣen s leɛyaḍ seg waṭas n yemdanen ițțumelken, aṭas daɣen n iquḍaṛen akk-d wid ikerfen i geḥlan.
Dɣa imezdaɣ n temdint-nni meṛṛa feṛḥen mačči d kra.
Yuɣ lḥal di temdint-nni yella yiwen wergaz isem-is Semɛun, issewham imezdaɣ n tmurt n Samarya s ssḥur i gxeddem ; iḥețțeb iman-is d win yesɛan tazmert.
Imdanen akk am umeẓyan am umeqqran, țțaran ddehn-nsen ɣuṛ-es qqaṛen : « Argaz-agi ț-țazmert n Ṛebbi s yiman-is ; ț-țazmert-nni iwumi neqqaṛ tazmert yessewhamen ! »
Țțamnen yis axaṭer si zik i ten-issewham s ssḥur i gxeddem ;
lameɛna, asmi umnen s wayen i sen-ibecceṛ Filbas ɣef wayen yeɛnan tagelda n Sidi Ṛebbi d yisem n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, usan-d akk ad țwaɣeḍsen deg waman am yergazen am tlawin.
Semɛun s yiman-is yumen ; ula d nețța yețwaɣḍes deg waman, seg wass-nni ur yettixiṛ ara ɣef Filbas ; ițțawham deg-s mi gețwali leɛǧayeb d lbeṛhanat timeqqranin i gxeddem.
Mi slan belli lɣaci n tmurt n Samarya qeblen awal n Sidi Ṛebbi, ṛṛusul yeqqimen di temdint n Lquds ceggɛen-asen Buṭrus d Yuḥenna.
Mi wwḍen ɣuṛ-sen, dɛan fell asen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken a sen-d-yefk Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ;
axaṭer mazal ur d-iris ula ɣef yiwen deg-sen, țwaɣeḍsen kan deg aman s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa.
Buṭrus akk-d Yuḥenna ssersen ifassen-nsen fell-asen, dɣa yețțunefk asen-d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.
Mi gwala Semɛun yețțunefk-ed Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i lɣaci imi ssersen ṛṛusul ifassen-nsen fell-asen, yewwi-yasen-d idrimen yenna-yasen :
Ffket-iyi ula d nekk tazmert agi iwakken kra n win i ɣef ara sserseɣ ifassen-iw, a t-ikcem Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.
Lameɛna Buṭrus yenna-yas : Ad negren yedrimen-ik ad glun yis-ek imi tɣileḍ Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen n Sidi Ṛebbi yețnuzu s idrimen !
Ul-ik ur yeṣfi ara ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi ! Ur k-id-iṣaḥ umur, ur tesɛiḍ lweṛt di ccɣel-agi.
Endem di yir ṛṛay-ik, tedɛuḍ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken ma yella wamek, a k-yeɛfu ɣef yir axemmem-agi i d-yeffɣen seg ul-ik !
Atan walaɣ teččuṛeḍ d ddɣel, imlek-ik lbaṭel !
Semɛun yerra-yasen : Dɛut kunwi s yiman-nwen fell-i ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken ur d-ideṛṛu ara yid-i wayen akka i d-tennam.
Buṭrus d Yuḥenna kemmlen cehden ɣef Sidna Ɛisa, beccṛen awal n Sidi Ṛebbi, mbeɛd uɣalen ɣer temdint n Lquds. Deg webrid-nsen, țbecciṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ deg waṭas n tudrin n tmurt n Samarya.
Yiwen lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi inṭeq-ed ɣer Filbas yenna-yas : Kker, ṛuḥ ɣer lǧiha n usammer, ɛeddi seg webrid-nni yexlan i gețṣubbun si temdint n Lquds ɣer tmurt n Ɣaza.

Ikker, iṛuḥ. Immuger-ed deg webrid yiwen n wergaz, d aneɣlaf n Kendyas tagellit n tmurt n Ityubya ; d nețța i d lewkil ɣef lmelk-is meṛṛa , lameɛna d argaz ur nesɛi ddunit ; yusa-d ɣer temdint n Lquds iwakken ad iɛbed Sidi Ṛebbi.
Mi gțeddu ɣef tkeṛṛust-is iwakken ad yuɣal ɣer wexxam-is, yufa-t-id lḥal yeqqaṛ di tektabt n nnbi Iceɛya.
Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yenna i Filbas : Ṛuḥ qeṛṛeb ɣer tkeṛṛust-ihina.
Filbas yuzzel ɣuṛ-es, yesla i uneɣlaf-nni n tmurt n Ityubya yeqqaṛ di tektabt n nnbi Iceɛya. Yenna-yas : Tfehmeḍ ayen akka i teqqaṛeḍ ?
Yerra-yas : Amek ara fehmeɣ ma ulac win ara yi-d-isfehmen ? Dɣa yesserkeb-ed Filbas ɣer tama-s.
Atah wayen akken yella yeqqaṛ di tektabt-nni : Am izimer m'ara t-awin a t-zlun, am tixsi iggugmen zdat win i ț-ițellsen, ur d-yeldi imi-is.
Yețwaḥqeṛ, ițwačč lḥeqq-is ! Anwa ara d-yeḥkun ɣef wayen yedṛan di lǧil-ines ? Anwa ara d-yeḥkun ɣef tudert-is yețwakksen si ddunit ?
Aneɣlaf-nni yenna-yas i Filbas : Di leɛnaya-k ssefhem-iyi-d ɣef wanwa i d-ițmeslay nnbi-yagi, ɣef yiman-is neɣ ɣef wayeḍ ?
Dɣa Filbas s wawal-agi i gebda a s-ițbecciṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yeɛnan Sidna Ɛisa.
Mi teddun deg webrid-nsen, wwḍen ɣer yiwen wemkan i deg llan waman. Aneɣlaf-nni yenna-yas : Atnan waman ! D acu ara yi-d iḥebsen iwakken ad țwaɣedṣeɣ ?
Filbas yenna-yas : Ma tumneḍ seg ul-ik, tzemreḍ aț-tețwaɣeḍseḍ. Aneɣlaf-nni yerra-yas : Umneɣ belli Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi.
Imiren yumeṛ ad ḥebsen takeṛṛust-is. Filbas d uneɣlaf-nni rsen-d, kecmen i sin ɣer waman, dɣa Filbas isseɣḍes-it.
Mi d-ffɣen seg waman, Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi yerfed Filbas, yexfa ger wallen uneɣlaf-nni. Aneɣlaf-nni ikemmel abrid-is s lfeṛḥ ;
ma d Filbas yufa-d iman-is di temdint n Acdud ; syenna ikemmel abrid-is, ițeddu ițbecciṛ awal n tudert di tudrin meṛṛa i ɣef iɛedda, armi i gewweḍ ɣer temdint n Qiṣarya.
Caɛul mazal ițqehhiṛ inelmaden n Sidna Ɛisa, ițgalla deg-sen a ten-ineɣ. Iṛuḥ ɣer lmuqeddem ameqqran,

issuter-as a s-d-ixdem lkaɣeḍ ara yawi ɣer leǧwameɛ meṛṛa n temdint n Dimecq, iwakken ma yufa deg-sen wid ittabaɛen abrid n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, ama d argaz ama ț-țameṭṭut, a ten-id-yawi țwarzen ɣer temdint n Lquds.
Yella iteddu deg webrid, qṛib ad yaweḍ ɣer temdint n Dimecq. Taswiɛt kan, tekka-d yiwet n tafat seg igenni tfeǧǧeǧ-ed fell-as, tezzi yas-d.
Yeɣli ɣer lqaɛa, yesla i yiwen n ṣṣut i s-d-yeqqaṛen : Caɛul ! A Caɛul ! Acuɣeṛ i yi tețqehhiṛeḍ ?
Yenna-yas : Anwa-k a Sidi ? Sṣut-nni yerra-yas-d : D nekk i d Ɛisa, win akken i tețqehhiṛeḍ !
Kker fell-ak ! Ṛuḥ ɣer temdint n Dimecq, dinna ara k-d-inin acu ara txedmeḍ.
Irgazen i geddan yid-es bedden, dehcen, ggugmen ; slan i taɣect-nni lameɛna ur walan ula d yiwen.
Caɛul ikker-ed si lqaɛa, ɣas akken ldint wallen-is, ur yețwali ara. Sṭfen-as afus, wwin-t ɣer temdint n Dimecq.
Yeqqim tlata wussan ur iwala, ur ičči, ur yeswi. Caɛul yumen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ
Di temdint n Dimecq, yella yiwen unelmad isem-is Ananyas ; Sidi Ṛebbi yessawel-as-d deg uweḥḥi, Ananyas yerra-yas : Aql-iyi a Sidi.
Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-yas : Kker tṛuḥeḍ ɣer webrid ițusemman « Abrid ayeffus », ɣer wexxam n Yuda ; dinna steqsi ɣef yiwen wergaz isem-is Caɛul n temdint n Sars. Atan ideɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi,
yețwali deg uweḥḥi ikcem ɣuṛ-es yiwen wergaz isem-is Ananyas, yessers ifassen-is fell-as iwakken a t-id-yuɣal yeẓri.
Ananyas yerra-yas : A Sidi, acḥal n yemdanen i d yeḥkan fell-as ițqehhiṛ inelmaden-ik imqedsen di temdint n Lquds !
Yusa-d ɣer dagi daɣen s țțesriḥ n lmuqedmin imeqqranen iwakken ad yerr ɣer lḥebs wid akk ineddhen s yisem-ik.
Lameɛna Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ṛuḥ, axaṭer argaz-agi d nekk i t-yextaṛen iwakken ad ibecceṛ isem-iw i wat Isṛail, i leǧnas nniḍen akk-d igelliden-nsen.
Yerna a s ssekneɣ acḥal ara yeɛteb ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw.

Ananyas iṛuḥ ; mi gewweḍ ɣer wexxam-nni, yessers ifassen-is ɣef Caɛul yenna-yas : A Caɛul a gma, d Sidna Ɛisa-nni i k-d-iḍehṛen deg-webrid ansi i d-tusiḍ, i yi-d-iceggɛen iwakken a k-id-yuɣal yeẓri yerna aț-țeččaṛeḍ d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.
Imiren kan ɣlin-d seg wallen-is am akken d iqecṛan, dɣa yuɣal-it-id yeẓri ; yekker, yețwaɣḍes.
Mi gečča, yuɣal-it-id lǧehd ; isɛedda kra wussan ɣer inelmaden i gellan di temdint n Dimecq.
Ur iɛeṭṭel ara, yebda yețbecciṛ di leǧwameɛ n wat Isṛail belli Sidna Ɛisa d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi.

Wid akk i s isellen, wehmen qqaṛen : Eɛni mačči d win akken i gețqehhiṛen di temdint n Lquds wid ineddhen s yisem-agi n Ɛisa ? Eɛni ur d-yusi ara ɣer dagi iwakken a ten-yawi țwarzen ɣer lmuqedmin imeqqranen ?
Lameɛna Caɛul simmal yețnerni di liman ; isseɛweq at Isṛail izedɣen di temdint n Dimecq mi sen-d-ițbeggin belli d Ɛisa i d Lmasiḥ.
Mi Ɛeddan kra wussan, at Isṛail mcawaṛen akken a t-nɣen ;
lameɛna Caɛul yesla s txazabit i bɣan a s xedmen, am yiḍ am ass țɛassan ula ț-țiwura n temdint iwakken a t-nɣen.
Yiwen yiḍ, inelmaden gren-t zdaxel n uqecwal, ṣubben-t-id si ṣṣuṛ i d-izzin i temdint.
Mi i d-yusa ɣer temdint n Lquds, Caɛul inuda ɣef yinelmaden, lameɛna kukran-t akk axaṭer ur uminen ara belli yuɣal d anelmad n Sidna Ɛisa.
Dɣa Barnabas yewwi-t ɣer ṛṛusul, yeḥka-yasen amek i s-d-iban Sidna Ɛisa deg webrid, amek i s-d-ihḍeṛ d wamek i gbecceṛ s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa ɛinani mbla akukru di temdint n Dimecq.
Seg imiren yețṛuḥu yețțuɣal yid-sen di temdint n Lquds, yețbecciṛ ɛinani s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa.
Iheddeṛ daɣen nețța d wat Isṛail i d-yusan si tmura i gețmeslayen tayunanit, yețțemjadal yid-sen, meɛna ula d nutni țqelliben a t-nɣen.
Mi slan watmaten s wannect-agi, srewlen-t ɣer temdint n Qiṣarya iwakken ad iṛuḥ syenna ɣer temdint n Sars.
Tajmaɛt n watmaten yellan di tmura n Yahuda d Jlili akk-d Samarya tethenna, tețțimɣuṛ di liman, tețțeddu s tugdi n Sidi Ṛebbi, tețnerni s lemɛawna n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.
Buṭrus i d-inudan tijmaɛin meṛṛa, iṛuḥ daɣen ɣer watmaten izedɣen di temdint n Lud.
Yufa dinna yiwen wergaz isem-is Inyas ; argaz-agi tmanya iseggasen nețța deg usu axaṭer ikref.
Yenṭeq ɣuṛ-es Buṭrus yenna-yas : Ay Inyas ! Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yesseḥla- k ! Kker fell-ak tekkseḍ usu-inek ! Imiren kan yekker.
Mi t-walan yeḥla, imezdaɣ akk n temdint n Lud d wid n uzaɣaṛ n tmurt n Sarun beddlen tikli, qeblen abrid n Sidna Ɛisa.
Di temdint n Jafa, tella yiwet n tmeṭṭut isem-is Tabita ; tețseddiq, tețɛawan igellilen.
Di lweqt-nni, yeɣli-d fell-as lehlak dɣa temmut. Ssarden-ț, ssersen-ț di tɣuṛfeț.
Mi slan inelmaden belli Buṭrus di temdint n Jafa i gella, yerna ț-țamdint ur nebɛid ara ɣef temdint n Lud, ceggɛen ɣuṛ-es sin yergazen iwakken a t-ḥellelen a d-yas ɣuṛ-sen s lemɣawla.
Buṭrus ikker yedda yid-sen imiren kan. Mi gewweḍ, ssulin-t ɣer tɣuṛfeț-nni. Tuǧǧal akk țrunt, zzint-as-d i Buṭrus, sseknent-as-d tiqendyaṛ d ibeṛnyas i tzeṭṭ Durka uqbel aț-țemmet.
Buṭrus issufeɣ ɣer beṛṛa wid akk yellan dinna, yeqqim ɣef tgecrar, yedɛa ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi ; izzi ɣer lmegget-nni yenna-yas : Tabita, ekker ! Dɣa teldi-d allen-is, twala-d Buṭrus, imiren teqqim-ed.
Buṭrus yefka-yas afus-is iskker-iț-id, dɣa issawel i inelmaden nni akk-d tuǧǧal, ufan-ț-id tedder.
Imezdaɣ meṛṛa n temdint n Jafa slan s wayen yedṛan, daymi aṭas i gumnen s Sidna Ɛisa.
Buṭrus yeqqim kra n wussan di temdint n Jafa, ɣer yiwen wergaz isem-is Semɛun, d axeddam deg uɣerruz ( aglim ).
Di temdint n Qiṣarya, yella yiwen wergaz iwumi qqaṛen Kurnilyus, d lqebṭan n yiwet n terbaɛt isem-is « tarbaɛt n Selyan ».
Am nețța am wexxam-is ḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi ; ițseddiq i igellilen, yerna am iḍ am ass yezga ideɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.
Yiwen wass, leǧwahi n tlata n tmeddit, iweḥḥa-yas-ed Sidi Ṛebbi, iwala yiwen lmelk ikcem-ed ɣuṛ-es yenna-yas-d : A Kurnilyus !
Kurnilyus yerfed allen-is ɣuṛ-es, tekcem-it tugdi, ițergigi, yerra-yas : D acu, a Sidi ? Lmelk yenna-yas-d : Sidi Ṛebbi yeqbel taẓallit-ik akk-d lewɛadi i tețțakeḍ i imeɣban ;
Tura ceggeɛ irgazen ɣer temdint n Jafa, ɣer Semɛun, win iwumi qqaṛen Butṛus, iwakken a d-yas.
A t-tafeḍ ɣer yiwen wergaz i gxeddmen deg uɣerruz, ula d nețța isem-is Semɛun ; axxam-is yezga-d ɣef rrif n lebḥeṛ.
Mi gṛuḥ lmelk-nni i s-d-ihedṛen, Kurnilyus yessawel i sin seg iqeddacen-is akk-d yiwen uɛeskṛi n terbɛat-is i gellan d argaz iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi.
iḥka-yasen-d ayen akk yedṛan; dɣa iceggeɛ-iten ɣer temdint n Jafa.
Azekka-nni, mi qṛib ad awḍen wid i gceggeɛ Kurnilyus ɣer temdint n Jafa, Buṭrus yuɣ-it lḥal yuli ɣef ssḍeḥ iwakken ad idɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi, aț-țili d leǧwahi n tnac n wass,
yeṭṭef-it laẓ yebɣa ad yečč. Llan țheggin-as-ed lqut, taswiɛt kan iweḥḥa-yas-ed Sidi Ṛebbi ;
iwala igenni yeldi, yiwet lḥaǧa icuban ɣer tẓeṛbit tameqqrant icudden si ṛebɛa tɣemmaṛ, tețṣubbu-d ɣer lqaɛa.
Llan deg-s lewḥuc at ṛebɛa idaṛṛen n mkul ṣṣifa, wid iteddun ɣef wuɛebbuḍ, akk-d yefṛax n igenni s mkul ṣṣifa.
Yesla i yiwen n ṣṣut yenna yas-d : A Buṭrus, ekker ! Ezlu teččeḍ !
Lameɛna Butṛus yenna-yas : Ala a Sidi, di leɛmeṛ-iw ur ččiɣ ayen iḥeṛmen neɣ ayen ur neṣfi.
Sṣut-nni inṭeq-ed tikkelt tis snat yenna-yas-d : Ayen iḥseb Sidi Ṛebbi d leḥlal, ur k-id-iṣaḥ ara a t-tḥesbeḍ d leḥṛam !
Ayagi, iweḥḥa-yas-t-id Sidi Ṛebbi tlata n tikkal ; imiren kan, lḥaǧa-nni tețwarfed ɣer igenni.
Akken mazal Buṭrus yețxemmim ɣef lmeɛna n uweḥḥi-nni, wwḍen-d yergazen-nni i d-iceggeɛ Kurnilyus steqsayen ɣef wexxam n Semɛun.
Mi d-wwḍen ɣer tewwurt, ssawlen, steqsan ma deg wexxam-nni i gețțili Semɛun iwumi qqaṛen Butṛus.
Mazal Buṭrus ițxemmim ɣef wuweḥḥi-nni, mi s-d-yenna Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen : Atnaya tlata yergazen țnadin fell-ak.
Ur țkukru ara, kker, ddu yid-sen axaṭer d nekk i ten-id iceggɛen.
Butṛus iṣubb-ed ɣuṛ-sen, yenna yasen : Aql-i ! D nekk i d Buṭrus ! D acu akka i kkun-id-yewwin ɣuṛ-i ?

Nutni rran-as : D lqebṭan-nneɣ Kurnilyus, i ɣ-d iceggɛen ɣuṛ-ek ! D argaz țcekkiṛen akk wat Isṛail yerna ḥemmlen-t axaṭer d amdan aḥeqqi iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi. Ibedd-ed ɣuṛ-es lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-yas-d a d-iceggeɛ ɣuṛ-ek, a d-taseḍ ɣer wexxam-is iwakken ad isel i wayen i tesɛiḍ a s-t-id-tiniḍ.
Buṭrus issekcem-iten ad nsen ɣuṛ-es. Azekka-nni ikker yedda yid-sen nețța d kra n watmaten n Jafa.
Sellazekka-nni, wwḍen ɣer temdint n Qiṣarya. Kurnilyus yețṛaǧu ten deg wexxam-is nețța d leḥbab-is akk-d imawlan-is i d-yeɛṛeḍ.
Akken iteddu Butṛus ad yekcem, immuger-it-id Kurnilyus ɣer tewwurt n wefrag, yeɣli ɣer idaṛṛen-is, yekna zdat-es iwakken ad isṭerḥeb yis s leqdeṛ ameqqran.
Meɛna Butṛus issekker-it-id yenna-yas : Kker fell-ak ! D amdan am kečč i lliɣ.
Leḥḥun, țmeslayen armi kecmen ɣer wexxam, yufa dinna aṭas n yemdanen i gennejmaɛen.

Buṭrus yenna-yasen : Yak teẓram d leḥṛam i wemdan n wat Isṛail ad ixaleḍ abeṛṛani neɣ ad ikcem ɣer wexxam-is. Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yessefhem-iyi-d belli ur ilaq ara a d-nini ɣef walebɛaḍ belli ur zeddig ara neɣ ur iṣfi ara ;
daymi i qebleɣ a d-aseɣ mi yi-d-tessawlem. Init-iyi-d tura sebba ɣef wacu i d-tceggɛem ɣuṛ-i.
Kurnilyus yerra-yas : Ṛebɛa wussan aya, leǧwahi n tlata n tmeddit, lliɣ deɛɛuɣ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi deg wexxam-iw ; ataya ibedd-ed zdat-i yiwen wergaz s llebsa yețfeǧǧiǧen,
yenna-yi-d : « A Kurnilyus ! Sidi Ṛebbi yeqbel taẓallit-ik akk-d lewɛadi i tețțakeḍ i igellilen.
Ceggeɛ ɣer temdint n Jafa ɣerSemɛun ițusemman Butṛus iwakken a d-yas ; a t-tafeḍ ɣer yiwen i gxeddmen igelman, ula d nețța isem-is Semɛun ; axxam-is yezga-d ɣef rrif n lebḥeṛ.
Imiren ceggɛeɣ-en ɣuṛ-ek ; tanemmirt-ik imi d-tusiḍ. Tura ihi aql-aɣ akk dagi zdat Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken a nsel s ɣuṛ-ek, ayen akk i k-d-yumeṛ Sidi Ṛebbi a ɣ-t-id-tiniḍ.
Butṛus yebda ameslay yenna : Armi ț-țura i fehmeɣ belli ț-țideț, Sidi Ṛebbi ur ixeddem ara lxilaf ger yemdanen.

Lameɛna di mkul lǧens, yal amdan i t-yețḍuɛun, ixeddmen ayen yellan d lḥeqq, iɛǧeb-as i Ṛebbi i gellan d Illu n yemdanen meṛṛa ; teslam belli iceggeɛ-ed awal-is i wat Isṛail, ibecceṛ-asen-d lehna s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Ahat teslam s wayen yedṛan di tmurt n Yahuda meṛṛa ; yebda-d si tmurt n Jlili seg wasmi ițbecciṛ Yeḥya aɣeṭṭas, aɣḍas n waman.

Teslam s Ɛisa Anaṣari amek i t-iččuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi s tezmert akk-d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, amek i gteddu seg umkan ɣer wayeḍ, ixeddem lxiṛ, amek isseḥlay wid akk i gemlek Cciṭan, axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi ițțili yid-es.
Aql-aɣ d inigan n wayen akk i gexdem di tmurt n wat Isṛail ț-țemdint n Lquds anda i t-nɣan mi t-semmṛen ɣef wumidag,
meɛna ass wis tlata Sidi Ṛebbi isseḥya-t-id si ger lmegtin ; yefka-yas tazmert s wayes i d-isbeggen iman-is,
mačči i yemdanen meṛṛa meɛna i nukkni kan i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi a nili d inagan-is ; nukkni yeččan, yeswan yid-es mi d-iḥya si ger lmegtin.
