Axaṭer argaz ur numin ara s Lmasiḥ yella seddaw leɛnaya n Sidi Ṛebbi s tmeṭṭut-is yumnen ; daɣen tameṭṭut ur numin ara s Lmasiḥ, tella seddaw leɛnaya n Sidi Ṛebbi s wergaz-is yumnen ; neɣ m'ulac dderya-nsen ad țwaḥesben d dderya n leḥṛam nutni yellan d dderya n leḥlal.

Ma yella win ur numin ara s Lmasiḥ yebɣa ad imfaṛaq akk-d tmeṭṭut-is i gumnen, neɣ tameṭṭut ur numin ara s Lmasiḥ tebɣa aț-țemfaṛaq akk-d wergaz-is i gumnen, zemren ad mfaṛaqen ; argaz-nni neɣ tameṭṭut-nni yellan d imasiḥiyen ur d-yeqqim wayen i ten-icerken, axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi yessawel aɣ-d iwakken a nɛic di lehna.
Yerna amek i teẓriḍ kemm a tameṭṭut tamasiḥit belli tzemṛeḍ aț-țselkeḍ argaz-im ? Neɣ amek i teẓriḍ kečč ay argaz amasiḥi belli tzemreḍ aț-țselkeḍ tameṭṭut-ik ?
Ilaq yal yiwen ad yelḥu s wayen i s-d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi, yerna ad yeqqim di lḥala i deg yella asmi i s-d-yessawel. Akka i țweṣṣiɣ tijmuyaɛ n watmaten meṛṛa.
Ma yella walebɛaḍ yuɣ-it lḥal yexten mi s-d-yessawel Sidi Ṛebbi, ilaq ad yeqqim akken yella ; ma yella walebɛaḍ ur yextin ara asmi i s-d-yessawel Sidi Ṛebbi, ur ilaq ara ad yexten.
Yexten walebɛaḍ neɣ ur yextin ara ulac deg-s ; ayen yesɛan azal d ṭṭaɛa n lumuṛat n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ilaq yal yiwen ad iqqim akken i t-id-yufa lḥal asmi i s-d-yessawel Sidi Ṛebbi.
D akli i telliḍ asmi i k-d yessawel Sidi Ṛebbi ? Ur țxemmim ara, meɛna ma tusa-yak-ed teswiɛt i deg tzemreḍ aț-țesɛuḍ tilelli, faṛes-iț.
Axaṭer akli iwumi d-yessawel Sidi Ṛebbi yuɣal d win yesɛan tilelli ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi ; daɣen amdan aḥuṛṛi iwumi d-yessawel Sidi Ṛebbi yuɣal d akli n Lmasiḥ.
Yella win ixelṣen fell-awen iwakken aț-țilim d iḥuṛṛiyen, ihi ur țțuɣalet ara d aklan n yemdanen.
Ihi ay atmaten, ilaq yal yiwen ad yeqqim zdat Ṛebbi di lḥala i deg yella asmi s-d-yessawel.
Ɣef wayen yeɛnan wid ur nezwiǧ ara, Sidi Ṛebbi ur d-yenni kra fell-asen, meɛna a wen-d-fkeɣ ṛṛay-iw, nekk yerra Sidi Ṛebbi s ṛṛeḥma-ines tameqqrant d argaz yuklalen lețkal.
Ɣuṛ-i d ayen yelhan i wergaz ma yeqqim akken yella ɣef ddemma n lweqt-agi iweɛṛen.
Ma txeḍbeḍ tameṭṭut, ur țnadi ara a ț-teǧǧeḍ ; m'ur tezwiǧeḍ ara, ur țnadi ara aț-țzewǧeḍ.
Tura ma yella ilemẓi neɣ tilemẓit zewǧen, ur wwin ara ddnub ; meɛna wid ara izewǧen ad ṛwun lḥif di tudert-nsen ; nekk mačči d ayen i wen-mennaɣ.
Atan wayen ara d-iniɣ ay atmaten : lweqt ițțazal, drus i d iqqimen, wid izewǧen ilaq ad ilin am akken ur zwiǧen ara,
wid yețrun ad ilin am akken ur țrun ara, wid ifeṛḥen am akken ur fṛiḥen ara, wid yețțaɣen am akken ur sɛin ara.
Wid yesɛan nnfeɛ di ddunit-agi am akken ur t-sɛin ara axaṭer ddunit-agi ur tețdum ara.
Ur bɣiɣ ara aț-țesɛum iɣeblan. Win ur nezwiǧ ara ițxemmim i lecɣal n Sidi Ṛebbi, yețnadi kan ad yeɛǧeb Sidi Ṛebbi ;
meɛna win izewǧen yețxemmim ɣef lecɣal n ddunit, yețnadi ad yeɛǧeb i tmeṭṭut-is ; ul-is yebḍa ɣef sin.

Akken daɣen tameṭṭut ur nezwiǧ ara akk-d țlemẓit ; țxemmiment kan ɣef lecɣal n Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken ad ilint ț-țiqeddacin-ines s lǧețțat-nsent d ṛṛuḥ-nsent ; meɛna tin izewǧen tețxemmim kan ɣef lecɣal n ddunit d wamek ara teɛǧeb i wergaz-is.

Ur wen-d-nniɣ ara ayagi iwakken a kkun-kellxeɣ meɛna nniɣ awen-t-id i nnfeɛ-nwen axaṭer bɣiɣ aț-țeddum s tikli yelhan, yeṣfan iwakken aț-țeṭṭfem deg webrid n Lmasiḥ mačči deg wayen nniḍen.
Ma yella yiwen deg-wen ixḍeb tilemẓit, iḥar ur yezmir ara ad yeṛǧu ibɣa ad yezweǧ, mačči d ddnub ma yella yezweǧ.
Ma d win iqesden s lebɣi-ines ur izeggej ara, ma yella yeẓra iman-is yezmer ad iṣbeṛ, d ayen yelhan i gexdem m'ur yezwiǧ ara.
Ihi win izewǧen d ayen yelhan i gexdem, win ur nezwiǧ ara d ayen yelhan nezzeh.
Tameṭṭut izewǧen ur tezmir ara aț-țeǧǧ argaz-is skud mazal-it yedder, ma yella yemmut, tezmer aț-țɛiwed zzwaǧ d win tebɣa, acu kan ilaq ad yili d win yumnen s Lmasiḥ am nețțat.
Meɛna ɣef wakken walaɣ ma teqqim akken tella axiṛ-as, akken ara tesɛu lehna. Wagi d ṛṛay-iw nekk, ẓriɣ ula d nekk sɛiɣ Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ɣef wayen yeɛnan aksum n iseflawen i zellun i ssadaț, ț-țideț nesɛa akk tamusni, d acu kan tamusni tețțawi-d zzux i wemdan ma d leḥmala tesnernay deg-nneɣ laman ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.
Win i gɣilen yessen kra, urɛad yessin akken i glaq ad yissin.
Meɛna win iḥemmlen Sidi Ṛebbi, Sidi Ṛebbi yessen-it.
Ɣef wayen yeɛnan učči n weksum n iseflawen immezlen i lmeṣnuɛat, neẓra belli lmeṣnuɛat-agi ț-țikellax di ddunit axaṭer anagar yiwen n Ṛebbi i gellan.
Ɣas qqaṛen aṭas n iṛebbiten i gellan ama deg igenni ama di lqaɛa, ( axaṭer ț-țideț ! Ɣuṛ-sen aṭas n iṛebbiten akk-d ssadaț i gellan)

meɛna ɣuṛ-nneɣ nukni yiwen kan n Ṛebbi i gellan, d baba-tneɣ Ṛebbi i d-ixelqen kullec, ula d nukni d ayla-s. Anagar yiwen n Ssid i gellan : d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, yis i d-yella kullec, yis daɣen i nedder ula d nukni.

Aṭas ur nessin ara tideț-agi. Kra deg-sen i guɣen tannumi tețțen asfel n ssadaț, tura m'ara tețțen aksum-nni mazal ḥesben-t belli ț-țideț d asfel i ssadaț, neyya-nsen tenquqel, ḥussen am akken denben.
Mačči d ayen yețmaččan ara ɣ-iqeṛṛben ɣer Ṛebbi. Ma nečča ur nerbiḥ acemma, m'ur nečči ara, ur aɣ-iṛuḥ wacemma.
Ihi, ɛasset iman-nwen, ɣuṛ-wat tilelli-agi i tesɛam aț-țili d ugur n uɣelluy i wid ur neǧhid ara di liman.

Axaṭer ma iwala-k-id walebɛaḍ ur neǧhid ara di liman, teqqimeḍ aț-țeččeḍ di lemqam kečč yessnen, amek tebɣiḍ ur yețṛuḥu ara ula d nețța ad yečč seg iseflawen-agi yemmezlen i ssadaț ?
S wakka ihi, gma-k-agi ur neǧhid ara di liman, i ɣef yemmut Lmasiḥ , ɣef ddemma n tmusni-nni inek i geɣli.
Imi tețțawim ddnub ɣef watmaten-nwen, tessexṛabem neyya-nsen, tdenbem ɣer Lmasiḥ.
Ihi ma yella ayen ara ččeɣ izmer ad isseɣli gma di ddnub, ur țțuɣaleɣ ara maḍi ad ččeɣ lmakla-nni iwakken ur iɣelli ara.
Eɛni ur zmireɣ ara ad xedmeɣ akken bɣiɣ ? Mačči d amceggeɛ n Lmasiḥ i lliɣ ? Ur ẓriɣ ara Sidna Ɛisa s wallen-iw ? Mačči d nekk i kkun-id-yewwin ɣer webrid n Lmasiḥ ?
Ɣas wiyaḍ ur iyi-ḥsiben ara d amceggeɛ n Lmasiḥ, kunwi ur tezmirem ara a yi-tnekkṛem axaṭer ț-țikli-nwen akk-d Lmasiḥ i d țbut belli d Lmasiḥ i yi-d-iceggɛen.
Atan wamek țțaraɣ i wid i yi-sseḍlamen :
Eɛni ur aɣ-d-iṣaḥ ara a nečč, a nsew nukni s imceggɛen n Lmasiḥ ?
Ur sɛiɣ ara lḥeqq ad aɣeɣ tameṭṭut yumnen aț-țețțeddu yid-i am akken xeddmen imceggɛen nniḍen n Lmasiḥ d watmaten n Ssid-nneɣ akk-d Buṭrus ?
Neɣ d nekk kan akk-d Barnabas i glaqen a nexdem iwakken a d-nawi aɣṛum nneɣ ?

Yella wass i deg teslam belli aɛeskṛi ilaq ad ixelleṣ m'ara d-isɛeddi lɛeskeṛ ? Anwa ara yeẓẓun tara ur itețț ara si tẓuṛin-is ? Ulac ameksa ara yeksen taqeḍɛit n lmal ur itess ara seg uyefki-ines !
Tɣilem ayen akka i d-nniɣ d lɛaddat kan n yemdanen ? Ula d ccariɛa n Musa tenna-t-id !
Axaṭer yura deg-s : Ur țțarat ara takmamt i wezger isserwaten nneɛma. Eɛni ɣef yezgaren i gḥebbeṛ Sidi Ṛebbi ?
Mačči ɣef ddemma-nneɣ i d-yenna akka ? Ț-țideț, d nukni iwumi i d-yenna imeslayen-agi ! Ilaq win ikerrzen akk-d win yesserwaten ad ssirmen ad sɛun amur di lɣella nsen.
Ma yella nezreɛ gar-awen lbaṛakat n Sidi Ṛebbi, d acu yellan ma nemger-ed s ɣuṛ-wen tamɛict nneɣ ?

Ma twalam d lḥeqq ad meggren wiyaḍ s ɣuṛ-wen, eɛni mačči d nukni i gezwaren ? Meɛna nukni ur d-newwi acemma s ɣuṛ-wen, neṣbeṛ i kullec iwakken ur d-yețțili ara wugur i lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ.
Ur teẓrim ara belli wid ixeddmen di lǧameɛ țțawin-d lqut-nsen si lǧameɛ ? Ur teẓrim ara daɣen lmuqeddem izellun i Ṛebbi iseflawen i d-țțawin medden, yețțawi amur-is seg-sen ?
Akka daɣen i d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wid yețbecciṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ : di lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ara afen tamɛict-nsen.
Nekk ur d-wwiɣ acemma s ɣuṛ wen, yerna ur d-uriɣ ara tabṛaț-agi iwakken a d-ssutreɣ lḥeqq-iw. Axiṛ-iyi lmut wala a yi-tețwakkes sebba-agi s wayes zemreɣ ad zuxxeɣ !
Ur țzuxxuɣ ara s yiman-iw imi țbecciṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ, axaṭer țwaḥeṛseɣ ad beccṛeɣ. A nnger-iw ma yella ur beccṛeɣ ara lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ.
Lemmer xedmeɣ ayagi s lebɣi w sɛiɣ lḥeqq ad ssutreɣ lexlaṣ, meɛna d Ṛebbi i gḥettmen fell-i ccɣel-agi.
Ihi, d acu i d lexlaṣ-iw ? D lfeṛḥ i seɛɛuɣ m'ara țbecciṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ mbla lexlaṣ, mbla ma ssutreɣ lḥeqq-iw.
Ɣas akken ur iyi-ițțalas yiwen kra ; rriɣ iman-iw d aqeddac n mkul yiwen iwakken a d-rebḥeɣ aṭas n yemdanen ɣer webrid n Lmasiḥ.
Ɣer wat Isṛail rriɣ iman-iw am nutni iwakken a ten-id-rebḥeɣ ; ɣer wid yettabaɛen ccariɛa n Musa tebɛeɣ-ț am nutni iwakken a ten id rebḥeɣ, ɣas akken nekk ur lliɣ ara seddaw leḥkum n ccariɛa.
Akka daɣen, m'ara iliɣ d wid ur nesɛi ara ccariɛa, țțaraɣ iman-iw am akken ur sɛiɣ ara ccariɛa iwakken a ten-id-rebḥeɣ, ɣas akken nekk sɛiɣ ccariɛa n Ṛebbi imi d Lmasiḥ i d ccariɛa-inu.
Akk-d wid ur neǧhid ara deg webrid n Ṛebbi, uɣaleɣ am nutni, iwakken a ten-id-rebḥeɣ. Ddiɣ di lebɣi i mkul yiwen iwakken a d-sellkeɣ ulamma kra deg-sen.
Ayagi akk xedmeɣ-t ɣef ddemma n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ iwakken ad sɛuɣ yid-sen amur.
Di temzizla, teẓram belli deg wid akk yețțazalen deg wannar, yiwen kan ara irebḥen. Azzlet ihi iwakken aț-țrebḥem.

Wid akk yețțazzalen, m'ara heggin iman-nsen i tazzla, țɛețțiben iman-nsen ; nutni țenɛețțaben iwakken a d-rebḥen cciɛa ur nețdum ara ; lameɛna nukni, nețɛețțib iman-nneɣ iwakken a nerbeḥ cciɛa ara idumen.
Nekk ur țțazzaleɣ ara am win ur nesɛi ara lmeqsud, ur kkateɣ ara deg ubeḥri m'ara țnaɣeɣ ;
meɛna țɛețțibeɣ lǧețța-inu, țɛassaɣ ɣef yiman-iw, axaṭer uggadeɣ nekk i gbeccṛen i wiyaḍ ad ɣliɣ, ad uɣaleɣ ɣer deffir.
Țwaɣeḍsen meṛṛa di tagut-nni akk-d lebḥeṛ mi ddan d Sidna Musa,
ččan meṛṛa seg yiwen lqut n Sidi Ṛebbi,
swan meṛṛa si lɛinseṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi i d-iteffɣen seg wezṛu iteddun yid-sen ; azṛu-agi, d Lmasiḥ.
Ɣas akken, aṭas seg-sen ur neɛǧib ara i Sidi Ṛebbi ; daymi i ten-tesseɣli lmut yiwen yiwen mi teddun deg unezṛuf.
Ayen akken yedṛan yid-sen yeqqim-ed d lemtel i nukni, iwakken ur neṭṭamaɛ ara ayen n diri am akken i t-ṭṭamaɛen nutni.
Ur țțilit ara am wid iɛebbden ssadaț akken xeddmen kra seg-sen, axaṭer am akken yura di tira iqedsen : Yeqqim wegdud ad yečč ad isew, mi gfukk yekker ad yezhu, ad yecḍeḥ.
Ur ilaq ara daɣen a nxeddem leɛṛuṛ akken xeddmen kra seg-sen ; daymi deg yiwen n wass, lmut tečča tlata uɛecrin alef deg-sen.
Ur ilaq ara a njeṛṛeb Sidi Ṛebbi akken i xedmen kra seg-sen, dɣa qqsen-ten izerman mmuten.
Ur ilaq ara daɣen aț-țesmermugem ɣef wiyaḍ akken i smermugen kra deg-sen armi i ten-issenger lmelk n lmut.
Timsalin-agi akk i sen-yedṛan, qqiment-ed d lemtel, uran-tent di tektabin, iwakken a nelmed nukni ițɛicin di taggara n lweqt.
Ihi win iḥesben iman-is ibedd, ad iɛass iman-is ur iɣelli ara !

Ayen akk s wayes i tețwajeṛbem, d ayen iwumi yezmer wemdan. Sidi Ṛebbi d bab n lḥeqq, ur yețɛemmid ara aț-țenɛețțabem sennig n tezmert nwen ; lameɛna m'ara tețwajeṛbem, a wen-d-yefk tazmert s wayes ara tṣebṛem d wamek ara teffɣem si tegniț n leɛtab.
A wid eɛzizen fell-i, xḍut i weɛbad n ssadaț.
Țmeslayeɣ awen-d am akken țmeslayen i wid ifehmen ; meyyzet kunwi s yiman nwen ɣef wayen i d-qqaṛeɣ.
Taqbuct n lbaṛaka i ɣef nețḥemmid Sidi Ṛebbi, eɛni ur aɣ-tecrik ara d idammen n Lmasiḥ ? Neɣ aɣṛum i nbeṭṭu, ur aɣ-yecrik ara d lǧețța n Lmasiḥ ?
Imi yiwen n weɣṛum kan i gellan, ula d nukni nuɣal d yiwet n lǧețța ɣas akken deg waṭas yid-nneɣ i nella, axaṭer ntețț meṛṛa seg yiwen n weɣṛum.
Walit at Isṛail : wid itețțen seg weksum n iseflawen s weɛbad-nsen, eɛni ur criken ara d wemkan-nni anda i zellun iseflawen ?
Eɛni bɣiɣ a d-iniɣ belli asfel nni i zellun i ssadaț neɣ ssadaț-nni i țɛebbiden, sɛan lqima ? Xaṭi !
Meɛna ayen akka i zellun, zellun-t i leǧnun mačči i Ṛebbi ; nekk ur bɣiɣ ara aț-țcerkem akk-d leǧnun.

Ur tezmirem ara aț-țeswem si teqbuct n Sidi Ṛebbi ma yella tețțessem si țeqbuct n leǧnun ; ur tezmirem ara daɣen aț-țeččem seg weɣṛum n Sidi Ṛebbi ma yella tețțețțem seg weɣṛum n leǧnun.
Eɛni nebɣa a nejreḥ ul n Sidi Ṛebbi a d-neskker tismin-is ? Tɣilem tazmert-nneɣ teɣleb tazmert-is ?
Llan wid i d-iqqaṛen : kullec d leḥlal fell-aɣ ; ț-țideț, lameɛna ur aɣ-yenfiɛ ara kullec. Kullec yețțusemmeḥ-aɣ a t-nexdem, meɛna mačči d kullec i ɣ-yesnernayen di liman.
Ur țnadit ara ɣef nnfeɛ-nwen kan kunwi, meɛna nadit ɣef nnfeɛ n wiyaḍ.
Tzemrem aț-țeččem kra n wayen i gețnuzun di ssuq mbla asteqsi, mbla ma tḥebbṛem,
axaṭer ddunit d wayen akk yellan deg-s d ayla n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ma yeɛṛeḍ-ikkun walebɛad ur numin ara s Lmasiḥ, ma tṛuḥem, ččet s neyya mbla asteqsi seg wayen akk ara wen-d-issers.
Lameɛna ma yella win i wen-d yennan : ayagi yețțunefk d asfel i ssadaț, ur tețțet ara imi i kkun-id ixebbeṛ iwakken ad yethedden wul nwen.
Mačči ɣef neyya-nwen i d-nniɣ akka, lameɛna ɣef neyya n win i kkun-iɛerḍen. Ihi, acimi ara ǧǧeɣ wayeḍ ad idebbeṛ deg ixemmimen-iw ?
Ma yella ḥemdeɣ Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wayen i tețțeɣ, acimi ara ǧǧeɣ iman-iw ad wwten deg-i ɣef lqut i ɣef ḥemdeɣ Sidi Ṛebbi ?
Ama teččam neɣ teswam, neɣ kra n wayen ara txedmem, xedmet-eț i tmanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ur țțilit ara d sebba n uɣelluy ama i wat Isṛail, ama i iyunaniyen, ama i tejmaɛt n Sidi Ṛebbi,
am akken xeddmeɣ nekk, țnadiɣ a wen-ɛeǧbeɣ meṛṛa di kullec, ur țqellibeɣ ara ɣef nnfeɛ-inu, meɛna țqellibeɣ ɣef nnfeɛ n umur ameqqran deg-wen iwakken ad țwaselken.
Ɛandet-iyi am akken țɛanadeɣ Lmasiḥ.
A kkun-ibarek Ṛebbi imi i yi-d-tețmektayem di yal taswiɛt yerna teṭṭafaṛem lewṣayat-iw akken i wen-tent-slemdeɣ.
Meɛna, tura bɣiɣ aț-țissinem ayagi : Lmasiḥ d aqeṛṛuy ɣef yemdanen meṛṛa, argaz d aqeṛṛuy ɣef tmeṭṭut-is, ma d Ṛebbi d aqeṛṛuy ɣef Lmasiḥ.
Ihi argaz ara yesburren ɣef wuqeṛṛuy-is m'ara ideɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi neɣ m'ara d-yețxebbiṛ ayen i s-d-yusan s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi, yekkes lḥeṛma ɣef Ssid-is.
Lameɛna tameṭṭut ara ideɛɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi neɣ ara yețxebbiṛen s wayen i s-d-yețțasen s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi aqeṛṛuy-is ɛeryan, tekkes lḥeṛma ɣef wergaz-is, am akken d aqeṛṛuy-is i tseṭṭel.
Axaṭer ma yella tameṭṭut ur tesburr ara, aț-țegzem kan ihi acebbub-is am wergaz ; lameɛna ma yella d lɛib i tmeṭṭut aț-țegzem neɣ aț-țṣeṭṭel acebbub-is, ilaq ihi aț-țɣum aqeṛṛuy-is.
Argaz ur ilaq ara ad yesburr i wqeṛṛuy-is axaṭer d nețța i gmetlen Sidi Ṛebbi d lɛaḍima-ines ; ma ț-țameṭṭut d nețțat i d lḥeṛma n wergaz.
Axaṭer mačči d argaz i d- yețwaxelqen si tmeṭṭut meɛna ț- țameṭṭut i d-ițwaxelqen seg wergaz.
Daɣen argaz ur d-yețwaxleq ara i tmeṭṭut, lameɛna ț-țameṭṭut i d yețwaxelqen i wergaz.
Daymi ɣef ddemma n lmalayekkat, tameṭṭut ilaq aț-țesbur i uqeṛṛuy-is iwakken a d-tbeggen belli seddaw lḥekma n wergaz-is i tella.
Ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi, ur d-tețțili tmeṭṭut mbla argaz, ur d-yețțili wergaz mbla tameṭṭut.
Axaṭer akken i d-tețwaxleq tmeṭṭut seg wergaz, akken daɣen i d-yețlal wergaz si tmeṭṭut, ayagi akk s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi i d-yekka.
Meyzet kunwi s yiman-nwen : eɛni yelha-yas i tmeṭṭut aț-țdeɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi mbla ma tesburr ɣef wuqeṛṛuy-is ?
Ula d lɛadda n yemdanen tesselmed awen belli d lɛib i wergaz ma iṛebba acebbub-is.
Lameɛna d ccan ameqqran i tmeṭṭut ma tṛebba acebbub-is axaṭer yețțunefk-as-d iwakken a s-yili d asburru.
Ma yella win yebɣan ad iɣanen ɣef wannect-agi, ilaq ad iẓer belli nukni ur nesɛi ara tannumi-agi, ur telli ara daɣen di tejmuyaɛ n Sidi Ṛebbi.
A nɛeddi tura ɣer wayen nniḍen. Ɣef wayen yeɛnan tijmuyaɛ-nwen ur kkun-țcekkiṛeɣ ara, axaṭer ayen i deg ilaq aț-țeddum ɣer zdat, kunwi tețțuɣalem ɣer deffir.
Sliɣ belli m'ara tețnejmaɛem yețțili lxilaf gar-awen yerna umneɣ belli tella kra n tideț deg wayagi.
Ilaq a d-yili lxilaf-agi gar-awen iwakken a d-banen wid yeṭṭfen di liman seg wul.
M'ara tedduklem ɣer imensi n usmekti, ur txeddmem ara akken yebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi !
Axaṭer wa yețḥiri ad yečč lqut-is, wa mazal-it yelluẓ wayeḍ yeṛwa, yeskkeṛ.

Amek ! Ur tesɛim ara ixxamen nwen iwakken aț-țeččem aț-țeswem ? Neɣ tebɣam aț-țesseɣlim lqima n tejmaɛt n Sidi Ṛebbi, aț-țesneḥcamem wid ur nesɛi acemma ? D acu ara wen-d-iniɣ, a kkun cekkṛeɣ ? Ur kkun-țcekkiṛeɣ ara ɣef wayagi !
D ayen i yi-d-ițțunefken s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi i wen-slemdeɣ nekkini. Deg iḍ-nni i deg yețțuzenz Sidna Ɛisa, yeddem-ed aɣṛum,
yeḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi yebḍa-t yenna : « Wagi d lgețța-w yețțunefken fell awen, xeddmet ayagi iwakken a yi-d țmektayem. »
Daɣen, mi fukken učči, yeddem ed taqbuct yenna : « Taqbuct-agi d lemɛahda tajḍiṭ s idammen-iw ; xeddmet ayagi iwakken a yi-d-tețmektayem. »
Axaṭer kra n tikkelt i deg ara teččem seg weɣṛum-agi, i deg ara teswem si teqbuct agi, tețxebbiṛem s lmut n Lmasiḥ alamma d ass i deg ara d-yuɣal.
Daymi win ara yeččen seg weɣṛum-agi, ara yeswen si teqbuct-agi n usmekti n Lmasiḥ, m'ur sen-yefki ara lqima, yewwi ddnub ɣer yiri-s ɣef ddemma n lǧețța akk-d idammen n Lmasiḥ.
Ihi mkul yiwen ad ixemmem deg yiman-is uqbel ad yečč seg weɣṛum-nni neɣ ad isew si teqbuct-nni.
Axaṭer ma yella yiwen deg-wen yečča neɣ yeswa tiremt n usmekti n Lmasiḥ, mbla ma yefka lqima i lǧețța n Lmasiḥ, yewwi-d lɛiqab i yiman-is.
Ɣef wayagi i llan gar-awen aṭas n wid ihelken akk-d ineɛyuba, yerna aṭas deg-sen i gemmuten.
Lemmer nețḥadar ɣef yiman nneɣ, tili ur d-nețțawi ara lɛiqab n Sidi Ṛebbi fell-aneɣ.
S wakka m'ara ɣ-iɛaqeb Sidi Ṛebbi, yețṛebbi-yaɣ iwakken ur aɣ yețḥasab ara d wat n ddunit.
Ihi ay atmaten, asmi ara tennejmaɛem iwakken aț-țeččem, myeṛǧut wway gar-awen.
Ma llan wid yelluẓen, ad ččen uqbel deg wexxam-nsen iwakken ur d-tesseɣlayem ara lɛiqab n Sidi Ṛebbi fell-awen m'ara tennejmaɛem. Timsalin nniḍen a tent-fruɣ m'ara n-aseɣ.
Ay atmaten, ur bɣiɣ ara aț-țeqqimem mbla tamusni ɣef wayen yeɛnan ayen i d-yețțak Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.
Teẓram belli asm'akken ur tuminem ara s Lmasiḥ, țțawwin kkun wiyaḍ tɛebbdem lmeṣnuɛat ur neneṭṭeq ara.

Tura ilaq aț-țeẓrem belli yiwen ur izmir a d-yini : « ad yețwanɛel Ɛisa Lmasiḥ » ma yella s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i gețmeslay. Daɣen yiwen ur izmir ad iched belli Ɛisa Lmasiḥ d Ssid-is, ma yella mačči s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i t-id-yenna.
Llan aṭas n leṣnaf n tukciwin n Ṛebbi, lameɛna yiwen n Ṛṛuḥ kan i gellan ;
aṭas n leṣnaf n leqdic i gellan meɛna yiwen n Ssid-nneɣ kan i nesɛa ;
aṭas n leṣnaf n lecɣal i gellan, meɛna Ṛebbi d yiwen, d nețța i ten-isedduyen akk deg-nneɣ meṛṛa.
Yal yiwen tețțunefk-as-d tukci n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i nnfeɛ-nneɣ meṛṛa.
Ihi Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yefka-d i yiwen ad immeslay s ṣṣwab d lefhama, yefka-d i wayeḍ ad immeslay s tmusni.
Ṛṛuḥ-agi yefka daɣen i wayeḍ liman iǧehden, i wayeḍ tazmert s wayes ara yesseḥlu imuḍan ;

yefka daɣen i wayeḍ tazmert ad ixdem lbeṛhanat, ma d wayeḍ ad ițxebbiṛ s wayen i s-d-yețțassen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi ; wayeḍ daɣen yefka-yas-ed tazmert s wayes ara yeɛqel ayen i d-ițțasen s ɣuṛ Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi d wayen i d-ițțasen s ɣuṛ leṛwaḥ n diri ; wayeḍ yețțunefk-as-d ad immeslay timeslayin ur nețwassen ara ; wayeḍ daɣen yețțunefk-as-d a d-yessefhem timeslayin-agi ur nețwassen ara.
Ayagi akk itekk-ed seg yiwen n Ṛṛuḥ. Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yețțak-ed ayagi meṛṛa akken yebɣa, i yal yiwen deg nneɣ.
Lǧețța n wemdan d yiwet, ɣas akken tesɛa aṭas n lemfaṣel. Lemfaṣel-agi ɣas deg waṭas yid-sen, d yiwet n lǧețța i llan ; akken daɣen i gella Lmasiḥ.
Axaṭer s yiwen n Ṛṛuḥ kan i nețwaɣḍes meṛṛa iwakken a nili d yiwet n lǧețța ; ama d at Isṛail neɣ d iyunaniyen, ama d aklan neɣ d iḥeṛṛiyen, seg yiwen n Ṛṛuḥ i neswa meṛṛa.
Lǧețța ur tebni ara ɣef yiwen n lmefṣel, lameɛna tebna ɣef waṭas n lemfaṣel.
Ma yenna-d uḍar : nekk mačči d afus ur țekkiɣ ara di lǧețța, eɛni imi ur yelli ara d afus ur ițekka ara ula d nețța di lǧețța ?
Ma yella yenna-d umeẓẓuɣ : nekk mačči ț-țiṭ, ur țekkiɣ ara di lǧețța, eɛni ț-țideț m'ur yelli ara ț-țiṭ ur ițekka ara ula d nețța di lǧețța ?
Ma yella lǧețța meṛṛa ț-țiṭ, amek ara tili tmesliwt ? Neɣ ma yella d ameẓẓuɣ kan i tella, amek ara yili wesriḥi ?
Sidi Ṛebbi yebna mkul lmefṣel di lǧețța akken i s-yehwa.
Ma yella lǧețța meṛṛa d yiwen n lmefṣel, anda-ț ihi lǧețța ?
S wakka ihi aṭas n lemfaṣel i gellan, meɛna lǧețța yiwet.
Tiṭ ur tezmir ara aț-țini i ufus : ur k-uḥwaǧeɣ ara ! Aqeṛṛuy ur yezmir ara ad yini i uḍaṛ : ur k-uḥwaǧeɣ ara.
Lemfaṣel-nni n lǧețța i d-yețbanen d imecṭaḥ, nefɛen aṭas.
Lemfaṣel n lǧețța iwumi ur nefki ara lqima, d nutni i nețḥadar akteṛ n wiyaḍ ; ihi d lemfaṣel ur nezmir ara a d-nebder i nețḥadar aṭas,
ma d wid yesɛan lqima, ur uḥwaǧen ara lemḥadra. Sidi Ṛebbi yebna lǧețța akken ara izegged lqima i lemfaṣel ixuṣṣen,
iwakken ur d-yețțili ara lxilaf ger lemfaṣel, meɛna ad țemḥadaren wway gar-asen.
Ma yella yiwen n lmefṣel yețwaqṛeḥ, wiyaḍ meṛṛa ad țwaqeṛḥen yid-es ; ma yella yețțunefk-as ccan i wayeḍ, wiyaḍ akk ad feṛḥen yid-es.
Kunwi meṛṛa d lǧețța n Lmasiḥ, yal yiwen deg-wen d lmefṣel di lǧețța-s, mkul yiwen deg umkan-is.

Di tejmaɛt n Lmasiḥ, Sidi Ṛebbi yesbedd uqbel ṛṛusul, deffir-nsen wid i d-yețxebbiṛen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi, rnan-d wid yesselmaden, rnan-d daɣen wid yesɛan tazmert ad xedmen lbeṛhanat, wid yesɛan tazmert ad sseḥlun imuḍan, wid ara iɛiwnen wiyaḍ, wid ara yilin d imdebbṛen akk-d wid ara yemmeslayen timeslayin ur nețwassen ara.
Eɛni țțuceggɛen-d meṛṛa d ṛṛusul ? Neɣ țxebbiṛen-d akk s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi ? Sselmaden meṛṛa ? Xeddmen meṛṛa lbeṛhanat ?
Eɛni sɛan meṛṛa tazmert ad sseḥlun imuḍan, neɣ ad mmeslayen meṛṛa timeslayin ur nețwassen ara ? Neɣ zemren akk a d-sfehmen timeslayin-agi ?
Ihi a wen-d-iniɣ : nadit axiṛ ɣef tikciwin-nni inefɛen aṭas. A wen d-mleɣ tura abrid yifen akk iberdan.
Ɣas zemreɣ ad mmeslayeɣ timeslayin n ddunit meṛṛa, ad rnuɣ tid n lmalayekkat, m'ur sɛiɣ ara leḥmala n tideț, ad iliɣ am ṭṭbel yeddendunen neɣ nnaqus yeṭṭenṭunen.

Ɣas ma yețțunefk-iyi-d ad țxebbiṛeɣ s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi, ad fehmeɣ kra yellan d lbaḍna, ad sɛuɣ tamusni di mkul lḥaǧa, ɣas ad sɛuɣ liman s wayes i zemreɣ ad iniɣ i wedrar qleɛ iman-ik syagi tṛuḥeḍ ɣer wemkan ihina, m'ur sɛiɣ ara leḥmala ɣer wiyaḍ, nekk d ulac.
Ɣas daɣen ad feṛqeɣ ayen akk sɛiɣ i wid yelluẓen, ad rnuɣ ad sebbleɣ tudert-iw alamma d lmut ɣef ddemma n wiyaḍ, m'ur sɛiɣ ara leḥmala deg ul-iw, ayagi ur iyi-infiɛ ara.
Leḥmala n tideț tețțawi-d ṣṣbeṛ, leḥmala tețɛawan, leḥmala ur tesɛi ara tismin, ur tesɛi ara zzux, win yesɛan leḥmala deg ul-is ur yețcekkiṛ ara iman-is,
Win yesɛan leḥmala n tideț ur ițnadi ara ad ixdem cceṛ, ur yețnadi ara ɣef nnfeɛ-ines, ur izeɛɛef ur yețțaṭṭaf cceḥnat ;
Win yesɛan leḥmala ur ifeṛṛeḥ ara s lbaṭel meɛna ifeṛṛeḥ s lḥeqq;
leḥmala tețsamaḥ kullec, tețțamen, tessaram tsebbeṛ i kullec.
Axebbeṛ n wayen i d-yețțasen s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi ad ifak, timeslayin ur nețwassen ara ad ḥebsent, tamusni aț-țefnu, ma d leḥmala n tideț werǧin aț-țfak ;
axaṭer tamusni-nneɣ txuṣṣ, ayen nețbecciṛ s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi ur innekmal ara,
meɛna m'ara d-yaweḍ wayen innekmalen, ayen ixuṣṣen meṛṛa ad imḥu.
Asmi lliɣ d aqcic, țmeslayeɣ am weqcic, țxemmimeɣ, țmeyyizeɣ slɛeqliya n weqcic ; asmi uɣaleɣ d argaz, ǧǧiɣ lɛeqliya n weqcic.
Ass-agi, nețwali am akken di lemri yumsen, meɛna imiren a nuɣal a nwali akken ilaq ; ass-agi tamusni inu mazal txuṣṣ lameɛna ad uɣaleɣ ad issineɣ akken i yi-issen Sidi Ṛebbi.
Tura ihi tlata n leḥwayeǧ-agi i gesɛan lqima : liman, asirem d leḥmala ; lameɛna di tlata-agi, d lehmala i ț-țameqqrant.
Qbel kullec nadit aț-țesɛum leḥmala n tideț. Nadit daɣen ɣef tukciwin n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, lameɛna nadit axiṛ a d-țxebbiṛem s wayen i d-ițțasen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi.

Win yețmeslayen tutlayin ur nețwassen ara, mačči i yemdanen i gețmeslay lameɛna i Ṛebbi, imi yiwen ur ifehhem acu i d-yeqqaṛ ; axaṭer s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i d-iqqaṛ ayen ur nezmir a t-nefhem.
Ma d win i d-ițxebbiṛen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi, ițmeslay-ed i yemdanen, yesnernay liman-nsen, inehhu-ten, yețṣebbiṛ-iten.
Win yețmeslayen tutlayin ur nețwassen ara, yesseǧhad iman-is di liman, ma d win i d-ițxebbiṛen s wayen i d-ițțasen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi, yesseǧhad tajmaɛt n Sidi Ṛebbi meṛṛa.

Bɣiɣ aț-țemmeslayem meṛṛa s tutlayin ur nețwassen ara, lameɛna bɣiɣ axiṛ ma tețxebbiṛem s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi. Win yețxebbiṛen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi yenfeɛ akteṛ n win yețmeslayen tutlayin-agi, anagar ma yella izmer a d-yessefhem ayen i d-yenna, iwakken tajmaɛt meṛṛa aț-țestenfeɛ.

Tura ay atmaten, lemmer a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-wen a wen-d mmeslayeɣ s tutlayt ur nețwassen ara, deg wacu ara kkun-nefɛeɣ ? A kkun-nefɛeɣ ma wwiɣ-awen-d ayen i yi-d-ițțuweḥḥan d wayen i yi-d-yețțuxebṛen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi, neɣ țamusni akk-d uselmed !
A d-nefk lemtel n dduzan n lmusiqa am tjewwaqt d snitra : ma yella ur yemxalaf ara ṣṣut-nsent, amek ara neɛqel ṣṣut n tjewaqt neɣ win n snitra ?
Neɣ daɣen m'ur neɛqil ara mliḥ ṣṣut n lbuq s wayes i țheggin imnayen iman-nsen ɣer imenɣi, anwa ara iheggin iman-is ɣer umenɣi ?
Kunwi daɣen, ma yella tneṭqem-d s tutlayt ur nețwassen ara, amek ara nefhem d acu i d-teqqaṛem ? Am akken tețmeslayem i waḍu !
Llant aṭas n tutlayin yemxalafen di ddunit, lameɛna sɛant akk lmeɛna.
Ma yella ur fhimeɣ ara tameslayt n walebɛaḍ, ad iliɣ d abeṛṛani ar ɣuṛ-es, nețța daɣen ad yili ɣuṛ-i d abeṛṛani.
Kunwi daɣen, imi tețnadim aț-țesɛum tukciwin i d-yețțak Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, nadit axiṛ aț-țesɛum ayen ara inefɛen tajmaɛt n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Daymi, win yețmeslayen tutlayt ur netwassen ara ilaq ad issuter i Ṛebbi a s-d-yefk ad yessefhem ayen i d-iqqaṛ.
Axaṭer ma yella deɛɛuɣ s tutlayt ur nețwassen ara, d ṛṛuḥ-iw i gdeɛɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi mačči d lefhama-inu.
D acu ara xedmeɣ ihi ? Ad dɛuɣ s ṛṛuḥ, lameɛna ad dɛuɣ daɣen s lefhama-inu ; ad cnuɣ s ṛṛuḥ, ad cnuɣ daɣen s lefhama-inu.
Axaṭer ma yella tḥemdeḍ Ṛebbi s ṛṛuḥ-ik kan s tutlayt ur nețwassen ara, win yeqqimen gar-awen, ur nessin ara, amek ara d-yini « amin » i yimeslayen-ik, m'ur yefhim ara d acu i d-teqqaṛeḍ ?
Ɣas yimeslayen-ik s wayes i tḥemdeḍ Ṛebbi gerrzen aṭas, ur nfiɛen ara win ur nefhim ara d acu i d-teqqaṛeḍ.
Ad ḥemdeɣ Ṛebbi imi țmeslayeɣ tutlayin ur nețwassen ara akteṛ-nwen meṛṛa.
Meɛna di tejmaɛt, axiṛ-iyi a d-iniɣ xemsa yimeslayen yețwafehmen iwakken ad lemden wiyaḍ, wala ɛecṛa alaf imeslayen s tutlayt ur nețwassen ara.
Ay atmaten, ur țțilit ara am arrac m'ara tmeyyzem ɣef kra, lameɛna sɛut lɛeqliya n imeqqranen ; ma ɣef wayen yeɛnan cceṛ, ilit am arrac.
Atan wayen yuran di tira : Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-d : A d-mmeslayeɣ i wegdud-agi+ seg imawen n ibeṛṛaniyen + s tutlayin nniḍen+ , meɛna ur iyi-d-smeḥsisen ara.+ +
Ihi tutlayin-agi ur nețwassen ara, d licaṛa i wid ur numin ara mačči i wid yumnen ; ma d win i d ițxebbiṛen s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi, d licaṛa i wid yumnen mačči i wid ur numin ara.

Ma yella nnejmaɛen imasiḥiyen meṛṛa deg yiwen wemkan, bdan țḥemmiden akk Sidi Ṛebbi s tutlayin ur nețwassen ara, ma kecmen-d yemdanen ur nessin ara ayagi neɣ wid ur numin ara s Lmasiḥ, eɛni ur d-qqaṛen ara tedrewcem ?

Meɛna ma yella țxebbiṛen-d akk s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi, ma ikcem-ed win ur numin ara neɣ win ur nessin ara, a d-yawi s lexbaṛ belli d amednub i gella ɣef ddemma n wayen yesla, ad iḥuss deg iman-is belli ad ițțuḥaseb ;
ayen yeffren deg ul-is a d-iban, dɣa ad yeɣli ɣer lqaɛa ɣef wudem, ad yeɛbed Sidi Ṛebbi ad yini : ț-țideț Ṛebbi gar-awen i gella !

D acu ihi i glaqen ay atmaten ? M'ara tennejmaɛem akken tellam : wa a d-yawi ccna, wayeḍ d aselmed, wayeḍ d aweḥḥi, wayeḍ timeslayin ur nețwassen ara, wayeḍ a tent-id issefhem ; kullec ad yețwaxdem i wesnerni n tejmaɛt.
Ma llan wid yețmeslayen timeslayin ur nețwassen ara, sin neɣ tlata a d-mmeslayen meɛna yal yiwen s nnuba-s, yerna ilaq ad yili win ara d-yesfehmen ayen i d-qqaṛen.
Ma ulac win ara d-yesfehmen, ad ssusmen axiṛ di tejmaɛt, ad mmeslayen deg iman-nsen kan akk-d Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ma llan wid i d-ițxebbiṛen s wayen i d-ițțasen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi, sin neɣ tlata a d-mmeslayen, wiyaḍ ad meyzen ɣef wayen i d-nnan.
Ma yella gar-awen win iwumi i d-iweḥḥa Sidi Ṛebbi kra, ilaq ad iɛass alamma yessusem win akken yellan yețmeslay.
Tzemrem akk a d tețxebbiṛem s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi, meɛna wa deffir wa, iwakken atmaten meṛṛa ad lemden, ad innerni liman-nsen.
Win i d-ițxebbiṛen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi yeḥkem deg wayen i d-iqqaṛ,
axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi mačči d Ṛebbi n ussexṛeb, meɛna d win iḥemmlen lehna.
Am akken xeddmen di tejmuyaɛ n wid iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi, ilaq tilawin ad ssusment di tejmaɛt, ur ilaq ara a d-grent iman-nsent ; meɛna ad qadṛent tajmaɛt, ad aɣent awal akken i t-id-tenna ccariɛa.
Ma yella bɣant ad steqsint ɣef wayen ur fhiment ara, ad steqsint irgazen-nsent deg wexxam ; axaṭer ur yessefk ara i tmeṭṭut a d-ger iman-is di tejmaɛt.
Eɛni s ɣuṛ-wen i d-yekka wawal n Ṛebbi ? Neɣ ɣuṛ-wen kan i gella ?
Ma yella yiwen deg-wen iwala iman-is yețweḥḥi-yas-d Sidi Ṛebbi neɣ yețxebbiṛ-ed s ɣuṛ-es, ilaq ad iɛqel belli ayen akka i wen-d-uriɣ d lameṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi ;
meɛna ma yella inkeṛ-it, iban belli ur yețwaqbel ara ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.
Akka ihi ay atmaten, ssirmet a d-tețxebbiṛem s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi. Ur qeṭṭɛet ara i win yebɣan ad immeslay s tutlayin ur nețwassen ara,
acu kan xḍut i ussexṛeb, xedmet kullec s țțawil.
Ay atmaten, bɣiɣ a wen-d smektiɣ tura lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i wen-d-ssawḍeɣ, win akken i tqeblem yerna tḥerzem-t ;
s Lexbaṛ agi n lxiṛ i tețwasellkem ma yella tettebɛem-t akken i wen-t-id-nniɣ, neɣ m'ulac liman-nwen am akken d aḍu.
Slemdeɣ-awen di tazwara ayen i lemdeɣ nekkini : Lmasiḥ yemmut ɣef ddnubat-nneɣ akken yura ;
yețwamḍel, yuɣal-ed ɣer tudert ass wis tlata, akken i t-id-nnant tira iqedsen.
Iwala-t Buṭrus, walan-t daɣen ṛṛusul di tnac yid-sen.
Rnan walan-t daɣen akteṛ n xemsmeyya n watmaten deg yiwet n teswiɛt ; aṭas deg-sen mazal-iten ddren ar tura, ma d kra deg-sen mmuten.
Yerna iwala-t Yeɛqub akk-d ṛṛusul meṛṛa.
Mi t-walan akk, walaɣ-t idheṛ-iyi-d daɣen i nekkini yellan d ulac.
Nekk, yellan d aneggaru akk di ṛṛusul, ur uklaleɣ ara ad țțusemmiɣ d ṛṛasul axaṭer lliɣ țqehhiṛeɣ tajmaɛt n warraw n Ṛebbi.

S ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi i wwḍeɣ ɣer wayen akka i lliɣ tura ; ṛṛeḥma i yi-d-ifka ur tṛuḥ ara deg ulac, lameɛna uɣaleɣ xedmeɣ akteṛ-nsen meṛṛa, mačči s yiman-iw, meɛna s ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi yellan yid-i.
S wakka ihi, ama d nekk ama d nutni, atah wayen i nețbecciṛ yerna d ayen s wayes i tumnem.
Ma neqqaṛ belli Lmasiḥ yeḥya-d si ger lmegtin, amek ihi kra deg-wen qqaṛen ulac ḥeggu n lmegtin ?
Ma yella ulac ḥeggu n lmegtin, ihi Lmasiḥ daɣen ur d-iḥyi ara.
Ma yella ihi Lmasiḥ ur d-iḥyi ara, ayen i nețbecciṛ d aḍu, ayen s wayes tumnem daɣen d aḍu.
Lemmer ț-țideț lmegtin ur d ḥeggun ara, neskaddeb ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi nukni i d-icehden belli yesseḥya-d Lmasiḥ si ger lmegtin. Lemmer ur t-id-isseḥyi ara, ihi lmegtin ur d-ḥeggun ara ;
axaṭer ma yella lmegtin ur d-ḥeggun ara, Lmasiḥ daɣen ur d-iḥyi ara.
Ma yella Lmasiḥ ur d-iḥyi ara, ihi liman-nwen am akken d aḍu, mazal-ikkun di ddnub-nwen,
ula d imasiḥiyen yemmuten negren, liman-nsen iṛuḥ d ulac.
Ma yella asirem-nneɣ di Lmasiḥ di ddunit-agi kan i gella, d nukni i gețɣiḍen akteṛ n yemdanen n ddunit meṛṛa.
Meɛna Lmasiḥ iḥya-d si lmut, d nețța i d amezwaru i d-iḥyan ɣef wid akk yemmuten ;
axaṭer, am akken i d-tekcem lmut ɣer ddunit s yiwen wergaz, s yiwen wergaz daɣen i d-yusa ḥeggu n lmegtin.
Am akken i weṛten meṛṛa yemdanen lmut imi d-kkan s ɣuṛ Adam, akken daɣen wid akk yumnen s Lmasiḥ a d-ḥyun si ger lmegtin imi umnen yis,
ḥeggu-agi ilaq a d-idṛu di lweqt-is : Lmasiḥ iḥya-d d amezwaru, ass n tuɣalin-is a d-ḥyun meṛṛa wid yellan d ayla-s.
Imiren a d-taweḍ taggara, Lmasiḥ ad issenger tizmar, lḥekmat d wid iḥekmen ; ad yerr tagelda i Sidi Ṛebbi Baba-tneɣ.
Axaṭer ilaq Lmasiḥ ad yeḥkem alamma yerra iɛdawen-is seddaw iḍaṛṛen-is.
Aɛdaw aneggaru ara yessenger, d lmut.
Axaṭer am akken yura : Sidi Ṛebbi yerra kullec seddaw yiḍaṛṛen-is+ . Meɛna mi gura belli kullec yuɣal seddaw yiḍaṛṛen-is, iban belli Win yerran kullec seddaw yidaṛṛen-is ur ițekki ara.
M'ara yuɣal kullec ger ifassen n Lmasiḥ, imiren nețța yellan d mmi-s, ad yuɣal seddaw n lḥekma n win i s-d-yefkan kullec ; iwakken Sidi Ṛebbi ad yeḥkem ɣef kullec.
Kra n yemdanen țnadin ad țwaɣedṣen ɣas lukan ad awḍen ɣer lmut,f+ lemmer ț-țideț lmegtin ur d-ḥeggun ara, acuɣeṛ ihi i țnadin ad țwaɣedṣen ?
I nukni, acimi i nețqabal lmut kull ass ?
Ay atmaten, yal ass țwaliɣ lmut ger wallen-iw ; s tideț i wen-d-nniɣ ayagi axaṭer tellam d sebba n zzux-iw imi tedduklem d Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.

Ma yella ɣef ddemma n ccan n yemdanen i nnuɣeɣ d lewḥuc di temdint n Ifasus, acu n lfayda i sɛiɣ ? Ihi m'ur d-ḥeggun ara lmegtin : a nṛuḥ kan a nečč, a nsew axaṭer azekka a nemmet akken i t-id-iqqaṛ yiwen n lemtel.
Ḥadret aț-țețwakellxem, axaṭer tikli d yemcumen tessufuɣ i webrid.
Uɣalet-ed ɣer leɛqel nwen, xḍut i yir abrid ; axaṭer kra deg-wen țeddun am akken ur ssinen ara Ṛebbi ; ayagi nniɣ-t-id iwakken aț-țenneḥcamem.
Meɛna alebɛaḍ a d-yini : « amek ara d-ḥyun lmegtin ? Amek ara tili lǧețța s wayes ara d-uɣalen ? »
A win ur nefhim ! Ayen ara tzerɛeḍ m'ur yemmut ara deg wakal, ur d-ițamɣay ara.
Ayen akken i tzerɛeḍ mačči d ayen i d-yemɣin meɛna d aɛeqqa kan n yired neɣ n zerriɛa nniḍen.
Imiren Sidi Ṛebbi a s-yefk lǧețța akken yebɣa, yal zzerriɛa a s-yefk ṣṣifa i s-ilaqen.
Seg wayen akk yețțidiren ur sɛin ara irkul yiwet n ṣṣifa ; ṣṣifa n wemdan weḥd-es, tin n lmal weḥd-es, tin n yefṛax weḥd-es, tin n iselman daɣen weḥd-es.
Llant daɣen ṣṣifat n igenwan akk-d ṣṣifat n ddunit, yal yiwet s tafat-is ;
tafat n yiṭij weḥd-es, tafat n waggur weḥd-es, tafat n yitran daɣen weḥd-es ; ula seg itri ɣer wayeḍ temxalaf tafat-nsen.
Akka ara tedṛu asm'ara d-ḥyun lmegtin. Lǧețța m'ara tekcem akal, trekku ; meɛna m'ara d-teḥyu ur tețțuɣal ara aț-țerku.
M'ara ț-țerren ɣer wakal tețțuɣal d ulac, meɛna m'ara d-teḥyu, a d-teḥyu s ccan d ameqqran. M'ara ț-țerren ɣer wakal teffeɣ-iț tezmert, m'ara d-teḥyu a d-teḥyu s lǧehd d ameqqran.
Tekcem ɣer wakal s yiwet n ṣṣifa, a d-teḥyu s ṣṣifa nniḍen ; akken tella lǧețța n wemdan, tella daɣen lǧețța n Ṛṛuḥ.
Daymi i d-nnant tira iqedsen : Adem yellan d amdan amezwaru yuɣal d amdan yeddren, meɛna Adam aneggaru, d Ṛṛuḥ i d-yețțaken tudert.
Mačči d amdan n ṛṛuḥ i d-yusan d amezwaru, meɛna d amdan n ddunit, amdan n ṛṛuḥ yerna-d deffir-es.
Amdan amezwaru yekka-d seg wakal, d amdan n ddunit ; amdan wis sin yusa-d seg igenni.
Akken yella wemdan n ddunit, ara yilin yemdanen n ddunit ; daɣen akken yella wemdan n igenwan ara yilin yemdanen n igenwan.
Akken i ncuba ɣer wemdan n ddunit ara ncabi ɣer wemdan n igenwan.
Ay atmaten, atan wayen bɣiɣ a d-iniɣ : lǧețța n weksum d idammen ur tweṛṛet ara tageldit n Ṛebbi. Ayen ara yemten ur yezmir ara ad yewṛet ayen ur nețmețțat ara.
A wen-d-iniɣ yiwet n lbaḍna : ur nețɛedday ara akk si lmut meɛna lǧețțat-nneɣ ad nbeddalent.

Deg yiwet n teswiɛt, qqen tiṭ-ik teldiḍ-ț, m'ara d-inṭeq lbuq aneggaru, axaṭer lbuq a d-inṭeq, lmegtin a d-ḥyun ur țțuɣalen ara ad mmten, ma d wid i d-yufa lḥal mazal-iten ddren, ad beddlen ṣṣifa.
Ilaq lǧețța-yagi irekkun aț-țels ayen ur nrekku ara, lǧețța ara yemten aț-țels ayen ur nețmețțat ara.

Asm'ara tels lǧețța-agi irekkun ayen ur nrekku, asmi ara tels lǧețța-agi ara yemten ayen ur nețmețțat, ad yedṛu wawal-nni yuran di tira iqedsen : Tazmert n Sidi Ṛebbi teɣleb lmut, tessebleɛ-iț. +
A lmut, anida-ț tezmert-im ? A lmut, anda-ț tsiqest-im + ?
Tisiqest n lmut, d ddnub ; ma d ddnub, d ccariɛa i d-isbeggnen tazmert-is.
A neḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣ-d-yefkan tazmert-is s Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ !
S wakka ay atmaten eɛzizen, ǧehdet ur ɣellit ara. Țnernit kul ass di lecɣal n Ssid-nneɣ, ẓret belli leɛtab-nwen ɣef ddemma n Ssid-nneɣ ur yețțili ara mbla lfayda.
Ɣef wayen yeɛnan ajmaɛ n yedrimen i watmaten n temdint n Lquds yellan di lexṣaṣ, xedmet akken i weṣṣaɣ ad xedmen di tejmuyaɛ n tmurt n Galasya.
Mkul ass amezwaru n dduṛt, ilaq yal yiwen deg-wen ad yerr di rrif ayen iwumi yezmer n yedrimen, ur țṛaǧut ara a n-awḍeɣ d wamek ara ten-id jemɛem.
M'ara n-awḍeɣ, ad ceggɛeɣ wid ara d-textiṛem, a sen-fkeɣ tibṛatin, ad ṛuḥen ad awin ayen akken i d-tjemɛem ɣer temdint n Lquds.
Ma yella twalam ilaq ad ṛuḥeɣ nekk s yiman-iw, ad ddun yid-i.
Ad zegreɣ qbel tamurt n Masidunya d wamek ara n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-wen, axaṭer ilaq-iyi a n-ɛeddiɣ syenna.
Ad qqimeɣ kra n wussan, neɣ ahat ad sɛeddiɣ ccetwa ɣuṛ-wen, s wakka aț-țzemrem a yi-tɛiwnem iwakken ad kemleɣ abrid-iw.
Tikkelt-agi, ur bɣiɣ ara a n-ɛeddiɣ d abrid kan, meɛna ssarameɣ ad qqimeɣ kra n lweqt ɣuṛ-wen, ma yebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi.
Tura, aql-i ad qqimeɣ dagi di temdint n Ifasus, alamma d ass n lɛid n wass wis xemsin.
Axaṭer ldint iyi-d tewwura iwakken ad xedmeɣ yiwen ccɣel d ameqqran, ɣas akken aṭas n yeɛdawen i gellan.
M'ara n-iɛeddi ɣuṛ-wen gma tneɣ Timuti, lhit-ed yid-es a s-ikkes ukukru axaṭer d aqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi i gella am nekk.
Ḥadret ad yili win ara t-iḥeqṛen. Ɛiwnet-eț ad ikemmel abrid-is iwakken a d-yaweḍ ɣuṛ-i di lehna ; aql-aɣ nețṛaǧu-t nekk d watmaten.
Ma d gma-tneɣ Abulus, nhiɣ-t aṭas iwakken a n-iddu d watmaten nniḍen ara n-yuɣalen ɣuṛ-wen, meɛna ur yebɣi ara a n-iṛuḥ tura ; a n-yas m'ara s-iserreḥ lḥal.
Ɛasset, ṭṭfet di liman, ilit d irgazen, ǧehdet.
Xedmet kullec s leḥmala.
Tessnem Stifanas ț-țwacult-is, teẓram belli di tmurt n Akaya d nutni i gumnen d imezwura, yerna uɣalen d iqeddacen ɣef wegdud n Sidi Ṛebbi. Ad ssutreɣ deg-wen ay atmaten,
aț-țaɣem awal i yergazen am wigi, aț-țqadṛem wid akk yețțekkin di leqdic yid-sen.
Aql-i feṛḥeɣ mi d-usan Stifanas, Furtunatus akk-d Axaykus ; feṛḥeɣ yis-sen am akken d kunwi.
axaṭer hednen ul-iw d wulawen nwen. Ilaq a nissin a nefk lqima i yergazen am wigi.
Tijmuyaɛ n tmura n Asya țselliment-ed fell-awen. Akilas akk-d Brisila d wid yețnejmaɛen deg wexxam-nsen țsellimen-d fell-awen s yisem n Ssid-nneɣ.
Atmaten akk yellan dagi țsellimen-d fell-awen. Msalamet wway gar-awen s sslam n tegmaț.
Nekk Bulus, s ufus-iw i d-uriɣ imeslayen-agi n sslam.
Win ur nḥemmel ara Ssid-nneɣ atan ad yețwanɛel ! Marana-ta, Ssid-nneɣ iteddu-d.
Ṛṛeḥma n Sidna Ɛisa aț-țili fell-awen !
Ḥemmleɣ-kkun meṛṛa s yisem n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.

Nekk Bulus amceggeɛ n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ s lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi, akk-d gma-tneɣ Timuti, i watmaten n tejmaɛt n Sidi Ṛebbi yellan di temdint n Kurintus akk-d wid meṛṛa i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi di mkul amkan n tmurt n Akaya.
Ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a wen-d țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi Baba tneɣ akk-d Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Ad ițțubarek Sidi Ṛebbi, Baba-s n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yellan di yal taswiɛt d Bab n leḥnana d ṣṣbeṛ.
Ițṣebbiṛ-aɣ di lemḥayen-nneɣ iwakken s ṣṣbeṛ i ɣ-d-ifka, a nizmir ula d nukni a nṣebbeṛ wid yellan di lemḥayen.
Axaṭer am akken i d-țeɣlayent fell-aɣ lemḥayen ɣef ddemma n Lmasiḥ, akken daɣen i ɣ-d-ițțas ṣṣbeṛ s ɣuṛ-es.

Nukni ma nenɛețțab di lmeḥnat, nțenɛețțab iwakken aț-țețțusebbṛem yerna aț-țețțuselkem. Ma nețțuṣebbeṛ nukni, aț-țețțuṣebbṛem ula d kunwi iwakken aț-țesɛum ṣṣbeṛ di lemḥayen i deg tețɛeddayem am nukni.
Ihi ɣef wayen i kkun-yeɛnan nețkel, nekkes anezgum, axaṭer neẓra akken i tețțekkim di lemḥayen-nneɣ, ara tețțekkim daɣen di ṣṣbeṛ i ɣ-d ițțunefken.
Nebɣa aț-țeẓrem ay atmaten lmeḥna i nesɛedda di tmurt n Asya; ɣlint-ed fell-aɣ lemḥayen iwumi ur nezmir, neɛteb armi nɣil a nemmet.
Nețwali deg iman-nneɣ belli ḥekmen fell-aɣ s lmut, iwakken ur nețkal ara ɣef yiman-nneɣ lameɛna a nețkel ɣef Ṛebbi i d-iḥeggun lmegtin.
D nețța i ɣ-d-isellken si lmut am tagi yerna nețkel belli mazal a ɣ-isellek sya ɣer zdat.

Ula d kunwi tețɛawanem-aɣ m'ara tdeɛɛum ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi fell-aɣ. S wakka, ɣef ddemma n tẓallit n waṭas n watmaten, a ɣ-d-țțunefkent lbaṛakat s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi ; imiren aṭas ara iḥemden Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef ddemma nneɣ.

Ațah sebba s wayes i nefṛeḥ s yiman-nneɣ yerna ulawen-nneɣ thennan : nelḥa d yemdanen meṛṛa s wul yeṣfan d neyya, abeɛda yid wen kunwi. Ayagi yusa-yaɣ-d s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi, axaṭer mačči s lɛeqliya n yemdanen i nțeddu meɛna d ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣ-ițwellihen.

Ayen i wen-nura di tebṛatin- nneɣ, nenna-t-id s wul yeṣfan d neyya, ulac deg-sent lmeɛna nniḍen anagar ayen i teɣṛam d wayen i tfehmem deg-sent. Ssarameɣ aț-țfehmem ayagi akken ilaq am akken i tebdam tfehmem-t, yeɛni ass n tuɣalin n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ a nili d sebba n lfeṛḥ-nwen, kunwi aț-țilim d sebba n lfeṛḥ-nneɣ.
Imi tḥeqqeqeɣ belli akka i gella lḥal, ssarmeɣ a n-ɛeddiɣ di tazwara ɣuṛ-wen iwakken aț-țfeṛḥem snat n tikkal.
Qesdeɣ ad ɛeddiɣ fell-awen m'ara ṛuḥeɣ ɣer tmurt n Masidunya, syinna a d-uɣaleɣ ɣuṛ-wen iwakken a yi-tɛiwnem ad kemmleɣ abrid-iw ɣer tmurt n Yahuda.
Mi qesdeɣ ad xedmeɣ annect-agi, eɛni ur xemmemeɣ ara ? Neɣ m'ara qesdeɣ ad xedmeɣ kra, ma nniɣ-ed anɛam neɣ ala uɣaleɣ beddleɣ ṛṛay, eɛni d lebɣi-inu i țnadiɣ ?
Ṛebbi yeẓra belli ayen i wen-d-neqqaṛ mačči d anɛam akk-d ala ɣef yiwet n tikkelt ;
axaṭer Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Mmi-s n Ṛebbi i nbecceṛ gar-awen nekk d watmaten Silwan akk-d Timuti, ur d-yusi ara iwakken ad yili d anɛam akk-d ala, meɛna anagar anɛam i gellan deg-s.
Axaṭer yis i d-iqqaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi anɛam i wayen meṛṛa i gewɛed. Ihi s yisem n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i d-neqqaṛ daɣen amin i Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken a t-neḥmed a t-ncekkeṛ.
D Sidi Ṛebbi s yiman-is i ɣ isǧehden yid-wen di tikli-nneɣ akk-d Lmasiḥ, d nețța i ɣ-ixtaṛen.
Yessers fell-aɣ ṭṭabeɛ-ines yerna yefka-yaɣ-d deg ulawen-nneɣ Ṛṛuḥ-is iqedsen yellan d aɛeṛbun n lbaṛakat i ɣ-iwɛed.
Atan Sidi Ṛebbi yeẓra belli ț-țideț i d-qqaṛeɣ : mi qesdeɣ ur țțuɣaleɣ ara ɣer temdint n Kurintus, d aḥader i bɣiɣ a kkun-ḥadreɣ.
Ur nețnadi ara a wen-d-nesken ayen s wayes ara tamnem axaṭer neẓra tǧehdem di liman, lameɛna nebɣa a nexdem yid-wen iwakken a ndukkel di lfeṛḥ.
Ihi qesdeɣ ur n-țuɣaleɣ ara ɣuṛ wen, imi ur bɣiɣ ara a kkun sḥezneɣ daɣen.
Axaṭer ma sḥezneɣ kkun, anwa ara yi-isfeṛḥen ma yella mačči d kunwi ?
Uggadeɣ a yi-isḥeznen kra seg wid i glaq a yi-isfeṛḥen, daymi i wen-d-zzewreɣ tabṛaț-nni, axaṭer ẓriɣ ma yella feṛḥeɣ aț-țfeṛḥem ula d kunwi.
Uriɣ-awen tabṛaț-nni s imeṭṭawen d leḥzen ameqqran akk-d wul yetqelqen, mačči iwakken aț țḥeznem lameɛna iwakken aț-țeẓrem acḥal i kkun-ḥemmleɣ.
Ma yella gar-awen win yellan d sebba n leḥzen, mačči d nekk i gesseḥzen lameɛna d kunwi meṛṛa i gesseḥzen, yeɛni bɣiɣ a d-iniɣ amur ameqqran deg-wen.
Amdan-agi tlumm-it meṛṛa tejmaɛt, beṛka-t !
Tura, ilaq-awen kan a s-tsamḥem yerna a t-tesǧehdem, neɣ m'ulac a d iɣli fell-as leḥzen d ameqqran ara t-isfeclen.
Ihi a kkun-nhuɣ a s-d-beggnem belli tḥemmlem-t.
Uriɣ-awen ayagi iwakken ad ẓreɣ ma tețțaɣem awal di kullec.
Win iwumi ara tsamḥem, a s-samḥeɣ ula d nekk ; ma yella wayen i ɣef ara samḥeɣ i yiwen, ɣef ddemma-nwen i s-sumḥeɣ zdat Lmasiḥ ;
s wakka ur nețțaǧa ara Cciṭan a ɣ-iɣleb, axaṭer nessen lmeqṣud-is.
Mi wwḍeɣ ɣer temdint n Truwas iwakken ad beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ, Sidi Ṛebbi yeldi-yi-d tiwwura iwakken ad beccṛeɣ.
Lameɛna ur yethenna ara wul-iw imi ur ufiɣ ara dinna gma-tneɣ Tit ; daymi ǧǧiɣ atmaten n temdint n Truwas, imiren ṛuḥeɣ ɣer tmurt n Masidunya.
A neḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi a t-ncekkeṛ imi s Lmasiḥ i nɣelleb kullec yerna yerra-yaɣ d iqeddacen-is iwakken a nbecceṛ Lmasiḥ di mkul amkan am rriḥa taẓiḍant.
?er Sidi Ṛebbi, d nukni i d rriḥa taẓiḍant n Lmasiḥ ger wid ițwasellken yellan deg webrid n Sidna Ɛisa akk-d wid iḍaɛen.
I wid iḍaɛen, d ṛṛiḥa n lmut i d-ițțaken lmut ; i wid yellan deg webrid n leslak, d rriḥa n tudert i d ițțaken tudert. Anwa ihi i gzemren ad ixdem ccɣel am wagi ?

Nukni ur nețḥerrif ara awal n Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken a netjaṛ yis am akken xeddmen waṭas n yemdanen, lameɛna zdat Sidi Ṛebbi, ț-țideț i d-neqqaṛ mi nețbecciṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ i ɣ-d-yekkan s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi.
D acekkeṛ i nebɣa a d-ncekkeṛ iman-nneɣ mi d-nenna imeslayen agi ? Eɛni neḥwaǧ ula d nukni a wen-nawi tibṛatin n lewṣaya neɣ a tent-id-nawi s ɣuṛ-wen am akken xeddmen kra n yemdanen ?
Tabṛaț-nneɣ, d kunwi s yiman nwen ; ț-țabṛaț yuran deg ulawen nneɣ, tețwassen yerna ɣṛan-ț akk yemdanen.

Iban belli tabṛaț-agi yura-ț Lmasiḥ s yiman-is mi wen-d nbecceṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ; mačči s lmidad i ț-yura lameɛna s Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi yeddren, mačči ɣef teblaḍin n wezṛu i ț-ijerred lameɛna deg ulawen-nwen.
Lețkal-agi i nesɛa deg wayen i d-nenna, yekka-d s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi, s Lmasiḥ.
Ur nezmir ara a d-nini belli d nukni i gxeddmen ccɣel-agi s tezmert-nneɣ lameɛna d Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣ-d-ițțaken tazmert deg wayen akk i nxeddem.

D nețța i ɣ-d-ifkan tazmert s wayes i nuɣal d iqeddacen n leɛqed ajdid . Leɛqed-agi ur d-yekki ara seg wayen yuran di ccariɛa lameɛna s ɣuṛ Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen. Axaṭer ccariɛa tețțawi ɣer lmut, ma d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yețțak-ed tudert.

Ccariɛa yețwajerden ɣef teblaḍin n wezṛu tesban-ed tamanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi deg udem n Sidna Musa, yețfeǧǧiǧ wudem-is almi ur zmiren ara wat Isṛail ad muqlen ɣuṛ-es ; ɣas akken, afeǧǧeǧ-nni ur ițdum ara.
Ma yella ccariɛa i gețțawin ɣer lmut tban-ed s lɛaḍima am tin, acḥal ihi ara tili meqqṛet tmanegt i d-yewwi Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i d-ițakken tudert !
Ma yella leqdic ɣef ccariɛa yețțawin ɣer lmut yesɛa ccan, acḥal meqqeṛ akteṛ ccan n leqdic ɣef Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i gețțarran imdanen d iḥeqqiyen.
Nezmer a d-nini : anda ara d tban tmanegt icceɛceɛen zik-nni zdat tin n tura ? Tuɣal d ulac !
Ma yella ayen ur nețdum ara yesɛa ccan, acḥal ihi i t-yugar di ccan wayen yețdumun.
?ef ddemma n wusirem-agi, i nesɛa lețkal d ameqqran ;
nukni ur nelli ara am Sidna Musa yețɣummun udem-is iwakken ur țwalin ara wat Isṛail lɛaḍima-nni ur nețdum ara.
Ar ass-a qquṛen iqeṛṛay-nsen, gguman ad fehmen ; imi leḥjab-nni ur yekkis ara m'ara d-ɣṛen di tira iqedsen n leɛqed aqdim, axaṭer leḥdjab-agi itekkes anagar s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Ar ass-a, leḥjab-agi ițɣummu ulawen-nsen m'ara qqaṛen ccariɛa n Musa ;
meɛna m'ara d-yuɣal wul n wemdan ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi, leḥjab-nni itekkes ;
axaṭer Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, d Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi. Anda yella Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi, tella tlelli.
Nukni ur nesɛi ara leḥjab ɣef wudmawen-nneɣ, tamanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi tețban-ed deg-nneɣ am akken di lemri, Sidi Ṛebbi yețbeddil-aɣ dayem iwakken a necbu ɣuṛ-es s tmanegt yețnernin.
Ihi, ur ilaq ara a nefcel imi s Ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣ-d ițțunefk leqdic-agi ɣef Lmasiḥ.

Ur neqbil ara ayen yellan d lɛib d wayen yețwaxedmen s tuffra, ur nteddu s tḥila, ur nețḥerrif awal n Ṛebbi. Meɛna nețbeggin-ed awal n Sidi Ṛebbi s tideț, iwakken imdanen meṛṛa ad slen i wawal n Ṛebbi, a t-fehmen akken yella.
Ma mazal lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i wen nbecceṛ ur ițwafhem ara, lmeɛna-ines tețwaffer kan ɣef wid iḍaɛen,

ur numin ara s Ṛebbi ; axaṭer Cciṭan yerran iman is d ṛebbi n ddunit-agi , yesderɣel ixemmimen nsen, daymi ur walan ara tafat yellan di lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yeɛnan tamanegt n Lmasiḥ, nețța yellan d ṣṣifa n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Axaṭer mačči ɣef yiman-nneɣ i nețbecciṛ, lameɛna nețbecciṛ ɣef Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ ; ma d nukni, nuɣal d iqeddacen-nwen ɣef ddemma n Sidna Ɛisa.
Ṛebbi i d-yennan : Tafat aț-țecceɛceɛ di ṭṭlam, d nețța daɣen i d-ifkan tafat tfeǧǧeǧ deg ulawen-nneɣ iwakken a ɣ-d ibeggen tamanegt-is yețfeǧǧiǧen ɣef wudem n Lmasiḥ.
Nukni yețțawin deg iman-nneɣ agerruj-agi, necba ticmuxin n wakal, iwakken tazmert-agi tameqqrant a d-tban belli tusa-d s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi mačči s ɣuṛ-nneɣ.
Nețwaḥṛes si mkul tama meɛna ur nefcil ara ; nella di teswiɛt n ṭṭiq meɛna ur neɣli ara ;
nețwaqheṛ meɛna Sidi Ṛebbi ur aɣ-yeǧǧi ara ; nețwarkeḍ meɛna ur aɣ-nɣin ara.
Nețțawi daymen di lǧețțat-nneɣ lmut n Sidna Ɛisa iwakken a d-tban daɣen deg-nneɣ tudert-is.
Nukni yeddren, nețqabal daymen lmut ɣef ddemma n Sidna Ɛisa, iwakken a d-tban tudert n Sidna Ɛisa di lǧețțat nneɣ ifennun.
S wakka lmut txeddem deg-nneɣ, ma ț-țudert txeddem deg-wen.
Am akken yura di tira iqedsen : umneɣ, daymi i d-hedṛeɣ ; nukni daɣen nesɛa liman-agi, daymi i d nheddeṛ.
Axaṭer neẓra belli Sidi Ṛebbi i d-isseḥyan Sidna Ɛisa si ger lmegtin, a ɣ-d-isseḥyu ula d nukni akk-d Sidna Ɛisa, iwakken a ɣ issemlil yid-wen m'ara nuɣal ɣuṛ-es.

Ayen akk ideṛṛun yid-nneɣ, ideṛṛu ɣef ddemma-nwen, iwakken ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi aț-țaweḍ ɣer waṭas n yemdanen ; s wakka aṭas ara iketṛen di leḥmada n Sidi Ṛebbi, a t-cekkṛen ɣef tmanegt-is.
Daymi ur ilaq ara a nefcel ; axaṭer ɣas akken lǧețța-nneɣ tfennu seg wass ɣer wayeḍ, ṛṛuḥ yellan deg-nneɣ yețnerni seg wass ɣer wayeḍ.
Leɛtab-agi i nesɛedday tura xfif yerna ur ițdum ara ; ițheggi-yaɣ-ed tamanegt tameqqrant ur nfennu.
Axaṭer nukni ur nețnadi ara ɣef wayen țwalint wallen, lameɛna nețnadi ɣef leḥwayeǧ ur țwalint ara ; axaṭer leḥwayeǧ i țwalint wallen fennunt, ma d ayen ur țwalint ara, yețdumu i dayem.

Lǧețțat i nesɛa di ddunit-agi am iqiḍunen ara yefnun, meɛna neẓra belli Sidi Ṛebbi ihegga-yaɣ deg igenwan tinezduɣin n dayem, mačči d ayen yexdem ufus n wemdan, meɛna d ayen yexdem nețța s yiman-is.
Aql-aɣ nenɛețțab zdaxel uqiḍun agi, nețṛaǧu s lḥir melmi ara naweḍ ɣer tnezduɣin n dayem yellan deg igenwan ;
lameɛna ilaq a nili nhegga iman-nneɣ di ddunit-agi, mačči alamma tusa-d lmut a ɣ-tawi.

Skud mazal-aɣ deg uqiḍun n ddunit-agi, yeɛni lǧețțat-nneɣ, nețnazaɛ am akken nbub taɛekkumt ẓẓayen ; mačči d lmut i nebɣa a nemmet, lameɛna nessaram a nels lǧețța n igenwan iwakken ad yețwakkes seg-neɣ wayen ifennun.
D Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣ-iheggan ɣer tudert-agi, ifka-yaɣ-d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen d aɛeṛbun n lbaṛakat ara ɣ-d ițțunefken.
S wakka nesɛa daymen lețkal deg wulawen-nneɣ. Neẓra belli skud mazal-aɣ di lǧețța n ddunit-agi, aql-aɣ mazal nebɛed ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi ;
axaṭer tura aql-aɣ nțeddu s liman, werɛad nwala s wallen.
S tideț nesɛa lețkal deg wulawen nneɣ, lameɛna a wi-yufan a neffeɣ si ddunit-agi iwakken a nili ɣer tama n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ama nella di ddunit-agi ama neffeɣ seg-s, nețnadi kan a neɛǧeb i Sidi Ṛebbi.
Axaṭer a nɛeddi meṛṛa di ccṛeɛ n Lmasiḥ, iwakken mkul yiwen ad ițțuḥaseb ɣef lxiṛ neɣ cceṛ i gexdem asmi yella di ddunit.
Neẓra d acu i d lmeɛna n tugdi n Sidi Ṛebbi, daymi i nețnadi a d nehdu wiyaḍ. Sidi Ṛebbi yessen ulawen-nneɣ akken ilaq, ssarameɣ ula d kunwi tessnem-aɣ, teẓram ayen yellan deg ulawen-nneɣ.

Mačči d zzux i nebɣa a nzux s yiman-nneɣ ɣuṛ-wen, nebɣa kan a nili d sebba n lfeṛḥ-nwen. S wakka aț-țissinem amek ara terrem awal i wid ixedmen ccan i wayen i d ițbanen s ufella kan, mačči i wayen yellan deg wulawen.
Ma yella llant teswiɛin i deg nɛedda tilas deg uselmed-nneɣ, nɛedda tilas iwakken a d-tban tmanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi ; m'ara netɛqqel, i nnfeɛ-nwen i netɛeqqel.
Nețwaḥṛes s leḥmala n Lmasiḥ yeččuṛen ulawen-nneɣ, axaṭer neẓra imi yemmut yiwen wemdan ɣef yemdanen meṛṛa, ihi mmuten meṛṛa.
Yemmut ɣef medden meṛṛa, iwakken wid yeddren ur țɛicin ara i yiman nsen, lameɛna ad ɛicen i win yemmuten yerna yeḥya-d ɣef ddemma-nsen.
Sya d asawen ur nețwali yiwen s lɛeqliya n yemdanen ; ɣas akken zik-nni uqbel a namen nella nețwali Lmasiḥ s lɛeqliya n yemdanen, tura mačči akenni i t-nețwali.
Ihi win iteddun deg webrid n Lmasiḥ, iɛawed ed talalit, yuɣal d amdan ajdid : ayen yellan d aqdim iɛedda, kullec yuɣal d ajdid.
Ayagi meṛṛa yekka-d s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi i gessemṣalaḥen imdanen yid-es s Lmasiḥ, yerna iweṣṣa-yaɣ-ed a nbecceṛ amṣaleḥ-agi i yemdanen meṛṛa n ddunit,
axaṭer s Lmasiḥ i gessemṣaleḥ Sidi Ṛebbi imdanen yid-es mbla ma imuqel ɣer ddnubat-nsen yerna iweṣṣa-yaɣ a nbecceṛ amṣaleḥ-agi.
Ihi nukni d imceggɛen n Lmasiḥ, am akken d Ṛebbi s yiman-is i wen-d-issawalen yis nneɣ : Nețḥellil-ikkun s yisem n Lmasiḥ aț-țemṣalaḥem akk-d Ṛebbi.
Win akken yellan d azedgan leɛmeṛ yednib, Sidi Ṛebbi yeḥkem fell-as deg umkan-nneɣ am akken d amednub i gella iwakken s tikli-nneɣ akk-d Lmasiḥ, a nili d iḥeqqiyen zdat Sidi Ṛebbi.
Imi d iqeddacen n Sidi Ṛebbi i nella, bɣiɣ a kkun-nenhu ur tețḍeggiɛem ara ṛṛeḥma i wen-d ițțunefken s ɣuṛ-es.
Axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-d : Di lweqt ilaqen, qebleɣ-ed taẓallit-ik, di lweqt n leslak, sellkeɣ-k. Ihi tura, atan yewweḍ-ed lweqt ilaqen, yewweḍ-ed wass n leslak.
Di yal lḥaǧa, ur nebɣi ara a nili d ugur ula i yiwen deg-wen iwakken ur d-tețțekksem ara kra n diri di lxedma-nneɣ,
meɛna nețbeggin-ed belli d iqeddacen n Sidi Ṛebbi i nella deg wayen akk nxeddem : nṣebbeṛ i teswiɛin n ceddat, i lḥif, i tugdi,
i tiytiwin ; neṣbeṛ mi nella di leḥbus, di teswiɛin n ccwal, leɛtab, aɛawez akk-d laẓ ;
nedda s wul yeṣfan, s tmusni, s ṣṣbeṛ, s leḥnana, s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, s leḥmala n ṣṣeḥ,
s wawal n tideț, s tezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi, s leslaḥ n lḥeqq s wayes nețnaɣ yerna nețdafaɛ ɣef yiman-nneɣ ;
ama di teswiɛin n ccan neɣ n lɛaṛ, ama mi heddṛen fell-aɣ medden s lxiṛ neɣ s cceṛ. Nețwaḥseb d ikeddaben ɣas akken ț-țideț i d neqqaṛ,
nețwankeṛ, ɣas akken nețwassen ɣer yemdanen meṛṛa ; ḥesben-aɣ nemmut, nukni nedder ; țqehhiṛen-aɣ lameɛna ur nemmut ara ;
sseɣlayen-d fell-aɣ leḥzen, lameɛna nețțili daymen di lfeṛḥ. ?esben-aɣ d igellilen, lameɛna nesserbaḥ aṭas n yemdanen, ɣilen ur nesɛi acemma, lameɛna nukni ur aɣ-ixuṣṣ ula d kra.
Ay imezdaɣ n temdint n Kurintus, nemmeslay-awen-d, neldi-yawen mliḥ ulawen-nneɣ,
ur ten-neɣliq ara ɣuṛ wen, d kunwi i gɣelqen ulawen-nwen ɣuṛ-nneɣ.
?meslayeɣ-awen-d am akken d arraw-iw i tellam : xedmet am nukni, swesɛet ulawen-nwen ula d kunwi !
Ur cerrket ara d wid ur nețțamen ara s Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken aț-țxedmem am nutni. Eɛni lḥeqq d lbaṭel, zemren ad cerken ? Tafat akk-d ṭṭlam, zemren ad ddukklen ?
Amek ! Yezmer Lmasiḥ ad imsefham akk-d Cciṭan ? Acu n tdukli yellan ger win yețțamnen s Ṛebbi d win ur nețțamen ara ?

D acu icerken lǧameɛ iqedsen n Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d lmeṣnuɛat ? Axaṭer d nukni i d lǧameɛ iqedsen n Ṛebbi yeddren. Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-t-id di tira iqedsen : Ad zedɣeɣ yerna ad lḥuɣ gar-asen, A d iliɣ d Illu-nsen, ad ilin d agdud iw
?ef wannect-agi i d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi : Mfaṛaqet d yemdanen-agi, beɛdet fell-asen ; ur țnalet ara ayen iḥeṛmen, nekk ad sṭerḥbeɣ yis-wen ;
ad iliɣ d baba-twen, kunwi aț-țilim d arraw-iw, d yess-i ; akka i d-yenna Ṛebbi Bab n tezmert.

A wid eɛzizen, imi i ɣ-d țțunefkent lemɛahdat-agi, ilaq a nessizdeg iman-nneɣ seg wayen akk issenǧasen lǧețța-nneɣ akk-d wulawen-nneɣ iwakken a nkemmel tezdeg n tikli-nneɣ akk-d Sidi Ṛebbi, s ṭṭaɛa d wannuz.
Qeblet-aɣ deg wulawen-nwen ! Ur neḍlim yiwen, ur nexdim cceṛ ula i yiwen, ur nečči lḥeqq n yiwen.
Ur d-nniɣ ara annect-agi iwakken a kkun-sḍelmeɣ ; axaṭer nniɣ-awen t-id yakan : ama nedder ama newweḍ ɣer lmut, tellam deg wulawen-nneɣ .
Lețkal-iw fell-awen meqqeṛ, țzuxxuɣ aṭas yis-wen ; yethedden wul-iw yerna yeččuṛ d lfeṛḥ ɣas akken nesɛedda aṭas n leɛtab.
Seg wasmi i d-nekcem tamurt n Masidunya ur nesteɛfa, nețwaḥṛes si mkul tama : ccwal di beṛṛa, tugdi deg ulawen-nneɣ.
Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yețṣebbiṛen wid yețwaḥeqṛen, iṣebbeṛ aɣ s gma-tneɣ Titus mi d-yewweḍ.

Mačči kan mi d-yewweḍ gma tneɣ Titus i nețțuṣebbeṛ, lameɛna nețțuṣebbeṛ daɣen s ṣṣbeṛ i d-yewwi s ɣuṛ-wen. Yeḥka-yaɣ-d acḥal tețmennim a yi-teẓrem, acḥal tḥeznem d wamek tebɣam a yi-tɛiwnem seg ul. ?ef wayagi i gzad lfeṛḥ-iw.
?riɣ belli sḥezneɣ-kkun s tebṛaț iw tamezwarut, lameɛna ur ndimeɣ ara ; ɣas akken ndemmeɣ, ndemmeɣ kan mi ẓriɣ sḥezneɣ-kkun kra n lweqt.

Tura aql-i feṛḥeɣ, mačči imi i kkun-sḥezneɣ, meɛna imi s leḥzen-agi tettubem yerna tbeddlem tikli. Axaṭer leḥzen-nni i d-yeɣlin fell awen yusa-d s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi, s wakka ur d-yekki wacemma n diri s ɣuṛ-nneɣ.
Leḥzen i d-itekken s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi ițbeddil tikli n wemdan, yețțawi ɣer leslak yerna ur nțendemmay ara deg-s ; ma d leḥzen i d-itekken si ddunit, yețțawi ɣer lmut.

Leḥzen-agi-nwen yeɛǧeb aṭas Sidi Ṛebbi, walit acḥal i gexdem deg-wen : acḥal i tenneḥcamem d wamek i tḍelbem ssmaḥ ! Acḥal tendemmem, tekcem-ikkun tugdi n Sidi Ṛebbi ; acḥal tcedham a yi teẓrem yerna tebɣam a yi tɛiwnem ; amek daɣen tɛuqbem wid ixeddmen cceṛ ! Deg wayagi meṛṛa tesbeggnem-d belli teṣfam di taluft-agi.
Ihi ma uriɣ-awen-d, mačči ɣef ddemma n win iḍelmen neɣ win yețwaḍelmen, lameɛna iwakken a d-iban gar-awen zdat Sidi Ṛebbi, acḥal meqqeṛ leḥmala-nwen ɣuṛ-nneɣ.
?ef wannect-agi i theddnen wulawen-nneɣ. Sennig ṣṣbeṛ-agi, lfeṛḥ-nneɣ yennerna mi nwala acḥal yefṛeḥ yis-wen gma-tneɣ Titus, axaṭer tekksem-as anezgum.
?ideț zuxxeɣ yis-wen zdat-es, lameɛna ur nneḥcameɣ ara, axaṭer anagar tideț i wen-d-nheddeṛ yal ass imi ayen akken s wayes nzuxx yis-wen zdat gma-tneɣ Titus, iban-ed belli ț-țideț ;
lemḥibba-s ɣuṛ-wen tețnerni mkul m'ara d-immekti amek i tesṭerḥbem yis s leqdeṛ d wannuz.
Feṛḥeɣ imi zemreɣ ad țekleɣ fell-awen di kullec.
Nebɣa a kkun-nesseɛlem ay atmaten ɣef wayen yeɛnan ṛṛeḥma i d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi i tejmuyaɛ n imasiḥiyen yellan di tmurt n Masidunya ;
țwajeṛben s waṭas n lmeḥnat, lameɛna lfeṛḥ-nsen yețnerni. ?as akken d igellilen i llan yerna xuṣṣen aṭas, seddqen mbla cceḥḥa ;
fkan-d ayen iwumi zemren ; aql-iyi d inigi, zemreɣ a d-iniɣ fkan-d nnig n tezmert-nsen yerna xedmen ayagi s lebɣi-nsen.
Ssutren-aɣ-d s uḥellel iwakken a sen-nexdem lemziya a d-fken ula d nutni amur-nsen n ssadaqa-agi i njemmeɛ iwakken a ț-țnawi i watmaten n tmurt n Yahuda yellan di lexṣas.
Zwaren deg iman-nsen mi fkan tudert-nsen i Ṛebbi, imiren s lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi, rnan qeddcen fell-aɣ seg ul ; ayagi sennig wayen nessaram !
S wakka ihi, nweṣṣa gma-tneɣ Titus ad ikemmel lxedma-nni i gebda ɣuṛ-wen ɣef wayen yeɛnan ssadaqa agi.
Am akken i tẓewṛem di kullec, ama di liman neɣ deg wawal, ama di tmusni neɣ di lemḥibba i tesɛam ɣuṛ-nneɣ, ẓewṛet daɣen di temsalt yeɛnan ssadaqa.
Mačči d lameṛ i bɣiɣ a wen-d fkeɣ ; ḥkiɣ-awen amek i zewṛen wiyaḍ, iwakken a kkun-jeṛṛbeɣ ma tesɛam leḥmala n tideț neɣ ala.
Tessnem ṛṛeḥma n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yellan d Bab n lerbaḥ n ddunit meṛṛa, yuɣal d igellil ɣef ddemma-nwen iwakken a kkun isserbeḥ s tigellelt-ines.

A wen-d-fkeɣ ṛṛay-iw deg wayagi axaṭer d ayen i wen-ilhan : aseggas iɛeddan, d kunwi i d imezwura i gebɣan aț-țɛiwnem atmaten n tmurt n Yahuda yellan di lexṣaṣ, d kunwi daɣen i d imezwura i gebdan tjemmɛem-d ssadaqa-agi ;
ihi tura kemmlet ccɣel-agi i tebdam, s wayen iwumi tzemrem ; am akken i t-tebdam seg ul, kemmlet-eț s wul.
Sidi Ṛebbi iqebbel ssadaqa-nneɣ, lameɛna s wakken tella tezmert-nneɣ, mačči sennig wayen nezmer.
Ur nebɣi ara a d-nini xlut ixxamen-nwen iwakken aț-țɛiwnem wiyaḍ, lameɛna iwakken aț-țemɛadalem ;
ayen tesɛam d zzyada ad yenfeɛ wid ixuṣṣen tura, iwakken asm'ara txuṣṣem kunwi, a kkun-ɛiwnen s wayen sɛan d zzyada ; s wakka ihi aț-țemɛadalem,
akken yura di tira iqedsen : Win yesɛan aṭas ur yesɛi ara zzyada, ma d win yesɛan cwiṭ ur t-ixuṣṣ kra .
A neḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef gma tneɣ Titus imi yețḥebbiṛ fell-awen am nukni.
Yeqbel mi t-in-nceggeɛ, yerna uqbel a s-nini yella iqsed a n-iruḥ ɣuṛ wen s lfeṛḥ d ameqqran.
A nceggeɛ yid-es yiwen seg watmaten-nneɣ i cekkṛent akk tejmuyaɛ n watmaten ɣef lxedma-ines deg ubecceṛ n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ;

ur yețwaxtaṛ ara kan d aṛfiq, lameɛna ț-țijmuyaɛ n watmaten i t-ixtaṛen iwakken a ɣ-iɛiwen di ccɣel agi yeɛnan ssadaqa ɣef ddemma n tmanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi, s wakka daɣen a d-nbeggen acḥal nebɣa a nɛiwen wiyaḍ.
Nețḥadar iman-nneɣ iwakken ur heddṛen ara fell-aɣ lɣaci ɣef wayen yeɛnan aḍebbeṛ i nețḍebbiṛ di ssadaqa agi, axaṭer aṭas n yedrimen i d nejmeɛ ;
nețqellib ayen yelhan ama zdat Sidi Ṛebbi ama zdat yemdanen.

Nceggeɛ yid-sen gma-tneɣ agi i njeṛṛeb acḥal d abrid di yal taswiɛt, nwala amek yebɣa ad iqdec seg ul ; tikkelt-agi ẓẓwaṛa-ines di leqdic ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi tban-ed akteṛ, axaṭer yețkel fell-awen.
?ef wayen yeɛnan gma-tneɣ Titus, d arfiq-iw yerna ixeddem yid-i ɣef ddemma-nwen, ma d atmaten nniḍen, d imceggɛen n tejmuyaɛ n watmaten ; qeddcen iwakken a d tban tmanegt n Lmasiḥ.
Sbeggnet-ed ihi belli tḥemmlem ten s tideț iwakken tijmuyaɛ n watmaten ad ẓrent belli nesɛa lḥeqq imi nețzuxxu yis-wen.
?ef wayen yeɛnan lemɛawna n watmaten, fiḥel ma uriɣ awen-d.

?riɣ acḥal tebɣam aț țqedcem, daymi i țzuxxuɣ yis-wen zdat n tejmuyaɛ n Masidunya qqaṛeɣ asen : atmaten n tmurt n Akaya heggan iman-nsen ad ɛiwnen seg useggas iɛeddan. ?ẓwaṛa-nwen di leqdic tessaki aṭas deg-sen.
Ceggɛeɣ atmaten-agi iwakken ad iban belli ț-țideț, tuklalem a nzux yis-wen yerna theggam iman-nwen am akken i t-id-nniɣ.
Ma yella ddan yid-i kra seg watmaten n Masidunya ilaq a kkun-in-afen theggam iman nwen iwakken zzux-nni i țzuxxuɣ yis wen ur iyi-țțuɣal ara d lḥecma, bɣiɣ a d-iniɣ d lḥecma nwen kunwi !

?ef ddemma n wannect-agi i wen-ceggɛeɣ kra seg watmaten a n-zwiren ɣuṛ-wen iwakken a d jemɛen ssadaqa-nni i ɣ-tweɛdem. S wakka m'ara n-awḍeɣ ad afeɣ theggam kullec yerna a d-iban belli ayen i tseddqem tefkam-t-id seg ul, ur kkun-iḥettem yiwen.
Ilaq aț-țeẓrem belli win i gzerɛen cwiṭ a d-imger cwiṭ ; ma d win izerɛen aṭas, a d-imger aṭas.
Mkul yiwen ilaq ad iseddeq akken yenwa deg ul-is, mačči s uḥettem neɣ s nndama axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi iḥemmel win ițseddiqen s lfeṛḥ.
Sidi Ṛebbi yesɛa tazmert a kkun id yeṛzeq s lbaṛakat n mkul ṣṣenf, ur kkun-ițxaṣṣa wacemma deg wayen akk teḥwaǧem yerna aț-țesɛum s zzyada iwakken aț-țizmirem aț-țseddqem.
Axaṭer yura di tira iqedsen : Yețțak-ed lbaṛakat-is mbla cceḥḥa, irẓeq-ed imeɣban, ṛ ṛeḥma-ines tețdumu i dayem .
Win i d-yețțaken i ufellaḥ zzerriɛa akk-d weɣṛum ara yečč , a wen-d-yefk ula i kunwi s lketṛa yerna ad issefti lbaṛakat n wayen tețseddiqem .
Sidi Ṛebbi ad issefti leṛzaq-nwen, s wakka aț-țizmirem aț-țseddqem mbla cceḥḥa ; imiren aṭas ara iḥemden Sidi Ṛebbi a t-cekkṛen ɣef wayen i sen-tseddqem.
Axaṭer ssadaqa-agi, ur tețțili ara kan d lemɛawna i watmaten, lameɛna iwakken a d-ilin daɣen waṭas n yemdanen ara iḥemden Sidi Ṛebbi.
Imi i d-tbeggnem belli tqeddcem ɣef lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ yerna tfeṛṛqem ayen akk tesɛam akk-d watmaten nniḍen, țḥemmiden Sidi Ṛebbi țcekkiṛen-t ɣef liman d ṭṭaɛa nwen.
Deɛɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi fell-awen ɣef ddemma n ṛṛeḥma tameqqrant i wen-ițțunefken s ɣuṛ-es, axaṭer ḥemmlen-kkun.
Ad ițțubarek Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef ṛṛeḥma-ines ur nesɛi lemtel !
Nekk Bulus i ɣef qqaṛen țsetḥiɣ m'ara iliɣ zdat-wen meɛna m'ara beɛdeɣ fell-awen weɛṛeɣ ɣuṛ-wen, bɣiɣ a kkun-nhuɣ s leḥnana d ṛṛeḥma n Lmasiḥ.
Di leɛnaya-nwen, ur iyi-ḥeṛṛset ara ad iwɛiṛeɣ m'ara iliɣ yid-wen ! Axaṭer lewɛaṛa-inu a ț-id-sbeggneɣ s lețkal yerna mbla lḥecma ɣer wid i ɣ-iḥesben nțeddu s lɛeqliya n ddunit.
?-țideț d imdanen i nella, lameɛna ur nețnaɣ ara s leslaḥ s wayes țnaɣen yemdanen ;
axaṭer leslaḥ-nneɣ, mačči d wid i ssexdamen yemdanen lameɛna nețnaɣ s leslaḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi i gzemren ad hudden ula d leswaṛ iǧehden.
Nețṛuẓu awal n kra n wid yebɣan a d-kken sennig n tmusni n Sidi Ṛebbi ; nebɣa a nessiweḍ imdanen meṛṛa ad beddlen ixemmimen-nsen iwakken ad ḍuɛen Lmasiḥ.
Asm'ara tessawḍem ṭṭaɛa-nwen ɣer lekmal-is, imiren a nɛaqeb kra n win iɛuṣan Sidi Ṛebbi.
Walit tideț akken ilaq lḥal : ma yella win itḥeqqeqen belli d ayla n Lmasiḥ i gella, ilaq ad iẓer belli akken yella nețța d ayla n Lmasiḥ i nella ula d nukni.
?as ma zuxxeɣ s tissas i yi-d-ifka Sidi Ṛebbi, ur ssetḥaɣ ara axaṭer tissas-agi ur sseɣlayent ara, lameɛna ad ssemɣuṛent tijmuyaɛ n watmaten di liman.
Ur bɣiɣ ara aț-țɣilem belli bɣiɣ a kkun-sxelɛeɣ s tebṛatin-iw.
Axaṭer llan wid yeqqaṛen : tibṛatin n Bulus qeṛṛḥent, sɛant tissas lameɛna m'ara yili gar-aneɣ ur yesɛi lhiba ur yesɛi tissas di lehduṛ-is.
Win i d-yennan annect-a, ilaq ad iẓer belli akken newɛeṛ m'ara wen naru tibṛatin ara newɛeṛ daɣen m'ara nili gar-awen.
Ur nezmir ara a nesseɛdel neɣ a nmettel iman-nneɣ ɣer wid yețcekkiṛen iman-nsen. ?mettilen iman-nsen ɣer yiman-nsen, ḥesben ulac win yellan sennig-nsen ; xuṣṣen di lefhama.
Nukni, ur netzuxxu ara sennig wayen ilaqen, lameɛna nețzuxxu kan s ccɣel i ɣ-d-iwekkel Sidi Ṛebbi ; d ccɣel-agi i ɣ-issawḍen armi d ɣuṛ wen.
Asmi i d-nusa ɣuṛ-wen, ur nɛedda ara tilas n ccɣel-nneɣ axaṭer d nukni i wen-ibeccṛen d imezwura lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ.
Ur nețzuxxu ara sennig wayen ilaqen, ur nețțawi ara ccan n lxedma n wiyaḍ lameɛna nessaram d kunwi ara yessimɣuṛen ccan n lxedma-nneɣ m'ara timɣuṛem di liman ;
iwakken mbla ma nɛedda i tlisa n ccɣel-nneɣ , a nbecceṛ daɣen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i tmura nniḍen, mačči d zzux ara nzuxx s ccɣel i xedmen wiyaḍ. Yura di tira iqedsen :
Win yebɣan ad izuxx, ad izuxx s wayen ixeddem Sidi Ṛebbi.
Axaṭer mačči d win yețzuxxun s yiman-is i gețwaqeblen lameɛna d win yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ah ! A lukan aț-țqeblem kra n timmuhbelt si lǧiha-w ! Lameɛna qeblet-eț kan !

Imi i kkun-ḥemmleɣ, țțasmeɣ fell-awen s tismin i d-yekkan s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi ; axaṭer xeḍbeɣ-kkun i yiwen n yesli kan : d Lmasiḥ ; iwakken a kkun-qeddmeɣ ɣuṛ-es am tlemẓit leɛmeṛ nezwiǧ leɛmeṛ.
Uggadeɣ a wen-sxeṛben ixemmimen nwen, aț-țettixṛem i neyya d ṣṣfa n wul-nwen di Lmasiḥ, aț-țedṛu yid-wen am ?ewwa i gexdeɛ wezrem s tḥila-ines.

Amek armi tḥessem i wid i wen-ibeccṛen Ɛisa nniḍen ur nelli d win akken i wen-nbecceṛ nukni ; amek tqeblem ṛṛuḥ iqedsen nniḍen ur nelli ara d win s wayes i tesṭerḥbem di tazwara neɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ nniḍen ixulfen win akken i wen-nbecceṛ ?
Akken walaɣ, ṛṛusul-nni i tḥesbem d imeqqranen ur iyi-yifen deg wacemma.
?as akken ur ssineɣ ara ad mmeslayeɣ, lameɛna ssneɣ Sidi Ṛebbi akken ilaq yerna nbeggen awen-t-id acḥal n tikkal di mkul lḥaǧa !
Asmi i wen-beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ, eɛni ḍelmeɣ mi ssanzeɣ iman-iw iwakken a kkun ssaɛliɣ kunwi ?
Ɛerraɣ tijmuyaɛ nniḍen imi i yi-d-țceggiɛen idrimen iwakken ad qedceɣ fell-awen.

Asmi lliɣ ɣuṛ-wen, ɣas akken xuṣṣeɣ ur lliɣ ț-țaɛkumt ɣef yiwen, axaṭer atmaten i d-yusan si tmurt n Masidunya fkan-iyi-d ayen akk i ḥwaǧeɣ. Di yal lḥaǧa, ḥudreɣ iman-iw iwakken ur țțiliɣ ara ț-țaɛekkumt fell-awen, yerna mazal ad ḥadreɣ iman-iw.
S tideț n Lmasiḥ yellan deg-i, a d-iniɣ : yiwen ur iyi-tekkes sebba agi n zzux i sɛiɣ di tmura n Akaya.
Acuɣeṛ ? Eɛni ur teɛzizem ara fell-i ? Atan Sidi Ṛebbi yezṛa !
Ayen akka xeddmeɣ, mazal a t-xedmeɣ iwakken ur sen-țaǧǧaɣ ara abrid i wid yebɣan ad zuxxen belli xeddmen am nukni.
Imdanen-agi, d ṛṛusul n lekdeb, d ixeddaɛen, țțaran iman-nsen d imceggɛen n Lmasiḥ.
Annect-a mačči d ayen issewhamen, imi ula d Cciṭan yezmer ad yerr iman-is d lmelk yețfeǧǧiǧen am tafat.
Ihi daɣen, mačči d ayen yessewhamen ma yella iqeddacen-is țțaran iman-nsen d iqeddacen n webrid n lḥeqq ; lameɛna taggara-nsen aț-țili akken llan lecɣal nsen.
A t-id-ɛiwdeɣ, ɣuṛ-wat a yi tḥesbem d amehbul ; neɣ qeblet-iyi am akken d amehbul iwakken ula d nekk ad zuxxeɣ cwiṭ.
Ayen akka ara d-iniɣ, mačči s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi i d-yekka lameɛna a d-hedṛeɣ s timmuhbelt, yerna țekleɣ axaṭer sɛiɣ ayen s wayes ara zuxxeɣ.
Imi aṭas i gețzuxxun s lɛeqliya n ddunit-agi, ula d nekk ad zuxxeɣ.
Axaṭer tṣebṛem i yimehbal kunwi yesɛan leɛqel !
?as akken ḥesben-kkun am aklan, ččan lḥeqq-nwen, ɛerran-kkun, bbehdlen-kkun, ḥeqṛen-kkun, meɛna tṣebṛem-asen.
Ssetḥaɣ a t-id-iniɣ meɛna a t-id iniɣ : nukni ur nezmir ara a nexdem akka, meɛna s timmuhbelt zemreɣ a d-iniɣ : ma yella win yesɛan sebba s wayes ara izuxx, ula d nekk ad zuxxeɣ :
d iɛebṛaniyen i llan ? Ula d nekk d aɛibṛani ; seg wat Isṛail i llan ? Ula d nekk n wat Isṛail ; ț-țarwa n Sidna Ibṛahim ? Ula d nekk si tarwa-s ;

d iqeddacen n Lmasiḥ i llan ? ?ef wannect-agi daɣen a d hedṛeɣ am umdan yeffeɣ leɛqel : nekk ugareɣ-ten s waṭas, xedmeɣ akteṛ-nsen, kecmeɣ leḥbus acḥal n tikkal, țewwteɣ akteṛ-nsen, acḥal d abrid i wwḍeɣ ɣer lmut !
Xemsa yiberdan i ččiɣ tiyita s ɣuṛ wudayen ; mkul tikkelt s ṛebɛin tiyita ɣiṛ yiwet ;
tlata iberdan i yi-wten iṛumaniyen s ujelkaḍ ; yiwen webrid qṛib i yi-nɣan s weṛjam ; ɣeṛqeɣ tlata iberdan di lebḥeṛ, sɛeddaɣ yiwen wass d yiwen yiḍ deg waman.

Mmugreɣ-ed acḥal n wuguren m'ara tsafaṛeɣ : isaffen iweɛṛen, imakaren deg iberdan, lxuf di temdinin, deg imukan yexlan, m'ara zegreɣ i lebḥuṛ ; lxuf ger wat n tmurt-iw akk-d wid ur numin ara s Ṛebbi, lxuf ger watmaten n lekdeb.
Xedmeɣ yerna nneɛtabeɣ aṭas, acḥal d abrid țțuẓumeɣ, zgiɣ deg uɛawez, di laẓ akk-d fad, deg usemmiḍ akk-d ɛerru.
Mbla ma nniɣ-ed ayen nniḍen : aḥebbeṛ yal ass ɣef tejmuyaɛ n watmaten,
anwa i gfeclen di liman ur iyi-issefcel ara ? Anwa i geɣlin di ddnub ur tecɛil deg-i tmes ?
Ma ilaq ad zuxxeɣ, ad zuxxeɣ s wayen i d-ițbegginen belli ur sɛiɣ ara tazmert.
Sidi Ṛebbi yellan d baba-s n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, yețțubarken i dayem, yeẓra belli ur skiddibeɣ ara !
Di temdint n Dimecq, ameqqran n ineɣlafen n ugellid Ariṭas yesbedd taɛessast ɣef tewwurt n temdint iwakken a yi-ṭṭfen,
lameɛna ṣubben iyi-d si ṭṭaq, zdaxel uḍellaɛ, lḥiḍ lḥiḍ ; s wakka i d-menɛeɣ seg ifassen-is.
Eɛni ilaq ad zuxxeɣ ? Ayagi ur infiɛ ara ! Lameɛna a d-ḥkuɣ ɣef kra n leḥwayeǧ i yi-d-iweḥḥa Sidi Ṛebbi.

Ssneɣ yiwen wergaz yumnen s Lmasiḥ, yețwarfed alamma d igenni wis tlata ṛbeɛṭac iseggasen aya ; ur ẓriɣ ma yella yețwarfed nețța s yiman is neɣ d aweḥḥi kan i s-d-ițțuweḥḥa, anagar Sidi Ṛebbi i geẓran.

?riɣ belli argaz-agi yețwarfed ɣer lǧennet, meɛna ur ẓriɣ ma yella yețwarfed nețța s yiman-is neɣ d aweḥḥi kan i s-d-ițțuweḥḥa, anagar Sidi Ṛebbi i geẓran ; yesla i yimeslayen iwumi ur yezmir yiwen a ten-id-yini, axaṭer ur ilaq i wemdan a ten-id-iɛawed.
Argaz am wagi zemreɣ ad zuxxeɣ yis, ma d nekk ur sɛiɣ ara s wayes ara zuxxeɣ anagar s lqella n lǧehd-iw.

Lemmer bɣiɣ ad zuxxeɣ, ur țțiliɣ ara d amehbul axaṭer anagar tideț ara d-iniɣ ; lameɛna ad ssusmeɣ, imi ur bɣiɣ ara imdanen a yi-ssalin ccan sennig n wayen țwalin xeddmeɣ-t neɣ ayen sellen qqaṛeɣ t-id.
Yenta-yi yiwen usennan s wayes i yi-țmeḥḥin Cciṭan iwakken ur ssimɣuṛeɣ ara iman-iw yerna ur țzuxxuɣ ara s uweḥḥi-nni yesteɛǧiben i yi-d-ibeggen Sidi Ṛebbi.
Tlata iberdan i dɛiɣ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken ad issebɛed fell-i lmeḥna-agi,

lameɛna yenna-yi-d : « steqneɛ kan s ṛṛeḥma-inu, axaṭer m'ara tfecleḍ imiren i d-tețban deg-k tezmert-iw ». Ihi bɣiɣ ad zuxxeɣ axiṛ s lqella n tezmert-iw iwakken tazmert n Lmasiḥ aț-țezdeɣ deg-i.
?ef wannect-agi, feṛḥeɣ m'ara fecleɣ, m'ara iliɣ di lḥeṛs, di leqheṛ, di leḥzen, di ceddat neɣ m'ara yi-regmen ɣef ddemma n Lmasiḥ, axaṭer m'ara fecleɣ imiren i ǧehdeɣ.
D kunwi i yi-ḥeṛsen armi heddṛeɣ am umehbul ; d kunwi i glaqen a yi-tcekkṛem, axaṭer ɣas akken ur swiɣ acemma, ur iyi-ifen deg wacemma wid iḥețțben iman-nsen d ṛṛusul.
Ayen akk i d-ițbegginen belli d ṛṛasul i lliɣ, yedṛa-d gar-awen : s ṣṣbeṛ ameqqran, s tezmert, s beṛhanat d licaṛat.
D acu i xedmeɣ i tejmuyaɛ nniḍen ur wen-t-xdimeɣ ara i kunwi, anagar imi ugiɣ ad iliɣ ț-țaɛkumt fell-awen ? Semmḥet-iyi ɣef wannect agi !

Aql-iyi țedduɣ a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ wen tikkelt tis tlata, yerna ur țțiliɣ ara ț-țaɛekkumt fell-awen. Mačči d idrimen-nwen i bɣiɣ lameɛna d kunwi ; axaṭer mačči d dderya i glaqen ad jemɛen i lwaldin-nsen, lameɛna d lwaldin i glaq ad jemɛen i dderya-nsen.
Ma d nekkini, zemreɣ ad ṣeṛṛfeɣ fell-awen seg ul ayen sɛiɣ, ad rnuɣ ad sebbleɣ ula ț-țudert-iw ɣef ddemma-nwen. Eɛni leḥmala-nwen ɣuṛ-i aț-țenqes imi i kkun-ḥemmleɣ aṭas ?
?-țideț ur a wen-lliɣ ara ț țaɛekkumt, lameɛna kra deg-wen qqaṛen, imi ḥeṛceɣ, ṭṭfeɣ-kkun s tḥila !
Eɛni kellxeɣ-awen mi wen-ceggɛeɣ kra seg watmaten ?
Asmi ḥelleleɣ Tit a n-yas ɣuṛ-wen akk-d gma-tneɣ nniḍen, yella wayen i d-istenfeɛ seg-wen Titus ? Eɛni ur neddi ara nekk yid-es s yiwet n lɛeqliya akk d yiwet n tikli ?

Acḥal aya kunwi tɣilem nețnadi amek ara ndafeɛ ɣef yiman-nneɣ zdat-nwen. Lameɛna zdat Sidi Ṛebbi, nukni nheddeṛ-awen-d s lebɣi n Lmasiḥ. Annect-agi meṛṛa a wid eɛzizen fell-aɣ, nxeddem-it iwakken aț-țennernim di liman.

Axaṭer uggadeɣ m'ara n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-wen, ur kkun-țțafeɣ ara akken bɣiɣ, kunwi daɣen ur iyi-tețțafem ara akken tenwam ; uggadeɣ a n-afeɣ gar-awen amennuɣ, tismin, zzɛaf, amḥezwer, zzux, ccwal, aqeṛṛeḍ, wid yekkaten deg wiyaḍ.

Uggadeɣ m'ara n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-wen, ad ssetḥiɣ yis-wen zdat Sidi Ṛebbi ; uggadeɣ ad țruɣ ɣef waṭas deg-wen iɛacen zik-nni di ddnub yerna ar ass-a ur tuben, ur rrin aḍar ɣef lefsed-nsen, ɣef yir tikli-nsen akk-d ticmatin i xeddmen.
Atan a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-wen tikkelt tis tlata, mkul taluft aț-țefru s sin neɣ tlata inigan akken yura di tira iqedsen.

Asmi i n-usiɣ ɣuṛ-wen tikkelt tis snat nniɣ-awen-t-id, tura daɣen ɣas ur lliɣ ara yid-wen, a t-id-ɛiwdeɣ ama i wid-nni yeɣlin di ddnub deg wayen iɛeddan, ama i wiyaḍ : asm'ara n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-wen ur țqileɣ ula d yiwen,
imi tebɣam aț-țetḥeqqeqem belli d Lmasiḥ i d-iheddṛen seg-i ; nețța ur nelli ara d win ifeclen ɣuṛ-wen lameɛna isbeggen-ed tazmert-is gar awen.

?-țideț yețwaṣleb ɣef ddemma n wefcal-ines, lameɛna yedder s tezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi ; ula d nukni nefcel imi nella di Lmasiḥ lameɛna a nidir yid-es s tezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi di leqdic-nneɣ gar-awen.
Jeṛṛbet tmeyyzem deg iman-nwen iwakken aț-țwalim ma tețțeddum s liman neɣ ala ; eɛni ur teɛqilem ara belli Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yella deg-wen ? Neɣ ahat tfeclem mi tețțujeṛbem ?
Lameɛna ssarameɣ aț-țestɛeṛfem belli nukni nbeggen-ed liman-nneɣ di teswiɛt n ujeṛṛeb !
Ndeɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken ur txeddmem ara cceṛ, mačči iwakken a d-nbeggen belli nesɛa lḥeqq, lameɛna nebɣa kan aț-țxedmem lxiṛ, ɣas ma nban-ed belli nefcel deg ujeṛṛeb.
Axaṭer ur nesɛi ara tazmert iwakken a nxalef tideț, lameɛna nesɛa kan tazmert s wayes ara neqdec ɣef tideț.
Nfeṛṛeḥ s wefcal-nneɣ ma yella kunwi tǧehdem ; m'ara ndeɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi fell-awen, nessaram aț-țennernim di liman.

Atah iwacu i wen-țaruɣ akkagi m'ara beɛdeɣ fell-awen, iwakken asm'ara iliɣ gar-awen, ur țiwɛiṛeɣ ara ɣuṛ-wen s tezmert i yi-d-ifka Sidi Ṛebbi, iwakken a kkun-sǧehdeɣ mačči iwakken a kkun-sseɣliɣ.

Tura ay atmaten ilit di lfeṛḥ, ssimɣuṛet liman-nwen, nadit amek ara tawḍem ɣer lekmal, mseǧhadet wway gar-awen, msefhamet, ɛicet di lehna, imiren Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n talwit akk-d leḥmala ad yili yid-wen.
?emsalamet wway gar-awen s sslam n tegmaț. Atmaten meṛṛa țsellimen fell-awen.
Ṛṛeḥma n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, leḥmala n Sidi Ṛebbi ț-țdukli i d-ițțak Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ad ilin yid-wen meṛṛa !
Nekk Bulus, yellan d ṛṛasul, mačči s ufus neɣ s lebɣi n yemdanen, lameɛna s lebɣi n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ akk-d Baba Ṛebbi i t-id isseḥyan si ger lmegtin.
Uriɣ tabṛaț-agi nekk d watmaten meṛṛa yellan yid-i, i tejmuyaɛ n watmaten n tmurt n Galasya :
ṛṛeḥma d lehna a wen-d-țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Baba-tneɣ Ṛebbi akk-d Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Lmasiḥ isebbel iman-is ɣef ddnubat-nneɣ, iwakken a ɣ-isellek si yir lǧil-agi, s lebɣi n Baba-tneɣ Ṛebbi.
I nețța tamanegt si lǧil ɣer lǧil ! Amin !
Wehmeɣ imi twexxṛem s lemɣawla ɣef win i wen-d-issawlen s ṛṛeḥma n Lmasiḥ, iwakken aț-țḍefṛem lexbaṛ n lxiṛ nniḍen.
Ur wen-d-nniɣ ara akka am akken yella lexbaṛ n lxiṛ nniḍen , lameɛna qqaṛeɣ-awen-d akka, axaṭer llan kra lɣaci i kkun-icewwlen yerna bɣan ad sɛewjen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yeɛnan Lmasiḥ.
?as a lukan d nukni, neɣ d lmelk ara d-yasen seg igenni a wen-d ibbecceṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yemxalafen ɣef win i wen-d-nbecceṛ si tazwara, atan ad yețwanɛel !
Nenna-yawen-t-id si zik, a s-d ɛiwdeɣ tura : yețwanɛel win ara wen-d ibeccṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yemxalafen ɣef win i tqeblem !

Ihi tura, eɛni d lemziya n yemdanen i țnadiɣ ? Xaṭi ! D lemziya n Sidi Ṛebbi i țnadiɣ. Neɣ eɛni țnadiɣ ad ɛeǧbeɣ i yemdanen ? Lemmer i mazal țnadiɣ ad ɛeǧbeɣ i yemdanen, tili ur țțilliɣ ara d aqeddac n Lmasiḥ.
A wen-d-iniɣ ay atmaten belli lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ i wen-d-beccṛeɣ mačči s ɣuṛ wemdan i d-yekka ;
axaṭer, nekk s yiman-iw mačči d amdan i yi-t-id-issawḍen neɣ i yi t-islemden, lameɛna d Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i yi-t-id-iweḥḥan.
Teslam ɣef tikli-inu n zik asmi lliɣ ttabaɛeɣ ddin n wat Isṛail ; teslam amek i qehṛeɣ tajmaɛt n imasiḥiyen d wamek bɣiɣ a ten-snegreɣ.
Asmi lliɣ ḍefṛeɣ ddin d leɛwayed n wat Isṛail, ifeɣ akk tizyiwin-iw akk-d wid n laṣel-iw, axaṭer ṭṭfeɣ di leɛwayed n lejdud-iw akken ilaq.
Lameɛna s ṛṛeḥma-s, Sidi Ṛebbi ixtaṛ-iyi-d uqbel a d-laleɣ yerna yessawel-iyi-d iwakken ad qedceɣ fell-as.
Asmi i yi-d-ibeggen Sidi Ṛebbi Mmi-s iwakken ad beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i t-iɛnan ger wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail, ur cawṛeɣ ula d yiwen ;
yerna ur uliɣ ara ɣer temdint Lquds ɣer wid yellan d ṛṛusul uqbel-iw, lameɛna ṛuḥeɣ ɣer tmurt n waɛṛaben ; syenna uɣaleɣ-ed daɣen ɣer temdint n Dimacq.
Mi ɛeddan tlata iseggasen, uliɣ ɣer temdint Lquds iwakken ad issineɣ Buṭrus, qqimeɣ ɣuṛ-es xemseṭṭac wussan.
Lameɛna ur ẓriɣ ula d yiwen nniḍen si ṛṛusul, anagar Yeɛqub, gma-s n Ssid-nneɣ.
Ayen i wen-d-uriɣ akka ț-țideț, zdat Ṛebbi ur skiddibeɣ ara.
Syenna, ṛuḥeɣ ɣer tmura n Surya d Silisya ;
kra wayen kkiɣ dinna, imasiḥiyen n tejmuyaɛ n tmurt n Yahuda leɛmeṛ ẓrin udem-iw.
Slan kan qqaṛen fell-i : win akken yellan ițqehhiṛ deg-nneɣ, atan tura ițbecciṛ liman i gebɣa zik-nni a t-issenger.
Dɣa țḥemmiden Ṛebbi ɣef ddemma-w.
Mi ɛeddan ṛbeɛṭac iseggasen, ɛawdeɣ uliɣ ɣer temdint n Lquds akk-d Barnabas, wwiɣ daɣen yid-i gma-tneɣ Tit.

Uliɣ, axaṭer d Sidi Ṛebbi i yi-t-id yumṛen deg uweḥḥi. Sfehmeɣ-asen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i țbecciṛeɣ ger wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail ; mliɣ-asen-t weḥḥed-sen i yimeqqranen n tejmaɛt iwakken ayen xedmeɣ armi d ass-a ur ițṛuḥ ara baṭel.
Tit, aṛfiq-iw yellan d ayunani, yiwen ur iḥettem fell-as ad iḍheṛ,

ɣas akken llan yir watmaten i d-ikecmen gar-aneɣ s tuffra, bɣan a t-ḥeṛsen ad iḍheṛ. Kecmen-d gar-aneɣ iwakken ad walin tilelli i nesɛa di tikli-nneɣ akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, bɣan a ɣ-rren d aklan-nsen.
Ula d yiwet n tikkelt ur nekni zdat-sen, iwakken tideț yellan di lexbaṛ n lxiṛ aț-țeqqim gar-awen.

d wid yesɛan lqima gar-awen, [ ur iyi-tewqiɛ ara lmeɛna d acu i llan zik, axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi ur ixeddem ara lxilaf ger yemdanen ] ; wid-nni yesɛan lqima ur ḥețțmen ara fell-i ad xedmeɣ ayen nniḍen.
Lameɛna walan belli Sidi Ṛebbi iwekkel-iyi iwakken ad beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail, am akken i gceggeɛ Buṭrus ad ibecceṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i wat Isṛail.
Axaṭer, Sidi Ṛebbi i gerran Buṭrus d ṛṛasul n wid yellan n wat Isṛail, yerra-yi ula d nekk d ṛṛasul n wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail.

Yeɛqub, Buṭrus akk-d Yuḥenna yețwaḥesben d imeqqranen n tejmaɛt, setɛeṛfen belli d Sidi Ṛebbi i yi-d ifkan ccɣel-agi, dɣa selmen fell-aneɣ afus deg ufus iwakken a ɣ-d-beggnen belli qeblen ayagi. Imiren nemsefham : nutni ad ṛuḥen ad beccṛen i wat Isṛail, ma d nekk akk-d Barnabas, a nṛuḥ a nbecceṛ i wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail ;
acu kan, weṣṣan-aɣ iwakken ur ntețțu ara igellilen n tejmuyaɛ-nsen yellan di temdint n Lquds, ayagi ur stehzaɣ ara deg-s, xedmeɣ-t seg-wul.
Asmi i d-yusa Buṭrus ɣer temdint n Antyuc, qubleɣ-t ɣer wudem-is zdat lɣaci, axaṭer yeɣleḍ.
