Uqbel a d-asen kra n yemdanen i d-iceggeɛ Yeɛqub, yella itețț akk-d watmaten ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail, lameɛna akken kan i d-wwḍen, iḥbes lmakla yid-sen iwexxeṛ fell-asen, axaṭer yuggad wid iṭṭfen di lɛaddat n wat Isṛail.
Atmaten nniḍen n wat Isṛail xedmen am nețța, wexxṛen ula d nutni, yuɣal armi ula d Barnabas iɛuned-iten.

Mi walaɣ ur teddun ara akken ilaq am akken i d-yeqqaṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , nniɣ i Buṭrus zdat lɣaci meṛṛa : ma yella kečč yellan seg wat Isṛail tețɛiceḍ am wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail, amek ara tḥeṛṣeḍ wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail ad ɛicen am wat Isṛail ?
Nukni ur nelli ara d imednuben am leǧnas nniḍen, laṣel-nneɣ seg wat Isṛail.

Lameɛna neẓra belli amdan yețțuɣal d aḥeqqi zdat Sidi Ṛebbi s liman-ines di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, mačči imi gxeddem ayen i d-teqqaṛ ccariɛa ; daymi ula d nukni numen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, iwakken a nuɣal d iḥeqqiyen zdat Sidi Ṛebbi s liman di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, mačči imi nxeddem ayen i d-teqqaṛ ccariɛa n Musa. Axaṭer ula d yiwen ur izmir ad yuɣal d aḥeqqi zdat Ṛebbi imi i gettabaɛ ccariɛa n Musa.
Nukni nețnadi a nuɣal d iḥeqqiyen s liman di Lmasiḥ ; ma nufa iman-nneɣ d imednuben ula d nukni am leǧnas nniḍen, eɛni d Lmasiḥ i ɣ-ițțawin ɣer ddnub ? Xaṭi !
Axaṭer ma uɣaleɣ ɣer ccariɛa nni i ǧǧiɣ, ihi rriɣ iman-iw d amɛaṣi ;
ɣef wayen yeɛnan ccariɛa aql-iyi mmuteɣ, yerna d nețțat i yi-wwin ɣer lmut ; ayagi yedṛa-d iwakken ad sɛuɣ tudert di Sidi Ṛebbi ; aql-iyi țwasemmṛeɣ ɣef wumidag akk-d Lmasiḥ.
Tura mačči d nekk i gețțidiren, d Lmasiḥ i gețțidiren deg-i ; axaṭer tudert-iw di ddunit, țɛiceɣ-ț s liman di Mmi-s n Sidi Ṛebbi i yi-ḥemmlen yerna isebbel iman-is fell-i.
Ur sseɣlayeɣ ara lqima n ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi, axaṭer ma nezmer a nuɣal d iḥeqqiyen zdat Ṛebbi s ccariɛa n Musa, ihi Lmasiḥ yemmut ɣef wulac !
Ay at Galasya ur nessin leṣlaḥ nsen ! Anwa i kkun-iseḥḥren kunwi iwumi i d-nessefhem akken ilaq lmut n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ɣef wumidag ?
?ef wayagi kan i bɣiɣ a kkun steqsiɣ : amek i wen-d-ițțunefk Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, imi i txeddmem ayen i d-teqqaṛ ccariɛa neɣ imi teslam yerna tumnem s lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ ?
Eɛni ixuṣṣ-ikkun leɛqel ? Amek, di tazwara tețțeklem ɣef Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, tura tebɣam aț-țețțeklem ɣef yiman-nwen ?
Eɛni ayen akk i tenɛețțabem iṛuḥ baṭel ? Ur ḥsiɣ ara iṛuḥ baṭel !
Win i wen-d-ifkan Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, ixeddmen lbeṛhanat gar-awen, eɛni ixeddem-iten imi i tettabaɛem ccariɛa neɣ imi tumnem s lexbaṛ n lxiṛ iwumi teslam ?
Akken yura : Ibṛahim yumen s Ṛebbi, yețkel fell-as, daymi i t-iḥseb Sidi Ṛebbi d aḥeqqi.
Ilaq aț-țfehmem ihi, wid iteddun s liman, d nutni i d arraw n tideț n Sidna Ibṛahim.

Si zik i d-ixebbeṛ Sidi Ṛebbi di tira iqedsen belli ad yerr leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail d iḥeqqiyen ɣef ddemma n liman nsen, mi genna i Sidna Ibṛahim lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ : Leǧnas meṛṛa n ddunit ad țțubarken yis-ek ;
ihi kra n win yumnen s Ṛebbi akken yumen yis Ibṛahim, ad ițțubarek am nețța.
Axaṭer wid yettabaɛen ccariɛa iwakken ad țwaqeblen ɣer Ṛebbi, deɛwessu tezga fell-asen imi yura : ad ițwanɛel kra n win yettabaɛen ccariɛa, ur nxeddem ara ayen akk yuran deg-s.
Ula d yiwen ur izmir ad yuɣal d aḥeqqi zdat Ṛebbi s ccariɛa, ayagi d ayen ibanen imi yura : Aḥeqqi ad yidir s liman.
Abrid n ccariɛa d webrid n liman mxalafen, imi yura : d win ara ixedmen ayen akk i d-teqqaṛ ccariɛa ara yesɛun tudert n dayem.
Lmasiḥ icufeɛ-aɣ-d si deɛwessu n ccariɛa, d nețța i gețwaneɛlen deg umkan-nneɣ ; axaṭer yura : ițwanɛel kra n win ițwaɛelqen ɣer ttejṛa.
Ayagi yedṛa-d iwakken s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail ad weṛten lbaṛaka i gefka Sidi Ṛebbi i Ibṛahim ; s liman ara ɣ-d ițțunefk Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i ɣ-iwɛed Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ay atmaten, a wen-d-fkeɣ lemtel yellan di lɛaddat-nneɣ : m'ara yexdem yiwen leɛqed akken ilaq, yiwen ur izmir a t-inkeṛ neɣ a s-yernu kra.

Ihi, Sidi Ṛebbi yefka lemɛahda i Ibṛahim akk-d win ara d-ilalen seg-s, ( ur d-yenni ara : i wid ara d-ilalen seg-s am akken aṭas i gellan ). Di tira iqedsen yura : i win ara d-ilalen seg-k ; win i ɣef yura wayagi, d Lmasiḥ.

Atah wayen bɣiɣ a d-iniɣ : di tazwara Sidi Ṛebbi yesbedd leɛqed akken ilaq, ccariɛa i d-yusan ṛebɛa meyya utlatin iseggasen deffir-es, ur tezmir ara aț-țemḥu leɛqed-agi, neɣ m'ulac aț-țeɣli lqima n lemɛahda n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Lemmer si ccariɛa ara newṛet leslak, acuɣeṛ lemɛahda ? Axaṭer s lemɛahda-agi i d-ibeggen Sidi Ṛebbi ṛṛeḥma-s i Ibṛahim.

Acuɣeṛ ihi i d-tețțunefk ccariɛa ? Tețțunefk-ed iwakken a d-tesbeggen belli nɛuṣa lumuṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi, alamma yusa-d win akken ara d ilalen si dderya n Ibṛahim iwumi d tețțunefk lemɛahda. D lmalayekkat i d-yewwin ccariɛa ɣer ufus n Sidna Musa iwakken a ț-id-issiweḍ i yemdanen.
Sidi Ṛebbi iceggeɛ-ed amdan iwakken a d-yessiweḍ ccariɛa i wiyaḍ, meɛna ur iḥwaǧ ara amdan iwakken ad isbedd leɛqed yid-sen.
Eɛni ccariɛa txulef lemɛahdat n Sidi Ṛebbi ? Xaṭi ! Lemmer ccariɛa tezmer a d-tefk tudert i wemdan, tili yezmer wemdan ad yuɣal d aḥeqqi zdat Ṛebbi s ccariɛa.
Lameɛna tira iqedsen nnant-ed : ddunit meṛṛa tella seddaw tezmert n ddnub ; iwacu ? Iwakken lemɛahda n Sidi Ṛebbi aț-țețțunefk i yemdanen meṛṛa ɣef ddemma n liman-nsen di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Uqbel a d-yas lweqt i deg ara namen s Lmasiḥ, nella seddaw leḥkum n ccariɛa, armi d ass i deg i d-yedheṛ webrid n liman.
S wakka, nețțuṛebba-d s ccariɛa armi d asmi d-yusa Lmasiḥ iwakken a ɣ-yerr d iḥeqqiyen zdat Ṛebbi s liman.
Tura yusa-d lweqt i deg ara namen s Lmasiḥ, ifuk fell-aneɣ leḥkum n ccariɛa.
Axaṭer tuɣalem akk d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi s liman di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Kunwi akk yețwaɣeḍsen s yisem n Lmasiḥ, tețɛicim tudert tajḍiṭ yellan di Lmasiḥ.
Tura ulac lxilaf ger wat Isṛail d iyunaniyen, ger waklan d iḥeṛṛiyen, ger yergazen ț-țilawin, axaṭer kunwi akk tuɣalem d yiwen di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Yerna ma tellam d ayla n Lmasiḥ, aql-ikkun si dderya n Ibṛahim, wid ara iweṛten akken i t-id-iwɛed Sidi Ṛebbi.
Atah wayen i bɣiɣ a t-id-iniɣ : qqaṛeɣ-awen skud win ara iweṛten mazal-it meẓẓi, ur yemxalaf ara nețța d win yellan d akli, ɣas akken d nețța ara yuɣalen d bab n kullec ;
lameɛna ilaq-as ad yaɣ awal i wid ițelhayen yid-es, iseddayen lecɣal-is, alamma yessaweḍ leɛmeṛ akken i d-iweṣṣa baba-s.
Akken daɣen ula d nukni asmi nella meẓẓiyit, nɛac seddaw leḥkum n leqwanen n ddunit,
meɛna asmi i d-yewweḍ lweqt i ɣ-iweɛɛed Sidi Ṛebbi, iceggeɛ-ed Mmi-s i d-ilulen si tmeṭṭut, iɛac seddaw leḥkum n ccariɛa,
iwakken a d-ifdu wid yellan seddaw leḥkum n ccariɛa, iwakken a nuɣal d arraw-is.
Tura imi nuɣal d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi, ifka-yaɣ-d ɣer wulawen-nneɣ Ṛṛuḥ n Mmi-s s wayes i nessawal i Ṛebbi : « Abba » ! Yeɛni : a Baba !
S wakka, ikkes fell-awen uzaglu n tkelwa, tuɣalem seg warraw-is ; ma tellam seg warraw-is, d kunwi ara iweṛten ayen i wen-iwɛed Sidi Ṛebbi s ṛṛeḥma-ines.
Zik-nni ur tessinem ara Ṛebbi yerna tețɛebbidem lemqamat d ssadaț deg umkan n Ṛebbi.
Lameɛna tura mi tessnem Ṛebbi, yerna nețța iḥseb ikkun d arraw-is, amek armi tebɣam aț-țuɣalem ɣer lɛaddat n zik ur nesɛi lmeɛna iwakken aț-țilim seddaw uzaglu-nsent ?
Tețțakem lqima i leɛyudat n kra wussan, kra wagguren, kra lewqat d kra yiseggasen !
Uggadeɣ ayen i nɛețțabeɣ akk fell-awen iṛuḥ baṭel.
Ay atmaten di leɛnaya-nwen, uɣalet am nekkini, imi ula d nekk lliɣ am kunwi. Ur iyi-texdimem acemma n diri.
Ur tecfim ara belli d lehlak i yi-ṭṭfen ɣuṛ-wen mi wen-beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ass amezwaru.
?as akken lehlak-iw yeɛfen, ur teɛyim deg-i, ur iyi-teḥqiṛem, lameɛna telham yis-i am akken d lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi neɣ d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ s yiman-is i lliɣ.
Anda-t lfeṛḥ-nni-nwen n zik ? Acu i gedṛan yid-wen ? Zemreɣ ad cehdeɣ fell-awen belli, lemmer d ayen iwumi tzemrem a t-txedmem, tili tekksem-d allen-nwen iwakken a yi-tent-id-tefkem.
Eɛni uɣaleɣ awen tura d aɛdaw imi i wen-d qqaṛeɣ tideț ?
Imdanen-agi țbegginen-awen-d belli ḥemmlen-kkun, lameɛna nutni ččuṛen ț-țiḥila ; bɣan kan a kkun sbeɛden fell-i iwakken a ten-tettebɛem nutni.
Yelha ma ixeddem yiwen lxiṛ, mačči kan m'ara iliɣ gar-awen lameɛna di mkul lweqt.
Ay arraw-iw, aql-i nɛețțabeɣ tura daɣen ɣef ddemma-nwen am tmeṭṭut yeṭṭfen addud, alamma iban-ed Lmasiḥ deg-wen.
Acḥal mennaɣ ad iliɣ gar-awen di teswiɛt-agi i wakken a wen-d mmeslayeɣ akken nniḍen, axaṭer aql-iyi tḥeyyṛeɣ ɣef ddemma-nwen.
Init-iyi-d, kunwi yebɣan aț-țilim seddaw leḥkum n ccariɛa, eɛni ur teslim ara i wayen i d-teqqaṛ ccariɛa ?
Atah wayen i d-teqqaṛ : Sidna Ibṛahim yesɛa sin warraw-is, yiwen seg Haǧiṛa yellan ț-țaklit, wayeḍ seg Saṛa yellan ț-țaḥeṛṛit.
Lameɛna mmi-s n taklit-nni, ilul-ed s lebɣi n wemdan, ma d mmi-s n tḥeṛṛit-nni, ilul-ed ɣef ddemma n lemɛahda n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Taqsiṭ-agi tesɛa lmeɛna nniḍen : snat n tilawin-agi țusemmant d sin leɛqud : yiwen n leɛqed d win n wedrar n Sinay i d-ițaǧǧan aklan, yeɛni : d Haǧiṛa.
Haǧiṛa, d adrar n Sinay yellan di tmurt n waɛṛaben, tețmettil-ed tamdint n Lquds n tura, i gellan ț-țaklit s nețțat s warraw-is.
Lameɛna tamdint n Lquds yellan deg igenwan ț-țaḥeṛṛit, d nețțat i d yemma-tneɣ.
Axaṭer yura : Efṛeḥ kemm a tiɛiqeṛt ur nețțarew ara ! Ɛeggeḍ s lfeṛḥ kemm ur nessin lewjaɛ n tarrawt ! Axaṭer tameṭṭut yețwaḥeqṛen, aț-țes ɛu dderya akteṛ n tin yesɛan argaz-is .
Ma d kunwi ay atmaten, d arraw n lemɛahda i tellam am Isḥaq.
Zik-nni, win i d-ilulen s lebɣi n wemdan ițqehhiṛ win i d-ilulen s lebɣi n Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi, akka i gella lḥal ar ass-a.
Lameɛna d acu yuran di tira iqedsen ? Enfu taklit d mmi-s ;axaṭer mmi-s n taklit ur ilaq ara ad iwṛet akk-d mmi-s n tmeṭṭut taḥeṛṛit .
Akka ay atmaten, ur nelli ara d arraw n taklit lameɛna d arraw n tmeṭṭut taḥeṛṛit.
Ɛisa Lmasiḥ isellek-aɣ iwakken a nesɛu tilleli n tideț. Ihi ḥerzet tilelli-agi, ḥadret aț-țuɣalem d aklan !
?esset-iyi-d ! Nekk Bulus, nniɣ awen-d : ma yella tḍehṛem, Lmasiḥ ur kkun-infiɛ ara.
Yerna ad ɛawdeɣ a d-iniɣ i yal argaz i gḍehṛen, belli ilzem ad ixdem ayen akk i d-tenna ccariɛa.
Kunwi yețnadin aț-țuɣalem d iḥeqqiyen zdat Ṛebbi s ccariɛa, ur d-yeqqim wacemma gar-awen d Lmasiḥ, tețwaḥeṛmem si ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ma d nukni, nessaram a ɣ-yerr Sidi Ṛebbi d iḥeqqiyen zdat-es ; ayagi nețṛaǧu-t s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen akk-d liman.
Axaṭer, di tikli-nneɣ akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, neḍheṛ neɣ ur neḍhiṛ ara, ayagi ur yesɛi ara azal ; ayen yesɛan azal, d liman i d-țbegginen lecɣal i nxeddem s leḥmala.
Di tazwara tewwim abrid ilaqen, anwa i kkun-issufɣen i webrid n tideț ?
Ṛṛay-agi ur d-yekki ara s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi i wen-d-issawlen.
Akken qqaṛen : « Ciṭṭuḥ n temtunt ( iɣes n temtunt ) yessalay akk arukti.»
Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi ihedden ul-iw fell-awen, țekleɣ belli ur tețxemmimem ara akken nniḍen. Lameɛna win i kkun-icewwlen, akken ibɣu yili, a t-iɛaqeb Sidi Ṛebbi.
Lemmer mazal nehhuɣ ar tura ɣef ṭṭhaṛa, iwacu i yi-mazal țwaqehṛeɣ ? Tili lexbaṛ i nețbecciṛ ɣef Lmasiḥ ițwasemmṛen ɣef wumidag, ur yețțili d ugur ula i yiwen.
Wid-nni i kkun-icewwlen ɣef ṭṭhaṛa ad ṛuḥen ihi ad ɛegben iman-nsen.
Ay atmaten, Sidi Ṛebbi ifka yawen tilelli, ur d-țafet ara sebba s wayes ara txedmem s tlelli-agi lebɣi n tnefsit-nwen ; lameɛna beggnet-ed lmaḥibba yellan gar-awen.
Axaṭer lameṛ i gesdukklen meṛṛa ccariɛa d wagi : ḥemmel lɣiṛ-ik am yiman-ik .
Ma yella tețțemkerracem am lewḥuc yerna wa itețț wa, ḥadret iman-nwen neɣ m'ulac yiwen ad issenger wayeḍ.
Ddut ihi s lebɣi n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, iwakken ur txeddmem ara lebɣi n tnefsit-nwen.
Axaṭer lebɣi n tnefsit ixulef lebɣi n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, akken daɣen lebɣi n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ixulef lebɣi n tnefsit ; d iɛdawen wway gar-asen, daymi ur tezmirem ara aț-țxedmem akken tebɣam.
Lameɛna ma yella tleḥḥum s lebɣi n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, atan ihi ur tellim ara seddaw leḥkum n ccariɛa.
Axaṭer, lefɛayel n tnefsit țbanen : zzna, leḥṛam, lefsad,
zzyaṛa n lemqamat, ssḥur, lkeṛh, ccwal, tismin, zzɛaf, wid yebɣan a d-kken sennig wiyaḍ, assexṛeb, wid ifeṛqen ț-țirebbaɛ,

ṭṭmeɛ, ssekṛan, at iɛebbaḍ ur nesɛi lqaɛ d wayen akk ițemcabin ɣer wayagi meṛṛa. Ɛeggneɣ-awen-d am akken i wen-d-nniɣ yakan : wid i gxeddmen lecɣal-agi ur seɛɛun ara amkan di tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Lameɛna atan wayen i d-itekken si Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen : leḥmala, lfeṛḥ, lehna, ṣṣbeṛ, lehhu, leḥnana, liman,
ul yeṣfan, aɣlab n tnefsit ; eɛni ccariɛa tugi annect-agi ?
Wid yellan n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, semmṛen ɣef wumidag lebɣi n tnefsit-nsen, s ccehwat-is d umenni ines.
Imi d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i ɣ-d ifkan tudert, ilaq-aɣ ihi a neddu di lebɣi ines.
Ur ilaq a nessimɣuṛ iman nneɣ, ur ilaq a nețnaɣ neɣ a nețțemyasam wway-gar-aneɣ.
Ay atmaten, kunwi ileḥḥun s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, ma teṭṭfem yiwen yeɣleḍ, erret-ț-id ɣer webrid s leḥnana ; ḥadret ɣef yiman-nwen, axaṭer tzemrem aț-țeɣlim ula d kunwi deg ujeṛṛeb.
?emɛawanet deg unerfud n tɛekkmin nwen, s wakka ara tḍuɛem ayen i d-tenna ccariɛa n Lmasiḥ.
Ma yeḥseb yiwen iman-is yesɛa lqima nețța ur yeswi kra, ɣef yiman-is i gețkellix.
Ilaq mkul yiwen ad imeyyez tikli-ines, imiren ma yufa ayen s wayes ara izux, ad izux i yiman-is kan mačči alamma imettel iman-is ɣer wiyaḍ.
Axaṭer mkul yiwen ad yerfed taɛkumt-is weḥd-es.
Win iwumi sselmaden awal n Ṛebbi ilaq ad yeǧǧ amur deg wayen akk yesɛa i win i t-isselmaden.
?adret aț-țɣelṭem : yiwen ur yezmir ad istehzi ɣef Ṛebbi ; ayen yezreɛ wemdan, a t-id-imger.
Win yettabaɛen lebɣi n tnefsit-is, a t-tessiweḍ ɣer lmut ; ma d win iteddun s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ad isɛu tudert n dayem.
Ilaq a nxeddem lxiṛ mbla ɛeyyu ; axaṭer m'ur nefcil ara, a d-nemger m'ara d-yaweḍ lweqt.
Ihi, skud yella wamek, a nexdem lxiṛ i yemdanen meṛṛa, abeɛda atmaten di liman !
Walit tira-agi : s ufus-iw i wen tent-id-uriɣ.
Wid meṛṛa i gebɣan ad ḥețțmen fell-awen ṭṭhaṛa, bɣan a d-sbeggnen iman-nsen zdat imdanen belli ṭṭfen di leɛwayed, iwakken ur țwaqehhaṛen ara ɣef ddemma n umidag n Lmasiḥ.
Widak-agi iḍehṛen, nutni s yiman nsen ur ttabaɛen ara ccariɛa ; lameɛna bɣan aț-țḍehṛem iwakken ad zuxxen imi ḥettmen fell-awen ṭṭhaṛa-agi.

Ma d nekk ur bɣiɣ ad zuxxeɣ s wacemma, anagar s lmut n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ɣef wumidag ; axaṭer s lmut n Lmasiḥ ɣef wumidag uɣaleɣ ur ḥsibeɣ ara ddunit-agi, akken daɣen ddunit ur iyi-teḥsib ara ula d nekk.
Axaṭer ayen yesɛan azal, mačči d ṭṭhaṛa, lameɛna ț-țalalit tajḍiṭ i d-itekken s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi.
I wid akk itebɛen abrid-agi , a sen-iniɣ: lehna d ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi a wen-d țțunefkent i kunwi d wegdud n Sidi Ṛebbi meṛṛa !
Sya ɣer zdat, ur ḥwaǧeɣ yiwen a yi-isseḥzen ; axaṭer ccwami yellan di lǧețța-w țbegginent-ed belli d aqeddac n Sidna Ɛisa i lliɣ.
Ay atmaten, ṛṛeḥma n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ aț-țili yid-wen meṛṛa ! Amin !
Nekk Bulus yellan d amceggeɛ n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ s lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi, uriɣ-ed tabṛaț-agi i watmaten yellan di temdint n Ifasus i gumnen s Ɛisa Lmaṣiḥ.
Ṛṛeḥma d lehna a wen-d țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ akk-d Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Ad ițțubarek Sidi Ṛebbi, baba-s n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, i ɣ-d-ifkan deg igenwan mkul lbaṛakat n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Yis i ɣ-d-ixtaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi uqbel a d-ixleq ddunit, iwakken a nili zdat-es d izedganen mbla lɛib.
Sidi Ṛebbi iḥemmel-aɣ, daymi i geqsed si zik s lebɣi-ines a ɣ-yerr d arraw-is s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ,
iwakken a t-neḥmed a t-ncekkeṛ ɣef ṛṛeḥma-s tameqqrant i ɣ-d-ifka s Mmi-s eɛzizen.
S lmut n Sidna Ɛisa i ɣ-d-icufeɛ Sidi Ṛebbi, s idammen-is yuzzlen i ɣ-țwaɛfan ddnubat-nneɣ ; s wakka isbeggen-aɣ-d acḥal meqqṛet ṛṛeḥma ines
i d-issers fell-aɣ s tugeț yerna ifka-yaɣ-d lefhama ț-țmusni.
Sidi Ṛebbi isbeggen-aɣ-ed lebɣi-s yellan d lbaḍna, lemziya-nni i geqsed a ț-ixdem si tazwara s Lmasiḥ,
ara yessiweḍ ɣer lekmal-is di lweqt i gextaṛ : ad isdukkel ayen akk yellan ama deg igenwan ama di lqaɛa, seddaw lḥekma n Lmasiḥ.
S Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i ɣ-yerra Sidi Ṛebbi d ayla-s, am akken i t-iqsed si tazwara di lebɣi-ines,
iwakken nukni yessarmen di Lmasiḥ d imezwura, a neḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef tmanegt-is.
Kunwi daɣen mi teslam s lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i wen-d-yewwin leslak, tumnem s Lmasiḥ ; dɣa Sidi Ṛebbi iḍbeɛ-ikkun s ṭṭabeɛ-ines yellan d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i gewɛed a wen-t-id yefk.
Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen d aɛeṛbun n lweṛt-nneɣ, alamma yewweḍ ɣer lekmal-is leslak n wid akk yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi. A neḥmed ihi Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef tmanegt-agi-ines ( lɛaḍima-s ).
Daymi mi sliɣ s liman-nwen yeṛsan di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ d wamek i tḥemmlem wid akk i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi,
kull ass țḥemmideɣ rennuɣ Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef ddemma-nwen, țțadreɣ-kkun-id dayem di tẓallit-iw
iwakken Sidi Ṛebbi, Illu n Ssid nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yellan d bab n tmanegt, a wen-d-yefk s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen tamusni d lefhama s wayes ara t-tissinem akken ilaq ;
a wen-ildi leɛqel iwakken aț țfehmem d acu n usirem i ɣer wen-d issawel, d acu n lbaṛakat timeqqranin i ghegga i wid yumnen yis ;
aț-țwalim tazmert-is tameqqrant i ɣ-d-ibeggen i nukni s wid yumnen yis.
Tazmert nni i d-ibeggen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, mi t-id-yesseḥya si ger lmegtin, yerna yesɣim-it ɣer tama-s tayeffust deg igenwan iwakken ad yeḥkem,
sennig igelliden meṛṛa n ddunit, sennig imdebbṛen ț-țnezmarin, sennig tgeldiwin akk-d yismawen meṛṛa yellan mačči kan di lǧil-agi meɛna ula di lǧil i d-iteddun.
Sidi Ṛebbi yerra kullec seddaw iḍaṛṛen n Lmasiḥ, yerra-t daɣen d aqeṛṛuy n tejmaɛt n imasiḥiyen
yellan d lǧețța n Lmasiḥ ; deg-s i gețțili yerna d nețța i d kullec di ddunit meṛṛa.
Zik-nni, tellam am wid yemmuten ɣef ddemma n tuccḍa-nwen akk-d ddnubat-nwen ;
tețɛicim di ddnub, tewwi-kkun ddunit, tḍefṛem Cciṭan, sselṭan n ddunit-agi i gțekellixen ar tura wid ur nḍuɛ ara Sidi Ṛebbi.
Nukni daɣen, zik-nni am nutni i nella ; nettabaɛ ixemmimen-nneɣ, ccehwat-nneɣ, nxeddem lebɣi n tnefsit-nneɣ, nella nuklal urrif n Sidi Ṛebbi am wiyaḍ.
Lameɛna imi i geččuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi d ṛṛeḥma, yerna leḥmala-ines ɣuṛ-nneɣ ț-țameqqrant,
yerra-yaɣ-d ɣer tudert akk-d Lmasiḥ, nukni yellan am wid yemmuten ɣef sebba n ddnubat-nneɣ. S ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi i tețwasellkem.
S tdukli-nneɣ akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, Sidi Ṛebbi isseḥya-ɣ-ed akk-d Lmasiḥ yerna yesɣim-aɣ yid-es deg igenwan,
iwakken di leqṛun i d-iteddun, a d-tban acḥal meqqṛit ṛṛeḥma-ines akk-d leḥnana-s i ɣ-d-isbeggen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
S ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi kan i tețwasellkem, mi tumnem. Ayagi mačči d ayen i d-ikan s ɣuṛ-wen lameɛna ț-țukci n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Mačči s lḥasanat-nwen i tețwasellkem akken yiwen ur ițzuxxu s yiman is ;
axaṭer ayen i nella tura s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣ-d-yekka, ixleq-aɣ-ed di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ iwakken a nexdem di tudert-nneɣ lecɣal yelhan i-ɣ-d ihegga si tazwara.
Kunwi ur nelli ara seg wegdud n wat Isṛail, iwumi qqaṛen wat Isṛail : « A wid ur neḍhiṛ » axaṭer nutni ḥesben iman-nsen ḍehṛen ɣef ddemma n ṭṭhaṛa-nni i sɛan di lɛadda-nsen,

mmektit-ed amek i tellam zik : di lweqt-nni tellam tbeɛdem ɣef Lmasiḥ, d ibeṛṛaniyen ur nelli ara seg ugdud i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi, ur tețțekkam di lemɛahdat i sen-iwɛed, ur tesɛim asirem, ur tessinem Sidi Ṛebbi.
Meɛna imi tumnem s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, kunwi yellan zik tbeɛdem fell-as, tura tqeṛṛbem-d ɣuṛ-es s idammen-is yuzzlen ɣef ddemma-nwen.

Axaṭer d Lmasiḥ s yiman-is i d lehna-nneɣ, imi i gesdukkel at Isṛail d leǧnas nniḍen yerra-ten d yiwen n wegdud. Mi gefka iman-is d asfel, ihudd lḥiḍ-nni i ten-ifeṛqen, i ten-yerran d iɛdawen ;
yesseɣli tazmert n ccariɛa yerna lewṣayat akk-d leqwanen-ines, iwakken a d-issufeɣ si snat ccetlat-agi, yiwen kan n wegdud ajdid ara yamnen yis ; s wakka i d-issers lehna.
S lmut-is ɣef wumidag i ten-issemṣaleḥ d Sidi Ṛebbi, ikkes tiɛdawit yellan gar-asen, isdukkel sin leǧnas-agi yerra-ten d yiwen wegdud.
Yusa-d a wen-ibecceṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , yewwi-awen-d lehna ama i kunwi yellan tbeɛdem ɣef Ṛebbi, ama i wat Isṛail iqeṛben ɣuṛ-es ;
axaṭer yis i nezmer am kunwi am nukni, a nqeṛṛeb meṛṛa ɣer Baba Ṛebbi, s yiwen n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.
Ihi tura, kunwi ur nelli ara seg wat Isṛail, ur tellim ara d ibeṛṛaniyen neɣ d imsebriden, meɛna tețțekkam di tejmaɛt n wegdud n Sidi Ṛebbi, tuɣalem d iɛeyyalen n twacult-is.
Tuɣalem d axxam yebnan ɣef lsas i ssersen ṛṛusul akk-d lenbiya, Ɛisa Lmasiḥ s yiman-is i d azṛu alemmas yeṭṭfen lebni.
D nețța i gessalayen lebni, yesseǧhad-it iwakken ad yuɣal d lǧameɛ iqedsen n Sidi Ṛebbi.
S tdukli-nwen akk-d Lmasiḥ, ula d kunwi tețțekkam di lebni-agi, iwakken aț-țilim d axxam anda yezdeɣ Sidi Ṛebbi s Ṛṛuḥ-is.
Daymi nekk Bulus, aql-i d ameḥbus n Lmasiḥ ɣef ddemma nwen kunwi ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail.
Ahat teslam s lxedma i yi-d ițțunefken s ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wayen i kkun-yeɛnan.
Sidi Ṛebbi ildi-yi-d allen iwakken ad fehmeɣ lbaḍna-ines, am akken i t-id-uriɣ s kra imeslayen ;
m'ara ten-teɣṛem, aț-țeẓrem ayen fehmeɣ ɣef lbaḍna n Lmasiḥ.
Sidi Ṛebbi ur d-ibeggen ara lbaḍna-agi i lejdud-nneɣ, lameɛna tura ibeggen-iț-id s Ṛṛuḥ-is iqedsen i imceggɛen-ines akk-d lenbiya.

Ațah lbaḍna-agi : imi umnen leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail s lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ i sen-d ițțubeccṛen, ad țekkin di lɛahed i d-ițțunefken i wat Isṛail, ad weṛten yid-sen lbaṛakat yerna ad uɣalen meṛṛa d yiwet n lǧețța.
Uɣaleɣ d aqeddac n lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ s ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi ț-țezmert-is ixeddmen deg-i ;
nekk yellan d ulac ger imasiḥiyen meṛṛa, yețțunefk-iyi-d s ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi ad beccṛeɣ i wid ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail, lexbaṛ n lxiṛ yeɛnan lbaṛakat ur nkeffu yellan di Lmasiḥ
yerna a d-sfehmeɣ lmeɛna n lbaḍna agi i geffer Sidi Ṛebbi si lebda, nețța i gxelqen kullec.
S wakka, lḥekmat ț-țnezmarin n igenwan ad issinent tamusni n Sidi Ṛebbi di mkul ṣṣifat-ines, s tejmaɛt n imasiḥiyen
akken yella di leqsed n Sidi Ṛebbi si lebda ; leqsed-agi yessaweḍ-it ɣer lekmal-is s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ.
S liman-nneɣ di Sidna Ɛisa i nezmer a nqeṛṛeb ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi s lețkal.
Daymi i wen-qqaṛeɣ tura : ur țțaǧat ara uguren i d-țmagareɣ ɣef ddemma-nwen a kkun-sfeclen axaṭer d ayen ara kkun-iqeṛṛben ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ɣef wayagi i kerfeɣ tigecrar, seǧǧdeɣ zdat Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ,
seg i d-tekka yal tawacult yellan ama deg igenwan ama di lqaɛa,
ṭṭalabeɣ-as iwakken s lɛaḍima-s tameqqrant, a kkun-isseǧhed s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ-is iqedsen.
Ssutureɣ-as ad izdeɣ Lmasiḥ deg wulawen-nwen s liman, aț-țesɛum izuṛan ara iṛeṣṣin di leḥmala,
iwakken kunwi akk-d wid yumnen meṛṛa, aț-țzemrem aț-țfehmem acḥal hraw, acḥal ɣezzif, acḥal lqay, acḥal ɛlay leḥmala n Lmasiḥ,
yerna aț-țissinem leḥmala-agi yugaren yal tamusni yellan di ddunit, alamma yezdeɣ Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi deg-wen s lekmal.
Sidi Ṛebbi ixeddem deg-nneɣ s tezmert-is, yețțak-aɣ-d akteṛ n wayen akk i s-neṭṭalab d wayen akk i nețxemmim ;
ad ițțubarek yisem-is si lǧil ɣer lǧil di tejmaɛt n imasiḥiyen akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i dayem, Amin !
Nekk yellan d aqeddac n Lmasiḥ, a kkun-nhuɣ ihi aț-țeddum akken yebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi mi wen-d-issawel.
Ddut s lḥenna d wannuz akk-d ṣṣbeṛ, țemyawit wway gar-awen s lmaḥibba.
Ḥeṛset iman-nwen aț-țeṭṭfem di tdukkli n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, s lehna wway gar-awen.
Yiwet n lǧețța kan akk-d yiwen n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i gellan, am akken daɣen i wen-d-issawel Sidi Ṛebbi ɣer yiwen usirem kan.
Yiwen kan i d Ssid-nneɣ, yiwen n liman akk-d yiwen n weɣḍas i gellan,
yiwen n Ṛebbi kan i gellan, d nețța i d baba-tneɣ meṛṛa ; yella sennig kullec, yella ger yemdanen meṛṛa, yella daɣen deg-sen meṛṛa.
Meɛna mkul yiwen deg-nneɣ tețțunefk-as-d ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi s wakken yella umur i s-d-yefka Lmasiḥ.
Akken yura di tira iqedsen+ : Mi yuli ɣer igenwan, + yewwi yid-es imeḥbas, ifka-d tikciwin i yemdanen.+ +
D acu i d lmeɛna : « Yuli ɣer igenni ? » Ayagi, yeɛni : uqbel ad yali Lmasiḥ ɣer igenni, iṣubb ɣer imukan lqayen n ddaw tmurt.
D win akken iṣubben, i gulin daɣen ɣer igenwan iwakken ad yeɛmeṛ ddunit meṛṛa ;

d nețța i d-ifeṛqen tukciwin i yemdanen : kra yefka-yasen ad ilin d ṛṛusul, kra d lenbiya, kra nniḍen ad beccṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ, wiyaḍ d imeksawen n tejmaɛt n imasiḥiyen neɣ d wid yesselmaden agdud n Sidi Ṛebbi.
S tukciwin-agi, Sidna Ɛisa ad iheggi wid yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi, ad sɛun tazmert s wayes ara xedmen ccɣel i sen-d-ifka iwakken aț-țegmu tejmaɛt n watmaten yellan d lǧețța n Lmasiḥ ;
s wakka a ndukkel deg yiwen n liman akk-d yiwet n tmusni ɣef wayen yeɛnan Mmi-s n Sidi Ṛebbi, alamma nuɣal d imeqqranen di liman, imiren s tdukli-nneɣ a naweḍ ɣer lekmal yellan di Lmasiḥ.
S wakka ur nețɣimi ara d arrac imeẓyanen i țțawint lemwaji, i gekkat waḍu ɣer mkul lǧiha, iwumi țkellixen yemdanen s tḥila-nsen d uselmed-nsen.
Meɛna m'ara d-nini tideț s lmaḥibba, a nennerni di kullec di tikli-nneɣ akk-d Lmasiḥ yellan d aqeṛṛuy n tejmaɛt n watmaten.
Lǧețța tebna s leɛḍam i cuddent lemfaṣel yal yiwen deg umkan-is ; s Lmasiḥ i tețțimɣuṛ tețnerni di lmaḥibba m'ara xeddmen leɛḍam ccɣel-nsen akken ilaq.
Atah ihi wayen i d-nniɣ d wayen i d-qqaṛeɣ s yisem n Lmasiḥ : ur țɛicit ara am wid ur nessin ara Sidi Ṛebbi, imi nutni ttabaɛen ixemmimen-nsen ur nesɛi lmeɛna.
Lefhama-nsen iɣumm-iț ṭṭlam, sbeɛden iman-nsen ɣef tudert i d ițțak Sidi Ṛebbi axaṭer jehlen, qquṛen wulawen-nsen.
Ur țsetḥin ur țneḥcamen, xeddmen anagar leɛṛuṛ yerna ur sɛin ara leqniɛa.
Meɛna kunwi, mačči d ayagi i tlemdem ɣef wayen yeɛnan Lmasiḥ.
Ma yella d ṣṣeḥ teslam yis yerna slemden awen tideț yeɛnan Lmasiḥ,
eǧǧet ihi tikli d lɛeqliyat-nwen tiqdimin i ssefsadent ccehwat-nni yețɣuṛṛun,
iwakken aț-țesɛum lefhama tajdiṭ i d-yețțak Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ;
aț-țuɣalem d imdanen ijdiden akken yella di lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi, iwakken aț-țeddum deg webrid n lḥeqq akk-d ṣṣfa i ɣer tessufuɣ tideț.
Daymi, xḍut i lekdeb, ilaq mkul yiwen deg-wen ad immeslay s tideț i lɣiṛ-is, axaṭer d leɛḍam n yiwet n lǧețța i nella.
Ma yella terfam ur dennbet ara, ilaq a wen-yekkes wurrif uqbel ad yeɣli yiṭij ;
ur țțaǧat ara abrid i Cciṭan ad ikcem ulawen nwen.
Win yellan yețțakar ilaq ad yeǧǧ tukerḍa, ad ixdem s iɣallen-is iwakken a d-isewweṛ aɣṛum-is s leḥlal, s wakka ad izmir ad iɛiwen wid yeḥwaǧen.
Ur ilaq ara a d-iffeɣ yir wawal seg imi nwen, meɛna init-ed kan imeslayen iṣelḥen s wayes ara sfaydin wid ara sen-islen yerna ad nnernin di liman.
Ur sseḥzanet ara Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, axaṭer yis i kkun-iḍbeɛ Sidi Ṛebbi i wass i deg ara innekmal leslak-nwen.
Ekkset si gar-awen : ddɣel, taɛdawit, zzɛaf, urrif, leɛyaḍ, rregmat d wayen akk n diri.
Ilit d iḥninen msamaḥet wway gar-awen, akken i wen-isemmeḥ Sidi Ṛebbi s Lmasiḥ.
Cbut Sidi Ṛebbi baba-twen imi tellam d arraw-is eɛzizen ;
ddut di tudert-nwen s leḥmala am akken i ɣ-iḥemmel Lmasiḥ i gefkan iman-is ɣef ddemma-nneɣ d asfel i Sidi Ṛebbi, am lweɛda yesɛan rriḥa iɛeǧben i Sidi Ṛebbi.
Kunwi s imasiḥiyen xḍut i zzna, i wayen ur neṣfi ara, i ṭṭmeɛ ; ayagi meṛṛa ur ilaq ara a d-ițwabdar gar-awen ulamma d abdar ;
ur qebbḥet, ur d-qqaṛet imeslayen ur nesɛi lmeɛna, ur stehzayet ara ɣef wiyaḍ, ayagi d ayen n diri ; meɛna d imeslayen ara iḥemden Sidi Ṛebbi i glaqen a d-ffɣen seg imi-nwen ;

axaṭer ilaq aț-țeẓrem belli wid izennun neɣ wid ixeddmen ayen ur neṣfi akk-d wid ur nesteqniɛ ara, imi wid ur nesteqniɛ ara cban wid iɛebbden lmeṣnuɛat, widak-agi meṛṛa ur țekkayen ara di tgeldit n Lmasiḥ akk-d Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ḥadret ad yili win ara kkun-ikellxen s lehduṛ ur nesɛi lmeɛna ; axaṭer ɣef wayagi i d-ițrusu wurrif n Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wid i t ițɛuṣun.
Ɣuṛ-wat ad yili wayen ara kkun icerken yid-sen.
Ț-țideț, zik-nni tellam di ṭṭlam, meɛna tura s tikli nwen deg ubrid n Lmasiḥ, teffɣem ɣer tafat. Ddut ihi di tafat imi tellam d arraw n tafat ;
axaṭer tafat tețțawi ɣer wayen yelhan, ɣer lḥeqq akk-d tideț.
Meyyzet aț-țfehmem ayen iɛeǧben i Sidi Ṛebbi ;
ur țekkayet ara di lecɣal n ṭṭlam ur nesɛi lfayda, meɛna kecfet-ed lecɣal-agi ɣer tafat.
S tideț ayen xeddmen imdanen agi s tuffra, d lḥecma a t-id-nebder ;
lameɛna m'ara d-nekcef ayen xeddmen, lecɣal-nsen țbanen-d di tafat imi anda tella tafat, kullec yețban di tafat.
Axaṭer yura : Ddekwal a kečč yeṭṭsen, ekker-ed si ger lmegtin, imiren a d-tecṛeq fell-ak tafat n Lmasiḥ.+
Ihi ḥadret mliḥ tikli-nwen, ur leḥḥut ara am imehbal, meɛna am wid itɛeqlen ;
faṛset lweqt axaṭer ussan d ixeddaɛen.
Daymi, ur smuhbulet ara, meɛna nadit aț-țissinem lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ur sekkṛet ara, axaṭer ssekṛan yessufuɣ i webrid, lameɛna ǧǧet Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ad iččaṛ ulawen-nwen ;
țemseǧhadet wway-gar-awen s isefra n Zabuṛ, cnut ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi, țḥemmidet-eț s wulawen-nwen.
Ḥemmdet Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ ɣef kullec, di mkul lweqt, s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Țemqadaṛet wway gar-awen i lmend n Lmasiḥ.
A tilawin, ḍuɛemt irgazen-nkunt am akken i glaq aț țḍuɛemt Sidi Ṛebbi !
Axaṭer argaz d aqeṛṛuy ɣef tmeṭṭut-is, am akken yella Lmasiḥ d aqeṛṛuy ɣef tejmaɛt n imasiḥiyen ; Lmasiḥ d amsellek n tejmaɛt-agi yellan d lǧețța-s.
Am akken i tețḍuɛu tejmaɛt n imasiḥiyen Lmasiḥ, tilawin daɣen ilaq ad ḍuɛent irgazen-nsent di kullec.
Ay irgazen, mkul yiwen deg-wen ilaq ad iḥemmel tameṭṭut-is akken iḥemmel Lmasiḥ tajmaɛt n imasiḥiyen yerna isebbel tudert-is fell-as ;
s weɣḍas n waman d wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi yerra-ț teṣfa iwakken a ț-iqeddem i Sidi Ṛebbi ;
yebɣa a d-tban tejmaɛt-agi n imasiḥiyen zdat-es, teṣfa mbla ccwami, mbla akmac, mbla lɛib, aț-țili ț țimqeddest, ulac deg-s ayen ara s-d-nessukkes.
Akken daɣen, irgazen ilaq ad ḥemmlen tilawin-nsen am lǧețțat-nsen. Win iḥemmlen tameṭṭut-is d iman-is i gḥemmel.
Ulac win ikeṛhen lǧețța-s, lameɛna ițɛeyyic-iț, ițḥadar-iț am akken i gxeddem Lmasiḥ i tejmaɛt n imasiḥiyen,
axaṭer d leɛḍam n lǧețța-s i nella ; am akken yura :
daymi argaz ilaq ad yeǧǧ baba-s d yemma-s iwakken ad iɛic ț-țmeṭṭut-is, dɣa di sin yid-sen ad uɣalen d yiwen.
Bɣiɣ a wen-d-iniɣ belli ayagi d lbaḍna tameqqrant yeɛnan Lmasiḥ akk-d tejmaɛt n imasiḥiyen.
Ihi, mkul yiwen deg-wen ilaq ad iḥemmel tameṭṭut-is am yiman-is, ma ț-țameṭṭut ilaq aț-țqadeṛ argaz-is.
A dderya, ḍuɛet imawlan-nwen akken yebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi, axaṭer ayagi d ayen yellan d lḥeqq.
Di ccariɛa i d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi i Sidna Musa, d wagi i d lameṛ amezwaru yesɛan lemɛahda :
Qadeṛ baba-k d yemma-k iwakken aț-țɛiceḍ di lehna yerna ad yiɣzif leɛmeṛ-ik di ddunit.+
Ma d kunwi ay imawlan, ur sserfayet ara dderya-nwen, meɛna ṛebbit-țen akken i kkun-id-iweṣṣa Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ay aklan, ḍuɛet imɛellmen n ddunit-agi, s leqdeṛ, s wul yeṣfan d neyya am akken d Lmasiḥ i tețḍuɛum .
Ayagi ur t-xeddmet ara kan m'ara kkun-țɛassan am akken tețnadim aț-țɛeǧbem i yemdanen, lameɛna ilit am iqeddacen n Lmasiḥ i gxeddmen lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi seg ul.
Qedcet fell-asen am akken d Lmasiḥ s yiman-is i ɣef tqeddcem mačči ɣef yemdanen.
Teẓram belli win ixedmen lxiṛ, ama d akli neɣ d aḥeṛṛi, a t-yaf ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.

Ma d kunwi ay imɛellmen, xedmet daɣen i iqeddacen-nwen akken yella di lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi ; ur xeddmet ara deg-sen lbaṭel, imi teẓram belli amɛellem-nsen yellan daɣen d amɛellem-nwen, deg igenwan i gella yerna nețța ur ixeddem ara lxilaf ger yemdanen.
Sǧehdet ihi iman-nwen s tezmert tameqqrant n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Refdet leslaḥ meṛṛa i d-yețțak Sidi Ṛebbi, iwakken ur kkun-iɣelleb ara Cciṭan s tḥila-ines ;
axaṭer imenɣi-nneɣ mačči akk d yemdanen i gella, lameɛna nețnaɣ ț-țgeldiwin akk-d tnezmarin n ṭṭlam iḥekmen di ddunit-agi, akk-d leṛwaḥ imcumen yellan deg igenwan.
Ɣef wayagi, refdet leslaḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi, iwakken aț-țizmirem aț-țqablem tiswiɛin iweɛṛen, s wakka ɣer taggara n umenuɣ a kkun-id-yaf lḥal mazal tbeddem.
Heggit iman-nwen am iɛsekṛiwen, beggset tideț, lset lḥeqq ɣef yidmaren-nwen am tidemmar n wuzzal.
Sɛut zzwaṛa am warkasen deg yidaṛṛen-nwen, daymen theggam i ubecceṛ n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ.
Di yal taswiɛt, sɛut liman am tseddarit s wayes ara tizmirem aț-țsensem isufa n tmes n Cciṭan ;
cuddet leslak am tcacit n wuzzal ɣef wuqeṛṛuy-nwen, sxedmet asekkin n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yellan d awal n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Di yal taswiɛt deɛɛut ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen s yal taẓallit d uḥellel. Ɛiwzet ihi, kettṛet di tẓallit, deɛɛut ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef watmaten meṛṛa ;
deɛɛut daɣen fell-i iwakken a yi-d-yefk Sidi Ṛebbi imeslayen s wayes ara beccṛeɣ lbaḍna n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ mbla tugdi.
Țțuceggɛeɣ-d ad beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ; ɣef ddemma-s i lliɣ d ameḥbus ; dɛut ihi iwakken a t-beccṛeɣ akken ilaq, mbla tugdi.
Bɣiɣ aț-țeẓrem ula d kunwi ayen i yi-yeɛnan d wayen i xeddmeɣ, daymi i n-ceggɛeɣ gma-tneɣ ameɛzuz Tucik iqeddcen seg ul ɣef Sidna Ɛisa, d nețța ara kkun-isɛelmen ɣef kullec.
Ceggɛeɣ-t-in iwakken aț-țeẓrem ayen akk i ɣ-iɛnan, yerna ad isseǧhed ulawen-nwen.
Ay atmaten, lehna, leḥmala akk-d liman a wen-d-țțunefken s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ akk-d Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi a d-ters ɣef wid akk iḥemmlen Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ s lmaḥibba ur nfennu !
S ɣuṛ Bulus akk-d Timuti iqeddacen n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, i watmaten yumnen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, i imeqqranen n tqeḍɛit akk-d wid i ten-ițɛassan yellan di temdint n Filibus.
Ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a wen-d țțunefkent s ɣuṛ baba-tneɣ Ṛebbi akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ !
?ḥemmideɣ țcekkiṛeɣ Sidi Ṛebbi mkul tikkelt m'ara kkun-id-mmektiɣ.
Yal ass deɛɛuɣ fell-awen s lxiṛ di tẓallit-iw s lfeṛḥ d ameqqran,
ɣef ddemma n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i deg tețțekkim seg wass amezwaru armi ț-țura.
Umneɣ s tideț belli win yebdan deg-wen ccɣel-agi yelhan, a t-ikemmel alamma d ass n tuɣalin n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.

D lḥeqq imi țxemmimeɣ akkagi fell-awen axaṭer tezgam deg ul-iw yerna tețțekkim irkulli di tejmilt i yi-d-ifka Sidi Ṛebbi, ama mi lliɣ di lḥebs ama mi țbecciṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ s tezmert ț-țissas.
Atan Ṛebbi d inigi, acḥal i kkun ccedhaɣ axaṭer ḥemmleɣ-kkun s leḥnana n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ;
yerna ayen i ssutureɣ di tẓallit-iw d anerni n leḥmala-nwen di tmusni akk-d lefhama.
S wakka aț-țissinem amek ara textiṛem ayen ifazen, iwakken aț-țilim teṣfam, ulac ayen ara wen-ssukksen i wass n tuɣalin n Lmasiḥ ;
yerna tudert-nwen aț-țeččaṛ s wayen yellan d lḥeqq i gxeddem yis-wen Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, i tmanegt akk-d lḥemd n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ay atmaten, bɣiɣ aț-țeẓrem belli ayen idṛan yid-i, d ayen i gesnernan abecceṛ n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ.
Axaṭer deg ufrag n ccṛeɛ akk-d imukan nniḍen meṛṛa, ẓran akk ɣef ddemma n Lmasiḥ i țwaḥebseɣ.
Aṭas n watmaten i gțeklen ɣef Ssid-nneɣ, yerna ɣas akken ẓran-iyi țwarzeɣ s snasel ur kukran ara, țbecciṛen awal n Ṛebbi mbla tugdi.
S tideț, llan kra țbecciṛen Lmasiḥ s ṭṭmeɛ akk-d zzux ; meɛna wiyaḍ țbecciṛen s wul yeṣfan d neyya.
Widak-agi xeddmen ayagi s lmaḥibba, imi ẓran țwaxtaṛeɣ iwakken ad dafɛeɣ ɣef lexbaṛ n lxiṛ.
Ma d wiyaḍ, țbecciṛen Lmasiḥ s wul yeččuṛen ț-țiḥila ; ixemmimen nsen ur ṣfin ara, ɣilen s wakka ara rnun lqeṛḥ i wul-iw m'akka lliɣ di lḥebs.
Ur i yi-tewqiɛ ara, axaṭer akken yebɣu yili lḥal, ama s tḥila ama s wul yeṣfan Lmasiḥ yețwabecceṛ ; ɣef wayagi feṛḥeɣ yerna mazal ad feṛḥeɣ,
axaṭer ẓriɣ ayagi meṛṛa i nnfeɛ inu, s tẓallit-nwen akk-d lemɛawna n Ṛṛuḥ n Sidna Ɛisa.
Bɣiɣ yerna ssarameɣ ur d-yețțili wacemma s wayes ara ssetḥiɣ ; meɛna am ass-a am uzekka, s lețkal ameqqran, a d-tban deg-i tmanegt n Lmasiḥ ama s tudert-iw ama s lmut-iw ;
axaṭer ɣuṛ-i, Lmasiḥ ț-țudert-iw ma d lmut d rrbeḥ.
Meɛna ma yella tudert-iw di ddunit, d lfayda ɣef ddemma n leqdic-iw ɣef lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , d acu ara xtiṛeɣ ? Ur ẓriɣ ara !
Di snat lǧihat-agi ɛewqeɣ : deg yiwet n tama, bɣiɣ ad ṛuḥeɣ iwakken ad iliɣ akk-d Lmasiḥ, axaṭer d ayen ifazen aṭas ,
di tama nniḍen, ɣef ddemma-nwen yenfeɛ axiṛ ad idireɣ di ddunit ; ayagi tḥeqqeqeɣ deg-s.
?riɣ ad idireɣ yerna ad qqimeɣ gar-awen meṛṛa, iwakken aț-tennernim yerna aț-țfeṛḥem di liman.
Tuɣalin-iw ɣuṛ-wen, a wen-d-tefk sebba tajḍiṭ, s wayes ara tzuxxem s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ɣef ddemma-inu.

Acu kan, ddut s tikli yuklal lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ iwakken ad sleɣ fell-awen, ama usiɣ-ed a kkun-ẓreɣ ama ɣabeɣ fell-awen, tǧehdem, tedduklem s yiwen n Ṛṛuḥ, tețḥarabem s yiwen wul ɣef liman i d-ițțak lexbaṛ n lxiṛ.
?uṛ-wat aț-țeǧǧem iɛdawen a kkun-ssagden, ayagi ad yili i nutni d țbut n nnger-nsen, i kunwi d țbut n leslak-nwen ; annect-agi s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi i d-yekka ;
axaṭer tețțunefk-awen-d ṛṛeḥma mačči kan iwakken aț-țamnem s Lmasiḥ, meɛna iwakken aț-țenɛețțabem daɣen ɣef ddemma-ines
m'ara tețḥarabem akken twalam țḥarabeɣ nekkini, yerna mazal țḥarabeɣ ar tura am akken i teslam yis.
Eɛni ur tufim ara ṣṣbeṛ di Lmasiḥ, asseǧhed di leḥmala, tagmaț di Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen wway-gar-awen, ur tufim ara leḥnana d ṛṛeḥma ?
Kemmlet ihi lfeṛḥ-iw, sɛut yiwen uxemmem, sɛut yiwet n leḥmala, ddukklet s yiwen n ṛṛuḥ, d yiwen uxemmem.
Ur xeddmet acemma s umḥizwer neɣ iwakken aț-țesɛum ccan ur nesɛi lqima, meɛna anzet, ḥesbet wiyaḍ am akken sɛan lqima akteṛ-nwen.
Ilaq yal yiwen deg-wen ur ițnadi ara kan ɣef nnfeɛ-ines, lameɛna ilaq ad inadi ɣef nnfeɛ n wiyaḍ.
Sɛut deg ulawen nwen ixemmimen yellan di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ :
Nețța yellan d ṣṣifa n Ṛebbi, ur inuda ara ad isseɛdel iman-is akk-d Ṛebbi.
Meɛna isellem kullec s yiman-is mi guɣal d aqeddac. Isseɛdel iman-is d yemdanen mi d-iban s ṣṣifa n wemdan ;
yessanez iman-is mi gedda s ṭṭaɛa armi d lmut, lmut ɣef wumidag.
Daymi Sidi Ṛebbi issuli-t sennig n kra wayen yellan yerna ifka-yas isem yellan sennig n yismawen meṛṛa,
iwakken s yisem n Ɛisa, yal tagecrirt aț-țeknu deg igenwan, di lqaɛa, ddaw lqaɛa,
iwakken yal iles a d-icehhed belli Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, d nețța i gellan sennig kullec i tmanegt n Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ.
A wid eɛzizen fell-i, yal ass tețțaɣem awal ; sbeggnet-ed ihi leslak-nwen s lecɣal, s ṭṭaɛa d wannuz, mačči am asm'akken lliɣ yid-wen, meɛna tura akteṛ imi ɣabeɣ fell-awen.
Axaṭeṛ d Ṛebbi i wen-d-ițțaken lebɣi akk-d tezmert s wayes ara txedmem lebɣi-s yelhan.
Xedmet kullec mbla asmermeg neɣ asṭuqqet n wawal,
iwakken yiwen ur kkun-ițlumu, aț-țilim teṣfam, d arraw n Ṛebbi, ur tseɛɛum ara lɛib ger lǧil-agi n ixeddaɛen, aț-țfeǧǧeǧem gar-asen am teftilin di ddunit
aț-țețbecciṛem awal n tudert ; s wakka, ass n tuɣalin n Lmasiḥ, ayagi ad yili d sebba n ccan-iw imi ur uzzileɣ ur nɛețțabeɣ baṭel.
?as akken ad țțusebbleɣ d asfel ara yernun ɣef wesfel n liman-nwen yețțunefken d lweɛda i Sidi Ṛebbi, d ayen i yi isfeṛḥen yerna feṛḥeɣ yid-wen meṛṛa .
Ula d kunwi feṛḥet am nekk, feṛḥet yid-i.
S lețkal i sɛiɣ di Sidna Ɛisa, ssarameɣ qṛib a wen-ceggɛeɣ Timuti iwakken a yi-issefṛeḥ s lexbaṛ ara yi-d-yawi s ɣuṛ-wen.
Ur sɛiɣ ula d yiwen ara yi-iɛawnen deg ixemmimen-iw, iwakken ad iḥebbeṛ fell-awen seg ul ;
axaṭer akken ma llan țnadin ɣef nnfeɛ-nsen, mačči ɣef nnfeɛ n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Tessnem tikli n Timuṭi, am weqcic ɣer baba-s, yefka tudert-is yid-i i ubecceṛ n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ.
Ihi akken kan ara tefru temsalt-iw, a wen-t-in-ceggɛeɣ
yerna sɛiɣ lețkal di Ssid-nneɣ belli qṛib a n-aseɣ s yiman-iw ɣuṛ-wen.
Walaɣ ilaq-iyi a wen-ceggɛeɣ gma-tneɣ Ebafrudit, amdakkul-iw di lxedma d uḥareb ɣef ddemma n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ, win akken i yi-d-tceggɛem yewwi-yi-d s ɣuṛ-wen ayen akk ḥwaǧeɣ ;
iccedha-kkun meṛṛa yerna yeḥzen aṭas imi teslam yis yehlek.
?-țideț ihlek armi yewweḍ lmut ; meɛna iɣaḍ Sidi Ṛebbi yerna mačči kan d nețța i t-iɣaḍen, ɣaḍeɣ-t ula d nekk iwakken ur d-iɣelli ara fell-i leḥzen ɣef wayeḍ.
Ceggɛeɣ-t-in s lemɣawla, iwakken aț-țfeṛḥem m'ara t-twalim yerna ula d nekk leḥzen-iw ad yifsus.
Sṭerḥbet yis s lfeṛḥ d ameqqran, s wakken yuklal yal yiwen yellan deg ubrid n Lmasiḥ ; qadṛet imdanen am wigi
axaṭer ɣef ddemma n leqdic ɣef Lmasiḥ i gewweḍ ɣer lmut, mi gsebbel ṛṛuḥ-is iwakken ad ixdem ayen akken ur tezmirem ara a yi-t-txedmem kunwi.
Ihi ay atmaten, feṛḥet imi tedduklem akk-d Ssid-nneɣ. Ur ɛeyyuɣ ara di tira n wayen i wen-n-uriɣ yakan, yerna ayagi a wen-yili d ṭṭmana i liman-nwen.
?adret iman nwen deg wuccanen, ḥadret iman nwen ɣef yemcumen-nni iḍehṛen s lekdeb.
Axaṭeṛ d nukni i gesɛan ṭṭhara n ṣṣeḥ imi nɛebbed Sidi Ṛebbi s Ṛṛuḥ-is ; yerna nețzuxxu s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ nețkel fell-as, ur nețkil ara ɣef limaṛat n yemdanen.
Ula d nekk zemreɣ ad țekleɣ ɣef limaṛat n yemdanen. Ma yella win i gɣilen izmer ad ițkel ɣef limaṛat agi, nekk zemreɣ ad țekleɣ akteṛ !
Axaṭer dehṛeɣ ass wis tmanya, kkiɣ-ed si ccetla n wat Isṛail, n wedrum n Benyamin, d aɛibṛani mmi--s n uɛibṛani.
?ef wayen yeɛnan ccariɛa, d afarizi, ma d zzwaṛa, d win ițqehhiṛen tajmaɛt n imasiḥiyen ; ɣef wayen yeɛnan lqanun n ccariɛa n Sidna Musa, ur yelli wayen i yi-ixuṣṣen.
Meɛna ayen akken i yi-illan d lfayda, ḥesbeɣ-t tura d lexṣara ɣef ddemma n Lmasiḥ.

Zemreɣ a d iniɣ : ḥesbeɣ kullec d lexṣara ɣef ddemma n wayen ifazen, yellan ț-țamusni n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-iw. ?ef ddemma-s qebleɣ a yi-iṛuḥ kullec, ḥesbeɣ kullec d afṛaden, iwakken a d-rebḥeɣ Lmasiḥ

yerna ad sɛuɣ amkan ɣuṛ-es, ad uɣaleɣ d aḥeqqi mačči mi ḍuɛeɣ ccariɛa n Sidna Musa, meɛna imi uɣaleɣ d aḥeqqi s liman yellan di Lmasiḥ, s lḥeqq-nni i d-yețțak Sidi Ṛebbi i wid yesɛan liman deg-s.
S wakka ad issineɣ Lmasiḥ, ad issineɣ tazmert n ḥeggu-ines, ad țekkiɣ di leɛtab-is, ad iliɣ am nețța di lmut-is iwakken
akken yebɣu yili lḥal ad awḍeɣ s wayagi ɣer ḥeggu si ger lmegtin.
Ur d-nniɣ ara tikli-inu di Lmasiḥ tennekmal neɣ wwḍeɣ ɣer lmeqsud, meɛna mazal țțazzaleɣ iwakken a t-awḍeɣ, imi ula d nekk yewwi-yi Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Ay atmaten, ur ḥsibeɣ ara iman-iw wwḍeɣ ɣer lmeqṣud-agi ; lameɛna tella yiwet lḥaǧa xeddmeɣ-ț : tețțuɣ ayen iɛeddan, ssarameɣ ɣer wayen yellan ɣer zdat,
țțazzaleɣ ɣer lmeqṣud-agi iwakken ad awḍeɣ ɣer wayen i ɣ-ihegga Sidi Ṛebbi deg igenwan s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Nukni yellan d imdanen meqqṛen di liman ilaq a nesɛu akk axemmem-agi ; ma yella tesɛam axemmem yemxalafen ɣef kra n temsalin, d Sidi Ṛebbi ara kkun-d-isfehmen ɣef wayagi.
S wakka, imi newweḍ di tudert-nneɣ ɣer tegniț-agi, ilaq a nkemmlet tikli-nneɣ s tdukli.
Ɛandet-iyi ay atmaten, țmuqulet ɣer wid i twalam leḥḥun di liman am nukni,
axaṭer aṭas i gteddun am iɛdawen n umidag n Lmasiḥ ; nniɣ-awen-t-id acḥal d abrid, tura daɣen a wen-t-id ɛiwdeɣ s imeṭṭawen :
Taggara-nsen d nnger ; ṛebbi-nsen d iɛebbaḍ-nsen, țzuxxun s wayen i glaq ad nneḥcamen, țxemmimen anagar ɣef leḥwayeǧ n ddunit.
Ma d nukni tanezduɣt-nneɣ deg igenwan, syenna i nețṛaǧu s lḥir amsellek-nneɣ Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ
ara ibeddlen lǧețțat-nneɣ timeḥquṛin, a tent-yerr am lǧețța-s yeččuṛen d lɛaḍima, s tezmert s wayes ițțarra kullec seddaw lḥekma-s.
Daymi, ay atmaten-iw eɛzizen fell-i, kunwi i ccedhaɣ a kkun ẓreɣ, kunwi yellan d lfeṛḥ-iw, d ccan-iw , akka i glaq aț-țeṭṭfem s lǧehd di Ssid-nneɣ, a wid eɛzizen fell-i !
Bɣiɣ ad weṣṣiɣ tiyessetmatin nneɣ Iwudya akk-d Sinticya, iwakken ad ddukklent deg yiwen uxemmem di Ssid-nneɣ.

Ula d kečč a gma Sizugus unṣiḥ, ḍelbeɣ-ak a tent-tɛiwneḍ nutenti i ḥurben yid-i ɣef ddemma n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ, akk-d Klimun d imdukkal-iw nniḍen di leqdic iwumi uran yismawen nsen di tektabt n tudert.
Ilit dayem di lfeṛḥ imi tedduklem akk-d Ssid-nneɣ ; a wen-t-id-ɛiwdeɣ : ilit dayem di lfeṛḥ.
Ilaq aț-țiḥninem ɣer yemdanen meṛṛa, Ssid-nneɣ qṛib a d-yuɣal.
Ur țḥebbiṛet ɣef wacemma, meɛna di yal lḥaǧa, ssutret ayen teḥwaǧem i Sidi Ṛebbi s tẓallit, s uḥellel akk-d leḥmadi ;
imiren lehna n Sidi Ṛebbi i gugaren yal tamusni, aț-țeḥrez ulawen-nwen d ixemmimen nwen di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Taggara ay atmaten a wen-d iniɣ : ayen akk yellan d ṣṣeḥ, d lḥeṛma, d lḥeqq, d ṣṣfa, ayen akk yuklalen leḥmala d wayen yuklalen leqdeṛ akk-d leḥmadi, ad ilin d sebba n ixemmimen-nwen.
Ayen tlemdem s ɣuṛ-i yerna tqeblem-t, ayen twalam xeddmeɣ-t d wayen teslam nniɣ-t-id xedmet-eț ula d kunwi, dɣa Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n lehna ad yili yid-wen.

Feṛḥeɣ aṭas am akken ț-țukci i yi-d-ifka Ssid-nneɣ mi walaɣ ul-nwen iɛawed iǧǧuǧeg-ed ɣuṛ-i, tețḥebbiṛem fell-i ; ẓriɣ tețḥebbiṛem fell-i , lameɛna ur wen-d-teɣli ara teswiɛt iwakken a yi-t-id-tbeggnem.
Ur d-nniɣ ara ayagi imi xuṣṣeɣ, axaṭer lemdeɣ ad steqniɛeɣ di yal taswiɛt i deg lliɣ.
Ssneɣ ad ɛiceɣ di lexṣaṣ, am akken ssneɣ ad ɛiceɣ di tawant. Di yal amkan, di kullec lemdeɣ leqnaɛa d lexṣaṣ, lemdeɣ tawant d laẓ.
Zemreɣ i kullec s win i yi-sseǧhaden.
Lameɛna d ayen ilhan i txedmem imi tețțekkim di leɛtab-iw.

Kunwi teẓram ay atmaten n temdint n Filibus belli asmi bdiɣ abecceṛ n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ, mi ṛuḥeɣ si tmurt n Masidunya. Ula d yiwet n tejmaɛt ur temḥasab yid-i deg wayen i ț-id ikeččmen d wayen i tețțak d lemɛawna i wiyaḍ, anagar tajmaɛt-nwen ;
anagar kunwi i gxedmen ayagi, yerna mi lliɣ di temdint n Tisalunikya, snat n tikkal i yi-d-tceggɛem ayen akk ḥwaǧeɣ.
Mačči ɣef lweɛda i țnadiɣ, meɛna țnadiɣ ɣef lfayda tameqqrant ara yilin di nnfeɛ-nwen.

Yewweḍ-iyi-d kullec, aql-i di tawant, ur iyi-ixuṣṣ wacemma imi i yi-d-iwweḍ wayen i d-tefkam i gma tneɣ Ibafrudit ; ayen i d-yusan s ɣuṛ-wen am leɛṭeṛ n rriḥa yelhan, am wesfel i geqbel Sidi Ṛebbi yerna iɛǧeb-as.
Sidi Ṛebbi a wen-d-yefk ayen akk teḥwaǧem s wakken tella lɛaḍima n lbaṛakat-is, di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Tamanegt i Sidi Ṛebbi baba tneɣ, si lǧil ɣer lǧil, amin !
Sellmet ɣef wegdud n Sidi Ṛebbi, wid akk yumnen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Atmaten akk yellan yid-i țsellimen fell-awen. Wid akk yellan seg ugdud n Sidi Ṛebbi țsellimen fell-awen, abeɛda wid yellan d iqeddacen n Qayṣer.
Ṛṛeḥma n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ aț-țili yid-wen.
Nekk Bulus, amceggeɛ n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ s lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d gma-tneɣ Timuti,
i watmaten yellan di temdint n Kulus, wid iteddun s ṣṣfa deg webrid n Lmasiḥ. Ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a wen-d-țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi Baba-tneɣ !
Nețḥemmid Sidi Ṛebbi Baba-s n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yerna ndeɛɛu fell-awen ;
axaṭer nesla s liman i tesɛam di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ d wamek i tḥemmlem agdud n Sidi Ṛebbi,
ɣef ddemma n usirem i wen-ițțuheggan deg igenwan, asirem nni i wen-d-ițțuxebbṛen s wawal n tideț n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ.
Lexbeṛ-agi n lxiṛ yewḍen armi d ɣuṛ-wen, yețnerni di ddunit meṛṛa ; akken daɣen i gețnerni deg-wen ula d kunwi seg wasmi i teslam yerna tessnem tideț ɣef ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi,
akken i wen-ț-isselmed Ibafras, aṛfiq-nneɣ eɛzizen di leqdic ; nețța iqeddcen ɣef Lmasiḥ s wul yeṣfan,
ixebbeṛ-aɣ-ed ɣef leḥmala s wayes i kkun-yeččuṛ Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.
Daymi nezga ndeɛɛu fell-awen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi seg wasmi nesla yis-wen, nessutur-as a wen-d-yefk amek ara tissinem akken ilaq lebɣi ines, s lɛeqliya d lefhama i d-ițțak Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.
S wakka, aț-țleḥḥum s tikli yebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken a s tɛeǧbem di kullec, a d-tefkem lfakya yelhan, yerna aț-țnernim di tmusni n Sidi Ṛebbi,
Ndeɛɛu ɣer Ṛebbi akken a kkun-isseǧhed s tezmert-is tameqqrant iwakken aț-tṣebṛem i kullec alamma ț-țaggara.
Ḥemmdet, cekkṛet s lfeṛḥ Sidi Ṛebbi Baba-tneɣ i wen-d-yefkan amur di lweṛt i d-ihegga i warraw n tafat.
Ikkes-aɣ-d si tezmert n ṭṭlam, iwakken a ɣ-yessiweḍ ɣer tgelda n Mmi-s eɛzizen,
s wayes nețwasellek yerna nesɛa leɛfu n ddnubat-nneɣ.
Lmasiḥ, d ṣṣifa n Sidi Ṛebbi ur nezmir a nwali, d nețța i d amezwaru n txelqit meṛṛa.

Yis i gețwaxleq wayen nețwali d wayen ur nețwali ara ama deg igenwan ama di lqaɛa, tigeldiwin d igelliden, lḥekmat akk-d tezmar yellan deg igenwan ; kullec yețwaxleq yis, kullec yețwaxleq i nețța.
Yella-d uqbel a d-yețwaxleq kra yellan, d nețța i d lsas n txelqit,
d aqeṛṛuy n tejmaɛt n imasiḥiyen yellan d lǧețța-s. Yella si tazwara, d nețța i d amenzu i d-iḥyan si ger lmegtin iwakken ad yili d amezwaru di kullec.
Axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi yufa lfeṛḥ-is s lekmal di Mmi-s,
s Lmasiḥ i gemṣalaḥ akk-d txelqit, yessers-ed lehna ama di lqaɛa ama deg igenwan s idammen n Mmi-s yuzzlen ɣef wumidag.
Kunwi yellan zik-nni d ibeṛṛaniyen, d iɛdawen n Sidi Ṛebbi s ixemmimen-nwen d yir lecɣal nwen
Tura issemṣaleḥ-ikkun yid-es s lmut n Mmi-s iwakken a d-tbanem zdat-es teṣfam, mbla lɛib.

Ma yella teṭṭfem di liman-nwen s tideț, ma yella tbeddem, tṛeṣṣam. Ɣuṛ-wat aț-țțwexxṛem ɣef wusirem i wen-d-yewwi lexbaṛ n lxiṛ iwumi teslam, lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ i gețțubeccṛen i yemdanen n ddunit meṛṛa, i ɣef uɣaleɣ nekk d aqeddac.
Tura feṛḥeɣ aṭas imi nɛețțabeɣ fell-awen, axaṭer țkemmileɣ ayen ixuṣṣen i leɛtab n Lmasiḥ ɣef ddemma n imasiḥiyen meṛṛa, yellan d lǧețța-s, i ɣef uɣaleɣ d aqeddac.
Iceggeɛ-iyi-d Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken a wen-d-beccṛeɣ awal-is s lekmal.
Lbaḍna yeffren si zik, si lǧil ɣer lǧil, ibeggen-iț-id tura i wid yellan d ayla-s.
Yebɣa a d-yesken ccan n lbaḍna agi ifazen i leǧnas nniḍen ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail, iwakken ad walin Lmasiḥ deg-wen, nețța yellan d lsas n lɛaḍima i ɣer nessaram.
D Lmasiḥ agi i nețbecciṛ i yemdanen, nețweṣṣi-ten, nesselmad iten s tmusni d leɛqel, iwakken yal amdan ad innekmal di Lmasiḥ zdat Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ɣef wayagi i qeddceɣ s tezmert n Lmasiḥ yellan deg-i.
Bɣiɣ aț-țeẓrem acḥal meqqeṛ imenɣi i deg lliɣ ɣef ddemma nwen, ɣef watmaten n temdint n Ludikus akk-d wid meṛṛa i geslan yis-i meɛna leɛmeṛ ur ẓrin udem-iw.
Qebleɣ imenɣi-agi iwakken ad theddnen wulawen-nsen, ad ddukklen s leḥmala, ad ččaṛen d lefhama iwakken ad issinen lbaḍna n Sidi Ṛebbi Ṛebbi yellan di Lmasiḥ ;
deg-s i ffren igerrujen n lefhama ț-țmusni.
Nniɣ-d akka iwakken ur kkun ițkellix yiwen s imeslayen yețɣuṛṛun.
Ɣas akken ur lliɣ ara yid-wen, leɛqel-iw atan ɣuṛ-wen ; feṛḥeɣ aṭas mi ẓriɣ acḥal i teṭṭfem di liman-nwen di Lmasiḥ yerna tsedduyem kullec akken ilaq.
Ihi imi tqeblem Ɛisa Lmasiḥ d Ssid-nwen, ddut di lebɣi-ines.
Sbeddet lsas n tudert-nwen fell-as, sǧehdet liman-nwen akken i kkun nesselmed, țḥemmidet daymen Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ḥadret a kkun-kellxen wid ițfelsifen, wid yessexdamen tiḥila ț-țiḥeṛci ; ayagi d lekdubat i gebnan ɣef leɛwayed n yemdanen akk ț-țizemmar n ddunit, mačči ɣef uselmed n Lmasiḥ.
Axaṭer ayen akk yellan di Sidi Ṛebbi yezdeɣ s lekmal di Lmasiḥ,
kunwi tesɛam kullec deg-s, nețța yellan sennig lḥekmat ț-țzemmar.
Sṭhaṛa-nwen tekka-d si tikli nwen akk-d Lmasiḥ, mačči am tin yețwaxedmen s ufus n wemdan, lameɛna s ɣuṛ Lmasiḥ i d-tekka iwakken a kkun-isellek si tezmert n lǧețța tamednubt.
S weɣḍas-nwen tețwameḍlem akk-d Lmasiḥ, lameɛna teḥyam-d daɣen yid-es si lmut imi tumnem s tezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi i t-id-isseḥyan si ger lmegtin.
Kunwi ur neḍhiṛ ara, tellam temmutem ɣef ddemma n ddnubat nwen ; tura Sidi Ṛebbi yerra-kkun-id ɣer tudert s Lmasiḥ. Sidi Ṛebbi yeɛfa-yaɣ ddnubat-nneɣ meṛṛa.
Yemḥa leɛqed-nni i ɣ-isseḍlamen, imi ur nezmir ara a nexdem ayen d-teqqaṛ ccariɛa ; yemḥa-t mi t-isemmeṛ ɣef wumidag.
Sidi Ṛebbi yekkes tazmert i lḥekmat ț-țzemmar n igenwan, ikcef itent-id zdat txelqit meṛṛa, iɣleb-itent s lmut n Mmi-s ɣef wumidag.
Ihi ur țțaǧat ara win ara kkun-iḥasben ɣef wayen ara teččem d wayen ara teswem neɣ imi ur tettabaɛem ara ayen yeɛnan leɛyudat, talalit n waggur d wussan n westeɛfu ;
ayagi akk yezwar-ed d lemtel kan n wayen i d-iteddun, axaṭer tideț di Lmasiḥ i tella.

Ɣuṛ-wat a wen-kellxen yemdanen ițțarran iman-nsen d wid yunzen, țɛebbiden lmalayekkat, a kkun-id-awin ɣer webrid-nsen iwakken ur tețțawḍem ara ɣer lmeqṣud-nwen ; imdanen am wigi ttabaɛen kan ixemmimen-nsen yerna xeddmen ccan i yiman-nsen.

Ur qbilen ara ad ṭṭfen di Lmasiḥ yellan d aqeṛṛuy, i gesdukklen lǧețța s lemfaṣel meṛṛa d iẓuran i d-icudden ɣuṛ-es ; yis i tețnerni lǧețța, i tețțimɣuṛ s wakken yella di lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ma yella temmutem akk-d Lmasiḥ, teṭṭaxṛem ɣef wayen akk yeɛnan tudert n ddunit, acimi ihi am akken di ddunit i tellam, tqebblem ad ḥețțmen fell-awen leɛwayed n ddunit m'ara wen-qqaṛen :
« Ur teddmet ara neɣ ur ɛeṛṛdet ara neɣ ur țnalet ara !»
Lumuṛat-agi meṛṛa i nxeddem d ayen ara yefnun, d leqwanen d uselmed n yemdanen ;
ț-țideț, lumuṛat-agi sselmaden leɛbada, annuz akk-d uɛețțeb n lǧețțat nneɣ, țbanen-d amakken d ayen yelhan, lameɛna d ayen ur nezmir ad iɛawen bunadem ad iṭṭef iman-is.
Kunwi ihi, imi i d-teḥyam akk-d Lmasiḥ, nadit ɣef leḥwayeǧ n igenwan anda yella Lmasiḥ i gḥekmen ɣer tama tayeffust n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Țḥebbiṛet ɣef wayen yellan deg igenwan mačči ɣef wayen yellan di ddunit-agi,
axaṭer ɣer ddunit tețțusemmam temmutem, meɛna ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi tudert-nwen teffer akk-d Lmasiḥ.
M'ara d-iban Lmasiḥ yellan ț-țudert-nwen, kunwi daɣen a d tbanem yid-es.

Ɣef ddemma n wayagi, xḍut i yir tikli n ddunit-agi s wayes tețțeddum zik : leḥṛam, ayen iɛefnen, lebɣi n tnefsit, ccehwat n diri akk-d ṭṭmeɛ, ayagi meṛṛa am win ițɛebbiden ayen ixulfen Sidi Ṛebbi.
D annect-agi i d-isseɣlayen urrif n Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wid i t-ițɛaṣin.
Ula d kunwi akka i tellam zik-nni mi tețɛicim di ddnub.
Meɛna tura sbeɛdet iman-nwen ɣef wannect-agi meṛṛa : urrif, zzɛaf, ddɣel ; ḥadret a d-ffɣen seg imawen-nwen rregmat neɣ yir lehduṛ.
Ur skiddibet ara wway gar-awen imi tura teǧǧam yir tikli-nwen n zik.
Tuɣalem d ijdiden, tețnernim di tmusni n Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken aț țemcabim ɣuṛ-es, nețța i kkun-d-ixelqen.

Di tudert-agi tajdiṭ ulac lxilaf ger wat Isṛail d leǧnas nniḍen, ger win iḍehṛen d win ur neḍhiṛ, ger wid itqeddmen d wid ur netqeddem, neɣ ger wakli d uḥeṛṛi, imi d Lmasiḥ i gellan d kullec di mkul yiwen.
Sidi Ṛebbi iḥemmel-ikkun, yextaṛ-ikkun aț-țilim d agdud-is. Sɛut ihi ṛṛeḥma deg wulawen-nwen, leḥnana, lxiṛ, ṣṣbeṛ d wannuz.
Țemyawit wway gar-awen, ma yella win yesɛan accetki ɣef wayeḍ msamaḥet axiṛ wway gar-awen, akken i wen-isemmeḥ Lmasiḥ, msamaḥet ula d kunwi.
Nnig n wayagi meṛṛa sɛut leḥmala, ț-țin i gesdukkulen ulawen.
Sɛut lehna n Lmasiḥ deg ulawen nwen iwakken aț-țilim d yiwen, ḥemmdet Sidi Ṛebbi imi ɣer lehna-agi i wen-d-yessawel.

Awal n Lmasiḥ ad izdeɣ gar-awen s lbaṛakat-is meṛṛa iwakken wa ad isselmad wa, wa ad inehhu wayeḍ s ṣṣwab. Ccnut s wulawen-nwen, ḥemmdet Sidi Ṛebbi s isefra n Zabuṛ akk-d ccnawi i d-ițțak Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.
Ama deg imeslayen ama di lecɣal ara txedmem, xedmet kullec s yisem n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa, s yisem-is țḥemmidet Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ.
A tilawin, ḍuɛemt irgazen-nkunt, ayagi d ayen ilaqen i tid i gețḍuɛun Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ma d kunwi ay irgazen, ilaq aț-țḥemmlem tilawin-nwen, ur seɛɛut ara ulawen iqesḥen ɣuṛ-sent.
Ay arrac țțaɣet awal i imawlan nwen di kullec, axaṭer akka ara tɛeǧbem i Sidi Ṛebbi.
Lameɛna kunwi ay imawlan ur sserfuyet ara dderya-nwen neɣ m'ulac ad feclen.
Ma d kunwi ay iqeddacen, țțaɣet awal i imɛellmen-nwen di ddunit-agi mačči kan zdat-nsen akken a sen tɛeǧbem meɛna ɣas ulac-iten xedmet ccɣel-nwen seg wul, am akken i Sidi Ṛebbi.
Kra n wayen ara txedmem, xedmet-eț s wul yeṣfan am akken i Sidi Ṛebbi i t-txeddmem mačči i yemdanen,
mmektit-ed lweṛt i kkun ițṛaǧun s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi akken i t-id-yewɛed ; axaṭer amɛellem n tideț i ɣef tqeddcem, d Lmasiḥ.
Win ixeddmen cceṛ a d-iɣellet ayen yexdem ; axaṭer ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi ulac lxilaf.
Ay imɛellmen ddut s lḥeqq, ur xeddmet ara lxilaf ger iqeddacen nwen, axaṭer teẓram belli ula d kunwi tesɛam amɛellem deg igenwan.
Ur ɣefflet ara, meɛna deɛɛut țḥemmidet daymen Sidi Ṛebbi.
Deɛɛut daɣen fell-aɣ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken a ɣ-d-ildi tiwwura a nbecceṛ awal-is, a nxebbeṛ ɣef lbaḍna n Lmasiḥ i ɣef lliɣ di lḥebs,
dɛut iwakken ad sfehmeɣ akken ilaq lbaḍna-agi i yemdanen.
Ddut s ṣṣwab zdat wid ur numin ara s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ; faṛset tagniț, țbecciṛet awal n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Sɛut iles aẓidan, imeslayen yesɛan lfayda, iwakken aț-țețțarram awal i yal yiwen s ṣṣwab.
Tucik, gma-tneɣ eɛzizen i ɣef țekleɣ, aṛfiq-nneɣ di leqdic ɣef Ssid-nneɣ, a wen-n-yawi lexbaṛ-iw.
Ɣef wannect-agi i wen-t-in ceggɛeɣ iwakken a wen-n-yawi lexbaṛ-nneɣ yerna ad ihedden ulawen-nwen.
A d-yas nețța d gma-tneɣ eɛzizen Unizim i ɣef nețkel, yellan d yiwen seg-wen ; d nutni ara wen-n-yawin lexbaṛ ɣef wayen meṛṛa ideṛṛun dagi.
Ițsellim-ed fell-awen Arisṭark aṛfiq-iw yellan yid-i di lḥebs akk-d Maṛqus yețțilin i Barnabas, win i ɣef kkun-weṣṣaɣ aț-țesterḥbem yis ma yusa-d ɣuṛ-wen.
Ițsellim-ed daɣen fell-awen Ɛisa iwumi qqaṛen Yustus. Ger wat Isṛail anagar tlata watmaten-agi i gxeddmen yid-i i tgeldit n Sidi Ṛebbi, d nutni kan i yufiɣ ɣer tama-w.

Gma-tneɣ Ibafras n tmurt-nwen, yellan d aqeddac n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ițsellim-ed fell-awen ; yezga ideɛɛu ɣer Ṛebbi fell-awen iwakken aț-țeṭṭfem, aț-țennernim di liman yerna aț-țilim twejdem aț-țxedmem lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi.
A d-cehdeɣ fell-as acḥal inɛețțab fell-awen, ɣef watmaten n tejmaɛt n Ludikus akk-d wid n Yirabulis.
Luqa aḥbib-nneɣ eɛzizen yellan d ṭṭbib akk-d Dimas, țsellimen-d fell-awen.
Sellmet ɣef watmaten yellan di Ludikus, ɣef Nimfa akk d wid ițnejmaɛen deg wexxam-is.
M'ara teɣṛem tabṛaț-agi, fket-eț i watmaten n tejmaɛt n Ludikus a ț-ɣṛen, kunwi daɣen ɣṛet tabṛaț ara kkun-id-yawḍen s ɣuṛ-sen.
Init i Arcibus ad ibedd i ccɣel nni i ɣef t-iwekkel Ssid-nneɣ, a t-ixdem akken ilaq.
Nekk Bulus, s ufus-iw i wen-n uriɣ. Sslam fell-awen ! Ur tețțut ara belli d ameḥbus i lliɣ. Ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi aț-țili yid-wen.
Nekk Bulus, Silwan akk-d Timuti, i tejmaɛt n watmaten yellan di temdint n Tiṣalunik yumnen s Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ akk-d Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa lmasiḥ. Ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a d-ersent fell-awen.
Yal ass nețḥemmid Sidi Ṛebbi fell-awen ; mkul m'ara nedɛu ɣuṛ-es, nețțader-ikkun-id di tẓallit-nneɣ.

Nețmektay-ikkun-id zdat Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ, ɣef wayen akk txeddmem seg wasmi tumnem s Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ; tqeblem aț-țenneɛtabem ɣef ddemma n yisem-is imi tḥemmlem-t yerna lețkal-nwen fell-as d ameqqran.
Ay atmaten eɛzizen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi, neẓra belli d nețța i kkun-id ixtaṛen.

Lexbeṛ-agi n lxiṛ i wen-d newwi mačči d imeslayen kan, lameɛna s țțeḥqiq i wen-d-nbecceṛ lexbaṛ-agi n tideț, s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen. Teẓram amek i nedda gar-awen, asm'akken i nella ɣuṛ-wen ; nexdem ayagi iwakken a kkun-nɛiwen di tikli-nwen.
Ula d kunwi tuɣalem tețțeddum am nukni deg webrid n Ssid-nneɣ, imi di teswiɛt iweɛṛen i tqeblem awal-is s lfeṛḥ i d-ițțak Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.
S wakka tuɣalem d lemtel i wid akk yumnen, i gellan di tmura n Masidunya akk-d Akaya.
Axaṭer s ɣuṛ-wen, lexbaṛ n lxiṛ iwweḍ mačči kan ɣer tmura-agi, meɛna slan s liman-nwen di Sidi Ṛebbi di mkul amkan. Daymi fiḥel a d-nemmeslay fell-awen.
Imdanen meṛṛa ḥekkun amek i tesṭerḥbem yis-nneɣ, amek i d-tuɣalem ɣer webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi, teǧǧam aɛbad n ssadaț, iwakken aț-țḍuɛem Sidi Ṛebbi n tideț, Sidi Ṛebbi yeddren.
Yerna tețṛaǧum a d-yuɣal Ssid nneɣ Ɛisa seg igenwan, Mmi-s-nni i d-isseḥya si ger lmegtin ; d nețța ara ɣ-isellken ass n lḥisab.
Ay atmaten, kunwi s yiman-nwen teẓram mačči mbla lmeɛna i d-nusa ɣuṛ-wen.
Teẓram daɣen nenneɛtab, nețwargem di temdint n Filibus, meɛna neṭṭef di liman-nneɣ di Sidi Ṛebbi, nkemmel abecceṛ n wawal-is gar-awen ɣas akken nețwaqehheṛ.
Lexbeṛ-agi n lxiṛ i wen-d newwi ur ibni ara ɣef lekdeb neɣ ɣef tḥila d lexdeɛ.
Sidi Ṛebbi ițkel fell-aɣ, daymi i ɣ-iceggeɛ iwakken a nbecceṛ awal-is. Axaṭer iẓra nețmeslay mačči iwakken a neɛǧeb i yemdanen, meɛna iwakken a s-neɛǧeb i nețța yessnen ulawen-nneɣ.
Teẓram belli leɛmeṛ ur nemmeslay s usqizzeb neɣ neḍmeɛ kra deg yiwen, atan Sidi Ṛebbi d inigi !
Leɛmeṛ ur nqelleb ad yali ccan-nneɣ ama ɣuṛ-wen ama ɣer wiyaḍ ; yerna lemmer nebɣi, nezmer a nḥettem iman-nneɣ fell-awen imi d imceggɛen n Lmasiḥ i nella !
Meɛna asmi nella gar-awen, neččuṛ d leḥnana am tyemmaț ițḥadaren ɣef warraw-is.
Imi tellam deg wulawen-nneɣ, mačči kan d lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi i nebɣa a wen-nbecceṛ, meɛna nezmer a nsebbel ula ț-țiṛwiḥin-nneɣ fell-awen, axaṭer teɛzizem fell-aɣ aṭas.
Ma tecfam ay atmaten ɣef wussan nni mi i wen-d-newwi lexbaṛ n lxiṛ, nenneɛtab, nxeddem iḍ d wass akken ur nețțili ț-țaɛkumt ula i yiwen deg-wen.
Ṛebbi yeẓra, kunwi teẓram belli tikli-nneɣ teṣfa, nedda s lḥeqq, yiwen ur aɣ-d-issukkes lɛib gar-awen kunwi s wid yumnen.
Teẓram daɣen nella i mkul yiwen deg-wen am ubabat ɣer warraw-is.
Nenha-kkun, nesseǧhed-ikkun, nḥellel-ikkun iwakken aț-țeddum akken yebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi i wen-d issawlen ɣer tgeldit-is d lɛaḍima-s.

S wakka nețḥemmid dayem Sidi Ṛebbi imi tqeblem awal-is i wen-d newwi. Tqeblem-t mačči am akken d awal n wemdan, meɛna tqeblem-t imi d awal n Sidi Ṛebbi. D awal-agi i gxeddmen deg-wen tura, kunwi s wid yumnen.
Ay atmaten, tedṛa yid-wen am tejmuyaɛ n imasiḥiyen yellan di tmurt n Yahuda : akken i kkun-qehṛen warraw n tmurt-nwen akken daɣen i ten-qehṛen wudayen.
D udayen-agi i genɣan Ssid nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ akk-d lenbiya, d nutni daɣen i ɣ-iqehṛen. Ɛuṣan Sidi Ṛebbi yerna d iɛdawen n yemdanen.
Rnan kemmlen di ddnubat-nsen, axaṭer ur ɣ-ǧǧin ara a nbecceṛ leslak n Sidi Ṛebbi i leǧnas nniḍen ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail. S wakka i d-yeɣli lɛiqab n Sidi Ṛebbi fell-asen.
Ma d nukni ay atmaten seg wasmi i d-nṛuḥ s ɣuṛ-wen, ɣas akken ur kkun-ẓerrent ara wallen, tellam deg wulawen-nneɣ ; nxaq fell-awen aṭas, daymi i neɛṛeḍ a d-nas iwakken a kkun-nẓer.
Acḥal n tikkal i nebɣa a nuɣal ɣuṛ-wen, nekk s yiman-iw, yiwet neɣ snat n tikkal i ɛerḍeɣ a n-ruḥeɣ, meɛna Cciṭan ur aɣ yeǧǧi ara, iqḍeɛ-aɣ abrid.
D kunwi i d sebba n usirem d lfeṛḥ-nneɣ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi, yis-wen ara nzuxx zdat Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa asm'ara d-yuɣal.
Ț-țideț, d kunwi i d can nneɣ i d lfeṛḥ-nneɣ.
Imi ur nezmir ara a neṣbeṛ fell-awen nnig wannect-a, nufa-d yiwen ṛṛay : nukni a neqqim di temdint n Atinya,
ma d gma-tneɣ Timuti, aqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi, ițbecciṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ, a wen-t-in-nceggeɛ a kkun isseǧhed yerna a kkun-inhu di liman nwen,
iwakken yiwen ur ifeččel di teswiɛt-agi n uqehheṛ. Teẓram belli ayagi d ayen i ɣ-ițṛaǧun.
Asmi nella yid-wen nenna-yawen yakan belli a d-yas wass i deg ara nețwaqehheṛ. Atan tura twalam belli d ayen ideṛṛun.

Imi xaqeɣ fell-awen, ur zmireɣ ara ad ṣebṛeɣ, ceggɛeɣ-awen gma tneɣ Timuti iwakken a yi-d-yawi lexbaṛ ma mazal teṭṭfem di liman nwen ; axaṭer uggadeɣ a kkun iɣuṛṛ Cciṭan, aț-țețțum ayen akk i wen-nesselmed, uggadeɣ lxedma nneɣ aț-țuɣal d ulac.

Mi d-yuɣal Timuti s ɣuṛ-wen, yewwi-yaɣ-d lexbaṛ yelhan fell-awen : iḥka-yaɣ-d amek tḍuɛem Sidi Ṛebbi, d leḥmala yellan wway gar-awen ; yenna-yaɣ-d daɣen amek i ɣ-d țmektayem, ur aɣ-tețțum ara, tḥarem melmi ara ɣ-teẓrem am akken i nxaq fell-awen ula d nukni.
Ay atmaten, ɣas akka nella di lmeḥna d iɣeblan, theddnen wulawen nneɣ ɣef wayen yeɛnan liman-nwen.
Tura yuɣal-aɣ-d ṛṛuḥ imi neẓra teṭṭfem di Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Lfeṛḥ-nneɣ d ameqqran zdat Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef ddemma-nwen. Akken nebɣu neḥmed-it fell-awen drus.
Nețḥellil Sidi Ṛebbi am iḍ am ass, a ɣ-d-yefk tagniț i deg ara kkun-nẓer, iwakken a wen-nkemmel aselmed n wayen i kkun-ixuṣṣen di liman-nwen.
Nessutur Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ d Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa a ɣ-d-ldin iberdan iwakken a n-nas ɣuṛ-wen.
Ad isnerni Ṛebbi leḥmala i tesɛam wway gar-awen, aț-țḥemmlem daɣen imdanen meṛṛa am akken i kkun nḥemmel nukni.
Ad isseǧhed Ṛebbi ulawen nwen, iwakken aț-țeṣfum, aț-țilim mbla lɛib zdat Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ i wass i deg ara d-yuɣal Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ nețța d lmalayekkat.
Ay atmaten, tlemdem s ɣuṛ-nneɣ amek ara teddum iwakken aț-țɛeǧbem i Sidi Ṛebbi ; a kkun nenhu s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ kemmlet ɣer zdat iwakken aț țimɣuṛem.
Ay atmaten teẓram belli lewṣayat i wen-nesselmed, kkant-ed s ɣuṛ Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
D ṣṣfa n wulawen-nwen i gebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi ; yebɣa aț-țḥadrem iman nwen si lefsad,
yal yiwen deg-wen ur ițțak ara lebɣi i tnefsit-is deg wayen icemten ; ad iddu s ṣṣfa d lḥeṛma,
ur ițmenni ara ayen icemten am akken xeddmen imejhal ur nessin ara Sidi Ṛebbi.
Deg wannect-agi ilaq yiwen ur ițkellix gma-s di tlufa yeɛnan idrimen. Acḥal n tikkal i kkun-nweṣṣa iwakken aț-țḥadrem iman-nwen axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi ad yerr țțar akken i wen-t-id-nenna !
Sidi Ṛebbi ur aɣ-d-inni ara a neddu di lefsad meɛna iweṣṣa-yaɣ-d a neddu s ṣṣfa.
S wakka win ur neqbil ara lewṣayat-agi, mačči d amdan i gɛuṣa, meɛna iɛuṣa Sidi Ṛebbi i wen-d-ițțaken Ṛṛuḥ-is iqedsen.
Ɣef wayen yeɛnan tagmaț, fiḥel ma nemmeslay-awen-d fell-as, imi temyeḥmalem wway gar-awen akken i tlemdem s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi.
Akken daɣen i tḥemmlem atmaten yellan di tmurt n Masidunya meṛṛa. Di leɛnaya nwen ay atmaten, kemmlet deg webrid-agi.
Nadit aț-țɛicem di talwit, ur țɛassat ara d acu i xeddmen wiyaḍ. Xedmet s ifassen-nwen, ur ṭṭamaɛet ara aɣṛum-nwen deg wiyaḍ, akken i kkun-nweṣṣa yakan
iwakken a kkun-qadṛen medden ɣef ddemma n tikli nwen yeṣfan, yerna ur tețțilim ț-țaɛkumt ula i yiwen.
Ay atmaten, ur nebɣi ara a kkun-neǧǧ di ccekk ɣef wayen yeɛnan wid yemmuten, iwakken ur tețțilim ara di leḥzen am wid ur nesɛi ara asirem n leslak n Sidna Ɛisa.
Axaṭer akken numen belli Sidna Ɛisa yemmut yuɣal yeḥya-d, numen daɣen belli Sidi Ṛebbi a d-isseḥyu wid yemmuten, imi umnen s Sidna Ɛisa.
Atah wayen ara wen-d-nini akken i t-id-isselmed Ssid-nneɣ : ma yella mazal-aɣ nedder asm'ara d-yuɣal, ur nețțili ara d imezwura ɣef wid yemmuten.

Axaṭer m'ara d-iffeɣ lameṛ, m'ara d-tenṭeq taɣect n lmelk akk-d ṣṣut n lbuq n Sidi Ṛebbi, Sidna Ɛisa s yiman-is a d-iṣubb seg igenni, imiren widak-nni yemmuten, llan umnen yis, a d-ḥyun d imezwura si ger lmegtin.
Ma d nukni ma yella mazal-aɣ nedder, a nețwarfed yid-sen ɣef wusigna, a nemmager Sidna Ɛisa deg igenwan, iwakken a nili yid-es i dayem.
Ihi mseǧhadet, mṣebbaṛet wway gar-awen s yimeslayen-agi.
Ɣef wayen yeɛnan ussan akk d lweqt, fiḥel ma nura-yawen fell-asen.
Teẓram s yiman-nwen belli ass-nni, Sidna Ɛisa a d-yuɣal am umakar deg iḍ.
M'ara yinin yemdanen : « aql-aɣ di lehna ț-țalwit, » ass-nni ur țfiqen ara alamma yeɣli-d fell-asen nnger, am lewjaɛ m'ara ṭṭfen tameṭṭut yellan s tadist, yernu yiwen ur imenneɛ.
Ma d kunwi ay atmaten, ur tellim ara di ṭṭlam iwakken a d-iɣli wass-nni fell-awen am umakar ;
axaṭer kunwi d arraw n tafat, tețțeddum deg wass ; nukni ur nelli ara d arraw n ṭṭlam iteddun deg yiḍ.
Ihi ur ilaq ara a neɣfel am wiyaḍ, meɛna ilaq a nɛass iman-nneɣ yerna a nɛiwez.
Wid yegganen gganen deg yiḍ, wid iṣekkren țṣekkiren deg yiḍ.
Ma d nukni yellan d arraw n tafat, a nɛass ɣef yiman-nneɣ : a nesɛu liman d leḥmala am llebsa n wuzzal ițlusu uɛeskṛi, a nesɛu asirem n leslak, am tcacit n wuzzal ɣef wuqeṛṛuy.
Axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi ur aɣ-ixtaṛ ara iwakken a nețwaɛaqeb, meɛna yebɣa a nesɛu leslak s Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ
i gemmuten fell-aɣ, iwakken ama nedder ama nemmut a nili yid-es.
S wakka ihi, țemseǧhadet, țemṣebbaṛet wway gar-awen akken i txeddmem yakan.
Di leɛnaya-nwen ay atmaten, qadṛet wid iqeddcen gar-awen, axaṭer s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i kkun nehhun, i kkun-sselmaden.
Ɛuzzet țen tḥemmlem-ten ɣef ddemma n lxedma-nsen, ɛicet di lehna wway gar-awen.
Di leɛnaya-nwen ay atmaten : nhut wid iteddun s yir tikli, ṣebbṛet wid iwumi ɣlin ifadden, refdet wid ifeclen, swesɛet ulawen-nwen ɣuṛ-sen meṛṛa.
Ḥadret iman-nwen ur țțarat ara țțaṛ, qellbet ɣef wayen yelhan ama gar-awen ama ɣer imdanen meṛṛa.
Ilit dayem di lfeṛḥ,
yal ass deɛɛut ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi,
ḥemmdet-eț ɣef kullec. D ayagi i gețṛaǧu Sidi Ṛebbi deg-wen, di tikli-nwen akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Ur snusut ara tafat n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ;
ur ḥeqqṛet ara ayen i d-ițweḥḥi Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i yemdanen.
Meɛna meyzet, qeblet ayen yelhan,
ḥadret iman-nwen ɣef wayen n diri.
Sidi Ṛebbi bab n talwit, ad iṣeffi ṛṛuḥ-nwen, lǧețțat nwen ț-țeṛwiḥin-nwen, iwakken aț țeqqimem d izedganen i wass i deg ara d-yuɣal Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Win i kkun-ixtaṛen, deg-s laman, d nețța ara kkun-iṣṣiwden ɣer wannect agi.
Ay atmaten, deɛɛut ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi fell-aneɣ.
Sṣiwḍet sslam-iw i watmaten meṛṛa.
Di leɛnaya-nwen, s yisem n Ssid-nneɣ, sseɣṛet tabṛaț-agi i watmaten meṛṛa.
Ṛṛeḥma n Ssid-nneɣ a d-ters fell-awen.
Nekk Bulus, Silwan akk-d Timuti, i tejmaɛt n watmaten n temdint n Tiṣalunik yumnen s Sidi Ṛebbi d Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a wen-d țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ay atmaten eɛzizen, imi liman-nwen simmal yețnerni, simmal tețțemyeḥmalem wway gar-awen, eɛni mačči d lḥeqq ma nețḥemmid Sidi Ṛebbi fell-awen am iḍ am ass ?
Newweḍ armi nețzuxxu yis-wen di yal tajmaɛt n watmaten, nețțawi-kkun d lemtel axaṭer ɣas akken tenneɛtabem tețwaqehṛem, tṣebrem, teṭṭfem di liman-nwen.
Sidi Ṛebbi d bab n lḥeqq, ma yella iɛemmed aț-țenneɛtabem akkagi, yebɣa a kkun-yerr d wid yuklalen tagelda-ines ; ț-țagelda-agi i ɣef tenneɛtabem.
Axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi yellan d Bab n lḥeqq, a d-yerr leqheṛ ɣef wid i kkun-ițqehhiṛen,
a kkun-iṣebber yid-nneɣ, kunwi yețwaqehṛen. Ayagi a d-idṛu asm'ara d-yuɣal Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, m'ara d-iṣubb seg igenwan nețța d lmalayekkat-is
di tlemmast n uḥeǧǧaǧu n tmes iwakken ad iɛaqeb wid iɛuṣan Sidi Ṛebbi, ur neqbil ara lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Sidna Ɛisa.
Lɛiqab ara ten-id-yasen, ț-țawaɣit ur nețfaka, Sidi Ṛebbi a ten-iḥeṛṛem ɣef udem-is, ur țwalin ara lɛaḍima-s.

Ayagi a d-idṛu asm'ara d-yas Sidna Ɛisa ; ass-nni wid yumnen yis ad tɛeǧǧben deg-s, a t-ḥemden m'ara t-walin di lɛaḍima-s ! Ula d kunwi aț-țilim gar-asen axaṭer tumnem s lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i wen-nbecceṛ.

?ef ayagi i ndeɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi fell-awen am iḍ am ass, iwakken a kkun-yerr d wid yuklalen tudert i ɣer wen-d-issawel. Nessutur-as daɣen a wen-d-ifk tazmert, iwakken aț-țxedmem ayen akken tessaramem n wayen yelhan, yerna ad ibarek lecɣal txeddmem deg webrid n Sidna Ɛisa.
S wakka imdanen ad ḥemden isem-is ɣef ddemma n tikli-nwen yelhan, kunwi daɣen aț-țwaɛuzzem s ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d ṛṛeḥma n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
?ef wayen yeɛnan tuɣalin n Ssid nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ț-țemlilit-nneɣ yid-es, di leɛnaya-nwen ay atmaten :

ḥadret a kkun-iffeɣ leɛqel neɣ a wen-ikcem ukukru, ma yella win i wen-d-yennan belli ass n tuɣalin n Sidna Ɛisa yewweḍ-ed ; yezmer lḥal ad yili win i wen-t-id-yennan neɣ win i t-iwalan deg uweḥḥi, neɣ daɣen a wen-arun tabṛaț am akken d nukni i wen-țin-yuran.
Akken yebɣu yili lḥal ur țțaǧat yiwen a kkun-ikellex, axaṭer ass-nni ur d-ițaweḍ ara uqbel ussan n tijehli, uqbel a d-iban wemcum ijehlen i gețṛaǧu nnger.
Win akken ara yessimɣuṛen iman is sennig wayen meṛṛa iɛebbden yemdanen, ad yekcem ɣer lǧameɛ iqedsen n Ṛebbi ad yerr iman-is deg wemkan n Ṛebbi. f+
Ur tecfim ara belli xebbṛeɣ kkun id yakan ɣef ayagi asm'akken lliɣ yid-wen ?
Teẓram acu i t-iṭṭfen ur d-ițban ara tura alamma yewweḍ-ed lweqt-is !
Tazmert n cceṛ yellan d lbaḍna, tebda ccɣel-is, ilaq kan ayen i ț-iṭṭfen ar tura ad ițwakkes.
Imiren amcum-nni amejhul a d- ban, dɣa Sidna Ɛisa a t-iṣuḍ s nnefs-is a t-issenger, a t-imḥu s ufeǧǧeǧ n lɛaḍima-s asm'ara d-yuɣal.
Amcum-agi amejhul a d-yas s tezmert n Cciṭan, ad ixdem leɛǧubat d lbeṛhanat s wayes ara ikellex,
ad issexdem lekdeb d lbaṭel iwakken ad ikellex wid iḍaɛen, axaṭer ur qbilen ara leḥmala n tideț s wayes ara țwaselken.
Daymi Sidi Ṛebbi iceggeɛ-asen-d tazmert n ṭṭlam aț-țexdem deg-sen, iwakken ad amnen s wayen yellan d lekdeb.
S wakka wid akk ur numin ara s tideț, ad țțuɛaqben imi țțafen lfeṛḥ-nsen anagar di lbaṭel.
Ay atmaten ɛzizen ɣer Ṛebbi, ilaq-aɣ a nețḥemmid kull ass Sidi Ṛebbi fell-awen, axaṭer ixtaṛ-ikkun d imezwura iwakken aț-țețțusellkem s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i kkun-iṣeffan s liman di tideț.
Sidi Ṛebbi issawel-awen-d aț țekkim di tmanegt n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, s lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ i wen-d newwi.
Ihi ay atmaten ḥerzet, ṭṭfet deg uselmed i wen-d-newwi, ama s yimi nneɣ ama s tebṛatin-nneɣ.
Nessutur di Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ akk-d baba-tneɣ Ṛebbi i ɣ-iḥemmlen, i ɣ-d-ifkan s ṛṛeḥma ines ṣṣbeṛ d usirem ițdumun,
ad țțuṣebbṛen wulawen-nwen, a wen-d-tețțunefk tezmert s wayes ara txeddmem anagar ayen yelhan ama di lecɣal-nwen ama deg imeslayen-nwen.
?ef wayen nniḍen ay atmaten, dɛut Sidi Ṛebbi fell-aneɣ iwakken awal-is ad ițțubecceṛ, ad yaweḍ ɣer yal amkan, ad ițwaɛuzz am akken i t-tɛuzzem kunwi.
Dɛut daɣen iwakken a ɣ-isellek si ger ifassen n yemcumen i ɣ-ibɣan cceṛ, axaṭer llan wid ur nețțamen ara.
Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi d bab n lețkal, a kkun-isseǧhed, a kkun iḥader ɣef wemcum.
Nesɛa laman ɣuṛ-es fell-awen belli txeddmem yerna aț-țkemlem aț-țxedmem ayen i ɣef i kkun-nweṣṣa.
Ndeɛɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken ad iččaṛ ulawen-nwen s leḥmala-ines, iwakken aț-țesɛum ṣṣbeṛ n Lmasiḥ. f+
Ay atmaten a kkun-nenhu s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ : sbeɛdet iman-nwen ɣef atmaten imeɛdazen, ițɛicin akken bɣan, mačči am akken i wen-t-nesselmed.
Teẓram s yiman nwen amek i glaq a ɣ-tɛandem, axaṭer nukni ur nɛac ara deg ussexṛeb asmi nella yid-wen.
Ur neḍmiɛ ula deg yiwen aɣṛum-nneɣ, lameɛna nețɛețțib iman-nneɣ di lxedma iḍ d wass, iwakken ur nețțili ț-țaɛekkumt ula i yiwen.
Yerna lemmer nessuter-awen a ɣ-tɛiwnem, d lḥeqq fell-aɣ ; meɛna nexdem akkenni iwakken a wen-nili d lemtel.
Asmi nella gar-awen nweṣṣa kkun belli « win ur nebɣi ara ad ixdem ur ilaq ara ad yečč. »
Axaṭer nesla belli llan gar-awen imeɛdazen ur nebɣi ara ad xedmen meɛna ggaren iman-nsen di lecɣal i ten-ixḍan.
Imdanen-agi a ten-nweṣṣi s yisem n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ : ad xedmen akken ilaq iwakken a d-ḥeṛṛen aɣṛum nsen.
Ma d kunwi ay atmaten xedmet lxiṛ, ur ɛeggut ara !
Win ur neqbil ara ayen i d-nenna di tebṛaț-agi, jebdet iman-nwen fell-as, ur țeddut ara yid-es iwakken ad inneḥcam, ad issetḥi.
Ur t-ḥețțbet ara d aɛdaw, meɛna nhut-eț am yiwen seg watmaten-nwen.
Nessutur di Sidi Ṛebbi bab n talwit a wen-d-yefk lehna kull ass, di yal tagniț ! Sidi Ṛebbi ad yili yid-wen meṛṛa !
Nekk Bulus, uriɣ-awen sslam-agi s ufus-iw, ț-țagi i ț-țira-inu di yal tabṛaț i wen-ceggɛeɣ.
Ṛṛeḥma n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ a d-ters fell-awen meṛṛa !
Nekk Bulus amceggeɛ n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, s lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi amsellek-nneɣ akk-d lebɣi n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i deg yella usirem-nneɣ,
i gma-tneɣ Timuti f+ i d-ṛebbaɣ di liman am mmi n tideț, lbaṛaka, ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a k-d-țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi Baba-tneɣ akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ.
Akken i k-nhiɣ uqbel ad ṛuḥeɣ ɣer tmurt n Masidunya qqim di temdint n Ifasus f+ iwakken ur tețțaǧǧaḍ ara kra n yemdanen ad slemden ayen i gxulfen tikli di liman,
ini-asen ad xḍun i tmucuha f+ d umeslay n zzux ɣef yizuṛan n tjaddit ur nețfaka, ayagi yețțawi-d lehduṛ ur nesɛi lfayda i ɣ-issebɛaden ɣef liman d lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi.
A sen-tiniḍ annect-agi iwakken a d-tessakiḍ deg wulawen-nsen leḥmala yeṣfan, ad ithedden lxaṭer-nsen yerna ad sɛun liman n tideț ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.
Llan kra n yemdanen ffɣen i webrid, țmeslayen kan ɣef wayen ur nesɛi lmeɛna.
Bɣan ad slemden i wiyaḍ ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi, nutni s yiman-nsen ur fhimen d acu i d qqaṛen ur fhimen ayen i sselmaden.
Neẓra belli ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi d ayen yelhan ma yella netbeɛ-iț akken ilaq,

meɛna ilaq daɣen a nẓer belli ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi ur d-tețțunefk ara ɣef ddemma n iḥeqqiyen meɛna tețțunefk-ed ɣef ddemma n yemcumen, i wid iɛuṣan Ṛebbi, i imejhal, i imednuben akk-d wid ur nețțak ara lqima i wayen iqedsen, wid ur nețqadaṛ ara Ṛebbi, wid ineqqen imawlan-nsen akk-d iqettalen,
i wid yeffɣen i webrid, i wat lɛaṛ, i wid itjaṛen deg waklan akk-d i ikeddaben, i wid ur nețțaṭṭaf ara deg wawal-nsen neɣ wid yețxalafen aselmed n tideț i wen-d yețțunefken.
Akka i gella di lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i yi-d-ițțunefken, i d-isbegginen tamanegt n Sidi Ṛebbi ameɣlal.
Ad ḥemdeɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ i yi-isǧehden, i yi-fkan laman iwakken ad iliɣ d aqeddac-is, yextaṛ-iyi-d ad iliɣ d aqeddac-is
ɣas akken zik regmeɣ-t yerna qehṛeɣ wid yumnen yis. Meɛna iɛfa-yi axaṭer imiren ur ẓriɣ ara d acu xeddmeɣ imi mazal ur sɛiɣ ara liman deg ul-iw.
Tura ṛṛeḥma-s tameqqrant ters-ed fell-i s liman d leḥmala yellan deg-s.
Awal-agi d awal n tideț yuklalen ad ițwaqbel s lekmal-is : « Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yusa-d ɣer ddunit iwakken ad isellek imednuben ».
Iḥunn-ed fell-i nekk yellan d amednub ameqqran iwakken a d-isbeggen ṛṛeḥma-s yerna ad iliɣ d lemtel sya ɣer zdat i wid ara yamnen yis ad sɛun tudert n dayem.
I ugellid n dayem, ameɣlal ur țwalint wallen, win yellan d yiwen, i nețța tamanegt d lɛezz si lǧil ɣer lǧil ! Amin !
A Timuti a mmi, a k-weṣṣiɣ ɣef wayen i d-caren fell-ak s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi si zik. Eṭṭef deg imeslayen-nni, sseǧhed iman-ik di liman s wul yeṣfan tedduḍ akken ilaq,
axaṭer kra n yemdanen nniḍen wexxṛen i tikli yeṣfan armi i sṛuḥen liman-nsen.
Llan gar-asen ?imni d Alixandru f+ sellmeɣ-ten i Cciṭan iwakken ad ẓren amek i tdeṛṛu d wid ireggmen Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ayen i ɣef ara kkun-weṣṣiɣ di tazwara, ḥemmdet cekkṛet Sidi Ṛebbi, ssuturet di tẓallit, deɛɛut ɣuṛ-es ɣef yemdanen meṛṛa.
Deɛɛut ɣef yigelliden d wid akk yeṭṭfen imukan n lḥekma iwakken a nɛic di lisser ț-țalwit, a nḍuɛ Sidi Ṛebbi s lḥeṛma d leqdeṛ.
Ayagi d ayen yelhan, d ayen iɛeǧben i Sidi Ṛebbi amsellek-nneɣ,
axaṭer yebɣa imdanen meṛṛa ad issinen tideț yerna ad țțuselken.
Yiwen n Ṛebbi i gellan, yiwen umcafeɛ daɣen i gellan ger yemdanen d Ṛebbi ; amcafeɛ-agi, d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ
i gefkan iman-is d asfel i leslak n yemdanen meṛṛa. D wagi i d țțbut i d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi di lweqt-is ;
daymi i d-țțuceggɛeɣ iwakken ad beccṛeɣ, ad slemdeɣ i leǧnas ibeṛṛaniyen ayen yeɛnan liman ț-țideț. Ayen akka i d-qqaṛeɣ ț-țideț mačči d lekdeb.
Bɣiɣ ihi ad ilin di mkul amkan yergazen ireffden ifassen ɣer Ṛebbi s wul yeṣfan, mbla lɣecc d yir axemmem.
Akken daɣen i glaq ad xedment tilawin, ad ilint s llebsa isseṭren, ad sɛunt lḥeṛma d neyya, ur țzewwiqent acebbub-nsent, ur țcebbiḥent iman-nsent s ddheb, s tɛeqcin akk-d llebsa ifazen,
meɛna ad cebbḥent iman-nsent s lecɣal yelhan, akken ilaq ad xedment tilawin yețḍuɛun Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ilaq-as i tmeṭṭut aț-țḥesses i uselmed s tsusmi d wannuz.
Ur qebbleɣ ara aț-țesselmed tmeṭṭut neɣ aț-țdebbeṛ ɣef wergaz meɛna aț-țețsusum ( ur d-teggar ara iman-is ).
Axaṭer d Adem i d-yețwaxelqen d amezwaru d wamek i d-terna ?ewwa ; f+
mačči d Adem i geɣwa Cciṭan meɛna d ?ewwa i wumi ikellex f+ armi i tɛuṣṣa Sidi Ṛebbi,
lameɛna aț-țețțusellek s tarwa-s f+ ma tețțeddu s ṣṣfa d neyya di liman d leḥmala.
?-țideț mi qqaṛen : « ma yella win yebɣan ad yuɣal d amdebbeṛ di tejmaɛt d ayen yelhan i gețmenni ».

Lameɛna amdebbeṛ di tejmaɛt ur ilaq ara ad afen deg-s lɣaci wayen ara s-d-ssukksen, ilaq ad yesɛu yiwet n tmeṭṭut kan, ad yili d win iḥekkmen deg iman-is, d aɛeqli, d win iteddun s ṣṣwab. Ilaq ad yili d win yesṭerḥiben deg wexxam-is, d win izemren ad isselmed awal n Ṛebbi ;
ur yețțili ara d asekṛan neɣ d amčaqlal meɛna ad yili d aḥnin d imhenni. Ur ilaq ara ad iḥemmel idrimen ;
ilaq daɣen ad yissin amek ara idebbeṛ ɣef wexxam-is, arraw-is ad ilin d wid yețțaɣen awal yerna a t-țqadaṛen.
Axaṭer ma yella walebɛaḍ ur yezmir ara ad idebbeṛ ɣef wexxam is, amek ara idebbeṛ di tejmaɛt n Sidi Ṛebbi ?
Amdebbeṛ di tejmaɛt ur ilaq ara ad yili d ajdid di liman di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, m'ulac a t-yekcem zzux, aț-țedṛu yid-es akken tedṛa d Cciṭan. f+
Ilaq ula d wid ur numin ara s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ a d-cehden fell-as s lxiṛ ur țțafen ara deg-s wayen ara s-d ssukksen, iwakken ur iɣelli ara di tecṛektin n Cciṭan.
Iqeddacen n tejmaɛt daɣen ilaq ad sɛun leqdeṛ, ad ilin d irgazen iteṭṭfen deg awal-nsen, ad xḍun i tissit n ccṛab akk-d rrbeḥ n lexdeɛ.
Ilaq ad ḥerzen s wul yeṣfan lbaḍna n liman i d-yețwakecfen.
Ilaq ula d nutni ad țwajeṛben di leqdic-nsen, m'ur ufin ara ayen ara sen-d-ssukksen imiren zemren ad qedcen di tejmaɛt.
