Ula ț-țiqeddacin n tejmaɛt ilaq ad sɛunt lḥeṛma, ur țmeslayent ara cceṛ ɣef wiyaḍ, ad ilint ț-țiɛeqliyin, ț-țid i ɣef yella lețkal ɣef kullec.
Iqeddacen n tejmaɛt ilaq ad sɛun yiwet n tmeṭṭut kan yerna ad ḍebbṛen ɣef yexxamen-nsen d warraw-nsen akken ilaq.
Axaṭer wid iqeddcen ɣef tejmaɛt akken ilaq, ad yali leqdeṛ-nsen ad nnernin di liman yerna ad sɛun lețkal d ameqqran di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Uriɣ-ak-n meṛṛa annect-agi ɣas akken ssarameɣ a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-ek,
iwakken ma ɛeṭṭleɣ ur n-usiɣ ara aț-țissineḍ amek i glaq aț-țedduḍ deg wexxam n Sidi Ṛebbi i gellan ț-țajmaɛt n Ṛebbi yeddren. Tajmaɛt-agi, ț-țigejdit i ɣef ters tideț.

S tideț acḥal meqqṛet lbaḍna n Lmasiḥ yellan d sebba n liman-nneɣ : win akken i d-yusan s ṣṣifa n wemdan, i ɣef d-icehhed Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, tɛeǧǧbent deg-s lmalayekkat, yețwabecceṛ i leǧnas, umnen yis di ddunit meṛṛa, yețwarfed s tmanegt tameqqrant ɣer igenwan.
Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ixebbeṛ-ed ɛinani belli deg ussan ineggura, aṭas ara iwexxṛen ɣef liman di Lmasiḥ, ad tebɛen wid i ten-ițɣuṛṛun s uselmed i d-yețțasen s ɣuṛ leǧnun.
A ten-ɣuṛṛen wat sin wudmawen yețbecciṛen lekdeb, wid iwumi yemmut wul am akken yețwaqqed s useffud.
Imdanen-agi bɣan ad ḥeṛṛmen zzwaǧ akk-d kra n leṣnaf n lmakla, lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi ixleq-ed kullec iwakken wid yumnen yis yessnen tideț, a t-ḥemden a t-cekkṛen.
Ayen akk i d-ixleq Sidi Ṛebbi yelha, ur ilaq ara a nerr kra di rrif, acu kan ilaq a t-ncekkeṛ ɣef wayen i ɣ-d-ițțak,
axaṭer ayen akk i d yețwaxelqen iṣeffu-t wawal n Ṛebbi akk-d țẓallit.
Ssefhem-asen ayagi i watmaten iwakken aț-țiliḍ d aqeddac yelhan n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, sseǧhed iman-ik di liman s wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi d uselmed n tideț i ttebɛeḍ s wul yeṣfan.
Ma ț-țimucuha n temɣaṛin ur nesɛi ara lmeɛna i gxulfen liman, ḍeggeṛ-itent akkin fell-ak. Issin amek ara telḥuḍ deg ubrid n Sidi Ṛebbi .
Tazzla deg wannar d ayen yelhan meɛna tenfeɛ i lǧețța kan, ma ṭṭaɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi tenfeɛ i kullec axaṭer deg-s i tella tudert n tura akk-d ț-țin i d-iteddun i ɣ-iwɛed Sidi Ṛebbi.
Awal-agi d awal n tideț yuklalen ad ițwaqbel ɣer yemdanen meṛṛa.
Ma d nukni nețɛețțib iman-nneɣ iwakken a neǧhed di liman, imi nețkel ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ yeddren yellan d amsellek n yemdanen meṛṛa abeɛda wid yumnen yis.
Atan wayen i ɣef ara tweṣṣiḍ imdanen d wayen ara sen-teslemḍeḍ.
?uṛ-ek a k-iḥqeṛ yiwen imi meẓẓiyeḍ di leɛmeṛ, meɛna ili-k d lemtel ger wid yumnen s yimeslayen-ik, s tikli-inek, s leḥmala-inek, s liman-inek ț-țezdeg n wul-ik.
Sɛedday lweqt-ik di leqṛaya d ubecceṛ d uselmed n wawal n Ṛebbi i wiyaḍ, alamma usiɣ-en.
Ur țțaǧa ara di rrif tikci i k-d-ițțunefken s ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi d yimeslayen s wayes i d-caren fell-ak di tejmaɛt mi ssersen ifassen-nsen fell-ak imeqqranen n tejmaɛt.
Err ddehn-ik ɣer wayagi txedmeḍ-t akken ilaq, iwakken imdanen meṛṛa ad walin amek i tețnerniḍ di tikli-inek di Lmasiḥ.
?ader ɣef yiman-ik d wayen i tesselmadeḍ i wiyaḍ, ma tkemmleḍ akken, d leslak ara d-tawiḍ i keččini akk-d wid i k-yesmeḥsisen.
Ur țlummu ara ɣef wemɣaṛ s leɛyaḍ, meɛna nhu-t am akken d baba-k ; enhu daɣen ilmeẓyen am akken d atmaten-ik,
tamɣaṛt am yemma-k, tilmeẓyin am yessetma-k, s wul yeṣfan.
Qadeṛ tuǧǧal f+ telhuḍ ț-țid yeḥwaǧen lemɛawna.

Ma ț-țid yesɛan dderya neɣ dderya n warraw-nsent, ilaq d nutni ara d-yelhun yid-sent, akka ara d-sbeggnen ṭṭaɛa-nsen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi m'ara rren lxiṛ i imawlan-nsen, ayagi d ayen i gɛeǧben i Sidi Ṛebbi.
Taǧǧalt i gellan weḥd-es ur nesɛi win ara ț-țirefden tețkel ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi tdeɛɛu ɣuṛ-es tețḥellil-it am yiḍ am ass.
Ma ț-țaǧǧalt yeṭṭafaṛen zzhu n ddunit, tinna temmut ɣas mazal-iț tedder.
Atah wayen i ɣef ara tweṣṣiḍ tuǧǧal iwakken ur d-yețțili ara wayen ara sent-d-ssukksen.
Ma yella win ur nɛawen ara at wexxam-is abeɛda imawlan-is, atan yeǧǧa liman, yuɣal akteṛ n win ijehlen.
Taǧǧalt ilaq aț-țesɛu sețțin n iseggasen di leɛmeṛ-is iwakken a ț-tɛawen tejmaɛt, ilaq aț-țili tezweǧ yiwet n tikkelt kan.
Ilaq aț-țili tețwassen s lecɣal-is yelhan, ț-țin iṛebban arraw-is akken ilaq, isṭerḥiben deg wexxam-is, issarden iḍaṛṛen n iqeddacen n Sidi Ṛebbi ; treffed imeɣban, txeddem lxiṛ.
Meɛna ur qebbel ara i tejmaɛt aț-țɛawen tuǧǧal meẓẓiyen di leɛmeṛ, axaṭer m'ara bɣunt ad ɛawdent zzwaǧ zemrent ad ǧǧent abrid n Lmasiḥ ;
s wakka ad xedɛent lɛahed-nni i fkant i Sidi Ṛebbi.

Yerna m'ur sɛint ara ayen ara xedment, ad țcalint seg wexxam ɣer wayeḍ mačči kan imi ur sɛint ara ccɣel, meɛna ad kettṛent deg yimeslayen ur nesɛi lmeɛna, ad ggarent iman-nsent deg wayen i tent-yexḍan.
Ihi bɣiɣ ad nhuɣ tuǧǧal meẓẓiyen di leɛmeṛ ad ɛawdent zzwaǧ, ad sɛunt dderya, ad lhint d yexxam-nsent iwakken iɛdawen ur țțafen ara ayen n diri ara hedṛen fell-asent.
Axaṭer llant seg-sent tid i geffɣen i webrid n Ṛebbi tebɛent abrid n Cciṭan.

Ma tella tin yumnen tesɛa tuǧǧal i s-yețțilin, d nețțat i glaq a tent tɛiwen iwakken ur țțilint ara ț țaɛkumt i tejmaɛt, akken daɣen tajmaɛt aț-țizmir aț-țɛiwen tid ur nesɛi ara win ara tent-irefden.
Imdebbṛen n tejmaɛt ixeddmen ccɣel-nsen akken ilaq uklalen ad țwaxelṣen s zzyada abeɛda wid yenneɛtaben deg ubecceṛ d uselmed.
Axaṭer tira iqedsen nnant-ed : Ur țțara ara takmamt i wezger yesserwaten, f+ yura daɣen : Axeddam yuklal lexlaṣ-is. f+
Ur qebbel ara win ara iccetkin ɣef wemdebbeṛ n tejmaɛt anagar ma ḥedṛen sin neɣ tlata inagan ara d-icehden fell-as.
Ma d wid idenben, lumm-iten zdat medden meṛṛa iwakken ula d wiyaḍ ad aggaden.
Di leɛnaya-k ɣef wudem n Ṛebbi d Sid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ akk-d lmalayekkat yețwaxtaṛen, deg wannect-agi meṛṛa ur xeddem ara lxilaf ger yemdanen.
Ur țɣawal ara aț-țesserseḍ ifassen ɣef yiwen, ur țekki ara di ddnubat n wiyaḍ ; ḥader iman-ik, qqim d azedgan.
?ef ddemma n weqṛaḥ n tɛebbuṭ-ik i k-issefcalen, ur tess ara kan aman lameɛna sew ciṭṭuḥ n ccṛab.
Llan kra n yemdanen ddnubat-nsen țbanen-d uqbel ad țțuḥasben, llan wiyaḍ ddnubat-nsen ur d-țbanen ara imiren kan.
Akken daɣen i d-țbanen lecɣal lɛali, ma d lecɣal n diri ur zmiren ara ad qqimen ffren.
Wid yellan d aklan yumnen s Lmasiḥ ilaq ad ẓren belli imɛellmen-nsen uklalen leqdeṛ, iwakken ur ițwargam f+ ara yisem n Sidi Ṛebbi, ur kkaten ara medden deg wayen i nesselmad.

Wid yesɛan imɛellmen i gețțamnen s Lmasiḥ ur ilaq ara ad kksen fell-asen leqdeṛ imi d atmaten-nsen i llan, lameɛna ad qedcen fell-asen seg ul imi d wid yumnen s Lmasiḥ, d wid eɛzizen ara yesfayden si leqdic-nsen. Atah wayen ara tweṣṣiḍ d wayen ara teslemdeḍ :
win ara yeslemden ayen ixulfen liman-nneɣ, ur neqbil ara awal imqeddes n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ,
yeččuṛ d zzux ur yessin kra ; iḥemmel ad ikețțeṛ awal, yețnaɣ ɣef ddemma n yimeslayen. Seg wannect-agi i d-itekk umennuɣ, tismin, lekfeṛ d ccekk,
imeslayen nsen ur țfakan ara axaṭer ččuṛen s yir ixemmimen teɛṛeq-asen tideț, ɣilen s ṭṭaɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi ara uɣalen d imeṛkantiyen.
?-țideț abrid n Sidi Ṛebbi yețțawi-d rrbeḥ ameqqran, meɛna ma yella nesteqniɛ s wayen nesɛa.
Axaṭer ur d-newwi yid-nneɣ acemma ɣer ddunit, akken daɣen ur nezmir a nawi acemma yid-nneɣ m'ara nemmet.
Ihi ma yella nesɛa ayen ara nečč d wayen ara nels, ilaq a nesteqneɛ.
Ma d wid yettabaɛen cci n ddunit ɣellin deg ujeṛṛeb akk-d tfextin n yir ccehwat n tnefsit-nsen, i gețțawin imdanen ɣer txeṣṣart akk-d nnger.
Axaṭer ṭṭmeɛ n idrimen d sebba n kra n wayen yellan diri-t. Llan kra i gtebɛen cci-yagi n ddunit, ffɣen i webrid n Lmasiḥ, ḍuṛṛen tiṛwiḥin nsen, sseɣlin-d lhemm ɣef yiman nsen.
Ma d kečč ay aqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi ssebɛed iman-ik ɣef wannect agi meṛṛa, nadi ɣef lḥeqq d ṭṭaɛa, liman, lmaḥibba, ṣṣbeṛ d wannuz.
Sseǧhed iman-ik deg umenɣi ɣef liman, eṭṭef di tudert n dayem i ɣer k-d-issawel Sidi Ṛebbi, asm'akken i d-cehdeḍ s wayen tumneḍ zdat yemdanen meṛṛa.
A k-weṣṣiɣ zdat Sidi Ṛebbi i d-yețțaken tudert, zdat Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i gcehden ɣef liman akken ilaq zdat Bunṭus Bilaṭus.
Tbeɛ lewṣayat-agi, iwakken aț-țeqqimeḍ d azedgan, ur a k-d-issukus yiwen kra alamma d ass n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ
ara d-yuɣalen di lweqt i d-ihegga Sidi Ṛebbi awḥid Bab n tezmert, Agellid n igelliden d Ssid n ssyadi,
win yeddren i dayem, i gellan di tafat ur yezmir yiwen aț-țyaweḍ, ulac win i t-iwalan neɣ i gzemren a t-iwali. I nețța tamanegt ț-țezmert i dayem ! Amin.

Weṣṣi imeṛkantiyen n ddunit-agi iwakken ur ssemɣaṛen ara iman-nsen, ur țkalayen ara ɣef cci n ddunit ur nesɛi laman, meɛna ad țeklen ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣ-d-ițțaken lxiṛ s tugeț iwakken a nili di lfeṛḥ.
Weṣṣi-ten ad xeddmen lxiṛ, ad ilin d imeṛkantiyen s lecɣal lɛali, ad țseddiqen mbla cceḥḥa, ad bḍun d wiyaḍ ayen sɛan.
S wakka, ad jemɛen i yiman-nsen agerruj yelhan i wussan i d-iteddun iwakken ad sɛun tudert n tideț.
A Timuti eɛzizen, eḥrez ayen i tlemdeḍ, ssebɛed iman-ik ɣef yimeslayen ur nesɛi lmeɛna, ɣef yimennuɣen yeɛnan tamusni n lekdeb.
Wid i gtebɛen tamusni-agi, sṛuḥen liman-nni i sɛan di Lmasiḥ. Ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi aț-țili yid-wen !
Nekk Bulus aqeddac n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ s lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi, țwaceggɛeɣ ad beccṛeɣ tudert i ɣ-iwɛed Sidi Ṛebbi di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
A Timuti a mmi eɛzizen : leɛfu, ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a k-d-țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ.
?ḥemmideɣ Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣef qeddceɣ s wul yeṣfan akken qedcen fell-as lejdud-iw, deɛɛuɣ fell-ak am yiḍ am ass ;
m'ara d-mmektiɣ imeṭṭawen-ik, țḥiriɣ melmi ara k-ẓreɣ iwakken ad iliɣ di lfeṛḥ.
?mektayeɣ-ed neyya-nni i tesɛiḍ di liman, akken i ț-tesɛa sețți-k Luiza akk-d yemma-k Anisa ; tḥeqqeqeɣ belli ar ass-a mazal-iț deg wul-ik.
Daymi bɣiɣ a k-weṣṣiɣ a d tessakiḍ tikci-nni i k-d-yețțunefken s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi asm'akken i sserseɣ ifassen-iw fell-ak.
Axaṭer mačči d Ṛṛuḥ n ukukru i ɣ-d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi meɛna d Ṛṛuḥ yeččuṛen ț-țazmert d leḥmala akk-d leɛqel.

Ihi ur țsetḥi ara aț-țcehdeḍ ɣef Ssid-nneɣ, ur țsetḥi ara daɣen yis-i nekk yellan d ameḥbus ɣef ddemma-s. Meɛna eqbel leɛtab yid-i ɣef ddemma n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ, țkel ɣef tezmert i d-yețțak Sidi Ṛebbi.
D nețța i ɣ-isellken, i ɣ-d-issawlen ɣer tudert iqedsen, ayagi mačči ɣef ddemma n lecɣal-nneɣ meɛna d nețța i gebɣan s ṛṛeḥma-ines i ɣ-d yețțunefken s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ uqbel a d-texleq ddunit.
Ṛṛeḥma-agi tban-ed tura s tisin n wemsellek-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, i gɣelben lmut, ibeggen-ed tafat n tudert ur nețfaka s lexbaṛ n lxiṛ.
?ef ddemma n lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ i d-țțucegɛeɣ d ṛṛasul iwakken ad beccṛeɣ, ad slemdeɣ.
Daymi i țenɛețțabeɣ tura, meɛna ur ssetḥaɣ ara axaṭer ẓriɣ anwa s wayes umneɣ, yerna țekleɣ fell-as yesɛa tazmert ad yeḥrez ayen akken i ɣef iyi-iwekkel alamma d ass n tuɣalin-is.
?rez imeslayen iqedsen i tlemdeḍ s ɣuṛ-i, eddu yis-sen s liman d leḥmala i nesɛa di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
?rez mliḥ deg ul-ik ayen akken i tlemḍeḍ, s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i gzedɣen deg-nneɣ.
Teẓriḍ belli wid akk yellan yid-i di tmurt n Asya ǧǧan-iyi weḥd-i, llan gar-asen Figilus d ?irmujinus.
Ad ibarek Sidi Ṛebbi axxam n gma-tneɣ Unisifur axaṭer daymen yețṣebbiṛ-iyi, ur yessetḥa ara yis-i imi di lḥebs i lliɣ ;
lameɛna akken kan i d-yusa ɣer temdint n Ṛuma inuda fell-i armi i yi-yufa.
Teẓriḍ acḥal i yi-iɛawen asmi lliɣ di temdint n Ifasus. A d-yessers Ṛebbi fell-as ṛṛeḥma-s deg ass n tuɣalin n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Ihi kečč a mmi, sseǧhed iman-ik s ṛṛeḥma i gellan di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Ayen tesliḍ s ɣuṛ-i zdat waṭas inigan, sseḥfeḍ-it i wid yeṭṭfen di liman di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ iwakken nutni daɣen ad izmiren a t-slemden i wiyaḍ.
Awi amur-ik n leɛtab am uɛsekṛi n Lmasiḥ.
Aɛsekṛi i gebɣan ad yeɛǧeb i lqebṭan-is ur ilaq ara ad ixemmem ɣef lecɣal n ddunit.
Ulac daɣen win ara irebḥen timzizla ma yella ur yuzzil ara akken i d-yenna lqanun.
Afellaḥ ițenɛețțaben, d nețța i gezwar lḥal ad iɣellet.
Efhem ayen akka i k-d-nniɣ axaṭer d Sidi Ṛebbi ara k-iɛawnen aț-țfehmeḍ kullec.
Mmekti-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i d-iḥyan si ger lmegtin, win akken i d-iffɣen seg uẓaṛ n Sidna Dawed akken i t-id-yenna lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Lmasiḥ i ɣ ɣ ecciṛeɣ ;
lexbaṛ-agi i ɣef nneɛtabeɣ armi țwarzeɣ s snasel am akken d amcum i lliɣ, meɛna awal n Sidi Ṛebbi ur yețwacekkal ara.
Daymi ṣebṛeɣ i kullec ɣef ddemma n wid yețwaxtaṛen iwakken ula d nutni ad sɛun leslak i gellan di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ akk-d țmanegt n dayem.
Atah wayen yuklalen lețkal : ma nemmut yid-es, a nidir daɣen yid-es ;
ma yella neṭṭef di liman, a neḥkem yid-es ; ma yella nenkkeṛ-it ula d nețța a ɣ-yenkeṛ ;
ma yella nexdeɛ-it, nețța ur a ɣ-ixeddeɛ ara axaṭer ur yezmir ara ad yenkeṛ ayen i d-yenna.
Atah wayen ara sen-d-smektiḍ : nhu-ten zdat Ṛebbi ur țemčeqlalen ara ɣef yimeslayen ur nesɛi lmeɛna, yessufuɣen i webrid wid i sen ismeḥsisen.
Exdem lmeǧhud-ik zdat n Ṛebbi, aț-țiliḍ d aqeddac ibedden ɣer ccɣel-is, ur nețsetḥi ara deg wayen i gxeddem, i gețbecciṛen awal n Sidi Ṛebbi s lḥeqq.
Xḍu i yimeslayen ur nesɛi lmeɛna i gxulfen liman axaṭer wid i ten itebɛen simmal țzaden teffɣen i webrid n Ṛebbi.
Imeslayen-nsen am lehlak i teddun di lǧețța armi yečča-ț meṛṛa. Llan gar-asen ?imnayus d Filitus
i gwexxṛen ɣef webrid n tideț, qqaṛen belli ḥeggu n lmegtin dayen yedṛa-d, s wakka ssufuɣen aṭas n yemdanen seg webrid n liman.
Lameɛna d lsas i gessers Sidi Ṛebbi ara idumen : Ssid-nneɣ yeẓra wid yellan d ayla-s ; f+ yura daɣen win ara yinin nekk d ayla-s, ilaq ad yexḍu i wayen n diri. f+

Deg wexxam n imeṛkantiyen mačči d iqbucen n ddheb neɣ n lfeṭṭa kan i gellan meɛna llan daɣen wid n wesɣaṛ d wid n wakal ; wid n ddheb d lfeṭṭa țțaǧan-ten i leqdic n wussan n tmeɣṛa ma d wiyaḍ i leqdic n mkul ass.
Win ara yessizdgen iman-is yexḍa i lecɣal-agi n diri, ad yili am weqbuc-nni n ddheb neɣ n lfeṭṭa i sseqdacen deg wass n tmeɣṛa, yewjed ad yenfeɛ i wass m'ara t-yeḥwiǧ umɛellem-is.
Exḍu i ccehwat n temẓi i gețɣuṛṛun, kečč akk-d wid ideɛɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi s wul yeṣfan, nadi ɣef lḥeqq, liman, leḥmala ț-țalwit,.
Ur ggar ara iman-ik di lketṛa n lehḍur ifeṛɣen ur nesɛi lmeɛna, xḍu-k seg-sen ; teẓriḍ belli țțawin-d anagar amennuɣ.
Ur s-ilaq ara i uqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi ad ițnaɣ. Ilaq ad yili d aḥnin ɣer medden, ad isselmed s ṣṣwab yerna ad isɛu ṣṣbeṛ ;
ilaq ad issefhem s leɛqel wid i t-yețxalafen, ahat Sidi Ṛebbi a ten-id-yerr ɣer webrid iwakken ad issinen tideț,
a d-ldint wallen-nsen a d-snesren iman-nsen si tifextin n Cciṭan i ten-yeṭṭfen ad xedmen lebɣi-s.
Ilaq aț-țeẓred belli ɣer taggara n ddunit a d-asen wussan iweɛṛen.

Imdanen ad țxemmimen ɣef yiman-nsen kan, ad ṭṭamaɛen deg idrimen, ad ssemɣuṛen iman-nsen, ad țzuxxun, ad reggmen di Ṛebbi, ad țɛaṣin imawlan-nsen, ad nekkṛen lxiṛ, ad tekksen sser ɣef wayen yesɛan lḥeṛma,
ur seɛɛun ṛṛeḥma ur seɛɛun leḥnana deg ulawen-nsen, ad skiddiben ɣef wiyaḍ, ur zemmren ara ad ḥekmen deg iman-nsen, ulawen nsen qquṛen, d iɛdawen n lxiṛ,
d ixeddaɛen, a ten-isderɣel zzux, ad ḥemmlen lebɣi n tnefsit-nsen wala lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi ;
ad tebɛen abrid n Sidi Ṛebbi s wawal kan meɛna ad nekkṛen tazmert yellan deg-s. Ihi xḍu-k i yemdanen am wigi.
Kra seg-sen keččmen ɣer kra n yexxamen, țkellixen tilawin ur nesɛi ara lḥeṛma i gețțawi zzhu n ddunit ;
țqellibent daymen ad fehment, lameɛna leɛmeṛ țțawḍent ɣer tmusni n tideț.
Am akken i xulfen Yanes d Yambris Sidna Musa, f+ akken daɣen ara xalfen tideț yemdanen-agi, aț-țeɛwej lefhama-nsen, ad ffɣen i webrid n liman.
Meɛna ur țțawḍen ɣer wacemma axaṭer imdanen meṛṛa a ten-ɛeqlen belli ffɣen i webrid am akken tedṛa d Yanes d Yambris.
Ma d kečč tettebɛeḍ akken ilaq ayen i k-slemdeɣ, tikli-inu, ixemmimen-iw, liman-iw, ṣṣbeṛ-iw, leḥmala-inu d ẓẓwara-inu,

leqheṛ i țwaqehṛeɣ akk-d leɛtab-iw. Teẓriḍ lemḥayen i gɛeddan fell-i di temdinin n Antyuc, n Ikunyum d Listra ? Anwa leqheṛ iwumi ur ṣbiṛeɣ ara ? Meɛna Sidi Ṛebbi isellek-iyi seg-sen meṛṛa.
Kra n win yebɣan ad iddu di liman n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ad ițțuqehheṛ.
Ma d imcumen ixeddaɛen, ad țkemmilen dayem di cceṛ-nsen, ad ɣuṛṛen wiyaḍ, ad rnun iman-nsen.
Ma d kečč eḥrez ayen i tlemdeḍ s wayes i tesqenɛeḍ ; teẓriḍ anwa i k-islemden.
Seg asmi telliḍ d ameẓyan i tessneḍ tira iqedsen ; yis-sent ara tesɛuḍ lefhama yețțawin ɣer leslak s liman di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Yal tira iqedsen s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi i d-tekka yerna twulem i uselmed, i usefhem, i nehhu akk-d țṛebga deg webrid n lḥeqq,
iwakken yal aqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi ad yili d amdan ikemlen i gwulmen i yal ccɣel yelhan.
A k-n-ssutreɣ ɣef wudem n Ṛebbi d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ara iḥasben wid yeddren d wid yemmuten, i lmend n wass n tuɣalin-is ț-țgeldit-is.
Becceṛ awal n Sidi Ṛebbi ama di teswiɛt yelhan ama di teswiɛt iweɛṛen, ssefhem, lumm, enhu, sselmed s ṣṣbeṛ d leɛqel.
Axaṭer a d-yaweḍ lweqt anda kra n yemdanen ur zemmren ara ad slen i uselmed n tideț, lameɛna ad tebɛen lebɣi n tnefsit-nsen, a d-sbedden lecyux ara sen-d-ihedṛen ayen kan i sen-iɛeǧben ;
ad sɛuẓẓgen iman nsen ɣef tideț, ad rren ddehn-nsen ɣer tmucuha.
Ma d kečč ḥekkem deg iman-ik di kullec, ṣṣbeṛ i cedda d leɛtab, becceṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ , txedmeḍ lwaǧeb-ik n uqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi akken ilaq.
Ma d nekk yewweḍ-ed lweqt i deg ilaq ad sebbleɣ iman-iw, yewweḍ-ed lweqt i deg ara ṛuḥeɣ.
Kfiɣ ccɣel-iw yerna ṭṭfeɣ di liman ar tura, nnuɣeɣ imenɣi n tideț armi ț-țaggara.
Tura yețṛaǧu-yi lḥeqq n lxedma-w ara yi-d-yefk Bab n lḥeqq deg ass n lḥisab, yerna mačči i nekk kan, lameɛna i wid meṛṛa i t-iḥemmlen yețṛaǧun ass n tuɣalin-is.
Exdem lmeǧhud-ik iwakken ur tețɛeṭṭileḍ ara a d-taseḍ ɣuṛ-i.
Gma-tneɣ Dimas yeǧǧa-yi, yewwi-t zzhu n ddunit, iṛuḥ ɣer temdint n Tisalunik. Gma-tneɣ Krisis iṛuḥ ɣer tmurt n Galasya, ma d gma-tneɣ Tit iṛuḥ ɣer tmurt n Dalmasya.
Anagar gma-tneɣ Luqa i geqqimen yid-i. Awi-d yid-ek gma tneɣ Maṛqus iwakken ad iyi-iɛawen di lxedma-w.
Ma d gma-tneɣ Ticik atan ceggɛeɣ-t ɣer temdint n Ifasus.
M'ara d-taseḍ, awi-d yid-ek abeṛnus-nni i ǧǧiɣ deg wexxam n Karbus di temdint n Truwas, awi-d yid-ek daɣen idlisen, abeɛda wid yețwaxedmen s weglim.
Alixandru aḥeddad iḍuṛṛ-iyi, ixdem-iyi aṭas n cceṛ meɛna ayen yexdem a t-yaf ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ula d kečč ḥader iman-ik seg-s, axaṭer yețxaṣam-aɣ-d daymen deg wayen i nețbecciṛ.
Ass amezwaru i deg d-beddeɣ ɣer ccṛeɛ ur ufiɣ ula d yiwen ɣer tama-w, ǧǧan-iyi akk ; lameɛna a wer ten-iḥaseb Ṛebbi ɣef wayagi !
D Sidi Ṛebbi i yi-iɛawnen, i yi-isǧehden, iwakken lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ad ițțubecceṛ s lekmal-is i leǧnas nniḍen meṛṛa yerna isellek-iyi-d seg imi n yizmawen.
Sidi Ṛebbi mazal a yi-iḥader ɣef wayen akk n diri yerna ad iyi-isellek iwakken ad kecmeɣ tagelda-ines yellan deg igenwan. I nețța tamanegt si lǧil ɣer lǧil ! Amin !
Sellem ɣef Briska d Akilas akk-d țwacult n Unisifur.
Gma-tneɣ Irast yeqqim di temdint n Kurintus, ma d Trufim ǧǧiɣ-t di temdint n Milet mazal-it yehlek.
Exdem lmeǧhud-ik iwakken a d taseḍ uqbel ccetwa. Bulus, Buden, Linus, Kludya d watmaten akk nniḍen țsellimen-d fell-ak.
Sidi Ṛebbi ad yili yid-ek ! Ṛṛeḥma-s a d-ters fell-awen ! Amin.
Nekk Bulus aqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi, i d-iceggeɛ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ iwakken ad ssiwleɣ i wid akk yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi a d-uɣalen ɣer webrid-is yerna ad issinen tideț,
akken ad țeklen belli sɛan tudert n dayem, tudert i gewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi uqbel a d-tețwaxleq ddunit nețța ur neskiddib ara.
Yefka-d awal-is di lweqt ilaqen, ibeggen-it-id di lexbaṛ i yi-d yețțunefken s lameṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi amsellek-nneɣ.
Uriɣ-ed tabṛaț-agi i kečč, a Tit a mmi n tideț di liman i ɣ-yesdukklen : ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a k-d-țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ amsellek-nneɣ !
?ǧiɣ-k di tegzirt n Kritus iwakken aț-țkemmleḍ ccɣel-nni ur nfuk ara, yerna aț-țesbeddeḍ di yal tamdint imeqqranen n tejmuyaɛ n imasiḥiyen akken i k-n-umṛeɣ.

Yal yiwen deg-sen ilaq ad yili d amdan iwumi ur d-ssukksen acemma, ad yesɛu yiwet tmeṭṭut kan, arraw-is ad ilin d wid iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi, ad sɛun tikli yelhan, ad țțaɣen awal iwakken ur sen-d-ssukkusen ara wiyaḍ kra n diri.

Ilaq ameqqran n tejmaɛt ad yili yeṣfa di tikli-ines, imi d nețța i geṭṭfen lecɣal n Sidi Ṛebbi, ur ilaq ad yili d win yessimɣuṛen iman-is, ur ilaq ad ireffu, ur ilaq ad yili d asekṛan, ur ilaq ad yeskker ccwal, ur ilaq daɣen a t-ɣwun yedrimen n leḥṛam.
Lameɛna ilaq-as ad yili d win yețqabalen s wudem lɛali, d bab lxiṛ, d aɛeqli, d aḥeqqi, d win yețḍuɛun Sidi Ṛebbi, d win iḥekkmen deg iman-is ;
ilaq ad yeṭṭef deg awal n Sidi Ṛebbi yellan ț-țideț akken i t-yelmed, iwakken ad yizmir ad isselmed, ad inhu wiyaḍ yerna a d-isbeggen i wid i d-yekkaten deg awal-agi, belli ɣelṭen.
Aṭas seg wat Isṛail i gɛuṣan Sidi Ṛebbi yerna țkellixen medden s imeslayen-nsen,
ilaq a sen-terrem tikmamin i yimawen-nsen. Skarayen lhul deg yexxamen m'ara sselmaden ayen ur nlaq ara, iwakken ad rebḥen leḥṛam.
Yiwen seg-sen i ḥesben d nnbi, yenna-d : « at țegzirt n Kritus si zik-nsen d imeskaddaben, d lewḥuc iweɛṛen, d ifenyanen yețxemmimen kan ad ččen ' ' ;
ayagi i d-yenna ț-țideț. Daymi, ilaq a ten-tenhuḍ s lewɛaṛa, iwakken ad sɛun liman iseḥḥan ;
ur ilaq ara ad țḥessisen i tmucuha n wudayen akk-d lewṣayat n yemdanen ur neqbil ara tideț.
Kullec zeddig i wid zeddigen, meɛna ulac ayen zeddigen i wid ur nzeddig ara, ur nețțamen ara s Ṛebbi ; imi xemmimen-nsen d wulawen-nsen neǧsen yerna ur țendemmayen ara.
Imdanen-agi qqaṛen nessen Ṛebbi, meɛna cceṛ i xeddmen yesbeggin-ed belli ur t-ssinen ara, ɛuṣan Sidi Ṛebbi xeddmen anagar wayen yekṛeh, ur zmiren ara ad xedmen ayen yelhan.
Ma d kečč sselmed ayen yellan ț-țideț n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ini i yemɣaṛen ad setqenɛen, ad fken leqdeṛ i yiman-nsen, ad sɛun leɛqel, ad amnen s Sidi Ṛebbi s tideț, ad ḥemmlen wiyaḍ seg wul, ad ṣebṛen i leɛtab.
Ini daɣen i temɣarin ad sɛunt tikli yeṣfan, ur ilaq ara ad ilint ț-țiqeṛṛaḍin, ur ilaq ara ad țḥawalent tissit n ccṛab meɛna ilaq ad nehhunt ɣer wayen yelhan,
ad țweṣṣint tilawin ad ḥemmlent irgazen-nsent d warraw nsent,
ad ilint ț-țiɛeqliyin, ad ddunt s ṣṣfa, ad lhint d lecɣal n wexxam, ad lhunt, ad țțaɣent awal i yergazen-nsent iwakken awal n Sidi Ṛebbi ur yețwargam ara.
Nhu daɣen ilmeẓyen ad sɛun leɛqel ;
kečč s yiman-ik ilaq aț-țiliḍ d lemtel s lecɣal-ik yelhan, sselmad seg wul akk-d țideț,
s imeslayen iṣeḥḥan i deg ur yezmir yiwen a d iwwet, iwakken ixṣimen-ik ur țțafen ara ayen n diri ara hedṛen fell-aneɣ yerna ad nneḥcamen.
Iqeddacen daɣen ilaq-asen ad țțaɣen awal yerna ad ɛeǧben bab-nsen, ur sen-țeddun ara di nneqma,
ilaq ur ten-țțakren ara meɛna ad ilin d wid imeɛnen i deg yella laman, iwakken aselmed n Sidi Ṛebbi amsellek-nneɣ ad yesɛu ccan.
Sidi Ṛebbi isbeggen-ed ṛṛeḥma-s i d-yewwin leslak i yemdanen meṛṛa.
Ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi tesselmad-aɣ a neṭṭixeṛ ɣef lecɣal-nneɣ ur nelhi d wayen akk n diri yellan di ddunit, a nɛic di ddunit-a s ṣṣwab, s lḥeqq d ṭṭaɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi ;
akka ihi ara neṛǧu lfeṛḥ n wass i nessaram i deg ara d-tban tmanegt n Yillu-nneɣ ameqqran, amsellek nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Yefka iman-is fell-aneɣ iwakken a ɣ-isellek si ddnub yerna a ɣ-yerr d agdud-is yeṣfan, iwejden i lecɣal yelhan.
Akka i glaq aț-țețmeslayeḍ, aț-țnehhuḍ, aț-țețweṣṣiḍ s lewɛaṛa, ur țțaǧa yiwen a k-yeḥqeṛ.
Smekti-ten-id ad qadṛen wid iḥekkmen, ad țțaɣen awal, ad ilin wejden ad xedmen lecɣal yelhan :
ur kkaten deg yiwen, ad ilin d imhenniyen d imawlan n tifrat, yeččuṛen d leḥnana ɣer yemdanen meṛṛa.

Axaṭer ula d nukni zik txuṣṣ-aɣ tmusni, ur nețțaɣ ara awal ; nella nḍaɛ, nella d aklan n zzhu d wayen akk s wayes i ɣ-tesseḍmeɛ ddunit, nella d imcumen, nɛac di tismin, nekṛeh wiyaḍ, wiyaḍ keṛhen-aɣ.
Meɛna asmi i d-ibeggen Sidi Ṛebbi leḥnana-s d leḥmala-s i yemdanen,
isellek-aɣ mačči axaṭer d iḥeqqiyen i nella meɛna isellek-aɣ s ṛṛeḥma-s tameqqrant ; yessared-aɣ si ddnub-nneɣ s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen iwakken a d-nlal d ijdiden ;
Sidi Ṛebbi yeččuṛ-aɣ s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ amsellek-nneɣ,
iwakken s ṛṛeḥma-ines a nuɣal d iḥeqqiyen zdat Sidi Ṛebbi, a ɣ-d tețțunefk tudert n dayem i nețṛaǧu.
Awal-agi ț-țideț yerna bɣiɣ a d tesmektayeḍ ayagi kull-as iwakken wid yumnen s Ṛebbi, ad xeddmen anagar ayen yelhan, d ayagi kan i gelhan yerna yeṣleḥ i yemdanen !
Ur sṭuqqutet ara awal mbla lmeɛna ɣef wayen yeɛnan izuṛan n lejdud neɣ čaqlalat d umenɣi ɣef ddemma n ccariɛa, axaṭer d ayen ur nesɛi azal, ur neṣliḥ.
Ma yella tenhiḍ tikkelt neɣ snat win i d-yeskaren ccwal, ur k-d-ismeḥses ara, ssebɛed-it fell-ak ;
amdan am wagi yeṭṭaxeṛ i webrid n tideț, ddnub i yiri-s.
M'ara k-n-ceggɛeɣ gma-tneɣ Artimas neɣ Tucik, ilaq-ak a d-ṛuḥeḍ a nemlil di temdint n Nikubulis, dinna ara sɛeddiɣ ccetwa.
Eɛṛeḍ aț-țɛiwneḍ Zennac yellan d abugaṭu yesnen ccariɛa akk-d Abulus m'ara ṛuḥen ad safṛen, tefkeḍ-asen ayen ara ḥwiǧen.
Axaṭer ilaq daɣen atmaten-nneɣ ad lemden ad xedmen i wiyaḍ lecɣal yelhan, iwakken ad sɛun ayen ara ḥwiǧen, ur țțilin ara mbla lfayda.
Wid akk yellan yid-i țsellimen-d fell-ak. Sellem ɣef wid i ɣ-ihemmlen i gḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi. Ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi a d-ters fell-awen !
Nekk, Bulus yellan di lḥebs ɣef ddemma n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, akk-d d gma-tneɣ Timuti, i kečč a Filimun eɛzizen, amdakkel-nneɣ di leqdic,
i weltma-tneɣ Abya, i Arxibus aṛfiq-nneɣ di lecɣal n Lmasiḥ akk-d tejmaɛt i gețțilin deg wexxam-ik ;
ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a wen-d-tețțunefkent s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ akk-d Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Mkul m'ara dɛuɣ ɣer Ṛebbi țmektayeɣ-k-id, țḥemmideɣ Sidi Ṛebbi fell-ak ;
axaṭer sliɣ ɣef liman-ik meqṛen di Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ akk-d leḥmala i tesɛiḍ ɣer yemqedsen meṛṛa.
Ssutureɣ di Ṛebbi iwakken a d tesbeggneḍ liman-inek di Lmasiḥ s lecɣal yelhan, yerna aț-țɛeqleḍ ayen meṛṛa i ɣ-yelhan i nukni deg webrid n Lmasiḥ.
Feṛḥeɣ, yethedden wul-iw ɣef ddemma n leḥmala-inek axaṭer yis-ek a gma theddnen wulawen n yemqedsen.
?as Lmasiḥ iserreḥ-iyi iwakken ad ḍebbṛeɣ fell-ak ɣef wayen i glaq aț-țxedmeḍ,
bɣiɣ axiṛ a k-ssutreɣ s leḥmala imi nekk Bulus yellan d amɣaṛ yerna tura d ameḥbus ɣef ddemma n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ,
A k-ḥelleleɣ ɣef ddemma n gma-tneɣ Unizim, i guɣalen d mmi axaṭer wwiɣ-t-id ɣer webrid n Lmasiḥ dagi di lḥebs.
Zik ur k-yenfiɛ ara, meɛna tura infeɛ-aɣ di sin am kečč am nekk.
Nețța yeɛzizen ɣuṛ-i aṭas, atan a k-t-in-erreɣ ihi.
Acḥal bɣiɣ ad iqqim dagi ɣuṛ-i iwakken ad iyi-iqdec deg umkan-ik, m'akka țwaḥebseɣ ɣef ddemma n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ.
Meɛna ur bɣiɣ ara ad xedmeɣ ayagi mbla ṛṛay-ik, iwakken ayen ara yi-txedmeḍ n wayen yelhan ur t-txeddmeḍ ara s uḥettem, lameɛna a t-txedmeḍ s wul-ik d lebɣi-k.
Anwi yeẓran ? Ahat yemfaṛaq yid-ek i kra n lweqt kan iwakken asm'ara temlilem ur tețțuɣalem ara aț-țemfaṛaqem,

imiren ur yețțili ara d akli meɛna axiṛ n wakli imi guɣal d yiwen seg watmaten eɛzizen, abeɛda ɣuṛ-i, ilaq ad yiɛziz fell-ak akteṛ imi tura mačči d aqeddac-ik kan i gella, meɛna d gma-tneɣ di Lmasiḥ.
Ma yella ț-țidet tḥesbeḍ-iyi d aḥbib-ik tḥemmleḍ-iyi, sṭerḥeb yis am akken ara tesṭerḥbeḍ yis-i.
Ma yella iḍlem-ik neɣ tețțalaseḍ-as lḥaǧa, ḥaseb-iyi-d nekkini.
Uriɣ-ak-n ayagi s ufus-iw : « d nekk Bulus ara k-ixellṣen deg wayen i s-tețțalaseḍ » yerna mbla ma smektaɣ-k-id belli d nekk i k-id yewwin ɣer webrid n leslak.
A gma, xdem-iyi lemziya-agi ɣef ddemma n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ akken ad yethedden wul-iw di Lmasiḥ.
Uriɣ-ak-n tabṛaț-agi imi țekleɣ ad iyi-taɣeḍ awal, yerna ẓriɣ aț-țxedmeḍ nnig wayen i k-n-ssutreɣ.
Heggit-iyi taxxamt, axaṭer ssarameɣ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi qṛib a-yi-n yerr ɣuṛ-wen akken i s- tessuturem kull-as di tẓallit-nwen.
Gma-tneɣ Ibafras, yețțuḥebsen yid-i ɣef ddemma n Lmasiḥ yețsellim fell-ak aṭas.
?sellimen-d daɣen fell-ak atmaten ixeddmen yid-i : Maṛqus, Arisṭark, Dimas akk-d Luqa.
Ṛṛeḥma n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ aț-țili fell-awen.
Zik-nni, acḥal iberdan i d-ihdeṛ Sidi Ṛebbi seg yimi n lenbiya s țebcirat yemxalafen ;
ma deg ussan-agi yellan d ussan ineggura, yemmeslay-aɣ-d s Mmi-s, yerra kullec ger ifassen-is, yis i d-ixleq ddunit meṛṛa.

D nețța i d-isbeggnen ccbiha n tideț akk-d tmanegt tameqqrant n Sidi Ṛebbi akken tella, s tezmert n wawal-is i gbedd lsas n ddunit meṛṛa. Mi gessazdeg imdanen si ddnubat-nsen, yeṭṭef amkan n lḥekma deg igenwan ɣer tama tayeffust n Sidi Ṛebbi ;
yekka-d sennig n lmalayekkat, axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi yefka-yas isem yugaren isem-nsent.
Anwa lmelk iwumi yenna Sidi Ṛebbi : Kečč d Mmi, d nekk i k-id-yefkan ɣer ddunit ass-a . Anwa lmelk i ɣef i d-yenna : Nekk ad iliɣ d Baba-s, nețța ad yili d Mm i.
Asmi i d-yefka amenzu ɣer ddunit yenna-d : L malayekkat meṛṛa n Sidi Ṛebbi ad seǧǧdent zdat-es a t-ɛebdent.
Yenna-d daɣen ɣef lmalayekkat : Yesseqdac lmalayekkat-is am aḍu, iqeddacen-is am uḥeǧǧaǧu n tmes .
Ma ɣef Mmi-s yenna-d : Amkan n lḥekma-k a Ṛebbi ibedd i dayem, t azmert n tgeldit-ik, ț-țazmert taḥeqqit.
Tḥemmleḍ lḥeqq tkeṛheḍ lbaṭel, daymi a Ṛebbi, Illu-inek , idhen aqeṛṛuy-ik s zzit n lfeṛḥ, isbedd-ik d agellid, d k ečč i gextaṛ ger yeṛfiqen-ik.
Yerna yenna : D kečč a Ṛebbi i gessersen lsas n ddunit si tazwara, d ifassen-ik i gfeṣṣlen igenwan ;
nutni ad fnun ma d kečč aț-țdumeḍ , ad uɣalen meṛṛa d iqdime n am llebsa taqdimt,
a ten-tbeddleḍ a m akken tețwabeddal llebsa, a ten-tețleḍ am ubeṛnus, ma d kečč ur tețbeddileḍ ar a, ussan-ik ur țfakan ara .
Anwa lmelk iwumi yenna : ?ṭef amkan n lḥekma ɣer tama-w tayeffust, alamma rriɣ-ed iɛdawen-ik seddaw n iḍaṛṛen-ik ?
D acu-tent lmalayekkat ? D leṛwaḥ iqeddcen ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi, i d-ițceggiɛ iwakken ad ɛiwnent wid iwumi i d-yețțunefk leslak n Sidi Ṛebbi, d lweṛt !
?ef wayagi, ilaq a neṭṭef deg uselmed n tideț i nesla, a t neḥrez iwakken ur nțeffeɣ ara i webrid.
Imeslayen i d-wwint lmalayekkat sɛan azal, kra n win ur neqbil ara, ur netbiɛ ara imeslayen-agi yuklal lɛiqab,
amek ara nemneɛ ma yella ur neḥsib ara leslak ameqqran yecban wagi ? Leslak-agi i d-ibecceṛ Ssid-nneɣ si tazwara, ɛawden-aɣ-t-id daɣen wid i s-yeslan.
Sidi Ṛebbi ibeggen-ed tideț n cchada-nsen s licaṛat d lbeṛhanat d waṭas n leɛǧayeb akk-d tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, akken yella di lebɣi-ines.
Mačči i lmalayekkat iwumi yefka Sidi Ṛebbi lḥekma ɣef ddunit i d-iteddun i ɣef d-nețmeslay.
Yella win i d-icehden ɣef wayagi di tira iqedsen, yenna-d : D acu-t wemdan iwakken a t-id-temmektiḍ , a d-terreḍ ddehn-ik ɣuṛ-es ; d acu-t mmi-s n wemdan iwakken a d-telhiḍ yid-es ?
Terriḍ-t seddaw n lmalayekkat i kra n lweqt , mbeɛd tefkiḍ-as lqima d lɛezz,
terriḍ kullec seddaw iḍaṛṛen-is. Mi gerra Sidi Ṛebbi kullec seddaw iḍaṛṛen-is, yefka-yas ad iḥkem ɣef kullec ; ladɣa urɛad nwala tura yeḥkem ɣef kullec.

Lameɛna Ɛisa, win akken yerra Sidi Ṛebbi seddaw n lmalayekkat i kra n lweqt, nețwali-t tura di tmanegt-is yeččuṛ d lɛezz ɣef ddemma n leɛtab n lmut-is ; s ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi i gemmut ɣef yemdanen meṛṛa.

Sidi Ṛebbi i d-ixelqen kullec yerna kullec d ayla-s, yehwa-yas ad issiweḍ ccan n Ɛisa amsellek n yemdanen ɣer lekmal, mi t-id isɛedda si leɛtab ameqqran, iwakken a d-yawi aṭas n yemdanen ɣer lɛaḍima-s ;
axaṭer Sidna Ɛisa i gṣeffun si ddnub akk-d wid i gețwaṣeffan, yiwen i ten-id-ifkan. Daymi ur yessetḥa ara yis-sen, isemma-yasen « atmaten-is »
mi genna : A d beccṛeɣ isem-ik i watmaten-iw, a k-ḥemdeɣ di tlemmast n tejmaɛt n watmaten .
Yenna daɣen : Ad țekleɣ ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi . Yerna yenna : Aql-iyi nekk d warrac i yi-d-ifka Sidi Ṛebbi.
Imi arrac-agi țwaxelqen s weksum d idammen, ula d nețța yusa-d s ṣṣifa n wemdan iwakken ad iɣleb s lmut-is Cciṭan, win akken iḥekkmen ɣef lmut,
ad ikkes lxuf i wid akk yezgan d aklan seddaw uzaglu n lmut, a ten-isellek ;
axaṭer ur d-yusi ara ad iɛiwen lmalayekkat meɛna yusa-d ad iɛiwen tarwa n Sidna Ibṛahim.

Daymi i s-ilaq a d-yas s ṣṣifa n wemdan am atmaten-is iwakken ad yuɣal d lmuqeddem ameqqran i ɣef yella lețkal, yeččuṛen d ṛṛeḥma, ad iqdec ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi seg ul yerna ad ikkes ddnubat n yemdanen meṛṛa.
Imi nețța s yiman-is yenneɛtab deg ujeṛṛeb, yezmer ad iɛiwen wid ara yețțujeṛben.
Ihi ay atmaten yețwaxtaṛen, a wid iwumi i d-yessawel Sidi Ṛebbi aț-țweṛtem tageldit n igenwan, sserset tamuɣli-nwen ɣef Ɛisa, lmuqeddem ameqqran i d-iceggeɛ Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣef nețcehhid.
Yexdem lebɣi n win i t-id iceggɛen am akken i gexdem Sidna Musa i wexxam n Sidi Ṛebbi.
?-țideț Sidna Ɛisa yesɛa ccan akteṛ n Sidna Musa, imi win yebnan axxam, d nețța i gesɛan ccan akteṛ n wexxam yebna.
Axaṭer yal axxam yella win i t-yebnan, ma d win i d-ixelqen kra yellan, d Sidi Ṛebbi.
Sidna Musa yexdem ayen i glaqen a t-yexdem, yella am uqeddac ɣef wexxam n Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken a d ibeggen ayen ara d-ițțubeccṛen sya ɣer zdat.
Ma d Lmasiḥ yexdem ayen i glaq a t-yexdem, yesbedd-it am Mmi-s, d aqeṛṛuy n wexxam-is ; d nukni i d axxam-is ma yella neṭṭef, neṣbeṛ yerna nețkel deg wayen i nessaram.
?ef wannect-a i d-yenna Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen : Ass-a ma yella teslam i taɣect n Sidi Ṛebbi,
ur sɣaṛayet ara ulawen-nwen am wasmi i jehlen lejdud-nwen m'akken i yi-sserfan deg unezṛuf
anda ɛeṛden ad iyi-jeṛṛben ɣas akken walan lecɣal akk i xedmeɣ di ṛebɛin iseggasen.
?ef wayagi i rfiɣ ɣef lǧil-agi , dɣa nniɣ : Ulawen-nsen beɛden fell-i, zgan ɛeṛqen, ugin ad fehmen iberdan-iw.
Seg wakken i rfiɣ, gulleɣ ur kcimen asteɛfu-inu.
Ay atmaten, ḥadret ad yili gar-awen win ara yesseɣṛen ul-is, ara yeǧǧen cceṛ ad izdeɣ deg-s alamma issufeɣ-it i webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi yeddren.
?emyenhut wway gar-awen yal ass, skud nezmer a d-nini « ass-a » am akken i gura di tira iqedsen iwakken yiwen deg-wen ur t-ițkellix ddnub, ur yesɣaṛay ul-is.
Ma yella neṭṭef alamma ț-țaggara di liman-nni i nesɛa di tazwara, akka ara nțekki di Lmasiḥ,
akken yura di tira iqedsen : Ass-a ma yella teslam i taɣect n Sidi Ṛebbi, ur sɣaṛayet ara ulawen-nwen am asmi i jehlen lejdud-nwen deg unezṛuf.
Anwa-ten wid i gjehlen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi mi slan i taɣect-is, mačči d wid i d-yessufeɣ Sidna Musa si tmurt n Maṣer ?
Anwi i ɣef yerfa Sidi Ṛebbi azal n ṛebɛin n iseggasen, mačči d wid idenben i gessenger deg unezṛuf ?
Anwa-ten wid i ɣef yeggul ur kcimen amkan anda ara steɛfun, mačči d wid i t-iɛuṣan ?
Nwala ur kcimen ara ɣer westeɛfu n Sidi Ṛebbi axaṭer ugin ad amnen yis.
Skud mazal nezmer a nekcem ɣer westeɛfu i ɣ-yewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi, ilaq a naggad ur aɣ-ițfat ara lḥal, iwakken yiwen deg-wen ur s-yeqqaṛ ḍelmeɣ, iɛedda lweqt ur zmireɣ ara ad kecmeɣ.
Axaṭer lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ i ɣ-d ițțubeccṛen, d lexbaṛ-nni i d ițțubeccṛen i lejdud-nneɣ, lameɛna ur stenfɛen ara seg-s axaṭer mi s-slan ur t-qbilen ara.

Ma d nukni i t-iqeblen a nekcem ɣer westeɛfu-yagi i ɣef d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi : Deg wurrif i deg lliɣ, gulleɣ ur kcimen asteɛfu-inu . Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-d akka ɣas akken ifuk lecɣal-is seg wasmi i gexleq ddunit,
akken yura di tira iqedsen ɣef wass wis sebɛa : Sidi Ṛebbi yesteɛfa deg wass wis sebɛa seg wayen akk yexdem .
Yura daɣen : D lmuḥal ad kecmen ɣer westeɛfu-inu.
Imezwura i geslan i lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ ur kcimen ara ɣer westeɛfu yagi axaṭer ur t-qbilen ara, meɛna yella wamek ara kecmen wiyaḍ.

Aṭas n leqṛun mbeɛd, Sidi Ṛebbi yemmeslay-ed ɣef wass nniḍen iwumi i gsemma « ass-a » mi d-yenna seg yimi n Sidna Dawed : ( am akken yura iwsawen ) Ass-a ma yella teslam i taɣect-is ur sɣaṛayet ara ulawen-nwen.
Lemmer nnbi Yacuɛa yessaweḍ lejdud-nneɣ ɣer wemkan n westeɛfu, tili Sidi Ṛebbi ur d-yețmeslay ara ɣef wass nniḍen n westeɛfu.
Ar ass-a yeqqim-ed wass n westeɛfu i wegdud n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Axaṭer win ara ikecmen deg westeɛfu n Sidi Ṛebbi ad isteɛfu daɣen si lecɣal-is am akken yesteɛfa nețța.
A newwet ihi amek ara nekcem ɣer westeɛfu-agi, a nḥader akken ur iɣelli yiwen am wegdud n wat Isṛail iɛuṣan Sidi Ṛebbi deg unezṛuf.

Axaṭer awal n Sidi Ṛebbi d awal n tudert yesɛan tazmert, qeṭṭiɛ akteṛ n ujenwi yesɛan snat n leǧwahi qeṭṭiɛen, ikeččem armi d lqaɛ n teṛwiḥt d ṛṛuḥ, armi d ger lemfaṣel d wadif, yețbeggin-ed ixemmimen n wul d wayen yețḥussu wemdan.
Ulac ayen yeffren zdat Sidi Ṛebbi deg wayen akk i d-ixleq, kullec iban-ed ɛinani zdat win ara ɣ-iḥasben.
Imi d Ɛisa Mmi-s n Ṛebbi i nesɛa d lmuqeddem ameqqran, nețța i gzemren i kullec, i gzegren igenwan ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi, ilaq-aɣ ihi a neḥrez ayen i nețbecciṛ ɣef liman-nneɣ.
Axaṭer lmuqeddem ameqqran i nesɛa mačči d win ur nezmir ara a d-yiḥnin fell-aneɣ m'ara ɣ-iwali necceḍ, imi nețța daɣen yețțujeṛṛeb deg wayen yellan, am nukni, meɛna ur yeɣli ara di ddnub.
A nețkel ihi, a nqeṛṛeb ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi anda tella ṛṛeḥma iwakken a naf ssmaḥ, a ɣ-iɛiwen di lweqt ilaqen.
Yal lmuqeddem ameqqran yețwaxtaṛ-ed iwakken ad iqdec ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef ddemma n yemdanen, ad yețqeddim lewɛadi d iseflawen ɣef ddemma n ddnubat nsen.
Yezmer ad ifhem wid ur nessin ara akk-d wid iḍaɛen, imi ula d nețța s yiman-is ur yeǧhid ara, yezmer ad yeɣleḍ.
Ihi ɣef lǧehd-agi i t-ixuṣṣen i glaq ad yefk iseflawen ɣef yiman-is nețța akk-d yemdanen nniḍen ɣef ddemma n ddnubat-nsen.
Yiwen ur izmir ad yeṭṭef amkan n lmuqeddem ameqqran ma yella mačči d Sidi Ṛebbi i t-id-isbedden, am akken i gesbedd nnbi Haṛun.
Akka daɣen Lmasiḥ, mačči d nețța i gesbedden iman-is d lmuqeddem ameqqran lameɛna d Sidi Ṛebbi i t-isbedden mi s-yenna : Kečč d Mmi, d nekk i k-id-yefkan ɣer ddunit ass-a .
Yenna-yas daɣen : Sbeddeɣ-k aț-țiliḍ d lmuqeddem i dayem am akken i sbeddeɣ Malxisadeq.
Asm'akken yella Lmasiḥ di ddunit s ṣṣifa n wemdan, acḥal i gedɛa, acḥal i gḥellel s nnhati d imeṭṭawen Sidi Ṛebbi i gzemren a t-isellek si lmut. ?ef ddemma n ṭṭaɛa-ines, yețwaqbel.
?as akken d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi i gella, yelmed ṭṭaɛa s leɛtab i gɛeddan fell-as.
S wakka i gewweḍ ɣer tmanegt tameqqrant, yuɣal d abrid n leslak n dayem i wid akk i s-yețțaɣen awal.
Sidi Ṛebbi isbedd-it ad yili d lmuqeddem ameqqran am akken i t-yella Malxisadeq.
Nezmer a d-nernu aṭas ɣef wannect-agi meɛna d ayen i weɛṛen i wsefhem, axaṭer tweɛṛem i lefhama.
Ilaq acḥal ayagi segmi i tuɣalem d iselmaden, kunwi atan mazal teḥwaǧem win ara wen-islemden lumuṛ imezwura n wawal n Ṛebbi ; ur tezmirem ara i weɣṛum, mazal-ikkun teḥwaǧem ayefki.
S kra n win mazal i teṭṭeḍ, d llufan i gella, ur yessin ara ad yextiṛ ger wayen yelhan d wayen n diri.
Ma d win meqqren yezmer ad yečč ayen yeseḥḥan, imi i gjeṛṛeb, yessen ad yextiṛ ger wayen yelhan d wayen n diri.

Ur ilaq ara a neqqim kan deg wayen nelmed di tazwara ɣef wawal n Lmasiḥ. Ilaq-aɣ a neddu ɣer zdat a nesnekmal almud-nneɣ, mbla ma nɛawed-ed i lsas s wadda ɣef wayen yeɛnan : nndama ɣef lecɣal n diri i gețțawin ɣer lmut, liman di Sidi Ṛebbi,
ayen yeɛnan aɣḍas akk-d țrusi n ifassen, ḥeggu n lmegtin neɣ lḥisab aneggaru.
D ayen ara nexdem ma iserreḥ-aɣ Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ma d wid i d-yusan ɣer tafat, i gessefhem Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, i gɛerḍen lbaṛakat n Ṛebbi,
lbenna n wawal-is akk-d tezmert n ddunit i d-iteddun,
ma yella ṭṭaxṛen i webrid n Ṛebbi ulamek ara d-uɣalen imi țɛawaden asemmeṛ i Mmi-s n Ṛebbi, sseɣlayen di lqima-s zdat yemdanen.
Akal yeṛwan aman i d-yețțaken lerẓaq i wid i t-izerɛen, lbaṛaka n Sidi Ṛebbi tețrusu-d fell-as.
Meɛna ma yella yefka-d isennanen d ubuneqqaṛ, d akal ur nesɛi azal, ad ițwanɛel yerna qṛib a s-ceɛlen times.
?as ma nețmeslay-ed akka a wid eɛzizen, nețkel fell-awen d abrid yelhan i tewwim, d win ara kkun isellken.
Sidi Ṛebbi d bab n lḥeqq, ur itețțu ara lecɣal-nwen d leḥmala nwen ɣef ddemma n yisem-is akk-d lxiṛ i mazal txeddmem-t i watmaten di liman.
Nebɣa ihi yal yiwen deg-wen ad iṭṭef deg webrid-agi alamma ț-țaggara iwakken aț-țawḍem ɣer wayen i tessaramem.
Ur țțilit ara d imeɛdazen meɛna ɛandet wid iweṛten s liman d ṣṣbeṛ nsen lweṛt i gewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi.
Asmi i gefka Sidi Ṛebbi lɛahed i Sidna Ibṛahim, yeggul s yixef-is, axaṭer ulac win yellan sennig-es,
dɣa yenna : Gulleɣ a k-barkeɣ, ad sseftiɣ dderya-k.
Akka ihi Sidna Ibṛahim yeṣbeṛ yuṛǧa armi i t-id-yewweḍ wayen i s-yewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi.
Imdanen țgallan s wayen i ten-yugaren, s limin i ferrun tilufa ;
daymi i geggul Sidi Ṛebbi i wid ara iweṛten ayen i sen-yewɛed, iwakken a d-ibeggen belli ur yețbeddil ara ṛṛay.

Lɛahed-agi i d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d limin i geggul d ayen ur nețbeddil yerna ur yezmir ara a ten-inkkeṛ. Ma d nukni yeddurin ɣuṛ-es, d annect-agi i ɣ-isseǧhaden a neṭṭef mliḥ deg usirem i ɣ-d ițțunefken.
Asirem-agi d ayen yeṭṭfen tudert-nneɣ am umextaf ( tnejga ) yeṭṭfen lbabuṛ, yețɛedday akkin i leḥjab ɣer wemkan iqedsen,
anda akken yekcem Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa d amezwaru, ɣef ddemma-nneɣ yuɣal d lmuqeddem ameqqran i dayem akken yella Malxisadeq.
Malxisadeq-agi yella d agellid n Salem, d lmuqeddem n Sidi Ṛebbi ɛlayen. D nețța i gemmugren Sidna Ibṛahim mi d-yuɣal seg umenɣi i deg yeɣleb igelliden nniḍen, iwakken a t-ibarek.
I nețța i gefka Sidna Ibṛahim amur wis ɛecṛa n wayen akk i d-yerbeḥ seg umenɣi. Malxisadeq lmeɛna n yisem-is « agellid n lḥeqq », yețțusemma daɣen agellid n Salem yeɛni « agellid n lehna ».
Ur neẓri ara anwa i d baba-s neɣ anta i d yemma-s, ur nessin tajaddit-is, ur neẓri melmi i glul neɣ melmi i gemmut. Yella d lemtel n Mmi-s n Ṛebbi, yeqqim d lmuqeddem i dayem.
Walit acḥal meqqeṛ ccan n win iwumi yefka Sidna Ibṛahim leɛcuṛ seg wayen i d-yerbeḥ deg umenɣi.
At Lewwi yellan d lmuqedmin, țțawin leɛcuṛ ɣef wat Isṛail yellan d atmaten-nsen akken i d-tenna ccariɛa, ɣas akken ula d nutni ț-țarwa n Sidna Ibṛahim.
Ma d Malxisadeq ur nelli ara n at Lewwi, yewwi leɛcuṛ s ɣuṛ Sidna Ibṛahim yerna iburek-it.
Mbla ccekk win yețbaraken yugar win yețțubarken.
At Lewwi-agi yețțawin leɛcuṛ, d imdanen yețmețțaten, ma d Malxisadeq d win i ɣef d-nnant tira iqedsen : Mazal idder.
Nezmer ihi a d-nini belli Lewwi yețțawin leɛcuṛ ɣef wat Isṛail, yefka leɛcuṛ i Malxisadeq uqbel a d-ilal s ufus n Sidna Ibṛahim yellan si lejdud-is ;
axaṭer asmi yemmuger Malxisadeq Sidna Ibṛahim, Lewwi urɛad d-ilul.

Ccɣel i xeddmen lmuqedmin n at Lewwi, d lsas n ccariɛa yețțunefken i wegdud n wat Isṛail ; meɛna lemmer yennekmal ccɣel-agi, acuɣeṛ ihi ara d-yili lmuqeddem nniḍen am Malxisadeq mačči am Haṛun n at Lewwi ?
Ma yella ccɣel i xeddmen lmuqeddmin n at Lewwi yuɣal di rrif, ihi ula d ccariɛa aț-țuɣal di rrif.
Axaṭer Ssid-nneɣ, ur d-yekki ara seg wedrum n at Lewwi, meɛna yekka-d seg wedrum nniḍen. Adrum-nni ulac deg-s ula d yiwen n lmuqeddem i gqedcen deg wudekkan n iseflawen.
Ihi neẓra belli Ssid-nneɣ yeffeɣ ed seg wedrum n Yahuda, yerna Sidna Musa ur d-yenni ara a d-yeffeɣ lmuqeddem seg wedrum agi.
Yella wayen i d-ibeggnen annect agi, axaṭer yeffeɣ-ed lmuqeddem nniḍen yecban Malxisadeq.
Mačči d ccariɛa i t-yerran d lmuqeddem meɛna yuɣal d lmuqeddem s tezmert n tudert ur nețfaka ;
imi yura fell-as : Kečč d lmuqeddem i dayem am Malxisadeq.
Lameṛ aqdim yeɛnan lmuqedmin yețwabeddel, axaṭer ixuṣṣ yerna ur yenfiɛ ara.
Ccariɛa n Musa ur tezmir ara a ɣ-terr d iḥeqqiyen zdat Sidi Ṛebbi, meɛna yella yiwen usirem s wayes ara nqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-es ;
yerna ayagi yedṛa-d s limin n Sidi Ṛebbi, mačči am at Lewwi yuɣalen d lmuqedmin mbla limin ;
ma d Sidna Ɛisa yesbedd-it Sidi Ṛebbi s limin mi s-yenna : Sidi Ṛebbi yeggul ur yeḥnit aț-țiliḍ d lmuqeddem i dayem .
Ɛisa, d nețța i ɣ-iḍemnen lɛahed yifen amezwaru.
Aṭas seg wat Lewwi i gellan d lmuqedmin axaṭer lmut ur ten-tețțaǧa ara ad dumen di ccɣel-nsen ;
ma d Sidna Ɛisa, d win yețdumun, ur yuḥwaǧ ara a d-yeǧǧ lxedma-s n lmuqeddem i wayeḍ.
Daymi i gezmer ad isellek di mkul lweqt wid akk yețqeṛṛiben ɣer Ṛebbi s yisem-is, imi nețța yedder i dayem, ideɛɛu fell-asen ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.
D wagi i d lmuqeddem ameqqran i ɣ-ilaqen, d imqeddes, d azedgan, ur yesɛi ara lɛib, yemxalaf d imdanen idenben yerna ițwarfed sennig igenwan.
Ur yeḥwaǧ ara ad yefk iseflawen am lmuqedmin nniḍen ɣef ddnubat-is neɣ ɣef wid n wegdud, lameɛna yefka iman-is d asfel yiwet n tikkelt kan ɣef ddemma n ddnubatnneɣ.
Lmuqedmin imeqqranen i d tesbeddad ccariɛa, d irgazen ixuṣṣen di lǧehd, ma d win i gesbedd Sidi Ṛebbi s limin deffir ccariɛa, d Mmi-s i gessaweḍ ɣer tezmert tameqqrant i dayem.
Deg wayen akk i d-nenna atan wayen yesɛan azal : Lmuqeddem nneɣ ameqqran yeṭṭef amkan n lḥekma ɣer tama tayeffust n Sidi Ṛebbi di tgelda n igenwan.
Ixeddem ccɣel-is n lmuqeddem ameqqran deg wemkan iqedsen n tideț i gebna Sidi Ṛebbi, mačči d win i bnan yemdanen.
Yal lmuqeddem sbedden-t iwakken ad yețqeddim lewɛadi d iseflawen, daymi i s-ilaq ula d nețța ad yesɛu ayen ara iqeddem ;
lemmer Lmuqeddem-nneɣ ameqqran di ddunit i gella, ur yezmir ara ad yili d lmuqeddem nețța ur nelli ara seg wat Lewwi, imi llan wid yețqeddimen lewɛadi akken i d-tenna ccariɛa.

Ccɣel i xeddmen lmuqedemin agi d lemtel, d ccbiha n wayen yellan deg igenwan. Mi gekker Sidna Musa ad isbedd aqiḍun n temlilit, Sidi Ṛebbi yenna yas : -- Muqel ! Xdem kullec am lemtel i k-d-ssekneɣ deg wedrar.
Meɛna tura Lmasiḥ yețțunefk as-d ccɣel yugaren wagi s waṭas, d nețța i d amcafeɛ-nneɣ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi di leɛqed yifen amezwaru, ibedden ɣef lweɛd iṣeḥḥan.
Lemmer leɛqed amezwaru ur ixuṣṣ ara tili ur d-yețțili ara wayeḍ.
Axaṭer asmi i glum Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wegdud-is yenna : A d-asen wussan i deg ara sbeddeɣ leɛqed ajdid akk-d wegdud n Isṛail d wegdud n Yahuda.
Ur yețțili ara am leɛqed-nni i xedmeɣ d lejdud-nsen asmi i sen-ṭṭfeɣ afus s sufɣeɣ-ten-id si tmurt n Maṣer , imi nutni ur ṭṭifen ara di leɛqed-inu ula d nekk ǧǧiɣ-ten.
Atan leɛqed ara sbeddeɣ gar-i d wegdud n Isṛail. A wen-iniɣ : M 'ara ɛeddin wussan-agi, a sen-sfehmeɣ lumuṛat-inu, a ten-skecmeɣ deg wulawen-nsen, ad iliɣ d Illu-nsen, ad ilin d agdud-iw.
Deg ussan-nni, yiwen ur yeqqaṛ i wayeḍ neɣ i gma-s « issin Sidi Ṛebbi » axaṭer ad iyi-issinen meṛṛa seg umeẓyan ar umeqqran.
A sen-semmḥeɣ ddnubat-nsen, ur ten-id-țmektayeɣ ara.
Imi d-yehdeṛ ɣef leɛqed ajdid, leɛqed amezwaru yuɣal d aqdim ; ayen yellan d aqdim qṛib ad ițwakkes.
Leɛqed amezwaru yesɛa leqwanen yesɛan daɣen amkan anda ɛebbden Ṛebbi.
Axaṭer sbedden yiwen uqiḍun n temlilit i deg llan sin imukan : Deg umkan amezwaru yețțusemman amkan iqedsen, yella lmeṣbeḥ akk-d ṭṭabla anda yețrusu weɣṛum yețțunefken d lweɛda.
Deg umkan-agi iqedsen yella yiwen n leḥjab ifeṛqen amkan iqedsen d umkan iqedsen nezzeh,

tella dinna lḥila n ddheb i deg sseṛɣayen lebxuṛ akk-d usenduq n leɛqed iṛuccen s ddheb. Zdaxel n usenduq-agi yella uɛekkaz-nni n Haṛun yeǧǧuǧgen, illa daɣen aqbuc iččuṛen ț-țamanna akk-d teblaḍin i deg uran lumuṛat n Sidi Ṛebbi.

Sufella n usenduq-agi rsent snat n lmeṣnuɛat imetlen lmalayekkat, ɣumment s tili n wafriwen-nsent amkan-nni i țṛuccun s idammen n iseflawen i leɛfu n ddnubat. Mačči tura i d lweqt i deg ara d-nemmeslay ɣef wayagi meṛṛa.
Akka i gers kullec deg wemkan-agi iqedsen, lmuqedmin keččmen ɣuṛ-es mkul lweqt iwakken ad xedmen ccɣel-nsen ;
ma d amkan iqedsen nezzeh, anagar lmuqeddem ameqqran i gkeččmen ɣuṛ-es yiwet n tikkelt i useggas, iwakken ad iqeddem idammen n iseflawen ɣef ddemma n ddnubat-is akk-d wid n wegdud.
Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen issefhem-aɣ-d belli ulac abrid ɣer wemkan iqedsen nezzeh skud mazal aqiḍun n temlilit.
Ayagi yella d lemtel i lweqt-agi i deg nella ; lewɛadi d iseflawen i țțaken medden i Sidi Ṛebbi ur zmiren ara ad ssiwḍen ɣer ṣṣfa n wul.
D ayen yeɛnan kan lɛaddat n ccariɛa ɣef wučči ț-țissit akk-d luḍu ; lɛaddat-agi llant-ed d lemtel kan armi d asmi yerra Sidi Ṛebbi kullec d ajdid.
Lmasiḥ yusa-d d lmuqeddem ameqqran n lxiṛ i d-iteddun, yezger i wemkan iqedsen yugaren kra n wayen yebna wemdan, yesɛan azal meqqṛen, ur nelli ara n ddunit-agi.
Yekcem yiwet n tikkelt kan ɣer wemkan iqedsen nezzeh, mačči d idammen n iɛejmiyen neɣ n iqelwacen i gewwi yid-es lameɛna d idammen-is nețța, s wannect-a i ɣ-d-yefda i dayem.
Axaṭer ma yella idammen n iɛejmiyen d iqelwacen akk-d yiɣed n tgenduzt yeṛɣan d asfel țṣeffin lǧețța n wid idenben m'ara ten ṛuccen yis-sen,

amek ur aɣ-țṣeffin ara idammen n Lmasiḥ yefkan iman-is i Ṛebbi d asfel s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ n dayem, nețța ur nesɛi lɛib ? Amek ur yessizdig ara ulawen-nneɣ si lecɣal ur nemɛin yețțawin ɣer lmut iwakken a nuɣal d iqeddacen n Sidi Ṛebbi yeddren.

?ef wannect-agi i gella d amcafeɛ gar-aɣ d Ṛebbi s leɛqed agi ajdid, iwakken wid iwumi d-yessawel Sidi Ṛebbi ad weṛten lxiṛat n dayem i sen-yewɛed. Zemren ad weṛten ayagi s lmut-is i d-yedṛan, lmut-is i gtekksen ɣef yemdanen ddnubat-nsen n wasmi i llan seddaw n leɛqed amezwaru.
Ma yella walebɛaḍ yeǧǧa-d lewṣaya weqbel ad yemmet akken ad feṛqen ayla-s, ilaq ad aṛǧun alamma yemmut.
Lewṣaya-agi ur tṣeḥḥa ara ma yella mazal bab-is yedder lameɛna m'ara yemmet aț-țuɣal tṣeḥḥa.
Daymi leɛqed amezwaru daɣen yebda s tazzla n idammen.

Ula d Sidna Musa mi i d-yeɣṛa lumuṛ akken llan di Tawṛat, yeddem-ed taciṭa akk-d taḍuṭ tazeggaɣt, yebbeɣ-iten deg idammen n iɛejmiyen d iqelwacen akk-d waman, iṛucc yis-sen taktabt iqedsen akk-d wegdud meṛṛa,
yenna : Wigi d idammen n leɛqed i gesbedd Sidi Ṛebbi yid-wen.
Iṛucc daɣen s idammen-nni aqiḍun akk-d wayen yellan deg-s.
Axaṭer ccariɛa teqqaṛ-ed kullec ad yeṣfu s idammen, ulac leɛfu mbla tazzla n idammen.
Imi ayagi akk i gmetlen ayen yellan deg igenwan ilaq ad ițwaṣeffi s idammen n iseflawen, ula d ayen yellan deg igenwan ilaq ad ițwaṣeffi s idammen n wesfel yifen iseflawen imezwura.
Axaṭer Lmasiḥ ur yekcim ara ɣer wemkan iqedsen i bnan ifasen n yemdanen, yellan d lemtel n win n tideț, meɛna yuli ɣer igenni anda yella tura d amcafeɛ-nneɣ zdat Sidi Ṛebbi.
Lmuqeddem ameqqran ikeččem mkul aseggas ɣer wemkan iqedsen nezzeh, iwakken ad iqeddem idammen n lmal, ma d Lmasiḥ ur ikcim ara iwakken ad isebbel iman-is aṭas n tikkal ;
neɣ m'ulac, yili yeɛteb aṭas n iberdan seg wasmi i d-texleq ddunit. Lameɛna yusa-d di zzman-agi aneggaru yiwet n tikkelt kan, isebbel iman-is d asfel iwakken ad ikkes ddnub.
Lmut tețțawi imdanen yiwet n tikkelt kan imiren a d-yili lḥisab.

Ula d Lmasiḥ yefka iman-is yiwet n tikkelt kan iwakken ad iɛebbi ddnubat n waṭas n yemdanen, a d yuɣal tikkelt tis snat, mačči iwakken ad yekkes daɣen ddnubat n yemdanen meɛna iwakken ad isellek wid i t-yețṛaǧun

Ccariɛa n Musa ur d-țbeggin ara tideț akken tella, meɛna d lemtel n lxiṛat i d-iteddun, daymi ur tezmir ara aț-țessiweḍ ɣer tezdeg ikemlen wid yețqeṛṛiben ɣer Ṛebbi s iseflawen i țqeddimen seg useggas ɣer useggas.
Ihi tura lemmer wid yețqeddimen iseflawen-agi, țwaṣeffan si ddnubat nsen, tili ur țțuɣalen ara ad fken iseflawen ɣef ddnubat-nsen, imi ad ḥṣun deg wulawen-nsen belli ṣfan.
Meɛna s iseflawen-agi țmektayen-d yal aseggas belli mazal-iten d imednuben.
Imi d lmuḥal idammen n iɛejmiyen d iqelwacen ad kksen ddnubat.
Daymi mi i gțeddu a d-yas Lmasiḥ ɣer ddunit yenna i Sidi Ṛebbi : Ur tebɣiḍ iseflawen, ur tebɣiḍ lewɛadi ; lameɛna tefkiḍ-iyi-d ɣer ddunit s ṣṣifa n wemdan.
Ur teqbileḍ iseflawen n lmal i tețțeț tmes, ur teqbileḍ iseflawen itekksen ddnub ;
Dɣa nniɣ : Aql-iyi-n ay Illu-yiw, usiɣ-ed ad xedmeɣ lebɣi-k, akken yura fell-i di tektabt iqedsen.

Teslam d acu i d-yenna Lmasiḥ ! Yenna : Ur tebɣiḍ iseflawen d lewɛadi, ur teqbileḍ iseflawen n lmal i tețțețtmes ur teqbileḍ iseflawen itekksen ddnub, ɣas akken iseflawen-agi țțunefken akken yura di ccariɛa.
Yerna yenna : Aql-iyi usiɣ-ed iwakken ad xedmeɣ lebɣi-k . S wakka Sidi Ṛebbi yekkes akk iseflawen imezwura, yerra-d deg wemkan-nsen asfel n Lmasiḥ.
Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yexdem lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi, isebbel iman-is d asfel, iṣeffa-yaɣ si ddnub ɣef yiwet n tikkelt.
Lmuqedmin țqeddimen mkul ass iseflawen n lmal ur nezmir ad kksen ddnub.
Ma d nețța yefka yiwen wesfel kan i dayem ɣef ddemma n ddnubat ; dɣa yeṭṭef amkan n lḥekma ɣer tama tayeffust n Sidi Ṛebbi,
alamma uɣalen yeɛdawen-is seddaw iḍaṛṛen-is.
S yiwen wesfel kan yessazdeg i dayem wid yețwaxtaṛen.
Ula d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ibeggen-it-id imi gura di tira iqedsen :
Sidi Ṛebbi yenna : atan leɛqed ara sbeddeɣ gar-i yid-sen, M 'ara ɛeddin wussan-agi ad skecmeɣ lumuṛ-inu deg wulawen-nsen, a ten-aruɣ di lɛeqliya-nsen
Yenna daɣen : Ur d-țmektayeɣ ara ddnubat akk-d yir lecɣal-nsen.
Ma yella Sidi Ṛebbi yeɛfa-yaɣ ddnubat-nneɣ, acuɣeṛ ihi i neḥwaǧ tura iseflawen n lmal ɣef ddnub.
Ay atmaten, imi uzzlen idammen n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ fell-aneɣ, nețkel a nekcem ɣer wemkan iqedsen,
axaṭer yeldi-yaɣ abrid ajdid ɣer tudert mi gcerreg leḥjab, yeɛni lǧețța-s ițțusemmṛen.
Nesɛa lmuqeddem ameqqran yellan d aqeṛṛuy ɣef wexxam n Sidi Ṛebbi.
A nqeṛṛeb ihi ɣer Ṛebbi s wul d liman ikemlen, s wulawen-nneɣ zeddigen seg yir ixemmimen, s lǧețțat-nneɣ yuraden s waman yeṣfan.
Ilaq a neṭṭef deg usirem-nneɣ s wayes i nețcehhid, axaṭer win i ɣ-iɛuhden iteṭṭef deg wawal-is.
A nțemḥadar wway gar-aneɣ, a nțemweṣṣi ɣef leḥmala d lecɣal yelhan.
Ur ilaq ara a neṭṭixeṛ si tejmaɛt n watmaten akken uɣen tannumi kra nniḍen, meɛna a nțemyenhut wway gar-aneɣ imi ass n tuɣalin n Ssid nneɣ iqeṛṛeb-ed.
Ma yella nețkemmil nețɛici di ddnub s lebɣi-nneɣ yili nukni nessen tideț, ur d-yeqqim ara wesfel ara ɣ-yekksen ddnub-nneɣ,
yeqqim-aɣ-ed kan a neṛǧu s lxuf ameqqran lḥisab i d-ițeddun ț-țmes iṛeqqen ara yeččen wid iɛuṣan Ṛebbi.
Kra n win i gxulfen ccariɛa n Musa, ma yella cehden-d fell-as sin neɣ tlata inigan belli yuklal lmut ad immet mbla ṛṛeḥma ;
amek ihi ara tedṛu d win ara yewten di Mmi-s n Ṛebbi, ur neḥsib ara idammen n leɛqed i t-iṣeffan, ara iregmen Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i ɣ-d-yewwin ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Axaṭer neẓra anwa i d-yennan : ?țaṛ d ayla-w, d nekk ara ten-ixelṣen akken uklalen Yenna daɣen : D nețța ara iḥasben agdud-is.
A nnger n win ara d-yeɣlin ger ifassen n Sidi Ṛebbi yeddren !
Mmektit-ed ussan imezwura i deg twalam tafat n Sidi Ṛebbi d wamek tqublem leɛtab di tegniț n ccedda :
seg yiwet n tama reggmen-kkun, kksen fell-awen sser, si tama nniḍen tbeddem ɣer wid iwumi yedṛa wayagi.
?-țideț tḥunnem ɣef yimeḥbas yerna tqeblem s lfeṛḥ a wen-kksen ayla nwen, axaṭer teẓram belli tesɛam ayen yugaren ayagi yerna d ayen yețdumun.
Ihi ḥadret a wen-iṛuḥ laman i tesɛam ɣer Ṛebbi axaṭer a wen-d-yawi rrbeḥ d ameqqran.
Ilaq-awen aț-țesɛum ṣṣbeṛ iwakken aț-țxedmem lebɣi n Ṛebbi iwakken a wen-d-yefk ayen i wen yewɛed.
Drus i mazal, di kra n lweqt a d-yaweḍ win akken ara d-yasen, ur yețɛeṭṭil ara.
Aḥeqqi ɣer ɣuṛ-i d win i gțeklen fell-i, yesɛan liman deg wul-is meɛna ma iwexxeṛ fell-i ad zziɣ udem-iw fell-as.
Ma d nukni ur nelli ara seg wid yeṭṭixiṛen i webrid n Ṛebbi, ur nelli ara seg wid yețțuɣalen ɣer deffir, yețḍiɛen, lameɛna nukni seg wid yesɛan liman, nețțeddu deg ubrid n leslak.
Liman ɣer Ṛebbi, d lețkal nesɛa belli a ɣ-d-yaweḍ wayen i nețṛaǧu, ɣas ur t-nwala ara s wallen-nneɣ neẓra ț-țideț yella.
Si zik wid i gɛeǧben i Sidi Ṛebbi, d wid yesɛan liman deg-s.
S liman i nefhem belli ddunit tețwaxleq s wawal n Ṛebbi ; ihi ayen nețwali yekka-d seg wayen ur nețwali ara.

S liman i gqeddem Habil asfel i Sidi Ṛebbi axiṛ n wesfel n gma-s Kahin, ɣef ddemma n liman-ines Sidi Ṛebbi yeqbel asfel-ines yerna iḥseb-it d aḥeqqi ; daymi ɣas yemmut yeqqim-ed d lemtel ɣef liman.
S liman, Hanux yețwarfed ɣer igenni mbla ma tɛedda fell-as lmut, iɣab ɣef wallen, ur d-iban ara axaṭer irfed-it Sidi Ṛebbi ɣuṛ-es. Uqbel ad yețwarfed yeẓra belli yeɛǧeb i Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ihi, mbla liman d lmuḥal ad yeɛǧeb yiwen i Ṛebbi, axaṭer win ara iqeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es ilaq ad yamen belli yella yerna iqebbel-ed wid yețnadin fell-as.

S liman, i gumen nnbi Nuḥ ayen i s-d-iweḥḥa Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef wayen ara yedṛun, ɣas akken mazal ur iwala acemma s wallen-is, yebna lbabuṛ iwakken ad isellek at wexxam-is. S wakka i gḥuseb at ddunit imi yuɣ awal i Sidi Ṛebbi, yuɣal d aḥeqqi ɣuṛ-es ɣef ddemma n liman yesɛa.
S liman i guɣ Ibṛahim awal i Sidi Ṛebbi mi s-d-yessawel ad iṛuḥ ɣer yiwet n tmurt ara s-yefk d lweṛt ; iṛuḥ ɣas akken ur yeẓri ara ɣer wanda ițeddu.
S liman daɣen i gɛac am ubeṛṛani di tmurt i s-yewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi, yezdeɣ deg iqiḍunen am nețța am warraw-is Isḥaq akk-d Yeɛqub iweṛten yid-es ayen akken i s-yewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi.
Yețṛaǧu tamdint ibedden ɣef lsas iǧehden, tin akken yebna Sidi Ṛebbi s yiman-is.
S liman, ?ara tesɛa-d dderya ɣas akken ț-țiɛiqeṛt yerna meqqeṛt di leɛmeṛ, tumen belli win i s-yefkan lɛahed, ad iṭṭef deg wawal-is.
Daymi seg yiwen wergaz iwumi kkawen ifadden teffeɣ-ed dderya s waṭas dderya n dderya-k ad ilin am yitran n igenni, am ṛṛmel yellan ɣef rrif n lebḥeṛ, ur yezmir yiwen a ten yeḥseb.
Di liman, i mmuten akk yemdanen-agi uqbel a ten-id-yaweḍ wayen i sen-yewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi, lameɛna walan-t si lebɛid feṛḥen yis yerna setɛeṛfen belli d ibeṛṛaniyen, d imsebriden di ddunit.
Wid iheddṛen akka, iban țnadin tamurt i yiman-nsen.
Lemmer ndemmen imi ǧǧan tamurt-nsen tili uɣalen ɣuṛ-es,
meɛna nutni țqelliben ɣef tmurt ifazen yeɛni tin n igenwan, daymi Sidi Ṛebbi ur issetḥa ara ad ițțusemmi d Illu-nsen axaṭer ihegga yasen tamurt.
S liman i gefka Ibṛahim mmi-s Isḥaq d asfel mi i t-ijeṛṛeb Sidi Ṛebbi, nețța iwumi d-țunefkent lemɛahdat, yeqbel ad yefk mmi-s awḥid d asfel,
nețța iwumi i d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi : Seg Isḥaq ara k-d-fkeɣ dderya ara irefden isem-ik.
Yețkel ɣef Ṛebbi bab n tezmert belli yezmer a d-isseḥyu ula si ger lmegtin daymi i s-d-yerra mmi-s : ayagi yella-d d lemtel.
S liman, Isḥaq iburek arraw-is Yeɛqub akk-d Icaɛu ɣef ddemma n wayen i d-iteddun.
S liman daɣen i gburek Yeɛqub arraw n Yusef uqbel ad yemmet, s liman i gsenned ɣef wuɛekkaz iwakken ad iɛbed Ṛebbi.
S liman i gcar Sidna Yusef uqbel ad immet ɣef tuffɣa n wat Isṛail si tmurt n Maṣer, i gweṣṣa ad awin iɣsan-is yid-sen.
S liman, imawlan n Sidna Musa ffren-t tlata n wagguren mi d-ilul axaṭer walan aqcic yecbeḥ dɣa ur uggaden ara lameṛ n ugellid.
S liman, mi meqqeṛ Sidna Musa ur yeqbil ara ad ițțusemmi d mmi-s n yelli-s n Ferɛun,
yextaṛ ad yeɛteb d wegdud n Ṛebbi wala ad iqqim di zzhu n ddunit-agi yețțawin ɣer ddnub.
Yefhem belli leɛtab n Lmasiḥ, d sɛaya tameqqrant yugaren igerrujen n tmurt n Maṣer axaṭer iwala ɣer zdat lerbaḥ i t-yețṛaǧun.
S liman i d-iffeɣ si tmurt n Maṣer ur yuggad ara agellid iweɛṛen, yeṭṭef di liman am win iwalan win akken ur yețwali yiwen.
S liman i gefka lameṛ ad zlun izimer n leslak, i gṛucc tiwwura s idammen n izimer-nni iwakken m'ara d-iɛeddi win yessengaren ur yețnal ara imenza i d-ilulen ɣer wat Isṛail.
S liman, agdud n Isṛail yezger ɣef wuḍar i lebḥeṛ azeggaɣ, ma d imaṣriyen mi ɛeṛden ad zegren am nutni, yečča-ten.
S liman i ɣlin leswaṛ n temdint n Yeriku mi i s-yezzi wegdud n Isṛail sebɛa wussan.
S liman, Ṛaḥab yellan d yir tameṭṭut ur temmut ara akk-d wid ur numin ara s Ṛebbi axaṭer testeṛḥeb akken ilaq s wid i d-yusan ad ssiwḍen lexbaṛ i wat Isṛail a sen-awin lexbaṛ.
D acu ara d-iniɣ daɣen ? Aṭas n lweqt i glaqen iwakken a d-hedṛeɣ ɣef Gidɛun, ɣef Baraq, ɣef Samsun, ɣef Jifti, ɣef Sidna Dawed, ɣef Camwil neɣ ɣef lenbiya meṛṛa.
Wid i grebḥen deg umenɣi tigeldiwin nniḍen s liman, xedmen anagar lḥeqq, țțunefkent-asen-d lemɛahdat, zemmemen imawen n yizmawen,
ɣelben tazmert n tmes, menɛen i ujenwi qeṭṭiɛen, ḥlan si lehlakat-nsen, zewṛen deg umenɣi, lɛeskeṛ n tmura nniḍen rewlen zdat-sen.
Kra n tilawin walant wid i sent-yemmuten uɣalen-d si ger lmegtin, wiyaḍ țwaqehṛen meɛna ur qbilen ara ṛṛeḥma n yemdanen iwakken ad sɛun ḥeggu n tideț.
Wiyaḍ daɣen țwaqehṛen s ustehzi, s ujelkkaḍ, s snasel d leḥbus.
?waṛejmen, țwajeṛben, țwagezmen s umencaṛ, mmuten s ujenwi, teddun sya ɣer da, llebsa nsen d ibḍanen n wulli ț-țɣeṭṭen, yețwakkes-asen kullec, țwaḥeqṛen, țwaqehṛen.
Nutni ur tuklal ara ddunit, țmenṭaren deg unezṛuf, deg idurar, deg ifran d mkul amkan n ddunit.
Widak-agi meṛṛa yețwaqeblen ɣer Ṛebbi s liman-nsen urɛad i ten-id yewweḍ wayen i sen-yewɛed,
Axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi ihegga-yaɣ ayen yifen ayen akken i sen-yewɛed i nutni, iwakken ur țțawḍen ara ɣer wayen akken ikemlen mbla ma nțekka yid-sen.
Ula d nukni ihi imi i ɣ-d zwaren waṭas inagan agi, a nḍeggeṛ taɛkumt-nneɣ akk-d ddnub i ɣ-iɣummen, a nexdem s ṣṣbeṛ ccɣel-agi i ɣ-d-ițțunefken.

A nṛeṣṣi tamuɣli-nneɣ di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, nețța i ɣ-d-ildin abrid n liman yerna yessawaḍ-it ɣer lekmal ; mi geẓra lfeṛḥ i t-yețṛaǧun, yeqbel leɛtab ɣef wumidag, yeqbel tamḥeqṛanit akk-d lḥecma, dɣa yeṭṭef amkan n lḥekma ɣer tama tayeffust n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Xemmemet ihi ɣuṛ-es aț-țwalim amek i geqbel leɛtab n yemdanen imednuben, iwakken ur tɛeggum ara, ur tfeččlem ara ;
axaṭer kunwi mazal ur tennuɣem ara akk-d ddnub armi d lmut,
yerna tețțum lewṣayat i wen-d-ițțak am warraw-is. A mmi ur ḥeqqeṛ ara tiyita n Sidi Ṛebbi, ur feččel ara m'ara d-izzem fell-ak
axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi yețqassa wid i gḥemmel, yețțak tiɣṛit i wid i geḥseb d arraw-is .
Qeblet leɛtab, imi Sidi Ṛebbi iḥseb-ikkun d arraw-is ; axaṭeṛ ulac argaz ur nețqassa ara mmi-s ;
lameɛna ma yella tmenɛem i tiyita-agi i gețḥazen imdanen meṛṛa, atan ihi ur tellim ara d dderya n leḥlal, meɛna tețțusemmam d arraw n leḥṛam.
Imi ibabaten-nneɣ i ɣ-d-isɛan țțaken-aɣ tiyita yerna nqudeṛ-iten, amek ur nețqadaṛ ara Ṛebbi yellan d Baba-tneɣ s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, iwakken a nesɛu tudert ?
Imawlan-nneɣ țṛebbin-aɣ dagi di ddunit akken i sen yehwa, lameɛna Baba-tneɣ n igenwan yețțak-aɣ tiɣṛit di nnfeɛ-nneɣ iwakken a nuɣal d izedganen am nețța.
S tideț m'ara ɣ-țṛebbin yețɣiḍ aɣ lḥal lameɛna m'ara tɛeddi teswiɛt-nni, a naf belli d ayen yelhan i tudert-nneɣ.
Sǧehdet ihi iɣallen-nwen yeɛyan akk ț-țgecrar-nwen ifeclen.
Ṛeṣṣit iḍaṛṛen-nwen, ddut deg ubrid n lewqam, iwakken win isquḍuṛen ur iɣelli ara meɛna ad ibedd.
Nadit amek ara tilim di lehna d medden meṛṛa, nadit ɣef ṣṣfa axaṭer win ur neṣfi ara ur izmir ara ad iwali Sidi Ṛebbi.
?adret ad yili gar-awen win ara yeṭṭixṛen ɣef ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi, ara yesɛun lɣecc, a t-yeǧǧ ad yefk ixulaf deg wul-is alamma yuɣal d ugur ara iḍuṛṛen wiyaḍ.
?uṛ-wat ad yili gar-awen win ara ijehlen, ad iffeɣ i iberdan n Ṛebbi am Icaɛu yezzenzen lḥeqq-is n umenzu s uḍebsi n lmakla.
Teẓram mbeɛd, mi gebɣa ad iwṛet lbaṛaka s ɣuṛ baba-s ur yețwaqbel ara ɣas akken yețḥellil-it s imeṭṭawen, ur s-yufi ara abrid amek ara s-ibeddel ṛṛay.
Kunwi ur tqeṛṛbem ara am wegdud n Isṛail ɣer wedrar i gezmer wemdan a t-yennal, i deg tecɛel tmes ; ur twalam ara am nutni asigna d ṭṭlam akk-d țbuciḍant,
ur teslim ara am nutni i ṣṣut n lbuq neɣ i ṛṛɛud n lehḍur-nni armi eɛnan ɣer Ṛebbi ur sen-d-irennu ula d yiwen n wawal.
Axaṭer ur qbilen ara imeslayen-agi : ?as d yiwen si lmal ara d-iqeṛṛben ɣer wedrar-agi, ad immet s weṛjam.
Ayagi d ayen yessexlaɛen armi ula d Sidna Musa yenna : Tekcem-iyi tugdi armi i țergigiɣ.
Lameɛna kunwi tqeṛṛbem ɣer wedrar n Siyun, ɣer temdint n Sidi Ṛebbi bab n tudert, ɣer temdint n Lquds yellan deg igenwan anda llant luluf n lmalayekkat.

Tqeṛṛbem ɣer tejmaɛt n wid yextaṛ Ṛebbi d imezwura yesɛan ismawen-nsen uran deg igenwan. Tqeṛṛbem ɣer Ṛebbi nețța i gḥekkmen ɣef yemdanen meṛṛa, tqeṛṛbem ɣer leṛwaḥ n iḥeqqiyen i gewwḍen ɣer lekmal.
Tqeṛṛbem daɣen ɣer Ɛisa i ɣ-ildin abrid ɣer Ṛebbi s lemɛahda tajdiṭ akk-d idammen-is yuzzlen, yesɛan azal akteṛ n wid n Habil.

?uṛ-wat ihi, smeḥsiset i win i wen-d-ițmeslayen, ur xeddmet ara am wat Isṛail yugin ad semḥessen i win i sen-d-iceggeɛ Sidi Ṛebbi akken a d-uɣalen ɣer webrid, axaṭer ma yella nutni yeɣli-d fell-asen lɛiqab n Ṛebbi amek ara nemneɛ seg-s nukni, m'ur nuɣ ara awal i win i ɣ-d-ițweṣṣin seg igenwan.
Zik-nni, s ṣṣut-is yessenhez lqaɛa, ma ț-țura yefka-d lemɛahda-agi : Tikkelt nniḍen ad senhezzeɣ daɣen mačči kan ddunit meɛna ula d igenwan .
Imeslayen-agi « tikkelt nniḍen daɣen » sbeggnen-d belli ayen yețwaxelqen ad yenhezz ad yenger iwakken a d-yeqqim kan wayen yețdumun.
?ef wannect-agi imi i ɣ-d tețțunefk tgeldit ibedden ɣef lsas iṣeḥḥan a neḥmed a ncekkeṛ Sidi Ṛebbi s weɛbad i s-iɛeǧben, s liman ț-țugdi.
Axaṭer Illu-nneɣ am tmes itețțen.
Kemmlet myeḥmalet wway gar-awen am atmaten,
ur tețțut ara daɣen belli ilaq-awen aț-țesṭreḥbem s ibeṛṛaniyen axaṭer aṭas i gesṭṛeḥben s lmalayekkat mbla ma ẓran.
Xemmemet ihi ɣef yimeḥbas am akken yid-sen i tețwaḥebsem, mmektit-ed wid yenneɛtaben am akken ula d kunwi tenneɛtabem yid-sen.
Ilaq-awen aț-țefkem azal i zzwaǧ, argaz ț-țmeṭṭut-is ur țemyexdaɛen ara axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi ad iɛaqeb wid izennun ileḥḥun deg yir abrid.
Ur țaǧǧat ara iman-nwen a kkun ɣuṛṛen yedrimen, setqenɛet s wayen tesɛam. Sidi Ṛebbi s yiman-is yenna d : U r k-țaǧǧaɣ ara, ad iliɣ yid-ek.
Daymi i nețkel, nezmer a d-nini : Sidi Ṛebbi d amɛawen-inu, ulac ayen ara aggadeɣ ;d acu i gezmer a yi-t-ixdem wemdan ?
Mmektit-ed wid i wen-yemlan abrid, i wen d-ibeccṛen awal n Ṛebbi ; meyzet amek tekfa tudert nsen, sɛut liman am nutni.
Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, d win yellan iḍelli, i gellan ass-a, ara yilin i dayem.
?uṛ-wat aț-tebɛem ddyanat tibeṛṛaniyin ; axaṭer d ul yeččuṛen d ṛṛeḥma i gelhan mačči d win yeččuṛen d leqwanen yeɛnan lmakla ; wid yettabaɛen ayagi ur stenfɛen acemma.
?uṛ-nneɣ adekkan n tmezliwt anda ur zmiren ara lmuqedmin iqeddcen deg uqiḍun n temlilit ad ččen ayen i d yețțunefken d asfel.
Teẓram belli lmuqeddem ameqqran ikeččem ɣer wemkan iqedsen nezzeh, yețțawi yid-es idammen n lmal iwakken a ten iqeddem ɣef ddnub, ma d lǧețțat yesseṛɣay-itent beṛṛa n uqiḍun.
?ef wayagi Sidna Ɛisa daɣen yemmut beṛṛa n temdint iwakken s idammen-is, ad yessizdeg agdud meṛṛa.
A nṛuḥet ihi ɣuṛ-es ɣer beṛṛa, a neqbel a nețwakṛeh am nețța.
Imi dagi di ddunit ur nesɛi ara tamezduɣt n dayem, nețnadi ɣef tmezduɣt n igenwan.
A neḥmed Ṛebbi di mkul lweqt, s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa ; d wagi i d asfel ara s-nqeddem i Sidi Ṛebbi, m'ara nețberriḥ isem-is.
Ur stehzayet ara, xedmet ayen yelhan, țemɛawanet : d wigi i d iseflawen iɛeǧben Sidi Ṛebbi.

Aɣet awal i wid i wen-immalen abrid, ḍuɛet-țen axaṭer țɛassan fell awen, ẓran a d-yas wass deg ara ten-iḥaseb Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef lxedma nsen. Akka ara xedmen ccɣel-nsen akken ilaq s lfeṛḥ mačči s leḥzen neɣ m'ulac ur tseɛɛum ara lfayda.
Deɛɛut ɣer Ṛebbi s lxiṛ fell aneɣ, axaṭer neẓra nesɛa ul yethennan, nḥemmel a neddu akken ilaq di mkul taswiɛt.
Ad ssutreɣ deg-wen aț-țedɛum ɣer Ṛebbi fell-i iwakken ur țɛeṭṭileɣ ara a n-uɣaleɣ ɣuṛ-wen.
Ad ssutreɣ di Sidi Ṛebbi bab n talwit i d-isseḥyan Ssid-nneɣ yellan d Ameksa ameqqran s idammen-is yuzzlen, i ɣef tbedd lemɛahda n dayem,
a kkun-yawi d webrid yelhan, aț-țxedmem kra yellan d lebɣi-s. Ad yexdem deg-neɣ lebɣi-s s yisem n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, nețța yesɛan tamanegt i dayem. Amin.
Ay atmaten, a wen-ssutreɣ aț-țqeblem s ṣṣbeṛ ayagi akk i ɣef kkun-weṣṣaɣ ; atan tabṛaț-agi i wen-uriɣ ț-țamecṭuḥt.
A kkun xebbṛeɣ belli gma-tneɣ Timuti yeffeɣ-ed si lḥebs, ma yella ilḥeq-ed zik, atan a d-nṛuḥ ɣuṛ-wen nekk yid-es.
Sellmet ɣef yimeqqranen akk n tejmaɛt d watmaten meṛṛa. Atan țsellimen-d fell-awen watmaten n ?elyan.
Ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi aț-țili yid-wen meṛṛa.
Nekk Yeɛqub aqeddac n Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, sslam-iw i tnac leɛṛac n wegdud n Sidi Ṛebbi yenwezzaɛen di ddunit meṛṛa !
Ay atmaten, feṛḥet m'ara țɛeddayent fell-awen teswiɛin ujeṛṛeb,
axaṭer teẓram belli ajeṛṛeb n liman nwen yețțawi-d ṣṣbeṛ.
Meɛna ilaq ṣṣbeṛ-nwen a kkun issiweḍ aț-țxedmem lecɣal yelhan iwakken aț-țilim d wid yennekmalen, aț-țǧehdem ur kkun-yețxaṣṣa ula d acemma.
Ma yella yiwen deg-wen ixuṣṣ di lefhama, a ț-yessuter i Sidi Ṛebbi i d-yețțaken i yemdanen meṛṛa mbla cceḥḥa d ulummu, a s-ț-id-yefk.
Lameɛna Ilaq a ț-yessuter s liman mbla ccekk ; axaṭer win yețcukkun icuba ɣer lemwaji n lebḥeṛ i greffed yesrusu waḍu.
Amdan am wagi ɣas ur iṭṭamaɛ ara di Sidi Ṛebbi a s-d-yefk kra,
axaṭer d amdan ur nesɛi ara yiwen n ṛṛay, lecɣal-is ur seḥḥan ara.
Lameɛna igellil ilaq ad ifṛeḥ imi i t-irfed Sidi Ṛebbi ;
ma d ameṛkanti ad ifṛeḥ imi t-id-issers Sidi Ṛebbi axaṭer ad ifnu akken ifennu ujeǧǧig n lexla.
M'ara d-yali yiṭij s leḥmu-ines yesseṛɣayen, imɣi ad iqqaṛ, ajeǧǧig-is ad iɣli, ccbaḥa-ines a s-tṛuḥ. Akka ara tedṛu d umeṛkanti , ad iṛuḥ a d-yeǧǧ deffir-es wayen akk yesɛa.
D aseɛdi wemdan i gteṭṭfen deg ujeṛṛeb ur iɣelli ara ; axaṭer m'ara iɛeddi seg ujeṛṛeb, a s-d-tețțunefk tɛeṣṣabt n tudert i gewɛed Sidi Ṛebbi i wid i t-iḥemmlen.
M'ara tețwaɣuṛṛem, ɣuṛ-wat aț-ținim : d Ṛebbi i ɣ-iɣuṛṛen axaṭer Ṛebbi ur yezmir ara a t-iɣuṛṛ wemcum yerna Nețța s yiman-is ur yețɣuṛṛu ula yiwen.
Lameɛna yal yiwen deg-nneɣ yețɛedday deg ujeṛṛeb axaṭer d ccehwat n tnefsit-nneɣ i ɣ-ițɣuṛṛun.
Lebɣi n tnefsit yețțawi-d ddnub, ddnub mi gețwaxdem, yețțawi-d lmut.
Ay atmaten-iw eɛzizen ur ɣellṭet ara deg wayagi :
kra n tikci yelhan tețțas-ed seg igenwan, s ɣuṛ baba Ṛebbi i d-ixelqen tafat n igenwan, win akken ur nețbeddil, ur nețɣab am yiṭij iwakken a d-yeǧǧ ṭṭlam.
Yehwa-yas a ɣ-d-yefk tudert s wawal-is n tideț, iwakken a nili d imezwura deg wayen akk i d-yexleq.
Ay atmaten-iw eɛzizen, teẓram belli yal yiwen deg-wen ilaq ad yesmeḥsis, ur ilaq ara ad ireffu neɣ ad yețḥawal ameslay ;
axaṭer amdan ireffun ur ixeddem ara ayen yellan d lḥeqq ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.
Daymi i glaq aț-țḍeggṛem seg ulawen-nwen ayen akk ur nzeddig ara, d wayen yellan d cceṛ deg-wen ; meɛna qeblet s wannuz awal i geẓẓan deg-wen i gzemren ad isellek lerwaḥ nwen.
Mačči d asmeḥses kan n wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi i ɣer tella, lameɛna sbeggnet-ț-id di lecɣal-nwen ; neɣ m'ulac ț-țikellax kan i tețkellixem iman-nwen.
Axaṭer win yesmeḥsisen i wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi ur t-yexdim ara, icuba ɣer wemdan yețwalin udem-is di lemri akken yella.
Mi gwala iman-is, iṛuḥ, yețțu imiren kan amek akken i gella.

Ma d win yețmeyyizen akken ilaq ccariɛa iṣeḥḥan, ccariɛa i d yețțaken tilelli, iteṭṭfen deg-s mačči s usmeḥses kan ad yuɣal a ț-yețțu, meɛna ixeddem ayen i d-tenna, wagi ad yili d aseɛdi di lecɣal-is meṛṛa.
Ma yella win iḥesben iman-is yetbeɛ abrid n Sidi Ṛebbi yili ur yețțaṭṭaf ara iles-is, yesseɣlaḍ deg iman-is, abrid-agi i gewwi ur iṣeḥḥa ara.
Atan webrid iṣeḥḥan yellan ț-țideț zdat Sidi Ṛebbi baba-tneɣ : d m'ara terzum ɣef igujilen ț-țuǧǧal m'ara ilin di lmeḥna, d uḥader n yiman-nwen ɣef wayen n diri ara d-yekken si ddunit.
Ay atmaten, ur xeddmet ara lxilaf ger watmaten, d ayen ur nlaq ara ad yili ɣer wid yețțamnen s Ssid-nneɣ ameqqran, Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Yezmer lḥal a d-kecmen ɣer tejmaɛt-nwen sin yemdanen, yiwen d ameṛkanti yelsa llebsa ifazen yeqqen taxatemt n ddheb, wayeḍ d igellil llebsa-ines tcerreg ;

ma yella tuzzlem ɣer umeṛkanti-nni yelsan llebsa ifazen tefkam-as lqima tennam-as : eyya-d aț-țeqqimeḍ dagi, d amkan n lɛali ; ma d igellil-nni tennam-as : kečč bedd kan dagi neɣ qqim-ed dagi ɣer iḍaṛṛen-nneɣ.
Ma yella akka, atan txeddmem lxilaf wway gar-awen, eɛni mačči d lbaṭel i d itekken seg yir ixemmimen-nwen ?
Ay atmaten-iw eɛzizen, ḥesset-ed : Sidi Ṛebbi yextaṛ igellilen n ddunit agi iwakken a ten-yerr d imeṛkantiyen di liman, yerna ad weṛten tagelda i gweɛɛed i wid akk i t-iḥemmlen.
Ma d kunwi tḥeqṛem igellil ! Tqudṛem imeṛkantiyen, wid i kkun yeṭṭalamen i kkun-yeẓẓuɣuṛen ɣer yexxamen n ccṛeɛ.
D nutni daɣen i greggmen isem eɛzizen s wayes i tneddhem ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ma yella txeddmem ayen i d-tenna ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi : ?emmel wiyaḍ am yiman-ik, d ayen yelhan i txedmem.
Meɛna ma yella txeddmem lxilaf ger yemdanen, tdenbem yerna ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi teḥkem fell-awen axaṭer tɛuṣam-ț.
Ma yella win i gteddun deg webrid n ccariɛa, ixulef ulamma d yiwen si lumuṛat-is, ihi yerẓa akk lumuṛat n ccariɛa.
Win i d-yennan : Ur zennu ara, yenna-d daɣen : Ur tneqqeḍ ara tamgeṛṭ. Ihi ma yella ur tezniḍ ara meɛna tenɣiḍ tamgerṭ, atan teṛẓiḍ ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ilaq aț-țeẓrem belli Sidi Ṛebbi a kkun-iḥaseb s ccariɛa-ines yețțaken tilelli ɣef kra n wayen i tețmeslayem d wayen i txeddmem ;
Sidi Ṛebbi ur yețḥunnu ara ɣef win ur nețḥunnu ɣef wiyaḍ meɛna win yețḥunnun ɣef wiyaḍ, ur yețțagad ara ass n lḥisab.
Ay atmaten, d acu n lfayda ara yesɛu wemdan ma yenna-d umneɣ s Ṛebbi, m'ur t-id-isbeggen ara s lecɣal-is ? Eɛni liman am wagi a t-isellek ?
Yezmer lḥal ad yili yiwen seg watmaten neɣ si tyessetmatin xuṣṣen di llebsa, lluẓen ur sɛin ara ayen ara ččen ;
ma yella yiwen deg-wen yenna-yasen kan : « qqimet di lehna, sseḥmut teččem aț-țeṛwum » yili nețța ur sen-yefki ara ayen ḥwaǧen, d acu n lfayda yellan deg imeslayen-agi ?
Liman ɣer Ṛebbi akka i gella : ma yella ur t-id-sbeggnen ara lecɣal nwen, liman-agi yemmut
Meɛna ma yenna walebɛaḍ : kečč tesɛiḍ liman ma d nekk xeddmeɣ lecɣal ; nekk a s-rreɣ i wagi : sken-iyi-d liman-inek mbla lecɣal, nekk a k-ed ssekneɣ liman-iw s lecɣal-iw yelhan.
Tumneḍ belli yiwen n Ṛebbi kan i gellan ? d ayen yelhan ; ula d ccwaṭen umnen yis yerna țergigin seg-s.
Teggumam aț-țfehmem ay imdanen ! Ilaq aț-țeẓrem belli liman mbla lecɣal n lɛali, ur infiɛ ara.
Mmektit-ed Ibṛahim baba-tneɣ yețwaḥesben d aḥeqqi ɣef ddemma n lecɣal-is m'akken i d-iddem mmi-s Isḥaq a t-yezlu d asfel i Sidi Ṛebbi.
Twalam belli liman-is d lecɣal is ddukklen, s lecɣal-is i gennekmal liman-is.
Akka i gedṛa wayen d-nnant tira iqedsen fell-as : Ibṛahim yesɛa liman di Ṛebbi, daymi yenneḥsab d aḥeqqi ; yețțusemma d aḥbib n Ṛebbi.
Twalam ihi ! Amdan yețban-ed d aḥeqqi zdat Sidi Ṛebbi s lecɣal yelhan mačči kan s liman-is.

Ula d Raḥab yellan d yir tameṭṭut, tețwaḥseb ț-țaḥeqqit zdat Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef ddemma n ccɣel-nni n lɛali i texdem asm'akken i tesṭerḥeb s yemceggɛen n at Isṛail mi sen-temla abrid nniḍen ara yawin iwakken ad ṛuḥen.
Lǧețța ur nesɛi ara Ṛṛuḥ, temmut, akken daɣen, liman ur nesɛi ara lecɣal yelhan yemmut.
Ay atmaten-iw, ur țnadit ara aț-țuɣalem meṛṛa d wid yesselmaden, axaṭer teẓram belli d nukni s wid yesselmaden, ara yețțuḥasben akteṛ n wiyaḍ,
axaṭer nɣelleḍ meṛṛa, yal yiwen deg-nneɣ amek i gɣelleḍ. Win ur nɣelleḍ ara deg umeslay-is d amdan ikemlen, ula d lǧețța-s yezmer ad iḥkem deg-s.
Ma yella nerra aleggam deg yimi n uɛewdiw iwakken a ɣ-yaɣ awal, lǧețța-ines meṛṛa txeddem akken nebɣa.
Walit daɣen lbabuṛ, ɣas d ameqqran, yețsuḍu deg-s waḍu iǧehden, meɛna s yiwen ujeggu d ameẓyan, lqebṭan-ines issedduy-it ɣer wanda yebɣa.
Akken daɣen ula d iles ; ɣas mecṭuḥ deg yiman-is, yețzuxxu s lecɣal imeqqranen. Walit times tamecṭuḥt i gzemren aț-țesseṛɣ tiẓgi tameqqrant.
Iles daɣen ț-țimes, d bab n lbaṭel, yesɛa amkan di lǧețța-nneɣ yerna yessamas akk taṛwiḥt-nneɣ, yesseṛɣay akk tudert-nneɣ s tmes n ǧahennama i seg d-yuɣ aẓar.
Amdan yezmer ad iḥeṛṛeb yal ṣṣenf n lewḥuc : ama d wid iteddun ɣef ṛebɛa iḍaṛṛen, ama d ifṛax, ama d izerman ama d lewḥuc n lebḥeṛ yerna ț-țideț iɣleb-iten meṛṛa.
Ma d iles, ulac amdan i gzemren a t-yeɣleb. Yeččuṛ d ssem ineqqen ; d lehlak ur nesɛi ddwa.
Yis i nḥemmed Sidi Ṛebbi baba tneɣ, yis daɣen i nenneɛɛel imdanen i d-ixleq Sidi Ṛebbi ɣer ccbiha-s.
Seg yimi-agi i d-țeffɣent ddeɛwat n lxiṛ d nneɛlat. Ay atmaten-iw, ur ilaq ara ad yili wakka.
Eɛni yezmer yiwen n lɛinseṛ a d-yefk aman ḥlawen akk-d wid ṛẓagen ?
Ay atmaten-iw, ulac taneqleț ara d-yefken azemmur, neɣ tara ara d-yefken tibexsisin, lɛinseṛ meṛṛiɣen ur yezmir ara a d-yefk aman yelhan.
Ma yella yiwen deg-wen yefhem yetɛeqqel, ilaq a t-id-isbeggen s tikli-ines yelhan akk-d lecɣal i gxeddem s tmusni d wannuz.
Meɛna ma yella ul-nwen yeččuṛ ț-țismin tirẓaganin yerna tebɣam a d-tekkem sennig wiyaḍ ; ur xeddmet ara ccan i yiman-nwen, ur skiddibet ara, ur nekkṛet ara tideț.
Lefhama am tagi ur d-tekki ara s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi meɛna d lefhama n ddunit akk-d yemdanen, tekka-d daɣen s ɣuṛ Cciṭan.
Axaṭer anda llant tismin d wemḥizwer, yella ussexṛeb d mkul ccɣel n diri yellan.
Lefhama n bab igenwan uqbel kullec teṣfa, ț-țamhennit, ț-țuṛẓint, teččuṛ d leḥnana akk-d lecɣal yelhan, ur tesɛi timrurit ur tesɛi sin wudmawen.
Imawlan n lehna țeẓẓun s lehna ayen i d-issemɣayen ayen yellan d lḥeqq ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.
Seg uxemmem i tețxemmimem ɣef yiman-nwen kan i d-itekk umennuɣ akk-d imenɣi gar-awen.

Tețmennim aṭas leḥwayeǧ lameɛna ur tezmirem ara tent-tesɛum ; tneqqem, tețțasmem ur d-tețțawim ayen tebɣam ; tețnaɣem yerna tețțemyenɣam, ur kkun-id-ițțaweḍ ara wayen tebɣam axaṭer ur tessuturem ara ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.
M'ara tessutrem kra ur a wen-d- țunefk ara, axaṭer ur tessutrem ara akken ilaq, tessutrem kan wayen yellan d nnfeɛ-nwen.
Ay at leɛṛuṛ ! Ur teẓrim ara belli win iḥemmlen ddunit yekṛeh Sidi Ṛebbi ? Ihi, win iḥemmlen ddunit-agi d aɛdaw n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Tɣilem ayen akken yuran di tira iqedsen ur yesɛi ara lqima : belli Sidi Ṛebbi iḥemmel Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i d-iceggeɛ ad izdeɣ deg-wen armi yețțasem seg win ara iṭṭfen amkan-is ?
Lameɛna Sidi Ṛebbi yețțak-ed ṛṛeḥma tameqqrant, akken yura di tira iqedsen : S idi Ṛebbi ur iqebbel ara wid yessemɣaṛen iman-nsen meɛna yețțak-ed ṛṛeḥma-s i wid yessanazen iman-nsen.
Ihi ḍuɛet Sidi Ṛebbi, ur țaǧǧat ara Cciṭan a kkun-yeɣleb dɣa ad yerwel fell-awen.
Qeṛṛbet ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi, nețța a d-iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-wen. Ssizdeget ifassen-nwen ay imednuben, ṣṣfut ulawen-nwen, ay at sin udmawen.
Walit lɣelṭat-nwen, meǧdet, ilaq taḍsa-nwen aț-țuɣal d imeṭṭi, lfeṛḥ nwen ad yuɣal d leḥzen.
Anzet i Sidi Ṛebbi, nețța a kkun yerfed.

Ay atmaten, ur kkatet ara wa deg wa, win ara yewten di gma-s neɣ iḥuseb-it, yewwet-ed di ccariɛa yerna iḥuseb-iț. Ihi ma yella tewtem di ccariɛa, ur tellim ara seg wid ixeddmen wayen i d-tenna, meɛna seg wid yekkaten deg-s.
Kečč yețḥasaben gma-k d acu i tḥesbeḍ iman-ik ? D Sidi Ṛebbi kan i gețḥasaben i d-yefkan ccariɛa, d nețța kan i gețselliken i gețțaǧan i lmut.
Slet-ed tura kunwi i geqqaṛen : ass-a neɣ azekka a nṛuḥ ɣer temdint ihina, a neqqim aseggas, a netjaṛ iwakken a d-nerbeh idrimen !
Kunwi ur neẓri ara d acu ara wen-yedṛun azekka ! Kunwi yecban tagut i d-ițalin tɣelli !
Meɛna ilaq aț-țeqqaṛem : ma yebɣa Sidi Ṛebbi, a nɛic am akka, ma yebɣa daɣen, a nexdem aya neɣ aya.
Meɛna kunwi tesɛam ixemmimen n zzux deg ulawen-nwen. Kra yellan d zzux am wagi diri-t.
Ma yella win yessnen ad ixdem ayen yelhan ur t-yexdim ara, yedneb.
Slet-ed tura ula d kunwi ay imeṛkantiyen : meǧdet ɣef ddemma n txeṣṣarin ara d-yeɣlin fell-awen !
Cci-nwen yerka, llebsa-nwen tečča-ț tumeṭ !
Ddheb d lfeṭṭa-nwen ṣeddeḍen ; d ṣḍiḍ-nsen ara icehden fell-awen, ara kkun-iččen am tmes. Tjemmɛem cci deg ussan-agi ineggura n ddunit !
Teččam lḥeqq n wid imegren igran-nwen, slet-asen i wigi ițcetkin ɣef lbaṭel-nwen, Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n tezmert yesla-d i leɛyaḍ-nsen.
Ddunit-nwen tesɛeddam-ț di lxiṛ, txedmem ayen akk mennan wulawen nwen ; tṛebbam tassemt i wass aneggaru.
Tḥekmem, tenɣam iḥeqqiyen yerna ur kkun-xuṣmen ara.
Ay atmaten, ṣebṛet ihi alamma d asm' ara d-yuɣal Ssid-nneɣ. Walit amek i gețṛaǧu ufellaḥ lɣella n wakal-is, iṣebbeṛ alamma yewwet-ed ugeffur n lexṛif ț-țefsut.
Ula d kunwi ṣebṛet, sǧehdet iman nwen, axaṭer tuɣalin n Ssid-nneɣ teqṛeb-ed.
Ur țemcetkayet ara wway gar-awen iwakken ur kkun-ițḥasab ara Sidi Ṛebbi ; axaṭer Bab n lḥisab, ibedd-ed ɣer tewwurt !
Ay atmaten-iw, mmektit-ed lenbiya i d-iceggeɛ Sidi Ṛebbi tecbum-d ṣṣbeṛ akk-d liman i sɛan di teswiɛin n leɛtab.
