Ihi amarezg n wid yeṭṭfen ur fcilen ara. Teslam ayen i d-qqaṛen ɣef ṣṣbeṛ n Sidna Yub, yerna twalam daɣen d acu i geqsed Sidi Ṛebbi a s-t-id-yefk, axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi yeččuṛ d leḥnana akk-d ṛṛeḥma.
Ay atmaten-iw, ur țgallat s igenni, ur țgallat s lqaɛa neɣ s wayen nniḍen, meɛna init kan ih neɣ ala, iwakken ur kkun-ițḥasab ara Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ma yella yenneɛtab yiwen deg-wen, ad yedɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi. Ma yella win yellan di lfeṛḥ, ad yeḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi s ccnawi.
Ma yella yiwen deg-wen yehlek, ad issiwel i imeqqranen n tejmaɛt, ad dɛun ɣer Ṛebbi fell-as, ad dehnen aqeṛṛuy-is s zzit s yisem n Sidi Ṛebbi ;
ma yella dɛan ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi s liman, țeklen fell-as, amuḍin-nni ad yețțusellek ; Sidi Ṛebbi a t-yesseḥlu yerna a s-isemmeḥ ddnubat-is.
?emqiṛit ddnubat-nwen wway gar-awen, wa ad yedɛu i wa s lxiṛ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken aț-țeḥlum. Ddeɛwat n win yellan d aḥeqqi zdat Sidi Ṛebbi, sɛant tazmert tameqqrant.
Nnbi Ilyas yella d argaz am nukni : meɛna mi gessuter ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi s wul-is iwakken ur d-tɣelli ara lehwa, ur d-teɣli ara tlata iseggasen d sețța waguren
Yessuter daɣen a d-teɣli lehwa dɣa teɣli-d, lqaɛa tefka-d leṛẓaq-is.
Ay atmaten-iw, ma yella yiwen deg-wen iɛṛeq-as webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi, yerra-t-id wayeḍ ɣer webrid,
ilaq aț-țeẓrem belli win ara d-yerren yiwen umednub ɣer webrid, isellek-it-id si lmut yerna aṭas si ddnubat-is ara yețțusemḥen.
Nekk Buṭrus, amceggeɛ n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, i yeɣṛiben ițɛicin di tmurt n Galasya, n Kafadusya, n Asya, n Bitinya akk-d wid yellan di tmurt n tqenṭert.

Akken i t-iqsed Baba Ṛebbi, tețwaxtaṛem si tazwara s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen iwakken aț-țḍuɛem Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, a kkun-iṣfu s idammen-is yuzzlen. Ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a wen-d tețțunefkent s tugeț.
Ad ițțubarek Ṛebbi, Baba-s n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i ɣ-d-ifkan s ṛṛeḥma-ines tudert tajḍiṭ s ḥeggu n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ si ger lmegtin, s wakka i nesɛa asirem ameqqran,
iwakken a newṛet ayen ur nrekku, ur nețțames, ur nfennu. D annect-agi i kkun-ițṛaǧun deg igenwan kunwi yumnen yis.
Sidi Ṛebbi ițḥadar fell-awen s tezmert-is alamma iban-ed leslak nwen di taggara.
D ayagi i kkun-issefṛaḥen ɣas akken tura sseḥzanent-kkun teswiɛin agi deg ilaq a d-tɛeddim seg ujeṛṛeb.

D uguren-agi ara d-isbeggnen lǧehd n liman-nwen i gesɛan azal akteṛ n ddheb ; ɣas akken ddheb-agi ifennu, ilaq-as ad iɛeddi di tmes iwakken ad iṣfu. Akken daɣen ula d liman-nwen ilaq ad ițțujeṛṛeb ; s wakka a wen-yili d sebba n ccan, n ucekkeṛ, akk-d tmanegt asm'ara d-yuɣal Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Tḥemmlem-t mbla ma twalam-t, tumnem yis ɣas akken ar tura ur t-teẓrim ara. Daymi lfeṛḥ-nwen d ameqqran armi ur tezmirem ara a t-id-tesfehmem s imeslayen.
Axaṭeṛ lfayda n liman-nwen, d leslak n teṛwiḥin-nwen.

Lenbiya caren-d ɣef wayen yeɛnan leslak i wen-d-ihegga Sidi Ṛebbi. Meyzen, qellben a d-afen lawan d wamek ara d-idṛu wayen i d-ixebbeṛ Ṛṛuḥ n Lmasiḥ yellan deg-sen ; axaṭer d Ṛṛuḥ-agi n Lmasiḥ i d-ixebbṛen ɣef wayen ara inneɛtab Lmasiḥ akk-d tmanegt ara d-yasen deffir leɛtab-agi.

Ițțubeggen-asen-d belli mačči i nutni, meɛna i kunwi i d-xebbṛen ayagi. D ayen i wen-d-xebbṛen tura wid ițbecciṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ, s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i d-ițțucegɛen seg igenni. Ula d lmalayekkat bɣant ad walint annect-agi.
Daymi, sǧehdet leɛqel-nwen, ur ɣefflet ara, ɛasset iman-nwen, sɛut asirem iṣeḥḥan di leslak ara wen d-ițțunefken asm' ara d-yuɣal Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Ilit am arrac ițțaɣen awal, ur xeddmet ara ayen akk i txeddmem asm' akken werɛad i kkun-tekcim tmusni,
meɛna ilit teṣfam di tikli-nwen am akken iṣfa Sidi Ṛebbi i wen-d issawlen.
Imi yura : Ilit teṣfam axaṭer nekk ṣfiɣ.

Ma tnedhem ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi am akken d Baba-twen, sbeggnet-ed di tudert-nwen belli tḍuɛem-t s leqdeṛ ameqqran, deg wussan i wen-d iqqimen di ddunit-agi ; nețța ur nxeddem lxilaf ger yemdanen, yețḥasaben yal yiwen s wakken llan lecɣal-is.
Teẓram belli mačči s idrimen neɣ s ddheb neɣ s lfeṭṭa ur nețdum ara i tețwacafɛem si yir tikli i wen-d-ǧǧan lejdud-nwen,
meɛna s idammen ɣlayen n Lmasiḥ, i gefkan iman-is d asfel am izimer ur nesɛi lɛib, ur nesɛi ccama.
Ihegga-t-id Sidi Ṛebbi uqbel a d-texleq ddunit, meɛna armi d ussan-agi ineggura i t-id-isbeggen ɣef ddemma-nwen.
Imi yis i tesɛam liman ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi i t-id-isseḥyan si ger lmegtin, i s-ifkan tamanegt tameqqrant, iwakken lsas n usirem-nwen akk-d liman-nwen ad ilin di Sidi Ṛebbi.
Imi tessazdgem ulawen-nwen, teddam di tideț, akken aț-țḥemmlem seg wul atmaten-nwen, myeḥmalet ihi wway gar-awen s wul yeṣfan
axaṭer tɛawdem-d talalit ɣer tudert tajḍiṭ. Talalit-agi mačči seg wemdan ițmețțaten i d-tekka, meɛna seg wawal n tudert ițdumun n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Akken yella di tira iqedsen : Amdan am leḥcic, + ccan-is meṛṛa am ujeǧǧig n lexla,+ leḥcic ițɣaṛ, ajeǧǧig iɣelli,+
ma d awal n Sidi Ṛebbi+ ițdumu i dayem+ . Awal-agi, d awal n lexbaṛ n lxiṛ i wen-d-ițțubecṛen.
Kkset seg ulawen-nwen cceṛ, tiḥila, tismin ; ur seɛɛut ara sin wudmawen, ur țmeslayet ara ayen n diri ɣef wiyaḍ.
Am llufan illuẓen ayefki n yemma-s, nadit ula d kunwi aț-țeṛwum awal n Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken aț-țimɣuṛem, aț-tețțuselkem,
ma yella tjeṛbem acḥal yelha Sidi Ṛebbi !
Qeṛṛbet ɣuṛ-es nețța yellan d-azṛu nni yeddren i ḍeggṛen yemdanen, meɛna Sidi Ṛebbi ixtaṛ-it, axaṭer azal-is meqqeṛ.

Ula d kunwi yellan am izṛa yeddren, dduklet iwakken ad ibedd wexxam i deg ara izdeɣ Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi. Aț-țilim ț-țajmaɛt n lmuqedmin ara iqeddmen s yisem n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, iseflawen iqedsen ara iɛeǧben i Sidi Ṛebbi.
Axaṭer atan wayen yuran di tira iqedsen : Xtaṛeɣ-ed azṛu+ yesɛan azal d ameqqran+ , sserseɣ-t deg udrar n Siyun,+ d nețța i geṭṭfen lebni,+ win ara yamnen yis ur ineddem ara.+
Amarezg-nwen kunwi yumnen yis. Ma d wid ur numin ara : Adɣaɣ-nni ḍeggṛen wid ibennun,+ d nețța i guɣalen d azṛu alemmas,+ Win yeṭṭfen lebni. +
D wagi i d azṛu + i guɣalen d ugur i yemdanen, + d azṛu i ten-isseɣlayen+ . Imi ugin ad amnen s wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi, ayen i ten-ițṛaǧun d ugur-agi ara ten-iɣeḍlen.

Kunwi d arraw n laṣel ițwaxtaṛen, d lmuqedmin n ugellid, d lǧens iṣfan, d agdud i d-ițwacefɛen. Tețwaxtaṛem iwakken aț-țbecṛem lecɣal yelhan n Sidi Ṛebbi, i kkun-id issufɣen si ṭṭlam yewwi-kkun-id ɣer tafat-is isteɛǧiben.
Zik-nni ur tewwiḍem ara ula d lǧens, ma ț-țura tuɣalem d agdud n Sidi Ṛebbi ; tellam zik-nni ur tesɛim ara ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi ma ț-țura tețțunefk-awen-d.
A wid eɛzizen ! Kunwi yellan d ibeṛṛaniyen, d imsebriden di ddunit a kkun-nhuɣ aț-țettixṛem i lebɣi n tnefsit i gețnaɣen d ṛṛuḥ-nwen.
Sɛut tikli ilhan ger wid ur nessin ara Sidi Ṛebbi, iwakken ɣas a d-skidben fell-awen, neɣ xedmen awen cceṛ ; m' ara walin lecɣal-nwen ilhan ad ḥemden Sidi Ṛebbi asm' ara d-yerzu ɣuṛ-sen.
Ɣef ddemma n Sidi Ṛebbi qadṛet wid iḥekmen. Qadṛet agellid imi d nețța i gḥekmen,
qadṛet ineɣlafen-is imi d nețța i ten-isbedden iwakken ad ɛaqben imcumen, ad cekkṛen wid i gțeddun s lḥeqq.
Xedmet ayen yelhan iwakken aț-țerrem takmamt i imejhal ur nefhim ; d wagi i d lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ilit d ilelliyen, meɛna ur ssexdamet ara tilelli-nwen iwakken aț-țɣummem cceṛ i txeddmem, ilit d iqeddacen n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Qadṛet imdanen meṛṛa ; ḥemmlet atmaten nwen, ḍuɛet Sidi Ṛebbi, qadṛet agellid.
Ay iqeddacen ! Ilaq aț-qadṛem imɛellmen nwen, aɣet-asen awal ama i wid ilhan ḥninen, ama i wid iweɛṛen.
D ayen ilhan i win iṣebbṛen m' ara iɛeddi fell-as lbaṭel ilmend n ṭṭaɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ma tețwaɛaqbem imi txedmem kra n diri, ma tṣebṛem i wannect-agi, anwa ara kkun-icekkṛen ? Meɛna ma iɛedda fell-awen lbaṭel, mi txedmem ayen yelhan, tṣebṛem, d ayen yelhan ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ɣer wannect-agi i wen-d-issawel Sidi Ṛebbi, axaṭer Lmasiḥ s yiman-is inneɛtab fell-awen, iǧǧa-yawen-d lemtel iwakken aț țeddum di lateṛ-is.
Nețța ur nednib, leɛmeṛ ur d-iffiɣ lekdeb seg imi-s.
Nețța ițwaregmen ur d-yerri rregmat, qehṛen-t ur d-irfid afus-is ɣer yiwen ; lameɛna yerra kullec ger ifassen n win i gḥekmen s lḥeqq.

Nețța i gɛebban ddnubat-nneɣ, ițwasemmeṛ ɣef wumidag iwakken a nili am wid yemmuten ɣef wayen yeɛnan ddnub axaṭer ddnub ur isɛi ara tazmert ɣef wid immuten. S wakka, tura ur nețɛici ara di ddnub meɛna di lḥeqq, akken yura : Di leǧruḥ-is i tufam ḥellu. +
Zik tellam am ulli iɛeṛqen, ma ț-țura, tuɣalem ɣer umeksa ițɛassan ɣef teṛwiḥin-nwen.
Kunemti daɣen a tilawin ḍuɛemt irgazen-nkunt, iwakken ɣas ma llan kra n yergazen ur uminen ara s wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi, s tikli ilhan n tilawin-nsen,
ad amnen mbla imeslayen m' ara walin tikli-nsent teṣfa, tesɛa leqdeṛ.
Ur țzewwiqemt ara iman-nkunt s ufella kan, ama s ddheb, neɣ s llebsa ifazen, neɣ s wemcaḍ n ucekkuɛ nkunt,
meɛna ccbaḥa-nkunt ilaq aț-țili deg wulawen-nkunt ; axaṭer ayen yesɛan azal ameqqran ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi : ț-țezdeg n wul, lehna d leḥnana, imi ayagi d ayen ițdumun.
Akka i țcebbiḥent iman-nsent tilawin iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi, yețqadaṛen irgazen-nsent ;
am Saṛa iḍuɛen argaz-is Ibṛahim, tessawal-as « A Sidi. » Aț-țuɣalemt d yessi-s ma txeddmemt ayen yelhan mbla tugdi.

Ma d kunwi ay irgazen, ḥadret tilawin-nwen imi teẓram ur ǧhident ara am kunwi. Ilaq a tent-tqadṛem axaṭer nutenti daɣen ad weṛtent yid-wen ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi ; s wakka ur d-ițili ara ẓẓeṛb i tẓallit-nwen.
Ihi sɛut akk yiwet n lɛeqliya, myeḥmalet wway gar-awen. Sɛut tagmaț, iḥninet, ddut s wannuz.
Ur țțarat ara țțaṛ, ur țarrat ara rregmat i wid i kkun-iregmen ; meɛna ddɛut s lxiṛ i wiyaḍ axaṭer d annect-agi i gețṛaǧu deg-wen Sidi Ṛebbi, iwakken aț-țweṛtem lbaṛaka-ines.
Win iḥemmlen tudert, + ibɣan ad yili d aseɛdi deg ussan-is :+ + + Ad iḥader iles-is ɣef wayen n diri+ d yimi-s seg yimeslayen ițɣuṛṛun+ .
Ad issebɛed iman-is ɣef cceṛ, + ad ixeddem ayen yelhan,+ ad ițnadi amek ara yili dayem di talwit,+ +
axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi ṛeṣṣant wallen-is ɣef yiḥeqqiyen, + + isell-ed i tiɣṛi-nsen ; + meɛna ițeffer udem-is + ɣef wid ixeddmen cceṛ.
Anwa ara wen-ibɣun cceṛ ma yella tḥemmlem aț-țxedmem anagar ayen yelhan ?
Yerna ma yella tețwaḍelmem ɣef lḥeqq, feṛḥet ! Ur țțagadet ara imdanen, ur tḥeyyiṛet ara.
Ɛuzzet deg ulawen-nwen Lmasiḥ yellan d Ssid-nwen. Ilit dayem twejdem aț-țǧawbem s leɛqel d leqdeṛ i kra n wid i kkun-id-isteqsan ɣef wusirem nwen di Sidi Ṛebbi, iwakken ad ithedden wul-nwen ;
imiren wid i d-iskiddiben ɣef tikli-nwen ilhan deg ubrid n Lmasiḥ, ad nneḥcamen.
Axiṛ aț-țenṭaṛṛem ma txedmem ayen yelhan di lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi, wala aț-țenṭaṛṛem ma txedmem ayen n diri.

Lmasiḥ s yiman-is immut ; s lmut-agi-ines i gefra tamsalt n ddnub n yemdanen. Nețța yellan d aḥeqqi, immut ɣef ddemma n imednuben meṛṛa iwakken a kkun-yawi ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi. Nɣan lgețța-s meɛna yuɣal-ed ɣer tudert s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.
S tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i gṛuḥ ad ibecceṛ i leṛwaḥ ițwaḥebsen,
yugin ad amnen, asm' akken i ten-ițṛaǧu Sidi Ṛebbi s ṣṣbeṛ akken a d-uɣalen ɣer webrid-is ; asmi i gexdem Sidna Nuḥ lbabuṛ i ɣer kecmen anagar tmanya yemdanen i gmenɛen si lḥemla n waman.

Aman-agi, d lemtel n weɣḍas i kkun-ițselliken ass-a ula d kunwi. Aɣḍas-agi n waman mačči d ayen i gessizdigen lǧețța n wemdan, lameɛna ițbeggin-ed belli nefka tudert-nneɣ i Sidi Ṛebbi s wul yeṣfan. Ayagi yezmer a d-yedṛu i lmend n ḥeggu n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ
i gulin ɣer igenni, yeṭṭef amkan n lḥekma ɣer tama tayeffust n Sidi Ṛebbi, sennig n lmalayekkat, sennig n tezmar d lḥekmat meṛṛa.
Am akken inneɛtab Lmasiḥ di lǧețța-s, kunwi daɣen ilaq-awen aț-țheggim iman-nwen ; axaṭer win i genneɛtaben di lǧețța-s iṭṭaxeṛ ɣef ddnub ;
iwakken ussan i s-d-iqqimen di tudert-is, ad iddu s lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi, mačči akken ibɣa nețța.
Beṛka-kkun tura ! Tellam tețțeddum d wid ijehlen, ur nessin Sidi Ṛebbi : tellam d isekṛanen, tețțeddum deg webrid n lefsad d zzhu, tɛebdem lemqamat, ulawen nwen ččuṛen d ṭṭmeɛ.
Tura wehmen imi teṭṭaxṛem fell-asen ur tețțeddum ara deg webrid nsen i gețțawin ɣer nnger, daymi i kkaten deg-wen.
Lameɛna a ten-iḥaseb Sidi Ṛebbi, nețța yețḥasaben wid iddren d wid yemmuten.
S wakka, lexbaṛ n lxiṛ ițțubecceṛ ula i wid yemmuten iwakken ɣas țțuḥasben am imdanen n ddunit meṛṛa, ad idiren s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen akken ibɣa Sidi Ṛebbi.
Taggara n ddunit tețțeddu-d ! Ɣef wannect-a, sɛut leɛqel, ɛasset ɣef yiman-nwen iwakken aț-țizmirem aț-țeẓẓallem.
Lḥaǧa tamezwarut, myeḥmalet wway gar-awen seg wul, axaṭer leḥmala tețsamaḥ aṭas n ddnubat.
Țmesṭerḥabet wway gar-awen s wul iṣfan.
Mkul yiwen deg-wen d acu n tikci i s-d-ifka Sidi Ṛebbi, ihi sxedmet-eț iwakken ad sfaydin wiyaḍ seg-s.

Win i wumi i d-yețțunefk ad ihḍeṛ, ilaq ad ihḍeṛ s imeslayen i s-d-ițțasen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi. Akken daɣen ma yella wayeḍ ițțunefk-as-ed ad iqdec, ad iqdec ɣef wiyaḍ s tezmert i s-d-ifka Sidi Ṛebbi. Iwakken di yal ccɣel, ad ițwaḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi s yisem n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, bab n tezmert ț-țmanegt si lǧil ɣer lǧil. Amin !
A wid eɛzizen ! Ur wehhmet ara ɣef wujeṛṛeb i d-iɣellin fell-awen am tmes, ur xellɛet ara, axaṭer ayagi ilaq a d-idṛu.
Lameɛna feṛḥet imi i tețțekkim di leɛtab n Lmasiḥ, axaṭer asm' ara d-tban tmanegt-is, aț-țfeṛḥem yid-es lfeṛḥ d ameqqran.
Amarezg-nwen ma yella iɛedda fell-awen lbaṭel imi tumnem s Lmasiḥ ! Axaṭer Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen iččuṛen ț-țamanegt, Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi yella deg-wen !
Ḥadret a d-yili gar-awen win ara ițwaqehṛen axaṭer yenɣa tamgeṛṭ neɣ yuker, neɣ iger iman-is di lecɣal n wiyaḍ ;
lameɛna ma yella ițwaqheṛ imi yumen s Lmasiḥ, ur ilaq ara ad inneḥcam ; ilaq ad iḥmed Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef yisem-agi.
Yewweḍ-ed lweqt n lḥisab n Sidi Ṛebbi ; yerna ad ibdu seg wat wexxam-is. Ihi ma yella seg-neɣ ara ibdu lḥisab, amek ara tili taggara n wid ur numin ara s lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi ?
Ma yella iwɛeṛ-as i uḥeqqi iwakken ad ițwasellek, amek ara tedṛu ihi d wemcum ur numin ara s Sidi Ṛebbi ?
Ma yella s lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi i genneɛtab yiwen ; ilaq ad yerr kullec ger ifassen n win i t-id-ixelqen, ad ițkel fell-as, ad ikemmel di lecɣal-is ilhan.
Ad nhuɣ tura imeqqranen di liman yellan gar-awen. Nekk yellan d ameqqran am nutni, nekk iḥedṛen i leɛtab n Lmasiḥ, ițekkan di tmanegt-is ara d-ibanen ; a ten weṣṣiɣ :
Ḥadret wid i wen-d-iwekkel Sidi Ṛebbi akken ițḥadar umeksa ɣef qeḍɛit-is ; lhit ihi yid-sen s lebɣi-nwen, mačči sennig n wulawen-nwen, xedmet ayagi ɣef wudem n Sidi Ṛebbi mačči s ṭṭmeɛ.
Ur ssimɣuṛet ara iman-nwen ɣef wid i wen-d-iwekkel Sidi Ṛebbi, meɛna ilit d lemtel ara tebɛen.
Imiren asm' ara d-iban win yellan sennig imeqqranen meṛṛa, a wen d-tețțunefk tɛeṣṣabt n tmanegt ur nfennu.
Ula d kunwi daɣen ay ilmeẓyen, qadṛet imeqqranen di liman ! Ddut s leqdeṛ d wannuz, axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi ur iqebbel ara wid ițzuxxun, meɛna ițțak ṛṛeḥma-s i wid ițțanzen.
Anzet ihi seddaw ufus iǧehden n Sidi Ṛebbi, iwakken a kkun-irfed di teswiɛt ilaqen.
Rret akk iɣeblan-nwen ger ifassen-is, axaṭer ițḥebbiṛ fell-awen.
Ḥadret, Ɛasset iman-nwen axaṭer aɛdaw-nwen d Cciṭan, ițezzi iṛeɛɛed am yizem, ițqellib anwa ara issebleɛ.
Ur s-țaǧǧat ara abrid, sɛut liman iǧehden ; axaṭer teẓram belli atmaten nwen di ddunit meṛṛa, akka i tdeṛṛu yid-sen am kunwi.

M'ara tenneɛtabem kra n wussan, Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n mkul ṛṛeḥma i kkun-ixtaṛen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ iwakken aț-țilim di tmanegt-is ițdumun, a kkun-iheggi, a kkun iseggem, a kkun-isseǧhed, iwakken ur tɣellim ara.
I nețța lḥekma si lǧil ɣer lǧil. Amin !
S ufus n gma-tneɣ eɛzizen Silwan i ɣef nețkel, i wen-d-uriɣ kra n imeslayen-agi iwakken a kkun-nhuɣ yerna ad cehdeɣ belli ț-țagi i d ṛṛeḥma n tideț n Sidi Ṛebbi s wayes tumnem.
Tajmaɛt n watmaten yumnen s Lmasiḥ, yellan di temdint n Babilun țsellimen-d fell-awen ; ula d mmi Maṛqus ițsellim fell-awen.
Msalamet wway gar-awen am atmaten ; talwit a d-ters fell-awen kunwi yumnen s Lmasiḥ.
Nekk Semɛun Buṭrus, d aqeddac, d amceggeɛ n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, i wid akk yesɛan liman am nukni, s lḥeqq n Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ akk-d umsellek nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a wen-d tețțunefkent s tugeț, s tmusni n Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa.
Tazmert n Sidi Ṛebbi tefka yaɣ-ed ayen akk ilaqen i tudert d ṭṭaɛa ; yis i ɣ-d-isbeggen win akken i ɣ-ixtaṛen s ṛṛeḥma-s ț-țmanegt-is.

Yis-sent daɣen i ɣ-d-tețțunefkent lemɛahdat yesɛan azal d ameqqran, iwakken s tmanegt-agi-ines akk-d ṛṛeḥma-s, aț-țekkim di lecɣal n Sidi Ṛebbi, aț-țbeɛdem ɣef ṭṭmeɛ ițțawin ɣer lefsad n ddunit.
Ɣef ayagi, ǧehdet, ẓewṛet iwakken aț-țernum i liman-nwen tikli yeṣfan, i tikli yeṣfan tamusni ;
i tmusni rnut ḥekmet deg yiman nwen, ṣebṛet, i ṣṣbeṛ rnut ṭṭaɛa,
i ṭṭaɛa tagmaț, i tegmaț leḥmala.
Ma yella wannect-agi deg-wen s tugeț, ur tețțilim ara d imeɛdazen, yerna ur tețɣimim ara mbla tamusni n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Ma d win ixuṣṣen deg wannect-agi, am uderɣal isferfuden, ur ițwali ara, ițțu akk ddnubat-is iɛeddan i s-isemmeḥ Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ay atmaten, ẓewṛet, sǧehdet iman-nwen deg wannect-agi imi d Sidi Ṛebbi i wen-d-issawlen, d nețța i kkun-ixtaṛen. Ma txedmem ayagi, ur tɣellim ara.
S wakka daɣen ara wen-teldi tewwurt iwakken aț-țkecmem ɣer tgeldit ițdumun n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, amsellek-nneɣ.
A wen-d-țɛawadeɣ dayem annect-agi meṛṛa ɣas akken tesnem tideț-agi yerna teṭṭfem deg-s.
Skud mazal-iyi ddreɣ, ilaq-iyi a kkun-nhuɣ iwakken ur tɣeflem ara.
Axaṭer ẓriɣ belli qṛib ad ṛuḥeɣ si ddunit-agi, am akken i yi-d-ixebbeṛ Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ;
daymi i xeddmeɣ ayen iwumi zemreɣ iwakken ɣas mmuteɣ, a d-temmektim ayen akk i wen slemdeɣ.
Mačči ț-țimucuha i wen-d newwi mi i wen-d-neḥka ɣef tezmert n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ț-țuɣalin-is, meɛna s wallen-nneɣ i nwala tamanegt-is.
Nella yid-es asm' akken i s-d isbeggen Baba Ṛebbi ccan ț-țezmert, asm' akken i d-inṭeq Bab n tmanegt s imeslayen-agi : Wagi d Mmi eɛzizen deg-s i gella lfeṛḥ-iw.
Sṣut-agi i d-ikkan seg igenni, nesla-yas s yiman-nneɣ mi nella yid-es deg udrar iqedsen,

yerna numen s wayen i ɣ-d xebbṛen lenbiya di tira iqedsen belli ț-țideț ; nenha-kkun aț-țerrem ddehn nwen ɣuṛ-sent, axaṭer ț-țaftilt iceɛlen di ṭṭlam alamma yuli wass, alamma ifeǧǧeǧ yitri n ṣṣbeḥ deg ulawen nwen.
Uqbel kullec, ẓret belli imeslayen akk i d-nnan lenbiya, yuran di tektabt iqedsen, ur d-kkin ara s ɣuṛ-sen ;
axaṭeṛ ulac ayen i d-xebbṛen s tmusni-nsen nutni, meɛna s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i d-nnan imeslayen i d-ikkan s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi.

Si zik llan lenbiya n lekdeb ger lɣaci, akken daɣen ara d-kkren gar-awen wid ara kkun-iɣuṛṛen s uselmed-nsen. A d-skecmen tamusni-nsen n lekdeb d usexṛeb, ad nekṛen ula d amsellek i ten-id-icufɛen ; s wakka ara d-sseɣlin ɣef yiman-nsen tawaɣit ur bnin fell-as.
Ɣas akken ffɣen i webrid, aṭas ara ten-iḍefṛen, ɣef ddemma-nsen ara ițwargem webrid n tideț ;
a ten-yawi ṭṭmeɛ, a wen kellxen s imeslayen n lekdeb ; meɛna nnger-nsen ur ițɛeṭṭil ara, tawaɣit tețṛaǧu-ten.
Teẓram belli Sidi Ṛebbi ur iḥunn ara ɣef lmalayekkat yeffɣen i webrid, meɛna iḍeggeṛ-iten ɣer tesraft lqayen n ṭṭlam anda țwaqnent, țṛaǧunt lḥisab.

Ur iḥunn ara daɣen ɣef yemdanen n zzman aqdim asm' akken i sen-d iceggeɛ lḥemla n waman i lɣaci amcum ; issemneɛ seg-sen anagar Sidna Nuḥ ițbecciṛen lḥeqq n Sidi Ṛebbi, akk-d sebɛa n yemdanen yid-es.
Iɛuqeb timdinin n Sudum d Gumuṛ, issenger-itent, isxeḍ-itent s tmes, yerra-tent d iɣed ; ifka-d ayagi d lemtel i yemcumen iwakken ad ẓren d acu i ten-ițṛaǧun.
Issemneɛ anagar Luṭ yellan d aḥeqqi, yemmuɣbnen ɣef yir lecɣal n lɣaci amcum yellan di zzman-is.
Argaz-agi aḥeqqi ițɛicin gar-asen, itețț-it wul-is ɣef ayen i gsell d wayen țwalint wallen-is yal ass, ɣef yir tikli nsen d yir lecɣal-nsen.
S wakka Sidi Ṛebbi yeẓra amek ara isellek di teswiɛin iweɛṛen imdanen i gțeklen fell-as ; ma d imcumen a ten-yerr ɣer rrif i lɛiqab i d-iteddun ass n lḥisab.
Ad iɛaqeb widak-nni i gxeddmen lefsad, ițnadin anagar lebɣi n tnefsit-nsen, imi ur țțaken ara lqima i lhiba n Sidi Ṛebbi. Ur țqadaṛen ara, qebbḥen, ur uggaden ara ad regmen ula d lmalayekkat.
Ma d lmalayekkat yesɛan lqeḍra ț-țezmert sennig wid yesselmaden lekdeb, ur sen-țarrant ara rregmat zdat Sidi Ṛebbi.
Meɛna imdanen-agi țɛicin am lmal n lexla, lhan kan i ṣṣyada, ur țxemmimen ara, reggmen ayen ur ssinen ; ad ɣlin di tesraft n ddnubat nsen, ad mmuṛdsen akken ițmuṛdus lmal.

D lbaṭel zerɛen ara d-megren, țțafen lfeṛḥ-nsen mi xeddmen ɛinani lebɣi n tnefsit-nsen. Sčuṛen d lɛib akk-d lḥecma, yerna m' ara qqimen yid-wen ɣer lmakla, ur țsetḥin ara s lehduṛ-nsen d ukellex-nsen.
Sṭamaɛen anagar yir tilawin iwakken ad znun yid-sent ; ur ɛeggun ara di ddnubat i xeddmen, țɣuṛṛun imdanen ur neǧhid ara di liman, ččuṛen d ṭṭmeɛ, ț-țarwa n deɛwessu.
Sǧan abrid n lewqam, ɛeṛqen mi tebɛen abrid i gewwi Belɛam mmi-s n Biɛuṛ i gḥemmlen ad yerbeḥ idrimen s lexdeɛ.
Lameɛna iḥeccem-it Sidi Ṛebbi, mi d-issenṭeq ɣuṛ-es taɣyult tagugamt s ṣṣut n wemdan ; s wakka i t-iḥbes, iwakken ur ițkemmil ara di yir ccɣel-is.
Imdanen-agi am tliwa iqquṛen, am usigna y
Axiṛ-asen i yemdanen-agi lemmer ur ssinen ara abrid n lḥeqq, wala imi i t-ssnen uɣalen ṭṭaxṛen i lameṛ iqedsen i sen-d-ițțucegɛen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi.
Yedṛa yid-sen am akken yella di lemtul : Ițțuɣal weqjun ɣer iriran-is ; qqaṛen daɣen : Ilef iwumi ssarden, yuɣal imiren kan ad ixnunes deg waluḍ.
Ay iḥbiben, ațah tebṛaț-iw tis snat i wen-d-uriɣ. Di snat yid-sent nudaɣ amek ara d-ssakiɣ di leɛqel nwen ixemmimen iṣfan s uselmed-agi i wen-d-smektaɣ.
Bɣiɣ a d temmektim imeslayen i d-nnan lenbiya iqedsen akk-d lameṛ n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ amsellek nneɣ, i wen-slemden yakan imceggɛen n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Tazwara, ilaq aț-țeẓrem belli deg ussan ineggura a d-kkren yemdanen ara iɛicen s lebɣi n tnefsit-nsen, yerna ad tmesxiṛen fell-awen ;
a wen-d-qqaṛen : anaɣ yenna-yawen a d-uɣaleɣ, ihi anda yella tura ? Lejdud-nneɣ ɛeddan mmuten, ulac ayen i gbeddlen seg wasmi i d-texleq ddunit.
Țțun belli di zzman aqdim asmi i d-ixleq Sidi Ṛebbi igenwan d lqaɛa ; s wawal-is i d-issufeɣ lqaɛa seg waman ;
S wawal-is daɣen i gessenger ddunit s lḥemla n waman.
Ula d igenwan d lqaɛa n tura s wawal-is daɣen i ten-ihegga iwakken a ten-issenger s tmes ass n lḥisab asm' ara iɛaqeb wid ur nḍuɛ ara Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ay iɛzizen ! Ɣuṛ-wat aț-țețțum ayagi : ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi alef n iseggasen am yiwen wass, yiwen wass am alef n iseggasen.

Sidi Ṛebbi ur ițɛeṭṭil ara ad ixdem ayen i d-yenna ; ɣas akken kra n yemdanen ɣilen iɛeṭṭel ; meɛna nețța d ṣṣbeṛ i wen-iṣebbeṛ iwakken ur inegger ula yiwen deg-wen, yebɣa a d-tuɣalem akk ɣer ubrid-is.
Ass n Sidi Ṛebbi a d-yas akken i d-ițțas umakar. Igenwan ad negren s yiwen zzhir d ameqqran, ayen yellan deg igenwan a t-tečč tmes, lqaɛa d wayen i ț-iɛemmṛen ad fnun.
Imi ayagi meṛṛa ad ifnu, acḥal i wen-ilaq aț-țḍuɛem Sidi Ṛebbi, aț-țeṣfum di tikli-nwen !
Aṛǧut, xedmet lmeǧhud-nwen iwakken a d-yeɛjel wass n Sidi Ṛebbi. Ass-nni i deg ara tekker tmes deg igenwan, i deg ara yefsi kra n wayen yellan deg-sen.
Meɛna nețṛaǧu am akken i ɣ-t-id-iɛuhed Sidi Ṛebbi : Igenwan d lqaɛa imaynuten ( ijdiden ), i deg ara izdeɣ lḥeqq.
Daymi ay iɛzizen, deg uṛaǧu-agi tețṛaǧum ḥeṛset iman-nwen iwakken a kkun-id-yaf di lehna, zeddigit, mbla lɛib.
Ḥṣut belli ṣṣbeṛ ameqqran n Sidi Ṛebbi, d leslak-nwen ! Am akken i wen-t-id-yura gma-tneɣ eɛzizen Bulus s tmusni i s-d-ițțunefken.

D ayen i wen-d-iqqaṛ daɣen di mkul tabṛaț i deg i d-immeslay ɣef temsalin-agi. Llan deg-sent imeslayen iweɛṛen i lefhama, daymi imdanen ur neǧhid ara di liman, ixuṣṣen di lefhama, sseɛwajen lmeɛna-nsen akken i sseɛwajen ula ț-țira nniḍen, ayagi xeddmen-t i nnger-nsen.
A wid eɛzizen, kunwi yeslan s wannect-agi meṛṛa, ḥadret ɣef yiman-nwen, ɣuṛ-wat a kkun-ɣuṛṛen yemcumen ur numin ara s Sidi Ṛebbi, a kkun-sbeɛden ɣef ubrid-is i deg teṭṭfem.
Lameɛna nnernit di tmusni d ṛṛeḥma n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, Amsellek-nneɣ. I nețța tamanegt am ass-a am ussan i d-iteddun i dayem. Amin !
Ɣef wayen yeɛnan win yellan d awal n tudert, i gellan si tazwara : nesla-yas yerna neẓra-t s wallen-nneɣ, nnulent ifassen-nneɣ yerna nerra ddehn-nneɣ ɣuṛ-es.
Tudert tban-ed, nwala-ț, nețcehhid fell-as, yerna nețbecciṛ-awen-d tudert n dayem yellan ɣer tama n Sidi Ṛebbi, tura tban-aɣ-ed.
Ayen nwala d wayen nesla nxebbeṛ-awen-t-id, iwakken ula d kunwi aț-țekkim di tdukkli-nneɣ, akken nella nukni d Baba-tneɣ Ṛebbi akk-d Mmi-s, Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Uriɣ-awen ayagi iwakken lfeṛḥ nneɣ ad innekmal.
Ayen nesla s ɣuṛ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ newwi-yawen-t-id : Sidi Ṛebbi ț-țafat, ur yelli ara deg-s ṭṭlam.
Ma neqqaṛ deg webrid n Ṛebbi i nella yili mazal-aɣ nteddu di ṭṭlam, neskaddeb nexḍa i webrid n tideț.
Meɛna ma yella nteddu di tafat am akken i gella nețța di tafat, ad ddukklen wulawen-nneɣ, yerna ddnubat-nneɣ ad iriden s idammen n Mmi-s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
Ma neqqaṛ ur yelli deg-nneɣ ddnub, atan neskaddeb ɣef yiman-nneɣ, tideț ur telli deg-nneɣ.
Meɛna ma nețqiṛṛi s ddnubat-nneɣ i Sidi Ṛebbi, nețța yellan d aḥeqqi, nezmer a nețkel fell-as a ɣ-isameḥ ddnubat-nneɣ, a ɣ-isellek si lbaṭel.
Ma neqqaṛ mačči d imednuben i nella, nerra Sidi Ṛebbi d akeddab, awal-is ur yelli ara deg-nneɣ.
Ay arraw-iw imeẓyanen, uriɣ awen ayagi iwakken aț-țexḍum i ddnub, meɛna ma yeɣli yiwen di ddnub, nesɛa win yețḥuddun fell-aɣ ɣer Baba Ṛebbi, d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yellan d aḥeqqi.
Mačči ɣef ddemma n ddnubat nneɣ kan i gefka iman-is d asfel meɛna ula ɣef ddemma n ddnubat n yemdanen n ddunit meṛṛa.
Ihi ma nețțaɣ awal i Sidi Ṛebbi yerna nḥerrez lumuṛat-is, d ayagi ara d-isbeggnen belli nessen-it.
Win ara yinin : ssneɣ Ṛebbi yili ur yeṭṭif ara di lumuṛat-is, d akeddab, ulac deg-s tideț.
Ma d win yețțaɣen awal-is, iḥemmel Sidi Ṛebbi seg-wul-is. S wakka ara d-iban belli d ayla n Sidi Ṛebbi i nella.
Win ara yinin ṭṭfeɣ di Sidi Ṛebbi, ilaq ad ilḥu am akken yelḥa Lmasiḥ.
A wid eɛzizen, di tebṛaț-agi mačči d lameṛ ajdid i wen-d-wwiɣ, meɛna d lexbaṛ-nni i kkun-id-iwḍen si tazwara ; lameṛ-agi d awal-nni i wumi teslam yakan.
Meɛna zemreɣ a d-iniɣ belli lameṛ-agi d ajdid. Tideț-agi tban-ed di Lmasiḥ, tban-ed daɣen deg-wen ; imi ṭṭlam ițwexxiṛ, tafat n tideț tfeǧǧeǧ yakan.
Win yeqqaṛen leḥḥuɣ di tafat, yili nețța yekṛeh gma-s, mazal-it di ṭṭlam.
Win iḥemmlen gma-s, di tafat i gețțili, ur yelli ara deg-s wayen ara t-isseɣlin.
Ma d win ikeṛhen gma-s, di ṭṭlam i gella ; iteddu di ṭṭlam ur yeẓri anda ileḥḥu, axaṭer ṭṭlam isderɣel-as allen.
Uriɣ-awen ayagi ay ilmeẓyen imi i wen-țwaɛfan ddnubat-nwen ɣef ddemma n yisem-is.
Uriɣ-awen ay ibabaten, axaṭer tesnem win yellan si tazwara. Uriɣ-awen ay ilmeẓyen, axaṭer tɣelbem amcum. Akken i wen-d-nniɣ yakan ay ilmeẓyen, uriɣ-awen axaṭer tesnem Baba Ṛebbi.
Uriɣ-awen ay ibabaten, axaṭer tesnem win yellan si tazwara. Uriɣ-awen ay ilmeẓyen, axaṭer tǧehdem, awal n Sidi Ṛebbi yezdeɣ deg-wen yerna tɣelbem amcum.
Ur ḥemmlet ara ddunit d wayen yellan deg-s. Ma yella walebɛaḍ ihemmel ddunit, leḥmala n baba Ṛebbi ur telli ara deg-s ;
axaṭer ayen akk yellan di ddunit, lebɣi n tnefsit, ṭṭmeɛ di kra n wayen i gɛeǧben i wallen akk-d zzux i d ițekken si cci n ddunit, mačči s ɣuṛ Baba Ṛebbi i d-kkan lameɛna si ddunit.
Ddunit d wayen yellan deg-s ad iɛeddi, kullec ad ikfu ; ma d win ixeddmen lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi ad yidir i dayem.
Ay arrac imeẓyanen, ț-țaswiɛt taneggarut ; am akken teslam belli aɛdaw n Lmasiḥ iteddu-d, atan tura aṭas n yeɛdawen n Lmasiḥ i d-ibanen ; s wakka ara neɛqel belli d lweqt aneggaru.
Sṭaxṛen fell-aɣ axaṭer ur llin ara seg-neɣ ; lemmer llin seg-neɣ, tili qqimen yid-nneɣ ; ṭṭaxṛen fell-aneɣ iwakken a d-iban belli ur llin ara seg-neɣ.
Ma d kunwi, yesmar-ed fell awen Lmasiḥ Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, yerna tessnem akk tideț.
Uriɣ-awen mačči imi ur tessinem ara tideț, lameɛna imi ț-tesnem axaṭer ulac lekdeb i d itekken si tideț.
Anwa i d akeddab anagar win inekkṛen belli Ɛisa d Lmasiḥ. Aɛdaw n Lmasiḥ, d winna i gnekkṛen Baba Ṛebbi akk-d Mmi-s.
Win ara inekṛen Mmi-s n Ṛebbi yenkeṛ daɣen Baba Ṛebbi, ma d win iqeblen Mmi-s n Ṛebbi yeqbel Baba Ṛebbi.
Ma d kunwi, ayen teslam si tazwara ilaq aț-țeṭṭfem deg-s ; ma yella tjemɛem-t deg ulawen-nwen, ula d kunwi aț-țilim di tdukkli akk-d Baba Ṛebbi d Mmi-s.
Atan lweɛd i ɣ-d-ifka Lmasiḥ : ț-țudert yețdumun.
Uriɣ-awen ayagi ɣef wid yețnadin a kkun-ɣuṛṛen.

Ma d kunwi, Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i d-yesmar fell-awen Lmasiḥ yezga deg-wen, ur teḥwaǧem ara win ara kkun-islemden ; axaṭer d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i d-immaren fell-awen i kkun-isselmaden. Ayen i wen-yesselmad ț-țideț, ur yeskiddib ara. Sṭfet ihi di Lmasiḥ am akken i wen-t-isselmed Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.
Ihi tura ay arrac imeẓyanen ṭṭfet di Lmasiḥ iwakken asm'ara d-iban a nesɛu lețkal, ur nțeffer ara fell-as si lḥecma ass n tuɣalin-is.
Imi teẓram belli Lmasiḥ d aḥeqqi, ilaq aț-țeẓrem daɣen kra n win ixeddmen lḥeqq s ɣuṛ-es i d-ikka.
Walit acḥal i ɣ-iḥemmel Baba Ṛebbi, armi nețțusemma d arraw-is ! yerna ț-țideț d arraw-is i nella. Ddunit ur aɣ-teɛqil ara d arraw n Ṛebbi imi ur tessin ara Sidi Ṛebbi.
A wid eɛzizen, aql-aɣ tura d arraw n Ṛebbi, ayen akken ara nuɣal werɛad i d-yedṛi, lameɛna neẓra belli m'ara d-yedṛu, a nili am nețța, axaṭer a t-nwali akken yella.
Kra n win yessaramen deg-s ad yeṣfu akken yeṣfa Lmasiḥ.
Kra n win idenben yerẓa ccariɛa n Sidi Ṛebbi, axaṭer ddnub ț-țaṛuẓi n ccariɛa.
Teẓram belli Lmasiḥ yusa-d iwakken ad ikkes ddnub nețța ur nesɛi ddnub.
Kra n win yeṭṭfen deg-s ixeṭṭu i ddnub ; kra n win yețɛicin di ddnub ur t-iwala ur t-yessin.
Ay arrac imeẓyanen, ɣuṛ-wat win ara kkun-iɣuṛṛen. Win iteddun s lḥeqq d aḥeqqi akken yella Sidna Ɛisa d aḥeqqi.
Win yețɛicin di ddnub yedda d Cciṭan, axaṭer d nețța i d amednub amezwaru. Ɣef ddemma n wayagi i d-yusa Mmi-s n Ṛebbi iwakken ad yessenger lecɣal n Cciṭan.
Kra n wid yellan d arraw n Ṛebbi ur țɛicin ara di ddnub, axaṭer tudert i d-itekken s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi tella deg-sen ; ur zmiren ara ad ɛicen di ddnub imi s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi i d-ɛawden talalit.
Atah wayen i d-ițbegginen lxilaf yellan ger warraw n Sidi Ṛebbi d wid n Cciṭan : kra n win ur nteddu ara s lḥeqq neɣ ur nḥemmel ara gma-s ur yelli ara si tarwa n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Atan lameṛ i wumi teslam si tazwara : ilaq a nemyeḥmal wway gar-aneɣ.
Mačči am Kahin yellan d amcum yenɣa gma-s, yezla-t axaṭer nețța lecɣal-is diri-ten, ma d gma-s iteddu s lḥeqq. f+
Ur wehhmet ara ay atmaten ma yella keṛhen-kkun wat ddunit.
Nukni nɛedda-d si lmut ɣer tudert axaṭer nḥemmel atmaten. Win ur nḥemmel ara, mazal-it di lmut.
Kra n win ikeṛhen gma-s d aqettal, yerna teẓram belli win ineqqen, ulac deg-s tudert n dayem.
Leḥmala n tideț, nessen-iț s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yefkan tudert-is fell-aneɣ. Ilaq-aɣ ula d nukni, a nefk tudert nneɣ ɣef watmaten-nneɣ.
Ma yella walebɛaḍ yesɛan cci, iwala gma-s di lexṣaṣ ur d-iḥunn ara fell-as, amek ara tezdeɣ leḥmala n Sidi Ṛebbi deg wul-is.
Ay arrac imeẓyanen, ur ḥemmlet ara s wawal kan d yiles aẓidan, lameɛna leḥmala n tideț a d-tban s lecɣal-nwen.
S wakka ara nẓer belli di tideț i nella, yerna ad yethedden wul-nneɣ zdat Sidi Ṛebbi,
ɣas yesseḍlem-aɣ wul-nneɣ : Sidi Ṛebbi sennig wul nneɣ i gella yerna yeẓra kullec.
A wid eɛzizen, ma yella ur aɣ-isseḍlem ara wul-nneɣ, nesɛa lețkal zdat Sidi Ṛebbi.
Kra n wayen ara nessuter, ițțak-aɣ-t-id axaṭer neḥrez lumuṛat-is yerna nxeddem lebɣi-s.
Atan wayen i ɣ-d-yumeṛ : a namen s yisem n Mmi-s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yerna a nemyeḥmal wway gar-aneɣ am akken yella di lameṛ i ɣ-d-yefka. f+
Win yețțaṭṭafen di Sidi Ṛebbi, iḥerzen lumuṛat-is, Sidi Ṛebbi yețțili deg wul-is ; yerna a neɛqel belli Sidi Ṛebbi yella deg ul-nneɣ s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i ɣ-d-yefka.

A wid eɛzizen, ḥadret iman-nwen ɣef kra n win ara wen-d-yinin heddṛeɣ s Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi, lameɛna jeṛṛbet-țen iwakken aț-țeẓrem ma yella s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi i d-kkan axaṭer, aṭas n lenbiya n lekdeb i gellan di ddunit.
Atan wamek ara tɛeqlem ma yella yiwen yesɛa Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi : kra n win ara icehden belli Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yusa-d ɣer ddunit s ṣṣifa n wemdan, s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi i d-yusa.
Ma d win ara inekkṛen ayagi ɣef Sidna Ɛisa, mačči s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi i d-yekka lameɛna yekka-d si Ṛṛuḥ n weɛdaw n Lmasiḥ i ɣef teslam a d-yas ɣer ddunit, atan tura yella yakan di ddunit.
Kunwi ay arrac imeẓyanen, d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi i tellam, tɣelbem wid yesselmaden lekdeb, axaṭer Ṛṛuḥ yellan deg-wen yugar win yellan di ddunit.
Nutni n ddunit, daymi i țmeslayen s lɛeqliya n wat ddunit, yerna at ddunit smeḥsisen-asen.
Nukni d ayla n Sidi Ṛebbi ; win yebɣan ad yissin Sidi Ṛebbi yesmeḥsis-aɣ-d ; win ur nelli ara n Sidi Ṛebbi ur a ɣ-d-ismeḥsis ara : s wakka ara neɛqel Ṛṛuḥ n tideț akk-d Ṛṛuḥ n lekdeb.
A wid eɛzizen, ilaq a nemyeḥmal wway gar-aneɣ axaṭer Sidi Ṛebbi s yiman-is, d leḥmala ; kra n wid yesɛan leḥmala deg ulawen-nsen, d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi i llan yerna ssnen Sidi Ṛebbi.
Kra n win ur nesɛi ara leḥmala deg wul-is ur yessin ara Sidi Ṛebbi, axaṭer leḥmala s ɣuṛ-es i d-tekk.
Atah wamek i d-isban Sidi Ṛebbi belli iḥemmel-aɣ : Sidi Ṛebbi iceggeɛ-ed Mmi-s awḥid ɣer ddunit iwakken yis a nesɛu tudert.
Ațah d acu i d leḥmala : mačči d nukni i gḥemmlen Sidi Ṛebbi lameɛna d nețța i ɣ-iḥemmlen armi i d iceggeɛ Mmi-s ad yefk iman-is d asfel i leɛfu n ddnubat-nneɣ.
A wid eɛzizen, ma yella Sidi Ṛebbi iḥemmel-aɣ annect-agi, ilaq ula d nukni a nemyeḥmal wway gar-aneɣ.
Ulac win iwalan Sidi Ṛebbi s wallen-is, meɛna ma yella nemyeḥmal wway gar-aneɣ, Baba Ṛebbi yețțili deg-nneɣ, leḥmala-s tețban-ed deg-nneɣ.
Atah wamek ara neɛqel nukni nețțili deg-s nețța yețțili deg-nneɣ : imi i ɣ-d-yefka Ṛṛuḥ-ines.
Nukni s yiman-nneɣ netɛeǧǧeb deg-s, daymi nezmer a d-neched belli Baba-tneɣ Ṛebbi iceggeɛ-ed Mmi-s, i leslak n ddunit.
Kra n win ara icehden belli Ɛisa d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi, Ṛebbi ad yețțili deg wul-is, nețța ad iṭṭef di Sidi Ṛebbi.
Nukni nessen leḥmala i ɣ-iḥemmel Sidi Ṛebbi, yerna numen yis. Sidi Ṛebbi, d leḥmala ; win yesɛan leḥmala deg wul-is yeṭṭef di Sidi Ṛebbi, Sidi Ṛebbi yezdeɣ deg ul-is.
Ma yella tennekmal leḥmala deg ulawen-nneɣ, a nesɛu lețkal i wass n lḥisab, axaṭer ayen yețɛeddin fell-aɣ di ddunit-a, d ayen yesɛedda Lmasiḥ s yiman-is.
Win yesɛan leḥmala n tideț ur t-tkeččem ara tugdi ; leḥmala n tideț tessufuɣ tugdi, axaṭer tugdi tețțas-ed si lxuf n lɛiqab, win yețɛicin di tugdi werɛad yessaweḍ ɣer leḥmala n tideț.
Ma d nukni, nḥemmel Sidi Ṛebbi axaṭer d nețța i ɣ-iḥemmlen d amezwaru.
Kra n win yeqqaṛen : ḥemmleɣ Sidi Ṛebbi yili yekṛeh gma-s, d akeddab, axaṭer win ur nḥemmel ara gma-s i gețwali, ur izmir ara ad iḥemmel Sidi Ṛebbi ur yețwali ara.
Atan ihi lameṛ i ɣ-d-iǧǧa Lmasiḥ : win iḥemmlen Sidi Ṛebbi ad iḥemmel daɣen gma-s. f+
Kra n wid yumnen belli d Ɛisa i d Lmasiḥ, uɣalen d arraw n Ṛebbi ; daɣen wid iḥemmlen Baba Ṛebbi, ḥemmlen ula d arraw-is.
Atah wamek ara nẓer belli nḥemmel arraw n Ṛebbi : ma nḥemmel Sidi Ṛebbi yerna nxeddem lumuṛat-is.
Axaṭer ma nḥemmel Sidi Ṛebbi ilaq a neḥrez lumuṛat-is ; lumuṛat-is ur ẓẓayit ara,
axaṭer arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi ɣelben ddunit, ayen s wacu i neɣleb ddunit, d liman-nneɣ di Sidna Ɛisa.
Anwa i gɣelben ddunit ? D wid yumnen belli Ɛisa d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi.

Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, d win akken i d-yusan ɣer ddunit s waman d idammen, mačči kan s waman n weɣḍas-is lameɛna s waman akk-d idammen-is yuzzlen mi gemmut fell-aneɣ ; yerna d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i d-icehden fell-as axaṭer Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, d Ṛṛuḥ n tideț.
Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, aman d idammen, di tlata yid-sen beggnen-d tideț-agi.
Ma yella cchada n yemdanen tețwaqbel, cchada n Sidi Ṛebbi tugar tin n yemdanen ; axaṭer d Sidi Ṛebbi s yiman-is i d-icehden ɣef Mmi-s.
Win yumnen s Mmi-s n Ṛebbi, yesɛa țbut deg wul-is, ma d win ur numin ara, yerra Sidi Ṛebbi d akeddab imi ur yumin ara s wayen i d-iched Ṛebbi ɣef Mmi-s.
Cchada-yagi ț-țudert n dayem i ɣ-d-yefka Sidi Ṛebbi, tudert-agi di Mmi-s i tella.
Win yumnen s Mmi-s n Ṛebbi yesɛa tudert ; win ur numin ara s Mmi-s n Ṛebbi ur yesɛi ara tudert.
Ayagi uriɣ-awen-t-id iwakken aț-țeẓrem belli tesɛam tudert n ṣṣeḥ yețdumun, kunwi yumnen s Mmi-s n Ṛebbi.
Tura atah lețkal i nesɛa ɣuṛ-es : ma nessuter-as kra yellan di lebɣi-s, yețḥessis-aɣ-d ;
ma yella neẓra belli yețḥessis-aɣ-d, kra n wayen ara s nessuter, neḥsa belli yewweḍ-aɣ-d.

Ma yella win yeẓran gma-s yedneb yili ddnub-is ur yețțawi ara ɣer lmut, ilaq ad yedɛu ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi, nețța a s-d-yefk tudert ; nniɣ-ed ayagi ɣef wid ixeddmen ddnub ur nețțawi ara ɣer lmut. Yella ddnub yețțawin ɣer lmut lameɛna mačči ɣef wid ixeddmen ddnub-agi i wen-d-nniɣ aț-țedɛum.
Kra yellan d lbaṭel, d ddnub, meɛna llan ddnubat ur nețțawi ara ɣer lmut.
Neẓra belli kra n wid yellan d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi ur țɛicin ara di ddnub ; meɛna Mmi-s n Ṛebbi yețɛassa fell-asen yerna Cciṭan ur yezmir ara a ten-yennal.
Neẓra belli d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi i nella, ma d ddunit teɣli ger ifassen n wemcum.

Neẓra daɣen Mmi-s n Ṛebbi yusa-d ɣer ddunit yefka-yaɣ-d lefhama s wayes ara nissin Ṛebbi n țideț. Deg-s i neṭṭef s yisem n Mmi-s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ; d nețța i d Ṛebbi n ṣṣeḥ, i ț-țudert yețdumun.
Ay ilmeẓyen, ḥadret aț-țɛebdem iṛebbiten n lekdeb.
Nekk yellan d ameqqran n tejmaɛt, i Kirya i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d warraw-is i ḥemmleɣ s tideț. Mačči d nekk kan i kkun iḥemmlen, meɛna ula d wid akk yesnen tideț ;
ɣef ddemma n tideț yellan deg-nneɣ ara yeqqimen deg-nneɣ i dayem.
Ssmaḥ, ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a ɣ-d țțunefken s ɣuṛ Baba Ṛebbi d Mmi-s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, iwakken a nɛic di tideț akk-d leḥmala.
Acḥal feṛḥeɣ imi ufiɣ kra seg warraw-im teddun deg webrid n tideț, akken i ɣ-t-id-yumeṛ Baba Ṛebbi.
Ihi tura a tajmaɛt n Kirya, ayen i nețṛaǧu deg-wen : a nemyeḥmal wway gar-aneɣ, mačči d lameṛ ajdid i wen-d-wwiɣ lameɛna d lameṛ yellan yakan si tazwara.
Leḥmala, d m'ara nțeddu deg webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi nḥerrez lumuṛat-is. S lameṛ-agi i teslam si tazwara i glaq aț-țeddum.
Aṭas n wid yesselmaden lekdeb i d-innulfan di ddunit, ur setɛeṛfen ara belli Ɛisa Lmasiḥ yusa-d ɣer ddunit s ṣṣifa n wemdan. D wigi i gețɣuṛṛun, i d iɛdawen n Lmasiḥ.
?adret iman-nwen iwakken ur a wen-yețṛuḥu ara wayen akk i wen-nesselmed lameɛna aț-țɣelltem lfayda tameqqrant.
Kra n win ara iɛeddin tilas deg wayen yesselmed Lmasiḥ, ur yeṭṭif ara di Ṛebbi ; ma d win yeṭṭfen deg uselmed n Lmasiḥ yeṭṭef di Baba Ṛebbi akk-d Mmi-s.
Kra n win ara d-yasen ɣuṛ-wen m'ur wen-d-yewwi ara aselmed-agi n Lmasiḥ ur sṭerḥibet ara yis ɣer yexxamen-nwen, ur țsellimet ara ula d sslam fell-as !
Axaṭer win i gesṭerḥben yis, yețțekki di lecɣal-is n diri.
Mazal-iyi aṭas n lecɣal i ɣef bɣiɣ a wen-d-hedṛeɣ lameɛna mačči di tebṛaț, ssarameɣ a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-wen, a wen-mmeslayeɣ s yimi-w, iwakken lfeṛḥ-nneɣ ad innekmal.
Arraw n weltma-m yextaṛ Ṛebbi, țsellimen fell-am.
Nekk yellan d ameqqran n tejmaɛt, i Gayus, f+ eɛzizen fell-i, i ḥemmleɣ s tideț.
Ay aḥbib-iw, ssarameɣ ṣṣeḥa-inek bxiṛ i tella, am tikli-inek deg webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Feṛḥeɣ aṭas asm'akken i d-usan watmaten, mi d-ḥkan ɣef tideț yellan deg-k, d wamek i teṭṭfeḍ di tideț-agi s wul-ik.
Ulac lfeṛḥ ara yecbun m'ara sleɣ s warraw-iw teddun di tideț.
A win eɛzizen, d ayen yelhan i txedmeḍ seg wul yeṣfan i watmaten, ɣas d ibeṛṛaniyen i llan ;
ḥkan-d zdat n tejmaɛt ɣef leḥmala-inek. ayen yelhan daɣen ma terniḍ tɛawneḍ-ten s wayen i tzemreḍ iwakken ad kemmlen abrid-nsen ;
axaṭer ɣef ddemma n yisem n Lmasiḥ i ṛuḥen, yerna ugin ad qeblen lemɛawna n wid ur numin ara s Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ilaq-aɣ ihi a nesṭerḥeb yerna a nɛiwen imdanen yecban wigi, iwakken a nili d iqeddacen ara yemɛawanen yid-sen ɣef ddemma n tideț.
Uriɣ kra yimeslayen i tejmaɛt, meɛna Diutrif iḥemmlen ad idebbeṛ ɣef wiyaḍ, yegguma a ɣ-d-iḥess ur aɣ-yeḥsib ara.

Daymi m'ara n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-wen a d-sbeggneɣ akk ayen ixeddem ! Iheddeṛ fell-aneɣ yir imeslayen akk-d lekdub, ula d atmaten yugi ad yesṭerḥeb yis-sen, wid yebɣan ad sṭerḥben yis-sen, yețțaggi-yasen yerna yessufuɣ-iten si tejmaɛt.
Ay aḥbib, ur țɛanad ara wid ixeddmen cceṛ meɛna ɛaned wid ixeddmen lxiṛ. Win ixeddmen ayen yelhan, n Ṛebbi ; ma d win ixeddmen cceṛ ur yessin ara Ṛebbi.
Ma d Dimitriyus țcekkiṛen-t akk medden, yerna tideț tețban-ed deg-s, ula d nukni nenna-t-id yerna teẓriḍ ayen i d-neqqaṛ ț-țideț.
Aṭas i mazal a k-t-id-iniɣ lameɛna ur bɣiɣ ara a k-t-id-aruɣ di tebṛaț.
Ssarameɣ qṛib a nemẓer iwakken a nehḍer.
Qqim di lehna ! Atmaten meṛṛa țsellimen-d fell-ak. Ula d kečč sellem ɣef watmaten akk, mkul yiwen s yisem-is.
Nekk Yuda yellan d gma-s n Yeɛqub, aqqedac n Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, i wid i wumi d-issawel Sidi Ṛebbi Baba-tneɣ, yerna ihegga-ten i Ɛisa Lmasiḥ ;
ṛṛeḥma, talwit d leḥmala a wen-d-tețțunefkent s tugeț !

A wid eɛzizen, acḥal aya segmi i bɣiɣ a wen-n-aruɣ ɣef wayen yeɛnan leslak i ɣ-icerken, walaɣ belli ilaq-iyi a kkun-nhuɣ iwakken aț-țesɛum tazmert aț-țḥadrem ɣef liman, liman i d-yețțunefken yiwet n tikkelt i wid i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi.

Axaṭer kra n yemdanen skecmen-d iman-nsen gar-awen, sseɛwajen lmeɛna n ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi iwakken ad ffren yir tikli-nsen, nekṛen ula d Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, win yellan d Ssid-nneɣ ; lɛiqab i ten-yețṛaǧun d ameqqran akken i d-ițwaxebbeṛ si zik di tira iqedsen.
?as akken teẓram ayagi meṛṛa, bɣiɣ a kkun-id-smektiɣ belli asmi i d-isellek Sidi Ṛebbi agdud-is si tmurt n Maṣer yessenger gar-asen wid akk yugin ad amnen yis ;
daɣen, lmalayekkat-nni ur neṭṭif ara di ccan i sent-id-ițțunefken, meɛna ǧǧant imukan-nsent eɛlayen, Sidi Ṛebbi yeqqen-itent di ṭṭlam i dayem alamma d ass ameqqran n lḥisab.

Akken daɣen i tedṛa d imezdaɣ n temdinin n Sudum d Gumuṛ akk-d tudrin i sent-id-yezzin, ixeddmen anagar ticmatin d zzna, qqiment-ed d lemtel mi tent-yessenger Sidi Ṛebbi s tmes yecban times n ǧahennama ;
imdanen-agi daɣen i d-ikecmen gar-aneɣ xeddmen am nutni, tirga-nsen ssawaḍent-țen ad xedmen ticmatin, ur setɛeṛfen ara s lḥekma n Sidi Ṛebbi, reggmen ula d lmalayekkat yellan deg igenwan.
Ula d lmelk Mixayel ur yexdim ara annect-agi asm'akken i gennuɣ akk-d Cciṭan ɣef lǧețța n Sidna Musa ; yegguma a t-yergem ula d rregmat meɛna yenna-yas kan : a k-iɛaqeb Sidi Ṛebbi.
Meɛna imdanen-agi reggmen ayen ur ssinen ara, ula d ayen akken ssnen i gessen ula d lmal ur nefhim ara, yețțawi-ten anagar ɣer nnger-nsen.
A tawaɣit-nsen ! Axaṭer tebɛen lǧeṛṛa n Kahin, sṛuḥen iman-nsen di leɣlaḍ, yewwi-ten ṭṭmeɛ n yedrimen am Belɛam, negren am akken yenger Kuri asm'akken i d-yekker ɣer ccwal.

D ugur ameqqran m'ara ṭṭfen imukan gar-awen ɣer imensi n tegmaț, zehhun mbla lḥecma, țxemmimen kan ɣef yiman-nsen. Cban asigna yețțawi waḍu, ur d-yețțak lehwa ; cban ttjuṛ ur d-nețțak ara lfakya di lawan-nsent, mmutent, qquṛent dɣa țwaqelɛent.
Akken i d-ṭṭeggiṛent lemwaji timeqqranin tikufta-nsent n lewsex, i d-ssufuɣen nutni tikufta n leɛṛuṛ-nsen. Cban itran ixețțin, iɣellin ɣer dderb n ṭṭlam i sen ițwaheggan.
Fell-asen i d-icar Hinux iɛacen di lǧil wis sebɛa deffir Adem, mi d-yenna : atan a d-yas Sidi Ṛebbi nețța d luluf n lmalayekkat-is
iwakken ad iḥaseb imdanen meṛṛa, ad iɛaqeb imcumen ur ten-tḍuɛ ara, ɣef yir lecɣal-nsen, ɣef rregmat i d-ssufuɣen yemcumen-agi seg yimawen-nsen .
Imdanen-agi ur steqniɛen ara deg wayen xeddmen, teddun s lebɣi n tnefsit-nsen ; imeslayen-nsen ččuṛen d zzux, sqizziben i yemdanen ɣef ddemma n nnfeɛ-nsen.
Ma d kunwi a wid eɛzizen, mmektit-ed ayen i wen-d-nnan yakan ṛṛusul n Ssid-nneɣ Ɛisa Lmasiḥ
asm'akken i wen-d-qqaṛen : di zzman aneggaru ad ilin wid ara yețmesxiṛen fell-awen, ara ilḥun s lebɣi n tnefsit-nsen.
Ihi, d wigi i d-yețțawin lxilaf ger yemdanen, țxemmimen anagar ɣef wayen yeɛnan ddunit, ur sɛin ara Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen n Sidi Ṛebbi deg wulawen-nsen.
Ma d kunwi ay iḥbiben-iw, snernit liman-nwen yeṣfan, deɛɛut s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.
?ṭfet di leḥmala n Sidi Ṛebbi, țeklet ɣef ṛṛeḥma n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, ara wen-d-yefken tudert yețdumun.
?unnet ɣef wid yețcukkun sfehmetțen
iwakken ad țțuselken, jebdet-țen-id si tmes. Llan daɣen wiyaḍ ilaq aț-țḥunnem fell-asen meɛna ɣuṛ-wat aț-țennalem ulamma d llebsa-nsen i tessenǧes lǧețța-nsen.
Tanemmirt tameqqrant i win yesɛan tazmert ad iḥader fell-awen iwakken ur tețțecḍem ara, a kkun-id isbedd zdat-es mbla lɛib di tmanegt- ines s lfeṛḥ ameqqran.

Tamanegt tameqqrant i Sidi Ṛebbi awḥid i gellan d amsellek-nneɣ s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ Ssid-nneɣ ; i Yillu nneɣ lhiba, tazmert, lḥekma akk-d lɛaḍima, uqbel a d-texleq ddunit, di lweqt-agi akk-d lweqat i d-iteddun ! Amin !

Wagi d aweḥḥi n Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, i s-d-ifka Ṛebbi iwakken ad ixebbeṛ iqeddacen-is ɣef wayen ara d-yedṛun ; leḥwayeǧ-agi i d-ițeddun ixebbeṛ-itent-id s lmelk i d-iceggeɛ i uqeddac-is Yuḥenna.
Yuḥenna yeḥka-d ayen akk yeẓra. Iched-ed ɣef wawal n tudert akk ț-țideț i d-yewwi Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.
D iseɛdiyen wid ara yeɣṛen, ara yessemḥessen i lehḍuṛ n uweḥḥi-agi yerna ḥerzen-ten, axaṭer lweqt i deg ara yedṛu wannect-agi iqeṛṛeb-ed.

S ɣuṛ Yuḥenna, i sebɛa tejmuyaɛ yellan di tmurt n Asya : ṛṛeḥma ț-țalwit a wen-d-țțunefkent s ɣuṛ Win yellan si tazwara, yellan ass-a, ara d-yuɣalen, s ɣuṛ sebɛa leṛwaḥ n Ṛebbi yețțilin zdat wemkan n lḥekma-ines,
s ɣuṛ Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ inigi n ṣṣeḥ, amezwaru i d-iḥyan si ger lmegtin, agellid n igelliden n ddunit ! Nețța i ɣ-iḥemmlen, i ɣ-isellken si ddnubat nneɣ s idammen-is yuzzlen fell-aneɣ,
yerra-yaɣ d lmuqedmin iqeddcen ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi, Baba-s. Tamanegt tameqqrant d lḥekma i Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ i dayem ! Amin !
Ataya, iteddu-d ɣef wusigna, mkul tiṭ a t-twali, ula d wid i t-ifetken a t-walin ; dɣa igduden n ddunit meṛṛa ad meǧǧden fell-as. ?-țideț, akka ara tedṛu !
Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-d : d nekk i d amezwaru i d aneggaru, d Win yellan si tazwara, yellan ass-a, ara d-yuɣalen ; d nekk i d Bab n tezmert. .

Nekk Yuḥenna gma-twen, yellan yid-wen ama di lmeḥna ɣef wayen yeɛnan tagelda n Sidi Ṛebbi, ama ɣef tuṭṭfa di liman di Sidna Ɛisa, lliɣ di tegzirt n Batmus ɣef demma n wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi yerna ad cehdeɣ ɣef Sidna Ɛisa.
Deg wass n westeɛfu iweḥḥa yi-d Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi, sliɣ i yiwet n taɣect ɛlayen i d-yekkan deffir-i am akken d ṣṣut n lbuq,
teqqaṛ-ed : Ayen akka i tețwaliḍ aru-t di tektabt tceggɛeḍ-ț i sebɛa tejmuyaɛ agi n watmaten : i tejmaɛt n Ifasus, n Smirnus, n Birɣamus, n Tyatir, n Sardas, n Filadilfya akk-d țin n Ludikus.
Muqleɣ ɣer deffir iwakken ad ẓreɣ anwa i yi-d-ițmeslayen, walaɣ sebɛa teftilin n ddheb,
di tlemmast nsent yella yiwen lxelq icuban amdan ; yelsa ajellab yerna yebges tabagust n ddheb.
Ccɛeṛ-is d amellal am taḍuṭ tacebḥant, am udfel, allen-is ceɛlent am tmes,
iḍaṛṛen-is țfeǧǧiǧen am nnḥas yefsin di tmes, ṣṣut-is yecba zzhir n waman yețseqsiqen deg udrar.
Yeṭṭef sebɛa yetran deg ufus-is ayeffus, seg imi-s yeffeɣ-d ujenwi yesɛan sin imawen iqeḍɛen , udem-is yețfeǧǧiǧ am yiṭij m'ara d-icceɛceɛ deg uzzal.
Mi t-walaɣ, fecleɣ, ɣliɣ ɣer iḍaṛṛen-is. Yessers fell-i afus-is ayeffus yenna : Ur țțagad ara ! D nekk i gellan si tazwara alamma ț-țaggara ,
nekk d Win yeddren ; lliɣ mmuteɣ, meɛna ḥyiɣ-ed si lmut, tura aql-iyi ddreɣ i dayem. D nekk i geṭṭfen tisura n lmut akk-d tid n laxeṛt.
Ayen akka i tețwaliḍ, ɣef wayen ideṛṛun tura d wayen i d-iteddun, aru-t di tektabt.

?ef wayen yeɛnan lbaḍna n sebɛa yitran-agi i twalaḍ deg ufus-iw ayeffus, akk-d sebɛa teftilin-agi n ddheb : sebɛa yitran-agi d lmalayekkat n sebɛa tejmuyaɛ n imasiḥiyen, ma d sebɛa teftilin-agi, d sebɛa-nni tejmuyaɛ.
Aru ayagi i lmelk n tejmaɛt n temdint n Ifasus : atah wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Win yeṭṭfen sebɛa yetran deg ufus-is ayeffus, Win yețțilin di tlemmast n sebɛa teftilin n ddheb :

ssneɣ tikli-inek d lecɣal-ik, ẓriɣ leɛtab-ik d ṣṣbeṛ i tṣebṛeḍ ; ẓriɣ ur tezmireḍ ara aț-țawiḍ i yemcumen, tjeṛbeḍ wid ițțarran iman-nsen d ṛṛusul ur llin, tkecfeḍ-ten-id belli d ikeddaben i llan.
Tṣebṛeḍ, tɛetbeḍ ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw, ur tefcileḍ ara.
Lameɛna tella yiwet lḥaǧa i ɣef ara k-lumeɣ : leḥmala i tesɛiḍ ɣuṛ-i tura mačči am leḥmala n wussan imezwura.
Mmekti-d seg wansi i d-teɣliḍ, endem deg wayen txedmeḍ tuɣaleḍ ɣer lecɣal-ik imezwura, ma yella ur tendimeḍ ara, atan a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-ek, ad kkseɣ taftilt-ik seg umkan-is.
Lameɛna atan wayen i yi-iɛeǧben deg-k : tkeṛheḍ lecɣal n inikulaten, akken i ten-keṛheɣ ula d nekk.
Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen, ad ismeḥses i wayen i d-iqqaṛ Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi i tejmuyaɛ n watmaten : win ara yeṭṭfen deg-i alamma ț-țaggara, a s-fkeɣ ad yečč si ttejṛa n tudert yellan di lǧennet.
Aru ayagi i lmelk n tejmaɛt n temdint n Smirnus : atah wayen i d-iqqaṛ Win yellan si tazwara alamma țaggara, Win yemmuten yuɣal-ed ɣer tudert :
?riɣ lmeḥna akk-d leɣben i deg telliḍ, lameɛna ɣer Ṛebbi d ameṛkanti ; ẓriɣ cceṛ i heddṛen fell-ak wid iḥesben iman-nsen d agdud n Ṛebbi ur llin, lameɛna nutni si tejmaɛt n Cciṭan.

Ur țțagad ara leɛtab i d-ițeddun ɣuṛ-ek. Atan Cciṭan ad yerr kra deg-wen ɣer lḥebs iwakken aț-țujeṛbem, aț-țilim di leɛtab ɛecṛa wussan. Eṭṭef di liman-inek alamma d lmut, a k-d-fkeɣ taɛeṣṣabt n tudert.
Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen, ad ismeḥses i wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi i tejmuyaɛ n watmaten : win ara yeṭṭfen deg-i alamma ț-țaggara, ur t-tețțawi ara lmut tis snat.
Aru ayagi i lmelk n tejmaɛt n temdint n Birɣamus : atah wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Win yesɛan ajenwi iqeḍɛen di snat leǧwahi :

?riɣ anda i tzedɣeḍ, dinna i gella wemkan n lḥekma n Cciṭan. Teṭṭfeḍ deg isem-iw, ur tenkiṛeḍ ara liman i tesɛiḍ deg-i ula deg ussan i deg nɣan Antibas, inigi-inu n ṣṣeḥ, dinna ɣuṛ-wen anida yeṭṭef Cciṭan amkan.

Lameɛna atan wayen yellan deg-ek ur iyi-neɛǧib ara : llan ɣuṛ-ek kra yemdanen mazal-iten ṭṭfen deg uselmed n Belɛam : isselmad i ugellid Balak ayen ara yilin d sebba n tuccḍa n warraw n wat Isṛail, isselmad-asen ad ččen aksum yețțunefken d iseflawen i ssadaț yerna a ten-tawi ccehwat n tnefsit-nsen.
Llan daɣen ɣuṛ-ek kra yemdanen yeṭṭfen deg uselmed n inikulaten.
Endem ihi ! Neɣ m'ulac ur țɛeṭṭileɣ ara a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-ek, a ten-ḥarbeɣ s ujenwi n yimi-w.

Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen, ad ismeḥses i wayen i d-iqqaṛ Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi i tejmuyaɛ n watmaten ! Win yeṭṭfen deg-i alamma ț țaggara, a t-id-ṛezqeɣ s tmana-nni yețwaḥerzen, a s-fkeɣ daɣen ablaḍ acebḥan i ɣef yura isem ajdid ur yessin yiwen, anagar win iwumi ara d-yețțunefk ublaḍ-nni.
Aru i lmelk n tejmaɛt n temdint n Tyatir : atah wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Mmi-s n Ṛebbi Win yesɛan allen iceɛɛlen am tmes, iḍaṛṛen-is țfeǧǧiǧen am nnḥas :
?riɣ lecɣal-ik, leḥmala d liman i tesɛiḍ akk-d wayen i txeddmeḍ s wul yeṣfan d ṣṣbeṛ. ?riɣ daɣen tura txeddmeḍ akteṛ n wussan imezwura.

Lameɛna tella yiwet lḥaǧa ur iyi-neɛǧib ara deg-k : teǧǧiḍ Yisabil yerran iman-is d nnbi aț-țkellex iqeddacen-iw s uselmed-ines, iwakken ad ččen aksum yețțunefken d iseflawen i ssadaț yerna a ten-awint ccehwat n tnefsit-nsen.
Eǧǧiɣ-as lweqt ɣileɣ aț-țendem, lameɛna ur tebɣi ara aț-țerr aḍar ɣef tecmatin i txeddem.
Usu-nni i ɣef txeddem ticmatin, dinna ara d-sseɣliɣ fell-as lehlak icemten nețțat d wid yeznan yid-es anagar ma yella beddlen tikli.
A d-ceggɛeɣ lmut i warraw-is ; s wakka tijmuyaɛ n watmaten meṛṛa ad setɛeṛfen belli ẓriɣ ayen yellan deg yixemmimen d wulawen n yemdanen, ad rreɣ i mkul yiwen ayen yuklal.
Ma d kunwi akk-d wid meṛṛa yellan si tejmaɛt n Tyatir ur neqbil ara aselmed-agi, yugin aț-țkecmem di lbaḍna lqayen yeɛni tin n Cciṭan, a wen-iniɣ : ur wen-sbabbayeɣ ara taɛkumt nniḍen ;
d acu kan, ṭṭfet di liman i tesɛam alamma uɣaleɣ-ed.
Wid yeṭṭfen deg-i ur fcilen ara, wid ḥerzen yerna ḍuɛen lumuṛat-iw alamma ț-țaggara, a sen-fkeɣ lḥekma ɣef leǧnas.
A sen-fkeɣ lḥekma i yi-d ițțunefken s ɣuṛ Baba, ad ḥekmen fell-asen s uɛekkaz n wuzzal, a ten ṛzen am akken țṛuẓun ibuqalen n talaxt. A sen-fkeɣ tafat n yitri n ṣṣbeḥ.
Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen, ad ismeḥses i wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi i tejmuyaɛ n watmaten.
Aru i lmelk n tejmaɛt n temdint n Sardas : atah wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Win yesɛan sebɛa leṛwaḥ, yeṭṭfen sebɛa yitran : ?riɣ lecɣal-ik, qqaṛen belli teddreḍ, lameɛna kečč temmuteḍ.
Ddekwal-ed, sseǧhed ayen i k-d yeqqimen neɣ m'ulac ad yemmet, axaṭer lecɣal-ik xuṣṣen ɣer Ṛebbi.
Mmekti-d ihi amek tesliḍ d wamek tqebleḍ awal n Ṛebbi, tbeɛ ayen akka i tlemdeḍ, tuɣaleḍ-ed ɣer webrid. Ma tɣefleḍ, a n-aseɣ ɣuṛ-ek am umakar, ur teẓẓareḍ ara anta ssaɛa i deg ara d-kecmeɣ.
Lameɛna llan ɣuṛ-ek kra yemdanen ur sneǧsen ara llebsa-nsen ; ad ilin yid-i s llebsa tamellalt axaṭer uklalen-ț.
Win ara yeṭṭfen deg-i alamma ț-țaggara, ad yels llebsa tamellalt, d lmuḥal ad mḥuɣ isem-is seg udlis n tudert, yerna zdat Baba Ṛebbi d lmalayekkat-is, a d-cehdeɣ belli d ayla-w.
Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen, ad ismeḥses i wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi i tejmuyaɛ n watmaten.

Aru ayagi i lmelk n tejmaɛt n watmaten yellan di temdint n Filadelfya : atah wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Win yeṣfan, yellan ț-țideț, Win yeṭṭfen tasaruț n Dawed, ayen ara yeldi ur yezmir yiwen a t-iɣleq, ayen ara yeɣleq ulac win izemren a t-ildi :
Ssneɣ lecɣal-ik, atan ldiɣ tawwurt zdat-ek, ulac win izemren a ț-țiɣleq, axaṭer ẓriɣ tḥerzeḍ awal-iw ur tenkiṛeḍ ara isem-iw, ɣas akken lḥekma-inek ț-țamecṭuḥt ;

atah wayen ara xedmeɣ i wid yellan si tejmaɛt n Cciṭan, ikeddaben-nni yețțaran iman-nsen d agdud n Ṛebbi ur llin ; a ten-i-d-awiɣ ɣuṛ-ek ad seǧǧden zdat-ek, ad setɛeṛfen belli ḥemmleɣ-k, deg-k i gella lfeṛḥ-iw.
Imi teṭṭfeḍ deg awal-iw s ṣṣbeṛ ur tefcileḍ ara, ula d nekk a k-ḥadreɣ di teswiɛt n ujeṛṛeb ara d-yasen ɣef ddunit meṛṛa iwakken ad țțujeṛben imezdaɣ-is.
Qṛib a d-uɣaleɣ. Eṭṭef di liman i tesɛiḍ deg-i iwakken yiwen ur ițizmir a k-yekkes taɛeṣṣabt n tudert i k-yețṛaǧun.

Win yeṭṭfen deg-i alamma ț-țaggara, a t-sbeddeɣ am tgejdit di lǧameɛ n Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-yiw, ad yili dinna i dayem. Ad jerdeɣ fell-as isem n Illu-yiw, isem n temdint n Illu-yiw, win n temdint n Lquds tajdiṭ ara d-iṣubben seg igenni s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi, ad aruɣ daɣen fell-as isem-iw ajdid.
Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen, ad ismeḥses i wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi i tejmuyaɛ n watmaten.
Aru ayagi i lmelk n tejmaɛt n watmaten n temdint n Ludikus : Atah wayen i d-iqqaṛ Win yețțusemman Amin, inigi n ṣṣeḥ ț-țideț, Win s wayes i d-ițwaxleq kra wayen yellan :
Ssneɣ lecɣal-ik, ur terkimeḍ ur tṣemḍeḍ, a wi yufan aț-țrekmeḍ neɣ aț-țismiḍeḍ !
Imi temmuzeɣleḍ ur teḥmiḍ, ur tsemmḍeḍ, atan a k-id-erreɣ seg imi-w ;
axaṭer teqqaṛeḍ : srebḥeɣ iman-iw, aql-iyi d ameṛkanti, ur uḥwaǧeɣ ula d acemma, ur d-tewwiḍ ara s lexbaṛ belli tețɣiḍeḍ am umeɣbun, ur tesɛiḍ acemma, aqli-k d aɛeryan, d aderɣal.

Daymi ad debbṛeɣ fell-ak aț-țaɣeḍ ɣuṛ-i ddheb yeṣfan, iwakken aț-țuɣaleḍ s tideț d amerkanti, aɣ daɣen llebsa tamellalt iwakken lḥecma n ɛerru-inek ur d-tețban ara, ternuḍ lekḥul s wayes ara teddawiḍ allen-ik iwakken aț-țwaliḍ.
D wid ḥemmleɣ i țɛaqabeɣ i țṛebbiɣ . Sendekwal-ed ihi iman-ik ; endem tbeddleḍ tikli !
Atan beddeɣ ɣer tewwurt sṭebṭbeɣ, ma yella win i d-yeslan i taɣect-iw yeldi-yi-d tawwurt, ad kecmeɣ ɣuṛ-es, ad ččeɣ imensi yid-es, nețța yid-i.
Win yeṭṭfen deg-i alamma ț-țaggara, a t-sɣimeɣ yid-i deg umkan n lḥekma-inu, akken i ṭṭfeɣ nekk di Baba Ṛebbi alamma ț-țaggara, tura aql-i qqimeɣ yid-es deg umkan n lḥekma-ines.
Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen, ad ismeḥses i wayen i d-yeqqaṛ Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi i tejmuyaɛ n watmaten !
Walaɣ daɣen deg uweḥḥi nniḍen tawwurt n igenni teldi. Taɣect-nni yecban ṣṣut n lbuq iwumi sliɣ tikkelt tamezwarut, tenna-yi-d : Ali-d ɣer dagi a k-d-sekneɣ ayen ara yeḍrun sya ɣer zdat.

Imiren kan irfed-iyi Ṛṛuḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi. Walaɣ yiwen ukersi n lḥekma deg igenni, Win yeqqimen fell-as, yețfeǧǧiǧ am iɛeqcan ɣlayen iwumi qqaṛen azṛu n jasb akk-d sardwan. Tislit n wanẓar tezzi-yas-d i ukersi-nni n lḥekma tețfeǧǧiǧ am tizegzewt n wezṛu n zemṛud.
Akersi-nni n lḥekma, zzin-as-d ṛebɛa uɛecrin ikursiyen nniḍen i ɣef qqimen ṛebɛa uɛecrin n lecyux yelsan llebsa tamellalt, sɛan ɣef yiqeṛṛay-nsen tiɛeṣṣabin n ddheb.
Seg ukersi-agi n lḥekma țeffɣen-d lebruq, tuɣac akk-d ṛṛɛud. Zdat-es ceɛlent sebɛa teftilin ireqqen yellan d sebɛa n Leṛwaḥ n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Zdat ukersi-nni, yella daɣen am akken d lebḥeṛ n djaj icuban ɣer wezṛu n lekristal. Di tlemmast-is akk-d leryuf-ines, bedden ṛebɛa lxuluq yeddren ččuṛen d allen ɣer zdat ɣer deffir.
Lxelq amezwaru ițemcabi ɣer yizem, lxelq wi sin yecba agenduz, lxelq wis tlata yesɛa udem am win n wemdan, lxelq wis ṛebɛa icuba ɣer igider yețferfiren.

Ṛebɛa lxuluq-nni mkul yiwen seg-sen yesɛa sețța wafriwen, yerna ččuṛen d allen s wadda s ufella, am yiḍ am ass ur țsusumen ara qqaṛen : D imqeddes, d imqeddes, d imqeddes i gella Yillu, Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n tezmert, Win yellan si tazwara, yellan ass-a, ara d-yasen !
Lxuluq-nni, mkul m'ara țcekkiṛen țḥemmiden Win yeqqimen ɣef wukersi n lḥekma, Win yeddren si lǧil ɣer lǧil,
ṛebɛa uɛecrin n lecyux-nni țseǧǧiden daɣen zdat-es, srusun tiɛeṣṣabin-nsen zdat Win yeddren, țɛebbiden-t qqaṛen :
Tuklaleḍ a Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ, tamanegt d ccan akk-d lḥekma, imi d kečč i d Bab n txelqit, kra yellan s lebɣi-k i d-yețwaxleq.
Imiren, walaɣ deg ufus ayeffus n Win yeqqimen ɣef wukersi n lḥekma, yiwen wedlis yețwakteb si beṛṛa si zdaxel, yețwalṣeq s sebɛa ṭṭwabeɛ.
Walaɣ yiwen lmelk yesɛan tazmert tameqqrant, yeqqaṛ-ed s ṣṣut ɛlayen : Anwa yuklalen ad yeldi adlis-agi, yerna a d-iqleɛ ṭṭwabeɛ-ines ?
Lameɛna ur ufin ula d yiwen deg igenni neɣ di lqaɛa neɣ ddaw lqaɛa i gzemren ad ildi adlis-nni neɣ a t-iɣeṛ.
Dɣa țruɣ aṭas mi ẓriɣ ulac win yuklalen ad ildi adlis-nni neɣ a t-iɣeṛ.
Yiwen si lecyux-nni yenna yi-d : Ur țru ara, atan Yizem n lɛeṛc n Yahuda, si dderya n Dawed, yuklal ad ildi adlis-nni yerna ad iqleɛ sebɛa ṭṭwabeɛ-ines, axaṭer d nețța i gɣelben kullec.

Walaɣ daɣen di tlemmast n ukersi-nni n lḥekma, ger lxuluq-nni, ger lecyux-nni, yiwen Izimer ibedden, iban-ed am akken yemzel. Yesɛa sebɛa wacciwen akk-d sebɛa wallen yellan d sebɛa leṛwaḥ n Ṛebbi yețțuceggɛen i ddunit meṛṛa.
Izimer-agi iqeṛṛeb ɣer Win yeqqimen ɣef wukersi n lḥekma iwakken a d-iṭṭef seg ufus-is ayeffus adlis-nni.

Mi d-iṭṭef adlis-nni, ṛebɛa lxuluq akk-d ṛebɛa uɛecrin n lecyux nni seǧǧden zdat-es, mkul yiwen seg-sen yeṭṭef snitra d iqbucen n ddheb iččuṛen d leɛṭeṛ i d ițmettilen ddeɛwat n wegdud n Ṛebbi.

Cennun yiwen ucewwiq d ajdid qqaṛen : tuklaleḍ aț-țedmeḍ adlis, aț-țeldiḍ ṭwabeɛ-ines, axaṭer temmezleḍ, iwakken aț-țcafɛeḍ s idammen-ik yuzzlen, imdanen si mkul lɛeṛc, si mkul tutlayt, si mkul agdud, si mkul tamurt.
Terriḍ-ten am igelliden, d lmuqedmin i Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ, ad ḥekmen ɣef ddunit.
Walaɣ daɣen, yerna sliɣ i ṣṣut n waṭas n lmalayekkat i d-izzin i ukersi n lḥekma, i lxuluq akk-d lecyux-nni, leḥsab-nsen d ilulufen, d ayen ur nezmir a neḥseb.
Qqaṛen s ṣṣut ɛlayen : Izimer yemmezlen yuklal tazmert d lekyasa, lerbaḥ d lǧehd, ccan d lɛaḍima akk-d ucekkeṛ.

Ayen akk i d-ițwaxelqen deg igenni, di lqaɛa, ddaw lqaɛa, di lebḥeṛ d wayen akk yellan deg-sen, sliɣ-asen qqaṛen : A neḥmed a neckkeṛ Win yeqqimen ɣef wukersi n lḥekma akk-d Izimer, i nutni lɛaḍima d lḥekma si lǧil ɣer lǧil !
Ṛebɛa lxuluq-nni qqaṛen : Amin ! Ma d lecyux-nni țseǧǧiden zdat-sen.
Walaɣ daɣen mi gcerreg Izimer nni ṭṭabeɛ amezwaru. Sliɣ i taɣect n yiwen si ṛebɛa lxuluq-nni tenṭeq-ed am ṛṛɛud tenna-d : As-ed !
Walaɣ yiwen uɛewdiw d amellal. Win i t-id irekben yeṭṭef lqus deg ufus-is ; tețțunefk-as tɛeṣṣabt, iṛuḥ s tezmert tameqqrant iwakken ad iɣleb.
Mi gcerreg ṭṭabeɛ wis sin, sliɣ i lxelq wi sin yenna-d : As-ed !

Yeffeɣ-ed yiwen uɛewdiw nniḍen d azeggaɣ am tmes. Win i t-id-irekben, tețțunefk-as tezmert ad ikkes lehna si ddunit iwakken ad țnaɣen yemdanen wway gar-asen ; yețțunefk-as-d yiwen ujenwi d ameqqran.
Mi gcerreg Izimer-nni ṭṭabeɛ wis tlata, sliɣ i lxelq wis tlata yenna-d : As-ed ! Ataya daɣen yiwen uɛewdiw d aberkan. Win i t-id-irekben yeṭṭef lmizan deg ufus-is.

Imiren kan sliɣ i yiwet taɣect ger ṛebɛa lxuluq-nni teqqaṛ : Kilu n yirden d ssuma i gețțaɣ ufellaḥ i yiwen wass n lxedma, tlata kilu n temẓin daɣen d ssuma n yiwen wass n lxedma ; ma d zzit akk-d ccṛab ad qqimen akken llan.
Mi gcerreg ṭṭabeɛ wis ṛebɛa, sliɣ i taɣect n lxelq wis ṛebɛa tenna-d : As-ed!

Walaɣ yiwen uɛewdiw d aḥcici. Win i t-id-irekben isem-is lmut, tetbeɛ-it-id laxeṛt ; tețțunefk-asen-d tezmert ɣef ṛṛbeɛ n ddunit, iwakken ad snegren imdanen s ujenwi, s laẓ, s lehlak akk-d lewḥuc n lexla.
Mi gcerreg ṭṭabeɛ wis xemsa, walaɣ seddaw n udekkan i deg srusun iseflawen i Sidi Ṛebbi, leṛwaḥ n wid yemmezlen imi ugin ad nekṛen awal n Ṛebbi yerna cehden fell-as.
?ɛeggiḍen s taɣect ɛlayen, qqaṛen : A Ssid-nneɣ imqeddes, a Bab n tideț, d acu i tețṛaǧuḍ aț-țḥasbeḍ, aț-țerreḍ țțaṛ i imezdaɣ n ddunit ɣef yidammen-nneɣ i ssazlen ?
Mkul yiwen deg-sen yețțunefk as uqenduṛ d ammellal ; nnan-asen ad rnun ad ṛǧun kra lweqt alamma rnan-d ɣuṛ-sen yeṛfiqen-nsen di leqdic d watmaten-nsen ara nɣen am nutni.
Walaɣ daɣen mi gcerreg Izimer nni ṭṭabeɛ wis sețța ; tewwet zzelzla tameqqrant di lqaɛa, iṭij yuɣal d aberkan ; agur yuɣal am idammen,
ma d itran n igenni ɣellin-d ɣer lqaɛa am tbexsisin n tenqelț m'ara ț-țihuzz waḍu iǧehden.
Igenni yenneḍ am tẓeṛbit yețțlen, idurar ț-țegzirin meṛṛa ḥerrken seg imukan-nsen.
Igelliden akk-d imeqqranen n ddunit, wid iḥekkmen ɣef lɛeskeṛ, imeṛkantiyen, wid yesɛan lḥekma, aklan akk-d iḥuṛṛiyen, ulin meṛṛa ɣer idurar iwakken ad ffren zdaxel n lɣiṛan d iceṛfan,
qqaṛen i idurar d iceṛfan : ɣlit-ed fell-aɣ, ffret-aɣ zdat wudem n Win yeqqimen ɣef wukersi n lḥekma, zdat wurrif n Izimer ;
axaṭer yusa-d wass ameqqran n wurrif-nsen, anwa ara imenɛen ?

Mbeɛd ayagi, walaɣ ṛebɛa n lmalayekkat beddent di ṛebɛa tɣemmaṛ n ddunit ; sḥebsent aḍu n ṛebɛa tɣemmaṛ n ddunit iwakken ur d-ițṣuḍu ara waḍu ɣef lqaɛa d lebḥur, neɣ ula ɣef yiwet ttejṛa.

Walaɣ lmelk nniḍen i d-yulin si lǧiha n cceṛq, yeṭṭef deg ufus-is ṭṭabeɛ n Ṛebbi yeddren ; iɛeggeḍ s ṣṣut ɛlayen ɣer ṛebɛa lmalayekkat-nni iwumi yefka Sidi Ṛebbi tazmert iwakken ad ḍuṛṛent lqaɛa d lebḥur, yenna-yasen :
Ur țḍuṛṛut ara lqaɛa d lebḥuṛ neɣ ttjuṛ, alamma neḍbeɛ tiwenziwin n iqeddacen n Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ.
Imiren sliɣ i leḥsab n wid yețwaḍebɛen, meyya uṛebɛa uṛebɛin alef si leɛṛac n wat Isṛail :
si lɛeṛc n Yahuda țwaḍebɛen tnac n alef ; si lɛeṛc n Ruben, țwaḍebɛen ṭnac n alef ; si lɛeṛc n Gad, ṭnac n alef ;
si lɛeṛc n Azer, tnac n alef ; si lɛeṛc n Naftali, ṭnac n alef ; si lɛeṛc n Manasi, ṭnac n alef ;
si lɛeṛc n Semɛun, ṭnac n alef ; si lɛeṛc n Lewwi, ṭnac n alef ; si lɛeṛc n Isakaṛ, ṭnac n alef ;
si lɛeṛc n Zabulun, ṭnac n alef ; si lɛeṛc n Yusef, ṭnac n alef ; si lɛeṛc n Benyamin, țwaḍebɛen ṭnac n alef.

Mbeɛd ayagi, walaɣ izumal n lɣaci, ur yezmir yiwen a sen-d issufeɣ leḥsab, d imdanen n mkul lǧens, n mkul tamurt, n mkul agdud, n mkul tutlayt. Bedden zdat ukersi n lḥekma zdat Izimer-nni, lsan llebsa tamellalt, wwin-d tiseḍwa n tezdayin deg ifassen-nsen.
?ɛeggiḍen s taɣect ɛlayen qqaṛen : Leslak-nneɣ yekka-d s ɣuṛ Izimer, s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ yeqqimen ɣef wukersi n lḥekma.
Lmalayekkat meṛṛa zzin-t-ed i ukersi-nni n lḥekma, i lecyux akk-d ṛebɛa lxuluq-nni ; uɣalent ɣef wudem zdat ukersi-nni n lḥekma țɛebbident Sidi Ṛebbi,
qqaṛent : s tideț, a neḥmed, a neckkeṛ Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ, i nețța lɛaḍima, lekyasa, ccan d lḥekma si lǧil ɣer lǧil ! Amin !
Yiwen si lecyux-nni yenṭeq-ed yenna-yi-d : Wid yelsan ijellaben icebḥanen, anwa-ten ? Ansi i d-usan ?
Rriɣ-as : D kečč i geẓran a Sidi. Yerra-yi-d : Wigi, d wid yesɛeddan leqheṛ d ameqqran ; ssarden ijellaben-nsen, ssazdgen-ten deg idammen n Izimer.
Daymi i bedden zdat ukersi n lḥekma n Sidi Ṛebbi, țɛebbiden-t iḍ d wass deg wexxam-is. Win yeqqimen ɣef wukersi n lḥekma, a ten-iḥader ;
ur țțuɣalen ad llaẓen, ur țțuɣalen ad ffaden, ur ten-yețḥaz yiṭij neɣ l eḥmu .
Imi Izimer yellan di tlemmast n ukersi n lḥekma, d nețța ara yilin d ameksa-nsen, a ten-yawi ɣer wanda țazzalen waman n lɛinṣer, Sidi Ṛebbi a sen-yesfeḍ imeṭṭawen seg wallen nsen.
Mi gcerreg ṭṭabeɛ wis sebɛa, ters-ed yiwet tsusmi deg igenni azal wezgen n ssaɛa.
Walaɣ sebɛa lmalayekkat beddent zdat Sidi Ṛebbi, mkul yiwet deg-sent yețțunefk-as yiwen lbuq.

Yiwen lmelk nniḍen yusa-d, ibedd zdat udekkan n ddheb i deg țqeddimen iseflawen, yeṭṭef timbexxeṛt n ddheb ; efkan-as-d aṭas n lǧawi a t-isseṛɣ ɣef wudekkan-nni yellan zdat ukersi n lḥekma iwakken rriḥa-ines aț-țali ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d ddeɛwat n yimqedsen meṛṛa.
Dexxan n lebxuṛ-nni yuli akk-d ddeɛwat n yimqedsen yeṣfan, seg ufus n lmelk ibedden zdat Ṛebbi.
Lmelk-nni yeddem-ed timbexxeṛt nni n ddheb, yeččuṛ-iț-id ț-țirgin iṛeqqen yellan ɣef wudekkan-nni n ddheb, ideggeṛ-iț ɣer ddunit ; tebṛeq, terɛeḍ, sliɣ i tuɣac, tezlez lqaɛa.
Sebɛa lmalayekkat-nni yeṭṭfen sebɛa lbuqat, heggant iman-nsent ad wwtent lbuq.
Lmelk amezwaru yewwet lbuq, imiren kan yeɣli-d ɣef lqaɛa webruri akk ț-țmes ixelḍen d idammen, times nni tečča țelt n lqaɛa, țelt n ttjuṛ, d kra wayen yellan d leḥcic azegzaw.
Lmelk wis sin yewwet lbuq. Yiwet n lḥaǧa annect-ilaț am akken d adrar ameqqran i deg tecɛel tmes yețțuḍeggeṛ ɣer lebḥeṛ, țelt n lebḥeṛ yuɣal am idammen,
țelt n wayen yețɛicin di lebḥeṛ yemmut, țelt daɣen n lbabuṛat negren.

Lmelk wis tlata yewwet lbuq. Yeɣli-d seg igenni ɣer lqaɛa yiwen yitri d ameqqran i gṛeqqen am uḥeǧǧaǧu n tmes, itri-nni isem-is : Terẓeg ; țelt n isaffen d leɛwanseṛ n waman uɣalen d irẓaganen am ilili, aṭas n yemdanen i gemmuten imi swan seg waman-nni rẓagen.
Lmelk wis ṛebɛa yewwet lbuq. Iṭij, agur d yetran, tenqeṣ țelt n tafat-nsen s wakka tenqeṣ țelt n tafat n wass d țelt n tafat n yiḍ di ddunit.

Walaɣ yerna sliɣ i yiwen lbaz yețțafgen di tlemmast n igenni yeqqaṛ s taɣect ɛlayen : A tawaɣit, a tawaɣit, a nnger n imezdaɣ n ddunit, ɣef wayen ara yedṛun m'ara wten lbuq tlata n lmalayekkat tineggura !
Lmelk wis xemsa yewwet lbuq. Walaɣ yiwen yetri yeɣli-d seg igenni ɣer lqaɛa. Tețțunefk-as tsaruț n tesraft lqayen.
Yeldi tasraft-nni lqayen, yuli-d seg-s yiwen dexxan d aberkan am win n uḥeǧǧaǧu n tmes, ddunit Ṛebbi tuɣal akk ț-țaberkant si dexxan-nni, ula d iṭij ur d-iban ara.
Si dexxan-nni yeffeɣ-ed wejṛad ɣer ddunit, tețțunefk-as tazmert am tezmert sɛant tɣerdmiwin n lqaɛa.
Yețțunefk-asen lameṛ ur țḍuṛṛun ara leḥcic, ttjuṛ d wayen akk zegzawen di lqaɛa, lameɛna ad ḍuṛṛen imdanen ur nesɛi ara ṭṭabeɛ n Ṛebbi ɣef twenza-nsen.
Tețțunefk-asen tezmert, mačči iwakken a ten-nɣen, lameɛna iwakken a ten-qehṛen azal n xemsa waguren, leqheṛ ara d-yeɣlin fell-asen, am lqeṛḥ n wemdan m'ara t-teqqes tɣirdemt.
Deg ussan-nni imdanen ad nadin ɣef lmut ur ț-țafen ara, ad bɣun ad mmten lameɛna lmut aț-țerwel fell asen.
Ajṛad-nni yecba iɛewdiwen iheggan i umenɣi, sɛan ɣef yiqeṛṛay nsen am akken ț-țiɛeṣṣabin n ddheb, udmawen-nsen am wid n yemdanen,
acebbub-nsen am win n tilawin, tuɣmas-nsen am tid n yizmawen.
Sɛan ɣef yidmaren-nsen am tseddariyin n wuzzal, zzhir n iferrawen-nsen am zzhir n ikeṛṛusen zzuɣuṛen waṭas n iɛewdiwen m'ara țțazzalen ɣer imenɣi.
Sɛant tijeḥnaḍ ț-țsuqas am tid n tɣerdmiwin ; di tjeḥnaḍ-agi i tella tezmert ara iḍuṛṛen imdanen azal n xemsa wagguren.
Agellid-nsen, d lmelk-nni iḥekkmen ɣef tesraft lqayen, yețțusemma s tɛibṛanit « Abadun », ma s tyunanit « Abulyun » yeɛni « win yessexṛaben ».
Tawaɣit tamezwarut tɛedda. Mazal snat n twaɣyin nniḍen țeddunt-ed deffir-es.
Lmelk wis sețța iwwet lbuq. Sliɣ i yiwet taɣect i d-yekkan si ṛebɛa wacciwen yellan ɣef ṛebɛa tɣemmaṛ n udekkan n ddheb i gellan zdat Ṛebbi,
taɣect-agi tenna i lmelk wis sețța i geṭṭfen lbuq : Efsi-yasen ccedd i ṛebɛa lmalayekkat-nni yellan ɣef rrif n wasif ameqqran, iwumi qqaṛen « Lufrat ».
Ṛebɛa lmalayekkat-nni i gețțuheggan i ssaɛa-nni, i wass, i wagur d useggas-nni, țwaserḥent-ed iwakken ad snegrent țelt n yemdanen.
Sliɣ i leḥsab n yemnayen, llan di mitin imelyunen yid-sen.

Atan wamek i walaɣ deg uweḥḥi iɛewdiwen d wid i ten-irekben : imnayen-nni lsan tiseddariyin n wuzzal ț-țizeggaɣin am tmes, wiyaḍ ț-țizegzawin am lebḥeṛ, kra nniḍen am ukubri. Iqeṛṛay n iɛewdiwen-nni am akken d iqeṛṛay n izmawen ; seg imawen-nsen tețțeffeɣ-ed tmes, dexxan akk-d ukubri.
?elt n yemdanen mmuten s tlata n twaɣyin-agi, s tmes, s dexxan akk-d ukubri-nni i d-ițeffɣen seg imawen-nsen.
Axaṭer tazmert n iɛewdiwen-nni tella deg imawen-nsen akk-d ijeḥnaḍ-nsen ; tijeḥnaḍ-agi-nsen cubant izerman ; sɛant iqeṛṛay, yis-sen i țḍuṛṛun.

Imdanen nniḍen ur nemmut ara s twaɣyin-agi, ur ndimen ara seg yir tikli-nsen ; kemmlen ɛebbden leǧnun țṛuḥun ɣer ssadaț anda ɛebbden lmeṣnuɛat yețwanejṛen s ufus n wemdan, s ddheb, s lfeṭṭa akk-d nnḥas, s wezṛu akk-d wesɣaṛ. ?as akken lmeṣnuɛat-nni ur țwalin, ur sellen, ur leḥḥun,
imdanen-agi ur ndimen ara ɣef tmegṛaḍ i neqqen, ɣef ssḥur ɣef tukeṛdiwin akk țecmatin i xeddmen, lameɛna țkemmilen di lecɣal-agi.
Walaɣ daɣen yiwen lmelk nniḍen iǧehden, iṣubb-ed seg igenni, tețțel-it-id tagut ; tislit n wanẓar tezzi ɣef wuqeṛṛuy-is, udem-is yețfeǧǧiǧ am yiṭij, iḍaṛṛen-is am iḥeǧǧuǧa n tmes.
Yeṭṭef deg ufus-is yiwet tektabt tamecṭuḥt yeldin. Yessers aḍar-is ayeffus ɣef lebḥeṛ, ma d aḍar azelmaḍ yessers-it ɣef lqaɛa,
iɛeggeḍ s taɣect ɛlayen am akken d izem i gesreɛreɛen. Mi gesreɛreɛ lmelk-nni, nesla i useqseq n tuɣac n sebɛa ṛṛɛudat.

Mi sliɣ i tuɣac n sebɛa ṛɛudat nni țedduɣ ad aruɣ ayen i d-nnan, lameɛna sliɣ i yiwet taɣect i d-yekkan seg igenni tenna-yi-d : Eǧǧ di lbaḍna ayen akka i d-nnan sebɛa ṛɛudat-agi, ur tețțaru ara.
Lmelk-nni i walaɣ ibedd ɣef lebḥeṛ akk-d lqaɛa, yerfed afus-is ayeffus ɣer igenni,
yeggul s Win yeddren si lǧil ɣer lǧil , Win i d-ixelqen igenni, lqaɛa d lebḥeṛ d wayen yellan deg-sen, a d-yedṛu kullec mbla leɛḍil.
M'ara d-yaweḍ wass i deg ara nsel i ṣṣut n lbuq n lmelk wis sebɛa, imiren kra wayen yellan di lbaḍna n Sidi Ṛebbi ad yețwakemmel akken i t-id yenna i lenbiya.
Taɣect-nni i d-yekkan seg igenni, terna tenna-yi-d : Ṛuḥ, eddem-ed taktabt tamecṭuḥt yeldin deg ufus n lmelk-nni ibedden ɣef lqaɛa d lebḥeṛ.

Ṛuḥeɣ ɣer lmelk-nni, ssutreɣ-as a yi-d-yefk taktabt-nni tamecṭuḥt. Yenna-yi-d : Eddem-iț, sebleɛ-iț ; deg imi-k aț-țili ț-țaẓidant am tammemt, meɛna m'ara taweḍ ɣer uɛebbuḍ-ik, aț-țuɣal ț-țarẓagant.
Eddmeɣ-d taktabt-nni tamecṭuḥt seg ufus n lmelk iwakken aț-țeččeɣ, mi ț-greɣ deg imi-w ufiɣ-ț ț-țaẓidant, lameɛna mi tewweḍ ɣer uɛebbuḍ-iw, ččuṛen iẓerman-iw ț-țeṛzeg.
Nnan-iyi-d : Ilaq aț-țcireḍ daɣen ɣef wayen twalaḍ i waṭas n yegduden d leǧnas d igelliden n mkul tutlayt.
Fkan-iyi-d aɣanim s wayes țektilin, nnan-iyi-d : -- Ekker fell-ak, ektil lǧameɛ iqedsen n Sidi Ṛebbi, ktil daɣen adekkan i deg srusun iseflawen, tḥesbeḍ wid yețɛebbiden di lǧameɛ-agi.
Lameɛna afrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen, eǧǧ-it ur t-țektili ara, axaṭer yețțunefk i leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail, ara iṛekḍen tamdint n Lquds azal n tnin uṛebɛin wagguren.
Ad ceggɛeɣ sin inigan-iw ad sburren ticekkaṛin, iwakken ad ciren s wawal n Ṛebbi azal n tnin uṛebɛin wagguren.
Sin inigan-agi d snat n tzemrin akk-d sin n lemṣabeḥ i gbedden zdat Yillu Bab n lqaɛa n ddunit.
Ma yeɛṛeḍ yiwen a ten-iḍuṛṛ, tețțeffeɣ-ed tmes seg imawen-nsen tețțeț iɛdawen-nsen, akka ara yemmet kra win ara iɛerḍen a ten-iḍuṛṛ.

Sin inigan-agi sɛan tazmert ad ɣelqen tiwwura igenwan iwakken ur d-yekkat ara ugeffur deg ussan i deg ara țcirin awal n Ṛebbi ; sɛan daɣen tazmert ad rren aman d idammen, ad sexḍen lqaɛa s mkul lebla mkul tikkelt i deg ara bɣun.
M'ara faken aciri nsen, llafɛa ara d-yalin si tesraft lqayen, aț-țennaɣ yid-sen a ten teɣleb, yerna a ten-tneɣ.
Lǧețțat-nsen ad qqiment ḍelqent deg ubṛaḥ n temdint tameqqrant, i gețțumetlen s temdint n Sudum ț-țmurt n Maṣer, tamdint anda yețwaṣleb Ssid-nsen.
Lɣaci n mkul agdud, n mkul lǧens, n mkul tutlayt, n mkul tamurt, ad țfeṛṛiǧen deg-sen tlata wussan d wezgen, ur qebblen ara ad țwameḍlen.
Imdanen n ddunit meṛṛa ad ilin di lfeṛḥ ameqqran imi mmuten. Ad țemceggaɛen tirezfin wway gar-asen, axaṭer sin inigan-agi ḍuṛṛen-ten aṭas.
Mi ɛeddan tlata wussan-nni d wezgen, Ṛṛuḥ n Ṛebbi yesseḥya-d lǧețțat n lmegtin-nni, bedden ɣef yiḍaṛṛen-nsen. Kra wid yellan țfeṛṛiǧen deg-sen, tekcem-iten lxelɛa ț-țameqqrant.
Yiwet n taɣect ɛlayen i d-yekkan seg igenni tenna i sin inigan-nni : Alit-ed ɣer dagi ! Ulin deg usigna ɣer igenni, iɛdawen-nsen țmuqulen deg-sen.

Di teswiɛt-nni tewwet zzelzla tameqqrant, amur wis ɛecṛa n temdint yegrurej, mmuten sebɛa alaf yemdanen. Wid i gmenɛen si zzelzla-nni tekcem-iten tugdi, imiren setɛeṛfen s tezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi Bab n igenwan, ḥemden-t.
Tawaɣit tis snat tɛedda, ataya tețțeddu-d twaɣit tis tlata.
Lmelk wis sebɛa yewwet lbuq. Kra n tuɣac ɛlayen țɛeggiḍent deg igenni qqaṛent-ed : Lḥekma n ddunit tuɣal ɣer ifassen n Sidi Ṛebbi akk-d Lmasiḥ ines ; ad yeḥkem si lǧil ɣer lǧil.
Ṛebɛa uɛecrin-nni n lecyux yellan zdat Sidi Ṛebbi ɣef yimukan nsen n lḥekma, țseǧǧiden zdat Sidi Ṛebbi, țɛebbiden-t
qqaṛen : Nḥemmed-ik a Sidi Ṛebbi, a Bab n tezmert yellan si tazwara, yellan ar ass-a, imi tesxedmeḍ tazmert-ik tameqqrant yerna tesbeddeḍ lḥekma-inek.

Leǧnas llan kkren-d ɣuṛ-ek, lameɛna tura d urrif-ik i d-yewḍen, yusa-d lweqt i deg ara tḥasbeḍ lmegtin, ass i deg ara tkafiḍ iqeddacen-ik lenbiya, wid textaṛeḍ akk-d wid yețqadaṛen isem-ik, ama d imeẓyanen ama d imeqqranen s wayen uklalen ; ma d wid yessexṛaben ddunit a ten-tesnegreḍ.
Lǧameɛ iqedsen n Sidi Ṛebbi yellan deg igenwan yeldi-d, dɣa iban-ed zdaxel-is usenduq n leɛqed. Tebṛeq, terɛeḍ, nesla i tuɣac, tezlez lqaɛa, yeɣli-d webruri.
Tban-ed licaṛa ț-țameqqrant deg igenni : walaɣ yiwet tmeṭṭut tesburr-ed iṭij am llebsa, aggur seddaw iḍaṛṛen-is, tesɛa ɣef wuqeṛṛuy-is taɛeṣṣabt n tnac yitran.
Tella s tadist, yewweḍ-ed lweqt i deg ara d-tarew, tebda tețɛeggiḍ seg weqṛaḥ n tarrawt.
Tban-ed licaṛa nniḍen deg igenni : walaɣ yiwet llafɛa tazeggaɣt am tmes, tesɛa sebɛa iqeṛṛay akk-d ɛecṛa wacciwen, mkul aqeṛṛuy ters fell-as tɛeṣṣabt.
Ajelkkiḍ-is yezzuɣeṛ-ed țelt n yitran n igenni, ideggeṛ-iten-id ɣer ddunit. Llafɛa-nni tbedd zdat tmeṭṭut-nni ara d-yarwen, iwakken aț-țessebleɛ lṭufan-ines akken kan ara d-ilal.
Tesɛa-d aqcic ara yeksen leǧnas meṛṛa s tɛekkazt n wuzzal. Aqcic-nni yețwarfed ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi, ɣer wemkan n lḥekma-ines.
Tameṭṭut-nni terwel ɣer lexla anda i s-ihegga Sidi Ṛebbi amkan iwakken aț-țečč azal n walef umitin usețțin n wussan.
Yedṛa-d umenɣi deg igenni, Mixayel akk-d lmalayekkat-is nnuɣen akk-d llafɛa-nni. Llafɛa-nni d lmalayekkat-is nnuɣen-ten ula d nutni,
lameɛna ur ten-ɣliben ara, daymi i sen-yețwakkes wemkan-nsen deg igenni.
Llafɛa-nni tameqqrant tețțuḍeggeṛ ɣer ddunit nețțat d lmalayekkat-is, tin akken yellan d azrem-nni n zik yețțusemman Iblis, Cciṭan, tin i gxedɛen ddunit meṛṛa.

Sliɣ deg igenni i yiwen ṣṣut ɛlayen yeqqaṛ : tura yewweḍ-ed leslak, Nḥemmed-ik a Sidi Ṛebbi, lḥekma ț-țezmert i Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ, lḥekma n ddunit tuɣal ɣer ifassen n Lmasiḥ-ines, axaṭer win i gesseḍlamen atmaten-nneɣ, win yețcektayen fell-asen iḍ d wass zdat Sidi Ṛebbi Illu-nneɣ, yețțuḍeggeṛ seg igenni.
?elben-t watmaten-nneɣ s idammen n Izimer i ten-id-yefdan akk-d cchada-nsen fell-as yerna ur ɛuzzen ara tudert-nsen lameɛna sebblen-ț fell-as.
?ef wayagi feṛḥet ay igenwan, a wid i gzedɣen igenwan ! A nnger-im a lqaɛa ! A nnger-ik a lebḥeṛ ! Imi i d-iṣubb ɣuṛ-wen Cciṭan s wurrif ameqqran, axaṭer yeẓra drus n lweqt i s-d-iqqimen.
Llafɛa-nni, mi twala iman-is tețwaḍeggeṛ ɣer lqaɛa, tetbeɛ tameṭṭut nni i d-yesɛan aqcic.
Imiren kan țțunefken-as i tmeṭṭut-nni sin wafriwen n lbaz ameqqran iwakken aț-țafeg ɣer unezṛuf anda ara tɛic tlata iseggasen d wezgen, mebɛid ɣef wezrem.
Azrem-nni yessufeɣ-ed seg uqemmuc-is aman, feggḍen-d am asif deffir n tmeṭṭut-nni iwakken aț-țyawi uḥemmal.
Lameɛna lqaɛa tsellek tameṭṭut nni, tessebleɛ aman-nni i d-ifeggḍen seg uqemmuc n llafɛa-nni.
Llafɛa terfa ɣef tmeṭṭut-nni, tṛuḥ aț-țeskker imenɣi akk-d wid i d yeqqimen si dderya-s, wid i gḍuɛen lumuṛ n Sidi Ṛebbi yerna ṭṭfen di tideț n Sidna Ɛisa.
Llafɛa-nni tbedd ɣef ṛṛmel n lebḥeṛ.
Walaɣ yiwet leɛqiṛa tuli-d si lebḥeṛ, tesɛa sebɛa iqeṛṛay d ɛecṛa wacciwen, tesɛa ɣef wacciwen-is ɛecṛa tɛeṣṣabin, ma ɣef yiqeṛṛay-ines uran yismawen n rregmat.
Leɛqiṛa i walaɣ tecba aɣilas, iḍaṛṛen-is am wid n wersel, axenfuc is am uxenfuc n yizem. Llafɛa-nni tefka-yas tazmert aț-țeḥkem deg umkan-is s lḥekma tameqqrant.
Walaɣ yiwen seg iqeṛṛay-ines am akken yețwamzel, lameɛna lǧerḥ n tmezliwt-nni yeḥla. Imezdaɣ n ddunit meṛṛa dehcen ɣef wannect-agi, dɣa tebɛen leɛqiṛa-nni.
?seǧǧiden-as i llafɛa-nni, axaṭer tefka lḥekma-s i leɛqiṛa ; țseǧǧiden daɣen zdat leɛqiṛa qqaṛen : anwa yellan am leɛqiṛa, anwa i gzemren ad yennaɣ yid-es ?
Yețțunefk-as uxenfuc i seg i d-țeffɣen imeslayen iqebḥen akk-d rregmat ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi. Tețțunefk-as tezmert aț-țeḥkem azal n tnin uṛebɛin n wagguren.
Teldi axenfuc-is, tețqabaḥ Sidi Ṛebbi, treggem isem-is d wemkan i deg yețțili akk-d kra wid i gzedɣen deg igenni.
Serrḥen-as aț-țeskker imenɣi akk-d wid yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi yerna a ten-teɣleb. Tețțunefk-as lḥekma ɣef mkul lɛeṛc, ɣef mkul agdud, d mkul lǧens n mkul tutlayt.
Kra win ur nețwajerred ara di tektabt n tudert yellan seg wasmi tebda ddunit, di tektabt n Izimer immezlen, ad seǧǧden zdat-es.
Win yesɛan imeẓẓuɣen isel-ed !
Win i gețṛaǧu nnfu, ad yețwanfu ; ma d win yețṛaǧu ujenwi, ad yemmet s ujenwi. Daymi i glaq i wid yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi ad ṭṭfen di liman-nsen, ad sɛun ṣṣbeṛ.
Walaɣ daɣen yiwet leɛqiṛa nniḍen teffeɣ-ed seddaw n tmurt. Tesɛa sin wacciwen am wid n izimer, tețmeslay am llafɛa.
Tessexdam tazmert n leɛqiṛa tamezwarut ɣer tama-ines, teṣṣaweḍ armi terra imezdaɣ n ddunit meṛṛa țseǧǧiden zdat leɛqiṛa-nni tamezwarut i geḥlan si lǧerḥ-is.
Txeddem lbeṛhanat imeqqranen zdat yemdanen, tesseɣlay-ed times seg igenni ɣer lqaɛa.

Tețɣuṛṛu imezdaɣ n ddunit s lbeṛhanat i s-yețțunefken a ten texdem seddaw lḥekma n leɛqiṛa-nni tamezwarut, teqqaṛ asen : sbeddet yiwen lmeṣnuɛ ɣef ṣṣifa n leɛqiṛa-nni yețțewten s ujenwi tuɣal teḥla.
Leɛqiṛa tis snat, tețțunefk-as tezmert a s-tefk ṛṛuḥ i lmeṣnuɛ n leɛqiṛa-nni tamezwarut, iwakken lmeṣnuɛ-nni ad yizmir a d-yenṭeq, yerna ad ineɣ meṛṛa wid yugin a t-ɛebbden.
Leɛqiṛa-nni tḥețțem ɣef yemdanen, meẓẓi neɣ meqqeṛ, d igellil neɣ d ameṛkanti, d akli neɣ d aḥeṛṛi, ad wwten ticṛaḍ deg ufus ayeffus neɣ deg unyir-nsen,
yerna ula d yiwen ur izemmer ad yaɣ neɣ ad yezzenz, anagar win yesɛan ticṛaḍ-agi n yisem n leɛqiṛa neɣ numṛu n yisem-is.
Win iḥeṛcen yesɛan tamusni d leɛqel, a d-yaf lmeɛna n numṛu n leɛqiṛa yellan d isem n yiwen wergaz, numṛu-agi : d sețțemeyya usețța usețțin.
